# language_name:        Lacid
# closest ISO 639-3:    lsi
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           2009
# year_long:            
# vernacular_title:     Lacid Common Language Bible
# english_title:        The Bible in Lashi

# notes:                
40001001	He: da" khyoo: gi Abraham da" nya: zoo: yo' David da" nya: zoo: Yesu Khristu da" byuxeig shab Jhoem: mungdang: nghoid .
40001002	Abraham gi Isag ri khu: kaid . Isag gi Yaku ri khu: kaid . Yaku gi Yuda yo' nya: mang: nya: nhung" yi ri khu: kaid .
40001003	Yuda gi Thama mo Phared yo' Zerag ri doem khu: kaid . Phared gi Hesrum ri khu: kaid . Hesrum gi Aram ri khu: kaid .
40001004	Aram gi Aminada ri khu: kaid . Aminada gi Nason ri khu: kaid bye . Nason gi Salmon: ri khu: kaid .
40001005	Salmon gi Rahab mo Bua ri khu: kaid bye . Bua gi Rutha mo Obed ri khu: kaid bye . Obed gi Yese ri khu: kaid bye .
40001006	Yese gi David khokham" ri khu: kaid bye . David gi Uria da" yhoem: seing: myhi' ga: jang" mo - Sholumon ri khu: kaid bye .
40001007	Sholumon gi Rehoboam ri khu: kaid bye . Rehoboam gi Abia ri khu: kaid . Abia gi Asab ri khu: kaid . Asab gi Yosaphaid ri khu: kaid .
40001008	Yosaphaid gi Yoram ri khu: kaid . Yoram gi Uzia ri khu: kaid . Uzia gi Yotham ri khu: kaid bye .
40001009	Yotham gi Ahaza ri khu: kaid . Ahaza gi Hezekia ri khu: kaid .
40001010	Hezekia gi Manase ri khu: kaid . Manase gi Amon ri khu: kaid . Amon gi Yosia ri khu: kaid bye .
40001011	Yosia gi Babelon mung" moo thung: lo" lung" wa da" xeig moo Yekhonia yo' nya: mang: nya: nhoung" ri khu: kaid bye .
40001012	Babelon moo thung: loung" thang: ri Yekhonia gi Salathila ri khu: kaid . Salathila gi Zerubabela ri khu: kaid bye .
40001013	Zerubabela gi Abiu ri khu: kaid . Abiu gi Aliakim ri khu: kaid . Aliakim gi Azura ri khu: kaid .
40001014	Azura gi Zadug ri khu: kaid . Zadug gi Akhim yo , Eliu ri khu: kaid .
40001015	Eliu gi Aliaza ri khu: kaid . Eliaza gi Mathan ri khu: kaid bye . Mathan gi Yaku ri khu: kaid bye .
40001016	Yaku gi Mari da" yhoem: seing: phoo Yoseb ri khu: kaid bye . Mari gi Khristu ein: da" Yesu ri khu: kaid bye .
40001017	Houg: su" wigi Abraham da" pyaid mo David da" pyaid ju" sho' daxe: myid: xeig - hau: lho: David da" pyaid mo Babelon mung" moo thung: loung" lo" da" ayo , ju" sho' daxe: myid: xeig - Babelon moo thung: loung" jang mo Khristu da" pyaid ju" sho' daxe: myid: xeig nghoid .
40001018	Akhid" Yesu Khristu khu: lo da" khyoo: gi hid: su" nghoid . Nya: myhi' Mari gi Yoseb dang: myed: too" bye: nghoid loug we' nya: eig yug gi dage" azoem" nyid shi" ri Mari gi gyeungshang: Venyi: khyo" zoonu" gung bue" loo bye .
40001019	Nya: yhoem: seing: phoo Yoseb koem gi deung main" su: nghoid yoo mo nya: yhoem: seing: myhi' ri sho' athu' nhang: noug yoo mo nyang: ri gau" nhang: kaid wa ga: soin: nyid .
40001020	He: da" khyoo: damyid yu" nyid shi" uri yu" ge' . Aseing da" moug: lagyoo: dayug yhoeb' mo , moo nyang: ri gung re" yab shug lho: « David da" nya: zoo: Yoseb we" - re" da" yhoem: seing: myhi' Mari ri yu wa zi myid amyoo: . Nya: da" zoonu" gung gi hau: gyeungshang: da" Venyi: mo bue" lo da" zi nghoid .
40001021	Nyang: gi yuggi zoo: khu: loo wa zi nghoid . Nang nya: myeing ri Yesu ein: myheing byid: ca" wa . Khasu" wim gari nya: da" Byumyu" ri nyang: nya: youg: noo yooboo mo khyoid' yu wa su: nyang: nghoid nyid » .
40001022	He: da" khyoo: dangain" gi Lapi: bang: tid dang: byeung" loo ca" yoomo bue" loo bye .
40001023	Nyang: gi « yu" ge' zoomyi: gyeing" gi zoonu" gung bue" lo wigi yuggi zoo: khu: loo wa nghoid . Nya: myeing ri Emanuela ga: myheing byid: boem wa » ga: tid to" . Hau: da" dangkang: gi « Mangsoo ngoonu" yo' dage" nyid » ga: zi nghoid .
40001024	Yoseb yhoeb' so" ri" lang" hau: Aseing da" Mouglagyoo: nyang: ri tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nya: yhoem: seing: myhi' ri jha" yu bye .
40001025	Nghoidloug we' yuggi zoo: akhu: ri" ri" gi Mari yo" azoem" goo" looza: danyid nyid . Hau: yuggi zoo: ri Yoseb gi Yesu ga: myeing myheing byid: bye .
40002001	Akhid" Herod khokham" da" pyaid moo Yuda mung" mo Bedlehem voogung moo Yesu bain khu: lo thang: ri yu" ge' bid thu' mung" mo phajhi" bo da" byu yi gi Yerusalem voogung moo zheung: ju" re" boem wigi
40002002	« Khu: loo bye: da" Yuda khokham" gi kha: yoo: lha" . Nya: da" kyi: ri bid thu' mung" moo ngoonu" shau" myang bye . Houg: yoomo nyang: ri noku wa ngoonu" ju" re" boem: » ga: re" tid ago" .
40002003	Herod khokham" hau: da" dang: ri shau" gyoo: lang" gi nyang: yo' Yerusalem mo mo , dangain" - seing" gyo: kho" nyid boem wigi
40002004	Hau: byumyu" da" khainjung moo" yi yo' Tarha" sara: yi dangain" ri khe: zheung" to" lho: « Khristu ri khayoo: khu: to" boem wa lha" » Ga: nyangnu" ri myid: yu" da .
40002005	Nyangnu" nyang: tid da" zigi « Yuda mung" mo Bedlehem voogung moo khu: loo wa nghoid » ga: tid kyo" boem . Khasu" wim gari « lapi: yi da" lo , yo' hid: su" ga: lhid" to" . Nang je nge nyid zi anghoid . Nga" da" amyu" Israela ri shu" vhu" khu: wa da" zoug: gi nang mo thu' loo wa ga: wigi nyang: ri tid kyo" boem . › »
40002006	‹ Yuda mung" mo nang Bedlehem we" - Yuda voogung yi tho' moo
40002007	Houg: lang" Herod gi phajhi" boo mo , ri gau" khe: yu lho: hau: kyi: zeing thu' lo da" khyoo: ri myed: yu lho: wigi
40002008	Bedlehem khyoo nyangnu" ri nhang: kaid lho: wigi « cang yen: yu" lho: shau" myang lang" gi ngoo we' yhe: yo" noku sho' ngoori lo doem tid kyoo" kho' ge' » ga: tid kaid .
40002009	Hau: khohkam" da" dang: bain shau" gyoo: lang" nyangnu" thu' lo ri Yu" ge' bid thu' mung" da" kyi: gi Zoonu" khu: to" joyoo eung: eung: dab sho' nyangnu" da" shid' khyoo: dayhe: lo" nyid .
40002010	Hau: da" kyi: ri myang boem lang" gi nyangnu" gye" gau yi boem .
40002011	Hau: yhoem: moo ju" vang lo" boem ri zoonu" yo' nya: myhi' Mari ri myang boem wigi poid thug thoug lho: nyang: ri zheung: noku boem . Nyang: tu: nya: da" sadeig ri phang lho: nyang: ri sheing: - myi: nghe' nam pyo: xu: - myi: anghe' ja: mu" ra: jhung: shug ri thoid' yu boem lho: nyang: ri to' byid: boem .
40002012	Herod jhang khyo" adoem tau" loo" wa shid re" yhoeb' mo , moo nyangnu" ri mau lagyoo: re" tid poin" yoomo khyoo: goo" khaid khyo" nyang: nya: moug: khyoo: doem lo" byug boem bye .
40002013	Akhid" phajhi" boo mo , lo" byug thang: ri « Yu" ge' hau: Aseing da" moug: lagyoo: dayug gi Yoseb ri yhoeb' mo , moo thu' shug wigi too' we' hau: zoonu" yo' nya: myhi' ri shu" lho: Egutu mung" khyoo: phang: we' . Ngoo nang ri doem khe: da" bidnyid ju" sho' houg: moo dalo" nyid nyid we' . Khasu" wim gari hau: zoonu" ri said pyam wa ga: Herod sho: nyid bye: » ga: tid .
40002014	Houg: lang" Yoseb to wigi zoonu" mitang: ri myen" gam gung ri shu" thu' lho: Egutu mung" khyoo: phang: loo" bye . Herod so' she: thang da" bidnyid ju" sho' hau: mung" moo danyid nyid .
40002015	Hau: zigi « Nga" zoo: ri Egutu mung" mo ngoo khe: yu bye » ga: wigi lapi: tid to" hau: Aseing dang: byeung" loo baja" ga: bue" loo bye .
40002016	Herod gi phajhi" boo mo , mhau' too" khare" zi si lang" nheig yo: lho: wigi phajhi" boo mo , nyang: ri toin" shid da" ayo , ri soin: yu" wigi Bedlehem voogung yo' hau: mung" goin" mo eig zain vhoo: mo yuggi zoo: yi jhoid' said pyam bye .
40002017	Lapi: Yeremi tid to" da" dang: gi joeb byeung" loo bye .
40002018	« Hau: uri nyang: Rama joyoo moo kug myeing" shau" thui: gi myeing tei" to" zi shoug" gyo: boem bye . Rakhela nya: zoo: yi ngau nyid ri nheig teing byu aboo ga: wigi tid to . »
40002019	Akhid" Herod shid: lo" thang: ri Yu" ge' hau: Aseing da" moug: lagyoo: dayug gi Egutu mung" mo Yoseb jang" moo doem thu' loo bye .
40002020	« Too' we' hau: zoonu" yo' nya: myhi' ri shu" lho: Israela mung" khyoo: doem loo" we' hau: zoonu" da" kang: ri kuang mo , shid: boem bye: » ga: re" tid .
40002021	Houg: lang" nyang: to' wigi zoonu" yo' nya: myhi' ri shu" lho: Israela mung" khyoo: doem loo" bye .
40002022	Nghoidloug we' Akela-u gi nya: phoo Herod da" gung thid' Yuda mung" moo khokham" doem koid nyid zi Yoseb shau" gyoo: lang" nyang: myid gyoug nyid . Hau: tho' moo yhoeb' mo , khyo" nyang ri doem toin" shid yoomo Galile mung" khyoo: nyang: lo" wigi Nazared ga: da" voogung moo danyid nyid .
40002023	Houg: su" wigi Yesu ri « Nazared phoo ga: myheing boem wa » ga: lapi: yi tid to" dang: gi byeung" loo bye .
40003001	Hau: yo , hau: boin: moo Baptisma sara: Yohan nyid thu' lo wigi
40003002	« Mougkhung: mungdain: ju" lo nyid bye: yoomo nheigloem: thid' loo: ge' » ga: Yuda dain" pyoid yoo moo tarha" kho" nyid .
40003003	Lapi: Esaia tid da" dang: gi hau: Aseing khyoo: ri soin' nyheing too" ge' guid" da" khyoo: ri soin' nyheing koid ge' » › ga: wigi tid to" yug nyang: nghoid bye .
40003004	Hau: Yohan koem gi gola-ug moug" yo' yo , da" byimi void lho: shooyid bicu" cu" ci: - nya: da" zoo: noem gi siyoo mo jhen" khyeig nyoug yo' byoo: yhid: nghoid nyid .
40003005	Hau: uri Yerusalem mo mo , Yuda mung" mo mo , yo' Yodan gyid lang thei: tab' he: tab' mo mo , Yohan jhangmoo zheng: ju re .
40003006	Nyang: nya: youg noo yooboo ri thoid shed boem wigi Yohan da" lo , moo Yodan gyid lang mo baptisma ri zheung: kham: yu boem .
40003007	Akhid" Pharishe" yo' Saduke myoo" sho' mo , baptisma kham: yu wa ga: ju" re" boem zi Yohan lhoem: myang lang" nyang: bang: ri Yohan tid zigi « Akhyeing" da" myuno , Byumyu" yi we" - Mangso dang: khoo' da" zi thung" shau" zoo: wa da" yooboo shed: gyoin noo gyoin mo yo" phang: thu' loo" goo" baja" ga: nanu" ri hang" tid poin" go" lha" .
40003008	Houg: yoomo nheigloem: thid da" ashi" zei: ge'
40003009	Abraham gi ngoonu" da" nya: phoo nghoid ga: wigi ajho: nyid goo . Nanu" ri ngoo tid kyoo" ba: - Mangsoo gi he: da" lug loem: mo Abraham nya: zoo: yo" phain" thu' byid: wa .
40003010	Akhid" nyang: hau: da" voozung: gi shi" gam poem: moo zhung: too" bye . Houg" su" wigi ge da" ashi" azei: da" shi" gam jo , moo jo , ri thug lheing: pyam lho: myikhyoem' moo du" zei pyam' wa .
40003011	Ngoo gi nheigloem: thid' goo" baja" ein: nanu" ri gyid moo baptisma ri byid: bye . Nghoidloug we' nga" thang: moo ju" ri" wa su: gi nga" tho' mo yoem: je boo su: nghoid wigi nya: da" khyid: baid' voin byid: wa zilang" ngoo amoin: yi . Hau: yug gi gyeungshang: Venyi: moo we' myi: moo we' nanu" ri baptisma byid: wa su: nghoid .
40003012	Nya: da" lo , moo gug khyoo' lhang" khang" dakhyam" ci: wigi nya: gug boem ri geig khyo' kyeing yu" lho: mo da" gug shi" rigi nya: da" gug jhi: moo kaid' too" wa . Amo da" gug shi" rigi ayo" said da" myi: moo nghe' pyam' wa » ga: tid .
40003013	Hau: da" ayo , moo Yesu gi Yohan da" lo , mo baptisma yu wa ga: Galile mung" mo wigi Yodan gyid lang yam moo nyid da" Yohan jhangmoo ju" ri" bye .
40003014	Nyang: koem gi « ngoo loem: she' re" jang" mo baptisma yu wa ca" nyid da: . Nang loem: she' nga" jhangmoo dare" rhe" » ga: nyang: ri lhoem: tid da .
40003015	Houg: ri Yesu gi « akhid" nyang: houg: zei: byid: we' deung main" da" khyoo: ja: khang" moo" ri zei: byeung" wa zigi ge nyid bye: » ga: nyang: ri tid . Houg: lang" hau: moo" nyang: ri zei: byid: bye .
40003016	Akhid" Yesu baptisma bain kham: yu lang" gyid thoem" mo to' thu' lo" da" uri yu" ge' mougkhoung: khoem" duang: bang" lo" lho: Mangso da" Venyi: gi pheing" kyoug" su" dang: gyoo" lo wigi nya: tho' moo zhoung: jo , zi nyang: myang .
40003017	Hau: tho' moo gootu: « he: yug gi ngoo vho: ngei da" nga" jheddab zooshang: nyang: nghoid bye: » ga: mougkhoung: mo thui: myeing thu' lo .
40004001	Houg: lang" yu satan: jhu' phyo' zi shau" baja" ga: gyeungshang: da" Venyi: gi Yesu ri dain pyoid' yoo: khyoo: shu" lam" loo" bye .
40004002	Bid' nyid myid: xi: nyid" voem: ashau" zoo: loo: lang" nyang: gi zoo gye" yoid nyid bye .
40004003	Hau: uri jhu' phyo' su: yu satan: ju" re" wigi « Nang Mangso da" nya: zoo: nghoid deung rigi he: lugzeing ri zooyho' bue" loo we' ein: tid we' » ga: tid .
40004004	Yesu gi « Byu gi zooyho' yo' za: kangso' dei nyid zi anghoid . Mangso mungdang: bain sho' yo' kangso' dayo" dei nyid » ga: tid .
40004005	Houg: lang" jhu' phyo' su: yu satan: gi Yesu ri gyeungshang: da" voogung khyoo shu" vang lo" lho: akyu" mho' yhoemkhung: myhang: thang jang" moo do , loo" nhang: lho: wigi
40004006	« Jhoem: mougsoug" moo nya: moug: lagyoo: yi da" lo , wigi vu , yu wa ga: tid to . Nang Mangso nya: zoo: nghoid deung rigi hug: mo byam gyo" yu" we' › » ga: tid .
40004007	Yesu gi « ‹ hug: re" da" Mangsoo ri nang yo" ca: yu" zi anghoid › ga: jhoem: mougsoug" moo lhid" to" » ga: doem phoug tu" .
40004008	Hau: thang: ri yu satan: gi Yesu ri gye" myang: da" boem tho' khyoo shu" do , lo" lho: Moug: myid mungdain: dangain" yo' hau: zi joem khayhi' yung" bang da" khyoo: ri dalheing: dam lo" toin" shid lho: wigi
40004009	Nyang: ri « nang ngoori dajhi' goeb pid nghoid rigi hid: myang gu: dangain" ngoo nang ri byid: wa » ga: tid .
40004010	Yesu gi yu satan: ri hid: su" ga: doem tid . « satan: we" - nga" jang" mo thu' loo" we' . Khasu" wim gari nang gi re" Mangsoo ri za: vhu" pid pid ca" - Cung" nghei byid: ca" ga: tid to" zi nang anghab yu" lha" » ga: phoug tid .
40004011	Houg: lang" yu satan: gi Yesu jang" mo phang: loo" bye . Hau: thang: ri mau lagyoo: yi Yesu ri re" doo" zho" boem .
40004012	Baptism sara: Yohan ri myheig bye: ga: da" khyoo: ri Yesu shau" gyoo: lang" nyang: gi galile mung" khyoo: vang lo" .
40004013	Nyang: gi Nazared voo moo anyid loo: za: Zebulon yo' Nabthali mung" mougkyoo" - Galile mung" yam mo Kapernaum Yesu da" voo moo lo" nyid nyid .
40004014	Hid: su" bue" loo wa da" khyoo: ri Lapi: Esaia tid to" dang: deung loo wa shid re" nghoid . Lapi: Esaia gi gyid nung" yam - Yodan gyid lang thei: tab cang Tungbau byumyu" yi nyid da" Galile mung .
40004015	« Zebulon yo' Nabthali mung" moo
40004016	Moug coid khoug: moo nyid da" Byumyu" gi bidbang zeing ri myang boem wa . shid: zau: da" bid shoem: yoeb moo zhung: jo , mo , da" atho' moo bidbang ju" ri" wa » ga: kho" kyo" to .
40004017	Hau: ayo , moo Yesu gi « Mougkhung: mungdain: ju" ri bye yoomo nanu" da" yooboo mo nheigloem: thid' loo ge » ga: Tarha" kho" shid" bye .
40004018	Akhid" Galile thoem" yam moo so" lo da" uri nya: mang: yo' nya: nhung" tang nghoid da" Petru ga: da" Simon yo' nya: nhung" Andre: eig yug goin du" yen" lang" zi Yesu lo" myang . Khasu" wim gari nya: eig yug gi ngoo: kuang yen" su: eig yug nghoid .
40004019	Houg: lang" Yesu gi « Nga" thang: cang ge' re" eig yug ri Byu cang kuang da" byu koid' wa » ga: tid .
40004020	Houg: lang" jang: nya: eig yug gi goin ri she: pyam' too" kho' lho: Yesu da" thang: moo bo cang loo" bye .
40004021	Houg: mo doem xo' so" lo" ri gootu: dazoem" Zebedi da" nya: zoo: tang: Yaku yo' nya: nhung" Yohan gi nya: phoo yo' dage" lhid' khau: moo goin pho: nyid lang" zi lo" myang lang" nya: eig yug ri we' dalheing: dam khe: shu" loo" bye .
40004022	Hau: tang: we' lhid' yo' nya: phoo ri she: pyam' too" kho' lho: Yesu da" thang: moo bo cang loo" bye .
40004023	Hau: lho: Yesu gi Galile mung" goin" cang koem" yen" zoore" - nyang: bang: da" Tarha" jung yi moo cang jhoug" byid: yen" wigi hau: mungdain: da" ngeibu: lu dang: cang kho" yen" ziyo' mung" byu yi da" noo phyoo" aja: ja: - nooboug: aja: ja: ri zheung: ge loo nhang: yen .
40004024	Houg: yoomo Yesu da" khyoo: ri Suri mung" goin" - lei: khyoug: su phoid nhami lhupyo' nhang: lo" boem wigi Gung du: angei apyoo: mo , noo phyoo" aja: ja: shau" mo , yo' yu dab deizoo: dab mo , ngho' baid baid mo , yo' khyid: joem: lo , joem: shid: mo , myoo" sho' nya: jhang shu" ju" re" boem ri dangain" ri lhoem: ze: ge lho: nhang: kaid bye .
40004025	Houg: yoomo Galile mung" yo' Dekapoli mung" - Yerusalem voogung yo' Yuda mung" goin" - Yodan gyid lang thei: tab' voo khyab' daxi: mo mo , Byu ajoem atung: bang: gi nya: jang" moo bo cang yen .
40005001	Akhid" byu ajoem atung: ri shau" myang lang" Hau: bouggung tho' khyoo: nyang: do , loo" bye . Bouggung tho' moo lo" zhung: jo , ri nya: cangzoo: yi zeing: lo boem lho: wigi
40005002	Nyang: dang: phang lho: nyangnu" ri ngilho' wa da" Tarha" kho" kyo" da" zigi
40005003	« Venyi: moo asho" ajhen: nghoid nyid mo , gi ngilho' boem wa . Khasu" wim gari Mougkhung: da" mungdain: gi nyangnu" shau" seing: boem wa zi nghoid .
40005004	« Koug shu: shau" mo , gi ngilho' boem wa Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo nyanu" nyang: ri nheig teing byid: zi shau" boem wa .
40005005	« Nheugloem: nu" nham' mo , gi ngilho' boem wa . Khasu" wim gari nyanu" nyang: gi Mangso dang: theing to" da" mainkaid jeju" yo" yu boem wa zi nghoid .
40005006	« Mangsoo vho: da" khyoo: ri vho: ngei nyid mo , gi ngilho' boem wa . Khasu" wim gari nyanu" nyang: vho: da" khyoo: ri we' Mangsoo wigi jhoeb pyeing byid: wa zi nghoid .
40005007	« Subi" ri nheing se' khyeig mo , gi ngilho' boem wa . Khasu" wim gari nyanu" nyang: ri Mangsoo nheig khyeig zi doem shau" boem wa .
40005008	« Nheugloem: yung" mo , gi ngilho' boem wa . Khasu" wim gari nyanu" nyang: gi Mangsoo ri shau" myang boem wa .
40005009	« Shangei shapyoo: si' mo , gi ngilho' boem wa . Khasu" wim gari nyanu" nyang: ri Mangso da" nya: zoo: ga: myheing: byid: boem wa .
40005010	« Mangso da" deung main" khyoo: cang yoomo pyi: sho: dam kaid zi shau" nyid mo , gi ngilho' boem wa . khasu" wim gari Mougkhung: mungdain: ri nyanu" nyang: shau" seing: boem wa .
40005011	« Nga" da" khyoo: yoomo subi" nanu" ri juang" yi lho: yooboo aja: ja: foin: to" uri nanu" gi ngilho' bye . Nanu" da" shid mo Lapi: yi ri we' nyangnu" houg: su" shen" yhen boem ziyo' mhau' fain" khyo" cang lho: xang: shid" mo lapi: yi ri we' houg: yo" dakhyoo" ti" pyi: sho: boem bye .
40005012	Gauyi zoore" pyoo" pyoo: danyid ge' . Khasu" wim gari mougkhung: tho' moo nanu" da" vhu" kung: phoug" gi gye" myo: jo , bye .
40005013	« Nanu" gi mougmyid da" xoo" yo' du ago" - hau: xoo" phue: lo" byug rigi kha: mo doem se' ngham" loo wa lha" . Nghi: khyoo: she: pyam to" lho: subi" nang: pye" pyam tho' moo gootu: ce" akyu" we' aboo loo .
40005014	« Nanu" gi mougmyid bidbang yo' du ago" - boem tho' moo tam: to" da" voogung ri ce: zewe' ayo" go too .
40005015	Myibung: ri tab' lho: lain" wigi hang" azhung" lhung to" yu" - myibung: ki" jang: moo ke" to" rigi dayhoem: goin" mo , myo , yo" myang .
40005016	Houg: su" wigi subi" gi nanu" da" ge moozoo" ri yo" myang lang" gi Mougkhung: tho' moo nyid da" nanu" da" nya: phoo ri yo" coung" nghei byid: goo" baja" - nyangnu" da" shid khoin" moo nanu" da" bidbang ri thoin" pang too" byid: ge" o" .
40005017	« Moshe toung: to" da" tarha" yo' Lapi: yi da" dang: ri ngoo phyo' pyam wa yhangti" amyid wim goo" - phyo' pyam wa shid re" anghoid hau: ziri joeb pyeing wa ein: ngoo dare .
40005018	Nanu" ri ngoo deung" deung tid ba - Mougkhung: yo' myidjang: abyo , loo" shi" ri hau: zi abui" bui" gi hau: toung: to" da" Tarha" mo dang: myhi' dakhoin" yo' dang: khyoo: dakhoin" we' yo" led loo" wa zi anghoid .
40005019	Houg: su" yoomo hang" nghoid loug we' houg: mo nge da" Tarha" dakhoin" ri cang lho: Subi" ri we' yo" cang sho' jhoug" byid: mo , gi Mougkhung: mungdain: moo gyi: thang mo , ein: boem wa .
40005020	Khasu" wim gari ngoo nanu" ri tid da" zigi nanu" da" deung byeung" khyoo: ri toung: to" da" tarha" ri jhoug" byid: da" sara: yi yo' Pharishe yi da" deung byeung" tho' moo aje gyi: rigi Mougkhung: mungdain: moo nanu" deung" deung ayo" vang lo" boem wa .
40005021	« Nanu" byu ge said wa zi anghoid . Byu said su: gi yung" moo yooboo byid: moin: yi" ga: goonham mo , ri tid to" zigi nanu" shau" gyo: yu" boem bye .
40005022	Ngoo nanu" ri tid da" zigi nya: mang: nya: nhung" ri nheig yoo: su: hang" nghoid loug we' yooboo byid: wa zi moin: yi" nyid bye . Nya: mang: nya: nhung" ri yooboo hoeb' ga: tid su: we' hau: ludaid phung: mo dang: khoo' gi" bye . Hau: lho: koo" dau: he: zi ga: tid su: gi ngarai" myi: yo' moin: yi" nyid bye .
40005023	Houg: su" lho: hau: Mangso da" phoin: tho' hkyoo: - re" da" xoin" jhung: shug ci: yhe: lo" nghoid rigi re" mang: re" nhung" nang ri yooboo foin: jang: daja: ja: myid boin: lo nghoid rigi
40005024	Mangso da" phoin: nam moo re" da" xoin" ri too" kho' lho: re" mang: re" nhung" yo' shi" lo" sham: veing" goo" ge' . houg: su" bain koid' lho: re" da" xoin" ri Mangso da" phoin: tho' moo ki" we' .
40005025	« Nang ri jhen: dab goo" su: yo' dage" ayo , yoo" shi" uri myab myab sham: veing" goo" ge' . houg: su" anghoid ri jhen: boo su: gi nang ri tarha" agyi yung" moo ab pyam' ri" wa . Tarha" agyi gi nang ri dang: kho' da" ludaid' yi da" lo , moo ab pyam' wa nghoid wigi nang ri thung: khyo' pyam' zi shau" wa .
40005026	Nanu" ri ngoo deung" deung tid da" zigi Ngei jhen: bain sho' nang axab' xab' gi houg: mo nang yo" loid lo" wa zi anghoid .
40005027	« Sube" myi: age lhoid' ga: zigi nanu" shau" gyo: yu" boem bye .
40005028	Ngoo nanu" ri tid zigi nheigloem: moo yu" ngei ziyo' - myiyi: zoo: ri yu" yu" lho: vho: da" nheigloem: boo su: gi nya: da" nheigloem: khoug: moo hau: da" myiyi: zoo: yo' myi: lhoid' da" moo" zei bye .
40005029	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo re" lo , yo' myojid" nang ri yu" shoid nhang: nghoid rigi hau: myojid" ri kyung" thoid pyam' we' re" da" gung goin" ngarai" mung" moo gyoo" lo" tho' moo re" gung daja: te: yoin" zigi je ge nyid .
40005030	Re" da" lo , yo lo , nang ri shoid' nhang: nghoid rigi hau: lo , ri jab khyo' pyam' we' gung goin" ngarai mung" moo gyoo" loo" wa tho' moo re" gung daja: te: yoin" wa zi gi je ge nyid .
40005031	« Houg: za: we' anghoid - re" yhoem: seing: myhi' ri kang" pyam' nau ri nyang: ri kang" kaid' da" mougsoug" byid: we' ga: dang: jo , bye .
40005032	Nghoidloug ngoo nanu" ri tid da" zigi lang lhoid yoomo za: anghoid rigi nya: myi: ri kang" pyam' su: gi nyang: ri lang lhoid nhang: kaid zi nghoid . Houg: kang" pyam' da" myiyi: ri loxo' yu su: we' sube" myi: lhoid' da" yooboo yoo" bye .
40005033	« Nang mhau' lho: jham' age tang: - nang nheung" da" dang: gi hau: Aseing wigi nang nyang: ri zang" loo nhang: wa ga: goo" nham' mo , ri tid to" zi nanu" shau" gyoo: yu" goo" wam: bye .
40005034	Ngoo nanu" ri tid da" zigi nanu" ce" ja: moo" moo we' nheing" go" - jham tang: go" da" khyoo: akoid: goo . Mougkhung: myeing we' yo" yu zi anghoid . Houg: gi Mangso da" zhung: tang nghoid .
40005035	Myidjang: myeing yu lho: we' jham' age tang: - houg: gi Mangso da" khyid: theing jang: nghoid . Yerusalem voogung ri we' anghoid . Houg: gi khokham" zeing da" zhung: tang nghoid .
40005036	Re" da" vhuloem moo we' jham' age tang: - re" da" xam: dakhaid ri lang" phyu: we' no , we' ga: nang yo" koid: zi anghoid .
40005037	Re" da" dang: gi « nghoid » ga: lang" gi nghoid bye anghoid ga: lang" gi anghoid baja" . Hau: tho' mo jain" tid da" dang: gi hau: age su: yo' dasen: nyid .
40005038	« ‹ Myo , dajid" moo dajid" - zei dakhaid moo dakhaid - doem tau" byid: ca" › ga: da" dang: ri nanu" shau" gyo: yu" boem bye .
40005039	Nghoidloug ngoo nanu" ri tid da" zigi akhyeing" su: ri ce" latoo: we' aphug goo" - re" lo , yo shoid' bopyug pyug byid: su: - ri dashoid' we' doem kham: byid: shi" we'
40005040	Nang ri dang: khoo' lho: wigi re" da" akhau: byi: yu pyam' byid: su: ri re" da" adang byi: we' khyoid' byid: shi" we'
40005041	Nang ri doin: zeig nau wigi khyoo damain: yhi: nhang: su: yo' dage" khyoo: eig main: cang yhi: shi" we' .
40005042	Mho' su: ri byid: we' re" jang" mo daja: ja: jhid" nghoo" noug su: ri we' ahe: pyam .
40005043	« ‹ Re" byumyu" ri te: jheddab lho: re" gyivoo yi rigi anoug angei koid we' › ga: da" dang: gi nanu" shau" gyoo: goo" wam: bye .
40005044	Ngoo nanu" ri tid da" zigi nanu" da" gyivoo yi ri jheddab ge' . nanu" ri shin" yhen , mo , shid re" akyu" mho' byid: ge' .
40005045	Houg: su" nghoid ri za: Mougkhung: tho' moo nyid da" phoo Mangso da" nya: myid: nya: zoo: yi gi nanu" yo" bui" wa zi nghoid . Khasu" wim gari agi mo , yo" gi mo , da" tho' moo nya: bid ri thu' nhang: nyid wigi deung byeung" mo , yo" adeung byeung" mo , da" tho' moo moug: ri voo byid: nyid .
40005046	Na nu" ri jheddab mo , ri za: jheddab nghoid rigi nanu" ce: akyu" boo wa lha" . Kheing" khyu: zoo: mo , we' houg: su" koid: boem bye anghoid goo" la" .
40005047	Nanu" da" nya: mang: nya: nhoung" yo" za: shau" doem go" nghoid rigi ci: je nghoid cang boo goo" wa lha" . Mangsoo ri asi shi" mo , we" houg: su" lhung koid: boem anghoid goo" la" .
40005048	Houg: su" wigi Mougkhung: tho' moo nanu" da" nya: phoo gi joeb byeung" nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" we' joeb byeung" nyid ge' .
40006001	« Subi" myang baja" ga: nyangnu" shid khoin" moo nanu" myonhoo: sho: da" moo" ri azei: wa shid re" zed" nyid ge' . Houg: su" anghoid rigi Mougkhung: tho' moo nyid da" nanu" nya: pho , jang" mo aphoug" ri yo" yu goo" wa zi anghoid .
40006002	« Nang alu: kaid nghoid rigi Subi" coung" byid: zi yo" yu baja" ein: - tarha" jung joem mo: - khyoo: kang" nooyoo moo we' ayid void da" byu yi yhangti" - re" shid khoin" moo laboo" amoid nhang . Nanu" ri ngoo jhug jhug tid zi gi houg: su" koid: mo , gi nyang: nya: aphoug" ri yo" yu boem bye .
40006003	Nang alu: byid: nghoid rigi re" lo , yo lo , koid: da" moo" ri lo , koung" lo , ri asi nhang .
40006004	Houg: su" - nang alu: byid: da" moozoo" - hang" amyang ase' jang moo nghoid nyid ri hang" amyang ase' da" joyoo ri myang se' da: - re" phoo gi nang ri doem tau" byid: wa zi nghoid .
40006005	« Nanu" akyu" mho' nyid nghoid rigi ayid void da" byu yi yhangti" akoid: goo . Khasu" wim gari subi" nyanu" nyang: ri yo" myang goo" baja" ga: tarha" jung yi yo' khyoo: kang" shoem: moo cang yab' lho: Akyu" mho' wa zi nyangnu" vho: boem da . Nanu" ri ngoo jhug jhug tid ba - nyangnu" gi aphoug" yo" yu abye: go .
40006006	Nang akyu" mho' nghoid rigi re" da" khoug: lhung yab khyoo vang lo" lho: khoem" ri we' myhed" pyam' wigi hang" we' amyang da" joyoo moo re" phoo ri mho' we' hang" we' amyang da" joyoo ri yo" myang da" re" phoo gi nang mho' ziri byid: wa zi nghoid .
40006007	« Nanu" akyu" mho' nyid ri tarha" tungbau mo byu yi yhangti" - dang: pug apoug mho' goo . Khasu" wim gari dang: sheing" sheing: mho' nyid yoomo tam" gyoo: byid: wa yhangti" nyangnu" myid wim nyid boem ago" .
40006008	Nanu" amho' shi" ri lang" nanu" ci: vho: zi dangain" - nanu" da" nya: phoo Mangsoo gi se' nyid gu nghoid yoomo tarha" tungbau mo mo , yhangti" amho' nyid goo" .
40006009	Houg: su" yoomo nanu" gi hid: su" ein: akyu" mho' ge' . ‹ Mougkhung: tho' mo ngoonu" da" phoo Mangsoo we' . Re" myeing re" khyang" gyeungshang: nyid baja" .
40006010	Re" mungdain: we' ju" loo baja" . Mougkhung: tho' moo nang nheig deig nyid yhangti" - myidjang: tho' moo we' re" nheig deig jang: bue" loo baja" .
40006011	Ngoonu" moo ca" nyid da" zoo: noem - khid" nyid" ngoonu" ri byid: we' .
40006012	Subi" ngoonu" ri shoid' da" yooboo - ngoonu" khyoid pyam' byid: yhangti" - ngoonu" da" yooboo ri we' khyoid pyam' byid: we' .
40006013	Ngoonu" ri jhu' phyo' jang" moo ayhi: nhang: lo za: yu deizoo: lo , mo khyoid yu we' o" . ‹ Coid doem: boo" doem: ri vhoeb da" akhang" yo" - phung" yoeb myonhoo: ngilang: gi Apyaid atoo: nang moo za: dajo , jo , baja" o" - Amen . ›
40006014	« Khasu" wim gari sube" da" shoid' vhang: yooboo ri khyoid pyam' byid: nghoid rigi Mougkhung: mo nanu" da" nya: phoo we' nanu" shoid' vhang: da" yooboo ri khyoid pyam' byid: wa .
40006015	Sube" da" yooboo ri ayo" khyoid' pyam byid: nghoid rigi nanu" da" nya: phoo we' nanu" shoid vhang: da" yooboo ri khyoid pyam' pyid: wa zi anghoid .
40006016	« Nanu" zoo: noem zeung: nyid nghoid rigi ayid void ci: da" byu yi yhangti" - nanu" myonhoo: ashoo: goo" sube" shid khoin" moo nyangnu" zoo: noem yo" zeung: zi myang baja" ga: nyangnu" gi nyang nya: da" myonhoo: ri mhau: shoem nhang: ago" . Houg: yoomo yoo" eung: da" akyu" ri nyangnu" yo" yu boem bye .
40006017	Nang zoo: noem zeung nyid nghoid rigi myojid" wi ayo" myang da" nya: phoo mo led lho: hang" we' asi wa shid re" myo , ced" xam: kyo' nyid ge' .
40006018	Houg: gi byu shid moo anghoid - hang" we' amyang da" joyoo moo nyid nyid da: - Re" pho , shid khoin" moo za: nang zoo: noem zeung: da" khyoo: myang nyid wa nghoid wi gi hau: hang" amyang da" joyoo ri yo" myang da" re" phoo gi nang ri doem tau" byid: wa zi nghoid .
40006019	« Nhau: yo" zo: wi zo: shoin , lho: khoug" mo , yo" khau" baid' thoid yu lo" se' da: - myidjang: tho' moo nanu" da" ziyoo jonu" ri ayoung: too" goo .
40006020	Nhou: yo" zoo ayo" zo: shoin , - khoug" mo , we' ayo" baid thoid , ayo" khau" lo" da" Mougkhung: tho' moo nanu" da" ziyoo jonu" ri young: too" ge' .
40006021	Khasu" wim gari re" da" ziyoo jonu" jo , jang" moo re" da" nheigloem: we' jo , yoomo nghoid .
40006022	« Hau: myojid" gi re" da" gung du: mo myibung: nghoid nyid . Re" da" myojid" soo" soo" gyeung: nghoid rigi re" da" gung goin" bang nyid .
40006023	Re" da" myojid" age nghoid rigi re" da" gung goin" moug: coid' nghoid nyid . Nang moo bo da" bidbang gi moug: coid bue" byug nghoid rigi hau: moug: coid' gi khayhi' thu: no , jo , wa lha" .
40006024	« Hang" nghoid loug we' Aseing: eig youg jang" moo lang: jhang yo" vang wa zi anghoid . Nyang: gi dayug ri ngheing" lho: dayug rigi jheddab wa zi nghoid . Houg: su" anghoid lang" gi dayug rigi vho: lho: dayug rigi anoug angei koid: zi nghoid . Nanu" gi Mangsoo ri we' moug myid ziyoo jonu" ri we' dage" lang: jhang yo" vang wa zi anghoid .
40006025	« Houg: su" wigi ngoo nanu" ri tid da" zigi cizoo: wa cishau" wa dei nyid wa shid re" civoid wa khasu" koid: wa ein: gung du: shid re" myid amyoo: goo . Hau: kang: so' gi zoo: noem tho' moo gung du: gi byime tho' moo je phau" zi anghoid .
40006026	Moug: moo dang: yen" da" ngho' joem ri yu" yu" ge' . nyangnu" gi atei: ashab' sadeig moo we' akaid too" - nghoid loug mougkhoung: mo nanu" da" nya: phoo gi ngho' joem ri we' zoo: noem zho" nyid da . Nanu" gi ngho' joem tho' moo je gyi: anghoid goo" la" .
40006027	Nanu" mo khayug nghoid loug we' nyang: nya: da" apyaid' sheing: baja" ga: zain nyid dajhi' koo: yo" loung: kaid: go" wa la" .
40006028	« Hau: lho: byime shid re" ci: wim myid myo: nyid go" la" . dain" yoo mo myi vhoeb' bain: joem khasu" youg gyi: lo ziri myed yu" ge' .
40006029	Nghoidloug ngoo nanu" ri tid da" zigi Sholumon lang" gi nya: myonhoo: ngilang: dangain" moo bain: dakyang: yo" lhang" amoin: yi .
40006030	Ade: loem" jeung" da" mo , we" - akhid" nyid" te: youg jo , lho: nab' yo nyid" gi myi: khyoem , moo du" zei pyam' wa da" vu , fu myo , ri lang" Mangsoo houg: su" zho" jhoug coung: goin nghoid rigi hau: tho' mo nanu" ri je zho" jhoug coung: goin wa anghoid goo" la" .
40006031	« Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi myid myoo: ung: loug zoore" ‹ ngoonu" cizoo: wa cishug wa civoid wa lha" . ein: wigi atid nyid goo" › .
40006032	( Khasu" wim gari tarha" tungbau mo mo , we' hau: gu: dangain" ziri sho: nyid ago" ) houg: dangain" ziri nanu" vho: nyid zigi mougkhoung: tho' mo nanu" da" nya: phoo gi se' nyid gu nghoid .
40006033	Nanu" koem gi nya: da" mungdain: yo' nya: da" deung byeung" khyoo: ri xang: shid" sho: nyid ge' . houg: lang" hau: zi dangain" nanu" ri poug lung: byid: wa nghoid .
40006034	Houg: yoomo nab , yo nyid" shid re" myid amyoo: goo" - nab , yo nyid" gi nya: shid re" kyi" khyeug wa zi nghoid . Khid" nyid" kyi" khyeug zigi khid" nyid" shid mo gi" bye .
40007001	« Nanu" ri yooboo byid: dang: kho' zi ashau" baja" - subi" ri yooboo byid: dang: khoo' zi akoid: goo .
40007002	Khasu" wim gari Nangnu" nyang: yooboo byid: khyo" cang wigi nanu" ri we' yooboo byid: dang: kho' zi shau" goo" wa . Nanu" nyang: leig byid: kaid da" tang mo nanu" nyang: ri doem leig byid: wa .
40007003	Nyang: nya: myojid" moo bo da" thang" tung" rigi amyed yu" loo: - re" mang: re" nhoung" da" myojid" moo bo da" phei" lhoug: ri cikoid: yu" nyid , go" lha" .
40007004	Yu" we' re" da" myojid" moo thang" tung" kaid to" lho: ‹ ahain: shi" - re" da" myojid" mo phei" lhoug: yu pyam' byid: wa › ga: re" mang: nhung" phoo ri khasu" wim se' tid nyid lha" .
40007005	Akug void to" mo , we" - re" da" myojid" mo thang" tung" ri xang: shid" yu pyam' we' hau: thang: ri she' re" mang: nhung" pho , da" myojid" mo myo , vang ri yu pyam' byid: we' .
40007006	« Gyeungshang: da" ziri lakhuid" joem ri abyid: goo . Nanu" da" vhu" shid ri vu , joem da" shid khoin" moo ashe: pyam' too" goo" - houg: su" anghoid lang" vu , joem gi nang: nhe" pyam' wa . Lakhuid" joem gi lo tau" ngaid boem wa .
40007007	« Mho' ge' . houg: lang" nanu" yo" yu goo" wa . Shoo: ge' . houg: lang" nanu" shau" myang goo" wa . Ko' ge' houg: lang" nanu" shid re" khoem" phang byid: wa .
40007008	Khasu" wim gari mho' mo , hang" we' yo" yu shoo: mo , we' shau" myang . Ko' nyid mo , ri we khoem" hpang byid .
40007009	Nangnu" mo hang" nghoid loug we' nya: zoo: gi zooyho' mho' ri lug pyi" byid: wa la" .
40007010	Ngoo: do , mho' ri lhang: myu byid: wa la" .
40007011	Houg: su" wigi nanu" lang" akhyeing" ashoeb nyid mo , nyang: nya: da" zoo: yi ri ge da" jhung: shug se' byid: nghoid rigi hau: tho' re" je ge da" mougkhoung: tho' mo nanu" da" nya: phoo gi nyang: ri mho' mo , ri ge da" jhung: shug abyid: wa ein: go" la" .
40007012	« Subi" nanu" ri pang" thoug byid: wa nanu" vho: nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - subi" ri we' nanu" cang pang" thoug ge' . Hau: da" zigi toung: to" da" tarha" yo" - lapi: yi da" dang: gung nyang: nghoid bye .
40007013	« Jhab' da" khoem" duang: khyo" vang loo ge' . khasu" wim gari joem: lo" jang" moo ju" yhe: da" khoem" duang: gi gye" lam: ziyo' - khyoo: we' gye" yhi: lei wigi houg: khyoo vang loo" mo , gye myo: ago" .
40007014	Apyaid' atoo: kangso' dei da: khyoo moo ju" da" khoem" duang: yo" khyoo: gi soo" soo" jhab' yoo mo shau" sho: vang loo" mo , atham .
40007015	« Nheugloem: ung: khoug: moo gi lang: kyen: phyo' zoo: wa ga: zeigne nheigloem: kaid ci: lho: yang yid void to" mo , nanu" jang" moo ju" loo wa mhau' da" lapi: yi ri jang" pyam' ge' .
40007016	Nyangnu" nya: da" ashi" yo , nyangnu" ri si' wa zi nghoid . Zukyen: byab moo zabyidd" shi" - salau" gam mo shi" myho , shi" yo" phyo' yu" la" .
40007017	Houg: su" wigi ge da" shi" gam moo gi ge da" ashi" zei: jo . Age da" shi" gam moo gi age da" ashi" zei: jo .
40007018	Ge da" shi" gam moo gi age da" ashi" zei: wa zi anghoid . Age da" shi" gam gi ge da" ashi" zei: wa zi anghoid .
40007019	Amo da" ashi" zei: da" shi" gam jo , moo jo , rigi thoug lheing: pyam' lho: myi: khyoem moo du" zei pyam' zi shau" nyid ago" .
40007020	Houg: su" wigi nyangnu" nya: da" ashi" yo" - nyangnu" nya: da" akhyoo" ri yo" se' da .
40007021	« Ngoo ri ‹ Aseing we" - Aseing we" › ga: mho' mo , dangain" - Mougkhung: mungdain: moo yo" vang loo" wa zi anghoid . Mougkhung: tho' moo nyid da" nga" pho , nheigloem: yo" cang su: za: dayo" vang loo" wa .

40010017	Byu yi ri lhid' ge' . khasu" wim gari tarha" agyi yi da" lo , moo ab pyam' boem wigi nyangnu" da" tarha" jung moo nanu" ri shen" yhen: baid said' koid: boem wa .
40010018	Nyangnu" da" shid moo we' tarha" nghi: zain byu yi da" shid moo we' sagsi: bui" wa shid re" nanu" gi ngoo yoomo zoug: khokham" yi da" shid khoin" moo she: vang lo" zi shau" goo" wa .
40010019	Nanu" ri ab pyam' wa da" uri khasu" tid wa zi gi gung ayoug goo" - Khasu" phoug tu" wa da" dang: gi nanu" ri tid poin" loo wa .
40010020	Khasu" wim gari nanu" vho: khyo" tid wa zi anghoid . Nanu" nya: pho , da" Venyi: gi nanu" da" nhoid' ri ngho" tid loo wa zi nghoid .
40010021	« Hau: uri gi nya: mang: nya: nhung" nyang: cang" nyang: - said' pyam' wa shid re" ab pyam' go" loo wa zi nghoid . Nya: myid: nya: zoo: yi we' myhi , phoo yi ri gyikoid lho: - said' pyam' lo boem wa .
40010022	Byu myoo" sho' mo , we' nga" myeing yoomo nanu" ri ngheing" lo boem goo" wa . Hang" nghoid loug lo" thang bidnyid ju" sho' yoem: kaid geing: teing nyid nghoid rigi hau: yug gi Mangso wigi khyoid yu zi shau" wa nghoid .
40010023	Davoo moo nanu" ri pyi: sho: loo lang" gi goo" voo khyoo phang: loo" ge' . Israela amyu" yi da" voogung joem moo nanu" moo" abain zei: shi" ri hau: byu da" nya: zoo: gi ju" gyoo" loo wam: bye .
40010024	« Cangzoo: gi sara: tho' moo je gyi: zi anghoid . deizoo: , phoo we' nya: yhoem: seing: tho' moo je gyi: zi anghoid .
40010025	Cangzoo: gi sara: yhangti" - deizoo: , phoo gi nya: yhoem: seing: yhangti" - nghoid nyid rigi myid je pyoo: wa . Nyangnu" nyang: gi Bezebula ga: nghoid rigi nya: yhoem: byu yi ri hau: tho' re" je tid go" wa anghoid goo la" ga: tid .
40010026	« Houg: yoomo nyangnu" ri agyug goo" - nghoeb' to" da" zi dangain" gi shau" phang shug wa . Yhoem" to" zi dangain" we' shau" myang loo wa .
40010027	Moug: coid' moo nanu" ri tid kyo" dang: dangain" - bidbang moo shau" tid kyoo" wa . Nanu" da" nukhyab' moo so' kyo" da" dang: gi yhoemkhung: tho' mo zeig: yoid ge' » ga: kho" kyo .
40010028	Hau: lho: daja: gi gung shoo" ri za: te: yo" said' pyam' lho: nheigloem: Venyi: ri ayo" said' pyam' mo , ri agyug goo" - gung du: yo" Venyi: ri dalheing: dam - ngarai" mung" moo yo" shoin pyam' su: Mangsoo ri je gyoug nyid ge' .
40010029	Jookhyang eig du: ri theing" cen , eig cu' yo" - yo" qei anghoid goo" la" . Nanu" nya: pho , amyeing" abo ri hau: jookhyang dadu: we' myidjang: moo age byed gyoo .
40010030	Nanu" da" vhuloem mo xam: dangain" ri we' Mangsoo gi nghab' too" bye .
40010031	Houg: yoomo agyug goo" - nanu" gi jookhyang myoo" sho' tho' moo je phau" nyid mo , nghoid .
40010032	« Hang" nghoid loug we' Sube" shidkhoin" moo ngoori yhen: yu ri Mougkhung: tho' moo nyid nga" pho , da" shid khoin" moo ngoo we' hau: yug ri yhen: yu wa .
40010033	Hang" nghoid loug sube" da" shidkhoin" moo ngoori ngeig pyam' lang" gi Mougkhung: tho' moo nyid da" nga" pho , shid khoin" moo we' ngoo hau: yug ri ngeig pyam' wa .
40010034	« Myidjang: tho' moo ngei pyo: khyoo: byid: wa ga: ngoo re" ein: ajhoo: goo" - ngei pyo: khyoo nhang: kaid wa ein: ngoo re" zi anghoid . Gyi koid goo" wa shid re" ngoo dare .
40010035	Nya: phoo yo" yuggi zoo: - Nya: myhi' yo" myi yi: zoo: - nya: nid yo' nya: dumoo" - nyang: cang" nyang: gang: go" loo" wa shid re" ngoo re" zi danghoid .
40010036	Nyang: nya: da" yhoem: byu yi mo we' gyivoo bui" go" loo wa .
40010037	« Hang" nghoid loug - ngoori jheddab da" tho' moo nya: myhi' nya: phoo ri je jhed' dab , rigi hau: yug gi ngoo yo" amoin: yi . Hang" nghoid loug - ngoori jheddab da" tho' moo nya: zoo: yi ri je jheddab nghoid rigi hau: yug gi ngoo yo" amoin: yi .
40010038	Hang" nghoid loug - nyang: nya: da" pyang" zeing ri vu , lho: nga" thang: acang rigi hau: yug gi ngoo yo" amoin: yi .
40010039	Nya: kangso' ri yoo" su: gi kangso' soem" wa . Ngoo yoomo nyang: nya: da" kangso' soem" loo" su: gi kangso' ri yo" yu wa zi nghoid .
40010040	« Nanu" ri lhoem: kham: yu su: gi ngoori we lhoem: kham: yu bye . Ngoori lhoem: kham: yu su: we' ngoori nhang: kaid' da" Mangsoo ri lhoem kham: yu zi nghoid bye .
40010041	Mangso lagyo: da" myonhoo: ri tu: lho: Mangso da" lagyoo: ri lhoem: kham: yu su: gi Mangso lagyoo: yo" da" aphoug" ri bo yoo" wa . Deung main" su: da" myonhoo: ri tu: lho: deung main" su: ri kham: yu su: gi deung main" su: yo" da" aphoug" ri bo yoo" wa .
40010042	Hang" nghoid loug - lagyoo: pho , da" myonhoo: ri tu: lho: he: da" nga" cangzoo: nge thang su: mo dayug yug ri gyid jham" dagoem shoin: jhoug nghoid ri hau: yug gi nya: aphoug" ayo" yu loo: nyid wa zi anghoid . Ein: wigi ngoo jhug" jhug tid » ga: tid .
40011001	Houg: su" wi nya: cangzoo: daxe: eig youg bang: ri dang: bain pyeing: to" thang: ri voogung joem moo cang jhoug" byid: wa shid re" mungdang: kho" kyoo" wa shid re" hau jo yoomo thu' lo .
40011002	Khristu koid: da" moozoo" ri Yohan gi thung: khoug: mo shau" gyoo: lang" nya: cangzoo: yi ri nhang: kaid lho: « Aseing gi gyoo" loo wa Meshia nghoid deung la" .
40011003	Houg: su" anghoid lang" gi goo" yug ri lang" nyid shi" wa la" » ga: myed kaid .
40011004	Yesu gi « Nanu" myang yu" da" khyoo: shoug" gyo: yu" bye da" khyoo: dangain" ri Yohan ri lo" tid kyoo" ge' .
40011005	Myo , jed mo ri myo doem myang nhang: ago" - khyid: agi lo: mo gi khyoo doem yo" so" lo" boem - manggam: noo mo we' gyeungshang: lo" boem . Nujed mo , we' dang: shau" gyo: lo boem bye . shid: jo mo we' doem dei to'' lo ago" - ashau" ajhen: mo we gau yi mungdang: ri shau" gyo: boem ago" .
40011006	Ngoo yoomo nheigloem: aleing mo gi ngi lhoo wa" » ga: tid kyo" kaid .
40011007	Houg: bang: loo" khare" thang: ri Yesu gi Yohan da" khyoo: ri vhu" zhug lho: wigi Meingbyu yi ri « nanu" gi ce: noem ri yu" wa ein: wigi kyoem khoug: moo yhi: go" led hau lhei , nyid da" jam deung" ri yu" wa ein: yhi: go" lha" .
40011008	Houg: su" anghoid lang" gi ce: noem ri yu" wa ein: yhi: go" - yhui yhui wim da" byimi void ci: su ri yu" wa ein: yhi: go" lha" . yhui , yhui wim da" byimi void to" su gi kho kham" yhoem: moo dalhung nyid .
40011009	Houg: su" anghoid lang" gi ci: yu" yhi: go" Lapi: phoo ri yu" wa ein: yhi: go" la" . gyeing" nghoid rigi Lapi: phoo da" tho' moo je gyi: su: ri nanu" shau" myang bye" - ein: ngoo tid .
40011010	Jhoem: mungdang: moo bo zigi Yu" ge' nang yhi: wa da" khyoo: ri yo" soin' nyheing da" nga" lagyoo: ri re" da" shid moo ngoo nhang: kaid - ga: da" dang: khoin" gi Yohan ri tid nau zi nghoid .
40011011	Ngoo jhug" jhug tid da" zigi Xangsu: mhoo: myid: moo Baptisma sara: Yohan tho' je gyi: da" zigi dayug we' abo yu" shi" nghoid loug mougkhoung: mungdain: moo nge thang yug gi Yohan tho' je gyi: su: nghoid .
40011012	Baptisma sara: Yohan da" bidnyid mo wigi Akhid" nyid" ju" sho' Mougkhung: mungdain: gi agyoo: ayoid jhen" vang mo yo" zain: go" nyid yoomo yo" rhi , mo , za: hau mungdain: ri yo" yu sho' shakoid ago" .
40011013	Khasu" wim gari Yohan da" ayo , ju" sho' Lapi: yi dangain" mo , da" tarha" moo Mangso da" Mungdain: khyoo ri tid too" bye .
40011014	Nanu" gi nyangnu" da" Mungdang: ri tam" gyo: nghoid rigi Yohan gi ju" ri" wa ga: tid to" da" Elia nghoid bye .
40011015	Shoug" gyo: ja: nukhyab' dab mo hang" we' shau" gyoo: goo" baja" .
40011016	« Akhid" nyid" He: da" byumyu" ri ngoo ce: ja: dangtu' khyo" tid kyo" yu" shi" wa lha" . Kid" vang" moo zhoung: yoin" to" da" zooshang: mi" gi nyang: cang" nyang: nyhoo: go" zoo" re .
40011017	‹ Nanu" da" shid re" loxo' pui" khalhang ri khayhi' moid nghoid loug we' nanu" ago" boem nghoid da . Ngoonu" gi kougshu: ngau nyid nghoid loug we' Nanu" abo ngoug abo kougshu: nghoid ago" › ga: tid nyid da" zooshang: mi" yo" dadu nyid boem da .
40011018	Khasu" wim gari Yohan gi azo: ashug loo re" ri nyangnu" gi ‹ he: yug gi yu vang su: nghoid nhung: › ga: tid boem ago" .
40011019	Byu da" nya: zoo: gi zo: shug lho: re" ri we ‹ Yu" ge , he: yug gi zo: myo , no su: - zabyidd" shug lid: su: nghoid - Kheing" khyu: zoo: mo , yo' yooboo yoo" mo , da" bidnoem phoo nghoid › ga: doem tid ago" . Nghoidsho' loug Mangso da" phajhi" - deung main" khyoo: rigi Hau: phajhi" zei: thu' lo da: - nya: ashi" yo" sagsi: toin" shid' nyid » ga: tid .
40011020	Yesu hau: uri mau" pho" yoem: myoo" sho' toin" shid' bye: da" voogung bang: gi nyang nya: yoo boo mo nheigloem: athid lo boem yoomo hau: da" voogung joem ri hid: su" ga: gyi koid da .
40011021	« O" Kurazin we" - nang gi joem loo" wa O" Besaida we" nang joem: loo" wa . Khasu" wim ga ri re" eig yug ri toin" shid' da" moozoo" zeing joem ri Turu yo" Sidun eig voo moo toin" shid' nghoid rigi jid: moo" byi: ri gang" ci: lho: nheigloem: bain thid zi gye" myang wam: bye .
40011022	Houg: yoomo nanu" ri ngoo tid zi gi hau: Mangso da" dang: khoo' bidnyid moo Turu yo" Sidun kham: wa da" dam gi nanu" kham: wa dam tho' moo je soem" wa zi nghoid .
40011023	Kaperna-um we" - nang we moug: moo thug sho tu: to zi shau" wa la" . Houg: su" anghoid lang" moo vo moug ju" sho' khyo kaid zi nang shau" wa nghoid . 40011024	Houg: yoomo nanu" ri ngoo tid da" zigi Tarha" dang: kho da" bidnyid moo Sodom voo kham: zoo: wa dam gi nang kham: zoo: wa dam tho' moo daje som" wa zi nghoid . »
40011025	Houg: lang" Yesu gi « Mougkhung: yo" myidjang ri vhoeb da" nga" phoo we" - Phajhi" byen ya yo" nheigloem: yeig kung mo jang" mo he: da" khyoo: ri nang yhoem" nghoeb to" lho: ci: asi mo , ri phang shug yoomo ngoo nang ri jeju" boin .
40011026	Nghoidbye: nga" phoo we" - Nang vho: da" khyoo: gi hid: su" nghoid nyid .

40012001	Hau: ayo , moo Aseing Yesu gi Dougno: Bidnyid ri sung: soo: yoo khyo" so" lid: lo" uri nya: cangzoo: yi gi zoo so" yoid wigi sung: soo: nham: ri phyed yu lho: zo: ago" .

40012013	Houg: lang" Yesu gi hau: da" lo , shid: su: ri « Re" lo , dain: kaid we' » ga: tid lang" hau: yug nya: lo , ri dain: kaid ri dashoid mo lo , yhangti" nyang: doem ge lo .
40012014	Hau: thang ri Pharishe" zheung: thu' lo" wigi Yesu ri khasu" koid: said pyam wa khyoo: phajhi" khyoug" go" nyid boem .

40012017	Hid: su" toung: kaid da" khyoo: gi Lapi: Esaia kho" kyo" to" da" dang: joeb byeung" loo wa shid re" nghoid . Hau: lapi: dang: gi
40012018	« Ngoo khyen: yu da" nga" dei zooshang: - Ngoo vho: ngei da" jheddab su: nghoid . Nga" Venyi: nya: da" tho' moo ngoo kaid byid: to" wigi Tungbau byumyu" ri nya: da" deung main" da" mungdang: ri kho" kyoo" wa zi nghoid .

40012020	jab bye: da" jam phyeing" youg: ri anhe , khyoug" wa . shid: lo" nyid da" myi: bung: ri asaid pyam wa . Deung byeung" da" tarha" dang: khoo' bidnyid ju" sho' nyang: xo' yoem: kaid nyid wa .

40012023	Byu phung: moo" zeing gi Yesu zei: da" moo" ri myang lang" gye" yu" mau" boem wigi « he yug gi David da" nya: zoo: nghoid wa la" » ga: tid go" nyid boem .
40012024	Pharishe yi shau" gyoo: lang" gi « he: yug gi yu zoug: Bezebula da" yoem: so' khyo" yu ri dayo" khaid thu' pyam eung: » ga: tid go" nyid boem .
40012025	Yesu gi houg: bang: da" nheigloem: ri si' byid: yoomo hid: su" ga: tid . 40012026	Houg: yoomo yu satan: da" mungdain: moo we' nyang: cang" nyang: dasaid go" nyid nghoid rigi hau: satan: da" mungdain: gi khasu" se' geing: teing jo , wa lha"
40012027	Ngoo gi Bezebula da" yoem: yo' yu ri da: khaid thu' deung nghoid rigi nanu" da" nya: zoo: yi gi hang" da" yoem: yo' yu ri yo" khaid thu pyam wa lha" . Nanu" da" nya: myid: nya: zoo: yi zei: da" moozoo" gi nanu" gyo: shoid ziri toin" shid nyid .
40012028	Ngoo gi Bezebula da" yoem: yo' yu khaid thu' zi anghoid . Mangso da" Venyi: yoem: so' khyo" yu ri khaid thu zi danghoid . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo Mangso da" Mungdain: gi nanu" jang" moo ju" bye: ziri si' loo ge' .
40012029	« Yoem: bo da" sarhi' phoo ri shi" amyheig tei" to" rigi nya: yhoem: moo ceug vang yhe: lho: nya: ziyoo ri hang se' yo" lhoid yu wa la" .
40012030	« Nga" tab adab su: gi nga" da" gyivoo tab' dab su: nghoid . Ngoo yo" dadeung: daloem: za: ashoin" too" su: gi abyi asain" nghoid nyid .
40012031	Houg: yoomo ngoo tid da" zigi shoid vhang: da" yooboo - tid shoid sang: shoid da" yooboo - ce: ja: ri nghoid loug we' yo" khyoid pyam byid: wa da" akhyoo" jo , . Houg: su" nghoid loug we' gyeungshang: Venyi: ri age khyo" tid shoid su: gi yooboo yo" khyoid byid: wa khyoo: aboo loo .
40012032	Hang" nghoid loug we' Byu da" nya: zoo: ri nhoid yo" tid shoid da" yooboo gi yo" khyoid pyam byid: . Nghoidloug we' gyeungshang: da" Venyi: ri nhoid tid shoid da" yooboo rigi he: pyaid ri we' thang: phyang" pyaid ri we' yo" khyoid pyam byid: zi anghoid .
40012033	« Ashi" ge zi vho: ri agam ge zi zhung" too" ca . Age da" agam gi age da" ashi" ri zei: byid: zi nghoid . Ashi" ri myang lang" agam ri yo" se .
40012034	Myu no , byumyu" yi we" - nanu" akhyeing" ashoeb da" mo , khasu" wigi dang: gi yo" tid goo" wa lha" . nheigloem: moo byeung" jo , ja: she , nhoid tho moo da tid thu' lo .
40012035	Ge da" byu gi nya: zi gi kaid to" da" boin" mo ge da" zi ri shau" thoid yu da: - akhyeing" ashoeb su: gi nya: da" akhyeing" ashoeb zi kaid to" da" boin" mo age zi za: dashau" thoid yu nyid .
40012036	« Aseing Yesu tid zigi tarha" dang: khoo' da" bidnyid moo byu yug khang" moo" gi nyang: tid da" age da" dang: yo" dakhyoo" ti" - tarha"
40012037	dang: khoo' zi shau" wa nghoid . Nang yooboo yo" ayo" zigi nanya: dang: khyo" cang lho: dang: khoo' zi shau" wa nghoid . »
40012038	Houg: lang" Tarha" sara: yi yo' Pharishe yi dayham" gi « Sara: we" - ngoonu" gi nang toin" shid da" alhoo: again daja: ja: ri myang nau ga: re" mho' ago" . »
40012039	Aseing Yesu gi « Akhyeing" ziyo' Mangsoo: abo da" he: pyaid mo byu yi gi mau" pho" alhoo: again ri se' mho' boem nhung: lha" . Lapi: Yona da" alhoo: again tho moo gootu: ce: alhoo: again we nanu" myang zi anghoid .
40012040	Yona gi ngoo: zeing da" voem: doug khoug: moo soem" nyid soem" myen , loung" jo , yhangti" - Byu da" nya: zoo: gi myidjang: khoug: moo soem" nyid" soem" myen , loung" jo , wa zi nghoid .
40012041	Nineve" voo byu yi gi Yona kho" kyo" da" mungdang: yoomo: - nyangnu" da" yooboo mo nheigloem: thid lo ago" . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nyangnu" gi Tarha" dang: kho' da" bidnyid moo He: pyaid mo byu yi yo" to lo wigi nanu" ri yooboo foin: boem wa zi nghoid . Ngoo nanu" ri tid ba - akhid" he: khyi moo Yona tho' moo je gyi: su: dayug ju" nyid bye .
40012042	Moug: thang: mo , Sheba: khokham" myhi , gi-Khokham" Sholumon da" Phajhi" dang: ri gyo: yu wa shed re" gye" ve: da" moug mo ju" lo . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo tarha" dang: khoo , da" bidnyid moo nyang: gi he: pyaid mo byu yi yo" to lo wigi nyangnu" ri yooboo foin: wa zi nghoid . Yu" ge' akhid" he: khyi moo Sholumon tho' je gyi: su: dayug ju" nyid bye: - ga: wigi tid .
40012043	« Akhyeing" da" yu gi Byu da" yhoem: mo thu lo" lho:-kyug kyi ri da" joyoo moo so" lheing yen" wigi doug noo: wa da" joyoo ashau" shoo: loo .
40012044	Houg: lang" nyang: gi ngoo gi khasu" nghoid loug - akhang: yhoem: xoug" moo doem loo" wa" ga: tid nyid . Hau: da" yhoem: moo doem tau" lo" yu" rigi zhen" kain: yung" yung" shoem" san to" zi lo" myang .
40012045	Houg: lang" gi nya: tho mo yoem: je gyi: da: - akhyeing" da" yu nyhed yug ri doem khe: loung: lho: wigi hau: yhoem: moo vang zhoung: jo , boem bye . Hau: yu vang to" su: da" asam" aved gi xang: shid" tho re" je akhyeing" ashoeb bue" loo bye . He: da" pyaid mo akhyeing" da" byu yi moo we' houg: yo" dakhyoo" ti" bue" loo wa » ga: tid .
40012046	Yesu gi Byu phung: moo ri kho" kyo" nyid da" uri-nya: myhi' yo' nya: nhung" gi ju" re" boem . Nyang: yo" shau" doem goo" wa ga: nghe: shoid moo re" lang" nyid boem .
40012047	Houg: yoomo byu dayug gi « Yu" we' re" myhi , yo" re" no , nang yo" shau" doem goo" wa ga: nghe: shoid moo re" yab jo , ago" » ga: tid kyo .
40012048	Yesu phougtu" zigi « Nga" myhi gi hang" nghoid lha" . Nga" mang: nhung" yi ga: zigi hang" nghoid lha" » ga: myid .
40012049	Hau: lho: nya: cangzoo: yi jhang khyoo lo , toin" kaid lho: « Yu" ge' hid: bang: gi nga" myhi , yo" - nga" mang: nga" nhoung" nghoid bye .
40012050	Mougkhung: tho' moo nyid da: - Nga" phoo vho: khyo" cang koid: mo , hang" we' Nga" mang: nga" nhung" - nga" nham" mo" yo' nga" myhi , nghoid bye: » ga: tid .
40013001	Hau: bidnyid moo Yesu gi hau: yhoem: mo thu' lo" lho: gyid thoem" yam moo jhoug" byid: wa shed re" zhoung: jo .
40013002	Hau: uri gye" myo: da" byu phung: moo" zeing gi houg: lang" Aseing ri lheing khoem phoung foem: loo yoomo nyang: gi lhid' khoug: moo yhe: vang zhoung: jo . Hau: byu phung: moo" gi gyid nung" yam moo yab jo , ago" .
40013003	Hau: uri dangtu' myoo" sho khyo" khyoo: myoo" sho' jhoug" byid: da" zigi « shid phyang" byu dayug gi myoug: shi" sain" wa shed re" thu' lo .
40013004	Ashi" ri sain" kaid da" uri dayham" gi khyoo: gung moo gyoo" loo" yoomo ngho' joem gi hau: ashi" ri koid: zo: pyam .
40013005	Ashi" dayham" gi myid zhoo" athu: da" lug phoug tho' moo gyoo" lo" lho: myid zhoo" poo" yoomo myab , myab , youg re .
40013006	Nghoidloug we' bid zho: nge" loo lang" gi agyi: no , sho' ayo" cen , yoomo nyhau" kyoug shid: lo .
40013007	Ashi" dayham" gi zu: bang moo gyo" wigi yug ri" nghoid loug we' zu: bang gyi: ri" lang" te: foeb said pyam .
40013008	Myoug: shi" gootu: gi myidjang: gi moo gyo" yug yoomo azhang dashoo: azhang khyug xi: - azhang soem" xi: ashi" zei: myo: je: lo . »
40013009	« Nukhyab dab , mo , dangain" gi tam" gyoo: ge" » ga: Yesu tid .
40013010	Nya: cangzoo: yi gi Yesu jhang zheung: lo boem lho: « ciwim wigi subi" ri jhoug" byid: ri dangtu' ci: ca" lha" » ga: myid: boem ago" da .
40013011	Yesu gi « Nanu" gi mougkhoung: mungdain: da" no , thang khyoo: ri se' gyo: da" akhang" yo" ago" . Goo" ji koem gi hau: akhang" ri ayoo" nghoid ago" .
40013012	Daja: ja: yoo" su: gi hang" ri nghoid loug we' yoo" su: ri myoo" sho' doem poug lung: byid: lho: nyang: gi je yo" jo , loo wa zi nghoid . Ayoo" ajo , su: jang" mo koem gi nyang: yo" gu: dajhi' kyeing" zi lang" yu pyam byid: wa nghoid .
40013013	Hid: su" dangtu' khyo" nyang: nu ri tid kyo" da" zigi nyanu" nyang: gi yu" nyid loug amyang - tam" gyoo: loug ashau" gyo: ziyo' - ase' gyoo: yoomo nghoid .
40013014	He: da" khyoo: ri Lapi: Esaia tid to" dang: gi nyangnu" moo joeb byeung" loo bye . He: da" byumyu" gi tam" gyoo: nghoid loug we' se' gyoo: zi anghoid . Yu" nghoid loug we' myang wa zi anghoid . ci: wim gari nyangnu" gi nheig gyeing: mo anghoid .
40013015	Khasu" wim gari He: byumyu" gi nheigloem: deig lid: nyid . nyangnu" da" nukhyab' we jid: jo , myojid" we' coem" ci: bang: nghoid . Houg: su" anghoid rigi nyangnu" da" myojid" gi myang boem wa . Nukhyab' we' shau" gyo: boem wa . Nheugloem: soo zoo: we' lheing: boem wa zi nghoid . Hau: lho: nyangnu" nga" jhang phoug lo wigi nyangnu" nya: dam noo ri ngoo ze: gi byid: wa zi nghoid › ga: Mangsoo tid nyid .
40013016	« Nghoidloug we' nanu" gi myo , myang ziyo' nu: gyo: loo yoomo ngilho' boem bye .
40013017	Nanu" ri ngoo gyeing" nyang: tid ba: - nanu" yo" myang da" zi joem ri Lapi: yi yo" deung: byeung" da" byu yi myoo" sho' myang noug goo" nghoid loug ashau" myang boem . Nanu" shau" gyo: da" khyoo: ri we' nyangnu" gi ashau" gyoo: nghoid ago" .
40013018	« Houg: yoomo myoug: shi" sain" su: da" dangkang: ri tam" gyoo: ge' .
40013019	Khyoo: gung moo gyo" da" myoug: shi" da" khyoo: gi Mungdain: da" tarha" mungdang: ri shau" gyoo: nghoid loug we' ase' gyoo: su: yo" du . Akhyeing" su: ju" re" lho: nheigloem: khoug: moo sain" kaid to" da" myoug: shi" ri yu pyam byid: ga: tid .
40013020	Lug phoug tho' moo sain" khyo da" myoug: shi" gi mungdang: ri shau" gyoo: lang" gau yi nheigloem: yo" dalheing: dam lhoem: yu bang: ri tid nau zi nghoid .
40013021	Nghoidloug we' nheigloem: moo agyi: no , no , azug yoomo daso' za: te: bo jo , lho: mungdang: tarha" yoomo sei: daja: ja: thu' lo lho: su" juang" yi shen" yhen zi thoung" shau" lo da" uri hau: yug gi dalheing: dam doem phoug lo" bye - houg: yhangti" su: ri tid nau zi nghoid .
40013022	Ju: byab moo gyoo" lo" da" myoug: shi" gi Tarha" mungdang: ri shau" gyo: lho: Mougmyid tho' mo myid myoo: ung: loug khyoo: yo' ziyoo jonu" ri myo , no , vhoo: bo khyoo: yoomo mungdang: tarha" myoug: shi" ri nghoeb zeig pyam lho: wigi ashi" ayo" zei: dakhyoo: ri tid nau zi nghoid .
40013023	Myidjang: gi moo sain" khyo da" myoug: shi" gi mungdang: tarha" ri shau" gyo: lho: hau: ziri se' gyoo: su: yo" du nyid . Nyangnu" mo dayham" gi azhang dashoo: - dayham" gi azhang khyug xi: - dayham" gi azhang soem" xi: - myo: je lo da" ashi" ri yo" zei: » ga: tid .
40013024	Aseing Yesu nyangnu" ri dangtu' gootu: doem tid kyo" da" zigi « Mougkhung: mungdain: zeing gi khasu" nghoid . Byu dayug gi ge da" gug myoug: ri nya: yoo moo yhe: sain" to .
40013025	Nghoidloug we' myen" ri byu yhoeb' pyo: jo da" uri nya: gyivoo ju" re" wigi myo , shi" ri re" sain" kaid khare" lho: doem phang: lo" byug .
40013026	Gug gam joem youg gyi: lo wigi anham: ashi" thu' lo da" uri myo , we' bo thu' lo .
40013027	Houg: lang" hau: youg da" dei zoo: yi ju" re" wigi yoo seing: ri ‹ yhoem: seing: we" - Gug gi myoug: ri re" yoo moo datei: anghoid la" . nghoid loug we' he: myo , gam joem gi khayo , youg lo lha" › ga: zheung: myid: boem .
40013028	Yoo seing: gi ‹ he: da" moozoo" gi gyivoo zei: da" lo , moo" nghoid › ga: phoug tu . ‹ Houg: su" nghoid lang" gi ngoonu" myo , ri yhe: phoin pyam wa nang aveing" la" › ga: deom myid: boem .
40013029	Yoo seing: gi houg su" ‹ akoid: goo" khasu" wim gari myo , gam phoin lang" gug gam ri bo zang" phoin wa nghoid .
40013030	Gug yed nham" ju" sho' gug yo" myo , eig ja: goin" - dage" youg jo , lho: gyi: loo goo" baja" . Houg: lang" gug yed mo , gi myo , gam joem ri xang: shid" yed deung: lho: myi: moo nghe pyam ge' hau: thang: gug rigi nga" da" jhi: moo zheung" kaid too" ge" › ein: wigi ngoo tid wa » ga: tid .
40013031	Aseing Yesu dangtu' gootu: doem tid da" zigi « Mougkhung: mungdain: gi Byu dayug khyam: moo sain" da" nghang" shi" cab yo" du nyid .
40013032	Hau: da" nghang" shi" cab gi acab ja: khang" mo" da" tho' moo nge thang da" acab nghoid loug we' gyi: loo lang" gi nghang" poem: dangain" tho' moo je gyi: da" agam nghoid . Moug: moo dang: yen" da" ngho' joem we' akung: ako'' moo soid soid to . »
40013033	Nyang: dangtu' gootu: doem tid da: zigi « Mougkhung: mungdain: gi doo cid" yo" du nyid . Myiyi: zoo: dayug gi doo cid" ri yu: lho: wigi cen: moin" soem tang moo kaid kaid ri cen: moin" dangain" ri do loo nhang: » ga: tid .
40013034	Aseing Yesu gi dangtu' joem ri ci: lho: wigi byu phung: moo" yi ri kho" kyo" nyid . Dangtu' abo zigi daja: we' akho" kyoo .
40013035	Hid: su" kho" kyo" da" khyoo: gi Lapi: yi da" dang: moo Nga" da" nhoid phang lho: « dangtu' khyo" ngoo tid wa . Moug: phain" myid phain" da" bidnyid mo wigi yhoem" to" da" khyoo: ri ngoo phoid: kyoo" wa » ga: Lapi: tid to" dang: zung: loo wa shed re" nghoid bye .
40013036	Hau: thang: ri Yesu gi zoeb phoung: byu yi ri too" khoo , lho: yhoem: moo vang lo . Hau: uri nya: cangzoo: yi tain" re" wigi « yoo moo youg da" dangtu' mo dangkang: ngoonu" ri phoid: kyoo" we » ga: re" mho' boem .
40013037	Yesu gi « myoug: shi" sain" su: gi byu da" nya: zoo: nghoid .
40013038	Yoo thung" gi he: da" mougmyid nghoid ge da" myoug: shi" gi Mungdain: da" nya: zoo: yi ri tid nau zi nghoid . Myo , gam gi akhyeing" su: da" nya: zoo: yi ri tid nau zi nghoid .
40013039	Soo" yo myo , shi" ri re" sain" da" gyivoo gi yu satan: nghoid . Gug yed nam" gi he: mougmyid thang loo" yo' nghoid . Gug yed mo , gi Mouglagyoo: yi nghoid .
40013040	Myo , gam ri khyen: yham" lho: myi moo nghe pyam yhangti" - he: da" mougmyid lo" thang da" bidnyid moo we' houg: yo" dakhyoo" bue" loo wa .
40013041	Byu da" nya: zoo: gi nya: moug: lagyoo: yi ri nhang: kaid lho: byu yi ri shoid vhang: nhang: mo , yo" - atarha" da" moo" zei: mo , bain , sho ri Nya: mougkhoung: Mungdain: mo khyen: thu' yu lho: wigi
40013042	Dadab jo , da" moo myi: khyoem moo khyo kaid nhang: wa houg: moo vang loo" bang: dangain" gi ngougmyeing" shoo" thui: yo' zei yang: ngaid kyeig ga: nyid boem wa .
40013043	Hau: uri deung byeung" mo , gi nyangnu" da" nya: pho , Mungdain: moo bid yhangti" doug bang to" boem wa . Nukhyab dab mo dangain" tam" gyo: yu ge' .
40013044	« Mougkhung: mungdain: gi hid: su" bue" ziyo' du nyid . Byu dayug gi yoo dakhyang" moo myhoeb to" da" phougdab ziyoo ri myang - Houg: lang" nyang: gi dalheing: doem myhoeb too" khoo , lho: gau yi da" nheigloem: yo" lo" wigi nya: ziyoo dangain" oung" pyam lho: doem tau" yhe: wigi hau: yoo ri qei yu .
40013045	« Hau: lho: daja: gi Mougkhung: mungdain: gi phoug" dab da" palhe" ri sho: yen" da" phaga: byu yo" du nyid .
40013046	Hau: da" phaga: byu gi gye phoug" dab da" palhe" ri shau" myang lang" doem tau" lo" wigi nyang: yo" da" zi dangain" ri oung" pyam lho: hau: da" palhe" ri qei yu .
40013047	« Hau: lho: daja: - Mougkhung: mungdain: gi ngoo: kuang mo , gyid thoem" moo goin du" ri ngoo: aja: ja: ri yo" du" yu ziyo' du nyid .
40013048	Hau: goin moo ngoo: myoo" sho' boo lang" tung gung khyoo: lang: she: yu lho: zhoung: jo , wigi ngoo: do , ri khyen ago" - ge da" ngoo: rigi gyoin khoug: moo khyen: kaid lho: age da" ngoo: rigi nghi: khyoo: khyen: du" pyam ago" .
40013049	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - he: mougmyid lo" thang da" bidnyid ri we' bue" loo wa nghoid . Mouglagyoo: yi gi thu' lo lho: deung main" mo , da" agung mo akhyeing: ashoeb bang: ri khyen: gam thu' to" lho: dab jo da" fang myikhyoem moo du" zei kaid pyam wa .
40013050	Hau: joyoo moo ngougmyeing" shu: thui: to" - zei yang: ngaid zeing to" zi shau" boem wa nghoid .
40013051	Aseing Yesu gi « he: khyoo: dangain" ri nanu" gi se' gyoo: go" la" » ga: myid: yu" da" uri nya: cangzoo: yi gi « se gyoo: bye: Aseing we" » ga: tid ago" .
40013052	Yesu gi « houg: su" nghoid yoomo Mougkhung: mungdain: da" cangzoo: agi yi bue" loo da" tarha" sara: hang" nghoid loug we' Aseig we axoug" ri we yu thu' shug da" yhoem: seing: yo" du nyid » ga: tid .
40013053	Hau: dangtu' dangain" ri bain tid kyoo" lang" gi Aseing Yesu hau: joyoo mo thu' lo" wigi
40013054	Hau: thang: ri nya: voogung moo doem ju" lo" ri tarha" jung moo tid kyeing" tid poin" nyid da" uri voogung bang: gi nya: dang: ri shau" gyoo: mo , gye gyo: mau" boem yoomo « he: yug gi hid yhangte" da" phajhi" byen ya gi khayo yo" yu lha" » ga: myid boem .
40013055	« Hid: yhangte" da" mau" pho" alhoo: again joem gi khasu" wim yo" koid shug la' . nyang: gi lagsama nya: zoo: anghoid la' . Nya: myhi' myeing gi Mari ga: zi anghoid goo" rhe" - nya: nhung" we' Yaku Yoseb Simon Yuda ga: bang: anghoid goo" la" .
40013056	Nya: nham" moo" yi we' yha" moug bang: angoid goo" la" . Houg: su" nghoid ri he: yug gi he: phajhi" byen ya gi khayo , yo" yu lha" » ga: wigi Yesu ri alhoem: yu boem .
40013057	Yesu gi nyangnu" ri « Lapi: gi nya: voo yo' nya: yhoem: mo gootu: joyoo moo gi myonhoo: bo nyid phau" myang: nyid boem . »
40013058	Hau: voo byu yi gi nyang: ri loem" jeung" myid abo boem yoomo Aseing Yesu gi hau: voo moo mau" pho" alhoo: again myoo: sho' atoin" shid .
40014001	Hau: uri Galile mung" ri vhoeb ci: su: - Herod khokham" gi Aseing Yesu da" khyoo: ri shau" gyoo: lang"
40014002	« He: yug gi Baptisma sara: Yohan danghoid . Gyeing" nyang: shid: da" jang" mo doem dei to' loo eung: bye . Houg: yoomo mau" pho" alhoo: again yo" toin" shid' » ga: nya: vhoo: mo moo" voin mo ri tid kyo .
40014003	Ciwim gari he: shid mo Herod gi nya: nhung" Philib da" yhoem: seing: myhi' Herodi yoomo Yohan ri myheig lho: thung: tei" lhung nhang: too" bye .
40014004	Khasu" wim gari Yohan gi Herod khokham" ri « hau: myiyi: ri re" yhoem: seing: myhi' koid: wa zigi atarha" » ga: tid byid: nyid yoomo nghoid .
40014005	Herod gi Yohan ri said pyam noug nghoid loug we' Yuda byumyu" yi ri gyoug yoomo avoem" said , pyam . Khasu" wim gari houg: bang: gi Yohan ri Lapi: dayug ga: zheung: loem yoomo nghoid .
40014006	Hau: thang: ri Herod da" khu: lo pui" koid: da" bidnyid moo Herodi da" zoomyi: zoo: gi mung" byu yi da" shed moo go" shug lang" Herod gi soo" soo" nheigloem: pyo: wigi
40014007	Hau: zoomyi: zoo: ri « Ce: noem nghoid loug we' nang mho' zi byid: wa » ga: dang: byid: to" .
40014008	Hau: da" myiyi: zoo: gi nya: myhi' joug jhoin" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Baptisma sara: da" vhuloem ri he: da" bain moo akhid" kaid byid: we' ga: lo" mho' .
40014009	khokham" gi myid apyoo: loo: nghoid loug we' being" voo yi da" shid khoin" moo nheung" too" bye: yoomo hau: myiyi: zoo: mho' ziri byid: wa shed re" amyeing" khyo kaid bye .
40014010	Houg: yoomo byu nhang: kaid lho: Yohan da" vhuloem ri thung: khoug: moo kho" pyam bye .
40014011	vhuloem ri bain moo kaid ci: lho: myiyi: nu" ri byid: bye . Nyang: we hau: vhuloem ri nya: myhi' jhang khyoo ci: lo .
40014012	Yohan da" cangzoo: yi gi Yohan da" mang ri re" yu myhoeb shoung: pyam boem . Hau: thang: ri Yesu jhang lo" tid kyo" ago" .
40014013	Yesu gi Yohan da" khyoo: shau" gyoo: lang" nyang: kyeing" lhid zhoung: lho: ci: sam: aso" da" joyoo khyoo thu' yhe: lo" da" khyoo: byu phung: yi shau" gyoo: lang" voo mo , thu' lho: tung khyoo khyo" nya: jang" moo cang yhe: lo" boem .
40014014	Yesu gi lhid' mo tung gung khyoo lo" ri byu phung: moo" ri nyang: myang lang" nyangnu" ri nheig yu khyeig yoomo noo da" byu dangain" ri ge loo" nhang: bye .
40014015	Myenthang: ju" loo lang" nya: cangzoo: yi zheung: lo boem wigi « he: joyoo gi ci: we ajo , da" joyoo nghoid . Moug: we coid loo bye . Byu phung: moo" yi ri voogung khyoo zoo: noem zheung: qei zoo: nhang: kaid we' » ga: re" tid boem .
40014016	Yesu gi « hid: bang: voogung khyoo loo" aca" - nanu" nyang: nyangnu" ri zoo: noem byid: ge' » ga: tid .
40014017	Nya: cangzoo: yi we' ngoonu" zooyho' wim: loem: yo' ngoodo , eig du: date: yo" the , ga: doem tid boem .
40014018	Houg: lang" Yesu gi « nga" jhang ci: loo ge' » ga: wigi doem tid .
40014019	Houg: lang" byu phung: moo" ri vu , fu" yoo moo zheung: zhoung: jo , nhang . Hau: thang: ri zooyho' wim: loem: yo" - ngoo: zoo: eig du: ri yu lho: wigi Moug: khyoo yu" lho: Mangso jeju" ri coung" byid . Hau: thang: ri zooyho' ri lang: phe , yu wigi nya: cangzoo: yi ri byid . Nya: cangzoo: yi gi byu phung: moo" yi ri gam , byid: ago" .
40014020	Byu dangain" mo , gi gye" gyi: shau" zo: boem thang: ri zo: teing da" adu atoem - doem koid: zheung" boem ri daxe: eig kyang daceung byeung" shi" .
40014021	Zo: da" byu - myiyi: yi yo" zooshang: mi" ri abo soin: ri zooyho' zo: da" byu yuggi za: wim: khyeing" koo: su" bo .
40014022	Yesu gi Byu phung: moo" ri nhang: kaid da" uri nya: cangzoo: yi rigi lhid zhung: nhang: lho: gyid nung" goo" tab nya: shid khyoo: gu: loo" lang" nhang .
40014023	Byu phung: moo" yi ri nhang: kaid thang: ri Akyu" mho' wa shid re" boug tho' khyoo do , lo . Myenthang: coid shoem zoo" ri houg: moo Aseing nyang: kyeing" nyid nyid .
40014024	Hau: uri lhid gi gyid yam yo" gye" ve: da" thoem" gung moo ju" lo" nyid uri lid tau" hau: lo wigi being: moid gi hau: lhid moo lo baid nyid yoomo lhid gi moug lo" nyid .
40014025	Nabsoin: myo , myang yid ri Aseing Yesu gi gyid thoem" tho' khyo" cangzoo: yi jhang khyoo so" lo .
40014026	Gyid dang moo so" lo zi nya: cangzoo: yi lhoem: myang lang" dain ziyo' « thei: zigi soo" byoo danghoid » ga: gyoug ziyo' lhoem: nyho: boem .
40014027	Yesu dalheing: dam tid zigi « seing" yang" ge' - agyug goo" ngoo danghoid » ga: tid .
40014028	Houg: lang" Petru gi « Aseing nang nghoid deung rigi ngoori gyid dang khyo" re" jhang khyoo so" ri" wa amyeing" byid: we' » ga: tid .
40014029	« Ri" we' » ga: Yesu tid . Houg: lang" Petru gi lhid' tho' mo gyo" lho: Yesu jhang khyoo gyid tho' khyo" so" yhe: lo .
40014030	Nghoidloug we' ug lid ri myang lang" gi nyang: gyoug lo wigi gyid khoug: moo noeb vang lo" nyid da" uri « Aseing we" - khyoid yu shi" we' o" » ga: yoid nyho .
40014031	Houg: lang" Yesu gi nya: lo , ri Petru jhang myab myab yhoin" kaid lho: zei: wigi tid zigi « loem" jeung" da" yoem: neing: su: we" ciwim wigi loem gyam nyid lha" » ga: tid .
40014032	Nya: eig yug gi lhid' khoug: moo ju" vang loo" lang" uglid we' noem: lo" byug bye .
40014033	Houg: lang" lhid' khoug: moo nyid da" cangzoo: yigi « Nang gi Mangso da" nya: zoo: gyeung" nyang nghoid bye: » ga: Nyang: ri noku boem ago" .
40014034	Nyangnu" gyid thei: tab' gu: dab lo" boem lho: Genesared meing: moo ju" vang lo" boem .
40014035	Houg: mo da" byu yi gi Yesu ri se' yu" boem yoomo: - noo mo , ri zheung: shu" nhang: kaid lho: noo phyoo" shau" mo , dangain" ri zheung: khe: shu" re" boem ago" .
40014036	Nya: da" byi: thang: mo da" bain: byug moo khyalhang" - shau" tain" sho' ga: re" mho' boem . Shau" tain" mo , dangain" we' noo phyoo" mo ge lo" boem .
40015001	Hau: da" uri Yerusalem mo Pharishe yo" tarha" sara: ri gi Yesu jang" moo dang: re" myid: boem .
40015002	« Goonham mo phoug" phyid" yi jhau" to" da" khoin" thui: ri Re" cangzoo: yi gi ci: wim acang go" lha" . nyangnu" gi ngoonu" thung" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - voem: azoo: shi" ri lo , acid" boem » ga: Yesu ri tid .
40015003	Yesu gi « Mangsoo tid to" da" tarha: ri she: pyam lho: nanu" nyang: tid to" da" tarha" ri cang go" la" .
40015004	Mangsoo tid to" zigi re" myhi , re" phoo ri phau" myang: we' Khasu" wim gari ‹ nya: myhi' nya: phoo ri nheing" su: hang" nghoid loug we' gyeing" nyang: shid: zi shau" wa nghoid .
40015005	Nghoidloug we' nanu" jhoug" byid: da" zigi Byu dayug yug moo nya: myhi' nya: phoo ri bo pang thug wa da" zi daja: ja: yoo" nghoid loug we' hau: zigi Mangso da" shid re" byid: pyam bye: zi nghoid › ga: tid lang" hau: yug gi nya: myhi' phoo ri phau" myang: anoo" loo › ga: tid ago" .
40015006	‹ Hid yhangti" nanu" nya: da" tarha" ri yo" cang wa shid re" Mangso da" tarha" rigi aphoug" akhyoid koid: pyam bye . ›
40015007	Akug za: te: void mo , we" - nanu" da" khyoo: Lapi: Esaia tid zigi gye eung: bye .
40015008	‹ He: da" amyu" gi nya: da" khoin" thui: yo" - Ngoori phau" myang: boem nghoid loug we' nyang: nya: nheigloem: gi ngoo yo" ve: gang: jo .
40015009	Khasu" wim gari Byu koid: da" tarha" ri Nga" da" tarha" yhangti" jhoug" byid: nyid yoomo nyangnu" ngoori noku nyid da" zigi akoem: za danghoid » › ga: wigi Mangsoo tid .
40015010	Houg: lang" Yesu gi Byu phung: moo" ri khe: yu lho: « gyo: yu lho: si ge' .
40015011	Nhoid' khoug: moo vang lo da" zigi Byu ri aco' ajhoid bui" nhang: zi anghoid . Nhoid' khoug: mo thu' lo da" zigi byu ri aco' a jhoid bui" nhang: » ga: tid kyo" .
40015012	Hau: thang: ri nya: cangzoo: yi tain" lo lho: « Akhid" tid da" dang: yoomo Pharishe bigi - nheigloem: gyo: no nyid zi nang se' la" » ga: re" tid kyo" boem .
40015013	Yesu gi « Mougkhung: tho' moo nyid da" nga" phoo asho" to" da" agam bain , sho' ri phoin pyam wa zi nghoid .
40015014	Houg: bang: yoomo myid amyoo: goo" - nyangnu" gi myo , jed mo ri khyoo: shid: da" myo , jed mo , nghoid . Myo , jed nyang: cang" khyoo: shed go" rigi eig youg duang: khuang" moo byid: gyo" zi shau" wa nghoid » ga: doem tid kyo .
40015015	Petru gi « hau: dang: ri ngoonu" we' se gyo: sho tid kyoo" shi" we' » ga: tid .
40015016	Yesu gi « nanu" we' akhid" ju" sho ase' gyoo: shi" go" rhe" » ga: tid .
40015017	« Nhoid' moo vang lo zigi voem: doug khoug: moo ju" lo" lho: nghi: yhi: jang" moo khyo' pyam zi asi shi" goo" rhe"
40015018	Nhoid' mo thu' lo da" dang: gi nheigloem: khoug: mo thu' lo zi nghoid yoomo Byu ri aco' ajhoid bui" nhang: zi nghoid .
40015019	Ciwim gari Byu said zi su: myi: ri shoid zi: - myiyi: yuggi youg: shoo: go" zi Sube" zi khau" khyoo: - adeung amain" da" sagsi: bo kham: da" khyoo: - age da" lu wim gei sang: khyoo: - he: age da" khyoo: dangain" gi nheigloem: khoug: mo thu' lo zi nghoid .
40015020	He: kyoo: joem gi byu ri aco' ajhoid bui" nhang: da" zi nghoid . lo , acid" loo: voem: zo: da" khyoo: gi byu ri aco' ajhoid ayo" bui" nhang: » ga: Yesu tid .
40015021	Akhid" Yesu gi hau: joyoo mo doem thu' lo" lho: Turu yo" Sidun voo yo" jhang damoug moo ju" lo .
40015022	Hau: moug mo Khanan myiyi: myhi , dayug gi nya: jang" moo re" lho: « David da" nya: zoo: we" - ngoori nheig khyeig byid: we' nga" myiyi: zoo: ri yu vang wigi shen" yhen kyi" kyeig zi shau" nyid » ga: re" nyho: tid .
40015023	Nghoidloug we' Yesu gi dakhoin" we' aphougtu" . Nya: cangzoo: yi tain" yhe: lho: « Nyang: ri loo" nhang: kaid we' ngoonu" da" thang: moo cang nyho: nyid da: » ga: tid boem .
40015024	Aseing Yesu gi « Israela Amyu" mo byug lo" da" yang joem shid re" za: ngoori nhang: kaid zi nghoid » ga: phoug tid .
40015025	Houg: lang" hau: da" myiyi: myhi , gi Nya: khyid: yang: moo yu: tain" re" lho: wigi goeb pid' zoo" re" « Aseing we" ngoori pang" thoug yu shi" we o" » ga: tid .
40015026	Yesu gi « zoo: yi: da" zoo: noem ri yu lho: lakhuid" joem ri du" byid: wa zi gi adu nghoid da » ga: phoug tid .
40015027	Myiyi: myhi , gi « Nghoid da: Aseing we" - nghoid loug we' lakhuid" joem lang" yhoem: seing: da" zoobui" mo gyo" da" voem cab' voem: thang: ge koid: zo: da: » ga: tid .
40015028	Houg: su" wi Yesu gi « Myiyi: zoo: we" re" da" loem" jeung" khyoo: gi gyi: jo , da . Nang vho: nyid khyoo: bui" baja" ga: » nyang ri tid . Hau: ayo , mo nyang: nya: myiyi: zoo: gi ge loo" khari" bye .
40015029	Aseing Yesu gi hau: joyoo mo thu' lo" lho: Galile gyid nung" yam khyo" bouggung moo do , lo" wigi zhoug: jo .
40015030	Byu phung: moo" gi nya: jang" moo ju" re" boem ri khyid: yoin" mo myo , amyang mo dang: ase tid mo gootu: noophyoo" aja: ja: shau" mo ri shu" ju" re" boem wigi Yesu da" khyid: yang: moo nyhed: to" ago" . Yesu gi hau: noophyoo" shau" mo , ri zheung: ge loo" nhang: kaid .
40015031	Houg: yoomo dang: ase tid mo , gi dang: se tid lo: - Gung yoin" mo , gi yangzain: lo - khyid: gyoug: mo , gi khyoo: yo" so" zi myo , amyang lo: mo , gi myo , doem myang ziyo' - Israela da" Mangsoo ri coung" byid: boem yoomo byu phung: moo" yi gi gye" yu" mau" nyid boem .
40015032	Hau: uri Yesu gi nya: cangzoo: yi ri khe: yu lho: « He: da" mung" byu yi gi ngoo yo" soem" nyid" nyang: nyid bye . Nyang: nu" zoonoem ayoo" loo: yoomo nyangnu" ri ngoo nheig khyeig . Khyoo: moo zooyoid so" shang" loo" zi ci' yoomo zoo: noem azhoo" loo: anau nhang: kaid . »
40015033	Nya: cangzoo: yi gi « hid: myho' byuphung: moo" zo: gyi: sho' da" zoonoem gi he: dain" pyoid yoo moo ngoonu" khayo , se' yu wa » ga: zheung: tid lang .
40015034	Aseing Yesu gi « nanu" moo zooyho' kha: myhoo yho' yoo" go" » ga: doem myid: uri « zooyho' nyhed yho' yo" - ngoonug we dajhi' yo" » ga: zheung: tid boem .
40015035	Yesu gi « houg: lang" byu phung: yi ri myidjang moo zhoug: jo , nhang: ge' » ga: tid kaid .
40015036	Zooyho' nyhed yho' yo" ngoo: ri yu lho: Jeju" ri coung" nghei lho: zooyho' yo ngoo: ri phe yu wigi Nya: cangzoo: yi we' Byu phung: yi ri zheung: doem gam byid .
40015037	Byu dangain" mo zo: gyi: thang: ri zo: teing ajab amoin" doem cang koid: zheung" yu ri nyhed lain" ceing byeung" sho' nghoid shi .

40015039	Hau: Byu phung: yi ri nhang: kaid thang: ri lhid' zhoung: wigi Magadan moug moo ju" yhe: lo .
40016001	Pharishe yo" Saduke gi Yesu jang" moo re" ca , yu" zoore" - Apyaid atoo: mo da" Mangsoo gi Aseing ri nhang: kaid da" khyoo: deung zi si' wa shid re" alhoo: again ri pya shug we" ga: mho' boem .
40016002	Yesu gi « bidvang zoo" ri mougkhung: ne nghoid rigi moug: phang" wa ga: wigi we' .
40016003	Nab' kyoo zoo" ri mougkhung: ne lho: moug: doeb' nghoid rigi moug: voo wa ga: wigi we' nanu" se tid ago" . Nanu" gi mougkhung: ri yu" lho: mau: da" akhyoo" zain , gain , xung" gain , rigi se boem . Nghoidloug we' he: pyaid da" aved asam" rigi ase' phyoid: yu" goo" nhung: lha" .
40016004	He: da" pyaid mo byu yi gi gye" akhyeing" ashoeb' zi nghoid lho: Mangsoo yo" kha: yhi' ve: gang: nyid boem bye: nhung: lha" . Nanu" gi ngoori alhoo: again mho' go" la" . 40016017	Yesu gi « Yona da" nya: zoo: Simon we" - nang ngilho' bye . He: khyoo: gi Xangsu: byu dayug yug nang ri toin" shid' zi anghoid . Mougkhung: mo nga" phoo Mangsoo toin shid yoomo za: nang dayo" se' ga: tid .
40016018	Petru we" - ngoo nang ri tid ba" - nang gi lung: moo" boem nghoid . He: da" lug moo" boem moo apoem ayang: koid: lho: Nga" da" phung: ri zhug too" wa . shid zoug: lang" hau: da" phung: ri ung: wa zi anghoid .

40016025	« Nyang nya: da" kangso' ri khyoid yu noug su: gi kangso' soem" wa . Nga" shid re" kangso' soem" loo" su: koem gi kangso' yo" yu wa .

40016027	Byu da" nya: zoo: gi Nya: pho , da" myonhoo: phung yoeb bang ri void' ci: lho: Mouglagyoo: yi yo" dage" gyoo" loo wa . Hau: da" bidnyid ri mougmyid byu yi dayug yo" dayug ri nyang: nyang: koid: da" moozoo" yo' dakhyoo" ti" doem tau" byid: wa zi nghoid .

40017001	Khyug nyid" koo: myang" thang: ri Yesu gi Petru Yaku yo' nya: nhung" Yohan ri khe: shu" lho" - myhang: da" boem tho' khyoo: nyangnu" kyeing" do , lo" boem .

40017005	Petru houg: su" ga: dang: da tid nyid shi" uri gye bang da" jhoem: phyu: thei" daloem: gi nyangnu" da" tho' moo ju" gyoo" lho: hau: jhoem: phyu: thei" khoug: mo da" thui: gi « He: yug gi ngoo jheddab da" nga" zoo: nghoid . 40017010	Hau thang: ri cangzoo: yigi Tarha" sara: yigi « ciwim wigi Elia xangshid" ju" ca" ga: tid go" lha" » ga: Yesu ri zheung: myid: boem .
