40017012	« Nanu" ri ngoo tid nau da" zigi Elia gi gyoo" loo bye . Nghoidloug we' byu yi nyang: ri asi yoomo nyang: ri cinoug cikoid lo abye: go . Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" Nyangnu" gi byu da" nya: zoo: ri we' Houg: bang: da" lo , moo kyi" khyeug shen" yhen zi kham: wa » ga: wigi tid .
40017013	Hau: lho: ri she - cangzoo: yi gi Yesu gi Baptisma sara: Yohan ri yeing lho: tid zi dase' gyo: ago" .
40017014	Aseing yo" cangzoo: yi gi byu phung: moo" yi nyid da" jang" moo ju" lang" byu dayug gi Aseing da" shid khoin" moo poid thug re" thoug lho: wigi « Aseing we" - nga" zoo: ri nheig khyeig byid: shi" we' o" -
40017015	nyang: gi ngho' baid baid da" noo bo wigi coid' lo" lho: myikhyoem moo we' gyid thoem" moo we' daso' so' leung vang vang wim nyid .
40017016	Ngoo nyang: ri re" da" cangzoo: yi jhang khyoo: khe: shu" yhi: nghoid loug we' nyangnu" gi noo gi sho' ayo" koid: nghoid ago" » ga: tid .
40017017	Aseing Yesu gi « nanu" gi loem" jeung" nheigloem: abo zi yo" shoid vhang: nyid boem nhung: lha" . Ngoo gi nanu" yo' dage" kha: myhang ju" sho' nyid ca" la" . kha: myhang ju" sho nanu" ri kham: zheung: nyid wa . Hau: zooshang: ri nga" jhang khe: shu" ri" ge' » ga: tid .
40017018	Aseing Yesu gi ngho' yu ri nheig yo: kaid lang" gi hau: ngho' yu gi zooshang: gung mo phang: thu' loo" bye . Houg: lang" zooshang: no zi ge loo" bye .
40017019	Hau: thang: ri cangzoo: yi gi Yesu jang" moo sam" zoo: yu: yhe: lho: « ngoonu" gi hau: ngho' yu ri ci: wim ayo" khaid thu' pyam lha" » ga: zheung: myid: boem .
40017020	Aseing Yesu gi « Nanu" moo loem" jeung" nheigloem: ngi , yoomo nghoid . Ngoo deung" deung nanu" ri tid zigi nanu" moo loem" jeung" nheigloem: nghang" shi" cab yhi' koo: bo nghoid rigi He: da" boem ri he: joyoo mo zi fo: joyoo khyoo yu: loo" we' ga: tid nghoid ri yu: loo" khari" wa loem" jeung" nheigloem: bo rigi nanu" ayo" koid: wa zi ci" we ajo .
40017021	( He: ja: ngho' yu rigi Akyu mho' da" ziyo' zoonoem zeung: khyo" za: date: yo" khaid thu' ga: jhoug" byid . ) ‹ Loem ge" da" lo , wigi lhid" to" da Jhoem: mougsoug" xoug" myoo" sho' moo he: da" abeing: zoo: gi aboo .
40017022	Yesu da" cangzoo: yi gi Galile meing: moo doem shau" go" uri Aseing Yesu nyangnu" ri tid da" zigi « Byu nya: zoo: gi su" be" da" lo , moo said pyam zi shau" wa nghoid .
40017023	Nyang: ri said pyam goo" wa hau: thang: ri soem" nyid byeung" loo lang" Byu nya: zoo: gi shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo wa » ga: tid . Nya: cangzoo: yi we nheigloem: gye" agyo: pyo: boem loo .
40017024	Yesu yo" cangzoo: yi gi Kaperna-um voo moo ju" lo" da" uri Kyu" mho' yhoem: mo" shid re" kheing" khyu: mo ju" re" boem wigi Petru ri « re" sara: phoo gi-Kyu" mho' yhoem: mo" shid re" kheing" gi kaid nyid la" » ga: re" zheung: myid: boem .
40017025	Petru gi « kaid nyid » ga: tid . Petru yhoem: khoug: khyoo vang loo" lang" Yesu xangshid" tid zigi « Simon we" nang khasu" myang nyid Mougmyid khokham" yi gi akhoin: kheing" hang" jang" mo khyu: yu nyid ago" lha" . Nyangnu" da" nya: zoo: yi jang" mo khyu: yu la" . houg: su" anghoid lang" gi gootu: da" byu yi jang" mo nghoid la" . »
40017026	Petru gi « gootu: byu yi jang" mo lhung khyu: yu ago" » ga: tid . Houg: lang" Yesu gi « houg: su" nghoid lang" gi nya: myid nya: zoo: yi gi kheing" khyu: jang" mo loid byoin da" akhang" yo" boem .
40017027	Houg: su" nghoid loug we' nyangnu" da" nheigloem: moo anoo nhang: wa da" shid re" Nanu" gi gyid thoem" khyoo yhe: lho: ngoo: myhed' ge' . Xang: shid" shau" myhed' yu da" ngoo: ri nhoid' lang: fo , yu" ge" Dingga" ngei dakyab' ri shau" yu goo" wa . Hau: da" ngei ri yu lho: nang nyang: yo" nga" shid re" houg: bang: ri byid: pyam we' » ga: tid .
40018001	Houg: lang" cangzoo: yigi Aseing Yesu jang" moo ju" re" lho: « Mougkhung: Mungdain: moo je gyi: thang su: kha yug nghoid wa lha" » ga: wigi zheung: myid: boem .
40018002	Yesu gi zooshang: dayug ri khe: yu lho: wigi nya: cangzoo: yi da" shid khoin" moo yab jo , nhang: lho: tid da" zigi
40018003	« Ngoo nanu" ri gyeing" gyeing" tid ba . Nanu" gi nheigloem: thid' pyam lho: zooshang: yi yhang ti" abue" lo rigi Mougkhung: Mungdain: moo yo" vang loo" goo" wa zi anghoid .
40018004	He: zooshang: yhangti" - nya: nheigloem: nyhoem: khyo su: gi Mougkhung: Mungdain: moo je gyi: thang su: nghoid wa .
40018005	Nga" myeing yoomo hid yhang: te" da" zooshang: dayug yug ri lhoem: kham: yu su: gi ngoori lhoem: kham: yu su: nghoid bye .
40018006	« Ngoori loem" jeung" nyid da" ngi , su: dayug yug ri loem" jeung" nheigloem: byo loo" nhang: su gi nya: leingzeing: moo lug lheing: je gyi: gyab' tei" tab' lho: no , thang Panglai thoem" thi" moo khyo pyam wa zigi nya: shid re" je ge nyid .
40018007	Mougmyid moo loem" jeung" khyoo: ri lhu: phyo da" thei' leung jang: joyoo mo mougmyid gi joem: lo" nyid bye . Nheugloem: thei leung jang: gi gyeing" nyang: jo , - nghoid sho loug thei leung jang: koid thu' su: gi gyeing" nyang: joem: loo" wa zi nghoid .
40018008	« Re" da" khyid: nghoid loug - lo , nghoid loug re" da" loem" jeung" nheigloem: ri lhu: phyo' nghoid rigi Hau: khyid: yo" lo , ri kho" pyam we' . Khyid: lo , joeb' joeb' yo" - apyaid ato: da" myi: thoem" moo davang loo" wa tho' rigi gungdu: ajoeb' byeung" lo: zi apyaid ato: kangso' yo" yu zigi je ge nyid .
40018009	Re" da" myojid" gi re" da" loem" jeung" khyoo: ri yu shoid nhang: nghoid rigi hau: myojid" ri thoid pyam we' ngarai" myi: thoem" moo myojid" joeb' ziyo' vang loo" wa tho' rigi myo , dajid" yoin" ziyo' - apyaid ato: kangso' dei jang" khyoo: vang loo" wa zigi je ge nyid .
40018010	« Nanu" gi ngi , su: khayug ri we' Byu ngi yoo ayu" wa shid re" lhid nyid ge' . Nanu" ri ngoo tid da" zigi hau: zooshang: me" da" moug: lagyoo: yi gi Mougkhung: Aseing nga" pho da" myonhoo: ri khanham we' dayu" nyid boem ago" .
40018011	( Byu da" nya: zoo: gi byug loo" mo , ri khyoid yu wa shid re" ju" re" zi nghoid . ) ‹ ‹ He: Jhoem: dang: gi Loem ge" da" lo , mo lhid" to" da" jhoem: mungdang: xoug" moo gi aboo . »
40018012	« Nanu" gi khasu" ein: soin: nyid go" Byu dayug gi nyang: moo yo" da" yang dashoo: mo dadu: byug lo" ri goug: xe: goug: du: ri bouggung tho' mo yang kaid jang" moo - nyhed: too" kho lho: byug lo" da" yang ri ashoo: loo za: nyid wa la" .
40018013	Byoug lo" da" yang ri shau" sho: lho: ri abyug da" yang goug: xe: goug: du: yoomo gau yi nge' pyo: da" tho' moo byug lo" da" yang dadu: ri shau" shoo: yoomo je gau yi ngei' pyoo: wa ein: wigi ngoo nanu" ri gyeing" gyeing" tid kyo .
40018014	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - Mougkhung: tho' mo nanu" da" nya: phoo we' he: ngi , su: dayug we byug lam" loo" wa zi avhoo: ga: tid .
40018015	« Re" mang: re" nhung" nang ri shoid nghoid rigi nyang: shoid zi ri si wa da" shid re" nya: jhang khyoo yhi: we' . Nghoidloug we' re" eig yug za: shau" doem goo" ge' re" dang: ri tam gyo: nghoid rigi hau: mang: nhung" phoo ri nang yo" khyoid yu bye .
40018016	Nghoidloug nyang: gi re" da" dang: ri atam" gyo: nghoid rigi nyang: yo" dage" sagsi: eig yug soem" yug sho: shu" lho: nyang: jhang khyoo yhi: ge' . Houg: lang" jhoem: dang: moo bo ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nang yooboo foin: da" khyoo: ri eig soem" yug sagsi: bui" baja" .
40018017	Gyeing: nyang: houg: bang: da" dang: ri we' nyang: atam" gyo: nghoid rigi hau: khyoo: bain sho Hpung moo yhe: tid kyoo" we' . Lo" thang moo Hpung: mo mo , da" dang: ri we' atam" gyo: nghoid rigi hau: yug ri Mangsoo ano" su: dagyug khyo" soin: pyam ge' .
40018018	« Nanu" dangain" mo ri ngoo gyeing" gyeing" tid da" zigi Mougmyid tho' moo nanu" toung: too" ma too" gi Mougkhung: tho' moo we' toung: too" lang" wa . Myidjang: tho' moo nanu" akhang" byid: moo byid: gi Mougkhoug: tho' moo we' akhang" byid: lang" wa zi nghoid .
40018019	« Hau: tho' moo gootu: Ngoo nanu" ri gyeing" gyeing" tid da" zi gi Mougmyid tho' moo byu eig yug soem" yug veing" go" wigi Akyu" mho' nghoid rigi Mougkhung: tho' mo nga" phoo gi nanu" mho' da" zi dangain" ri byid: wam: bye .
40018020	Khasu" wim gari Byu eig soem" yug gi Nga" da" myeing ri nghe: khau: lho: zoeb foem: nghoid rigi houg: bang: yo" ngoo dage" nyid wa zi nghoid . »
40018021	Hau: thang: ri Petru gi Yesu jang" moo yhe: lho: « Aseing we" nga" mang: nhung" gi ngoori shoid nghoid ri kha myhoo lheing: koo: ngoo nyang: ri yooboo khyoid byid: wa lha" . nyhed lheing: ju" sho' khyoid byid: ca" la" » ga: myid: yu .
40018022	Aseing Yesu gi « nyhed lheing: za: anghoid . Nang nyhed , xi: xi: nyhed lheing: ju" sho' yooboo ri khyoid goo" ca" » ga: wigi tid .
40018023	« Houg: su" nghoid yoomo Moungkhoung: Mungdain: gi hid: su" nghoid . shedphyang" ri khokham dayug gi nya: dei zoo: yi da" lhid" xoem"
40018024	pug ri sho' yu" wa shid re" myid to . Hau: lhid" xoem" pug sho' go" yu" uri ngei van , myoo" sho jhen: dab su: dagyug ri khi: nhang .
40018025	Hau: yug gi jhen: houg: yo" xab' wa akhyoo" aboo loo: yoomo khokham" Phoo gi hau: yug yo" dage" nya: myi: nya: zoo: yhoem: zi yookhuid" dangain" oung" pyam lho: jhen: xab' wa amyeing" khyo' kaid .
40018026	Houg: lang: hau: yug gi khokham" da" shid khoin" moo goeb pid' lho: ‹ ngoori zheung: kham: byid: shi" we' jhen: gi yo" sho' xab' zi nghoid › ga: toung" pain .
40018027	Khokham" gi nyang: ri nheig yu" khyeig yoomo nya: jhen: joem dangain" ri lhid" xoem" pug mo kho" pyam byid: lho: lhoid pyoid kaid bye .
40018028	« Nghoidloug hau: yug gi houg: mo thu' lo" da" uri nyang: ri ngei jhen: daxoo: dab da" nya: byen cang" dage" moo" zoem" voin , su: yo" thoung" shau" goo" lang" hau: jhen: dab su: da" leingzeing: moo gya , zeing ci: lho: wigi nang ngoori byid: ca" da" jhen: myab xab' we' ga: nhain .
40018029	Nya: byen cang" phoo gi poid thug thoug lho: ‹ ngoori zheung: kham: byid: shi" we' jhen: yoo" sho xab' zi nghoid › ga: mho' tid .
40018030	Nghoidloug we' jhen: seing: gi atam" gyoo: loo za: hau: jhen dab su: ri jhen: ayo" xab' pyam' pyam' gi thung: tei" lhung to .
40018031	He: khyoo: ri gootu: da" moo" zoem zei byen cang" yi myang lang" nheig soo" soo" yu" yoo: yoomo nyangnu" da" khokham" jhang yhe: wigi bue" lo da" khyoo: dangain" ri kau: to" ago" .
40018032	Houg: lang" khokham" gi hau: da" moo" voin su: ri khe: yu lho: He: da" deizoo: gang: - nang ngoori toung: pain: da" uri nang xab' ca" da" jhen: dangain" ri ngoo kho" pyam byid: bye: anghoid la" .
40018033	Nang ri ngoo nheig khyeig yhangti" - nang we re" da" byen cang" ri nheig ge khyeig anghoid rhe" ga: tid .
40018034	khokham" gi nheig gye" yu" yo: wigi hau: da" deizoo: ri we' jhen: abain xab' xab' gi thung: moo lhung to" . »
40018035	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi mang: nhung" nyang: cang" - dayoug da" yooboo ri dayug - re" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: mo , gyeing" gyeing" khyoid pyam byid: go" nghoid rigi Mougkhung: tho' mo Nga" phoo we' nanu" da" yooboo ri gyeing" gyeing" khyoid pyam byid: wa zi nghoid ga: wigi jhoug" byid .
40019001	Aseing Yesu gi hid: su ga: bain jhoug" byid: thang: ri Galile mung" mo thu' lo" wigi Yodan gyidlang thei: tab' - Yuda mung" khyoo ju" vang lo .
40019002	Byu phung: moo" gi nya: da" thang: moo cang lo nyid boem . Hau: joyoo moo Aseing gi noophyoo" shau" mo ri ge loo" nhang .
40019003	Pharishe dayham" gi Yesu jang" moo ju" re" lho: « Byu dayug yug gi ce: khyo" nghoid nghoid - nya: yhoem: seing: myhi' yo" ge gang: go" la" » ga: re" lheung myid: boem .
40019004	Yesu gi « Phain" to" da" Aseing gi xang: shid" mo wigi Byu yuggi yo" myiyi: ri phain" too" bye .
40019005	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo yuggi gi nya: myhi , nya: phoo ri too" kho' lho: nya: yhoem: seing: myhi' yo" dage" nyid loo" ca . Hau: eig yug gi dagung dashoo" za: bue" loo" wa .
40019006	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nya: eig yug gi eig yug anghoid - dayug za: date: nghoid . Houg: yoomo Mangsoo shoem: too" bye: da" vhu" shang rigi byu hang" we' age phoid: pyam loo . »
40019007	Pharishe gi houg: su" nghoid rigi ci: wim wigi nya: myi: ri kang" pyam' mougsoug" lhid" byid: lho: yo" kang" pyam ga: Moshe gi cikoid: lhid" to" lha" » ga: doem myid: boem .
40019008	Yesu gi « Nanu" gi nheigloem: thain: mo , nghoid yoomo Moshe gi nanu" ri myi: kang" pyam wa da" akhang" byid: da" zi nghoid . Xangshid" moo hid: su" kang" pyam wa da" amyeing" ajo ,
40019009	Nanu" ri ngoo tid zigi nanu" da" yhoem: seing: myhi' ri Yuggi goo" yug yo" shoid vhang: goo" yoomo za: anghoid ri ce: ja: yooboo mo nghoid nghoid - myi: kang" pyam lho: gootu: myiyi: dayug yug yo" - deung khu: doem qei" su: gi myi: lhoid da" yooboo yoo" su: nghoid » ga: doem tid .
40019010	Nya: cangzoo: yi gi « myhi' zeing phoo zeing zoem" nyid da" khyoo: gi hid: su" danghoid rigi deung khu: aqei" loo: nyid ri je ge » ga: tid boem .
40019011	Yesu gi « yug khang" moo" deung khu: aqei loo: yo" nyid wa zi anghoid . Nghoidloug we' Mangso da" akhang" yoo" mo , za: houg: su" dayo" nyid boem .
40019012	Byu yi deung khu: ayo" qei" da" zigi khyoo: daja: ja: yoomo nghoid . Byu dayham" moo gi khu: lo bidnyid mo nyang: - deung khu: qei" wa da" yoem: abo boem . dayham" gi hau: deung khu: qei" wa da" yoem: ri shain: pyam boem yoomo deung khu: ayo" qei" boem . Dayham" gi Mangso da" Mungdain: shid re" ab noung" pyam yoomo deung khu: aqei" loo: nyid . He: da" jhoug" myeing" ri yo" lhoem: yu mo hang" we' lhoem: yu goo" baja" . »
40019013	Byu dayham" bang: gi zooshang: yi da" tho' moo lo , ke" lho: akyu" mho' byid: wa shid re" Yesu jhang khyoo shu" re" ago" . Nghoidloug we' nya: cangzoo: yi gi houg bang: ri lhoem gyikoid boem .
40019014	Aseing Yesu gi « zooshang: mi" ri nga" jhang khyoo nhang: kaid ge' nyangnu" ri atoem too" goo . Khasu" wim gari Mangso da" Mungdain: gi houg: yhangti" mo , mungdain: nghoid » ga: tid .
40019015	Yesu gi zooshang: me" da" tho' moo lo , ki" byid: lho: mainkaid byid: thang: ri hau: joyoo mo thu' lo .
40019016	Byu dayug gi Yesu jang" moo ju" re" lho: « Sara: we" - Apyaid ato: kangso' yoo" wa shid re" khate" moo" gi ri ngoo zei: ca" lha" » ga: re" myid: .
40019017	Yesu gi « nang gi ge da" moo" yo" sen: lho: cikoid: ngoori myid: - gi su: gi dayug za: date: nyid . Nang apyaid ato: da" kangso' yoo" nau nghoid rigi Mangso da" amyeing" tarha" ri cang we' » ga: tid .
40019018	« Hau: yug gi kha: da" tarha" ri cang wa lha" » ga: myid: . Yesu gi « Byu asaid - Su: myi: alhoid - su" be" zi akhoug" - adeung amain" da" sagsi: akham:
40019019	Myhi , phoo ri phau" myang: ge' re" yhoem: kyoo" cang" ri nanya: gung yo' dakhyoo" ti" jheddab we' » ga: tid kyo .
40019020	Hau: da" zoolu: phoo we' « hau: da" tarha" dangain" ziri ngi , shi" pyaid mo , bain cang nyid bye: . Ngoo gootu: ce: noem cang ca" shi" lha" » ga: doem myid .
40019021	Aseing Yesu gi « Nang joeb byeung" su: bui" nau nghoid rigi loo" we' re" da" zi dangain" oung" pyam lho: hau: ngei sho" jhen mo , ri gam byid: pyam we' houg: su" koid: lang" Mougkhung: tho' moo nang yoo" zoo: yoo" shoug wa . Houg: bain gam pyam byid: lho: nga" thang: moo cang we' » ga: tid .
40019022	Nghoidloug we' hau: zoolu: phoo gi zi gye" yo" sathi" nghoid yoomo Yesu da" dang: ri shau" gyoo: lang" nheigloem: apyo: zoore" thu' loo" khare" .
40019023	Aseing Yesu gi « Ngoo nanu" ri gyeing" gyeing" tid ba: - yoo" zoo: yoo" shoug su: gi Mangso Mungdain: moo yo" vang loo" wa shid re" gye yau: nyid .
40019024	Ngoo dalheing: doem tid ba: - Gola-ug gi nghab' nhoo: duang: khyo" vang lid loo" wa tho' moo yoo" zoo: yoo" shoug su: Mangso mungdain: moo yo" vang loo" zigi je yau: nyid » ga: wigi cangzoo: yi ri tid .
40019025	Nya: cangzoo: yi gi Aseing da" mungdang: ri shau" gyoo: lang" gye" gyo: mau" boem wigi « houg: su" nghoid rigi khyoid yu zigi hang" te: shau" wa lha" » ga: zheung: myid: boem .
40019026	Yesu phougtu" zigi « houg: bang: ri yu" zhug to" lho: Byu khyo" te: soin: yu rigi he: khyoo: ayo" bui . Nghoidloug we' Mangsoo gi ci" we' yo" bue" » ga: tid kyo .
40019027	Hau: uri Petru gi « Yu" we' ngoonu" gi ziyoo jonu" dangain" she: pyam kho' lho: Aseing thang: cang boem bye: . Ngoonu" gi ce: noem akyu" ri shau" kham: zoo: wa lha" » ga: myid: .
40019028	Yesu gi « ngoo gyeing" gyeing" tid ba: ju" loo wa da" mungdain: seig moo Byu da" nya: zoo: gi myonhoo: yoeb' bang joeb byeung" da" zhungtang tho' moo zhoung: jo , da" uri nga" cangzoo: yi nanu" we' zhungtang daxe: eig loem: tho' moo zhoung: jo , lho: Israela daxe: eig kung: mo mo , dangain" ri yo" vhoeb' khang" wa zi nghoid .
40019029	Hau: tho' mo gootu: Ngoo yoomo , yhoem: yoo yaboin: - nya: mang: nya: nhung" - nya: myhi' nya: phoo nya: myid nya: zoo: - ri to" pyam khoo su: hang" nghoid loug we' nyang: to" pyam kho' tho' moo dashoo: ki - Akyu" ri je kham: zoo: wa . Hau: tho' moo apyaid ato: kangso' we yo" yu wa zi nghoid .
40019030	Nghoidloug we' byu myoo" sho' mo , gi akhid" shid' khyoo: nyid nyid mo , myoo" sho' gi thang: mo mo' bui" wa . Akhid" thang: moo nyid mo , myoo" sho' gi shid moo nyid mo , bui" wa zi nghoid .
40020001	« Mougkhung: mungdain: gi zabyid khyam: seing: dayug thoung" shau" da" moo" yo" du nyid . Nyang: gi khyam: moo" zei: wa da" vhoo" kung: sho: lhung: wa ga no" re thu' yhe: lo .
40020002	Vhoo" kung: phoug" shang" wa zi danyid" ri ngei phyu: dakyab byid: wa zi veing" yoomo nyangnu" ri zabyid khyam: khyoo nhang: kaid bye .
40020003	Nab' kyoo goug nayi: koo: moo nyang: gi kid" vang" khyoo yhe: yu" lo" ri ce: moo" abo mo , yab yoin" to" ziri myang .
40020004	Houg: lang" nyangnu" ri ‹ nanu" we zabyid khyam: moo moo" yhe: zei: ge' . Moin: yi" da" vhoo" kung: phoug" ngoo shang" wa › ga: tid .
40020005	Houg: bang: we yhe: lo" boem bye . Nyang: gi bidnyid" gung ri nghoid loug - myenthang: soem" nayi koo: moo nghoid loug - houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - kid" vang" moo yhe: yu" lho: vhoo" kung: cang lhung: yu shi .
40020006	Myenthang: wim: nayi: koo: moo dalheing: doem yhe: yu" ri Byu gootu: yab jo , zi doem myang wigi nyangnu" ri ciwim wigi moo" azei: loo: danyid" goin" he: joyoo moo yab jo , go" › ga: myid: yu .
40020007	Houg: bang: gi ‹ ngoonu" ri hang" we alhung: yoomo nghoid › ga: tid boem . Houg: lang" khyam: seing: gi ‹ nanu" we' nga" zabyid khyam: moo moo" yhe: zei: ge' › ga: tid kaid .
40020008	« Myenthang: ju" lang" hau: khyam: seing: gi moo" shu" vhu" shi: su: ri ‹ moo" zei: mo , ri khe: zheung" lho: moo vang thang mo , mo wigi vang shid" bang: moo ju" sho' vhoo" kung: phoug" thug byid: we' › ga: tid .
40020009	Houg: lang" vhu" shi: su: gi myenthang: wim: nayi: ri vang zei: mo , gi ngei phyu: dakyab kyab yo" yu boem bye .
40020010	Xang: shid" vang zei: mo , gi ngei je myoo: wa ga: myid boem ago" . Nghoidloug nyangnu" we' ngei phyu: dakyab kyab shau" yu boem ago" .
40020011	Houg: su" nyangnu" gi ngei yo" yu boem lang" khyam: seing: ri myeing" myo: boem ago" .
40020012	Moo" vang shid" mo , hid: bang: gi ‹ Nang gi danayi: za: te: kung: da" thang: ri dari" mo ri ngoonu" nyid" goin" bid lhab' kham: mo yo' dakhyoo" ti" nyangnu" ri vhoo" kung: phoug" byid: da › ga: khyam: seing: ri tid ago" .
40020013	Khyam: seing: gi nyangnu" mo dayug ri ‹ bidnoem phoo we" - ngoo nang ri mhoug zo: zi anghoid . Nang yo' ngoo dakyab byid: wa ein: sham go" veing" too" bye anghoid la" .

Hau: lagyoo: yi gi « Sara: we" - nang gi deung main" su: nghoid wigi Mangso da" khyoo: ri deung: main" khyo" jhoug" byid: nyid ziyo' byu gootu: yi ciga: wa ziri nang gung ayou loo: za: byu myonhoo: ri we' akhyen: su: nghoid ziri ngoonu" se .
40022017	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nang khasu" myid da" khyoo: ri ngoonu" ri tid kyoo" we' Roma khokham" ri khang" doug ge kaid la" . age kaid la" » ga: zheung: myid: boem .
40022018	Nghoidloug we' Yesu gi nyangnu" da" age khyo" lheing: myid: da" dang: khoin" nghoid ziri si byid: yoomo nyang gi « ayid void mo we" - nanu" gi ciwim ngoori myheig" wa shid' re" lu: go" la" .
40022019	Khang" doug kaid wa da" ngei dakyab ngoori byid: yu" ge' » ga: tid . Nyangnu" gi ngei dakyab ci: re" ago" .
40022020	Yesu nyangnu" ri « he: ngei kyab moo hang" da" myonhoo: soolho: yo"-myeing dab lha" » ga: myid:
40022021	« Nyangnu" gi khokham" da" myonhoo: soolhoo: yo' myeing dab » ga: doem phoid: kyo" boem . Houg: lang" Yesu gi « Ketha khokham" yo" sen: gu: Ketha khokham" ri byid: ge' . Mangsoo yo" sen: gu: Mangsoo ri byid: ge' › ga: tid .
40022022	Houg: bang: gi hau: da" dang: ri shau" gyoo: lang" gye" gyo: mau" boem bye . Hau: thang: ri nyangnu" gi nya: jang" mo thu' lo" ago" .
40022023	Hau: bidnyid ri nyang: Saduke dayham" gi Yesu jang" moo ju" re" boem . Houg: bang: gi shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo wa ziri aloem" jeung" mo , nghoid ago" .
40022024	Nyangnu" gi « sara: we" - Yuggi dayug gi zoo: aboo shi" ri shid: lo" ri nya: mang: da" cougmoo" myhi , ri nya: nhung" yug lo , doem xo' yu lho: yo" da" zooshang: gi nya: mang: yhoemkhung: xo' void zi nghoid ga: Moshe tid to .
40022025	Akhid" ngoonu" moo nya: mang: nya: nhung" nyhed yug nyid . Mang: zeing gi myi: yu thang: ri zoo: shang: shi" ri ayoo" shid: lo" nya: nhung" gi coug" doem koem .
40022026	Nya: nhung" yi dayug bain dayug - nyhed yug ju" sho' - coug" koem: thang: ri zoo: abo zi te: shid: lo" boem .
40022027	Hau: thang: ri hau: da" myiyi: myhi , we' shang shid: lo .

40024020	Nanu" cae: thu' lo" da" ayo , gi xung" thu' yo , yo" - Dougno: Bidnyid ri aeung: loo wa shid re" Mangsoo jhang akyu" mho' nyid ge' .
40024021	Khasu" wim gari hau: da" bidnyid moo gye" gyi: da" sho" jhen yau: khe" da" bidnyid ju" loo wa . 40024022	Nghoidloug we' Mangsoo: gi hau: ayo , bidnyid ri ashoung" kaid nghoid rigi xangsu: byu yi hang" kangso' we yo" loid wa zi anghoid . Nghoidloug we' Mangsoo gi nyang: khyen: yu too" mo , shid re" hau: ayo , bidnyid ri shoung" kaid byid: wa nghoid .
40024023	« Hau: da" ayo , moo byu dayug yug gi ‹ Yu" ge' he: joyoo moo Meshia nyid › ga: wigi we' Thei: joyoo moo Meshia nyid ga: wigi we' tid lo boem ri nyang ri aloem" goo .
40024024	Khasu" wim gari mhau' da" Meshia yo" mhau' da" Lapi: po" thu' lo lho: ge bue" rigi Mangsoo khyen: yu too" bye: mo , ri lang" khyoo yo" shu" vhang: sho' - alhoo: again mau" pho" moozoo" zeing yo" - zei: shug lo boem wa zi nghoid .
40024025	Tam" gyoo: ge' he: da" khyoo: abue" loo shi" ri nanu" ri ngoo tid kyoo" bye .
40024026	« Houg: yoomo gyeing" nyang: nyangnu" gi ‹ Yu" ge' Meshia gi dain" pyoid yoo moo re" nyid › ga: tid boem nghoid ri nanu" athu' yhi: goo . He joyoo moo gau" nyid bye: ga tid nghoid loug we' hau: dang: ri agyo: loem" goo .
40024027	Bid thu' shoid mo bidvang shoid ju" sho' - mougkhung: ri we dangain" bang yi loo" nhang: da: - lhab' myeig lo" yhangti" - byu da" nya: zoo: doem gyoo" lo ri we' houg: su" wim loo" wa zi nghoid .
40024028	« Mang leung jo , da" khyi' khang" moo" moo Langda joem we' zheung: foem: boem wa nghoid .
40024029	« Houg: te" da" gyoug dain' jam joug khyoo: bain thoug" shau" da" hau: nyid" ri Bid gi moug: coid bue" loo" khari" wa . Lham" moo" we bang loo: wa zi anghoid . Kyi" joem gi mougtho' mo byid gyoo" lo boem wa . Mougkhung: moo jo , da" yoem: so' dangain" we' nyangnu" da" khyoo" mo nain" yu: phang: lo" boem wa .
40024030	Houg: thang: byu da" nya: zoo: gyoo" loo wa da" alhoo: again gi mougtho moo myang thu' loo: wa . Jhoem: moug" ju: lho: gyi: thang da" myo nhoo: phung" yoeb zeing yo" - Byu da" nya: zoo: gyoo" lo da" ziri mougmyid byu yi bain sho' mo lhoem: myang da" uri ngau nyid boem wa .
40024031	Byu da" nya: zoo: gi laboo" zeing myeing: lo da" uri nya: da" moug: lagyoo: joem ri mougmyid myonhoo: myid: shoid khyoo nhang: kaid wigi Mougmyid dashoid mo zi dashoid khyoo thang sho' moo nyid da" Aseing khyen: too" mo , ri nyangnu" zeung: foem: nyid wa .
40024032	« Lafoem gam mo he: akhyoo" daja: ri jhau" yu ge' . Hau: seig gam mo akung: ako'' nu" lo lho: afu' toid loo lang" gi zain vang khoem" ju" loo bye: ziri nanu" se' ago" .
40024033	Hau: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - tid kyo" lid lo da" khyoo: joem bue" lo ziri myang lang" gi nanu" da" anam , mo vang" khoem" duang moo nyang: ju" ri" bye: ziri si loo ge' .
40024034	Ngoo nanu" ri deung" deung tid ba" - he: da moo" bain sho' gi akhid" dei nyid mo abain shid: shi" ri boin: nyid ge' .
40024035	Mougkhung yo" myidjang: led: loo" nghoid loug we' nga" Mungdang: gi aled: loo" wa .
40024036	« Houg: su" nghoid loug we' He: da" moozoo" bue" loo wa da" ayo , bidnyid rigi nga" phoo mo lid' lho: hang" we' asi - mougkhung moo nyid da" lagyoo: yi we' asi - nya: zoo: we asi .
40024037	Noa da" bidnyid moo bue" lo ziyo' dakhyoo ti" - Byu da" nya: zoo: bidnyid moo we bue" loo wa .
40024038	Hau: da" bidnyid moo ti: gyid ashi shi" uri Noa gyid sang phoo yhoem: moo vang lo" da" bidnyid ju" sho' - Byu yi gi zo: lho: shug lho: myi: yu loxo' lho: koid: nyid boem ago" .
40024039	Nyangnu" gi ti gyid shi , jang" moo myu: shid: doem lo" da" bidnyid ju" sho' asi aboin: loo: nyid boem ago" . Byu da" nya: zoo: doem gyoo" loo wa da" bidnyid moo we' houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - bue" loo wa zi nghoid .
40024040	Hau: da" ayo , ri khyam: yoomoo byu eig yug moo" zei nyid da" jang" mo - dayug ri shu" do , lo" byug lho: dayug gi deung gyo" nyid khari" wa zi nghoid .
40024041	Lug lheing: gyeig nyid da" myiyi: zoo: eig yug mo we' dayug rigi shu" do , lo" byug lho: dayug gi deung nyid khari" wa .
40024042	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo zed" lhid zoore" lang" nyid ge' . Nanu" da" Aseing: gi kha: yo , khakhyeing: moo gyoo" loo wa zi nanu" asi .
40024043	Yhoem: seing: gi nya: yhoem: moo khoug" vang wa da" ayo , akhyeing: ri gyeing" gyeing" nyang: se' nghoid rigi nya: yhoem: ayo" re" khau" baid phoid loo" sho' zung" nyid wa zi anghoid la" .
40024044	Byu da" nya: zoo: gi nanu" amyid to" da" ayo , akhyeing: moo ju" ri" wa nghoid yoomo nanu" khanham we' jen" jen" koid nyid ge' .
40024045	« Loem loug ziyo' phajhi" bo da" deizoo: gi hang" nghoid la" . hau: yug gi nya: yhoem: seing: da" deizoo: gootu: ri vhoeb' khang" lho: ayo , ju" lang" zoo: shug thug byid: wa shid re" yhoem: seing: wigi khyen: nhang: too" su: nghoid .
40024046	Yhoem: seing: doem ju" lo da" ayo , moo moo" loem loug zei: nyid lang" zi lo shau" myang da" deizoo: koem gi ngilho' nyid .
40024047	Nanu" ri ngoo deung" deing tid da" zigi yhoem: seing: gi hau: da" deizoo: ri nya: zi jo , moo jo , ri yu" goin coung: vhoeb' khang" nyid wa shid re" hau: da" deizoo: ri nyheing too" zi nghoid .
40024048	Nghoidloug we' hau: da" deizoo: gang: dayug gi nya: yhoem: seing: gi myab doem loo wa zi anghoid - myang" shi wa ga: myid nyid .
40024049	Nya deizoo: byen cang" yi ri we' youg baid lho: yhid: shug foo" zo: mo , yo" - zo: yed' shug yed nyid uri
40024050	Hau: thang mo hau: yug alang" nyid aboin: aso" da" da nyid moo nya: yhoem: seing: doem ju" lo wigi
40024051	Nyang: ri eig du khyo lho: ayid void mo kham: zo: wa da: - amyen , akhyoid da" dam kham: nhang: wa nghoid . Hau: jang" moo ngoug byid' ngoug nhab' yo" - zei yang: kyeig ga: ngau nyid wa .
40025001	« Hau: ayo , moo mougkhoung: Mungdain: gi xu: myibung: ri ci: lho: phoo seig ri tau yu wa ga: thu' lo" da" zoomyi: daxi: yug yo" du nyid .
40025002	Nyangnu" mo wim: yug gi phajhi boung: gyeing ; bang: nghoid . Wim: yug gi nheig agyeung: bang: nghoid .

40025009	Phajhi" bo nheig gyeing: bang: anghoid ‹ nanu" shid re" we' ngoonu" shid re" we' ein: rigi tham: zi anghoid . Nanu" shid re" ung" jang: moo yhe: qei yu ge › ga: phoug tid kaid ago" .
40025010	Nheig aboo mo , nheig agyeung: da" zoomi: yi gi myi: xu: qei wa ga thu' yhe: lo" boem da" uri phoo seig gi kho ga: ju" ri" bye . Jen" jen" soin' nyheing to" da" myiyi: wim: yug gi phoo seig yo" dage" myi: fang pui" khyoo vang lo" boem lho: khoem" ri we' myhid" khare" boem bye .
40025011	« Hau: thang: ri gootu: wim: yug doem ju" lo lho: ‹ Aseing we" - Aseing we" ngoonu" ri akhoug: khyoo: vang nhang: we' oh" › ga: lo ngau ago" .
40025012	Nghoidloug we phoo seig gi « ngoo nanu" ri asi » ga: phoug tid .
40025013	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nanu" we' hau: bidnyid hau: ayo , ri asi yoomo zed" lhed lho: lang" nyid , ge' .
40025014	« Mougkhung: mungdain: ein: da" zigi gyung: so" loo" su: dayug yo" du nyid . Nya: deizoo: yi ri we khe: yu lho: ziyoo jonu" zheung: ab byid: too" khare" .
40025015	Dayug ri sheing: kyab wim: khyeing" - gootu: dayug ri sheing: kyab eig khyeing" - dayug ri sheing: kyab dakhyeing" koid: wigi nyang: nya: da" yoem: ri yu" lho: zheung: ab byid: to . Hau: thang: ri nyang: gi gyung: so" loo" bye .
40025016	Sheing: kyab wim: khyeing" yoo" su: we' dalheing: dam - phaga: yhe: cang koid: lho: amyaid sheing: kyab wim: khyeing" yo" yu too" bye .

40025019	« Akhyeing: ayo , shang" yhen" zoo: myang" lo" thang: ri hau: deizoo: yi da" yhoem: seing: gi doem ju" lo wigi nyangnu" yo" zhayen" sho' go" boem .
40025020	Sheing: kyab wim: khyeing" yoo" su: gi amyaid wim: khyeing" kyab ci: ju" re" lho: « Aseing we" - ngoori Aseing sheing: wim: khyeing" kyab byid: - yu" we' hid: moo ngoo amyaid wim: khyeing" kyab yoo" bye: » ga: re" tid .
40025021	Nya: yhoem: seing: gi gi bye: loemloug da" nga" deizoo: gi we" - nang gi nge da" moo" moo loem gi" su: nghoid yoomo gyi: da" moo" zeing moo we ngoo ab byid: wa ri" we' - ngoo yo' dage" gau yi ngei pyo: nyid loo: shang » ga: tid .

40025023	Nya: yhoem: seing: gi « gi bye: . Loemloug da" nga" deizoo: gi , we" nang gi nge da" moo" moo loemloug su: nghoid yoomo gyi: da" moo" zing ri ngoo ab byid: wa . Ri" we' ngoo yo" dage" gau yi ngei pyo: nyid loo: shang » ga: tid .
40025024	Hau thang sheing: kyab da" khyeing" yoo" su: ju" re" lho: « aseing: we" - ngoo gi Aseing da" khyoo: ri se' - Aseing gi cen" su: nghoid yoomo atei: asho" to" jang" mo doem shab yu su: - asain" akaid to" jang" mo - doem shoem" yu su: nang nghoid nhung: lha" .
40025025	Ngoo gi gyoug wigi re" sheing: ri myidjang: moo du: myhoeb to" - nyho' re" zi hid: nghoid » ga: re" tid .

40025031	« Byu nya: zoo: gi khokham" khyo" - Mouglagyoo: dangain" yo" dage" ju" gyoo" lo da" uri Nya: da" khokham" zhung: tang tho' moo zhoung: jo , wa nghoid .

40025033	Nyang: gi deung byeung" da" byu yi rigi lo , yo shoid khyoo: gootu: byu yi rigi lo , koung" shoid' khyoo kho' too" wa zi nghoid .

40025035	Khasu" wim gari Nanu" gi ngoo zooyoid da" uri zoo: noem byid: zho . Gyid shid da" uri shug gyid byid: jhoug ago" . Ngoo being" voo bue" yen" uri nanu" yhoem: moo being" ded" boem ago" .
40025036	Ngoo gung cen: doem bue" nyid da" uri byimi gam foid . Ngoo no nyid da" uri yu" coung: ago" . Ngoo thung: moo loung" jo , da" uri ngoori re" koem" yu" ago" ga: tid .
40025037	Houg: lang" deung byeung" mo gi ‹ Aseing we" nang zooyoid yen" zi: - ngoonu" kha: nham , myang wigi nang ri voem: byid: zho" yu" lha" . Gyid shid yen" zigi khanham myang wigi ` gyid byid: jhoug yu" la" .
40025038	Being" voo bue" yen" zi khanham myang wigi ngoonu" being" ded" yu" la" . Gung cen: nyid yen" yoo , khanham nyang wigi nang ri byimi foid yu boem la" .
40025039	No nyid ziri we' thung: loung" nyid ziri we' ngoonu" khanham myang wigi re" koem" yu" lha" . Ga: tid boem .
40025040	Khokham" gi nanu" ri ngoo deung" deing tid ba" - Hid: nga" nhung" yi khoug: mo: - nge thang su: ri yu coung: da" zigi ngoori yu coung: zi nghoid bye: › ga: tid .
40025041	« Hau: da" thang: ri khokham" gi lo , koung" shoid khyoo nyid mo , ri ‹ joem: so: zhung" da" byu yi we" - nga" jang" mo gang: loo" ge' . Yu satan: yo' nya: lagyoo: yi shid re" ein: nyheing to" da: - moo myi: apyaid atoo: thoem" khyoo vang loo" ge' › ga: tid .
40025042	‹ Khasu" wim gari ngoo zooyoid nyid uri nanu" ngoori voem: azhoo . Ngoo gyid shid uri gyid abyid: boem .
40025043	Ngoo being" voo bue" yen" uri nanu" ngoori being" adi" boem . Gung cen: nyid da" uri nanu" ngoori byimi afoid boem . Ngoo no , nyid ziyo' - thung: loung" jo da" uri nanu" nga" jhang are" koem boem › ga: tid .
40025044	Houg: lang" houg: bang: gi ‹ Aseing we" - Aseing zooyoid nyid zi gyid shid yen" ziri being" voo bue" yen" ziyo' - byimi avoid loo: nyid yen" ziri no , nyid da" ziyo' - thung: loung" jo , da" khyoo: ri ngoonu" khanham myang lho: wigi Aseing ri acoung: agoin loo: nyid boem lha" › ga: wigi phougtu" boem .
40025045	Khokham" gi ngoo nanu" ri deung" deing tid ba" - nge thang da" hid bang: mo dayug yug ri ‹ nanu" agoin acoung: da" zigi ngoori agoin acoung: zi nghoid › ga: tid wa .
40025046	Houg: yoomo houg: bang: gi apyaid ato: da" yooboo dam shau" kham: zo: wa jang moo ju" lo" boem wa . Nghoid loug we deung byeung" mo , koem gi apyaid ato: da" kangso' khyoo shau" vang lo" boem wa" . »
40026001	Aseing Yesu hid: su: ga: bain jhoug" byid: lang" nya: cangzoo: yi ri tid da" zigi nanu" se' ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" eig nyid rigi

40026012	He: da" myhi' zeing nga" da" gung moo xu: foid shoin" da" khyoo: gi Nga" gung ri myhoeb shung: wa ga: soin' khyo" nghoid da .
40026013	Akhid" deing" deing nanu" ri ngoo tid ba" - Lu dang: gi ri moug myid joyoo khang moo" moo kho" kyo" lo" da" uri he: myhi' zeing ri myid boin: wa da" shid re" nyang: koid: da" moo" ri tid kyo" lo" boem wa nghoid . »
40026014	Hau: thang: ri nya: cangzoo: daxe: eig yug moo bo da" dayug Yuda Iskarud ga gi khainjung moo" yi jhang khyoo yhe: lho:
40026015	« Yesu ri nanu" da" lo , moo ab byid: ri ngoori ci: byid: wa go" » ga: yhe: myid . Houg: bang: gi ngei soem" xi: kyab byid: boem .
40026016	Hau: ayo , mo wigi Yuda gi Yesu ri nyangnu" lo , moo kha: khyo" yo" ab byid: pyam wa da" khyoo: ri za: dasho: nyid lo .
40026017	Doo cid" abo da" zooyho' zoo: pui" xang shid" nyid moo cangzoo: yi gi Yesu jhang khyoo re" lho: « Aseing shid re" lhid" kaid myen" xoin: zoo: pui" ri khayoo: nyheig nhang: nau lha" » ga: re" myid: boem .
40026018	Yesu gi « voo khoug: khyoo vang lo" lho: byu dayug jang" moo yhe: wigi sara: tid kaid - nga" ayo , jhang loo bye: re" da" yhoem: moo led lo" pui" ri nga" cangzoo: yi yo" dage" zoo: wa ein: lo" tid ge' » › ga: tid kaid .
40026019	cangzoo: yi we' Aseing nyangnu" ri tid kaid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - koid: wigi led lo" da" myen" xoin: zoo: pui" ri nyheing to" boem bye .
40026020	Hau: nyid" myen" thang ; ju" loo lang" Yesu yo cangzoo: daxe: eig youg bang: yo" dage" zoo: wa shid' re zhoung: jo , boem .
40026021	Hau: uri Yesu gi « nanu' ri ngoo tid ba . Nanu" mo dayug gi sube" lo , moo ngoori ab pyam goo" wa nghoid » ga: tid .
40026022	cangzoo: yi gi nheigloem: gye" agyo: pyo: ziyo' - « Aseing we" - hau: su: gi ngoo nghoid la" . ngoo nghoid la" » ga: dayug bain dayug myid: nyid boem ago" da .
40026023	Yesu gi « ngoo yo' dage" zooyho' bian daloem: moo shoin" lab , zoo: su: gi ngoori ab pyam wa su: nghoid » ga: tid .
40026024	Jhoem: mungdang: moo nya: khyoo: ri tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - shid: wa zi nghoid . Nghoid loug we' Byu nya: Zoo: ri ab pyam su: shid' re" khayhi' gyoug . Yuggi he: yug ri akhu: kaid nghoid rigi nya: shid re" je gi wa zi nghoid , ga: tid .
40026025	Yesu ri ab pyam wa da" Yuda gi « Sara: we" - hau: ab pyam wa su: gi ngoo nghoid - anghoid la" » ga: myid: uri Aseing Yesu gi « nghoid nang nyang: nghoid bye: » ga: tid .
40026026	Yesu gi cangzoo: yi yo" dage" myen" xoin: zo: nyid da" uri zooyho' ri yu lho: jeju" ri bain coung" nghei lang" zooyho' ri phe , yu wigi « he: da" zooyho' gi nga" da" gung du: nghoid yu zoo: ge' » ga: tid lho: nya: cangzoo: yiri gam byid .
40026027	zabyidd" goem ri we' yu lho: jeju" bain coung" nghei lang" cangzoo: yi ri byid: lho: « nanu" dangain" mo , shug ge' .
40026028	He: da" zigi nga" suid" nghoid . He: da" suid" yo" Mangsoo dang: theing da" dazid thoug" too" bye . Byu myoo" sho' mo da" yooboo ri khyoid pyam byid: wa shid re" shoin: pyam da" nga" suid nghoid .
40026029	Nanu" ri ngoo tid nau da" zigi akhid" mo wigi nga" pho da" mungdain: moo nanu" yo" dage" zabyidd' aseig ri shau" shug da" bidnyid ju" sho' he: zabyidd" rigi ngoo shug loo: zi anghoid » ga: tid .

40026037	Petru yo" Zebedi nya zo: eig yug ri khe: shu" wigi Yesu gi nheigloem: amyen , akhoid wim loo yoomo nheig gye" koug nyid .

41005012	Yu joem gi Yesu ri ngoonu" vu , joem moo yhe: vang wa akhang" byid: kaid we' ga: mho' ago" . Yu joem gi nyhang" vu , joem jhang yhe lo" boem shang ga: sham go" nyid
41005013	Yesu gi nyangnu" ri loo" wa akhang" byid: kaid da: - akhyeng" da" yu joem gi hau: youg khyoug: mo thu' lo" wigi vu , joem moo yhe: bye . Houg: lang" eig khyeung" koo: bo da" vu , joem dangain" gi - dung" bung nhoid mo gyid thoem" khyoo: gei vang lo" boem wigi noeb se" shid: pyam .
41005014	Vu , zung" mo , gi tang" phang: lo" lho: hau: khyoo: ri voomoo" khoug: moo" we' khyam: yoo joem khyoo we lo" tid fu" kaid ago" . Houg: lang" mung" byu yi gi bue" lid loo bye: da" khyoo: ri yu" wa shid mo hau: joyoo kkyoo: thu' yhe: lo" boem ago" .
41005015	Nyang: nu" gi Yesu jang" moo ju" lang" yu phung myoo" sho' zhoug: da" byu gi byimi nyeung" za: void ci: lho: wigi nheg gyeing" gyeing: za: zhoung: jo , ziri yhe: myang boem yoomo nyangnu" gyoug nyid ago" .
41005016	Hau: khyo: ri shau" myang mo , gi zhoung su: yo' vu , joem moo khasu" bue" lid lo da" khyoo: ri meing byu yi ri tid kyo" ago" .

41005018	Yesu gi lhid khoug: khyo: vang lo" nyid uri shid phyang" yu joem zhung: su: ri Yesu jhang khyoo: nyang: we bo cang wa shid re: mho' nyid .
41005019	Nghoid loug we' Yesu nyang ri akhang abyid . loo: - re" yhoem: khyoo: doem lo" lho: yhoem: byu yi yo' bidnoem yi ri Aseing: gi nang ri khayhi' nheug khyeug wigi pang" thoug bye: khyoo: ri lo" tid kyoo we' ga: tid .
41005020	Houg: lang" nyang gi thu' lo" wigi Yesu nyang: ri khayhi' pang" thoug bye: da" khyoo: ri voo thoem daxi: voo jang sho' tid lo" . hau: dang: ri shau" gyoo: mo , dangain we' gyo: mau" ago" .
41005021	Thang: ri Yesu gi lhid mo wigi thoem" thei: tab khyoo: doem gu: dab lo" . Houg: lang" byu phung: moo" zeing nya: jang" moo re" zeung phoung nyid ago" . Yesu gi thoem" yam moo nyid nyid .

41006018	Herod giBaptisma byid: su: Yohan ri myheug lhug to" thoug ru wigi re" nhoung" da" yhoem: seing: myhi , ri lo xo yu wa zigi re" shid' re" ajoo , aeung nghoid da: - ga: vigi da tid poin" nyid .
41006019	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo herodia gi Yohan ri thoutheung anoug angei - said pyam noug nghoid loug we' nyang: gi Herod yoo mo khasu" ase' said pyam nghoid da .
41006020	Khasu" wim ga: ri Yohan gi deungmain" ziyo' gyeungshang: byu dayug nghoid ziri Herod se' lho: nyang: ri gyoug phau" ziyo' yu" goem byid: nyid . 41006021	Lo" thang moo Herodia gi Herod khokham" khu: lo da" bidnyid ju" lang" nyang: myid to" zi koid wa ayo , gi ri yo" yu abye: - Khasu wim ga: ri Herod gi nyang: khu: lo da" bidnyid ayo , moo Galile meing: mo vhu" she: nyid da" ludaid yi meing: zoug: yi yo' nya: gyi zoug: moo" yi ri khe: lho: zoo: pui" zeung doo" zho" nyid .

41006056	Houg: yoomo Yesu vang yhe: da" voo zeing voo zoo: mo mo , fu" moo" khyoo: yam cang noo phyoo" shau" mo , ri re" shu" lheung: yoin" to" wigi noo mo , we' nya: byi: sheing thang: moo khyalhang" shau" tain" nhang: wa shid' re" mho' nyid ago" . 41007001	Houg: lang" Pharishe" yo' Yerusalem mo re" lo da" tarha" sara yi dayham" gi Yesu jhang lheungkhoem: zeung: foem: lo xoem .
41007002	Nyangnu" gi nya: da" cangzoo: yi dayham" lo , acid" pyam loo: - asan da" lo . Wigi vhoem: zo: nyid ziri zang" myang ago" . Houg: yoo mo pharishe" gi hau: khyoo: byu mung" byu yi ri tid kyo" .
41007003	Khasu" wim ga: ri Pharishe" yo' Yuda byumyu" dangain" mo , gi goo" nham , mo da" phoug" phyid" thug" ri ri cang lho: loo , shi" acid" sain pyam lo: - zoo: noem azo: yu" boem nghoid da .
41007004	Hau: lho: kid" mo qei ci: lo da" zi dangain" ri we' cid" shi" acid" sain pyam zi nyangnu" azo: yu" boem nghoid da . Hau: tho' moo gootu: goem-oug" yo' gyid goem - yhoeb , joyoo: ri ced" san da' thung" ri myoo" sho' ja: ri we' nyang nung yo" yu ziyo' dakhyo" lhoung cang nyid boem zi nghoid .
41007005	Pharishe" yo' tarha" sara yi gi Yesu ri myid: zigi re" cangzoo: yi gi ciwim ngoo nu" phoug" phyed" thung" ri acang loo: - asan asen" da" lo , wigi lab , zo: nyid goo" lha" .
41007006	Yesu nyangnu" ri « nanu" da" khyoo: ri Lapi: Esaia tid to" zi gi khayhi' deung nyid lha" . Nyang: nu" nheigloem: gi gyeing" nyang ngoo yo' we gang jo .

41007010	Moshi gi re" myhi , re" phoo ri phau" myang: we' ga: tid to" - nya: myhi' nya: phoo ri nheing" dang: tid mo , hang" we' deung" deing nyang: ca" ga: amyeung" byid: to" .

41009018	Hau: yu vang zhung: khang" moo" - myid jang: moo baid lheung: kaid lho: nhoid mo nyoeb du: athei" thei" thu' wigi zei kyeug lho: gunggoin" goin" kyoung: thain: loo" loo" wim nyid . Hau: yu ri khaid , thu' byid: wa shid re" re" cangzoo: yi ri ngoo mho' nghoid loug we' nyangnu" ayo" khaid thu' byid: boem nghoid da: .
41009019	Yesu gi nyangnu" ri loem" jeung" myid , abo da" byumyu" we" - ngoonanu" yo' khamyhang ju" sho' nyid nyid wa lha" . Ngoo nanu" ri kha: myhang ju: sho' zeung: kham byid: wa lha" . - Hau: yuggi nu" ri nga" jhang shu" ri ge' ga: tid .
41009020	Nyangnu" gi hau: yug gi nu" ri Yesu jhang shu" lo ago" - hau: u ri Yesu ri myang lang" hau: yuggi nu" ri lang: thain: joeb loo" nhang: lho: myidjang: mooleung baid lo" ziyo' nhoid mo nyoeb du" athei" thei" leung lu: yen" .
41009021	Yesu gi nya: phoo ri-nyang: hidsu" bue" zi khamyhang nghoid bye: la" . - ga: myid . Nyang: gi zoo shang: yo , mo nyang: nghoid bye: ga: nyang: phoug tid .
41009022	Yu gi nyang: ri said pyam wa ga: myoo" sho' leung: - nyang: ri myi: moo gyid moo baid zei , kaid kaid wim nyid . Nang yo" bue" nghoid rigi nga" phoo tang: ri nheug khyeug ziyo' pang" thougyu we' .
41009023	Na nyang: nghoid bye: Yesu gi yo" bue" nghoid rigi loem" jeung" nheigloem: boo su: shid mo gi ja: khang" moo" yo" bue" zi nghoid ga: tid .
41009024	Houg: lang" nyang: hau: zoo shang: nya: phoo gi ngoo loem" jeung" - nga" loem" jeung" myid' atham: ngoori bo pang" thoug yu we' ga: ngau thu' lo .
41009025	Yesu gi mung" byu yi nya: jhang gei zeung: phoung lonyid ziri myang lang" hau: akhyeung" da" yu ri nhoid jed , nu jed da" yu we" - ngoo nang ri amyeung" byid: bye: - yuggi nu": jang" mo thu' loo , we' nyang: moo khanham we' adoem vang loo" loo: - ga: nheug yo: kaid .
41009026	Hau: akhyeung" da" yu gi yoid nyho: lho: hau: yuggi nu" ri lang: thain ; joeb loo: nhang: lho: nya: khyoug: mo thu' lo , - yuggi nu" we' shid: mang yhang: ti" daleung jo , lo: - byu myoo" sho' mo , gi nyang: shid: abye: ga: coem tid ago" .
41009027	Nghoid loug we Yesu gi-hau: yug gi nu" da" lo , moo zei: lho: she: to' kaid da: - houg: lang" hau: yuggi nu" gi to' yab re" .

41009029	Yesu gi nyangnu" ri akyu" mho' khyo" za: anghoid rigi gootu: ce" khyoo" we' he: ja" yu ri ayo" khaid thu' pyam - ga: tid kyo" .

41009031	Khasu" wim ga: ri Yesu gi nya: cangzoo: yi ri byu nya: zoo: gi sube" da" lo , moo ab byid: pyam zi shau" wigi nyangnu" gi nyang: ri said pyam boem wa nghoid . Nghoid loug we-said pyam thang: ri soem" nyid" ri doem dei to'' loo: wa ga" jhoug" byid: bye .

41013017	Hau: bidnyid gyoo: moo-zoonu" gung nghoid mo , yo" noug" nu" shu" mo , gi gye" gyougboem wa nghoid .

41013019	Khasu" wim ga: ri Mangsoo phain" to" da" moug myid jo , shid" jang" mo akhid" nyid" ju" sho' abue" yu" shi" ziyo' thang" phyang" kha" nham we' abue" yu" loo wa da" yaukhe" kyi" khyeug khyoo: gi hau: bidnyid gyoo: moo bue" thu loo wam bye .
41013020	Houg: yoomo ayo' bidnyid yi ri Aseung wigi ashoung" pyam byid: nghoid rigi hang" we' yo" dei nyid wa zi anghoid . Nghoid loug we' nyang: khen: yu too" mo , shid mo hau: bidnyid joem ri nyang shoung" pyam byid: wa .
41013021	Byu dayug yug gi nanu" ri yu" ge' hid: moo Meshia nyid yu" ge'-thei" thei moo Meshia nyid ga: tid nghoid loug we' aloem" goo" .

41015007	Hau: yo , ri goemlu to' jang" moo byu said lho: thung: khoug: moo myeug lhoung to" da" - goemlu gyiphung: mo _ Baraba ga: su byu dayug bo nyid .

41016020	Houg: lang" cangzoo: yi gi thu' yhe: lo" lho:-joyoo khyi , khang" moo" moo ngei bu: Ludang cang kho" kyo" lo" . 42001001	Myo , nhoo: bug thu' yoeb bang nghoid da" Thophilu we" - Nyhangnu" loem: khau loem" jeing" da" khyoo: moo" mo apoem: ayang: nghoid da" khyoo: joem ri lhid" too" mo , myoo" sho' bo nyid boem bye .

42001035	Mouglagyoo: gi « gyeungshang: Venyi: gi Re" tho' moo juri" wa . Myhang: thang da" Mangso yoem: vhoo" gi nang ri shoem" goem byid: wa . Houg: yoomo nang khu: loo wa yuggi zoo: ri myhang: thang da" Mangsoo nya: zoo: ga: myheing byid: boem wa .
42001036	Re" bidnoem myhi , nghoid da" Elisabed we' mang: loo" yid ri she - yuggi zoo: agyid asoo: ri gung lid: ci: da . Bougdung: myhi , daga: nyid su: gi gung lid: zi lham" moo" khyug khyab nghoid bye .

42005021	Tarha" sara: yi yo" - Pharishe bi gi He: yug gi hang" nghoid la" . Nyang: gi Mangsoo ri shoid da" dang: tid nyid bye . Mangsoo mo led lho: yooboo ri hang" yo" se' khyoid pyam byid: wa ga: myid yu" nyid boem .

42005023	Re" yooboo ri khyoid pyam byid: bye: ein: je tid lei la" . Houg: su" za: anghoid joyoo mo to' lho: so" loo" we' ein: tid wa je lei la" .
42005024	Nghoidloug we' byu da" nya: zoo: gi Mougmyid mo yooboo ri yo" khyoid pyam byid: ziri nanu" ri si nhang: ba ga: tid lho: gung joem: shid: su: ri nga" dang: tam" gyoo: we' too we' Re" da" dangzuang ri vu lho: yhoem: khyoo: loo" re' - ga: amyeing" byid: kaid .

42007020	Hau: eig yug gi Yesu jang" moo ju" yhe: lho: Aseing: gi ju" gyoo" loo wa ga: da" Aseing: nyang: nghoid bye la" . anghoid lang" ngoonu" gi-gootu: dayug ri lang" nyid shi" wa la" . hid: su" myid: yu" wa shid' re" Babtisma sara: Yohan myid: nhang: kaid ga: yhe: tid ago" .

42007022	Nyang: tid zigi Nanu" myang yu" khyoo: - shau" gyo: da" khyoo: dangain" Yohan ri lo" tid kyoo" ge' . Myo , amyang mo , gi myo , doem myang lo . Khyid: gyoug: mo , gi khyoo: doem yo" so" lo . 42007023	Ngoori aloem" shoid su: gi ngi lhoo wa" ga: wigi Yohan da" cangzoo: yi ri phed: kyo .
42007024	Yohan da" cangzoo: yi gi Aseing: jang" mo thu' loo" lang" Yesu gi Yohan da" khyoo: yo' sen: lho: byu phung: yi ri nanu" gi ce: noem ri yu" wa ein: wigi dain pyoid yoo khyoo: yhi: go" lha" . lid' hau lhei , nyid da" jam pheing" gam ri yu" wa shid' re" nghoid go" la" .
42007025	Houg: su" anghoid lang" gi byi yung" lhoo" yung" void ci: su: ri yu" wa ein: go" la" . Byi: gi mi gi void ci: mo , gi zoug: khokham" yhoem: moo danyid boem .
42007026	Ngoo ri tid kyoo" we' Lapi: ri yu" wa shid' re" nghoid go" la" . Nghoidbye nghoid loug we' Lapi: tho' moo je gyi: su: ri yu" wa shid' re" nghoid bye .
42007027	Jhoem: mougsoug" moo" tid zigi - Re" da" khyoo: ri nyheing wa shid' re" Nga" lagyoo: ri re" da" shid' moo nhang: kaid wa ga: Mangsoo tid to . Yohan gi hau: lagyoo: phoo nyang: nghoid bye .
42007028	Myiyi: mo khu: lo da" byu dangain" - Yohan tho' moo je gyi: zigi dayug we' aboo loo ein: ngoo nanu" ri tid . Nghoidloug we' Mangsoo Mangsoo mungdain: moo gye" nge thang su: gi Yohan tho' moo je gyi: ga: tid kyo .
42007029	Kheing" khyu: zoo: mo , yo" dage" byu phung: moo" yi gi Yesu da" mungdang: ri shaug" gyoo: lang" Mangso da" deingmain" khyoo: ri coung" nghei byid: boem ago" . Khasu" wim gari nyangnu" gi Yohan jang" mo Babtisma ri kham: yu mo , nghoid yoomo nghoid bye .
42007030	Nghoidloug we' Pharishe yo" tarha" sara: yi gi nyang: nya: da" shid' re" Mangsoo byid: to" da" soin nyheing adi ato' ri phyo pyam mo nghoid yoomo Yohan jang" mo babtisma ri akham: yu boem nghoid ago" .
42007031	Yesu gi He: pyaid mo , byu yi ri ce: noem dangtu' yo" tu , wa lha" . nyangnu" gi khate" mo , yo" du go" nyid boem lha" .
42007032	Nyangnu" gi kid" vang" khoug: moo zhoung: jo , lho: ngoonu" gi gye" pyoo: sho' moid baid myheing nghoid loug we' nanu" gi ato' ka , boem . Ngoonu" gi ngau kyoo" nghoid loug we'-nanu" gi abo ngoug - ga: wigi nyang: cang" nyang: yoid nyhoo: go" nyid da - zooshang: mi" yo" dadu nyid .
42007033	Khasu" wim gari Babtisma sara: Yohan gi zoo: noem ri we' azoo: - zabyid yhid ri we' ashug loo: re" ri nanu" gi he: yug gi yu vang su: nghoid ga: tid ago" .
42007034	Byu da" nya: zoo: gi zo: lho: shug lho: ri" lang" yen gi nanu" gi yu" ge' he: yug gi zo: lid shug lid su: nghoid ga: kheing" khyu: zo: mo , yo" - Phung: thu' mo , ri bidnoem noem su: nghoid ga: tid ago" .
42007035	Nghoidloug we' Mangso da" nyain: phajhi" ri kham: yu mo , dangain" gi hau: nyain phajhi" gi deingmain" da" khyoo: ri toin" shid nyid ga: tid .
42007036	Pharishe" dayug gi Yesu ri nyang: yo" dage" myen" xoin: zo: shang ga: re" lhoung . Yesu gi pharishe" yhoem: moo vang yhe: lho: zo: zhoung: jo .
42007037	Hau: da" voo moo yooboo shoid da" myiyi: dayug nyid . Nyang: gi pharishe yhoem: moo Aseing: myen" xoin: zo: nyid zi si' lang" nam , pyo: da" xu: byeung" bo da" juang: daloem: ri ci: re" lho:
42007038	Yesu da" nung thang khyid: yang: moo re" ngau nyid . Nya: da" ngoug byid gi Yesu da" khyid: moo gyo" nyid lang" nya: xam: wigi soid pyam byid . Hau: lho: hau: myiyi: gi Yesu da" khyid: moo boobug boug lho: nam , pyo: xu: joid byid: nyid .
42007039	Yesu ri khe: da" Pharishe phoo gi myiyi: houg: su" koid: ziri myang lang" He: yug gi Lapi: nghoid rigi lho: nya: khyid: moo zei: da" myiyi: gi hang" nghoid zi we' ce: noem yoobo shoid su: nghoid zi we' si' wam: bye ga: myid nyid .
42007040	Hau: uri Yesu gi hau yug ri « Simun we" - nang ri ngoo tid wa zi daja: bo » ga: tid . Simun gi « sara: we" tid we' » ga: tid .
42007041	Yesu tid zigi « ngei jhid" zo: su: dayug bo - ngei wim: shoo: kyab - dayug gi wim: xi: kyab jhen: dab .
42007042	Nya: eig yug gi jhen: ayo" xab loo: yoomo jhen: seing: gi hau: eig yug goin" da" jhen: ri khyoid pyam byid: bye . Hau: eig yug mo kha: yug gi jhen: seing: ri je jheddab wa lha" » ga: myid: .
42007043	Simun gi « ngei je myo: khyoid pyam byid: su gi je jheddab wa » ga: tid . Yesu gi « nang myid soin khyoo: gi jo » ga: tid .
42007044	Hau: thang: ri myiyi: myhi , shoid khyoo: lheing: lo" lho: Simun ri « Nang he: myiyi: ri myang yu" la" . ngoo gi re" da" yhoem: moo vang lo ri nang gi khyid: cid" gyid abyid . Nghoidloug we' nyang: gi nya: ngoug byid' yo' nga" khyid: cid" byid: lho: xam: yo' soid byid: bye .
42007045	Nang gi ngoori - boobug we' abug - he: myiyi: gi ngoo he: yhoem: moo vang lo u" mo nga" khyid: moo beung abyid . Boobug boug nyid .
42007046	Nang gi nga" vhuloem moo vhu" xu: ajoid byid . Nyang: gi nga" khyid: moo nam , pyo: xu: joid byid: bye . Houg: yoomo nang ri ngoo tid zigi he: myiyi: gi yooboo myoo" sho' mo loid loo" bye .
42007047	Houg: su" yooboo mo loid lo" zigi Nya: da" gyi: thang jheddab nheigloem: gi sagse: kham: nyid . Yooboo dajhi' za: te: loid loo" su: gi dajhi' date: se' jheddab » ga: tid .
42007048	Hau: thang: ri Yesu gi myiyi: ri « Re" yooboo khyoid pyam byid: bye » ga: tid .
42007049	Yesu yo" dage" myen" xoin: zo: nyid mo , gi « Yooboo ri lang" yo" khyoid pyam byid: da" he: yug gi hang" nghoid lha" » ga: nyang: cang" nyang: myid go" nyid boem .
42007050	Nghoidloug we' Yesu gi hau: myiyi: ri « Re" da" loem" jeing" khyoo: gi nang ri khyoid yu bye . Nheugloem: pyoo" pyoo: za: daloo" re' » ga: tid kaid .
42008001	Ayo , dajhi' myang" lo" da" uri Yesu gi voo gung myoo" sho' lid lo" zoore" - Mangsoo mungdain' lu dang: gi ri kho" kyo" lho .
42008002	Lagyoo: daxe: eig youg bang: gi nyang: yo" dage" bo cang yhe: lo . Noo gyi - yu join: gyi mo khyoid yu da" myiyi: yi dayham" we' bo cang lo" boem . Houg: bang: mo yu nyhed du: phang: thu' lo" da" Magadala ga: da" Mari we' bo lo .
42008003	Herod khokham" da" yhoem: vhoeb khang" da" zoug: moo" - Kutha da" yhoem: seing: myhi' - Yohana - Susanna yo" myiyi: gootu: myoo" sho' mo , gi nyang: nya: joyoo jang: moo Aseing Yesu yo' nya: cangzoo: yi ri ca" moo ca" bo pang" thoug ago" .
42008004	Voo zoo: voo zeing mo lo da" byu dangain" mo , gi Yesu jang" moo zeing: foem: to" da" uri Yesu dangtu' khyo" tid kyo" zigi
42008005	Amyoug sain" su: gi amyoug sain" wa ga: thu' lo . Sain" kaid uri myoug shi" dayham" gi khyoo: gung moo gyoo" lo" - hau: da" myoug shi" rigi byu yi nang: led nyid lho: ngho' joem we koid: zo: pyam .
42008006	Myoug shi" dayham" gi Lug phoug tho' moo gyoo" lo . Agam yug re" lho: gyid aboo yoomo nyhau" kyoug shid: pyam .
42008007	Myoug shi" dayham" gi Zu: kyen byab moo gyoo" lo . Zu: gam joem gi myoug gam nu" joem ri foeb said pyam .
42008008	Myoug shi" dayham" gi myidjang: gi moo gyoo" lo" wigi agam youg gyi: lo lho: dashoo: zhang ashi" myoo lo ga: wigi tid kyo . Hau: thang: ri Yesu gi nukhyab dab mo gi gyo: yu ge" ga: tid .
42008009	Nya: cangzoo: yi gi he: dangtu' mo da" dangkang: - Yesu ri doem myid: ago" .
42008010	Nyang: doem tid zigi Nanu" gi Mangsoo vhoeb khang" da" khyoo: mo no , thang da" khyoo: joem ri se' abye: go" - gootu: bang: gi yu" nyid lho: amyang - shau" gyo: lho: ase' gyoo: yoomo dangtu' khyo" kho" kyoo" ca" nyid .
42008011	He: dangtu' mo , dangkang: gi hid: su" nghoid . Myoug shi" gi Mangso da" mungdang: nghoid .
42008012	Khyoo: gung moo gyo" da" myoug shi" gi Mungdang: shaug" gyoo: mo , ri tid nau zi nghoid nghoid loug we' yu satan gi houg: bang: khyoid yu zi shau" wa avhoo: yoomo nyangnu" da" nheigloem: khoug: mo mungdang: ri re" yu pyam byid .
42008013	Lug phoug tho' moo gyoo" lo" da" myoug shi" gi Mungdang: ri shau" gyo: da: uri gau yi ziyo' kham: yu mo , ri tid nau . 42008014	Zu: kyen: byab moo gyoo" lo" da" myoug shi" gi Mungdang: ri shau" gyo: lho: myid myoo: ungloug da" khyoo: - yoo" zoo: yoo" shug da" khyoo: - gung shoo" nyam khyo: ze wigi nghoeb foeb pyam yoomo mo , da" ashi" ayo" zei: - mo , ri tid nau zi nghoid .
42008015	Jen" bo da" myidjang: gi moo gyoo" lo" da" amyoug koem gi Mungdang: ri shaug" gyoo: lang" tam" gyoo: nau da" nheigloem: yo" - geing: geing: teing teing kham: yu loem" jeing" wigi Ashi" zei: loo sho' koid: da" byu yi ri tid nau da" zi nghoid .
42008016	Myikug ri tab lho: wigi Lain" ceing: zhoung" lhoung: - anghoid lang" yhoeb , cuang gyid" moo kaid to" zigi hang" we' akoid: yu . Yab moo vang loo mo , myo , myang wa shid' re" myikug ke" jang: moo za: dete: lhoung ke" to" boem .
42008017	Yhoem" to" da" zi dangain" gi thu' myhang loo wa . Nghoeb to" khyoo: dangain" gi diricen: shau" myang boem wa .
42008018	Nghoid loug we' houg: yoomo Nanu" ceja: khasu" shau" gyo: ci: zigi zed" nyid ge' . Khasu" wim gari Yoo" su: ri poug lung: byid: wa . Ayoo" su: jang" mo gi nyang: yo" ga: myid ci: zi dangain" ri lang" nya jhang my yu pyam byid: wa" ga: tid .
42008019	Yesu da" nya: myhi' yo' nya: no , gi nyang: jang" moo ri" nghoid loug we' Byu phung: yi myo: nyid yoomo nyang: yo" ayo" shau" go" boem .

42008022	Danyid" ri Yesu yo' nya: cangzoo: yi gi gyid thoem" thei: tab khyoo gu: loo" shang ga: sham: go" wigi cangzoo: yi yo" lhid' mo gu: go" lo" boem bye .
42008023	Houg: su" gu: go" lo" ri Yesu gi yhoeb' pyo: jo , hau: uri nyeigdain tung" Uglid moo" hau , lo wigi lhid' moo gyid byeung" loo yoomo cangzoo: yi gi gyid moo noeb lo" nyid boem - ziyo' gye" gyoug dain mau" nyid boem bye .
42008024	Nyangnu" gi Yesu ri nhau" lho: Aseing: we" - Aseing: we" - ngoonu" shid: boem wam: bye myang ga: tid boem . Yesu gi to' re" lho: lid yo' being: mhoid ri amyeing" khyo' toem pyam houg: lang" uglid' yo' being: mhoid gi sam: zoo: tam" loo" bye .
42008025	Houg: lang" nyang: gi Nanu" loem" jeing" nheigloem: gi khare" - ga: cangzoo: yi ri myed . 42008026	Yesu yo' nya: cangzoo: yi gi Gerase mung" khyoo: gu: lo" ago" . Gerase gi Galile mung" gyid thoem" thei: tab moo jo , da" voogung nghoid .
42008027	Yesu gi gyid yam moo do , lo" ri voo moo" mo , Yu joem vang ci: da" voo byu dayug gi nyang: jhang re" shau . Hau: yug moo yu joem vang ci: zigi gye" myang" bye . Nyang: gi byimi avoid - yhoem: moo we' anyid nghoid loug we' Loeb boug mo lug ug khoug: moo za: cang nyid yen .
42008028	Yesu ri myang lang" nyang: gi yoid nyho: ngau lho: nya: shid' khoin" moo nyang: goeb pai wigi myhang: thang da" Mangso nya: zoo: Yesu we" - Nang gi ngoori ci: koid: nau lha" . ngoori ashen" ayhen shi" lhe" - ga: yo" nyho: yoid kaid .
42008029	Houg: su" tid da" khyoo: gi Yesu gi yu joem ri hau: youg da" gung mo thu' loo" wa da" shid' re" amyeing" khyo kaid yoomo nghoid . Yu joem gi hau: yug moo myoo" sho' lheing vang yu" bye . 42008030	Yesu gi Hau: da" yu ri re" myeing ce: myeing nghoid ga: myid . Nya: myeing gi legio nghoid ga: tid . Houg: su" tid da" khyoo: gi hau: yug moo yu joem myoo" sho' vang nyid yoomo tid zi nghoid .
42008031	Yu joem gi nyangnu" ri no , thang da" duang: khoug: moo akoin" khyo kaid ga: toung" pain: ago" .

42008033	Yu joem gi hau: byu jang" mo thu' lo" lho: Vu , joem jang" moo vang lo . Houg: lang" vu , joem moo" dangain" gi dung" bung tho' mo wigi dalheing: dam gyid thoem" moo byam vang lho: noeb shid: pyam boem .
42008034	Hid: su" bue" da" khyoo: ri vu , zung" mo , myang lang" phang: lo" boem . Nyangnu" gi voo moo" yo" soo" yo voo gung khyi khang" moo" moo he: da" ludang ri fu" lo" boem .
42008035	Byu phung yi gi houg: su" bue" lo da" khyoo: ri yu" wa ga: zeing: re" lo boem ago" . Yesu jang" moo ju" boem lang" gi yu joem phang: thu' loo" su: gi Yesu da" khyid: yang moo goo" nham yo' dakhyoo" ti" - byu gi doem bue" lho: zhoung: jo , ziri zheing: myang lang" yu" gyoug nyid boem .

42008040	Nung" thei: tab' khyoo: Yesu doem tau" lo da" uri Byu phung: moo" gi nyang: ri lhoem tau yu boem - khasu wim gari nyangnu" gi nyang ri lang" nyid boem yoo mo nghoid .
42008041	Hau: da" uri Ya - i - ru ga: su: gi ju" re" wigi nyang: gi Tarha" jung moo vhoeb da" zoug: phoo nghoid . Yesu da" khyid: yang: moo re" goeb pai lho: nya: yhoem: moo ri" wa shid' re" nyang: ri mho' tid .
42008042	Khasu" wim gari daxe: eig zain ju" bye: da" nya: zooti" myiyi: zoo: gi no shid: lo" nyid yoomo nghoid . Yesu gi nyang: yo" dage" cang lo" da" uri Byu myoo" sho' mo , we' nya: da" ayam , aqei: moo bo jhen" jhab' lo boem .

42008045	Aseing Yesu gi ngoori zang" su: gi hang" nghoid ga: myid . Nyangnu" hang" we' azang" tain" ga: hi: go" nyid da" uri Peteru gi Aseing: we' byu phung: moo" gi nang ri nyhen" pu , go" nyid .

42008047	Yoang moo hau: da" myiyi: myhi , gi nyang: koid: da" moo" po: thu' lo zi si' yoomo gyoug nain" ziyo' - shid' khyoo: re" lho: Yesu khyid: goeb pid . 42008051	Nyang: gi hau: yhoem: moo ju" lang" Peteru - Yaku - Yohan yo' myiyi: zo: da" nya: yhed nya: ba" mo , led lho: gootu: hang" ri we' haug ri we' nyang: yo' dage" avang loo" nhang .
42008052	Myiyi: zoo: shid: yoomo byu yug khang" moo" gi nyho: ngoug go" nyid Yesu gi angoug goo" - he: zooshang: gi shid: zi anghoid . Nyang: yhoeb' jo , zi za: danghoid ga: tid .
