42008056	Nya: myhi' phoo gi gye" mau" nyid ago" . Nghoidloug we' Yesu gi He: bue" lo khyoo: hang" ri we' atid kyoo" goo" ga: zung" nhang: kaid . s
42009001	Yesu gi cangzoo: yi daxe: eig yug bang: ri khe: zheung" yu lho: yu joem ri yo" khaid thu' pyam' wa da" yoem: so' yo' noo phyoo" joem ri yo" ge , loo" nhang: wa da" yoem: so' yo' amyeing" a: na: ri byid .
42009002	Hau: thang: ri nyang: gi nyangnu" ri tid zigi Mangso mungdain da" akhyoo" ri yhe: kho" kyoo" wa ziyo' noo phyoo" shau" mo , ri yhe: gi , byid: wa shid re" nhang: kaid' boem bye .
42009003	Yesu nyangnu" ri tid zigi nanu" gi hau: gyung" khyoo: mo shid re" ci" we' avoin , goo" - lham: dung: we' aci: goo" - thung: ngui" moo zoo: noem ngei sheing: we' akaid' voin , goo" - byimi we' ajhain" avoin goo .
42009004	Nanu" ri being" lhoem: tau yu da" kha: yhoem: moo nghoid loug we' nanu" gi hau: voogung mo doem thu' lo' da" ayo , ju" sho' - hau: yhoem: moo za: danyid nyid ge' .
42009005	Nanu" ri being" alheom: tau yu boem nghoid rigi hau: voogung mo doem thu' lo' wigi nanu" da" khyid: voo: mo phei" lhoug: ri ko" khyo , too" khoo , lho: nyangnu" ri sadi byid: khoo ge' .
42009006	Houg: lang" cangzoo: yi gi thu' yhe: lo" lho: voogung dangain" jang" moo joeb , sho' so" yen" boem wigi ludang: gi , ri cang kho" kyo" ziyo'-khyi , khang" moo" mo mo , ri noo phyoo" ge , loo" nhang: yen: ago" .
42009007	Galile mung" zoug: phoo Herod gi houg: su" bue" nyid da" khyoo: dangain" ziri shaug" gyoo: lang" - nyang: gi myid' gye" myo: loo bye . Khasu" wim ga: ri byu phung: yi dayham" gi Babtisma byid: da" Yohan doem dei loo bye" - ga: tid nyid ago" .
42009008	Hau: lho: gootu: dayham" bang: gi Elia po" thu' loo bye" - ga: dayham" gi goo" nham , mo lapi: yi dayug yug doem dei lo zi nghoid - ga: tid go" nyid boem .
42009009	Houg: lang" Herod gi Yohan vhuloem ri ngoo phyed" pyam' byid: bye: zi nghoid - ngoo ludang: shau" gyo: nyid da" he: yug gi hang" nghoid wa lha: ga: tid wigi nyang: gi Yesu ri shau" myang wa shid re" yoem: gye" kaid' nyid .
42009010	Lagyoo: yi gi doem tau" lo wigi nyangnu" zei: da" moozoo" dangain" Yesu ri tid kyo" zigi . Houg: lang" Yesu gi nyangnu" ri shu" lho: Bedsaida ga: da" voogung khyoo: yhe: lo" boem .
42009011	Byu phung joem hau: khyoo: ri zheung: shau" gyo: lang" Nyang: nu" gi Yesu da" thang: zheung: cang yhe: lo" ago" . Nyang: gi nyangnu" ri lheom: tau: yu lho: Mangso mungdain khyoo: tid kyo" ziyo' noo phyoo" bo mo , ri ge , loo" nhang .
42009012	Bid' vang lo" nyid lang" cangzoo: yi daxe: eig yug gi nya: jang" moo re" lo wigi byu phung: yi ri voogung khyoo: - yoozang joem khyoo: lo" wigi yhoeb , joyoo sho: wa ziyo' zoo: noem , lo" sho: boem , wa shid re" nhang: kaid' we' Khasu" wim gari he: joyoo gi byu hang" we' a nyid jo yoo nghoid - ga: tid ago" .
42009013	Nghoid loug we' Yesu gi nanu" nyang: nyangnu" ri zoo: noem daja: ja: byid: zhoo" ge' . ga: nyangnu" ritid . Nyang: nu" doem , phoug tid zigi ngoonu" yo" zoo: noem gi zooyho' wim: loem: yo' ngoo: eig du: za: date: nghoid . Nang gi ngoonu" ri he: byu phung: yi dangain" mo , shid re" zoo: noem , yhe: qei , nhang: nau , la" » ga: myid: boem .
42009014	( Houg: moo nyid mo , giyug gi , yi za: wim: khyeing" koo: bo da ) Yesu nya: cangzoo: yi ri « daphung moo wim xi: yug koo: koo: koid lho: wigi aphung: phung: zhoung: jo , nhang: ge" » ga: tid .
42009015	Cong: zoo: yi gi hougsu" bain koid thang: ri
42009016	Yesu gi hau: zooyho' wim loem: yo' ngoo: eig du: ri yu lho: moug: khung: khyoo: nghang yu" wigi Mangsoo jeju" bain' coung" byid: lang" zooyho' yo' ngoo: ri phe , yu lho: byu phung: yi ri gam , byid: boem wa shid re-cangzoo: yi ri byid: kaid' .
42009017	Nyang: nu" dangain" mo , gyi" sho' shug" zo: boem bye . Cangzoo: yi gi zo: teing da" ajab amoin" daxe: eig gyoin , byeung" sho' doem cang koid: zheung" yu ashi" go .
42009018	Danyid" ri Yesu gi nyang: kyeing" za: akyu" mho' nyid uri cangzoo: yi gi nya: jang" moo re" ago Yesu nyangnu" ri « byu phung: yi gi ngoori hang" nghoid ga: tid go" nyid boem ago » ga: lheom: myid .
42009019	Nyang: nu" phoug tu" boem zigi dayham" gi nang ri Babtisma byid: su: Yohan nghoid ga: nyangnu" phoug tid nyid ago - dayham" gi goonham , mo , lapi: dayug yug doem dei lo zi nghoid ga: tid nyid ago - ga: tid nyid boem .
42009020	Houg: lang" Yesu gi nyangnu" ri nanu" gi ngoori hang" nghoid ein: myid' nyid go" ga: myid: Peteru phoug tu" zigi nang gi nang Elia nghoid ga:-Mangso Meshia nghoid ga: tid .
42009021	Houg: lang" Yesu gi he: khyoo: hang" ri we' atid kyoo" wa shid mo jhug za: amyeidng" byid: bye .
42009022	Nyang yang: nu" ri i - byu da" nya: zoo: gi kyi" khyeug khyoo: myo" sho' shau" zoo: wa zi nghoid . Yuda Ludaid vhu" jhung: yi Khai jung zeing yi yo' tarha" sara: yi wigi ngeug pyam' zi shau" lho: said' pyam' goo" wa zi nghoid - nghoid loug we' soem" nyid" thang: ri doem dei to' loo wa zi nghoid - ga: tid kyo .
42009023	Houg: su" wi , nyang: gi-nyangnu" dangain" mo , ri nga" thang: moo cang noug su: hang" nghoid loug we' nyang: nya: gung ri ngeug pyam ca: . Hau: lho: nya: pyang" zeing ri nyid" khang" moo' vu , ci: lho: nga" thang: moo cang ca .
42009024	Khasu" wim ga: ri nyang: nya: da" kangso' ri khyoid yu noug su: gi hang" nghoid loug we' kang: so' soem" loo" wa nghoid loug we' ngoo yoomo kangso' soem" loo" su: koem' gi khyoid yu zi shau" wa nghoid .
42009025	Byu dayug gi he: mougmyid goin" ziri yo" seung: ci: nghoid loug we' Nyang: nya: da" kangso' soem" lo" rigi ce: noem , akyu" se' boo wa lha" . ce" akyu" we' aboo nghoid da .
42009026	Houg: lang" ngoo yo' nga" da" mungdang: ri sho' su: rigi byu nya: zoo: gi Nya: phung" yoeb , yo' nya: pho , da" phung" yoeb , bang yo' gyeungshang: moug: lagyoo: yi da" phung" yoeb , bang yo' ju" ri" lang" byu nya: zoo: we' nyang: ri sho' pyam' wa zi nghoid .
42009027	Nanu" ri ngoo deing" deing tid ba - he: khyi , moo nyid mo , mo dayham" Mangso mungdain ri amyang myang gi ashid: shigoo" wa .
42009028	Houg: bang: ri bain tid thang: ri labain daloem: kyoo: lang" Yesu gi Peteru - Yohan Yaku ri shu" lho: wigi akyu" mho' wa shid re" boug gung daloem: khyoo: do , yhe: lo" ago" .
42009029	Nyang: akyu" mho' nyid uri nya: myo nhoo: gi thed' loo khare" wigi nya: byimi joem gi yeing: yeing: lo , - moin: moin: phyu loo" khare" .
42009030	Hau: jang" mo nyeigdain tung" byu eig yug gi Yesu yo' dang: tid go" nyid . hau: eig yug gi Moshe yo' Elia nghoid ago" .
42009031	Nya: eig yug gi moug: khung: phung" yoeb , yo' thu jhu , lo wigi Yesu gi atoung" myang" ri Yerusalem voomoo" moo shid: kham: khyo" wigi Mangsoo myid' vho: khyoo: ri joeb , byeung" loo" nhang: wa ziyo' sen: lho: wigi Yesu yo' zheung: doem , go" nyid go" .
42009032	Peteru yo' nya: byen cang" yi gi yhoeb pyo: nyid ago nghoid loug we' nyangnu" bom: so" re" boem , rigi Yesu phung" bang yo' nyang: yo' yab , jo , da" byu eig yug ri myang ago" .
42009033	Hau: eig yug gi Yesu jang" mo phang: lo" nyid uri Peteru gi Yesu ri Aseing: we" ngoonu" he: khyi , moo nyid ge da - Re" shid' mo zoem" daloem: - Moshe shid mo zoem" daloem - Elia mo zoem" daloem: zoem" soem" loem: koid wa" - ga: tid kaid' da . ( Nyang: ci: tid shid' kaid' zi ri nyang: gyeing nyang: asi )
42009034	Nyang dang: da tid nyid shi" uri joem" moug" dathei" thu' lo wigi nyangnu" ri lo shoem" nghoeb , pyam - houg: lang" nyangnu" gi gyoug dain" nyid boem ago" .
42009035	Jhoem: thei" khoug: mo thui: daleom: gi He: yug gi nga" rizoo: nghoid - Nyang: ngoo khyen: to" zi nghoid - nya: jhoug" myeing" ri tam" gyoo: ge' ga: da" thui: daloem: myeung thu lo .
42009036	Hau: da" dang: thang: sau: loo" lang" houg: moo gi Yesu za: danyid lo . Cangzoo: yi gi nyangnu" shau" myang da" khyoo: dangain" hau: ayo , gyoo: moo hang" ri we' atid kyoo" loo - sam" zoo: danyid nyid ago" .
42009037	Thang: nyid" ri Yesu yo' cangzoo: yi soem" yug gi-boug gung tho' mo doem tau" gyoo" lo ago , byu phung: phung" moo" gi Yesu ri re" tau: yu boem ago" .
42009038	Byu dayug gi mo , phung: gung mo nyho: thu' lo wigi" - sara: we" nga" zooti" zoo: ri yu" byid: wa shid re" ngoo nang ri mho' ga: tid .
42009039	Hau: yu gi nyang: ri vang joung" ci: wigi nyed dain' tung" nyho: lho: lang" thoung: joeb , leung: lo" wigi nhoid mo nyoeb , du" athei" thei" thu' nyid da - gye" noo sho' ayoug: akhi" lho: lhoung phang: thu' lo" da .
42009040	Hau: yu ri kaid , thu' pyam byid: wa shid re" ngoo gi re" da" cangzoo: yi ri mho' nghoid loug we' nyangnu" gi ayo" khaid thu byid: nghoid ago" .
42009041	Yesu gi « loem" jeung" e" myed abo ziyo' shoid vhang: da" byu yi we" - ngoo gi nanu" yo' khamyang ju" sho' nyid wa lha" » ga: tid . Hau: thang: ri Yesu gi « re" zoo: ri hid: khyoo: shu" ri we' ga: tid .
42009042	Hau: yug gi nu" ju" re" lo da" uri yu gi nyang: ri myidjang: moo theung lheung: kaid' lho: lang: thain: nain" nyid nhang: Yesu gi akhyeung" da" yu ri amyeing" byid: kaid' lho yug gi nu" ri ge , loo nhang . houg: lang" nya: phoo ri doem ab byid: kaid .
42009043	Meing: byu phung: yi dangain" mo , gi Mangsoo da" phung" Yoeb , ri mau" hang" to" boem ago" .
42009044	Yesu gi nya: cangzoo: yi ri byu nya: zoo: gi sube" lo , khoug: moo ab , byid: pyam' shau" wa nghoid - he: dang: ri nanu" ato" myhid loo: xoem" too" ge' ga: tid .
42009045	Nghoid loug we' cangzoo: yi gi he: dang: gi ce: noem , ri tid nyid da" khyoo: ri ase' gyoo: shi" nghoid ago" . Hau: dang: ri nyangnu" ase' gyoo: goo" baja" ga: zau" too" byid: da Cangzoo: yi gi hau: khyoo: yo' sen: lho: nyang: ri avoem" myid: nghoid ago" .
42009046	Cang: zoo: yi gi nyangnu" mo , gyi: thang yug gihang" nghoid wa lha" . - ga: coem , tid ngeig go" thu' lo beom .
42009047	Yesu gi nyangnu" da" ung: khoug: moo ce: noem , bo nyid zigi si' byid: nyid yoomo nyang: gi zooshang: dayug ri khe: yu lho: nya: nam moo yab , jo , nhang: wigi
42009048	Nyang: nu" ri tid zigi nga" myeing mo , he: zooshang: yi ri kham: yu mo , hang" nghoid loug we' ngoori ri nhang: kaid' yug ri kham: yu su: nghoid bye khasu" wim gari nanu" mo nge thangsu: gi gyi: thang su: nghoid bye" - ga" tid .
42009049	Houg: lang"Yohan gi Aseing: we" re" da" myeing khyo" wigi yu joem ri khaid thu pyam' nyid da" byu dayug ri ngoonu" shau" myang boem bye - nghoid loug we' nyang: gi ngoonu" da" phung: mo byu anghoid yoomo wigi ngoonu" nyang: ri toem , pyam pye: - ga: tid .
42009050	Nyang: y' gootu: cangzoo: yi ri Yesu tid zigi nyang: ri atoem goo" ciwim gari nanu" ri athoug theing su hang" we' nanu" shoid mo su: nghoid .
42009051	Yesu moug: khung: khyoo: do , loo" wa da" ayo , jhangloo lang" nyang: gi myid kho: ci: lho: Yerusalem voomoo" khyoo: yhe: lo" nyid .
42009052	Nyang: gi nya: shid' vhu" khyoo: lagyoo: yi ri nhang: kaid lho: nyang: nu: gi Yesu shid' mo ca" khyoo: nyheung soin' byid: wa shid re" Samari voogung daloem: khyoo: vang yhe: lo" ago" .
42009053	Nghoid loug we' Yesu gi-Yerusalem voomoo" khyoo: dayhe: lo" nyid ziri se' boem yoomo voogung bang: gi nyang: ri akham: yu nghoid ago" .
42009054	Cangzoo: Yaku yo' Yohan tang: gi he: khyoo: rimyang lang" nyang: tang: gi Aseing: we" nyangnu" ri nghe , said' pyam wa shid re" nga" eigyug gimoug: khung: mo myi: ri khe: khyo , yu wa: nang aveing" la ? - ga: tid ago" .
42009055	Yesu gi lheung: lo lho-nyang: tang: ri gyikoid da .
42009056	Hau: thang: ri Yesu yo' nya: cangzoo: yigi goo" voo , khyoo: thu' so" lo" ago" .
42009057	Nyangnu" gi khyoolaid' moo so" lo" nyid boem uri byu dayug gi nang khakhyoo: yhi: khakhyoo: ngoo we' bo cang wa » ga: Yesu ri tid .
42009058	Yesu nyang: ri « zeig ni , joem gi khyung: yo" ago" - ngo , zoo: joem we' soid jo , ago" - nghoid loug we" byu nya: zoo: koem' gi vhu" shid" khoug: jang: khyalhang" we' ayoo" » ga: tid .
42009059	Nyang: gootu: dayug ri doem tid zigi « nga" thang: moocang we' » ga: tid . Nghoid loug we' hau: yug gi « sara we" nga pho , mang shi" lo" shung: khoo' wa akhang" byid: we' » ga: tid .
42009060	Yesu gi « byushid: yi gi nyangnu" da" byushid: nyang: cang" myhoeb , shung: goo" baja" - nang gi MangSo mungdain khyoo: riyhe: kho" kyoo" byid: we' » ga: tid .
42009061	Gootu: dayug gi « sara we" ngoo we' re" thang: cang wa Nghoid loug we' nga" yhoem: byu yiri shi" lo" vhu" too" khoo , wa akhang" byid: we' » ga: tid .
42009062	Yesu nyang: ri tid zigi « Khoin , zhug moozei: ci: lho: thang: khyoo: lheung: yu" su: hang" nghoid loug we' MangSo mungdain shid re" ce" akyu" we' boo zi anghoid » ga: tid .
42010001	Hau: thang: ri Aseing: gi cangzoo: nyhedxe: eig yug ri khyen: thu' yu lho: eig yug dazoem" zoem" - Aseing: nyang: yhi: wa da" voogung - khyi khang" moo" khyoo: - yhe: loo" lang" wa shid' re" nhang: kaid .
42010002	Nyang: tid zigi yham" yu wa da" gug myoo" sho' myheing jo , bye: - nghoid loug we' gug yham" dei zoo: gi atham: - houg: yoomo gug yham" dei zoo: myoo" sho' nhang: kaid wa shid' re" gug seing: ri akyu" mho' nyid ge' .
42010003	Yhi: ge' voemkhuid" phung: moo yangnu" ri yhangti" - ngoo nanu" ri nhang: kaid .
42010004	Nanu" gi ngei thung: nghui" - khyidbaid - ri aci: goo" - khyoo: moo yab lho: hang" yo" we' adoem goo" goo .
42010005	Nanu" kha: yhoem: moo vang loo" nghoid loug we' he: yhoem: moo myenjham" goo" baja" o" - ein: wigi xang: shid" ri mainkaid dang: tid ge' .
42010006	Hau: yhoem: moo myenjham" khyoo: ri vhoo: su: nyid nghoid rigi nanu" tid byid: da" mainkaid jeju" ri hau: yug shau" kham: zoo wa nghoid . Houg: te" byu da yug we' anyid: nghoid rigi nanu" tid byid: da" mainkaid jeju" gi nanu" nya: jang" moo doem tau" loo wa .
42010007	Nanu" gi hau: yhoem: moo nyid lho: yhoem: seing: mi" doo" zho" gu: ri zo: shug ge' . Khasu" wim ga: ri dei zoo: gi nya: vhu" kung: phoug" kham: zo: moin: yoomo nghoid . Yhoem: dayhoem: mo gootu: dayhoem: khyoo: athoid yhi: goo .
42010008	Nanu" ri lhoem: kham: yu da" voo bang: byid: zho" gu: - dangain" zoo: ge' .
42010009	Hau: voo moo noo phyoo" shau" nyid mo , ri ze: gi byid: ge' . Hau: thang: ri nyangnu" jang" moo Mangso da" mungdain: ju wa zi jhang bye: da" khyoo: ri tid kyoo" ge' .
42010010	Nanu" ri alhoem: kham: yu da" voo moo khyoo: gung moo yhe: lho: hid: su" tid ge'
42010011	Ngoonu" khyid: moo dab da" Nanu" voogung mo phei" lhoug: ri ngoonu" ko: khyoo bye: ein: tid ge' . Nghoidloug we' Mangso da" mungdain: gi nanu" nam moo jhang lo nyid bye: da" khyoo: ri myid boin: ge' .
42010012	Ngoo deing" deing tid nau zigi tarha" dang: kho" da" bidnyid moo Sodom voo tho' re - hau: voo je noo: wa ga: tid .
42010013	O" - Kurazin voo we" - nang joem: loo" wa . O" - Bedsaida voo we" - nang we' joem: loo" wa . Re" eig youg jang" moo toin" shid da" mau" pho" alhoo: again ri Turhu yo" Sidun voo ri toin" shid' nghoid yoo: gi hau: eig yug gi goonham mo jidmoo" mi gang" ci: lho: wigi myiyab cang" moo zhoung: jo , lho: nya: yooboo mo nheigloem: thid' lheung: loo goo" wam: bye .
42010014	Turhu yo"Sidun: gi-tarha" dang: kho: da bidnyid moo-nanu" da tho' moogi-khyam" sa yoo" shi" wa zi nghoid .
42010015	O" - Kaperna-um voo we" - nang gi moug: gung moo ju" sho' tu: to ziri vho: nyid la" . Ngarai mung" khyoo: nang ri du" khyo pyam zi shau" wa nghoid ga: tid .
42010016	Yesu nya cangzoo: yi ri tid zigi nanu" da" dang: ri tam" gyoo: mo gi nga" dang: ri we' tam" gyo: zi nghoid bye . Nanu" ri keing" pyam mo gi ngoori keing" pyam zi nghoid . Ngoori keung" pyam zigi ngo ri nhang: kaid su: ri keing" pyam zi we' nghoid bye .
42010017	Cangzoo: nyhed xe: eig youg bang: gi gye" gau yi ziyo' doem zheing: ju" lo boem lho: Aseing: we" - ngoonu" gi Aseing: da" myeing ri lang: lho: amyeung" byid: lang" yu joem lang" ngoonu" dang: ri tam" gyo: boem ago" ga: lo tid kyo" boem .
42010018	Yesu phoug tu" zigi-Moug khung: mo - satan gi lhab , myeig yhang: ti" byed gyoo" lo" zi ngoo myang .
42010019	Tam" gyoo: ge' - lhang: myu yo' gunggau" tho' moo yo" nang: led lo" lho: gyivo: da" yoem: so' dangain" ri yo" ung: pyam' wa da" amyeing" - Ana: ri ngoo nanu" ri byid: too" bye . Ceja: gyi we' nanu" ri ayo" ung: wa .
42010020	Nghoidloug we' nanu" moo yu join: joem ri yo" khaid thu' pyam yoomo agoug yi goo . Mougkhung: mungdain: moo nanu" da" myeing lhid" too" bye: yoomo za: dagoug ge" ga: wigi tid .
42010021	Hau: da" uri gyeungshang: Venyi: gi ngei pyoo: gau yi nhang: yoomo Yesu gi hid: su" ga: tid - Mougkhung: myidjang: da" Aseing: phoo Mangsoo we" - Se , thang Phajhi" zoug: yi moo yhoem" to" da" khyoo: yi ri phajhi" aboo mo ri phang shug byid: yoomo re" jeju" zeing: ri ngoo coung" nghei nyid . Phoo we" hid: su" bue" lo da" khyoo: gi nang vho: ngei da" khyoo: nyang: nghoid bye .
42010022	Nga" phoo gi ziyoo bain sho' ngoori ab byid: too" bye . Zooshang: kha: yug nghoid zigi Nya: phoo mo led: lho: gootu: hang" we' asi . Nya: phoo gi kha: yug nghoid zi we' nya: zoo: yo' nya: zoo: - khyen: yu lho: toin" shid noug su: mo lid: wigi hang" we' asi ga: tid .
42010023	Hau: thang: ri Yesu gi cangzoo: yi jhang khyoo: phug lho: akhid" nanu" myang da" zi joem khyoo: ri yo" myang da" myojid" joem gi ngi lhoo wa .
42010024	Nanu" ri ngoo tid zigi nanu" shau" myang da" khyoo: yi ri Lapi: yi khokham" yi gi myang noug nghoid loug we' ashau" myang boem . Nanu" shau" gyo: da" khyoo: ri gyoo: noug goo" nghoid loug we' ashug" gyo: boem .
42010025	Tarha" sara: dayug gi Yesu jang" moo re" lho: Sara: we" - ngoo gi apyaid ato: kangso' khasu" koid ri yoo" wa lha" » ga: Yesu ri phajhi" ca: yu noug yoomo re" myid .
42010026	Yesu gi Jhoem: mungdang: moo khasu" ga: tid to" lha" . nang ci: lhoung shau" nghab yu lha" » ga: nyang: ri doem phoug tid .
42010027	Hau: yug tid zigi Re" da" Aseing: Mangsoo ri Re" nheigloem: soo zoo: dangain" - Re" yoemso' dangain" - re" nyain: phajhi" dangain" yo' jheddab we' . Re" yhoem: kyoo" cang" ri nanya: gung yo' dakhyoo ti" jheddab we' ga: doem tid .
42010028	Houg: lang" Yesu gi nang phoid: zigi joo bye . Nang we' houg: yo' dakhyoo ti" kang so dei nyid yab we' .
42010029	Hau: tarha" sara gi nya: deingman" khyoo: vhoo noug yoomo nga" yhoem: kyoo" cang" gi hang" nghoid lha" » ga: nyang: gi Yesu ri myed .
42010030	Hau: uri Yesu tid zigi shid' phyang" byu dayug gi Yerusalem voo mo Yerikho voo moo gyoo" lo" da" khyoo: moo khyangtoug: joem yo' shau" go . Hau: khyangtoug: joem gi hau: youg da" byi mi , lhoid khyoid yu lho: coem nhoug wigi alug lug shid: loo" lang" she: pyam too" khare" boem .
42010031	Khainjung agyi dayug gi gyung: so" lo" ri hau: nhoug lheing: too" su: ri khyoo: moolo" myang . Houg: loug we' nyang: jang" pyam khare" .
42010032	Houg: yo" dakhyoo" Levi kung: mo dayug we' hau: joyoo moo ju" lo . Hau: yug we' houg: noo su: ri yhe: yu" lho: jang" goo" khaid khyo" phang: lo .
42010033	Nghoidloug we' Samari byu dayug gi gyung: so" lo" ri hau: da" byunoo jang" moo ju" loo" lang" hau: noo su: ri myang wigi nheig khyeig myid boo .
42010034	Noo su: jhang ju" sho' yhe: lho: noo su: da" dam , joem moo shooxu: yo' zabyid yhid: kaid byid: wigi pain" cu' yo' thoeb byid . Hau: thang: ri nya: loozei: dang moo noo su: ri zhung: nhang: wigi yhoeb' wa jang: ju" sho' shu" lo" lho: coung: goin byid: da .
42010035	Thang: nyid" ri yheb jang: mo thu' loo" yo , ri ngei eig kyab ri thoid lho: yhoeb jang: yhoem: seing: ri byid: wigi he: noo su: ri yu" goin coung: lang" ge' . Jain" gyo" gu: gi ngoo doem loo lang" lo xab' wa ga: tid kho' .
42010036	Houg: bang: soem" yug mo khyangtoug: shau" su: da" yhoem: kyoo" cang" gi kha: yug nghoid ein: nang jho: la" » ga: Yesu dang: thang: said'
42010037	Tarha" sara: phoo gi nheig khyeig ziyo' pang" thoug khari" su: nghoid ga: tid ri Yesu gi nang we' houg: su" lo" koid: we' ga: tid kaid .
42010038	Yesu yo' nya: cangzoo: yi gi gyung: so" lo" uri voo davoo moonyang: yhe: lo . Hau: voo moo Matha ga: myeing su: myiyi: zoo: gi nya: yhoem: moo nyang ri being" lhoem: kham: yu .
42010039	Matha moo nya: no , Mari ga: da" myiyi: zoo: dayug bo . Nyang: gi Aseing: da" khyid: yang: moo nyang: jhoug" byid: khyoo: ri tam" gyo: zhoung: jo .
42010040	Matha gi being" did" moo" myo: nhoung nyid yoomo Yesu jhang lo" lho: Aseing: we" nga" no , gi being" did" zho" moo" ri ngoo dayug nyang: kyeing" ri noung" to" zi nang abo myang la" . ngoori bo pang" zei: wa shid' re" nyang: ri tid kaid we' ga: lo" tid .
42010041	Aseing: gi Matha we" - Matha we" - nang gi moozoo" myoo" sho' shid' re" myid myo: nyid ga: nyang ri tid .
42010042	Nghoid loug we' nang moo daja: ca" shi" - Mari gi jo da" ziri khyen: yu abye: . Hau: ziri nya: jang" mo hang" we' ayo" lhoid yu loo: - ga: tid .
42011001	Danyid" ri Yesu gi joyoo daloem: moo akyu" mho' nyid . Akyu" bain mho' thang: ri cangzoo: dayug gi Aseing: we' Yohan gi nya: cangzoo: yi ri akyu" mho' jhoug" byid: yhangti" - ngoonu" ri we' jhoug" byid: we' ga: mho' .
42011002	Yesu gi « Nanu" akyu" mho' da" uri hid: su" mho' ge' . phoo we" - re" da" gyeungshang: myeing khyang" ri phau" myang: nyid boem baja" . Re" da" mungdain: ju" loo baja" .
42011003	Ngoo nu" ca" nyid da" zoo: noem ngoonu" ri nyid" khang" nyid byid: we' .
42011004	Ngoonu" ri subi" shoid da" yooboo - ngoonu" khyoid pyam byid: yhangti" - ngoonu" da" yooboo ri we' khyoid pyam byid: we' . Ngoonu" ri yau: da" jhu , phyo' ca: yu" jang" khyoo: ayhi: nhang .
42011005	Hau: thang: ri Yesu gi nanu" mo dayug yug gi myen" gam gung ri bidnoem dayoug yhoem: khyoo: yhe: lho: bidnoem phoo we" ngoori zooyho' soem" loem jen" jhid" byid: shi" we' ga: mho' .
42011006	Nga" da" yhoem: moo gyung: so" da" bidnoem dayug ju" lo . Nga" jang" moo nyang: ri zhoo" zi ci" we' ajo .
42011007	Yhoem: seing: gi ngoori phi: bu apu - yhoem: khoem" dangain" shung: bye . Zooshang: mi" yo" ngoonu" dangain" - yhoeb' yoo zheing: vang shang boem bye . Houg: yoomo ngoo to lho: nang ri zooyho' joem ri ayo" yu byid: loo: ga: yhoem: khoug: mo tid kaid .
42011008	Yhoem: seing: gi bidnoem dayug khyo" yhoeb' jo , yoomo to lho: zooyho' ri yu byid: wa zi anghoid . Nghoidloug we' hau: yug gi agyug asho' loo: damho , nyid yoomo yhoem: seing: gi to lho: ca" da" zooyho' dangain" ri byid: wa zi nghoid .
42011009	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" ri ngoo tid zigi Mho' ge' mho' ri yo" wa . Shoo: ge' sho: ri myang wa ko' ge' ko' lang" khoem" ri phang byid: wa .
42011010	Khasu" wim gari Mho' su: hang" nghoid loug yoo" zi nghoid . Shoo: su: gi shau" myang wa . khoem" moo ko' su: ri we' phang byid: wa zi nghoid .
42011011	Nanu" mo hang" nya: phoo we' Nya: zoo: gi ngoo: do' mho' ri Lhangmyu byid: wa su: nyid go" la" .
42011012	Gyo , u ga: mho' ri gunggoug" byid: goo" wa la" .
42011013	Nanu" akhyeing" mo lang" nya: zoo: yi ri ge zi se' byid: rigi Mougkhung: Aseing: - Nanu" da" nya: phoo gi mho' mo , ri gyeungshang: Venyi: je wigi byid: wa anghoid goo" la" » ga: tid .
42011014	Dalheing: ri Aseing Yesu gi dang: ase' tid da" yu ri khaid thu' pyam byid: lho: hau: yu phang: thu' loo" lang" dang: ase' tid su: gi dang: yo" tid lo . Byu phung: yi gi gye" mau" nyid boem .
42011015	Nghoidloug we' byu dayham" gi Yesu gi yu khokham" Bezebula ri loem: lho: yu joem ri dayo" khaid thu' ga: tid boem .
42011016	Byu dayham" bang: gi Yesu ri ca: yu nau boem yoomo mau" pho" mo alhoo: again daja: pya shug we" - ga: mho' boem .
42011017	Yesu gi houg: bang: da" nheigloem: ri si' byid: yoomo tid zigi « Mungdain: daloem: loem moo nyang: cang" aveing" goo" lang" gi hau: mungdain: gi amyang" ri byo , yoin" loo" wa zi za: nghoid . 42011018	Houg: yoomo satan da" Mungdain: moo dayug yo' dayug aveing" go" nghoid rigi Khasu" wim se' geing teing jo , wa la" . ngoo gi Bezebula ri loem: lho: yu yo" khaid thu' ga: nanu" tid ago" .
42011019	Gyeing" nyang: - ngoo gi Bezebula ri loem: lho: yu joem ri dayo" khaid thu' nghoid rigi nanu" da" cangzoo: yi gi hang" ri loem: lho: yu joem ri yo" khaid thu' go" lha" . houg: bang: nyang: lang" nanu" shoid vhang: nyid da" sagsi: yo" kham: boem da .
42011020	Nghoidloug we' ngoo gi Mangso da" yoem: so' mo yu joem ri yo" khaid thu' pyam yoomo Mangso da" mungdain: gi nanu" jang" moo juri" bye ziri si' loo: ge' .
42011021	Yoem: gyi: su: gi gyi zi gyi khoo: joeb sho' yo" - Nya: yhoem: ri zung" nyid nghoid rigi nya: da" ziyoo jonu" ri hang" ayo" re" vang lhoid yu wa .
42011022	Nghoidloug we' hau: youg tho' mo yoem: gyi: su: ju" loo lang" gi nyang: ri lo zain: oung: pyam lho: hau: yug myid loem: nyid da" gyi zi gyi khoo: dangain" - lhoid shoem" yu pyam wa . Yo" zain: yu da" ziyoo jonu" we' nya: da" bidnoem yi ri gam byid: pyam wa zi nghoid .
42011023	Nga" thang: adab su: gi nga" gyivo thang: dab su: nghoid . Ngoo yo" dadeing: daloem: za: anghoid su: gi abyoo asain" nghoid nyid .
42011024	Yu gi byu dayug jang" mo thu' lo" lho: kyug kyi , ri da" joyoo moo nyang: nyid jang: sho: yen . Myenjham" joyoo ashau" shoo: lang" gi ngoo akhang: - ngoo nyang: nyid kho" da" yhoem: khyoo doem loo" wa" ga: tid .
42011025	Houg: yoomo nyang: gi akhang: joyoo moo doem lo ri yung" yung" sain sain shoem" shoung: to" zi lo myang .
42011026	Houg: lang" nya: tho' aje khyeing" da" yu - nyhed yug doem khe: loung: lho: hau: joyoo moo doem jha" nyid . Houg: yoomo yu vang ci: su: da" aved asam" gi xang: shid" tho' re" je yau: lo" ga: tid .
42011027	Yesu gi hid: su" bain tid da" thang: ri byu phung: moo" mo myiyi: dayug gi nang ri khu: lho: noug" jhoug da" myiyi: gi kha: yhi' ngei: pyo: lha" » ga: tid .
42011028	Houg: nghoid loug Yesu gi Mangso da" mungdang: ri shau" gyo: lho: cang loo" su: gi hau: tho' re je ngei: pyo: ga: tid .
42011029	Byu phung: moo" gi lheing: khoem: to" da" uri Yesu gi He: pyaid mo byu yi gi gye" akhyeing" ashoeb boem nhung: lha" . nyangnu" gi alhoo: again toin" shid wa shid' re" da: mho' nyid ago" . 42011030	Nineve byu yi shid' moo Lapi: Yona gi alhoo: again bue" nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - he: pyaid mo byu yi shid' re" we' Byu da" nya: zoo: gi alhoo: again bue" loo wa .
42011031	Moug: pyi: shoid mo khokham" myhi , gi Phajhi" boo su: - Sholumon da" dang: ri shaug" gyoo: wa shid' re" nya: mung" mo jure . Akhid" hid: moo gi Sholumon tho' je gyi: zigi ju" nyid bye . Houg: yoomo tarha" dang: kho" da" bidnyid ri moug: pyi: shoid mo khokham" myhi gi to' lo lho: houg: bang: ri yooboo foin: dang: kho" wa zi nghoid .
42011032	Nineve voo byu yi gi Yona kho" kyo" mungdang: joem yoomo nyangnu" yooboo joem mo nheigloem: thid' boem da . Akhid" hid: moo Yona tho' je gyi: zi ju" nyid bye . Tarha" dang: kho" da" bidnyid moo Nineve voo byu yi gi to' lo lho: He: da" byu yi ri yooboo foin: dang: kho" wa zi nghoid ga: tid .
42011033	Byu yi gi myibung: ri tab lho: alhoung nghoeb to" yu Lain" wigi we' azhoung" lhoung: to" yu . Yhoem: khoug: moo vang loo mo myo , myang wa shid' re" myibung: ki" jang: moo dalhoung: ke" to .
42011034	Myojid" gi gung du: da" myibung: yhangti" nghoid . Myojid" ge nghoid ri re" gung goin" bang nyid . Nghoid loug we' myo , amyang nghoid rigi-re" gung goin" moug coid jo .
42011035	Houg: yoomo: - nanu" moo bo da" bidbang gi moug coid abue" loo" wa shid' re" zed" nyid ge' .
42011036	Re" gung goin" gi coid jo , zi dajhi' we' aboo loo - bang jo , nghoid rigi myibung: gi doug bang da" bidbang yo" - Re" tho' moo thoin" pang byid: yhangti" Nanu" da" dagung goin" gi doug bang jo , wa zi nghoid ga: tid .
42011037	Yesu houg: su" ga: bain tid lo" thang: rigi Pharishe dayug gi Yesu ri nyang yo' dage' voem: zoo wa ga: khe .

42011039	Aseing: gi Nanu" pharishe gi oug" khu joem ri atho' moo za: gye yung" sho' mhoin" cid" nghoid loug we' Nanu" da" nheigloem: khoug: moo gi akhyeing" ashoeb aco' ajhoid ziyo' byeung" jo , ago" .

42011042	Pharishe yi nanu" gi joem: loo" goo" wa . Nanu" gi nghang" pho , nyoug yu: fu - shabain sheing: nham: mo ju sho' to xi: boem mo daboem da" alu: kaid boem nghoid loug we' myonhoo: khyen: ziyo' - Mangsoo ri jheddab deung main" khyoo: aboo . 42011043	Pharishe yi nanu" gi joem: loo" goo" wa . Nanu" da" tarha" jung yi moo we' reng: da" joyoo moo we' zhung: nau . Kid" khoug: moo we' sube" wi - lhoem: phau" myang: wa ziri vho: ngei yen" ago" .
42011044	Nanu" gi joem: loo" goo" wa . Nanu" gi ci: azhug xoem" to" da" loeb yo" du nyid . Byu yi gi hau: loeb khuang" tho' khyo" nang: led: lo" da" uri loeb nghoid zi lang" ase' boem ga: tid .

42011047	Nanu" joem: loo" goo" wa . Nanu" da" nya: phoug" nya: phyid" yi said' kho" da" Lapi: yi da" shid' re" nanu" gi loeb ri koid .
42011048	Houg: su" nghoid ri nanu" da" phoug" phyid" yi shoid vhang: too" khare" moo" moo nanu" we' bo veing" bo zei: mo nghoid bye . Nanu" da" phoug" phyid" yi gi Lapi yi ri said lho: nanu" gi loeb koid: nyid mo , nghoid .

42011050	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo Abela mo he: Noku yhoem: moo" khoug: ju" sho' phoin: da" agyoo: moo said pyam lid lo" da" zakhari moo ju" sho' Mougmyid phain" da" nyid" mo he: gu: said pyam da" Lapi: yi suid" yoomo he: pyaid mo da" byu yi gi yooboo dang: kho" zi shau" wa nghoid . 42012021	Nyang: nya: shid' re" ziyoo jonu" khamyhoo young: too" nghoid loug we' Mangso da" shid' khoin" moo ayoo" ajo , su: gi hau: da" sathe" phoo yo" dadu nyid ga: tid .
42012022	Hau: thang: ri Aseing Yesu gi nya: cangzoo: yi ri tid zigi Houg: su" yoomo nanu" gi Ce: noem se' zoo: wa lha" . ein: kangso' shid' re" seing" akho" nyid goo . Ce: noem sevoid wa lha" . ein: wigi gung du: shid' re" seing" akhoo" goo" ga: tid .
42012023	Kangso' gi zoo: noem tho' moo je yhoug: gyen: - Gungdu: gi byi: mi tho' moo je yhoug: gyen .
42012024	Ka" no , joem ri myid yu" ge' . Nyangnu" gi amyoug: ri we' asain" too . Ayham" ashab yu . Nyangnu" moo zei: kaid to" yhoem: zeing ajo , Jhi: moo we' ashoung: too . 42012025	Nanu" mo hang" nghoid loug we' seing" kho" nyid yoomo nyang: nya: da" kangso' ri dazain damoo" khyalhang" yo" loung: sheing: nhang: goo" wa la" .
42012026	Hid: yhangti" - nge" da" moozoo" ri lang" age bue" nghoid rigi ci: yoomo gootu: moo" ri myid myo: nyid go" lha" .

42017013	Yesu Aseing: we" - ngoonu" ri nheig khyeig shi" we' o" ga: lhoem: yoid mho' boem .
42017014	Houg: bang: ri myang lang" Yesu tid zigi nanu" lo" lho: nanu" da" gungdoem: ri khainjung agyi yi ri lo" toin" shid ge" ga: tid . Nyangnu" gi khyoo: moo lo" nyid boem shi" uri noo ge lo" zi shau" boem bye .
42017015	Nyangnu" mo dayug gi nya: noo ge lo" ziri si' lang" doem tau" re" Mangsoo: ri thui: zeing yo" wigi nyho: coung .
42017016	Yesu da" khyid: yang: moo re" goeb pid lho: Aseing: ri jeju" so" nyid . Hau: yug gi Samari byumyu" nghoid .

42017020	Pharishe dayham" gi Mangso da" mungdain: gi kha: u" mo ju" ri" wa lha" » ga: Yesu ri zheing: myid: boem . Houg: lang" Yesu tid zigi « Mangso da" mungdain: ju" ri" wa zigi shau" yu" myang khyo" ju" ri" zi anghoid .
42017021	Yu" ge' Mangso da" mungdain: gi he: jang" moo jo , - thei: jang" moo jo , ein: wigi hang" ayo" tid ! Khasu" wim gari Mangso da" mungdain: gi nanu" da" akhoug: moo ju" nyid bye: ga: tid . »
42017022	Yesu nya: cangzoo: yi ri tid zigi Nanu" myang nau da" Byu nya: zoo: bidnyid gi danyid" ju" loo wa . Nghoidloug we' nanu" gi hau: ziri shau" myang zi anghoid .
42017023	Subi" gi Byu nya: zoo: ri yu" ge' he: joyoo moo nyid yu" ge" fo: jo , yoomoo nyid ga: tid goo" nghoid loug we' acang sho: yen" goo .
42017024	Lhab myeig lo" da" uri lhab bang gi moug yam dashoid mo zi dashoid khyoo: ju" sho' mougkhung: ri pang kaid ziyo' dakhyoo ti" Byu da" nya: zoo: bidnyid moo we' houg: su" bue" loo wa zi nghoid .
42017025	Nghoidloug we' He: pyaid mo byu yi da" keing" pyam ziyo' - jamjau zi xang: shid" shau" wa zi nghoid .
42017026	Noa da" pyaid moo bue" lo yhangti" - Byu nya: zoo: da" bidnyid moo we' houg: su" bue" loo wa .

42017028	Hau: da" ayo , gi loid" da" ayo , yo" dakhyoo ti" - xangsu: byu yi gi zo: pyoo: shug pyoo: - qei goo" ung" go" - shoo" zo: shoo" shug yhoem: koid: voolid zoore" nyid ago" da .
42017029	Sodom voo mo loid phang: thu' lo" da" bidnyid moo mougkhung: mo fang myi: mougvo lo wigi byu dangain" ri said toem" pyam bye .
42017030	He: khyo" wigi Byu nya: zoo: da" bidnyid moo khasu" bue" loo wa ziri toin" shid nyid zi nghoid .
42017031	Hau: da" bidnyid moo yhoemkhung: tho' moo nyid su: gi yhoem: khoug: mo nya: ziyoo soidgain lo" yu wa shid' re" agyoo" goo . Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - yoothung" dain" moo yhe: nyid su: we' yhoem: khyoo: adoem yo" tau" loo" wa .
42017032	Loid" da" yhoem: seing: myhi' ri myid boin: ge' .
42017033	Hang" we' nyang: nya: da" kang: ri khyoid yu noug: su: gi kangso' soem" wa . Nyang nya: da" kang: ri soem" loo" nhang su" koem gi Kangso' ri yo" yu wa .
42017034	Nanu" ri ngoo tid zigi hau: myen , moo yhoeb' joyoo daloem: moo yhoeb' jo , da" byu eig yug mo dayug ri shu" loo" shau" lho: dayug gi deing jo , khoo: wa .

42017037	Nya: cangzoo: yi gi nyang: ri myed: Aseing: we" kha: joyoo moo he: da" moozoo" bue" loo wa lha" . Yesu phoug tid zigi manggung jo , da" joyoo moo join yu joem zeing: foem boem wa" .
42018001	Hau: thang: ri Yesu gi nya: cangzoo: yi ri kha: uri we' yoem: ashoin: loo za: ayo , bain sho' moo akyu" mho' ca" da" khyoo: ri dangtu' daja: khyo" jhoug" byid: zigi

42018003	Hau: lho: hau: voo moo cougmoo" myhi , dayug we' nyid . Nyang: gi tarha" agyi jang" moo yhe: lho: ngoo yo" sei: boo su: ri ung: sho' dang: kho" byid: we' ga: kau: to .
42018004	Tarha" agyi phoo gi shang" yhen" zoo: myang" lang" re" kau: to" da khyoo: ri ayo" tid byid: ga: he: pyam . Nghoidsho' loug we' lo" thang moo nya: gung nyang: tid zigi ngoo gi Mangsoo ri we' agyug - byu ri we' cishu: anhang: su: nghoid .
42018005	Nghoidloug we' he: cougmoo" myhi , gi ngoori phibu daci: pu' nyid yoomo nya: da" jo khyoo: yo" yu wa shid' re" ngoo nya: da" moo" ri tid byid: wa zi nghoid . 42018010	Byu eig yug gi akyu" mho' wa shid' re" No ku" yhoem: moo" khyoo: yhe: lo . Dayug gi Pharishe gootu: dayug gi kheing" khyu: zo: su: nghoid .
42018011	Pharishe phoo gi nyang: kyeing" yab jo , lho: akyu" mho' zigi O" - phoo Mangsoo: we" - Byu goo" ji yi gi vhoo: boo mo adeung amain" mo sube" myi: lhoid mo , za: danghoid . 42018012	Ngoo gi labain daloem: khoug: moo-zoo: noem eig lheing: nyang: zeung: akyu" mho' - Hau: lho: yo" da" ziyoo daxi: boem mo daboem we ngoo nang ri byed .

42018014	Ngoo nanu" ri tid wa Yesu tid zigi kheing" khyu: zoo: su: gi Mangso da" shid' khoin" moo deung main" su: dayug khyo" yhoem: khyoo: doem yo" tau" lo . Pharishe phoo gi houg: su" anghoid . 42021036	Gyeing: gyeing: soo" soo" koid: nyid ge' ju" gyoo" loo wa da" myo , dain' dei: da" shid: gyoin noo gyoin ri yo" kham: zeing: yab jo , lho: wigi Byu nya: zoo: da" shid' khoin" moo dain: dain: yo" yab lho: tarha" dang: kho" ziri yo" kham: wa shid' re" khanham we akyu" damho , nyid ge' .

42023026	Gyizoo: yi gi Yesu ri shu" thu lo" uri siyoo voogung mo zi voomoo" khyoo: gyoo" re" nyid da" Kureni byu Simun ga: su: yo' nyangnu" shoug" go" da . Nyangnu" gi nyang: ri myheig yu lho: pyang" zeing yu nhang: wigi Yesu da" thang: moo cang soo" nhang: da .

42023028	Yesu gi hau: myiyi: yi jhang khyoo: lheing: yu" kaid lho: Yerusalem myiyi: nu" yi we" - nga" shid' re" angoug goo" - nanu" nyang: yo' nanu" da" nya: zoo: yi shid' re" da ngoug ge' .
42023029	Zoo: abo ziyo' - zoonu" noug" ashug yu" da" myiyi: gi ngi lhoo wa" ga: tid da" ayo , gi ju" lo boem wa .

43001020	Houg: lang" Yohan gi Ngoo gi Meshia anghoid - ga: wigi azoug" loo: bang bang lhoem: tid kyo . Houg: bang: gi nang Meshia anghoid rigi hang" nghoid Elia nghoid la" » ga: doem myid: boem .
43001021	Houg rigi nang hang" nghoid - Elia nghoid la" » ga: myed: ‹ ‹ Yohan gi ngoo Elia anghoid ga: tid . » Nyangnu" gi nang gi Lapi: nghoid la" » ga: doem myid: lang" Yohan gi ‹ ‹ Ngoo gi hau: da" lapi: we anghoid ga: tid . »
43001022	‹ ‹ Houg: bang: gi Houg: ri nang hang" nghoid - » ngoonu" ri nhang: kaid mo , ri lo" tid kyoo" ca . Nang nya: gung ri nang hang" nghoid ein: myid nyid ga: doem tid .
43001023	Yohan gi lapi: Esaia tid kyo" to" zi ' dakhyoo" ti" - - ngoo gi Aseing: ri" wa da" khyoo: ri dain: dain: nyheing ge' ga: dain" pyoid yoo moo nyho: nyid su: da" thui: nghoid ga: tid .
43001024	Yohan jang" moo Pharishe" yi nhang: kaid da" lagyoo: yi doem myid: zigi
43001025	Nang Meshia we anghoid - Elia we anghoid - Mangso: da" lapi: phoophoo we anghoid rigi Ce: noem koid ; wigi Babtisma kham: byid: yen" lha" » ga: zheing: myid: boem .
43001026	Yohan gi ngooo gi gyid yo' Babtisma ri kham: byid . Nanu" da" Phung: moo nanu" asi su: dayug bo yab jo .
43001027	Hau: yug gi nga" thang: moo da ju" ri" nghoid loug we' Ngoo gi nya: khyid: baid tei" phid: byid: wa zi lang" amoin: yi" su: nghoid - ga: tid .
43001028	He khyoo: gi Babtisma kham: byid: da" Yodan gyidlang bid thu' shoid moo jo , da" Bethani voo moo bue" da" khyoo: nghoid .
43001029	Thang: nyid" ri nya: jang" moo Yesu jure" zi myang lang" Yohan tid zigi Mougmyid byu yi da" yooboo ri yu pyam byid: da: - Mangso: yang nu" ri yu" yu" ge' .
43001030	Nga" thang: moo juri" su: danghoid loug - Nga" tho' mo je gyi: su: nghoid . Khasu" wim gari he: yug gi ngoo akhu: shi" mo nyid nyid su: nghoid - ngoo lhoung tid nyid su: gi he: yug nyang: nghoid bye .
43001031	He: yug hang" su: nghoid zi xang: shi" ri ngoo asi . Nghoidloug we' Israela Byumyu" yi nyang: ri zheing: se' boem wa shid' re" Ngoo gi gyid yo Babtisma ri kham: byid .
43001032	Hau: thang: Yohan sagsi ; kham: da" zi gi gyeungshang: Venyi: gi mougkhung: khyo" pheing" kyoug" yhangti" - gyoo" lo lho: nya: tho' moo zhoung: jo , ziri ngoo myang .
43001033	Nyang: gi hang" su: nghoid zi xang: shid" ri ngoo asi - nghoid loug we' gyid yo" Babtisma kham: byid: wa shid' re" ngoori nhang: kaid da" Mangsoo: tid zigi gyeungshang: Venyi: gi gyoo" lo lho: dayug yug da" atho' moo zhoung: jo , ziri nang shau" myang wa . Hau: yug gi gyeungshang: da" Venyi: yo" Babtisma byid: wa su: nghoid .
43001034	Houg: su" tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoo shau" yang bye . Houg: yoomo ngoo nanu" ri tid ba - nyang: gi Mangso da" nya: zoo: nghoid .
43001035	Thang: nyid" moo Yohan gi nya cangzoo: eig yug yo" dage" yab jo , da" uri
43001036	Aseing Yesu jure" zi myang lang" thei: yug gi Mangso yang nu" nghoid ga: tid .
43001037	Cangzoo: eig yug gi hau: dang: khoin" ri shaug" gyoo: lang" Yesu da" thang: moo cang lo" ago" .
43001038	Aseing Yesu gi thang: khyoo: lheing: yu" kaid ri houg: bang: cang lo ziri myang lang" ‹ ‹ Nanu" ce: noem sho: yen" go" ga: wigi myid . Houg: bang: gi ‹ ‹ Rabai we" nang khamoo nyid la" » ga: myid: boem . ( Rabai ga: da" dangkang: gi sara: we" ga: tid nau zi nghoid . )
43001039	Yesu gi hid: moo re" yu" ge" ga: phougtu . ( hau: ayo gi myenthang: myid nayi: koo nghoid bye . ) Houg: lang" nyangnu" gi nya: thang: cang yhe: ri nyang: nyid joyoo yhe: zheing: myang boem lho: nyangnu" gi Yohan yo' danyid" goin" nyid koin ago" .
43001040	Hau: cangzoo: yi mo dayug gi Simun Petru da" nya: nhung" - Andre nghoid .
43001041	Nyang: gi nya: mang: Simun ri myang lang" tid zigi ‹ ‹ Ngoonu" koem Meshia ri myang bye . » ( Meshia ga: da" dangkang: gi ) - Khristu ga: zi nghoid ga: tid .
43001042	Hau: thang: ri nyang: gi Simun ri Yesu jhang khyoo: khe: shu" yhe . Yesu gi Simun ri yu" lho: tid zigi ‹ ‹ Nang gi Yohan nya: zoo: Simun nghoid . Nghoidloug we' nang rigi Kepha ein: myheing wa zi nghoid . ( Hau: zigi Petru ga: ziyo' du: lho: lung: moo" boem ga: da" dangkang: bo . )
43001043	Thang: nyid" moo Yesu gi Galile mung" khyoo: loo" wa shid' re" myid phyed' to" . Philib ri myang lang" nga" thang: cang we' ga: tid .
43001044	Philib gi Besaida voo mo nghoid . Besaida gi Andre yo" Petru eig yug nyid da" voogung nghoid .
43001045	Philib gi Nathanela ri myang lang" Moshe da" tarha" pug moo nghoid loug - Lapi: yi da" Jhoem: mungdang: moo nghoid loug - lhid" shed' too" su: ri ngoonu" myang bye . Hau: yug gi Yoseb da" nya: zoo: - Nazared mo Yesu nghoid ga: tid .
43001046	Nathanela gi Nazared voo mo zi gi daja: ja: thu' yu" la" » ga: myid . ‹ ‹ Philib gi re" we' yu" we' ga: tid . »
43001047	Nathanela re" nyid zi Yesu myang lang" nya: khyoo: Yesu tid zigi fain" da" nheigloem: abo da" Israela Byu gyeing" dayug hid: moo ju" bye: ga: wigi tid .
43001048	Nathanela gi-Yesu ri nang khasu" wim ngoori khayo se' lha" » ga: myid: yu" . Yesu phougtu" zigi ‹ ‹ Nang ri Philib are" khi: shi" re - lafoem gam gyid" moo danyid shi" mo nang ri ngoo myang bye . »
43001049	Houg: lang" Nathanela gi Sara: we" nang gi ‹ ‹ Mangso da" nya: zoo: nghoid Israela byumyu" yi da" khokham" nghoid . » ga: wigi Nathanela phougtu .
43001050	Aseing Yesu tid zigi Lafoem gam gyid" moo ngoo nang ri myang bye: ga: tid yoomo za: nang loem" jeing" la" . He: tho' moo je gyi: da" moozoo" joem ri nang myang shi" wa zi nghoid .
43001051	Ngoo deing" deing nanu" ri tid ba - mougkhung: khoem" phang lho: Byu da" nya: zoo: tho' moo moug: lagyoo: yi gyoo" loo do , loo" koid' nyid da" ziri nanu" shau" myang wa ga: wigi nyangnu" ri Yesu tid .
43002001	Eig nyid" myang" thang: ri Galile mung" mo Khana voo moo loxo' pui" daloem: jo . Hau: da" pui" moo Yesu da" nya: myhi' we bo .
43002002	Yesu yo' nya: cangzoo: yi ri we' hau: pui" moo khe: to .
43002003	zabyidd" thang byug lang" Yesu da" nya: myhi' gi Hid: bang: zabyidd" thang boem bye: ga: Yesu ri tid .

43002006	Hau: joyoo moo galain eigsoem" xi: koo: vang da" yam: zeing: khyug loem: jo . Yuda byumyu" yi da" loem khau : khyoo: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - - cid" sain wa shid' re" to" da" yam: joem nghoid .
43002007	Yesu gi He: yam: joem moo gyid byeung" byeung" kham: kaid too" ge" ga: Dei zoo: yi ri tid lang" nyangnu" gi yam: nhoid ju" sho' sho' gyid kham: kaid pyeing to" boem .
43002008	Hau: thang: ri nyangnu" ri tid zigi He: yam: mo gyid dajhi' khu" yu lho: Pui" vhoeb jhang lo" byid: ge ga: tid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - dei zoo: yi gi khu" ci: lo" boem .
43002009	Pui" vhoeb gi zabyidd" agyeing" khyo" bue" lo da gyid ri shug ca , yu" . zabyidd" yeing ri khakhyo" yo" ziri gyid kham: kaid da" dei zoo yi gi se Pui" vhoeb phoo gi asi - ( nghoid loug gyid kham: zei da" deizoo: yi gi se ) yoomo pui: vhoeb gi phoo seig ri khe: yu wi -
43002010	tid zigi ‹ ‹ Byu hang" we' zabyidd" yeing je ge ziyo' - xang: shid" being" dalhoem: se . Hau: thang: ri she , ade: ngham" da" zabyidd" ri dalhoung jang - Nghoidloug we' nang gi je ngham" da" zabyidd" rigi akhid" ju" sho' da yhoem" too" nhung: lha" » ga: tid .
43002011	Yesu gi he: xang shid" mau" pho" alhoo: again ri Galile mung" Khana voo moo koid shug zoo" re" nya: myonhoo: phung" yoeb ri toin" shid . Houg: yoomo nya: da" cangzoo: yi gi nyang: ri loem" jeing" loem: khau lo boem .
43002012	Hau: thang: ri Yesu yo" - nya: yhed nya: no , - nya: cangzoo: yi yo" dage" Kaperna-um voo khyoo: lo" wigi hougmoo da eig nyid" theing: nyid boem .
43002013	Yuda byu yi da" lhed: kaid' pui" jhang lo da" uri Aseing Yesu gi Yerusalem voo khyoo: yhe: lo .
43002014	Noku yhoem moo" khoug: moo nu: jung - Yang - jid vhu: - ung" mo yo" - ngei thid' nyid mo zoobui" joem moo zhoung: jo , lang" ziri lo" myang .
43002015	Hau: uri tei" shoem , voosi" dakhaid koid ; yu lho: yang joem yo" nujung joem gougnyhoug dangain" ri no ku" yhoem moo" khoug: mo khaid thu' pyam . Ngei thid' mo da" zoobui" joem yo" - ngei joem ri we' tu: phaug foid' sain" pyam byid .
43002016	Aseing Yesu gi ‹ ‹ Haug: bang: ri hid mo yu pyam' ge' Nga" pho , Yhoem: moo" ri kid" yhoem: akoid logoo" ga: wigi-jid: vhu: ung" bang: ri amyeing" khyo ,
43002017	Houg: lang" cangzoo: yi gi ‹ ‹ O" - Mangsoo we" - ngoo coung" nghei seing" gam avoem" da" nheig nhei: jang: - Re" yhoem: moo" ri" jheddab myid gi nheigloem: moo myi: su" nge" nyid bye . » ga: wigi lhid" to" da" jhoem: dang: ri myid boin: boem ago" .
43002018	Yuda zoug: yi gi ‹ ‹ Nang gi he: da" moozoo" yo" koid ; wa da" amyeing" yoo" su: nghoid ziri ngoonu" ri ce: da" alhoo: again yo" koid ; shug wa lha" . » ga: wigi re" zheung: myid: boem .
43002019	Yesu phougtu" zigi ‹ ‹ He: no ku" yhoem: moo" ri phyo' pyam' ge' . soem" nyid" agyoo: moo ngoo doem yo" koid ; too" wa . »
43002020	Yuda byu yi tid zi gi myid: xe: khyug zain ju" sho' koid ; ri dabain da" no ku" yhoem moo" ri nang gi soem" nyid agyoo: moo yo" koid' wa la" » ga: myid nyid boem .
43002021	Nghoidloug we' Yesu tid da No ku" yhoem: moo" ga: zigi nya: gung doem: ri tid nyid zi nghoid .
43002022	Houg: yoomo Nya: cangzoo: yi gi Yesu shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' lo da" uri he: khyoo: ri doem myid boin: boem lho: Jhoem: mungdang: ri nghoid loug we' Yesu tid kyoo" khare" da" mungdang: ri nghoid loug we' loem" jeing" lo ago" .
43002023	Yerusalem voo moo koid ; da" lhed: kaid pui" moo Yesu zei: shug da" mau" pho" moo" ri zheung: shau" myang boem yoomo Byu myoo" sho' gi nyang: ri loem" jeing" vang lo boem .
43002024	Nghoidloug we' Yesu gi byu dangain" mo da" nheigloem: ri si' yoomo houg: bang: ri aloem .
43002025	Yesu ri byu da" akhyoo" hang" wigi we' tid kyoo" anoo . Nyang: gi byu da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo ci: bo ziri dangain" si' gu nghoid bye .
43003001	Pharishe yi phung: moo boo su: - Nikodi ga: da Yuda vhu' jhung: dayug nyid .
43003002	Nyang: gi myen" damyen ri Yesu jhang khyoo: re" lho: Rabai we" - Nang gi Mangsoo nhang: kaid da" Sara: dayug nghoid ziri ngoonu" se' khasu" wim gari nang koid ; shug da" mau" pho" moozoo" gi Mangsoo za: abo ri hang" we' ayo" koid ; zi nghoid ga: wigi tid .
43003003	Yesu gi ‹ ‹ Ngoo nang ri deing" deing tid ba - eig lheing: khu: ziri akham: yu su: hang" we' Mangso Mungdain: shau" myang wa zi anghoid » ga: tid .
43003004	Houg ‹ ‹ Nikodi gi Byu gi apyaid bain gyi: thang: ri khasu" se' doem yo" khu: loo: wa lha" . » ‹ ‹ Nya: myhi' da" ung: khoug: khyoo: vang lo" lho: doem yo" khu: wa la" . » ga: myid .
43003005	Yesu phougtu" zigi ‹ ‹ ngoo nang ri deing" deing tid kyoo" ba - gyid yo" Venyi: khyo" akhu: loo su: hang" nghoid loug we' Mangso da" Mungdain: moo ayo" vang .
43003006	Gung shoo" khyo" khu: zigi gung shoo" nghoid - Venyi yo' khu: lo da" zigi Venyi nghoid nyid .
43003007	Ngoo nang ri dalheing: doem khu: kham' ca" ein: tid ziri nang agyo: moug .
43003008	Lid' gi nyang: houg nau jang" khyoo: hau' loo" se nyid . Lid' houg thui: ri shaug" gyoo: nghoid loug we' kha: shoid khyo" hau lo lho: kha: shoid khyoo: hau lo" nyid zi ri nang asi . Venyi: mo khu: loo mo , hang" we' houg: yhangti" nghoid nyid .
43003009	Nikodi gi ‹ ‹ he: da" khyoo: gi khasu" se' ge bue" loo wa lha" . » ga: doem myid .
43003010	Yesu doem phougtu" zigi nang gi Israela amyu" mo Sara: moo" dayug nghoid to" nyid lho: wigi he: da" khyoo: ri nang ase' lo nhung: lha" .
43003011	Nang ri ngoo deing" deing tid kyo" - Ngoonu" gi nyang: nyang: se' da" khyoo: yo" myang da khyoo: ri tid kyoo" . Nghoidloug we' ngoonu" tid kyo" da" dang: ri nanu" hang we' anau lhoem: yu nghoid ago" .
43003012	Mougmyid yo" sen: da" khyoo: ngoo tid kyo" ri nanu" aloem" jeing" lang" gi Mougkhung: mungdain: yo' sen: da" khyoo: tid kyo" uri nanu" khasu" koid ; wigi se' loem" jeing" goo" wa lha" .
43003013	Mougkhung: mo gyoo" lo da" byu nya: zoo: mo gootu: hang" we' Mougkhung: khyoo: ado , lo" yu .
43003014	Dain" pyoid yoo moo Moshe gi seig zeing: moo gyid: lhang myu ri tu: to' to" yhangti" - Byu da" nya: zoo: we' tu: to' to" zi shau" wa nghoid .
43003015	Houg su" nyang ri loem jeung" mo , hang" we' apyaid ato: Kangso' ri yo" yu boem wa .
43003016	Khasu" wim gari Mangso da" nya: zoo: ri loem" jeing" bang: hang" nghoid loug we' ashid: loo za . Apyaid ato: kangso' yo" yu baja" ga: Mangsoo gi nya: zooti" zoo: ri byid: pyam jang moo ju" sho' Mougmyid xangsu: byu yi ri jheddab nyid .
43003017	Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo gi nya: zoo: ri nhang: kaid da" khyoo: gi Mougmyid byu yi ri tarha" dang: phyed wa shid' re" anghoid . Mougmyid byu yi da: khyoid yu Aseing bui" wa shid re nghoid .
43003018	Nya: zoo: ri loem" jeing" mo , hang" nghoid loug we' Tarha" dang: phyed' zi ashug" loo . Aloem" jeing" mo , koem gi Mang" so da" zooti" zoo: ri aloem" jeing" yoomo akhid" lang" tarha" dang: phyed zi shau" nyid .
43003019	Tarha" dang: phyed byid: da" akhyoo" dangkang: gi hid: su" nghoid bidbang zeing gi he: mougmyid moo juri" bye: nghoid loug we' Byu xangsu: yi gi akhyeing" ashoeb mo , nghoid nyid yoomo bidbang tho' moo moug: coid ri daje vho: boem .
43003020	Akhyeing" ashoeb moo" zei mo , gi bidbang ri ngheing" boem yoomo bidbang khyoo ari" nghoid boem wigi nyang: nya: akhyeing" ashoeb da" moozoo" bang thu' loo wa ziri avhoo: nghoid ago" gyoug yoomo - bidbang nam , moo avoem" tain" ri .
43003021	Nghoidloug we' deingmain" da" moo" zei: mo , gi nyangnu" koid da" khyoo: Mangsoo: myid khyoo: nghoid ziri yo" toin' shed wa shid re" bidbang moore" ago" .
43003022	Hau: thang: ri Aseing Yesu gi nya: Cangzoo: yi yo" dage" Yuda meing joem khyoo: so" koem" lo boem . Hau: joyoo moo cangzoo: yi yo" dage" nyid nyid lho: Babtisma ri we kham: byid .
43003023	Salim: joyoo anam , mo Enon: moo gi gyid myoo" sho' jo , yoomo Yohan we' Babtisma ri kham: byid: nyid . Byu yi we' Yohan jang" moo zeing: re" lho: Babtisma ri zheing: kham: yu nyid boem .
43003024	He: zigi Yohan thung: alung" shi" uri bue" da" khyoo: nghoid .
43003025	Yohan da" cangzoo: yi dayham" bang: gi loem: hau khyoo: moo ced" shang: khyoo: yo" sen: lho: Yuda byu dayug yo" ngeig go" nyid .
43003026	Houg: yoomo nyangnu" gi Yohan jang" moo yhe: lho: ‹ ‹ Sara: we" - Yodan gyidlang bid thu' tab' moo Sara: moo" jhang jure" yu" bye: da" byu - nang lhoung tid nyid da" su: ri aboin: la" . Akhid" nyang: gi Babtisma ri cang kham: byid yen" - byu myoo" sho' we nya: jang" moo zeing: re" nyid ago" » ga: re" tid .
43003027	Yohan gi ‹ ‹ Mangso: wigi a ab byid: ri byu gi ce" moo" ri we' ayo" kham: yu › › ga: wigi phougtu .
43003028	Ngoo gi Meshia anghoid . Hau: Aseing: da" gam , shid" khyoo: khyoeb su: date: nghoid . He: khyoo: ngoo nanu" ri tid kyoo" bye: zi gi nanu" nyang: sagsi: nghoid boem bye .
43003029	Lo , xo myhi , seig ri yo" seing: ci: su: gi loxo' phoo seig nghoid . Phooseig da" byen cang" phoo gi nya: nam , moo yab nyid lho: phoo seig da" thui: ri tam" gyo: nyid su: gi phoo seig da" thui: ri shaug" gyoo: lang" gau yi ngei pyoo: zi nghoid . Ngoo we' houg: su" joeb joeb byeung" byeung" gau yi ngei pyo: nyid bye .
43003030	Nyang: gi je gyi: sheung: loo wa . Ngoo koem gi neing: gyo" loo" wa zi nghoid .
43003031	Mougkhung: tho' mo gyoo" lo da" su: gi dangain" tho' moo je gyi . Mougmyid: mo nyid ri" su: gi mougmyid: byu te: nghoid yoomo mougmyid yo" sen: da" khyoo: ri te: se' tid . Nghoidloug we' mougkhung: tho' mo gyoo" lo da" su gi dangain" tho' moo nyid: su: nghoid .
43003032	Nyang: tid ri nyang: shau" myang shau" gyo: da" khyoo: - nghoid loug we' nya: mungdang: ri hang" we alhoem: kham: yu boem .
43003033	Nghoid loug we' nya: da" mungdang: ri kham: yu su: koem gi Mangsoo gideing main" su: nghoid khyoo: ri lhoem: kham: yu khyo" geing: teing nhang: su nghoid .
43003034	Mangsoo nyang: nhang: kaid su: gi Mangsoo mungdang: ri tid nyid khasu wim gari nya: - Venyi: byeung" byeung" kaid byid: to .
43003035	Nya phoo gi nya: zoo: ri jheddab yoomo nya: yoem: vhoo" bain sho' nya: zoo: ri ab byid: to .
43003036	Hou zoo: shang: ri loem" jeing" su: hang" nghoid loug we' apyaid ato: kangso' yoo" wa zi nghoid . Nghoidloug we' nya: zoo: da" dang: ri atam" gyoo: su: gi kangso' ayo" yu Mangso da" yoobo dam byid: zigi hau: youg tho' moo dajo , jo , nyid wa zi nghoid .
43004001	Yesu gi Yohan tho' mo Byu myoo" sho' ri Babtisma byid: nyid ziyo' cangzoo: yi je myo: lo ziri Pharishe zheung: shau" gyo: boem .
43004002	Gyeing" nyang: ga: rigi Aseing Yesu nya: gung gi Babtisma ri a byid . Nya: cangzoo: yi za: date: kham: byid .
43004003	Houg: su" Pharishe yi shau" gyo: ga: zi Aseing Yesu si' lang" gi Yuda mung" mo , thu' lo" lho: Galile mung" khyoo: tau" lo .
43004004	Nya: khyoo: gi Samari mung" khyo" phyed led: loo" ca" zi nghoid .
43004005	Samari mung" mo Sukha ga: da" voogung moo ju" lo . Hau: voo gi Yaku nya: zoo: Yoseb ri byid: to" da" mougmyid yo" athei" ve: da" joyoo nghoid .
43004006	Hau: joyoo moo Yaku da" gyid thung" jo , Yesu gi khyoo: so" myung: yoomo gyid thung" nam , moo zhoung: jo . Hau: da" ayo , gi bidnyid" gung tu: da" ayo , nghoid bye .
43004007	Samari myhi , dayug gi gyid kham: wa shid' mo jure . Aseing Yesu gi Ngoori shug gyid dagoem koo: byid: we' ga: hau: myiyi: ri tid .
43004008	( Nya: cangzoo: yi gi zoo: noem qei wa shid' re" voo khoug: khyoo: vang lo" boem uri nghoid . )
43004009	Myiyi myhi , phougtu" zigi nang gi Yuda byumyu" dayug nghoid . Ngoo gi Samari byu dayug nghoid nga" jang" mo khasu" wim wigi shug gyid ri mho' lha" . ( Hid: su" myid: da" khyoo: gi Yuda byumyu" yi gi Samari byu yi oug" khu , alhoung poung" ci: yu" yoomo nghoid . )
43004010	Yesu phougtid zigi Mangsoo ci: byid: nyid ziyo' - nang ri shug gyid dagoem mho' nyid su: gi hang" nghoid da" khyoo: ri nang se' nghoid ri koem gi hau: youg jang" mo nang gyid mho' wa zi nghoid . Hau: yug we' nang ri kangso' gyid byid: wa zi nghoid ga: tid .
43004011	Hau: myiyi: gi ‹ ‹ Aseing: we" gyid thung" gi gye no , - Aseing: nang gyid pung" we' aci: - nang khayo kangso' gyid se' yoo" wa lha" . »
43004012	He: gyid thung" gi phoug" Yaku ngoonu" ri byid: to" zi nghoid . Nyang: we' nya: zoo: yi we' Yang joem Nu: joem gi he: gyid thung" mo shug led loo" bye . Nang Yaku tho' je gyi: la" .
43004013	Yesu doem phougtid zigi « He: gyid shug mo , dangain" - thang: ri gyid doem shed shi" wa .
43004014	Nghoidloug we' ngoo byid: wa da" gyid shug mo , hang" we' khanham we' gyid doem shed loo: wa zi anghoid . Hau: ngoo byid: da" gyid shug su: gi nya: da" akhoug: moo gyid bug dalang bue" loo wa . Hau: zigi nya: da" shid' re" Kangso' gyid bue" wigi nyang: ri apyaid ato: kangso' byid: wa zi nghoid .
43004015	Hau: myiyi: tid zigi ‹ ‹ Lu daid' we" - Ngoo ri thang: phyang" gyid adoem shid wa shid' re" we' He: joyoo moo re" lho: gyid akham: ca" loo: wa shid' re" we' hau: gyid ngoori byid: jhug we" » ga: mho' da .
43004016	Yesu tid zigi lo" lho: Re" yhoem: seing: phoo ri khe: shu" ri" we' ga: tid .
43004017	Hau: myiyi: phougtu" zigi ‹ ‹ Ngoo yhoem: seing: phoo dayug we' ayoo" » ga: tid . Yesu phougtu" zigi ngoo yhoem: seing: phoo ayoo" ga: nang tid zi deing .
43004018	Nang gi yuggi wim: yug yo" loxo' yu bye: - Akhid" nang yo" dage" nyid su: gi re" yhoem: seing: phoo anghoid . Nang gi nghoid deing ziri tid nyid abye: . »
43004019	‹ ‹ Ngoo yu" ri nang gi Lapi: dayug nghoid zi myang si' bye: ga: › › myiyi: myhi , tid .
43004020	Nga" phoug" phyid" gi he: da" boem moo Mangsoo ri noku boem . Nanu" Yuda byumyu" yi gi Yerusalem voo moo da noku ga: tid boem › › ga: tid .
43004021	Yesu gi myiyi: zoo: nang we" - nga" dang: ri loem" jeing" we' he: boem tho' moo we' Yerusalem voo moo we' phoo Mangsoo ri anoku lo: da" ayo , gi ju" loo wam bye .
43004022	Nanu" Samari yi gi nyang: tu: nyang: ase' da" Mangsoo ri Noku ago" . Ngoo nu" gi ngoonu" nyang: si' bye: da" Mangsoo ri da noku boem . Khasu" wim gari Khyoid yu khyoo: gi Yuda byumyu" mo wigi ju" loo yoomo nghoid nyid .
43004023	Noku loem: khoug: mo , gi Phoo Mangsoo ri Venyi: yoem: vhoo" yo" - deingmain" khyo" noku wa ayo , gi ju" loo wa . Akhid" lang" hid: moo ju" nyid bye . Houg: su" loem" jeing" noku mo , ri Mangsoo vho: ngei nyid .
43004024	Mangsoo gi Venyi: nghoid - Venyi: da yoem: vhoo" khyo" za: byugi deingmain" khyoo" yo' noku nyid .
43004025	Hau: myiyi: myhi , gi ‹ ‹ Meshia nyang: ju" gyoo" ri" wa zi ngoo se' - Hau: da" ju" gyoo" loo lang" gi ngoonu" ri khyoo" dangain" re" tid shed wa zi nghoid › › ga: tid .
43004026	Yesu doem tid zigi ‹ ‹ Hau: yug gi akhid" nang yo" doem go" nyid su: - ngoo nyang: nghoid bye . »
43004027	Hau: uri nya: cangzoo: yi gi doem ju" loo bye . Nyangnu" gi Yesu myiyi: myhi , dayug yo" doem go" nyid zi lo myang yoomo gye" yu" mau" boem ago" . Nghoidloug we' hau myiyi: myhi , ri ‹ ‹ Ce: noem vho: ga: khyoo: ri we' › › Yesu: ri ‹ ‹ Ci: koid ; hau myiyi: myhi , yo" doem go" nyid › › ga: nyangnu" hang" we' avoem" myid: yu" boem nghoid ago" .
43004028	Myiyi: myhi , gi gyid yam: ri too" kho' lho: voo khoug: khyoo: lo" wigi voo byu yi ri
43004029	Ngoo koid ; da" khyoo: dangain" ri tid thu' byid: su: ri re" yu" ge' . Nyang: gi Meshia nghoid wa la" » ga: wigi lo" tid kyo .
43004030	Houg: yoomo byu yi gi voo mo thu' re" boem lho: Yesu jhang re" lo ago" .
43004031	He: da" uri cangzoo: yi gi ‹ ‹ Sara: we" zoo: noem shi" zoo: we' ga: zheung: sang: boem . »
43004032	Nghoid loug we' Yesu phougtu" zigi ‹ ‹ nanu" ase' da" zoo: noem ri ngoo yoo" bye › › ga: tid .
43004033	Houg: yoomo cangzoo: yi gi Yesu ri ‹ ‹ zoo: noem dayug yug ci: ri" bye: la' » ga: nyang: cang" nyang: myid: go" nyid .
43004034	Yesu gi ‹ ‹ Nga" da" zoo: noem gi Ngoo ri nhang: kaid' su: vho: khyo" cang pyeing lho: Hau: Aseing: byid: to" da" moozoo" ri bain sho' voin vu , khyoo: gi nga" zoo: noem nghoid bye: » ga: tid .
43004035	‹ ‹ Lham" moo" myid: khyab koo: myang" loo" lang" gug myheing yo , ju" wam: bye: ga: tid - dang: khyang" jo , anghoid goo" la" . Nghoidloug we' ngoo nanu" ri tid ba ; - Yoo thung" dain" khyoo: lheing: yu" kaid ge' yham" wa gug gi akhid" nyang: byang: yo" ne - myheing voin" jo , bye: ziyo' yham" wa jen" jen" nghoid bye .
43004036	Gug yham" mo , gi aphoug" ri shau" yu lho: Apyaid ato: kangso' yo" sen: da" amyoug: ashi" ri yo" yham" yu boem wa . Houg: yoomo shoo" su: yo" yham" su: gi dage" za: gau yi boem wa zi nghoid .
43004037	Dayug gi sho" lho: dayug gi yham" - ga: da" dang: khyang" gi deung nyid zi nghoid .
43004038	Nanu" ashoo" azhoung" to" da" yoo: thung" mo gug ri yham" yu wa shid' re" ngoo nanu" ri nhang: kaid bye . Gootu: da" byu yi zei: to" jang" mo - nanu" gi akyu" ri shau" kham: yu nyid boem" » ga: tid .
43004039	Samari myiyi: myhi , gi ‹ ‹ He: yug gi ngoo koid ; da" moo" dangain" yo" tid kyo" » ga: tid yoomo hau: voo mo , Samari byu yi myoo" sho' gi Yesu ri loem" jeing" lo boem .
43004040	Houg: yoomo Samari byu yi gi Yesu jhang jure" boem lho: nyangnu" jang" moo lo theing: we' ga: sang: boem yoomo Yesu gi hau: joyoo moo eig nyid" koo: theing: nyid kho .
43004041	Nya: da" mungdang: ri shau" gyo: boem yoomo byu gootu: myoo" sho' we' loem" jeing" lo boem bye .
43004042	Houg: bang: gi Samari myiyi: myhi , ri ‹ ‹ Akhid" ngoonu" gi Aseing: ri loem" jeing" lo boem zigi re" dang: yoomo za: anghoid - Aseing: da" mungdang: ri ngoonu" nyang: shaug" gyoo: boem yoomo danghoid . He: da" Aseing: gi mougmyid da" khyoid yu su: - gyeing" gyeing" - nyang: nghoid da" khyoo: ri ngoonu" si' bye: ga: tid boem .
43004043	‹ ‹ Khasu" wim ga: ri lapi ; gi nya: da: moug moo ce: myonhoo: aboo › › ga: Aseing: nyang: tid ziyo dakhyoo" ti" nghoid - eig nyid" koo: myang" lang" hau: joyoo mo , Galile mung" khyoo: yhe: lo" .
43004044	
43004045	Houg: su"Galile moo ju" lo" ri Galile byumyu" yi gi Yesu ri lhoem: tau yu boem . Khasu" wim gari Yerusalem voo moo koid ; led: lo da" lhed: kaid pui" moo nyangnu" da" gung nyang: yhe: ju" yu" lho: hau: pui" uri Yesu zei: shug da" akhyoo" again joem ri zheing: myang yoomo nghoid .
43004046	Hau: thang: ri Yesu gi gyid ri zabyidd" yeing bui" nhang: da" Galile mung" khana voogung moo dalheing: doem ju" lo . Hau: voo moo asu" ya zoug: dayug nyid . Nya: zoo: yuggi nu" gi Karpena-um voo moo no nyid .
43004047	Hau: da" zoug: phoo gi Yuda mung" mo , Galile mung" khyoo: Yesu ju" lo" ziri shaug" gyoo: yoomo Yesu jang" moo re" lho: shid: tham: no nyid da" nya: zoo: ri Karpena-um voo khyoo: yhe: lho gi byid: wa shid' re" Yesu ri re" sang: nyid .
43004048	Yesu tid zigi nang gi mau" pho" da" alhoo: again ri ashau" myang nghoid ri gi loem" jeing" wa zi anghoid .
43004049	Hau: zoug: phoo gi ‹ ‹ Aseing: we" - nga" zoo: ashid: shi" ri juri" byid: we' » ga: mho'
43004050	Yesu gi ‹ ‹ loo" we' re" zoo: gi kangso' dei nyid wa › › ga: tid . Hau: yug gi Yesu tid da" dang: ri loem" jeing" ziyo' tau" loo" bye .
43004051	Nyang: gi khyoo: laid moo daso" loo" shi" ri nya: dei zoo: yi jure" boem lho: re" yuggi zoo: gi ge loo bye: ga: re" tid lang" boem bye .
43004052	Hau: zoug: phoo gi kha: yo , ri nga" zoo: ge lo lha" » ga: myid: uri nya: dei zoo: yi gi anyi" nab' danayi: koo mo ge gyeing: loo bye . ga: tid kyo" boem .
43004053	Houg: lang" nya: phoo gi houg: noo ge lo da" ayo , gi ‹ ‹ Re" zoo: gi kangso' dei nyid wa › › ga: Yesu nyang: ri tid da" ayo , nghoid da" khyoo: ri myid boin: kaid . Houg: yoomo nyang: yo" yhoem: byu dangain" mi" yi , Yesu ri loem: khau lo .
43004054	He: khyoo: gi Yuda mung" mo , Galile mung" khyoo: - Yesu ju" lo" thang: ri eig lheing: ein: lheing: toin" shid' da" mau" pho" moozoo" nghoid .
43005001	Hau: thang: ri Yuda byumyu" yi da" pui" zeing: daloem: jo , yoomo Yesu gi Yerusalem voo moo" khyoo: yhe: lo .
43005002	Yerusalem mo yang khoem" duang: vang wa khyoo: wim: loem: jo , da" nam , moo gyid thoem" daloem: jo . Hau: gyid thoem" ri Hebre myeing" khyo" Bedsaida ga: tid .
43005003	Hau: vang wa khyoo: moo gi myo , amyang mo , khyoo: ayo" soo" mo gung joem: shid: mo , noophyoo" shau" mo , myoo" sho' leung yoin" to .
43005004	( Aseing: da" moug: lagyoo: yi gi daso' dadam gyid thoem" moo gyoo" lo lho: gyid ri lhu: nhoin , yoomo gyid thoem" noin" loo wa zi ri noo mo gi lang" nyid boem . Khasu" wim gari hau: gyid thoem" noin" lo da" uri xang" shid" gyid thoem" khoug: khyoo: yo" vang yhi: su: gi noo ge lo . )
43005005	Hau: joyoo moo soem" xe: shed zain ju" sho' no nyid da" byu dayug nyid .
43005006	Hau: yug leung jo , ziri Yesu myang lang" myang" sho' hid: su" no leung jo , ziri nyang: se . Houg: yoomo Yesu gi nang ge loo nau la" » ga: myid: yu .
43005007	Hau: yug gi yhoem: seing: we" - gyid thoem" noin" lo da" uri ngoori gyid thoem" khyoo: shu" gyoo" loo" wa byu dayug we aboo . Ngoo gyoo" loo" wa ein: dasoin , nyid shi" ri nga" shid' moo byu dayug yug shi" gyid thoem" moo ju" nyid lang" bye: ga: tid .
43005008	Yesu gi too we' re" da" myhu" lu ri deing: vu , lho: so" loo" we' ga: hau: yug ri tid .
43005009	Hau: yug gi dalheing: dam ge yangzain: lo lho: nya: myhu" lu yoeb' ci: lho: so" loo" bye . Hau: nyid" gi Dougno: Bidnyid nghoid .
43005010	Houg: yoomo Yuda zoug: yi gi noo ge loo su: ri akhid" nyid" gi labain nyid nghoid . re" myhu" lu ri dang lo zigi tung: to" tarha" ri shoid da" zi nghoid . ga: gyikoid boem .
43005011	Hau: yug gi ‹ ‹ Ngoori ge loo nhang: su: gi re" myhu" lu yoeb ci: lho: loo" we' › › ga: tid ga: doem tid kyo .
43005012	Nyangnu" gi nang ri houg: su" koid ; nhang: su: gi hang" nghoid la" » ga: myid: ago" .
43005013	Nghoidloug we' noo ge loo nhang: shoung" su: gi Yesu khayug: nghoid ziri nyang asi - khasu" wim gari Aseing Yesu gi hau: byu phung: moo" mo yho' thu' lo" byug yoomo nghoid .
43005014	Hau: thang: ri Yesu gi hau: yug ri no ku" yhoem moo" khoug: moo myang yoomo nang gi akhid" yangzain: bye . thang: ri yooboo ashoid loo . Houg: su: anghoid lang" gi nang he: tho' mo je yau: da" noo thoung" shau" shi" wa" - ga: tid .
43005015	Hau: yug gi thu' lo" lho: nyang: ri noo ge loo nhang: su: gi Yesu nyang: nghoid da" khyoo: ri Yuda zoug: yi ri tid kyo .
43005016	Houg: su" wigi Dougno: Bidnyid moo noo gi nhaung moo" zei: yoomo Yuda zoug: yi gi hau: nyid mo Yesu rishen" yhen' wa soin' lo boem .
43005017	Yesu gi Nga" phoo gi kha: u" we' moozoo" moo nyid . Houg: su: nghoid yoomo ngoo we' atheing: anoo: loo: moo" zei: nyid zi nghoid ga: houg: bang: ri tid kyo .
43005018	Hid: su" tid yoomo we' Dougno: tarha" ri do , rhue tho' agoo" - Mangsoo ri nya: phoo ga: du lho: nya: gung ri Mangsoo yo" dayi" too" yoomo we' Yuda zoug: yi gi nyang: ri said pyam wa shid' re" khyoo: sho: lo nyid boem bye .
43005019	Houg: yoomo Yesu gi Yuda zoug: yi ri tid zigi Nanu" ri ngoo deing" deing tid ba" - Nya: zoo: gi nya: nheigloem: khyo" ce" moo" we' ayo" zei . Nya: phoo koid ; da" moozoo" ri yu" lho: za: dazei: - Nya: phoo cikoid ; ziri nya: zoo: we' houg: su" bo koid .
43005020	Nya: phoo gi nya: zoo: ri jheddab yoomo nyang: zei: moozoo" dangain" nya: zoo: ri toin" shid . He: da" moozoo" tho' re" je gyi: da" moozoo" ri lang" zei: wa shid' re" nya: phoo gi nya: zoo: ri toin" shid' wa zi nghoid . Hau: ziri nanu" gi yu" mau" boem wa nghoid .
43005021	Nya: phoo gi byu shid: ri doem dei loo nhang: lho: kangso' byid: yhangti" - Nya: zoo: we' nyang: vho: ngei bang: ri kangso' byid: wa zi nghoid .
43005022	Nya: phoo gi hang" ri we' Tarha" dang: aphyed' - Nya: zoo: ri tarha" dang: phyed' wa zoug: myeing" dangain" byid: too" bye .
43005023	Byu yi gi nya: phoo ri phau" myang: boem yhangti" - nya: zoo: ri we' phau" myang: boem wa nghoid . Nya: zoo: ri aphoug" amyang: bang: hang" nghoid loug we' nyang: ri nhang: kaid da" nya: phoo ri aphoug" myang: zi nghoid .
43005024	Deing" deing nanu" ri ngoo tid ba" - Nga" da" dang: ri shau" gyo: lho: ngoori nhang: kaid su: ri loem" jeing" su: gi Apyaid' ato: kangso' yo . Nyang: gi tarha" dang: phyed' zi athoung" shau" loo za: shid: jo , jang" mo - Kangso' dei nyid da" shoid khyoo: yo" rue' led loo" su: nghoid bye .
43005025	Deing" deing Nanu" ri ngoo tid ba" - shid: jo , mo , gi Mangso nya: zoo: da" thui: ri shaug" gyoo: lang" Kangso' doem dei loo wa . Hau: ayo , gi akhid" nyang: ju" jo , bye .
43005026	Nga" phoo gi kangso' ajhung: nghoid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - - Nya: zoo: ri we' kangso' ajhung: bue" loo wa shid' re" koid ; too" bye .
43005027	Nyang: gi byu da" nya: zoo: nghoid yoomo nyang: gi nya: zoo: ri tarha" dang: yo" phyed' da" zoug: myeing" ab byid: too" bye .
43005028	He: da" khyoo: ri nanu" amoug" goo" - Loeb' khoug: mo shid' mang yi gi nya: zoo: da" thui: ri shau" gyoo: lang" thu' lo boem da" ayo , ju" loo wa .
43005029	Ge da" moo" zei: mo , gi Kangso' yoo" wa shid' re" to' wigi doem dei loo wa . Akhyeing" ashoeb moo" zei: mo gi yoobo dam kham: zoo: wa shid' re" to' wi gidoem dei lo boem wa zi nghoid .
43005030	Ngoo gi ngoo nyang: vho: khyo" ce: moo" we' ayo" zei: - Phoo Mangsoo toin" shid' khyo" za: dang: daphyed' dakho . Ngoo gi ngoo nyang: vho: khyo" acang - ngoori nhang: kaid su: vho: khyo" dacang yoomo Nga" da" tarha" dang: phyed' da" khyoo: gi jo nyid .
43005031	Ngoo gi ngoo nya: da" khyoo: sagsi: kham: nghoid rigi nga" da" sagsi: kham: khyoo: gi loem: agi .
43005032	Nghoidloug we' nga" da" khyoo: sagsi: kham: su: dayug nyid . Nyang: nga" da" khyoo: sagsi: kham: da" zi gi deingmain" nyid zi ngoo se .
43005033	Nanu" gi Yohan jang" moo lagyoo: nhang: kaid ago" . Nyang: nga" khyoo: sagsi: kham: zigi deingmain" zi nghoid .
43005034	Nga" da" khyoo: ri byu dayug yug gi sagsi: kham: byid: aca" loo . Nanu" khyoid yu zi shau" wa shid' re" za: he: dang: ri ngoo tid nyid zi nghoid .
43005035	Yohan gi myiyham: dab lho: bang nyid da" myibung: yhangti" nghoid nyid yoomo nanu" gi nya: da" bidbang khoug: moo daso' za: te: pyoo: nau boem .
43005036	Nghoidloug we' Yohan da" sagsi: kham: khyoo: tho' moo je gyi: da" sagsi: ngoo moo daja: jo . Phoo Mangsoo ngoori ab byid: to" wigi akhid" ngoo koid ; nyid da" moozoo" joem gi ngoori phoo Mangsoo nhang: kaid da" khyoo: ri sagsi: kham: nyid zi nghoid .
43005037	Ngoori nhang: kaid da" phoo Mangsoo nyang: we' nga" da" khyoo: ri sagsi: kham: nyid . Nanu" gi nya: da" myonhoo: yo' nya: da" thui: ri khanham we ashaug" gyoo: yu" - ashau" myang yu" boem .
43005038	Phoo Mangsoo nhang: kaid su: ri aloem" jeing" boem yoomo nya: da" mungdang: gi nanu" da" nheigloem: khoug: moo aboo .
43005039	Nanu" gi apyaid' ato: kangso' yoo" abe ga: wigi Mungdang: ri ayoeb' yoeb' nghab' nyid ago" . Hau: jhoem: mungdang: dangain" gi nga" khyoo: ri tid nyid zi nghoid .
43005040	Nghoidloug we' nanu" gi apyaid' ato: kangso' yoo" sho' ga: nga" jhang khyoo: anau re" boem .
43005041	Ngoo gi byu yi wi coung" byid: wa shid' re" sho: yen" zi anghoid .
43005042	Nghoid loug we' nanu" da" khyoo ri ngoo se' - Nanu" moo Mangsoo ri jheddab nheigloem: abo boem .
43005043	Ngoo gi Phoo Mangso da" zoug: myeing" zoug: thui: yo" juri" nghoid loug Nanu" gi ngoori alhoem: kham: yu boem . Gootu: dayug yug khyoo: nyang: nya: da" myid khyo" jure" nghoid rigi nanu" lhoem: kham: yu boem wa .
43005044	Nanu" gi nyang: cang" nyang: - coung" ngei phau" myang: goo" wa ziri vho: ngei nyid ago" . Nghoidloug we' dayug kyeing" da" Phoo Mangsoo mo coung" nghei myonhoo: byid: zi shau" yu wa shid' re" gi yoem: akaid boem . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi ngoori khasu" koid ; se' loem" jeing" wa go"
43005045	Nghoidloug we' ngoo gi Phoo Mangso da" shid' khoin" moo yooboo foin: dang: phyed' loo wa ein: ajhoo: goo . Nanu" ri yooboo foin wa su: gi nanu" nyang: nheig byu loem: khau: nyid da" Moshe nyang: nghoid .
43005046	Moshe gi nga" da" khyoo: ri lhid" toin" shid' su: nghoid . Houg: yoomo Moshe ri nanu" loem" jeing" lang" gi Ngoori we' loem" jeing" goo" zi nghoid .
43005047	Nghoidloug we' nanu" gi Moshe lhid" toin" shid to" da: - khyoo: ri aloem" jeing" boem yoomo khasu" koid ; wigi nga" da" dang: ri yo" loem" jeing" goo" wa lha" .
43006001	Hau: thang: ri Yesu gi Galile gyid nung" ( Tiberi thoem" we' ga: da" jang" moo gu: led lo .
43006002	Noo phyoo" shau" nyid da" byu yi ri ge loo" nhang: ziri zheing: myang boem yoomo byu phung: moo" gi thang: moo cang lo nyid boem .
43006003	Yesu gi boug tho' khyoo: do , lo" lho: nya: cangzoo: yi yo" dage" zhoung: jo .
43006004	Hau: uri lhed: kaid da" pui" zeing we' jhang loo bye .
43006005	Yesu gi lheing: yu" kaid da" uri byu phung: moo" cang lo nyid ziri myang kaid lang" hid: bang: zo: wa zoo: noem khayo se' qei wa lha" » ga: Philib ri myid: da .
43006006	( Hid: su" myid: da" khyoo: gi Philib ri ca: yu" noug yoomo nghoid . Nghoidloug we' Yesu ri nyang: khasu" koid ; nau zi si' gu nghoid . )
43006007	Philib phougtu" zigi byu dayug ri zoo: noem dajhi' jhi , yo" gam zhoo" sho' gi ngei eig shoo: kyab koo: mo qei ri datham: wa zi nghoid › › ga: wigi phougtu .
43006008	Simun Petru da" nya: nhung" cangzoo: dayug nghoid da" Andre tid zigi
43006009	Hid: moo zooshang: dayug nyid . Nyang: moo zooyho' wim: loem: yo" - ngoo: zoo eig du: bo . Nghoidloug we' hid: myhoo' gyeing" da" byu Phung: yi ri Khasu" koid: wigi gyi: sho' yo" zhoo" zi anghoid ga: tid .
43006010	Yesu nyangnu" ri tid zigi Byu yi ri zhoung: jo , nhang: ge' hau: joyoo moo vufu" myo , gye thu: joyoo moo byu wim: khyeing" bang: gi vufu" yoo moo zhoung: yoin" to .
43006011	Houg: lang" Yesu gi zooyho' ri yu lho: Jeju" ri bain coung" lang" zhoung: jo , mo , ri gam byid . Ngoo zoo: ri we' houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - koid lho: . Byu dangain" gi gyi" gyi: shau" zo: boem bye .
43006012	Houg: bang: zo: gyi: boem thang: ri Yesu gi zo: teing to" zi amyid afoo" abui" wa shid' re" cang koid: zheing" ge ga: cangzoo: yi ri tid .
43006013	Houg: yoomo cangzoo: yi gi zheing: cang koid: zheing" yu" ri zooyho' wim: loem: yo' ngoo: eig du: mo zo: teing ajab amoin" - kyileing" ceing daxe: eig gyoin byeung" nghoid shi .
43006014	Hid: su" Yesu zei: shug da" mau" pho" moozoo" ri myang mo , gi He: yug gi moug myid moo gyoo" loo wa ga: da" Lapi: amain" yang: nghoid bye ga: tid boem .
43006015	Yesu gi houg: bang: jure" wigi Nyang: ri myheig yu lho: agyoo: ayoid - khokham" tu: to' boem wa zi si' yoomo nyang: kyeing" boug: tho' khyoo: gau' yhe: lo" byug .
43006016	Myenthang: zoo" ju" lo da" uri cangzoo: yi gi Galile gyid thoem" khyoo: gyoo" lo" boem .
43006017	Lhid' tho' moo bain do , lo" boem lang" gyid thei: tab' Kaperna-um voo khyoo: gu: lo" ago" . Moug: coid loo: loug we' Aseing Yesu gi nyang: Nu" jang" moo atain" loo shi .
43006018	Hau: uri ug lid' we' hau nyid yoomo gyid thoem" moo being: mhoid to' lo nyid .
43006019	Cangzoo: yi gi soem" myid main: koo gu: lo" nyid da" uri Aseing Yesu gi gyid tho' moo khyoo: so" lho: wigi nyangnu" anam moo tain" lo nyid ziri myang boem . Houg: lang" nyangnu" gi gyoug dain ago" .
43006020	Yesu gi agyug goo" - ngoo danghoid ga: nyangnu" ri tid .
43006021	Houg: lang" nyangnu" gi goug goug za: Yesu ri lhid' khoug: moo khe: yu boem . Hau: thang: daso' ri nyangnu" ju" nau da" gyid yam moo yo" dab , lo" boem bye .
43006022	Thang: nyid ri gyid thoem" thei: tab' moo deing nyid kho' da" Byu phung: moo" yi gi hau: joyoo moo lhid' dakhyab kyeing" date: jo , ziri myid boin: ago" . Hau: da" lhid' moo Aseing Yesu abo loo loo: za: Cangzoo: yi boug" zhoung: lo" zi boin: so" boem .
43006023	Nghoid sho , loug we-Tiberi voo mo lo da lhid joem gi Aseing Yesu da Jeju" ri coung" nghei lho:-Byu phung: yi ri zooyho , gam , zho" da jo , yoo nam moo-ju" lo" abye: go" .
43006024	Byu Phung: moo" yi gi hau: joyoo moo Aseing: Yesu nghoid loug we' nya: cangzoo: yi abo nyid ziri se' boem wigi hau: da" lhid' joem moo do , lho: wigi Yesu ri shoo: wa shid' re" Kaperna-um voo khyoo: gu: lo" boem ago" .
43006025	Gyid thoem" thei: tab' moo Aseing Yesu ri myang boem lang" gi Byu phung: moo" yi gi Sara: moo" we" - nang gi hid: tab' moo khanham jure" lha" » ga: myid: boem .
43006026	Aseing Yesu gi deing" deing ngoo nanu" ri tid ba - Nanu" ngoori cang sho: da" khyoo: gi Ngoo koid ; shug da" mau" pho" moozoo" ri se' gyoo: yoomo anghoid . Voem: ri gyi" sho' shug zoo: yoomo danghoid ago" .
43006027	Boeb' yoin" loo" se' da" zoo: noem shid' re" yoem: akaid goo . Apyaid ato: kangso' yoo" nhang: da" aboeb ayoin" loo" se' da" zoo: noem shid' re" yoem: dakaid nyid ge' . 43006028	Byu yi gi Ngoonu" phoo Mang" soo: vho: da" khyoo: ri yo" voin vu , wa shid' re" khasu" koid ; wa lha" » ga: myid: boem .
43006029	Yesu phougtu" zigi Phoo Mangsoo nanu" ri koid ; nhang: nau da" khyoo: gi nyang: nhang: kaid su: ri loem" jeing" wa da" khyoo: nghoid .
43006030	Houg: bang: gi Yesu ri ngoonu" yo" loem" jeing" loo wa shid' re" Ce: noem da" mau" pho" moo" ri pya shug wa lha" . Aseing: ce: moo" ri nang zei: shug wa lha" .
43006031	Ngoonu" da" phoug" phyid" yi gi Jhoem: dang: moo tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - - dain" pyoid yoo moo Mana , zooyho' ri nyang: khyoo: zhoo" bye .
43006032	Yesu gi deing" deing nanu" ri ngoo tid ba-Moshe gi nanu" ri mougkhung: mo zooyho' ri byid: zi anghoid . Nga" phoo gi nanu" ri mougkhung: mo zooyho' amain" agyeing" ri byid .
43006033	Hau: da" main" gyeing" da" zooyho' gi Mougkhung: mo gyoo" lo lho: mougmyid xangsu: byu yi ri kangso' dei loo nhang: su: nyang: nghoid bye .
43006034	Houg: lang" nyangnu" gi Aseing: we" hau: zooyho' ngoonu" ri Khanham we' dabyid: nyid we' ga: doem mho' ago" .
43006035	Yesu gi ngoo gi Kangso' zooyho' nghoid . Nga" jhang ri" su: gi Khanham we' zooyoid zi shau" loo wa anghoid . Ngoori loem" jeing" su: we' khanham we' gyid shed' zi shau" loo: wa anghoid ga: wigi tid .
43006036	Akhid" nanu" ri tid ba - Nanu" gi ngoori myang bye: nghoid loug we' loem" jeing" boem wa zi anghoid .
43006037	Phoo Mangsoo ngoori ab byid: to" da" byu dangain" gi Nga" jang" moo ju" loo wa . Nga" jang" moo ju" loo mo , ri ngoo she: lhei" pyam wa zi anghoid .
43006038	Khasu" wim gari ngoo gi ngoo nya: myid khyo" voin vu , wa shid' re" mougkhung: khyo" gyoo" lo zi anghoid . Ngoori nhang: kaid su: Aseing: vho: khyo" zei: voin vu , wa shid' re" gyoo" lo zi danghoid .
43006039	Ngoori nhang: kaid da" Aseing: vho: da" khyoo: gi nyang: ab byid: to" da" xangsu: byu yi bain sho' gi dayug we' asoem" joem: loo" sho' lo" thang da" bidnyid rishid: jang" mo - Ngoo doem dei to'' loo nhang: wa khyoo: nghoid .
43006040	Khasu" wim gari nya: zoo: ri Noku loem: jeing" loo mo , dangain" gi Apyaid' ato: kangso' ri yo" yu wa shid' re" Nga" phoo gi vho: nyid . Ngoo we' houg: bang: ri lo" thang bidnyid moo shid: jang mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: wa zi nghoid .
43006041	Yesu gi Ngoo gi mougkhung: mo gyoo" lo da" zooyho' nghoid ga: tid yoomo hau: byu yi gi nya: khyoo: ri ngeig go" lo" boem bye .
43006042	Nyangnu" tid da" zigi He: yug gi Yoseb da" nya: zoo: Yesu anghoid la" . Nya: myhi' yo' nya: phoo ri ngoonu" se' - anghoid goo" la" . Houg: su" nghoid ri ci: yoomo ngoo gi mougkhung: mo gyoo" lo ga: tid nyid lha" » ga: tid go" nyid boem .
43006043	Yesu phougtu" zigi noo: ge' nanu" nyang: cang" nyang: angeig go" nyid goo .
43006044	Ngoori nhang: kaid da" phoo Mangso wigi amhoid" shu" lo rigi hang" we' nga" jang" moo ayo" loo . Nga" jhang ju" loo su: ri ngoo gi lo" thang da" bidnyid moo shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: wa .
43006045	Lapi: yi da" jhoem: dang: moo Houg: bang: dangain" gi Mangso da" jhoug" myeing" jhoug" thui: ri kham: yu boem wa ga: bo . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo Phoo Mangso da" jhoug" myeing" ri shau" gyo: lho: phoo jang" mo , thung" lid kham: yu mo , dangain" gi nga" jang" moo jure" boem bye .

43006048	Ngoo gi kangso' zoo yho' nghoid .

43006053	Aseing Yesu gi deing" deing ngoo nanu" ri tid zigi Byu nya: zoo: da" shoo" ri nanu" azoo: - nya: da" suid" ri we' ashug nghoid rigi nanu" gi kangso' yoo" wa zi anghoid .
43006054	Nga" da shoo" rizo: lho: nga" da suid" ri shug su: gi-apyaid ato: kang: so' yoo" bye . Ngoo we lo" thang da bidnyid moo-hau: yug ri shid: jo , jang" mo doem dei loo nhang: wa .
43006055	Nga" da" shoo" gi zoo: noem agyeing" nyang: nghoid bye . Nga" da" suid" we' shug phoo" agyeing" nyang: nghoid bye .
43006056	Nga" da" shoo" ri zo: lho: nga" da" suid" ri shug su: gi ngoo yo" dadeing: daloem: za: nyid su: nghoid . Ngoo we' hau: yug yo" dadeing: daloem: za: nyid wa zi nghoid .

43006069	Hau: tho' mo gootu: Aseing: gi Phoo Mangso jang" mo gyoo" lo da" gyeungshang: Aseing: nyang: nghoid bye: da" khyoo: ri akhid" ngoonu" gi yu" myang loem" jeing boem bye: ga: phougtu .

43006071	Simun Iskarud da" nya: zoo: - Yuda gi cangzoo: daxe: eig yug moo boo nghoid loug we' Aseing: ri gyivoo yi lo , moo ab pyam wa su: nghoid yoomo hau: yug ri yeing lho: hid: su" ga: tid zi nghoid .
43007001	Hau: thang: ri Aseing Yesu gi Galile mung" moo daso' so" koem" lheing: yen . Yuda zoug: myeing" ci: mo , gi Yesu ri said pyam wa ga: soin' go" nyid yoomo Yesu gi Yuda mung" moo aso" koem" yen" noug .
43007002	Yuda byumyu" yi da" seig kyang: zoem loung" da" pui" we' jhang loo bye .

43007012	Byu phung: moo" yi gi Yesu yo" sen: lho: so' so' ga: gau" doem go" nyid boem . Byu dayham" bang: gi he: yug gi byu gi nyang: danghoid ga: tid go" nyid boem . Dayham" tid nyid zigi byu gi anghoid mung" byu yi ri khyoo: shu" vhang: loo" su: danghoid ga: tid go" nyid .

43007015	Yuda zoug: myeing" ci: mo , gi gye" mau" nyid boem lho: He: yug gi khayoo: ce: jung we' ado , yu" zi Hid: te" phajhi" gi khayo , yu lha" » ga: tid moug" go" nyid .
43007016	Aseing Yesu phougtu" zigi Ngoo kho" kyo" jhoug" byid: da" tarha" mungdang: gi nga" tarha" anghoid ngoori nhang: kaid su: - Mangso da" tarha" dangoid .
43007017	Hau: Mangsoo: vho: da" khyoo: moo cang loo" noug: su: gi Ngoo kho" kyo" da" tarha" gi Mangso da" tarha" nghoid la" . Ngoo nya: vho: da" nga" tarha" nghoid la" » ga: zigi se' soin: myed yu" boem wa .
43007018	Nyang: nya: da" Tarha" ri kho" kyo" jhoug" byid: su: gi nyang: nya: da" myonhoo: ngeilang: ri shoo: wa nghoid . Nghoidsho' loug we' nyang: ri nhang: kaid su: da" myonhoo: ngeilang: ri shoo: su: gi deing: deing: main" main" se' kho" kyo . lho: nyang: moo mhau' fain" zi aboo .
43007019	Moshe gi nanu" ri tarha" byid: to" anghoid goo" la" . Nghoidloug nanu" dayug we' hau: tarha" ri acang boem . Nanu" gi ngoori said pyam wa shid' re" cikoid ; sho: nyid go" - ga: myid .
43007020	Meing: byu: yi gi nang gi yu vang ci: su: nghoid . Nang ri said wa ga: hang" su: se' soin nyid wa ga: tid boem .
43007021	Yesu phougtu" zigi Ngoo mau" pho" moo" daja: koid ; shug lang" gi nanu" dangain" mo , gye mau" lo" ago" -
43007022	Moshe gi nanu" da" zooshang: mi" ri athang: yham" pyam wa da" tarha" byid: to" . Houg: yoomo nanu" gi Dougno: Bidnyid ri lang" athang: yham" da" moo" ri koid ; boem ago" . 43007023	Houg: su" nghoid lang" gi zooshang: dayug yug ri Dougno: Bidnyid moo shooyid thang: yham" byid: ri Moshe da" tarha" ri ashoid ga: nanu" myid: ago" . 43007024	Atho' pyam: mo da" akhyoo" again ri za: yu" lho: dang: aphyed goo . Deung main" da" khyoo" khyo" dang: daphyed ge ga: tid .
43007025	Yerusalem mo , voo byu yi dayham" gi He: yug gi zoug: myeing" ci: mo , said pyam wa sho: nyid su: anghoid la" .
43007026	Yu" ge' nyang: gi bang bang kho" kyo" nyid da" hang" dayug we' nyang: ri atoem boem nhung: lha" . He: yug gi Meshia nghoid zi zoug: myeing" ci: mo , gi gyeing" nyang: se' boem bye: go" la" . Nghoidloug we' he: yug kha: moug: mo , nyid lo zi ngoonu" se .
43007027	Nghoidloug we' Meshia gyoo" lo nghoid ri koem gi nya: ayang: ri hang" we' si' zi anghoid .
43007028	Yesu gi no ku" yhoem moo" moo tid zigi Nanu" ngoori se' boem go" la" . Ngoo khayo , re" ziri we' se' boem bye . Nghoidloug we' ngoo gi ngoo nyang: vho: khyo" re" zi anghoid .
