43007031	Meing: byu yi da" akhoug: mo Nyang: ri loem" jeing" mo , myoo" sho' gi Meshia gyoo" lo da" uri he: youg tho' moo mau" pho" khyoo: je yo" koid ; shug wa la" » ga: myid: ago" .
43007032	Houg: su" Yesu da" khyoo: ri Meing: byu yi so' so' ga: doem go" nyid khyoo: ri Pharishe shau" gyo: boem . Houg: yoomo nyangnu" yo" khainjung agyi yi gi zung" lhug: nyid da" pyada: yi dayham" ri Yesu ri myheig wa shid' re" nhang: kaid boem .
43007033	Aseing Yesu tid zigi Ngoo gi nanu" yo" daso' za: byam nyid lho: Ngoori nhang: kaid da" Aseing: jhang khyoo: doem loo" wa su: nghoid .
43007034	Nanu" gi ngoori cang shoo: nghoid loug we' myang zi anghoid . Khasu" wim gari ngoo nyid wa joyoo moo nanu" yo" ju" zi we' anghoid ga: tid .
43007035	Yuda zoug: myeing" ci: mo , gi ngoonu" ashau" shoo: sho' nyang: kha: moug: khyoo: loo" wa la' - Yuda byumyu" yi nyid da" Greed voo gung yi moo lo" lho: Greed byumyu" yi ri jhau" mhoo , byid: wa la" .
43007036	Nyang: gi Nanu" ngoori shoo: nghoid loug myang zi anghoid . Ngoo nyid wa joyoo moo nanu" ayo" ju" boem ga: tid . He: da" dangkang: gi ce: noem nghoid lha" » ga: nyang: cang" nyang: myid go" nyid boem .
43007037	Hau: pui" zeing: da" lo" thang ziyo' - yhoug gyen: tang da" bidnyid moo Aseing: Yesu gi yab jo , lho: nyang tid zigi Gyid shed' su: hang" nghoid loug we' nga" jang" mo re" shug yu ge' .
43007038	Ngoori loem" jeung" sugi jhoem: mungdang: moo bo ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nya: da" nheigloem: khoug: mo we' dei kangso' gyid gyung: joem myoo" sho' yau thu' lo nyid wa zi nghoid .
43007039	Aseing Yesu hid: su" tid da" zigi Nyang: ri loem" jeing" mo , yo" yu wa da" gyeungshang: venyi da khyoo" ri tid zi nghoid . Nghoidsho' loug we' Yesu gi Myo , nhoo: phung" yoeb' ri ayo" yu shi" - houg yomoo gyeing shang Venyi: ri abyid: shi" zi nghoid .
43007040	Meing: byu yi mo dayham" gi Yesu hid: su" tid da" khyoo: ri shau" gyo: boem . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo he yug gi Deing" deing Lapi: nghoid ga: tid boem .
43007041	Dayham" bang: tid zigi Meshia nyang: nghoid ga: tid boem . Nghoidloug we' dayham" bang: gi Meshia gi Galile mung" mo thu' loo wa zi anghoid .
43007042	Meshia gi David da" nya: myid nya: zoo: nghoid ca" ga: wigi we' David nyid khare" da" Bedlehem mo po" thu' loo wa ga: wigi we' Jhoem: dang: moo bo ga: wigi we' tid go" nyid boem da .
43007043	Houg: nghoid yoomo Yesu yo" sen: lho: wigi Meing: byu yi gi nheigloem: azhung" goo" loo nyid boem ago" .
43007044	Byu dayham" bang: gi Yesu ri myheig noug: nghoid loug we' Hang" we' nyang: ri adab zei: boem nghoid ago" .
43007045	Zung" lhoug: da" pyada: yi gi Khainjung agyi yi yo , Pharishe yi jhang khyoo: doem lo da" uri nyangnu" gi ci: wim wigi hau: yug ri amyheig ci: loo go" ga: lhoem: myid: boem .
43007046	Zung" lhug da" pyada: yi gi He: yug kho" kyo" yhangti" - hang" dayug we' akho" kyo" yu" ga: lo tid boem .
43007047	Pharishe gi « Nanu" we' nyang: mhau' da" khyoo: ri kham: zoo: bye: go" rhe" » ga: tid boem .
43007048	« Ngoonu" da" vhu" jhung: yi Pharishe bang: da" akhoug" mo , dayug we' hau: yug ri loem" jeing" yu" zi nanu" si' go" la" .
43007049	He: mung" byu phung: yi gi Toung: to" da" tarha" ri asi yoomo Mangsoo shen" yhen zi shau" boem bye: nhung: lha" . » ga: wigi tid boem .
43007050	Houg: bang: da" akhoug: moo Nikodi ga: su: bo - Nyang: gi xang: shed" ri Aseing Yesu jhang re" yu" bye: zi goo" ji ri tid kyo .
43007051	Nikodi gi « Ngoonu" da" tarha" khyo" ce: moo" ri shoid da" khyoo: ri kyeung yu zi akoid . Tarha" shoid su: ri tid nyheing tid feing wa akhang" - we abyid: - loo: za: dayug yug ri tarha" dang: phyed' yu" la" . » ga: tid .
43007052	Houg: bang: gi « Nang we' Galile mung" mo byu nghoid la" . Jhoem: mungdang: moo nghab' yu" we' Galile mung" mo ce: lapi: dayug we' athu' lo yu" zigi nang si' ca" » ga: tid boem .
43007053	( Houg: lang" nyangnu" dangain" bang: gi nyang: nu" nya: yhoem: khyoo: lo" byug boem bye . )
43008001	( Hau: thang: ri nyangnu" gi nyang: tu: nya: yhoem: khyoo: yug khang" moo" lo" boem . Aseing: Yesu gi zhainlun boem khyoo: yhe: lo .
43008002	Hau: thang: nab kyoo ri no ku" yhoem moo" moo dalheing: dam ju" lo" da" uri byu myoo" sho' mo , gi Aseing: jang" moo re" lheung khoem byid ago" . Yesu gi: zhoung: jo , lho: houg: bang: ri jhoug" byid: nyid .
43008003	Tarha" sara: yi yo" - Pharishe bi: gi myiyi: dayug ri Yesu jang" moo khe: shu" re . Hau: yug gi soem" lid shoo: go" nyid jang" mo shau" myheug da" myiyi: nghoid . Tarha" sara: yi yo" - Pharishe gi-hau: myiyi: ridangain" mo , da" shid' khoin" moo yab jo , nhang: lho:
43008004	Aseing Yesu ri Sara: we" - He: myiyi: gi soem" lid shoo: go" nyid jang" mo - myo , moo gyo , nyang: shau" myheug boem bye .
43008005	Moshe tarha" moo sang: to" zigi hid: yhangti" myiyi: rigi-luggo , wigi du" said pyam ca" - ga: ngoonu" ri tarha" byid: to . Yesu ri nang khasu" tid noug: la" » ga: myid: boem .
43008006	Nyangnu" gi Yesu ri yooboo zhug lho: myheig wa shid' re . Pyi: sho: nyid boem . Nghoidloug we' Aseing Yesu gi goeb' ci: lho: myidjang: moo lo , nyhau" wigi thau" lhid" nyid .
43008007	Houg: bang: gi doem phoug myid myid koid ; nyid boem . Houg: lang" Yesu gi to' yu" kaid lho: Nanu" mo ce: yooboo adab su: gi nyang: ri luggo , yo" xang: shed" du" ge' ga: amyeing" byid: kaid .
43008008	Hau: lho: myidjang: moodoem goeb lho: thau" lhid" nyid .
43008009	Houg: bang: gi Hau da" amyeing" ri shaug" gyoo: lang" gi apyaid' je gyi: mo , mo shi" - dayoug thang: moo dayug - thu' lo" byug boem ago" . Yesu yo" houg moo yab jo , da" myiyi: myhi za: date: nyid lo .
43008010	Yesu gi doem lheing: yu kaid lho: myiyi: myhi nang we" - houg: bang: gi khayoo: lo ? Nang ri yooboo dam: byid wa mo , dayug we' anyid loo: rhe" ga: myid .
43008011	Houg: lang" hau: da" myiyi: gi Aseing: we" dayug we' azheung: nyid khari" loo: - ga: phougtu . ‹ ‹ Yesu gi Ngoo we' nang ri yooboo dam abyid: loo" we' yooboo adoem koid loo: lhe" ga: tid kaid . »
43008012	Dalheing: ri Yesu gi hparishe yi ri ngoo gi mougmyid: bidbang nghoid . Nga" thang: moo cang loo su: gi apyaid' ato: kangso' bidbang ri yo" yu lho: moug: coid' khoug: moo khanham we' asoo" loo: wa zi nghoid . ga: tid .
43008013	Pharishe yi gi nang gi na nya: khyoo: nanyang: sagsi: kham: nyid . Houg: yoomo re" da" sagsi: dang: gi adeung ga: tid nyid boem .
43008014	Yesu phougtu" zigi ngoo nya: khyoo: ri ngoo sagsi: kham: nghoid loug we' nga" sagsi: dang: gi deung main" nyid . Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoo gi khayo , re" lho: kha: khyoo: doem yhe: lo" nyid zi ngoo se' nyid . Nanu" gi ngoo khayo , re" ziri we' kha: joyoo khyoo: doem yhe: lo" nyid ziri we' ase' boem .
43008015	Nanu" gi byu da" akhyoo" khyo" dang: phyed' boem - Ngoo gi hang" ri we' aca: joeb - dang: aphyed .
43008016	Nghoid loug ngoo gyeing" nyang: dato' jeyang: dang: phyed' nghoid rigi ngoo dayug kyeing dang: phyed' zi anghoid . Ngoori nhang: kaid da" phoo Mangsoo gi ngoo yo" dage" nyid yoomo ngoo je: yang: dang: phyed' khyoo: gi deung main" nyid .
43008017	Nanu" da" tarha" moo lhid" to" jang" moo Sagsi: eig yug joeb lang" gi deung main" bye: ga: tid to .
43008018	Ngoo gi ngoo nya: khyoo: ri sagsi: kham lho: . Ngoo ri nhang: kaid da" Pho we' nga" da" khyoo: ri sagsi: kham: byid: nyid ga: tid .
43008019	Houg: bang: gi Re" Phoo khayoo: nyid ga: myid: boem . ‹ ‹ Nanu" gi ngoori we' nga" Phoo ri we' ase' boem . gyeing" nyang: nanu" ngoori se' nghoid rigi nga" phoo ri we' si' goo" zi nghoid ga: doem sho' kyoo . »
43008020	Yesu gi He: da" Mungdang: ri-no ku" yhoem: moo" khoug: Alu: kham: da" sadeig to" yab moo kho" kyo" jhoug" byid: uri tid da" mungdang: nghoid nyid . Nghoidsho' loug we' Yesu da" ayo , aju" shi" yoomo hang" we' Yesu ri amyheig atei" shi .
43008021	Dalheing: riYesu gi ngoo gi thu' loo" wam: bye . Nanu" gi ngoori shoo: boem wa . Nanu" gi nanu" nya: yooboo mo , shid: boem wa . Ngoo lo" da" joyoo moo nanu" ayo" cang loo wa" ga: tid .
43008022	Yuda zoug: myeing: ci: mo , gi ngoo lo" da" joyoo moo Nanu" ayo" loo" ga: nyang: tid bye . Nyang: gi nya: gung nyang: said' shid: wa ga la lha" » ga: tid go" nyid boem .
43008023	Yesu phougtu" zigi nanu" gi mougmyid mo byu yi nghoid . Nghoidloug we' ngoo gi mougkhung: khyo" ri" su: nghoid . Nanu" gi he: mougmyid mo byu nu" yi nghoid boem . Ngoo koem gi he: mougmyid mo byu anghoid .
43008024	Houg: yoomo nanu" gi nanu" da" yooboo moo shid: lo" boem wa ein: wigi ngoo tid bye . Ngoo gi ngoo nghoid nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - - ngoo nghoid ziri nanu" aloem" boem rigi Nanu" gi nanu" nya: yooboo moo shid: lo" boem wam bye . ga: tid .
43008025	Houg: bang: gi nang gi hang" nghoid ga: myid: boem . Yesu gi Ngoo hang" nghoid zi xang: shid" mo nyang: ngoo tid kyoo" bye .
43008026	Nanu" da" khyoo: yo" sen: lho: ngoo tid kyoo" ca" da" khyoo: soo" soo" bo . Nanu" ri yooboo foin: wa khyoo: we' myoo" sho' bo . Ngoori nhang: kaid da" Aseing: gi dang main" da" Aseing: danghoid . Hau: Aseing: jang" mo ngoo shau" gyo: da" khyoo: ri za: he: mougmyid byu yi ri ngoo tid kyo .
43008027	Yesu gi nya: pho da" khyoo: tid nyid ziri houg: bang: gi ase' gyoo .
43008028	Houg: yoomo Yesu gi byu nya: zoo: ri myidjang: moo tu: zhug lhang" too" lang" she - ngoo gi hang" nghoid nyid ziri nanu" yo" si' zi nghoid . Ngoo gi ngoo ngoonya: amyeing" akhang" khyo" ce: moo" we azei: - Nga" phoo nhang: kaid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - za: ngoo dazei: ziri we' nanu" se' loo wa .
43008029	Hau: tho' moo gootu: Ngoori nhang: kaid su" gi ngoo yo" dage" nyid . Hau: yug vho: da" moozoo" ri ngoo gi ayo , bain sho' moo zei: nyid wigi hau: Aseing: gi ngoo nyang: kyeing" ri ashe: lhei" too ga: tid kyo .
43008030	Hid: su" ga: tid da" dang: ri shau" gyo: da" byu myoo" sho' mo nyang: - Yesu ri loem" jeing" lo boem ago" .
43008031	Aseing Yesu gi nyang ri loem" jeing" loo mo , ri Nanu" gi ngoo jhoug" byid: khyo" cang zei: loo" lang" gi nga" da" cangzoo: agyeing" yi nghoid bye .
43008032	Nanu" gi deungmain" da" zi ri we' ci: wa . Hau: deungmain" da" zi gi nanu" ri lhoid pyoin kaid wa zi nghoid ga: tid .
43008033	Hau: da" byu yi gi Ngoonu" gi Abraham da" nya: myid nya: zoo: yi nghoid . Khanham we' sube" join , abue" yu" boem - Nanu" ri lhoid pyoin kaid wa ein: nang ci: koid ; tid ga: myid boem .
43008034	Aseing Yesu nyangnu" ri tid zigi Deing" deing nanu" ri ngoo tid ba - Yooboo shoid vhang: mo , dangain" gi yooboo da" join , nghoid .
43008035	Join , gi hau: ikoin deungkhu: daloem: moo pyaid goin" nyid zi anghoid nghoid loug nya: zoo: nghoid su: gi hau: deungkhu: moo khanham we' danyid nyid wa nghoid .
43008036	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nya: zoo: gi nanu" ri loid byoin nhang: nghoid rigi nanu" deing" deing loid byoin loo" wa .
43008037	Nanu" gi Abraham nya: myid: nya: zoo: nghoid zi ngoo se' - Houg: su" nghoid loug we' nanu" gi nga" da" jhoug" myeing" ri akham: yu noug: yoomo ngoori said wa ga: yoem: kaid nyid boem .
43008038	Ngoo gi nga" pho , jang" mo , yo" se' yu gu: dangain" - nanu" ri tid kyoo" bye: houg: nghoid loug we' nanu" gi nanu" da" nya: phoo tid ziri za: da cang nyid ago" .
43008039	Nyang: nu" phougtu zigi ngoonu" dangain" mo , nya: phoo gi Abraham nghoid ga: tid boem . Aseing Yesu gi Nanu" gi Abraham da" nya: myid nya: zoo: yi nghoid boem rigi Abraham yhangti" koid ; boem zi nghoid .
43008040	Mangso jang" mo shau" gyo: yu da" deingmain" da" moo ri nanu" ri kho" kyoo" nghoid loug ngoori - said wa shid' re" nanu" yoem kaid nyid ago" . Abraham gi houg su" alhoung koid' .
43008041	Nanu" gi nanu" da" nya: phoo nyang: yhangti" koid ; nyid boem ga: Yesu tid . nyangnu" doem phoug tid zigi ngoonu" moo Mangsoo ga: da" phoo dayug kyeing" date: nyid lho . Ngoonu" we' nya: zoo: gyeing" yi nyang: nghoid bye: ga: tid .
43008042	Yesu nyangnu" ri doem tid zigi Mangsoo gi nanu" da" nya: phoo gyeing" nghoid rigi nanu" ngoori jheddab goo" wa . Khasu" wimgari ngoo gi Mangso jang" mo gyoo" lo lho: akhid" hid: moo re" ju" nyid . Ngoo nyang: vho: khyo" re" zi anghoid . Phoo Mangsoo gi ngoori nhang: kaid .
43008043	Ngoo tid ziri nanu" ci: wim ase' gyoo: go . Nanu" moo nga" da" mungdang: ri gyo: yu wa nheigloem: nyang: aboo yoomo nghoid boem ago" .
43008044	Nanu" gi nya: phoo yu satan da" nya: zoo: nghoid yoomo nanu" nya: phoo vho: da" khyoo: moo cang koid ; nyid boem . satan gi xang: shid" mo nyang: byu said da" sarhi' nyang: nghoid . Nyang: moo deingmain" zi ci" we' aboo nghoid yoomo deung main" ziri asi - se' mhau' fain" su: nghoid . Nyang: gi mhoug mo , dangain" da" nya: phoo nghoid yoomo nya: void voo: yo' dakhyoo" ti" mhoug nyid .
43008045	Nghoid loug Ngoo gi deung main" da" dang: ri za: tid ri ngoori ci: wim aloem" jeing" go" -
43008046	Ngoo gi yooboo yoo" su: nghoid ein: - hang" sagsi: yo" shoo go" ngoo gi deung main" da" dang: ri za: da tid ri nanu" ci: wim - aloem" jeing" go" .
43008047	Mangso jhang" mo ju" ri" su: gi Mangso da" dang: ri tam" gyo: nyid nghoid loug nanu" gi Mangso jang" mo anghoid boem yoomo atam" gyo: zi nghoid ago" .
43008048	Nyangnu" Yesu ri Nang gi Samari byumyu" dayug nghoid lho: yu vang ci: su: nghoid ga: wigi ngoonu" tid dang: shoid la" » ga: myid: boem .
43008049	Yesu phougtu" zigi ngoo gi yu vang ci: su: anghoid . Ngoo gi nga" phoo ri phau" myang: nghoid loug we' nanu" gi ngoori aphoug" amyang .
43008050	Ngoo gi ngoo nya: myonhoo: ri ngoo ashoo: nghoid loug dayug su: gi nga" da" myonhoo: ri shoo: byid: lho: nga" shoid khyoo: dang: phyed' byid: nyid .
43008051	Deing" deing nanu" ri ngoo tid ba - Nga" da" jhoug" myeing" dang: ri tam" gyo: yu su: gi khanham we' shid: wa zi anghoid ga: tid .
43008052	Nyangnu" gi nang gi yu vang ci: su: dayug nghoid da" khyoo: ri akhid" ngoonu" yo" si' bye . Abraham gi shid: led: loo" bye: - Lapi: yi we' shid: led: loo" bye . Houg: su" danghoid ri nang gi nga" dang: tam" gyo: yu su: gi khanham we ashid: wa ga: tid .
43008053	Ngoonu" da" phoo Abraham gi shid: led: loo" bye . Abraham tho' moo nang gi je gyi: la" . Abraham tho' je gyi: ein: atid Lapi: yi we' shid: led: lo" boem bye: - nang gi na nya: gung ri hang" nghoid ein: myid nyid la" » ga: zheing: myid: boem .
43008054	Yesu phougtu" zigi Ngoo gi ngoo nya: gung ri coung" nghei nyid rigi nga" myonhoo: ngeilang: gi akoem: za danghoid wa . Ngoo ri coung" byid: su: gi nanu" lhoung: tid da" nanu" da" Mangsoo ga: su: nga" phoo danghoid .
43008055	Hau: da" Mangsoo ri nanu" ase' boem . Nghoid loug ngoo koem gi se - gyeing" nyang: ngoo asi ein: tid nghoid rigi ngoo gi nanu" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - - mhoug su: bue" loo" wa . Ngoo gi phoo ri gyeing" gyeing" si' yoomo nya: da" dang: ri tam" gyo: nyid .
43008056	Nanu" da" nya: phoo Abraham gi ngoo ju" ri" wa da" ayo , ri shau" myang wa ziri myed nyid . Hau: ziri nyang: shau" myang yoomo tid loo a ung: gau yi nyid bye .
43008057	Nyangnu" gi nyang: ri Nang gi apyaid' wim: xi: zain: lang" aboo shi" - khasu" koid ; wigi Abraham ri myang yu" wa lha" ga: tid boem .
43008058	Yesu doem phougtu" zigi Deing" deing nanu" ri ngoo tid ba - Abraham akhu: ri" shi" mo ngoo nyid nyid bye: ga: tid .
43008059	Houg: lang" nyangnu" gi Yesu ri du" wa ga: luggo , joem: ri koid: zei: ci: boem . Nghoidloug we' Yesu gi no ku" yhoem moo" khoug: mo gau" lheing thu' lo" byug .
43009001	Yesu khyoo: so" lo" nyid da" uri nya: myhi' ung: khoug: mo , myo , amyang da" su: dayug ri shau" myang .
43009002	Cangzoo: yi: gi sara: we" - he: yug myo , amyang zigi hang" yooboo nghoid la" . nya: yooboo yoo mo nghoid la" . nya: myhi' nya: pho , yooboo yoo mo nghoid la" » ga: zheing: myid: boem .
43009003	Aseing Yesu phougtu" zigi Nya: yooboo mo we' anghoid . Nya: myhi' nya: pho , yooboo mo we' anghoid . Mangso: da" phung" yoeb nyang: mo bang thu' loo nhang wa yoomo nghoid .
43009004	Ngoori nhang: kaid su: da" moo" ri nyid" ayo nghoid shi" ri ngoonu" koid ; wa zi nghoid . Hang" we ce" moo" we' ayo" zei: lo da" myen" ayo , gi ju" loo wa .
43009005	Ngoo gi he: mougmyid moo nyid shi" uri mougmyid shid' mo bidbang nghoid ga: tid .
43009006	Houg: su" ga: bain tid thang: ri Yesu gi myidjang: moo shikain" byi" teig lho: thoem" boeb' koid: yu wigi myo , amyang su: da" myojid" moo joid' byid: lho:
43009007	Loo" we' Silon gyid thoem" moo myo , lo" cid" we' ga: tid kaid . ( Silon ga: dangkang: gi nhang: kaid shau" bye: ga: zi nghoid . ) Hau: yug we' lo" wigi myo , lo" cid" lho: myo , myang lo ziyo' doem tau" lo .
43009008	Nyang: gi mo: phyi: nghoid yoomo akhang: re nyang: ri lhoung myang nyid da" yhoem: kyoo" cang" yi gi he: yug gi zhoung: jo , lho: ngei lhoung: mho' nyid su: anghoid la" » ga: myid go" nyid .
43009009	Byu dayham" gi nghoid ga: wigi we dayham" gi hau: yug anghoid hau: yug yo' du goo" su: dayug nghoid ga: wigi we tid ago" . Houg: loug we' hau: yug nyang: tid zigi ngoo gi hau: yug nyang: nghoid bye › › ga: tid .
43009010	Byu yi gi Akhid" nang myo , khasu" wim doem myang lo lha" » ga: myid nyid boem .
43009011	Hau: yug gi Yesu ga: su: thoem" boeb' dajhi' koid: yu lho: nga" myojid" moo joid byid: wigi ngoori Silon gyid thoem" moo myo , cid" nhang: kaid . Houg: yoomo ngoo lo" wigi myo , cid" lang" su' - myo , doem myang lo . ga: tid kyo .
43009012	Byu yi gi hau: yug akhid" khayoo" nyid ga: myid boem . ‹ ‹ Nyang: gi ngoo asi ga: doem tid . »
43009013	Byu yi gi shid' phyang" myo , amyang su: ri Pharishe yi jhang khyoo: khe: shu" yhe: lo" boem .
43009014	Yesu thoem" boeb' koid: yu lho: hau: yug ri myo , myang loo nhang: da" bidnyid gi Yuda Dougno: Bidnyid nghoid .
43009015	Pharishe yi gi hau: yug myo , myang lo da" khyoo: ri doem: myid: boem . Hau: yug gi nyang: gi nga" myojid" moo thoem" boeb' joid byid . Hau: thang: ri ngoo myo , yhe: cid" lang" akhid" ngoo myang lo ga: tid kyo .
43009016	Pharishe dayham" gi hau: yug Dougno: Bidnyid tarha" ri acang yoomo Mangso jang" mo gyoo" loo su: age bui" ga: tid ago" . Gootu: dayham" gi Yooboo dashoid vhang: nyid su: gi khasu" wim wigi hid: yhang: ti" tid boem . Hid: su" nghoid yoomo houg: bang: gi myid azhung" goo" loo: nyid boem .
43009017	Houg: yoomo Pharishe yi gi Myo , amyang nyid led: loo su: ri nang ri myo , myang loo nhang: su: gi kha yhang te" su: nghoid ga: doem zheing: myid: sho: boem . ‹ ‹ Hau: yug gi lapi: dayug nghoid ga: doem phoid: kyo . »
43009018	Nyhoid' loug we' Yuda zoug: myeing" ci: mo , gi akhang: re hau: yug myo , amyang wim lid: lo da" khyoo: ri we' akhuid myo , myang lo zi: ri nyangnu" aloem" jeing" yoomo nya: myhi' phoo yi ri khe: myid: yu ago" .
43009019	Nyangnu" gi he: yug gi nanu" da" nya: zoo: anghoid goo" la" . nanu" tid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - - ung: khoug: mo nyang: myo , amyang zi nghoid la" . Houg: su" nghoid ri ciwim wigi akhid" myo , myang la" » ga: zheing: myid: boem .
43009020	Nya: myhi' phoo yi gi He: yug gi ngoonu" nya: zoo: nghoid . Ung: khoug: mo nyang: myo , amyang gu khu: re" zi ri ngoo nu" se .
43009021	Nghoidloug we' khasu: wigi myo , myang lo zi ngoonu" asi . Nyang: ri hang" wigi myo , myang loo: nhang: zi ngoonu" asi . Nyang: gi nheig boo bye . Nyang: ri myid: yu" ge' . nya: khyoo: ri nyang: yo" tid kyoo" wa ga: phoid: kyo" boem .
43009022	Hid: su" ga: phoid: kyo" zigi Yuda zoug: myeing" ci: mo , ri gyoug yoomo nghoid . Aseing: ri Meshia nghoid ga: loem" jeing" mo , bain sho' ri Tarha" jung: mo khaid thu' wa ga: Yuda zoug: yi sham: phyid' go" too" bye .
43009023	Houg: yoomo myhi , phoo yi gi nyang: nheig boo bye: nyang: ri myid: yu" ge' ga: tid zi nghoid .
43009024	Pharishe yi gi myo , amyang wim led: lo yu" su: ri eig lheing: ga: lheing: doem khe: lho: Mangso da" shid' khoin" moo nghoid main" da" dang: ri tid we' jham' tang: we' nang ri myo , myang loo nhang: su: gi yooboo dab , su nghoid zi ngoonu" se' bye: ga: doem tid boem .
43009025	Hau: yug gi he: yug yooboo dab su: nghoid anghoid zi ngoo asi - ngoo gi goonham , mo myo , jed' nghoid loug we' akhid" gi ngoo myo , myang bye: - houg: za: ngoo date: se' ga: tid .
43009026	Houg: bang: gi nyang: gi nang ri khasu" koid re" myojid" ri khasu" doem myang loo nhang: ga: doem myid: boem . Hau: yug gi Nanu" ri ngoo dalheing: tid kyoo" bye: - nanu" atam" gyo: boem .
43009027	Ce: noem wim wigi-doem poug gyoo: noug go" lha" . Nanu" we nya: da cang: zoo: bui" noug go" la" . ga: myid: da .
43009028	Houg: bang: gi nang za: nya: cangzoo: danghoid . Ngoonu" gi Moshe da" cangzoo: yi nghoid ga: nyang: ri juang" ago" .
43009029	Mangsoo gi Moshe ri dang: tid byid: zi ngoonu" se' nghoid loug - He: yug gi khayo thu' lo zi ngoonu" asi ga: tid boem .
43009030	Myo , amyang led: lo yu" su: gi nyang: gi ngoori myo , myang loo nhang: su: nghoid . loug: nanu" gi hau: yug khayo re" zi asi ga: zigi moug" cang bo nyid nhung: lha" » ga: phoug tu .
43009031	Mangsoo gi yooboo yoo" mo , da" Kyu" mho' dang: ri atam" gyoo: - Aseing: ri loem: khau: phau" myang: lho: Mangsoo vho: khyo" koid ; su: da" thui: ri za: date: tam" gyoo: byid .
43009032	Nya: myhi' da" ung: khoug: mo myo , amyang su: ri dayug yug wigi myo , myang loo nhang: ga: zigi mougmyid jo , shid" jang" mo wigi khanham we' hang" we' ashug" gyo: yu" da" khyoo: nghoid .
43009033	He: yug gi Mangso jang" mo ju" ri" su: anghoid rigi Hid: te" moo" daja: we' yo" zei: zi anghoid ga: nyang tid .
43009034	Houg: bang: gi nang gi ung: khoug: mo , yooboo yo" gyi: sheung: loo su: nghoid lho: wigi ngoonu" ri dajhoug" byid: nyid shi" la" » ga: tid boem lho: tarha" jung mo khaid thu' kaid .
43009035	Hid: su" khaid thu' kaid zi: Yesu shaug" gyoo: lang" hau: yug yo" shau" go" lho: nang gi byu da" nya: zoo: ri loem" jeing" la" » ga: myid: yu .
43009036	Hau: yug gi Ludaid' phoo we" - ngoo yo" loem" jeing" wa shid' re" hau: byu nya: zoo: gi hang" nghoid lha" » ga: myid .
43009037	Aseing Yesu phougtu" zigi nyang: ri nang myang yu" bye . Akhid" nang yo" doem: go" nyid su: gi hau: yug nyang: nghoid bye .
43009038	Hau: yug gi Yesu shid' moo poid' thug thoug lho: Aseing: we" ngoo loem" jeing" bye: ga: tid .
43009039	Aseing Yesu gi-myo , amyang mo , ri myo , myang nhang: wa ziyo' - myo , myang mo , myo , jed' loo" wa shid' re" dang: phyed' byid: wa he: mougmyid khyoo: ngoo ju" re zi nghoid ga: tid .
43009040	Yesu da" anam , moo zheing: nyid da" pharishe gi hau: dang: ri zheing: shau" gyo: boem yoomo ngoonu" ri we' myo , amyang mo , nghoid ein: wigi tid nau la" » ga: wigi myid: boem .
43009041	Aseing Yesu gi nanu" myo , amyang mo , jen" nghoid rigi yooboo yo" boem wa zi anghoid . Akhid" nanu" gi ngoonu" myo , myang mo , nghoid ga: tid boem yoomo hau: zigi nanu" moo yooboo yo" nyid zi nghoid bye .
43010001	Aseing Yesu gi Deing" deing nanu" ri ngoo tid ba - yang khyam: khoug: khyoo: khoem" duang: khyo" avang loo loo: za: goo" khyo" do , rhoid vang loo su: gi khoug" su: yo" khyangtoug: danghoid .
43010002	Khoem" duang: khyo" vang loo su: koem gi yang zung" su: nghoid .
43010003	Yang zung" su: nghoid rigi khoem" zung" su: we' khoem" lhoem: phang byid: se' nyid . Yang joem we' nya: thui: ri se' gyo . Nyang: gi yang joem ri myeing yu khe: lho: yang khyam: mo , shu" thu' lo .
43010004	Nyang: gi yang joem ri shu" vhu" thu' lo" uri yang joem da" shid' khyoo: shu" vhu" she: yhe: lo . Yang joem we' nya: thui: ri se' gyoo: yoomo thang: moo bo cang lo" boem .
43010005	Yang joem gi byu being" thang: moo gi cang lo" boem wa zi anghoid . Byu being" da" thui: rigi ase' gyoo: yoomo nya: jang" mo gi phang: sain" loo" goo" wa zi nghoid .
43010006	Aseing Yesu gi he: dangtu' khyo" nyangnu" ri tid kyoo" nghoid loug - nyangnu" gi dangtu' da" dangkang: ri ase' gyo: boem .
43010007	Houg: lang" Yesu doem tid zigi nanu" ri ngoo tid ba: - ngoo gi yang joem vang loo wa da" khoem" duang: nghoid .
43010008	Nga" shid' moo juri" mo , gi khoug" mo khyangtoug: joem danghoid . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo Yang joem gi houg: bang: da" dang: ri atam" gyoo .
43010009	Ngoo gi khoem" duang: nghoid . Nga" jhang khyo" vang ri" su: gi goem loem joyoo shau" bye . Nyang: gi thu' thu' vang vang yo" koid ; wigi mhain" nu" jang: ri shau" myang wa zi nghoid .
43010010	Khoug" su: gi khoug" wa said wa ga: lhu: phyo' wa ga: date: re . Ngoo koem gi nanu" da" kangso' yoo" wa tho' moo byeung" shoin: lo" da" kangso' yo" dei nyid wa shid' re" re" zi nghoid .
43010011	Ngoo gi ge da" yang zung" su: nghoid . ge da" yang zung" su: gi yang joem shid' re" nya: kangso' dain , pyam nyid .
43010012	Lang: jhang gi yang zung" su: ti" anghoid . Yang seing: we' anghoid . Yoomo voem , khuid" joem ri" yo" myang lang" yang joem ri she: pyam too" kho' lho: thu' phang: lo" nyid . Houg: yoomo voem , khuid" joem gi yang phung: ri khaid ngaid wigi lhu: sain" pyam nyid .
43010013	Lang: jhang gi lang: jhang date: nghoid nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - - yang joem ri ce: nheig akhyeig loo: - thu' phang: loo" se' nyid .
43010014	Ngoo gi ge da" yang zung" su: nghoid . Phoo Mangsoo gi ngoori se' yhangti" - ngoo we' phoo ri se' nyid . Houg: yo" dayhangti" - yang joem ri we' ngoo se' nyid . Yang joem we' ngoori se houg: yoomo ngoo gi yang joem shid' re" kang: ri yo" ab pyam zi nghoid .
43010015	
43010016	He: da" yang khyam: moo abo da" yang - gootu: we' ngoo yoo" shi" Hau: yang joem ri we' nga" yang khyam: khoug: moo shu" vang loo ca" shi . Nyangnu" gi nga" thui: ri tam" gyoo: goo" wa houg: yoomo yang Phung: daphung: za: yang zung" su: dayug za: bue" loo wa nghoid .
43010017	Ngoo gi kangso' ri dalheing: doem yo" yu wa shid' re" nga" kang: ri yo" byid: pyam yoo mo phoo Mangsoo gi ngoori jheddab nyid .
43010018	Khayug we' nga" kangso' ri ayo" yu pyam byid ngoo nya: myid khyo" ngoo byid: pyam da" khyoo: nghoid . Ngoo gi kangso' ri byid: pyam wa amyeing" yo" - Kangso' doem yo" tau" yu wa amyeing" ngoo ci: - Hid: su" koid ; wa shid' re" phoo gi ngoori akhyeing byid: to" amyeing" byid: to" zi nghoid ga: tid .
43010019	Hid: su" tid yoomo Yuda byu yi moo nheigloem: aveing" go" boem loo .
43010020	Byu dayham" gi he: yug gi yu vang ci: da" foin" su: danghoid: ci: wim wigi nya: dang: ri nanu" tam" gyoo: go" ga: tid boem .
43010021	Nghoidloug we' byu dayham" bang: gi yu vang ci: su: gi hid: yhang te" da" dang: ayo" tid . Yu vang ci: mo , hang" su ; - myo , amyang su: ri myo , yo" myang nhang: yu" la" » ga: tid boem .
43010022	Hau: ayo , moo Yerusalem voo mo , no ku" yhoem moo" - ab noung" pui" zeing: daloem: jo , - hau: ayo , gi xung" gung ayo , nghoid .
43010023	Aseing Yesu gi no ku" yhoem moo" mo , Sholumon da" vang khoem" moo so" lheing yen .
43010024	Hau: uri byu yi gi Yesu ri re" lheung: khoem , ci: lho: nang gi kha: myhang myang" sho' ngoonu" ri nheigloem: soin: yau: nyid nhang: wa lha" . nang gi Meshia anghoid la" . - ngoonu" ri bang bang tid kyoo" we' ga: myid: boem .
43010025	Yesu gi nanu" ri ngoo tid kyoo" gu , nghoid bye: - nghoid loug we' nanu" gi aloem" jeung" boem . Phoo byid: da" amyeing" akhang" yo' dakhyoo ti" - - ngoo koid ; shug da" moo" dangain" gi nga" da" khyoo: ri sagsi: kham: nyid zi nghoid .
43010026	Nghoidloug we' nanu" ngoori aloem" jeing" yoo mo manu" ginga" yang joem anghoid .
43010027	Nga" da" yang joem gi nga" da" dang: thui: ri tam" gyo: boem . Ngoo we' nyangnu" ri se' lho: nyangnu" we' nga" thang: moo cang ago" .
43010028	Ngoo gi nyangnu" ri apyaid ato: kangso' ri byid: bye: yoomo nyangnu" gi khanham we' ashid: loo: wa . Hang" we' nga" da" lo , mo houg: bang: ri ayo" lhoid yu loo .
43010029	Nyangnu" ri nga" lo , moo ab byid: to" da" Phoo gi dangain" tho' moo je gyi: su: nghoid yoomo hang" nghoid loug - nyangnu" ri pho da" coung: goem nyid jang" mo ayo" lhoid yu loo .
43010030	Phoo yo" ngoo gi dagung dashoo" za: nghoid ga: tid .
43010031	Houg: lang" mung" byu yi gi Asing: ri du" wa da" luggo , doem koid: ci: boem bye .
43010032	Yesu gi nyangnu" ri Phoo koid nhang: da" - moo" gi ri nanu" da" shig khoin" moo zei: bye . Hau: moozoo" kha: loem: yoomo nanu" ngoori luggo , yo" du" noug go" la" » ga: myid .
43010033	Nyangnu" phug tu" zigi moo" gi dajaja: zei: yoomo Nang ri luggo , yo" du" nau zi anghoid . Nang gi byu kyeing" te: nghoid da: zi Mangso ayid void ci: lho: Mangsoo ri shoid vhang: da" dang: tid nyid yoomo luggo , yo" du" wa ga: tid ago" .
43010034	Aseing Yesu phougtu" zigi Nanu" da" tarha" : lhid" to" jang" moo Mangsoo ga: tid pang to" da - Jhoem: dang: moo toin" shid to" khyoo: yi gi khanham we' deingmain" nyid ziri nanu" se .
43010035	Mangsoo gi nya: da" mungdang: tam gyo: nyid mo , ri Mangsoo ga: tid pang to .
43010036	Phoo gi ngoori khyen: yu lho: he: mougmyid khyoo: nhang: kaid . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo Ngoo gi Mangso da" nya: zoo: nghoid ein: tid da" uri Ngoo gi Mangsoo ri shoid da" dang: tid ein: - nanu" khasu" koid ; yo" tid go" lha" .
43010037	Phoo zei: nhang: nau da" moo" ri ngoo avoin , vu , nghoid ri ngoori aloem" jeing" goo"
43010038	Ngoo ci: voin vu nyid nghoid ri koem gi ngoori aloem" jeing" nghoid loug we' ngoo voin , vu , da" moozoo" ri loem" jeing" ge' . Houg: lang" ngoo zei: da" moozoo" moo Phoo gi nga" khoug: moo nyid nyid lho wigi ngoo we' phoo yo" dadeing: daloem: za: nyid ziri nanu" se' gyo: loo wa ga: tid kyo" .
43010039	Houg: lang" nyangnu" gi Yesu ri myheig wa zi doem yoem: kaid go" lo" boem bye . Nghoidloug we' Yesu gi nyangnu" jang" mo , gau" jang" phang: thu' lo" byug .
43010040	Yesu gi Yodan gyung: thei: tab' moo goonham , Yohan Babtisma kham: byid: joyoo khyoo: doem yhe: lho: hau: khyi moo nyid nyid .
43010041	Byu yi myoo" sho' nyang: Yesu jang" moo jure" boem . Nyangnu" gi Yohan gi ce: mau" pho" moo" ayo" zei: shug - Nghoidloug we' he: youg khyoo: yo" sen: lho: wigi Yohan kho" kyo" dang: gi dangain" deung nyid ga: tid boem .
43010042	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo hau: joyoo moo byu myoo" sho' nyang: - Yesu ri loem" jeing" lo boem .
43011001	Bethani voo byu Lazaru ga: su: gi no nyid . Bethani voo gi Mari yo' nya: bi: Martha nyid da" voogung nghoid .
43011002	( He: da" Mari gi Aseing Yesu da" khyid: moo nam , pyo: moora: xu: foid gyoin: lho: nya: xam: wigi doem soid' byid: su: nghoid . No nyid su: Lazaru gi Mari da" nya: no , nghoid . )
43011003	Nya: be: eig yug gi Aseing: we" - re" jheddab da" byen cang" gi no nyid da: - ga: wigi Yesu jhang khyoo: dang: pyeung: kaid .
43011004	Yesu hau: ludang: ri shaug" gyoo: long" nyang: gi he: noo gi Lazaru ri shid: nhang: wa da" noo anghoid . Mangso da" myonhoo: phung: yoeb' bang loo nhang: wa ziyo' hau: noo yoomo Mangso da" nya: zoo: gi myonhoo: phung yoeb' - bug thu' sheing" jhu" loo wa" - shig re" nghoid ga: tid .
43011005	Nghoidloug Yesu gi Martha tang: Mari ri we' Lazaru ri we' jheddab nyid .
43011006	Lazaru no nyid ziri shau" gyo: lang" Yesu gi nyang: ju" nyid da" joyoo moo eig nyid" doem xo' theing: nyid .
43011007	Hau: thang: ri nya: cangzoo: yi: ri tid zigi Yuda mung" khyoo: - ngoonu" doem tau" loo" shang - ga: tid .
43011008	Cangzoo: yi gi sara: we" - houg: mo meing byu yi: gi akhoyo , shi" - Aseing: ri luggo , yo" du" wa ga: nyid boem ri hau: joyoo khyoo: dalheing: dadoem tau" loo" wa la" » ga: myid: boem .
43011009	Yesu tid zigi danyid" ri daxe: eig nayi: bo anghoid goo" la" . nyid kyoug mo bidbang khoug: mooso" yen" mo , gi he mougmyid bidbang moo myo , yo" myang wigi khyid: vhu" athung" loo: yo" so" yen" ago" .
43011010	Myen" ri so" yen" mo , koem gi myo , amyang yoomo khyid: vhu" thoung .
43011011	Nghoid loug we Yesu gi hid: su" ga: bain tid lho: ngoonu" da" bidnoem Lazaru gi yhoeb' pyo: jo , bye . Nyang: ri nhoug" wa shid' re" ngoo yhe: loo" wa" - ga: doem poug tid .
43011012	Cangzoo: yi gi Aseing: we" - nyang: yhoeb' pyo: nyid nghoid rigi doem so" loo wa nghoid - ga: tid boem .
43011013	Yesu gi Lazaru shid: bye: khyoo: ri tid nghoid loug we' nyangnu" gi gyeing" nyang: yhoeb' pyo: da" khyoo: ri tid sam" ga: cangzoo: yi gi jho: nyid ago" .
43011014	Houg: yoomo Yesu gi Lazaru shid: bye: ga: bang bang jha" tid kyo .
43011015	Hau: joyoo moo ngoo nyang: yo' dage" anyid kho' zigi nanu" ngoori loem" jeing" loo wa khyoo: nghoid yoomo: - nanu" shid' re" ngoo gau: - nya: jhang khyoo: yhe: lo" boem loo: shang ga: tid .
43011016	( Zoo: zoem , ga: myheing yo" da" ) Thoma gi nya: cangzoo: byen cang" yiri ngoonu" we' Aseing: yo" dage" shid: kham: wa shid' re cang yhe: lo" boem shang ga: tid .
43011017	Aseing Yesu juri" lang" gi Lazaru ri myhoeb' shoung: pyam zi myid: nyid" koo: myang" bye: khyoo: ri yhe: myang se' boem .
43011018	Bethani voo gi Yerusalem voo yo"-eig main: koo: date: ve: .
43011019	Yuda byumyu" myoo" sho' mo nyang: - Mari yo" Martha tang: da" nhung" zoo: shid: loo" yoomo nya: eig yug ri nheig teing: wa ga: jure" boem .
43011020	Martha gi Aseing Yesu re" lo zi shaug" gyoo: lang" yhe: tau yu wa ga: thu' lo" nghoid loug we' Mari gi yhoem: moo nyid kho . .
43011021	Martha gi Aseing: we" - Nang hid: moo danyid nghoid rigi nga" nhung" zoo: shid: wa zi anghoid .
43011022	Akhid" nghoid loug we' Aseing: mho' da" khyoo: dangain" - Mangsoo tam" gyoo: byid: wa zigi ngoo loem" jeing" nyid . ga: wigi Aseing: Yesu ri lhoem: tid kyo .
43011023	Aseing Yesu gi Re" nhung" gi doem dei loo wa zi nghoid ga: tid .
43011024	Marhta gi Mougmyid thang lo" da" bidnyid ri nyang: doem dei to'' loo wa ziri ngoo se' ga: tid .
43011025	Aseing Yesu nyang: ri tid zigi Ngoo gi doem dei to'' lo da" khyoo: yo" kangso' nghoid . Ngoori loem" jeing" mo , hang" we' shid: byug bye: nghoid loug we' dadei nyid wa .
43011026	Ngoori loem" jeing" lho: akhid" dei nyid shi" mo , we' khanham we' shid: wa zi anghoid . He: ziri nang aloem" la" » ga: myid .
43011027	Martha gi loem" bye: Aseing: we" - He: mougmyid moo gyoo" loo wa ga: da" Mangso: nya: zoo: Meshia nghoid ziri ngoo loem" bye: ga: tid .
43011028	Houg: su" bain doem go" lho: Martha gi yhoem: khyoo: lo" wigi nya: nhung" Mari ri gau" khe: lho: Sara: moo" ju" loo bye: - nang ri we myid nyid: ga: tid kyo .
43011029	Hau: dang: shaug" gyoo: lang" Mari myab myab to' lho: Aseing: jhang khyoo: yhe: lo .
43011030	Aseing Yesu koem gi voo khoug: moo aju" vang loo shi" - Martha yhe: tau yu joyoo moo danyid nyid shi .
43011031	Mari ri nheig teing dang: tid wa ga: yhoem: moo re" nyid da" byu yi gi Mari myab myab thu' lo" zi myang boem lang" loeb moo ngoug wa ga: yhe: loo" sam" ga: coem jho: boem . Houg: yoomo nyangnu" gi Mari da" thang: moo cang yhe: lo" boem .
43011032	Mari gi Aseing Yesu nyid da" jang" moo ju" yhi: lang" Aseing: ri myang wigi khyid: yang: moo goeb' zoore" - Aseing: we" nang he: joyoo moo danyid nghoid rigi nga" nhung" shid: byug wa zi anghoid ga: tid .
43011033	Aseing Yesu gi Mari koug ngau nyid ziri we' nyang: yo" dage" cang loo mo , ngau nyid ziri we' nheigloem: moo gye" lo" zang" wigi nheigloem: apyoo: loo .
43011034	Houg yoomo Yesu gi nya: nghain" doem: ri khayoo: myhoeb too" go" - ga: myid: - houg: bang: gi Aseing: we" re" yu" we' ga: tid ago" .
43011035	Yesu Ngau .
43011036	Houg: lang" byu yi gi yu" ge' nyang: gi Lazaru ri khayhi' jheddab nhung: ga: tid go" nyid boem .
43011037	Byu dayham" bang: gi myo , amyang su: ri myo , yo" myang loo nhang: su: gi Lazaru ri ashid: sho' ayo" koid ; nhung: lha" » ga: tid go" nyid .
43011038	Yesu gi nheigloem: moo gye" zang" loo yoomo loeb khyoo: yhe: lo . Hau: loeb khoem" moo gi lugloem: yo" tu" myhed" to .
43011039	Aseing Yesu gi lugloem: ri tu: shed pyam ge" ga: amyeing" byid . Shid: loo" su: nya: bi: Martha gi Aseing: we" akhid" gi boeb' nham nyid wam: bye . Nyang: shid: thang: ri myid: nyid" myang" bye: ga: tid .
43011040	Aseing Yesu tid zigi nang loem" jeing" nghoid rigi Mangso da" myonhoo: phung yoeb' ri shau" myang wa ein: ngoo tid bye: anghoid la" » ga: myid .
