43013025	Hau: cangzoo: gi Aseing Yesu da: namtain" moo yu: re" lho: Aseing: we" houg: su" koid' wa zigi kha yug nghoid wa lha" . ga: myid .
43013026	Yesu gi he: zooyho' daloem: ri xoin" khu , moo joem lho: ngoo byid: su: gi hau: yug nyang: nghoid bye: ga: tid kyo . Hau: thang: ri zooyho' dakhyi ri xoin" khu , moo joem lho: Simun Iskarud da" nya: zoo: - Yuda ri byid .
43013027	Hau: zoo: yho' ri Yuda zo: kaid ziyo' dage" satan gi nya: nheigloem: khoug: moo vang loo" bye . Yesu gi nyang ri nang koid ; wa da" moo" ri myab myab zei: we' ga: wigi tid .
43013028	Yuda ri houg: su" ga: cikoid ; tid da" zi zoobui" moo zhoung: jo , mo , hang" we' ase boem .
43013029	Yuda gi ngei thung: zoem su: nghoid yoomo pui" shid' re" yhoug: gyen: da" zi qei wa ga: la' shojhen: mo , ri gam byid: wa shid' re" la' - Yesu dang: pyeung: nyid sam" ga: cangzoo: yi dayham" jho: nyid boem .
43013030	Yuda Iskarud gi zooyho' dakhyi , ri kham: yu ci: lho: myab myab thu' loo" khari" bye . Hau: ayo gi myen" ayo , nghoid nyid .
43013031	Yuda thu' loo" khare" thang: ri Aseing: Yesu gi Akhid" byu da" nya: zoo: gi myo , nhoo: ngei: lang: bug thu' sheing" jhu" lo zi shau" bye . Mangsoo we' hau: yug: yoomo myonhoo: bug thu' sheing" jhu" lo zi shau" bye .
43013032	Mangsoo gi hau: yug khyo" wigi myonhoo: ngei: lang: - bug thu' sheing" jhu" lo rigi phoo Mangsoo gi nya: gungdu: khyo" wigi byu da" nya: zoo: ri we' myonhoo: bug thu' sheing" jhu" loo nhang: wam bye .
43013033	Nga" zoo: yi we" - ngoo gi nanu" yo daso' date: nyid loo: wa . Nanu" gi ngoori sho: goo" wa . Nghoid loug ngoo yhe: lo" nyid da" khyoo: moo nanu" ayo" cang loo ga: wigi Yuda zoug: myeing" ci: mo , ri kho" kyo" yu" ziyo' dayhangti" - nanu" ri we' akhid" ngoo kho" kyo .
43013034	Nanu" nyang: cang" nyang: jheddab goo" ge" ein: da" tarha" aseig ri nanu" ri ngoo byid: bye . Ngoo nanu" ri jheddab yhangti" - nanu" we' nyang: cang" nyang: jhed' dab , go" nyid ge' .
43013035	Nanu" nyang: cang" nyang: se' jheddab go' nyid rigi Byu dangain" mo , hau: jhed' kang: da" khyoo: ri yu myang lho: nanu" gi nga" da" cangzoo: yi nghoid da" khyoo: ri se' lo boem wa ga: tid kyo .
43013036	Simun Petru gi Aseing: we" - nang khayoo: loo" wa lha" » ga: myid . ‹ ‹ Yesu gi ngoo yhe: lo" nyid da" jang" moo akhid" nang ayo" cang . » ‹ ‹ Nghoid loug thang: phyang" ri dayo" cang loo wa » ga: tid .
43013037	Petru gi ‹ ‹ Aseing: we" - ciwim akhid" ngoo re jhang ayo" cang wa lha" . » ‹ ‹ Aseing: da" shid' re" nga" da" kangso' lang" ab pyam wa zi jen" jen" nghoid bye . »
43013038	Yesu tid zigi nang gi nga" shid' re" kangso' yo" ab wa jen" bye: la" . Deing" deing nang ri ngoo tid da" zigi gyo , atoin: shi" ri nang gi ngoori asi ga: soem" lheing: ju" sho' ngeig pyam wa su: nghoid ga: tid kyo" to .
43014001	Yesu gi nanu" nheigloem: myid amyo: nyid goo" - Mangsoo: ri loem" ge' ngoori we' loem" ge' ga: wigi tid .
43014002	Nga" pho da" yhoem: moo yab myoo" sho' jo . Houg: ajo , nghoid rigi ajo , ein: ngoo atid loo: za: nyid wa anghoid . Ngoo gi nanu" da" shid' re" joyoo nyheing wa ein: lo" zi danghoid .
43014003	Houg: su" nanu" shid' mo joyoo daloem: lo" nyheing too" kho lho: nanu" jang" moo ngoo doem re" wigi ngoo nyid jang" moo nanu" we' yo" nyid sho' nanu" ri nga" jhang khyoo: re" shu" yu wa zi nghoid .
43014004	Ngoo lo" nyid da" joyoo moo ju" da" khyoo: ri nanu" si' bye: ga: tid .
43014005	Thoma gi Aseing: we" - nang khayoo: loo" wa zi ngoonu" asi bye: re - houg: moo yo" ju" da" khyoo: ri ngoonu" khasu" se' si wa ga: tid .
43014006	Aseing Yesu tid zigi khyoo: gi ngoo nghoid - deung main" ziyo' kangso' we' ngoo nghoid . Ngoo moo anghe: khoug: loo: za: hang" we' Nga" phoo jang" moo ayo" ju" loo .
43014007	Akhid" nanu" gi ngoori si' bye: yoomo Nga" phoo ri we' si wam: bye . Akhid" mo nyang: - phoo ri nanu" se' lho: myang yu" boem bye: ga: tid .
43014008	Philib , gi Aseing: we" - hau: phoo ga: zi ngoonu" ri toin" shid' we' houg: su" yo" toin" shid' lang" ngoonu" gi nheig shid: wa ga: tid .
43014009	Yesu gi Philib , we" - ngoo gi nanu" yo" hid: myhang nyid lo ri ngoori nang asi shi" la" . Ngoori myang yu su: gi phoo ri we' shau" myang zi nghoid bye . Houg: su" nghoid ri phoo ngoonu" ri toin" shid' we' ein: ci: koid ; tid nyid go" lha" .
43014010	Ngoo gi phoo moo nyid phoo we' ngoo moo nyid . Phoo nyid zi nang aloem" rhe . Ngoo tid da" dang: dangain" gi nga" da" dang: anghoid . Ngoo koid ; da" moozoo" we' Ngoo yo" dage" nyid da" phoo Mangsoo: nyang: koid ; da" moozoo" nghoid bye .
43014011	Ngoo gi phoo yo" dadeing: daloem za: nghoid wigi Phoo we' ngoo yo" dadeing: daloem: za: nghoid yoomo ngoo tid ziri loem" jeing" ge' . Houg: su" anghoid lang" gi ngoo koid ; da" moozoo" ri yu" lho: loem" jeing" ge' ga: tid .
43014012	Deing" deing nanu" ri ngoo tid da" zigi ngoori loem" jeing" su: gi ngoo zei: da" moo" ri yo" zei: wa . Hau: tho' re je gyi: da" moo" ri we' yo" zei: wa nghoid . Khasu" wim gari ngoo gi phoo jhang khyoo: loo" wa yoomo nghoid .
43014013	Nya: zoo: yoomo wigi nya: pho da" myonhoo: ngeilang bang thu' loo baja" ga: Nga" da" myeing ri nghe: khau: lho: nanu" mho' da" zi dangain" ngoo koid ; byid: wa .
43014014	Nga" da" myeing ri lang: lho: nanu" ce" ja: akyu" ri nghoid loug - mho' ge' . Mho' ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - - ngoo koid byid: wa nghoid .
43014015	Nanu" ngoori jheddab nghoid rigi Nga" tarha" ri phau" cang goo" wa nghoid .
43014016	Ngoo gi phoo ri mho' lho: nanu" yo" khanham we' dage" nyid nyid wigi nanu" ri pang" thoug byid: wa da" yug - nanu" da" jhang khyoo: nhang: kaid wa .
43014017	Hau: da" Aseing: gi Mangso da" deung main" khyoo: ri toin" shid' wa da" Venyi: nghoid . Mougmyid gi hau: Venyi: ri myang we' amyang - si' we' asi yoomo ayo" kham: yu boem . Nghoidloug we' Hau: Venyi gi nanu" yo" dage" nyid lho: nanu" da" khoug: moo loung" jo . Hau: Aseing: ri nanu" se' boem bye .
43014018	Ngoo loo" lang" nanu" nyang: kyeing" ri she: pyam too" khoo , wa zi anghoid . Nanu" jang" moo ngoo doem ri" wa .
43014019	Ayo , dajhi' myang" lo" ri he: mougmyid byu yi gi ngoori amyang lo: boem wa . Nghoidloug we' nanu" koem gi myang boem shi" wa . Khasu" wim gari ngoo gi kangso' dei nyid su: nghoid yoomo nanu" we' kangso' shau" dei nyid boem wa .
43014020	Ngoo gi phoo yo" dadeing: daloem: za: nghoid ziri we' nanu" gi ngoo yo" dadeing: daloem: za: nghoid ziri we' hau: bidnyid ri nanu" yo" se' boem wa nghoid .
43014021	Ngoo ri kham: yu lho: cang loo" su: gi ngoori jheddab su: nghoid . Ngoori jheddab su: ri nga" Phoo we' jheddab wa zi nghoid . Ngoo we' nyang: ri jheddab lho: Nga" da" gung nyang: ri toin" shid' wa zi nghoid ga: tid .
43014022	( Yuda sakarud anghoid da" ) Yuda goo" yug gi Aseing: we" - re" da" gung du: ngoonu" rigi: toin" shid' lho: Mougmyid byu yi ri atoin" shid' ga: rigi khasu" se' bui" wa lha" » ga: myid .
43014023	Yesu doem tid da" zigi Ngoori jhed' dab , su: gi nga" da" moo" myeing" ung: voin su: nghoid . Houg: yoomo nga" Phoo gi nyang: ri jheddab wa . Nga" phoo yo" ngoo we' nya: jang" moo yhe: lho: nyang: yo" dage" nyid wa zi nghoid .
43014024	Ngoori ajheddab su: gi nga" jhoug" myeing" ri ase' gyo: yu . Nanu" shau" gyo: yu" da" jhoug" myeing" gi nga" da" jhoug" myeing" anghoid . Ngoori nhang: kaid da" nga" pho jhoug" myeing" danghoid .
43014025	Nanu" yo" dage" nyid shi" da" uri he: khyoo: ri ngoo tid kyoo" bye .
43014026	Nghoidloug we' Phoo gi nga" myeing mo nhang: kaid wa da" pang" thoug su: ein: da" gyeungshang: da" Venyi: gi nanu" ri ja: khang" moo" jhoug" byid: wigi ngoo tid kyo" da" khyoo: dangain" ri doem myid boin: loo nhang: wa zi nghoid .
43014027	Ngoo gi myenjham" khyoo: nanu" ri byid: khoo bye: - hau: da" ngei pyo: myenjham" da" khyoo: gi nanu" ri moug myid byu yi byid: te" da" zi anghoid . Nanu" nheigloem: myid amyoo: goo . Nheugloem: athang goo" - gyoug we' agyug goo .
43014028	Ngoo gi akhid" loo" nghoid loug we' nanu" jang" moo doem ri" wa ein: wigi tid da" dang: ri nanu" shaug" gyoo: bye . Phoo gi nga" tho' agoo" je gyi: su: nghoid . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nanu" ngoori jheddab nghoid rigi pho jhang khyoo: ngoo lo" ziri gau yi boem wa zi nghoid .
43014029	Hau: da" moozoo" bue" lo da" uri nanu" loem" jeing" loo wa shid' re" abui" shi" re" nyang: nanu" ri ngoo tid bye .
43014030	Mougmyid da" zoug: phoo gi jure" nyid bye . Houg: yoomo ngoo gi nanu" yo" dang: - myang" sho' shau" tid go" nyid wa da" ayo , ajo , loo . Hau: mougmyid zoug: phoo gi nga" tho' moo ce" amyeing" ajo .
43014031	Nghoidloug we' ngoo gi phoo rijheddab nyid da" khyoo: - mougmyid gi si' ca" nyid . Ngoo gi phoo ri jheddab yoomo ngoori tid kyo" da" khyoo: dangain" ri ngoo cang pyeing bye . He: joyoo mo to' lho: ngoonu" thu' lo" boem loo: shang ga: tid .
43015001	Aseing Yesu gi Ngoo gi main" da" zabyidd" nei nghoid . Nga" phoo gi khyam: seing: nghoid .
43015002	Ngoo moo ashi" azei: da" akung: ako' dangain" ri nyang: cu: khyo , pyam lho: ashi" zei: da" akung: ako'' ri koem gi je zei: baja" ga: kyid shang: to .
43015003	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - - ngoo jhoug" byid: da" Mungdang: gi akhid" lang" nanu" ri kyid shang: nyid bye .
43015004	Ngoo yo" dadeing: daloem: za: nyid ge' . Ngoo we nanu" yo" dadeing: daloem: za: nyid wa . zabyidd" ako' gi agam moo atei" axo , to" nghoid rigi nyang: kyeing" ashi" yo" zei: wa zi anghoid . Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - - nanu" we' ngoo yo" atei" axo , to" nghoid rigi ashi" yo" zei: boem wa zi anghoid .
43015005	Ngoo gi zabyidd" nei yang: nghoid . Nanu" gi akung: ako'' joem nghoid . Ngoo moo xo' wigi ngoo we nanu" yo' xo' to" ri gi na nu" ashi" myo" sho' yo" zei: loo wa khasu" wim gari ngoo yo' gang go" loo" lang" nanu" ci" we' ayo" koid loo .
43015006	Ngoo yo" axo' to" su: gi nghi: zain khyoo: cu: khyo , pyam wigi kyoug main lo" da" seig kung: yo" du wa . Byu yi gi hau akung ako joem ri cang sho: zheing" yu lho: myi: moo du kaid wigi nyang: gi nghe" joem: pyam wa . .
43015007	Nanu" gi ngoo yo" dadeing: daloem: za: nyid wigi Nga" da" Mungdang: we' nanu" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo bo jo , nghoid rigi nanu" mho' da" akyu" ci: mho' ci: yo" yu boem wa nghoid .
43015008	Nanu" gi ashi" myoo" sho' zei loo yoomo Mangso da" myonhoo: phung: yoeb' ri thu' loo nhang . Hid: khyo" nanu" gi nga" cangzoo: yi bue" lo boem .
43015009	Phoo gi ngoori jheddab nyid yhangti" - ngoo we' nanu" ri jheddab nyid . nga" jheddab jang" moo nyid nyid ge' .
43015010	Ngoo gi nga" pho , amyein g" ri tam gyo: wigi nya jheddab jang moo nyid nyid yhang ti" - nanu nga amyeing" tam gyo rigi nanu" we' nga" jheddab jang" moo nyid nyid .
43015011	Nga" gau yi da" khyoo: gi nanu" moo jo , jo wigi nanu" da" gau yi zi we' joeb , byeung" loo baja" - ein: ngoo he: khyoo: nanu" ri tid bye .
43015012	Nga" da" amyeing" gi hid: nghoid ngoo gi nanu" ri jheddab yhangti" - nanu" nyang: cang" nyang: jheddab goo" ge , .
43015013	Nyang: nya: da" bidnoem pho shid' re" kangso' ab pyam sho' jheddab da" tho' moo je gyi: da" jheddab nheigloem: gi hang" moo we' aboo loo .
43015014	Nanu" ngoo tid da" mungdang: khyo" cang nghoid rigi nga" da" bidnoem yi nghoid boem wa .
43015015	Akhid" mo wigi nanu" ri ngoo join atid loo wa . Khasu" wim gari-join gi Yhoem: seing: koid da" moozoo" ri asi . Nanu" ri bidnoem da ein: loo wa khasu" wim gari pho jang" mo ngoo shau" gyo: khyoo: dangain" nanu" ri yo tid kyoo" bye .
43015016	Nanu" gi ngoori khyen: yu zi anghoid ngoo she nanu" rida khyen: yu - nanu gi thu lo" lho: geng teing ashi myoo" sho' zei: wa zi yo" - nga" myeng mo , nanu" mho' moo mho' - phoo nanu" ri byid baja" ngoo nanu" ri nyheung to" .
43015017	He: zi gi nanu" ri ngoo byid: da" amyeing" nghoid - nyang cang" nyang jheddab goo" ge' ga: Yesu tid .
43015018	Mougmyid byu yi nanu" ri ngheing" nghoid rigi nanu" ri angheung" shi" ri ngoori shi" ngheing" bye khyoo: ri boin: nyid ge' .
43015019	Nanu gi moug myid ge' seing mo nghoid ri gi moug myid gi nanu" ri nyang: seung zi yhangti" jheddab wa zi nghoid . Nghoid loug we' ngoo gi nanu" ri he: mougmyid mo khyen: thu' too" bye: yoomo nanu" gi he: mougmyid yo' ci: asen . Houg: yoomo mougmyid gi nanu" ri ngheing" zi nghoid .
43015020	Join gi yhoem: seing: tho' moo je gyi: zi anghoid . Ngoo nanu" ri tid yu" bye: ziri myid boin ge' . Mougmyid byu wi gi ngoori shen" yhen nghoid rigi nanu" ri we shen" yhen wa zi nghoid . Nyangnu" gi nga" da" dang: ri cang lo" boem wa nghoid rigi nanu" da" dang: ri we' cang lo" boem wa zi nghoid .
43015021	Nghoidloug we' nyangnu" gi ngoori nhang: kaid da" Aseing: ri ase' boem yoomo nga" myeing yoomo nanu" ri shen" yhen boem wa zi nghoid .
43015022	Ngoo gi jure" lho: nanu" ri akho" kyo" nghoid rigi nyangnu" yooboo shoid vhang goo" wa zi anghoid . Akhid" nyangnu" gi nyang: nya: da" yooboo ri shoid vhang: ci: boem yoomo ci" we' ayo" ga: boem loo .
43015023	Ngoori ngheing" su: gi nga" phoo ri we' bo ngheing" zi nghoid bye .
43015024	Gyeing" nyang: ngoo gi goo" ji hang" we' akoid ; da" moo" joem ri nyangnu" da" shid' moo akoid ; shug loo: nyid rigi nyangnu" moo yooboo aboo wa zi nghoid . Akhid" koem gi nyangnu" gi ngoo koid ; shug da" moo" ri myang boem bye . yoomo ngoori we' nga" phoo ri we' ngheing" boem bye .
43015025	Hid: su" ngheing" da" khyoo: gi-Nyangnu" da" tarha" moo lhid' to" ziyo' nyangnu" gi ngoori ci: yoo abo da" jang" moo - ngheing" boem ga: to" ziyo' dakhyoo" bue" lo da" khyoo: nyang: nghoid bye .
43015026	Mangso da" deung main" khyoo: ri phang shug da: pang" thoug wa da" Mangso: jang" mo gyoo lo da" pang" thoug Aseing: ein: da: - gyeungshang: venyi nghoid . Ngoo gi nyang: ri Pho jang" mo nhang: kaid' lho: nga" khyoo: ri sagsi: kham: wa zi nghoid .
43015027	Nanu" we' xang: shid" mo nyang: - ngoo yo" dage" nyid boem yoomo nga" da" khyoo: ri sagsi: kham: boem wa zi nghoid .
43016001	Re" da" loem" jeing" khyoo: abyo , yoin" loo" wa shid' re" he: khyoo: joem ri ngoo tid kyoo" khoo bye .
43016002	Nanu" gi Tarha" jung joem mo khaid thu' pyam zi shau" boem lho: Nanu" ri said loo wa hougsu" koid' mo nyangnu" gi Mangso moozoo" voin , vu , khyoo: nyang: nghoid ga: soin: yu wa da" ayo gi ju" loo wa ,
43016003	Nyangnu" gi phoo ri ase' boem ngoori we' azheing: se' boem . Houg: yoomo hid: su" nanu" ri we' koid ; lo boem wa .
43016004	Ngoo nanu" ri he khyoo: tid kyo" zigi nyangnu" we' nanu" ri tid yhang: ti" koid wa ayo , ju" ngoo nanu" ri no , mo tid too" bye zigi nanu" myid boin wa shid re: nghoid . Ngoo gi nanu" yo" dage" nyid shi" yoomo nanu" ri hau: da" khyoo: no" re - atid kyoo .
43016005	Akhid" koem gi ngoori nhang: kaid su: jhang khyoo: - doem: loo" wam: bye . Nghoidloug we' nanu" hang" we' ngoo kha khyoo: loo" wa zigi amyid: boem nghoid da .
43016006	He: da" khyoo: ri ngoo tid kyoo" yoomo nanu" gi nheig gye" gye" gyo: koug nyid boem ago" .
43016007	Nghoidloug we' nanu" ri ngoo Deing" deung tid nyid da: zigi nanu" shid' re" je ge' . Ngoo alo" nghoid rigi pang" thoug wa su: gi nanu" jhang gyoo" loo wa zi anghoid . Ngoo lo" thang: hau: da" zi: nanu" jhang khyoo: nhang: kaid wa nghoid .
43016008	Hau: da" yug ju" gyoo" loo lang" gi moug myid byu yi ri yoobo da" khyoo: we' deung main" da" khyoo: ri we' Mangso tarha" dang: phyed' wa da" khyoo: ri we' shoid vhang: khyoo: ri bang bang nyang: phang shug loo wam bye .
43016009	Houg: bang: gi ngoori loem" jeing" da" khyoo: aboo yoomo yooboo yo" sen: lho nyangnu" shoid nyid boem .
43016010	Ngoo gi pho jhang khyoo: loo" wa zi nghoid yoomo nanu" ngoori shau" myang loo: wa anghoid loo: yoomo we' nyangnu" gi deung main" da" tarha" yo' sen: lho: shoid nyid boem .
43016011	He moug myid ri vhoeb khang" su ri tarha" dang: bain phyed' bye yoomo dang: phyed' zi yo sen lho: nyangnu" shed nyid boem .
43016012	Nanu" ri ngoo tid wa zi myoo" sho' boo shi" nghoid loug we' akhid" nanu" yo" kham: yu goo" wa zi anghoid .
43016013	Nghoidloug we' Mangso da" khyoo: - deing byeung" da" tarha" ri phang shug da" gyeungshang: Venyi: ju" gyoo" loo lang" gi nanu" ri deung main" da" tarha" bain sho' re" phang shug wam bye . Hau: da" gyeungshang: Venyi: gi nyang: vho: da" khyoo: tid kyoo" wa zi anghoid . Nyang: shaug" gyoo: ci: gu: ri tid kyo" lho: thang: phyang" bue" loo wa khyoo: ri tid wa nghoid .
43016014	Nyang: gi ngoo tid dang ri gyo: ci . lho: nanu" ri doem tid kyoo" wa nghoid yoomo nga" da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb' ri doug bang loo nhang: wa zi nghoid .
43016015	Pho jang" moo jo , moo jo , gi ngoo yo" sen: nyid . Houg: yoomo gyeungshang: da" Venyi: gi ngoo byid: zi yu lho: nanu" ri doem tid kyoo" wa ein: wigi ngoo tid .
43016016	Ayo , dajhi' nghoid lang" gi nanu" ngoori myang loo wa zi anghoid . Hau: thang: ri ayo , dajhi' myang" lang" gi ngoori doem shau" myang goo" wa ga: tid .
43016017	Cangzoo: yi dayham" bang: nyang: cang" nyang: tid go" nyid zi gi ayo , dajhi' myang" lang" nanu" ngoori shau" myang loo: wa zi anghoid . Hau: thang: ri ayo , dajhi' myang" lang" gi ngoori doem myang wa ga: Aseing: tid lho: Hau: tho' moo gootu: we' Aseing: gi ngoo gi pho jhang loo" wa ga: we tid .
43016018	Ayo , dajhi' myang" ri ga: zigi ce: noem ri tid nau zi nghoid ? ce: moozoo" khyoo: ri Aseing: tid nau nyid zi ngoonu" asi - ga: tid go" nyid boem .
43016019	Aseing Yesu gi nyangnu" nyang: ri houg: su" myid nau nyid boem zigi si' yoomo nanu" nyang: cang" ce: noem khyoo: ri myid: tid go" nyid go" ayo , dajhi' myang" lang" nanu" ngoori myang loo: goo" wa zi anghoid ein: wigi we' hau: thang: ri ayo , dajhi' doem myang" lang" gi ngoori doem shau" myang wa ein: wigi we' ngoo tid da" dang: yo" sen: wigi nghoid go" la" .
43016020	Deing" deing nanu" ri ngoo tid da" zigi nanu" gi ngougmyeing" shoo" thui: to" nyid goo" wa . Nghoid loug mougmyid byu yi koem gi gau yi nyid boem wa . Nanu" sho" jhen: shau" nyid boem nghoid loug nanu" da" sho" jhen: khyoo: gi gau yi myen jhoem" khyoo: bue" loo wa .
43016021	Myiyi: dayug gi zoo: khu: wa uri gyi" sho' no zi shau" lho: bain khu: kaid lang" gi mougmyid moo byu dayug yo" khu: kaid yoomo nyang: kham: zo: da" noodam ri to" myhid' bye .
43016022	Nanu" moo akhid" uri nheig koug nyid boem nghoid loug we' nanu" yo" ngoo dalheing: doem shau" goo" wa nghoid yoomo nanu" hau: uri gau yi boem wa zi nghoid . Nanu" da" gau yi da" khyoo: ri hang" wigi we ayo" lhoid' yu pyam .
43016023	Hau: da" bidnyid ju" lang" nanu" gi ngoori ce: ja: we' mho' aca" loo . Deing" deing nanu" ri ngoo tid da" zigi nanu" mho' da" khyoo: dangain" ri nga" myeing yoo mo phoo Mangsoo gi nanu" ri byid: wam bye .
43016024	Akhid" ju" sho' nanu" gi nga" da" myeing ri lang lho: daja" we' amho , atid yu" boem shi" . Nanu" da" ngei pyo: da" khyoo: byeung" byeung" yo" yu wa shid' re" Akyu" mho' nyid ge' . Nanu" mho' ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - yo" yu boem wa zi nghoid .
43016025	He: da" khyoo: joem ri dangtu' ci: lho: ngoo tid bye . Hid: su" dangtu' aci: loo: Phoo Mangso da" khyoo: ri bang" bang tid kyo" loo wa da" ayo , gi ju" loo wa .
43016026	Hau: da" bidnyid ayo , ju" lang" nanu" gi nga" da" myeing ri lang: lho: Akyu" mho' yoid: lo boem wa . Houg: gi ngoo nanu" da" gung thid' mho' byid: wa ein: tid nau zi anghoid .
43016027	Phoo nyang: lhang" - nanu" ri jheddab nyid yoomo nghoid . Nanu" gi ngoori jheddab wigi ngoo gi Mangso jhang khyo" re" da" ziri loem" jeing" yoomo Phoo gi nanu" ri gye jheddab nyid .
43016028	Ngoo gi phoo jang" mo moug myid moo gyoo" lo . Akhid" he: moug myid ri kang" lho: pho jhang khyoo: doem loo" loo: wa ga: tid .
43016029	Cangzoo: yi zheing: tid da" zigi Akhid" Aseing: gi dangtu' aci: loo bang bang nyang: tid nyid bye .
43016030	Aseing Yesu gi khyoo: acang: joeb ri si' su: nghoid zigi akhid" ngoonu" se' boem bye . Aseing: ri hang" ci: myid: nyid cang aboo loo . Houg: yoomo Aseing: gi apyaid' ato: da" Mangso jang" mo gyoo" lo da" Aseing: nyang: nghoid ziri ngoonu" loem" jeing" boem bye" - ga: doem tid boem .
43016031	Yesu gi Akhid" nanu" ngoori loem" jeing" deing bye: go" la" » ga: myid .
43016032	Nanu" gi nyang: nya: yhoem: khyoo: nyang: phang: gang: go" lho: . Ngoo we' ngoo nyang: kyeing" ri nyhed: pyam' khoo' shau" wa da" ayo , gi akhid" lang" ju" loo bye . Nghoidloug we' phoo Mangsoo gi ngoo yo" dage" nyid yoomo ngoo gi ngoo nyang: kyeing" nyid zi anghoid .
43016033	Nanu" gi ngoo yo" dadeing: daloem: za: khyo" myen , jham" khyoo: yo" yu wa da" shid' re" he: dang: ri ngoo tid bye . Nanu" gi mougmyid moo nyid shi" da" uri shojhen: kyi" khyeug zi shau" zoo: goo" wa . Nghoidloug we' geing: geing: teing teing shang" yab jo , ge' ngoo gi he: mougmyid ri oung: pyam bye: - ga: tid .
43017001	Hid: su" ga: bain tid kyo" thang: ri Aseing Yesu gi mougkhung: khyoo: nghang yu" to" lho: tid da" zigi O" nga" phoo we" - Ayo , ju" bye: - Nya: zoo: gi nya: pho da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb' ri thoin" pang byid: wa shid' re" re" zo: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb' ri we' doug bang thu' loo nhang: we' .
43017002	Re" zoo: ngoo gi ngoo nya: lo , moo pho wigi ab byid: to" da" moo" ri apyaid' ato: kangso' yo" byid: wa da" shid' re" nang nyang: ri Byu xangsu: bain sho' mo ri yo" vhoeb khang" da" zoug: myeing" ri byid: too" bye .
43017003	Apyaid ato: kangso' ga: zigi dayug kyeing" da" Mangsoo ri we' nang nhang: kaid da" Yesu Khristu ri we' se' da" khyoo nghoid .
43017004	He: mougmyid moo ngoo gi re" da" myonhoo: phung: yoeb' ri thoin" pang byid: bye . Nang ngoori ab byid: da" moo" zeing: ri bain sho' zei: pyam bye .
43017005	O" nga" phoo we" - he: mougmyid ajo , aboo shi" re - phoo yo" ngoo dage" kham: yu nyid da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb ri akhid" uri pho da" shid' khoin" moo ngoori byid: we' .
43017006	He: mougmyid mo khyen: thu' lho: nga" da" lo , moo nang ab byid: da" byu yi ri ngoo gi nang ri we si' nhang: too" bye . Houg: bang: gi nang seing: ci: yoomo ngoori ab byid: bye . Nyangnu" gi re" da" mungdang: ri tam gyo: nyid boem abye: .
43017007	Ngoo moo yo" da" zi dangain" gi nang jang" mo nghoid zi akhid" nyangnu" se' boem abye: .
43017008	Ngoori nang ab byid: da" mungdang: ri ngoo gi nyangnu" ri doem ab byid: da" uri nyangnu" kham: yu boem bye . Nang jang" mo ngoo gyoo" lo da" khyoo: yo" - gyeing" nyang: nang ngoori nhang: kaid da" khyoo loem" jeing" boem bye .
43017009	Ngoo gi nyangnu" shid' re" akyu" mho' nyid . Mougmyid byu yi shid' re" akyu" mho' nyid zi anghoid . Nghoid loug we' nang ngoo ri ab byid: too" mo , shid re" akyu" mho' zi nghoid ciwim ga ri nyangnu" gi nang seing ci mo , nghoid .
43017010	Ngoo moo yo" da" zi dangain" ri Nang gi yhoem: seing: nghoid yoomo Nang yo" zi dangain" we' nga" zi nghoid nyid . Hau: da" zi yoo mo Nga" da" myonhoo: ngeilang phung" yoeb we' thu' loo nhang: bye .
43017011	Akhid" Ngoo gi re" jhang khyoo: doem loo wa nghoid yoomo ngoogi mougmyid moo anyid loo . Nghoid loug we' nyangnu" houg: bang: koem gi moug myid moo nyid wa zi nghoid . gyeungshang: thang da" nga" phoo we" - nang yo" ngoo dadeing: daloem: za: nghoid nyid yhangti" - nyangnu" we' dadeing: daloem: za: nghoid wa shid' re" nang ngoori ab byid: to" da" re" voolang myeing da" yoem: vhoo" phung yoeb' khyo" nyangnu" ri zung" lhug byid: we' o" .
43017012	Ngoo gi houg: bang: yo" dage" nyid shi" da" uri nang ab byid: to" da" re" voolang myeing khyang" yoem: vhoo" yo' nyangnu" ri goem loem zung" lhug byid: bye . Ngoo gi nyangnu" ri zung" lhug goin coung: nyid . Yoomo Jhoem: mungdang: moo bo ziyo' dakhyoo ti" - shid: no byo , yoin" loo" wa da" dayug mo jan" lho: gootu: hang" we abyug loo" wa .
43017013	Akhid" gi ngoo Re" jhang khyoo doem loo loo: wa nghoid . Houg: bang: gi = ngoo gau yi te" da" gau yi khyoo: - byeung" byeung" yo" yu boem wa shid' re" He: mougmyid moo nyid shi" uri he: da" dang: ri ngoo tid .
43017014	Re" da" mungdang: khoin" nyangnu" ri ngoo byid: bye . Moug: myid byu yi gi nyangnu" ri avho: angei boem . Khasu" wim gari ngoo gi mougmyid yo" asen: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - - nyangnu" we' mougmyid yo" asen: nyid .
43017015	Nyangnu" ri he: mougmyid mo shu" thu' loo" wa da" shid' re" ngoo mho' nyid zi anghoid . Nyangnu" gi akhyeing" su da" lo , mo zung" lhug byid: wa shid' re" za: ngoo mho' nyid .
43017016	Ngoo gi he: mougmyid yo" asen: ziyo' dakhyoo ti" - - houg: bang: we' asen .
43017017	Houg: bang: ri deingmain" mungdang: khyo" wigi re" da" shid' re" goo" zu: xen , nyheing too" we' re" da" mungdang: gi deung main" da" khyoo , nghoid nyid .
43017018	Nang gi ngoori he: mougmyid khyoo: nhang: kaid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - - ngoo we' nyangnu" ri he: mougmyid khyoo: nhang: kaid .
43017019	Nyang: nu" gi re" shid re" gyeing" nyang: ab nung" too" mo bui" baja" nyangnu" shid re" nga" gungdu: nyang: nang ri ab nung" byid: bye . .
43017020	Ngoo gi nyangnu" da" shid' re" za: Akyu" mho' nyid zi anghoid . Nyangnu" kho" kyoo" yoomo ngoori loem" jeing" loo mo , shid' re" we' akyu" mho' nyid .
43017021	Moug: myid byu yi gi nang ngoori nhang kaid bye khyoo: ri loem" wa shid re nang gi ngoo moo nyid nyid lho: ngoo we' nang moo nyid nyid yhang: ti" hid: bang: we' yha" eig yug moo nyid baja" .
43017022	Nang yo' ngoo gi dadeing: daloem: za: nghoid nyid yhangti" - nyangnu" we' houg: su" bue" loo wa shid' re" ngoori nang byid: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb' ri nyangnu" ri we byid: too" bye .
43017023	Nyangnu" gi joeb byeung" khyo" daloem: za: bui" baja" - ngoo gi nyangnu" moo nyid nyid wigi nang gi ngoo moo nyid nyid . Houg: yoo mo nang ngoori nhang: kaid ziyo' - ngoori jheddab ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" nyangnu" ri jheddab khyoo: mougmyid byu yi se lo boem wa zi nghoid .
43017024	O" nga" phoo we" - Moug aphain" myid aphain" shi" mo Nang ngoori jheddab yoomo byid: to" da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb' ri Ngoori nang byid: too" mo , myang se' loo wa shid' re" ngoo nyid da" joyoo moo nyangnu" ri we' nyid nhang: nau .
43017025	Deing: byeung" nyid da" nga" phoo Mangsoo we" - moug myid gi nang ri ase' boem nghoid loug we' ngoo gi nang ri se' nyid . Hid: bang: gi ngoori nang wiginhang: kaid zi se' nyid boem .
43017026	Nga" da" tho' moo Nang to" da" jhed' khyeing: kang: khyeing: gi nyangnu" moo we bo jo , lho: ngoo we' nyangnu" da" nheugloem: moo yo" loung" jo , wa da" shid' re" Re" da" khyoo: nyangnu" ri ngoo si' nhang: bye . Xo , lho: wigi we' ngoo zei: loo" shi" wa ga: wigi akyu" mho' .
43018001	Hid: yhangti" akyu" bain mho' da" thang: ri Yesu gi nya: cangzoo: yi yo" dage" Kedron gyid nung" thei: tab' khyoo: gu: dab lo" boem .
43018002	Hau: joyoo moo khyam: daloem jo . Yesu yo" cangzoo: yi gi hau: khyam: khoug: khyoo: vang lo . Hau: joyoo moo Yesu yo' nya: cangzoo: yi gi atheing: loo: lhoung yhe: yu" yoomo nyang: ri ung" zo: pyam wa da" Yuda we' hau: joyoo ri se' to .
43018003	Roma gyizoo daphung: yo' khainjung agyi yi yo' pharishe nhang: kaid da" noku yhoem: moo" zung" da" gyi zoo yi ri shu" wigi Yuda gi hau khyam moo re" lho: nyangnu" gi myi bung we' myi doem we gyizi gyi kho joem ri ci boem .
43018004	Aseing Yesu gi nyang: thoung" shau" wa da" moozoo" dangain" ri si' gu nghoid yoomo houg: bang: jhang khyoo: jhen" yhe: lho . Nanu" hang" ri shoo: go" ga: yhe: myid .
43018005	Houg: bang: gi Nazared mo Yesu ri sho: - ga: tid boem . ‹ ‹ Ngoo gi hau: yug nyang: nghoid bye: » ga: tid . Aseing: ri gyivoo yi da" lo , moo ab pyam wa da" Yuda gi houg: bang: yo' dage" yab jo .
43018006	Ngoo gi hau: yug nyang: nghoid bye: ga: Yesu tid lang" su - nyangnu" gi nung zoid' zoid loo" khare" boem lho: dangain" mo , myidjang: moo leung loo" khare" boem .
43018007	Houg: yoomo Aseing Yesu gi nanu" hang" ri shoo: go" ga: doem myid . Houg: bang: we' ‹ ‹ Nazared mo Yesu › › ri sho: ga: doem tid boem .
43018008	Yesu gi hau: yug gi ngoo nyang: nghoid bye: ein: nanu" ri ngoo tid bye . Ngoo gi nanu" ngo ri sho: yen" go: nghoid lang" gi hid: bang: ri loo" nhang: kaid ge" ga: doem tid .
43018009	( Hid: su" ga: tid da" khyoo: gi phoo we" - ngoo nang ngoori ab byid: too" mo , mo dayug we' byug loo" zi aboo baja" ga: da dang byeung" loo wa shid re" nyang: tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" bue" loo wa shid' re" tid zi nghoid . )
43018010	Simun Petru gi sham dacam" ci: re" nyang: gi sham ri she: yu lho: Khainjung agyi pho da" join dayug ri she: jab kaid uri hau: join , pho da" lo , yo shoid mo nukhyab byed gyoo" loo" khare" . Hau: join , pho da" myeing gi Malkhu ga: su: nghoid .
43018011	Aseing Yesu Petru ri tid zigi sham: ri sham: byang moo doem xang too" we' . Nga" Phoo gi ngoori shug nhang: da" kyi" khyeug goem ri ngoo ashug wa ein: nang soin: rhe"
43018012	Hau: thang: ri Roma gyizoo: yi yo" - Yuda byumyu" yi ri zung" lhug da" gyizoo: yi gi Yesu ri myheig tei" ci: lho: wigi Anna zoug: pho jhang khyoo: xang" shid" khe: shu" yhe: lo" boem .
43018013	Anna gi hau: zain re - khainjung agyi moo": Kayapha da" yug phoo nghoid nyid .
43018014	Kayapha gi byu myoo" sho' mo da" shid' re" byu dayug za: te: shid: zigi je ge ga: Yuda zoug: myeing" ci: mo , ri phajhi" byid: su: nghoid .
43018015	Simun Petru yo" gootu: cangzoo: dayug gi Aseing Yesu da" thang: moo cang yhe: lo . Gootu: cangzoo: dayug gi Khainjung agyi pho yo" si' goo" yoomo Yesu yo" dage" Khainjung agyi phoo da" yhoem: vang" khoug: khyoo: yo" bo vang lo .
43018016	Hau uri Petru gi vang" khyam: nghe shoid moo nyid kho'' . Khainjung agyi phoo yo" si' go" da" cangzoo: phoo gi thu' re" lho: khoem" zung" da" zayam myhi , ri akhang" mho' wigi Petru ri fang yu .
43018017	Khoem" zung" da" zooyam myhi , gi nang gi fo: youg da" cangzoo: dayug nghoid da: anghoid la" » ga: myid: ri Petru gi ‹ ‹ ngoo anghoid » ga: tid .
43018018	Houg: lang" khainjung agyi yi ri zung" da" gyizoo: yi yo" - dei: zoo: yi gi ngam" yoomo , - myi: gyu: nghe , da" myikhyoem' yam lheing moo yab jo , zoore" - myi: gang go" nyid boem . Petru we' houg: bang: yo" dage" myi: yab gang nyid .
43018019	khainjung agyi moo": gi Yesu ri nya cangzoo: yi da" khyoo: ri we' nya: jhoug" myeing" joem da" khyoo: ri we' myid: kyeing joeb" yu .
43018020	Yesu phougtu" da" zigi Ngoo gi byu myoo" sho' mo da" shid' khoin" moo khanham we bang bang kho" kyo" jhoug" byid: loo bye . Khanham we' azoug" afu' ngoo akho" yu .
43018021	Houg: su" nghoid ri ci: wim nang ngoori myid: nyid la" . Ngoo kho" kyo" jhoug" byid: da" khyoo: ri gyo: yu" mo ri myid: yu" we' . Ngoo kho" kyo" da" khyoo: ri nyangnu" se' boem bye .
43018022	Hid: su" ga: phougtu" lang" gung zung" gyizoo: dayug gi Yesu ri thoin: lho: khainjung agyi moo" gi « Nang hid: su" aphoug" akhyoid ge phougtu" la" » ga: tid .
43018023	Aseing Yesu gi Nga" dang: amain" nghoid rigi amain" khyoo: ri" toin" shid' we' deing da" khyoo: tid loug ciwim ngoori baid go" ga: tid .
43018024	Hau: thang: ri Anna: khokham" gi Yesu ri myheig tei" lho: khainjung agyi moo": Kayapha jhang khyoo yhe: de" kaid bye .
43018025	Simun Petru gi myi: yab gang nyid da" uri Byu dayham" bang: gi nang we' hau: youg da" byen cang" anghoid la" » ga: myid: boem . Petru gi Ngoo anghoid ga: ngeig pyam .
43018026	Petru wigi nakhyab' jab phyed' byid: shau" da" join pho bidnoem Khainjung agyi dayoug da" join , phoo gi nang ri hau: yug yo" dage" khyam: moo ngoo myang - anghoid la" » ga: tid .
43018027	Petru gi ngoo anghoid ga: dalheing: doem ngeig pyam . Hau: uri nyang: gyo , toin: bye .
43018028	Nabsoin: myo , hain" zoo"Yesu ri Kayapha jang" mo zi Pilaid khokham" khoo" khyoo doem shu" yhe: lo" boem . Yuda zoug yi gi lhed: kaid pui" myen" xoin zoo: wa da" shid' re"-noku thung" tarha" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - - nyang: nya: da" gung ri ced" shang: nyid boem yoomo hau: khokham" khoo" khyoo: abo cang yhe: boem .
43018029	Houg: yoomo Pilaid khokham" gi houg: bang: yo" shau" goo" wa shid' re" nghe: shoid khyoo: thu' re" lho: He: yug ri ce: ja: shoid vhang yoomo yooboo foin: go" ga: myid .
43018030	Houg: bang: gi yooboo daja: ja: shoid su: anghoid rigi zoug: pho jang" moo ngoonu" khe: shu" ri" wa zi anghoid ga: tid boem .
43018031	Pilaid khokham" we' nanu" nyang: he: yug ri shu" loo" ge' . Nanu" nya: thung" tarha" khyo" dang: lo" phyed' ge' ga: tid . Nyang: nu" koem gi ngoonu" gi byu hang" ri we' said pyam wa da" dang: ayo" phyed' ga: doem phougtu" boem .
43018032	( Nyang: nu" doem phougtu" da" khyoo: gi Yesu khasu" shid: wa da" khyoo: ri nang: tid too" bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - - bue" lo khyoo nghoid nyid . )
43018033	Pilaid khokham" gi yhoem: khoug: khyoo: doem vang lo" lho: wigi Aseing Yesu ri khe: yu lho: wigi nang gi Yuda yi da" khokham" nghoid la" » ga: myid .
43018034	Yesu gi he: dang: gyi khoin" ri zoug phoo khyo" myid: la" . houg: su" anghoid lang" gi nga" da" khyoo: ri dayug yug re" koug yoomo myid: la" » ga: tid .
43018035	Pilaid khokham" gi nang gi ngoori Yuda byumyu" dayug yug nghoid ein: jho: nyid la" . Nang ri nga" jhang khyoo: shu" ri" mo , gi Re" da" byumyu" yi yo" - khainjung agyi moo": yi za: danghoid ago" . Nang gi ce: moo" shoid to" lha" » ga: doem myid .
43018036	Aseing Yesu tid zigi Nga" mungdain: gi he: mougmyid yo" asen: nghoid rigi ngoo gi Yuda byumyu" da" lo , moo avang loo" sho' nga" da" cangzoo: yi gi Meing: zain wa zi nghoid . Nga" da" mungdain gyeing" gi he: mougmyid yo" asen: ga: wigi tid .
43018037	Pilaid khokham" gi houg: su" nghoid rigi ‹ ‹ Nang gi khokham" nghoid la" . » ga: myid . Aseing Yesu gi Ngoo gi nang tid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - khokham" nghoid . Ngoo gi deung main" da" tarha" ri kho" kyoo" baja" ga: khu: re" lho: he: mougmyid moo gyoo" lo zi nghoid . Deungmain" da" tarha" yo" sen: mo , dangain" gi nga" da" dang: ri tam" gyo: ago" ga: tid kyo .
43018038	Pilaid khokham" gi deung main" ga: zigi ce: noem nghoid lha" » ga: myid . Hau: thang: ri Pilaid khokham" gi byu yi jhang khyoo: thu' re" lho: wigi he: yug ri said pyam wa yi , da" yooboo gi ngoo ci: amyang ga: tid .
43018039	Nanu" da" thung" boo ri jo ziyo' dakhyoo ti" - - lhed: kaid da" pui" nam" ri thung byu dayug yug ri ngoo lhoung nhang: thu' kaid . Nanu" da" Yuda khokham" phoo ri nhang: kaid wa zi vhoo: go" la" » ga: myid .
43018040	Houg: bang: gi nyang: ri anhang: thu' alhoid pyoin kaid . Baraba ri nhang: thu' kaid we' ga: nyho: yoid lo boem . ( Baraba gi khyangtoug: phoo nghoid nyid . )
43019001	Hau: thang: ri Pilaid khokham" gi Yesu ri khe: shu" loo" nhang: lho: gyoem thoung" wigi yug nhang .
43019002	Gyizoo yi gi zu: mug ri koid ; yu lho: Yesu da" vhuloem moo zhung" byid . Byi ni sheing: ri we' nyang: ri foid byid: to .
43019003	Nyangnu" gi Yesu jang" moo tain" re" boem lho: « Yuda khokham" phoo kang: sheing: nyid baja" o" » ga: tid zoore thoin: byid: boem ago" .
43019004	Pilaid khokham" gi nghi: khyoo: dalheing: thu' lo" lho: Meing: byu yi ri yu" ge' . He: yug ri said pyam wa shid' re" ngoo ce: yooboo we' amyang khyoo: nanu" we' si' wa shid' re" nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoo shu" thu' loo wa ga: tid .
43019005	Aseing Yesu we' zu: mug ri zhoung" ci: lho: byi ni sheing: ri void ci: wigi thu' re . Pilaid khokham" gi yu" ge' he: yug nyang: nghoid bye: ga: tid .
43019006	Khainjung agyi yi yo" - no ku" yhoem moo" zung" lhug da" gyizoo: yi gi Aseing: Yesu ri myang lang" nyang: ri pyang" zeing: moo baid jen" said pyam ge' ga: nyho: phau kaid ago" . Pilaid khokham" gi Nanu" nyang: nyang: ri khe: shu" lo" lho: pyang" zeing: moo baid jen" said pyam ge' nyang: ri shid: dam byid: wa zigi ngoo ce: yooboo we amyang ga: tid .
43019007	Meing: byu phung: moo" gi He: yug gi nya: da" gung ri Mangso da" nya: zoo: nghoid ga: tid yoomo shid: dam kham: moin: da" khyoo: - ngoonu" da" tarha" moo bo nyid ; ga: tid nyid boem .
43019008	Houg: bang: da" dang: zheing: shaug" gyoo: lang" Pilaid khokham" gi je gyo: gyoug lo .
43019009	Houg: yoomo yhoem: khoug: khyoo: doem vang lo" lho: Aseing Yesu ri Nang gi kha: mo re" zi nghoid lha" » ga: doem myid . Nghoidloug we' Aseing Yesu gi jed' we" aga: loo: tam" to .
43019010	Pilaid khokham" gi nang ri ngoo gi nang ri yo" nhang: kaid da" akhang" we' pyang" zeing: moo yo" baid jen" said pyam wa da" amyeing we' ci: zi nang asi rhe" ga: myid .
43019011	Aseing Yesu phougtu" zigi nang ri Mangsoo ab byid: yoomo za: hid: yhangti" yo" zi nghoid . Houg: yoomo ngoori we' re" da" lo , moo ab byid: su: gi yooboo je gyi wa nghoid - ga: tid .
43019012	Hid: su" ga: tid yoomo Pilaid khokham" gi Yesu ri doem lhoid kaid wa da" khyoo: sho: nyid . Nghoidloug we' Meing: byu yi gi he: yug ri doem lhoid kaid nghoid rigi Aseing: zoug moo" gi Ketha khokham" da" bidnoem anghoid loo . Hang" nghoid loug we' nyang: nya: da" gungdu: ri khokham" ga: tid su: gi Ketha khokham" ri tu: lhei" su: nghoid - ga: je nyho: lo ago" .
43019013	He: da" dang: ri shaug" gyoo: lang" gi Pilaid khokham" gi Yesu ri nghe: shoid khyoo: shu" thu' lo" lho: Lug pyi" myhu" to" da" tarha" gabyam: tho' mo , zhungtang tho' moo zhoung: jo , nhang . ( Hau: lug pyi" myhu" to" da" gabyam: ri Hebre myeing" khyo" gi Gabatha ga: da" joyoo nghoid . )
43019014	Hau: da" ayo , gi lhed: kaid pui" xang: shid" nyid" - bid gung zoo: tu: ri" yo , nghoid bye . Pilaid khokham" gi yu" ge' He: yug gi nanu" da" khokham" nghoid ga: Yuda byumyu" yi ri tid .
43019015	Houg: bang: gi nyang: ri said pyam ge' said pyam ge' baid jen" said pyam ge' ga: doem nyho: lo ago" . Pilaid khokham" gi Nanu" da" khokham" phoo ri pyang" zeing: tho' moo baid jen" said pyam noug go" la" » ga: doem myid . khainjung agyi moo": yi gi ngoonu" moo Ketha khokham" mo led lho: gootu: khokham" anyid ga: phougtu" boem .
43019016	Houg: lang" Pilaid khokham" gi Yesu ri pyang" zeing: tho' moo baid jen" said pyam wa shid' re" nyangnu" da" lo , moo jha" ab kaid bye . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nyangnu" gi Yesu ri khe: shu" lo" boem bye .
43019017	Yesu gi vhu" gyab' boug ga: da" joyoo khyoo: - nya: pyang" zeing: ri vu , lho: yhe: lo . ( Hau: da" joyoo ri Hebre myeing" khyo" Golagotha ga: zi nghoid . )
43019018	Houg: moo Yesu ri Pyang" zeing: moo baid jen" said boem bye . Yesu yo" dage" gootu: byu eig yug ri we' Yesu da" lo , yo shoid moo dayug - lo , koung" shoid moo dayug - pyang" zeing: tho' moo bo baid jen" said boem . Yesu rigi gung" gung moo kaid to .
43019019	Pilaid khokham" gi-xang: yoeb ladoo" mougsoug" lhid" lho: Aseing Yesu da" pyang" zeing: tho' moo tab too" nhang . Hau: da" mougsoug" gi ( Yuda byu yi khokham" Nazared voo byu Yesu ga: zi nghoid .
43019020	Yesu ri pyang" zeing ; tho' moo baid jen" said da" joyoo gi voogung yo" gye jhang yoomo byu myoo" sho' mo , gi hau: xang: yoeb ladoo" mougsoug" ri re" yo" nghab boem . Hau: mougsoug" ri Hebre myeing" - Latin myeing" - Greek myeing" khyo" lhid" tab to" boem .
43019021	Khainjung agyi yi gi Yuda khokham" ein: alhid" goo" - He: yug gi ngoo gi Yuda khokham" nghoid ga: tid su ein: za: date: lhid" too" ge' ga: Pilaid khokham" ri re" kyo" to" boem .
43019022	Pilaid khokham" gi Ngo lhid" to" khyo" nghoid bye: ga: doem tid .
43019023	Gyizoo: yi gi Aseing Yesu ri pyang" zeing: moo bain baid jen" to" thang: ri Yesu da: byisheing: ri myid: du khyo , lho: dayug dadu zheing: yu lo" ago" - nyangnu" gi nya: adang byisheing: ri nyangnu" me" lab , lho: yu lo" boem . Nghoidloug we' hau: da" byi: gi coeb' khyoo" aboo loo: yo , to" da" byi: nghoid yoomo
43019024	Gyizoo: yi gi he: byi: ri aceig goo" - me" lab lho: dayu shang ga: nyang: cang" nyang: sham: go" nyid . Gyizoo: yi hid: su" zheing: koid ; da" khyoo: gi jhoem mungdang: moo Houg: bang: gi nya: da" byi: ri zheing: gam go . Nga" da" byi: sheung ri me" lab , lho yu lo" boem: gyizoo yi gi hid yhang: ti" koid boem ago" .
43019025	Hau: da" uri Yesu da" nya: myhi' yo" - nya: myhi' da" nya: no gi Klopha da" yhoem: seing: myhi' Mari yo" - Magadala voo mo Mari we' Aseing Yesu da" pyang" zeing: yang moo yab jo , ago" .
43019026	Yesu gi nya: myhi' yo" - nyang: jheddab da" cangzoo: phoo yab jo , ziri myang . Houg: yoomo Yesu gi nya: myhi' ri tid . He: yug gi re" zoo: nghoid - ga: tid .
43019027	Hau: thang: ri cangzoo: phoo ri he: yug gi re" myhi , nghoid ga: doem tid . Hau: yo , mo wigi hau: cangzoo: phoo gi nyang: yo" dage" nyid wa nya: yhoem: moo shu" lo" .
43019028	Hau: ayo , moo moo" dangain" bain bye: da" khyoo: ri Aseing Yesu gi si' yoomo Jhoem mougsoug" moo bo ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - bue" loo wa shid' re" Yesu gi ngoo gyid shed' ga: tid .
43019029	Hau: joyoo moo gyid jhen: yo" kaid pyeing to" da" yam daloem: jo . Houg: bang: gi panglai gyid nyoeb thei" moo gyid jhen nyhoin" yu wigi jam pheing" yang: moo tab' lho: Yesu da" nhoid moo yhoin" jhoug boem .
43019030	Aseing Yesu gi hau: gyid jhen ri dajhi' shug lho: moo" bain bye" ga: tid zoore" - vhuloem ri nghoe" khyo kaid wigi kang: khyo" loo" khari" bye .
43019031	Yuda zoug: myeing ci: mo , gi pyang" zeing: moo baid jen" lhang" too" su: da" khyid ri youg khyau" lho: mang ri yu loo" wa da" amyeing" byid: wa da" shid' re" Pilaid khokham" ri mho' ago" . Nyangnu" hid: su" mho' da" khyoo: gi hau: nyid gi bainthu wim: nyid" nghoid . yoomo Yuda Dougno: Bidnyid ri shid: mang doem: ri pyang" zeing: moo alhang" too" nhang: noug yoomo we' nghoid da - hau: Dougno: Bidnyid gi - gooki" led' da" gyeungshang: Dougno: Bidnyid nghoid .
43019032	Houg: yoomo gyizoo: yi gi re" lho: wigi Aseing Yesu yo" dage" pyang" zeing: moo bo jen" lhang" to" da" xang: shid" dayoug da" khyid ri youg khyau" lho: gootu: dayoug da" khyid: ri we' youg khyoug" byid: pyam boem .
43019033	Nyang: nu" Yesu jhang ju" yhe: uri nyang: shid: jo , bye: yoomo Yesu da" khyid: ri gi ayoug khyoug" loo: nghoid ago" .
43019034	Nghoidloug we' gyizoo: dayug gi Yesu da" nam joug moo lham: toin wi thau" kaid da" uri dalheing: dam nyang: suid" yo" gyid yau thu' lo .
43019035	( He: khyoo: ri nanu" we' loem" jeing" loo wa shid' re" myojid" myang da" sagsi: dayug gi tid kyoo" bye . Houg: su" tid kyo" da" khyoo: gi deingmain" da" khyoo: nghoid . Hau: yug nyang: nya: dang: main" da" khyoo: - ri nyang: se . )
43019036	Hid: su" bue" lo da" khyoo: gi nya: shoo" youg dakhaid ri we' gyoug wa anghoid . wa ga: Jhoem: mungdang: moo bo ziyo' dakhyoo ti" - bue" lo da" khyoo: nghoid .
43019037	Gootu: da" jhoem dang: moo we' Byu yi gi nyangnu" thau" phoug too" su: ri nyangnu" yu" nyid boem wa" - ga: boo lhid" to" ga: tid .
43019038	Hau: da" thang: ri Aramathi voo mo Yoseb gi Yesu da" nghain" doem ri yu shung: wa da" shid' re" Pilaid khokham" jang" moo akhang" yhe: mho' . Yoseb gi Yuda zoug myeing" ci: mo , ri gyoug yoomo boin: abang" da" Yesu cangzoo: dayug nghoid nyid . Pilaid khokham" amyeing" byid: yoomo Yoseb gi nghain" doem ri yhe: yu bye .
43019039	Shid' phyang" Aseing Yesu jang" moo myen gung ri re" shau" su: - Nikodi we' moora: yo" nam pyo: seig xu: lhu: lheig to" da" nam pyo: xu: soem" xi: juid" koo: ci: lho: Yoseb jang" moo bo cang yhe: lo .
43019040	Nya: eig yug gi Aseing Yesu da" nghain" doem ri yu khyo , lho: Yuda byumyu" yi da" mang myhoeb thung" jo ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - - nam pyo: moora: yo" dage" pain" phyu: yo" thoeb boem .
43019041	Yesu ri pyang" zeing: moo baid jen" said da" joyoo nam moo khyam daloem jo . Hau: khyam: khoug: moo hang" ri we' anyhoeb' yu" shi" da" loeb seig daloem: jo .
43019042	Hau: nyid" gi Yuda Byu yi Dougno: Bidnyid ju" yid nghoid yoomo nghain" doem ri jang" moo jo , da" hau: loeb seig moo yhe: kaid to" boem .
43020001	Akhid" Labain nyid" myo , myang zoo" ri Magadala Mari gi loeb' moo re" yu" da" uri loeb' khoem" mo da" lugloem: tu: se: pyam to" ziri yhe: myang .
43020002	Nyang: gi Simun Petru yo" - Yesu jheddab da" cangzoo: yi jhang khyoo gei lo" lho: Aseing: ri loeb mo wigiyu lo" byug boem bye: - khayoo: too" go" la' - asi ga: lo" tid kyo .
43020003	Houg: thang" ri Petru yo" goo tu: cangzoo: phoo gi loeb' khyoo: yhe: lo" ago" .
43020004	Hau: eig yug gi dage" gei yhe: loo" nghoid loug - goo tu: cangzoo: phoo gi Petru tho' moo je yo" gei yoomo loeb' moo xang: shid" ju" yhe .
43020005	Nyang: gi yhe: goeb' yu" kaid ri loeb' khoug: moo pain" gyo" jo , ziri date: myang . Nghoidloug we' nyang: gi loeb khoug: moo avang loo" loo: za: nyid nyid .
43020006	Nya: thang: moo cang ju" re" da" Simun Petru gi ju" re" yo' loeb' khoug: khyoo: dain: vang lo" ri pain" khyoid: khyo , to" ziri we'
43020007	Yesu da" vhu" loem moo thoeb' da" vhu" thoeb' gi goo tu: joyoo moogyo" jo , ziri we lo" myang .
43020008	Hau: thang: ri loeb' moo xang: shid" ju" re" da" gootu: cangzoo: we' loeb' khoug: moo cang : vang lo" yu" da" uri houg: moo bue" lo da" khyoo: ri myang yoomo loem" jeing" loo bye .
43020009	( Yesu gi shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo" wa ga: da" jhoem: mungdang: ri houg: bang: akhid" ju" sho ase' gyo: boem shi . )
43020010	Hau: thang: ri cangzoo: eig yug gi doem tau" lo" ago" .
43020011	Mari gi loeb nam moo yab lho: ngau nyid . Nyang: gi ngau zoori loeb' khoug: moo goeb' yu" kaid da
43020012	Yesu da" gung doem vhuloem yang: moo Mouglagyoo: dayug khyid: thang: khyoo: dayug - Mouglagyoo: eig yug - bang: bang: phyu: da" byimi void ci: lho: zhoung: jo , ziri myang .
43020013	Hau: Mouglagyoo: eig yug gi myiyi: zoo: we" ci: wim ngau nyid lha" » ga: myid . Mari koem gi nyangnu" - Nga" Aseing: ri yu lo" byug bye . Nyangnu nyang ri khayoo: to" zi ngoo asi ga: tid .
43020014	Houg: su" tid lho: thang: khyoo: lheing: yu" kaid ri Yesu yab jo , ziri myang . Nghoidloug we' Yesu nghoid zi asi .
43020015	Yesu gi myiyi: zoo: nang we" - ci: koid ngau nyid . Nang hang" ri sho: yen ? ga: myid . Houg: lang" Mari gi Yesu ri khyam: zung" su: ga: jho: lho: nheig boo phoo we" nang nyang ri yu lo" nghoid rigi nang kha joyoo moo to" zi ngoori tid kyoo" we' ngoo nyang ri yhe: yu ci: loo" wa .
43020016	Aseing Yesu gi Mari we" ga: yoid . Houg: lang" Mari gi lheing: yu" lho: Hebre myeing" khyo" Raboni - ga: tu . ( Raboni ga: da" dangkang: gi sara: ga: da" dang: nghoid . )
43020017	Yesu gi ngoori azei: ci: - ngoo gi nga" pho jhang khyoo: ashau" do , loo" shi" - nghoid loug we' nga" mang nhung" be jhang khyoo: yhe: lho: nga" phoo ga: da" Nanu" da" nya: phoo - Nga" Mangsoo ga: da" nanu" da" Mangso jhang khyoo: - ngoo doem tau" loo" loo: wa da" khyoo: ri tid kyoo" ge' ga: tid .
43020018	Houg: yoomo Magadala Mari gi cangzoo: yi jhang khyoo: lo" lho: nyang: Yesu ri nyang: myang khoo , bye: da" khyoo: yo' nyang: nyang ri pyeung: kaid da khyoo: ri lo" tid kyo" Aseing: khasu" ga: pyeung: kaid da" khyoo: ri lo" tid kyo .
43020019	Cangzoo: yi gi Yuda zoug: myeing" ci: mo , ri gyoug yoomo Labain myen , gamgung yoo ri yhoem: khoem" myhed" pyam lho: zeung: foem: nyid boem . Hau: da" uri Yesu gi ju" lo lho: nyangnu" da" mo , phung: gung moo lo yab jo . Nanu" moo myenjham" ngei pyo: khyoo: dajo , nyid baja" ga: tid .
43020020	Houg: su" bain tid lang" gi Yesu da" lo , yo nam joug ri cangzoo: yi ri toin" shid . Cangzoo: yi gi Yesu ri shau" myang boem yoomo gau yi nyid boem .
43020021	Hau: thang: ri we' dalheing: - Yesu gi nanu" moo myenjham" khyoo: dajo , jo , baja" ga: nga" phoo gi ngoori nhang: kaid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - - nanu" ri we' ngoo nhang: kaid ga: tid .
43020022	Houg: su" bain tid thang: ri Yesu gi cangzoo: yi da" tho' moo so' moid kaid lho: gyeungshang: da" Venyi: ri kham: yu ge" ga: tid .
43020023	Nanu" gi sube" da" yooboo ri khyoid pyam byid: ri nyangnu" gi yooboo gyoid loo" wa zi nghoid . Nanu" wigi akhyoid byid: nghoid rigi nyangnu" da" yooboo gi khyoid pyam shau" wa zi anghoid ga: tid .
43020024	Yesu jure" da" ayo , moo ( Zoo: zoem" ga: myheing da" ) cangzoo: daxe eig yug mo , dayug nghoid da" Tho" ma gi cangzoo: yi yo" dage" anyid eung: .
43020025	Houg: yoomo cangzoo: byen cang" yi gi Yesu ri ngoonu" myang bye: - ga: lhoem tid kyo" boem . Thoma gi lo , mo da" ten" zei: baid khoo: yo' nam joug mo da" dam , khoo: ri za: ashau" soeb' yu" rigi ngoo aloem" ga: tid .
43020026	Hau: thang: shed nyid" koo: myang" ri cangzoo: yi gi yhoem: khoug: moo doem zheing: foem: to" boem . Thoma we' dage" nyid . khoem" dangain" ri myhed" too" nghoid loug we' Aseing Yesu gi vang lo wigi nyangnu" da" mo , phung: gung moo yab jo , lho: nanu" moo myenjham" khyoo: dajo , jo , baja" ga: tid .
43020027	Hau: thang: Thoma ri re" lo , nyoug" yo" hid: moo thau" yu" we' nga" lo , joem ri we yu" we' Re" da" lo , yhoin" kaid lho: nga" nam joug moo soeb yu" we' aloem" jeing" loo: loem shoid khyoo: akoid . Loem" jeing" nyid we' ga: tid .
43020028	Thoma gi Nga" Aseing: - Nga" Mangsoo - nang nghoid bye: nhung: lha" » ga: phaug tu" .
43020029	Aseing Yesu gi nang gi ngoori myang lho: daloem" la" . Ngoori amyang loug loem" jeing" mo gi ngi lho , boem wa" ga tid .
43020030	Yesu gi he: da" mougsoug" moo abo lhid" to" da" mau" pho" alhoo: again myoo" sho' ri nya: cangzoo: yi da" Shid khoin" moo toin" shid bye .
43020031	Nghoidsho' loug we' Yesu gi Mangso da" nya: zoo: Meshia nghoid da" khyoo: ri nanu" loem" jeing" loo wa ziyo' nanu" nyang ri loem" jeing" lho: kang so' yoo" wa shid re" he khyoo: joem ri lhid" to" zi nghoid .
43021001	Hau: thang: ri Yesu gi Tiberi gyid nung" yam moo cangzoo: yi ri nya: gung dalheing: doem thu' shug . Thu' shug da" aved' gi hid: su" nghoid nyid .
43021002	Simun Petru - Thoma ( Galile meing: Kana voo byu ) Nathanela - Zebedi da" nya: zoo: yi yo" cangzoo: gootu: eig youg bang: gi dage" nyid boem ago" .
43021003	Simon Petru gi gootu: ri ngoo ngoodo , kuang yhe: loo" wa ga: tid . ‹ ‹ Houg: bang: gi ngoonu" we' bo cang ri" wa ga: tid boem . » Houg: yoomo nyangnu" gi lhid' yo' ngoodo , kuang thu' yhe: lo" boem . Nghoid loug we' hau: myen goin" nyangnu" ci" we' ashau" boem .
43021004	Bid xain" lo da" uri Yesu gi gyid yam moo yab jo , nghoid loug we' cangzoo: yi gi Yesu nghoid zire: ase' boem .
43021005	Hau thang: ri nyang: - nyangnu" ri zoo: lu: yi we" - nanu" ci: ayoo" shi" goo" rhe" ga myid: - . houg: bang: gi ‹ ‹ Ci: ayo" boem o" » ga: phoug tid .
43021006	Yesu gi nanu" lhid' lo , yo shoid khyoo: - goin re" du" yu" ge' nanu" ngoodo' shau" kuang boem ago" wa ga: tid . Aseing: tid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nyangnu" gi goin ri du" khyo' kaid lang" ngoo: myo: yoo" yoomo ayo" doem lang thoid yu boem ago" da .
43021007	Yesu jhed' dab , da" cangzoo: phoo gi Aseing: danghoid nhung: o" - ga: Petru ri tid kyo . Aseing: nghoid ga: zi ri shaug" gyoo: lang" Petru gi nyang: khyoid to" da" byi: ri gung moo baid yeig lho: wigi gyid nung" khyoo: byam gyoo" loo" khare" . Khasu" wim gari nyang gi byi mi khyoid pyam lho: mod zei: nyid yoo mo nghoid .
43021008	Cangzoo: goo" ji gi lhid' yo' gyid yam khyoo to" lho: ngoodo' byeung" sho' bo da" goin ri lang she: yu" boem . Nyangnu" gi gyid yam mo wim: xi: lam' koo: ve: jang" moo zheing: nyid boem .
43021009	Nyangnu" gi lhid' tho' mo gyo" lho: tung: gung moo ju" lo lang" zooyho' ri we' myi: gyu: moo kang: da" ngoodo ri we' lo" myang boem
43021010	Yesu gi nanu" akhid" yo" da" ngoodo' dayham" ri ci: loo ge" ga tid .
43021011	Simun Petru gi lhid' tho' moo do , lo" lho: ngoodo' zeing: joem yo" byeung" jo , da" goin ri tung: gung ju" sho' she: yu da . Ngoodo' dasho: wim: xe soem" du: bo da: - ngoodo' houg: myhoo , myoo: nghoid loug we' goin gi ajeig loo .
43021012	Yesu gi lo zoo: ge' . ga: nyangnu" ri lhoung nyangnu" da" Aseing: nghoid ziri se' boem yoomo cangzoo: yi kha: yug we' nang hang nghoid lha" » ga: avoem" myid: boem nghoid da .
43021013	Yesu gi nyangnu" nyid da" jang" moo yhe: lho: zooyho' ri yu wigi nyangnu" ri byid . Ngoodo' ri we' houg: su" yu lho: byid .
43021014	He zigi nyang: shid: jang mo doem dei to'' lo thang ricangzoo: yi ri gung thu' shed da" zigi he: lheing: yo" ri soem" lheing: nghoid bye .
43021015	Cangzoo: yi bain zoo lang"Yesu gi Yohan nya: zoo: Simun we" - hid: bang: jheddab tho' moo nang ngoori je jheddab la" » ga: Simun Petru ri myid . Simun gi nghoid Aseing: we" - nang ri ngoo jheddab zi nang se' ga: tid .
43021016	Yesu dalheing: doem tid zigi Yohan nya: zoo: Simun we" - nang ngoori jheddab la" » ga: doem myid . ‹ ‹ Petru gi nghoid Aseing: we" - nang ri ngoo jheddab zi nang si' gu nghoid ga: tid › › Aseing Yesu gi nga" yang joem ri zung" nyid we' ga: tid .
43021017	Soem" lheing: ein: lheing: we' yesu gi Yohan nya: zoo: Simun we" - nang ngoori jheddab la" » ga: doem myid . Hid: su" soem" lheing: ju" sho' myid: nyid yoomo Petru gi nheig koug lo wigi Aseing: we" nang gi ce: noem ri we' dangain" si' su: nhgoid' - nang ri ngoo jheddab zigi nang se' ga: doem tid . Yesu gi nga" yang joem ri zung" nyid' we' ga: doem tid .
43021018	Deing" deing nang ri ngoo tid zigi nang gi ngi shi" da" uri ri ri soin' ci: lho: loo" nau jang" moo loo" se' nyid . Mang loo" lang" gi nang gi eig lo , goin" tu: lho: subi" gi nang ri tei" wigi nang anau lo" da" joyoo khyoo: shu" lo" boem wa ga: tid .
43021019	( Hid: su" ga: tid jang" moo Petru gi ci: te" da" shid gyoin yo" - Mangso da" myonhoo: phung" Yoeb thoin" pang byid: wa da" khyoo: - Yesu tid shed' zi nghoid . ) Hid: su" ga: bain tid lang" Petru ri nga" thang: moo cang we' ga: Yesu tid .
43021020	Petru gi lheing: yu" kaid da" uri nya: thang: moo Yesu jheddab da" cangzoo: phoo ri myang . Hau: yug gi myen xoin: zoo: uri Yesu da" nam moo nghe: to" lho: Aseing we" - Aseing ri gyivoo yi da" lo , moo ab pyam wa su: gi kha yug nghoid wa lha" » ga: myid su: nyang: nghoid nyid .
43021021	Petru gi hau: da" cangzoo: phoo ri myang lang" Aseing: we" he: yug gi ci: te" su: nghoid lha" » ga: Yesu ri myid .
43021022	Yesu gi ngoo doem gyoo" re" da" bidnyid ju sho' nyang: ri dei nyid nhang: nau nghoid rigi houg: gi nang yo' ci: sen: lha" . Nang gi nga" thang: cang we' ga: tid .
43021023	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo hau: cangzoo: phoo gi ashid: loo: wa ga: da" lu dang: gi cangzoo: yi da" akhoug: moo byo sain" loo" bye nghoid loug we' Yesu gi-hau: cangzoo: phoo gi ashid: loo: wa ga: tid nau zi anghoid . Ngoo doem gyoo" lo da" bidnyid ju" sho' nyang: ri dei nyid nhang: nau nghoid ri hau: zigi nang yo" ci: asen: la" . ein: wigi date: tid zi nghoid .
43021024	He da" khyoo: ri lhid" too" su: gi hau: khyoo: ri tid da" cangzoo: phoo nyang: nghoid bye . Nyang: tid da" khyoo: joem gi deung main" nyid ziri ngoonu" se' .
43021025	Yesu zei: da" moozoo" goo tu: myoo" sho' jo , shi" . Hau: zei: to" da" moozoo" dangain" ri daja: thang: moo daja: lhid" to" nghoid rigi mougmyid gyab , goin" jang" moo hau: mougsoug" pug joem too" wa da" jo yoo lang" jo , loo: zi anghoid ein: ngoo myed o" .
44001001	Jheddab da" Thophilu we' Yesu gi nya: moozoo" zei: shed" da" bidnyid mo wigi-Nyang: ri moug: khung: khyoo: to' yu" da" bidnyid moo ju" sho-zei: lo ziyo' jhoug" byid: lo da" khyoo: dangain" - ngoo xang: shed" lhid" kaid' jang" moo boo bye .
44001002	Yesu gi moug: khung: khyoo: to' yu zi ashug" shi" uri nya: lagyoo: yi ga: nyang: khyen: yu too" mo , ri-Nyang: gi gyeungshang: da" Venyi khyo" wigi pyein: dang: joem ri byid: too" khari" bye .
44001003	Nyang: shid: kham: thang: ri myed: xi: nyid" agyoo: moo nyang: gi myoo" sho' lheing: lagyoo: yi jang" moo nya: gung ri cang toin" shid lho: nyang: gi dadei nyid khyoo: ri loem' ge" da" sagsi: myoo" sho' yug ri toin" shid too" bye . Lagyoo: yi gi yesu ri shau myang boem wigi-Nyang: gi nyangnu" ri Mangso mungdain khyoo: tid kyo .
44001004	Nyang: nu" gi dage" zeung: lo boem uri Yesu gi lagyoo: yi ri Yerusalem voomoo" mo a thu loo" goo - nanu" ri tid kyo" too" gu nghoid - nga" phoo Mangsoo byid: to" jhung: shug ri dalang" nyid ge' .
44001005	Yohan gi gyid yo' Babtisma byid: bye - nghoid loug we' khamyhoo , nyid" akyoo: ri nanu" gi gyeungshang: venyi wigi babtisma kham byid: zi shau" goo" wa nghoid .
44001006	Yesu gi lagyoo: yi yo' dage" zeung: phoung nyid da" uri nyangnu" gi Yesu ri Aseing: we" Israela byumyu" yi ri he: ayo moo hau: mungdain ri doem toug" byid: wa la" » ga: myed: ago" .
44001007	Yesu gi nyangnu" ri-Nga" pho , da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , yo' mhe , phyed' to" da" ayo , ri nanu" gi asi noo" ga: tid .
44001008	Nghoid loug we' nanu" da" a tho' moo gyeungshang: Venyi ju" gyoo" loo lang" gi-nanu" gi yoem vhoo" pyeung byid: zi shau" wigi Yerusalem voomoo" mo zi Yuda meing: goin - Samari meing: yo' moug: myed thang sho' moo nga" sagsi: yi bue" loo" goo" wa-ga: tid .
44001009	Hid: su" ga: bain tid thang: ri lagyoo: yi yu" go" nyid uri nyang - Yesu gi moug: khung: khyoo: to' yu zi shau" bye - hau: thang: ri jhoem" moug" thei" gi nyang: nu da" myo , shid' ti: mo-Nyang: ri nghoeb ci: lho: do , lo" byug bye .
44001010	Lagyoo: yi gi Yesu do , lo" nyid uri moug: khung: khyoo: nghang yu" go" nyid ri-byimi phyu: void ci: da" byu eig yug - nyed' dain tung" nyangnu" nam" moo re" yab , kaid' lho:
44001011	Galile byu yi we" - nanu" ciwim wigi moug: khung: khyoo: nghang yu" nyid go" la" . Nanu" shid khoin" mo moug: khung: khyoo: to' yu shau" da" hau: Yesu gi-moug: khung: khyoo: do , lo" ziri nanu" myang ziyo' dakhyoo" ti-houg: su" nyang: doem gyoo" ri" wa zi nghoid - ga: tid kyo .
44001012	Hau: thang: ri lagyoo: yi gi Yerusalem voomoo" yo' khyoo: main: agung kho' koo: vi: go" da - Zhainlun boem mo wigi Yerusalem voomoo" khyoo: doem lo" boem .
44001013	Nyangnu" gi voomoo" khoug: moo vang lo" lho: nyangnu" lhoung nyid da" yhoem: tho' pyam: khyoo: do , lo" ago" . Nyang: nu" gi Petru Yaku Ander-philib thoma Batholume - Mathe Alphe nya: zoo: Yaku myu" jhed nheugloem: gyi: da" Simun yo' Yaku nya: zoo: Yuda zheung: nghoid ago" .
44001014	Nyangnu" gi Yesu nya: myhi' Mari yo" we-goo tu: myi: myi: yi yo" we' Yesu da" nya: no , yo" we' atheing: loo: foem: phoung akyu" mho' lho: danyid nyid boem .
44001015	Hau: thang: atoung" myang" ri loem" mo , dasho: eig xi: yug koo - zeung: foem: phoung nyid boem ago , Houg: lang" Petru gi to' yab , lho: wigi
44001016	Nga" Mang: nhung" yi we-Yesu ri myheug mo , ri khyoo: shu" shed su - Yuda yo' sen: lho: wigi gyeungshang: da" Venyi khyo" David da" nhoid mo tid to" da-Jhoem: mungdang: gi zung: loo wa zi nghoid bye .
44001017	Khasu" wimgari - Yuda gi ngoonu" yo' dage" moo" zei: wa shid re" khyen: too" su: nghoid yoomo nyang: gi ngoonu" phung moo boo su: nghoid nyid . (
44001018	Nyang: gi akhyeung" lo , moo" khyo" yo" da" ngei wigi myed jang: dacu , qei yu lho: houg: moo byid gyo" shid: pyam bye . Nya: voem: doug: we' boug dang: lo" wigi u: joem dangain" boug sain" pyam bye ga: tid kyo .
44001019	Yerusalem voomoo" moo nyid mo , dangain - hau: khyoo: ri shau" gyo: boem bye - Hougsu" wi nyangnu" gi hau: nya: da" myed jang: cu' ri nyangnu" da" myeing" khyo" Akeladama ga: myheung to" ago - Akeladama ga: tid zigi suid" moug: myed ga: zi nghoid . )
44001020	Khasu" wimgari - Coung" nghei pug moo nya: yhoem: gi yhoem: koem: bue" lo" wigi houg: moo hang" we' anyid loo: goo" baja-ga: we' hau: lho: nya: da" aya: ri we' goo tu: byu dayug yu pyam byid: baja" ga: wigi we' lhid" to-ga: tid .
44001021	Hau: yug gi Yohan Babtisma mungdang: kho" kyo" ayo , mo shed" lho: Yesu ngoonu" da" shid khoin" mo moug: khung: khyoo: shu" do , lo" bidnyid ju" sho' Yesu gi ngoonu" yo' dage" so" yen" da" ayo , bain sho' ngoonu" da" phung moo boo su: dayug nghoid da -

44001025	Too" kho' da" nya: jo yoo moo lagyoo: dayug khyo" moo" voin vu , wa shid mo-he: eig yug mo kha: yug ri nang khyen: yu bye: khyoo: ri ngoonu" ri toin" shid' byid: we-ga: mho' nyid ago" .
44001026	Houg: lang" nyangnu" gi-hau eig yug mo khyen: yu wa shid re" me" coem kaid' ago - Mathia gi me" ung: yoomo lagyoo: daxe: dayoug phung: moo bo kaid' loung: yu boem bye . Bible sociaty 29-8-2001
44002001	Pentikoti bidnyid ju '' loo lang-loem'' jeung" da'' byu yi dangain'' mo joyoo da loem: moo za: zeung: phoung nyid boem ago" .
44002002	Ug lid hau , lo te" da" thui: da ja-moung: khung: khyo" nyid' dain tung" myeung thu lo wigi nyangnu" zhoung: jo , da" yhoem: goin" jang" moo hau: da" thui: byeung" jo , bye .
44002003	Hau: thang: ri nyangnu" gi-nge" byo sain" lo" da" myiyham: yo' du , da" zi nyangnu" yug khang" mo" da" tho' moo dab , jo , ziri myang ago" .
44002004	Nyangnu" dangain" bang: gi gyeungshang: da" Venyi: byeung" lo wigi Hau: Venyi wigi yo" tid wa yoem: so' byid: ziyo' dakyoo" ti" gootu: myeing" aja: ja: ri tid thu lo boem .
44002005	Moug: myed tho' moo dajo , da" mungdain loem khang" moo" mo ju" re" boem da - Mangsoo ri gyoug phau" da" Yuda byu yi gi Yerusalem voomoo" moo nyid nyid ago" .
44002006	Hid: yhang: ti" myeung da" thui: ri zheung: shaug" gyoo: lang" mung" byu yi zeung: foem: lo boem ago" . Nyangnu" yug khang" moo" gi loem" jeing" mo , tid nyid da" dang: ri nyang: nya myeing" khyo" se' gyo: yu boem yoomo mung" byu yi gi mau" dain nyid boem .

44002023	Mangsoo gi nyang: soin: to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" Yesu ri nanu" da" lo , moo ab pyam wa shid re" myed phyed' too" su: nyang: nghoid da" lo , moo ab pyam wa shid re" myed phyed' too" su: nyang: nghoid bye . 44002027	Khasu" wim gari Nang gi ngoori - shid: lo" da moovo , moug: moo she: pyam too" wa zi anghoid . Nang gi loemlug da re" deizoo: ri loeb duang: khoug: moo boeb , pyam nhang: wa zi anghoid ga: tid nyid .
44002028	Nang gi ngoori kangso' dei nyid jang: moo ju" lo" da - khyoo: ri toin" shid byid: abye: da . Nang gi ngoo yo' dage" nyid yoomo ngoori ngei pyoo: nhang: loo wa nghoid ga: tid .
44002029	Nga" mang: nhung" yi we' subi" fu" yen da" ngoonu" nya: phoug" - David khokham" da" khyoo: ri Nanu" ri bang bang za: tid kyoo" wa . Nyang: gi shid: lo" lho: nyang: ri myhoeb shoung: pyam abye: go - nya: da" loeb gi akhid" nyid ju" sho' hid: ngoonu" da" shid' khoin" moo jo , jo .
44002030	Nyang: gi lapi: nghoid lho-Mangsoo gi nyang ri dang: soo" khoin" byid: to" ziri nyang: se' da . Mangsoo gi David khokham" yo' dakhyoo" ti" khokham" koid wa nya: da" akung: mo khokham" thu ri" nhang: wa ga - jham , tang: to .
44002031	Doem ju" loo wa da" bidnyid moo Mangsoo gi ce: noem koid loo wa zari - David gi se' too" yoomo Meshia gi shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo wa da" khyoo: ri David tid zigi nyang: ri moovo , moug: moo she: pyam to" zi ashug" nghoid da - nya: gung du: ri loeb khoug: moo aboeb loo" nhang: nghoid da - ga: tid to .

44002041	Nyangnu" myoo" sho mo , gi Petru kho" kyo" da" mungdang: ri loem" jeung" lo boem wigi Babtisma zheung: kham boem lho-hau: bidnyid moo loem" jeung" lo da" phung: byu yi soem khyeing" - hau: phung: moo loung: lo ago" .
44002042	Nyangnu" lagyoo: yi da" dang: ri jhau" yu zoore - dage" za: bo zoem" khau: nyid boem wigi zooyho' phe , gam go" khyoo: ri koid - dage" za: akyu" shoin" mho' wigi ayo , bidnyid ri lid loo" nhang: nyid ago" .
44002043	Lagyoo: yi khyo" wigi mau" pho" alhoo: again joem myoo" sho' toin" shed boem yoomo byu yug khang" moo" gi gyoug dain mau" ci' ago" .
44002044	Loem" jeung" bang: gi dage" za: zoem" khau: nyid boem lho: nyangnu" yo" da" ziyoo joem ri" we' dage" za: coem' gam go" ci: nyid ago" .
44002045	Nyangnu" gi nyang: nya: da" ziyoo soid gain joem ri oung" pyam boem lho: wigi hau: ngei zi joem ri kha: yug khamyoo , ca" nyid khyo" cang wigi-nyang: cang" nyang: coem gam go" ci: boem .
44002046	Nyang: nu" gi nyid" khang" moo" noku yhoem: moo" moo zeung: foem: phoung nyid lho: nyangnu" da" yhoem: khoug: mo da" zooyho' ri gau yi ziyo' phe , lho-khyo , nyhoem: da" nheigloem: yo' dage" za: shoin" zoo: shoin" shug nyid boem ago" .
44002047	Nyangnu" gi Mangsoo ri coung" nghei nyid zoore - byu dangain" bang: da" shid khoin" moo myonhoo: bo nyid ago" . Aseing: gi khyoid yu zi shau" bang: ri nyid" khang" moo" nyangnu" phung: moo myo: loung: loo nhang: nyid .
44003001	Danyed" ri Petru yo' Yohan eig yug gi myenthang: soem" nayi: koo: moo akyu" mho' wa shid mo noku yhoem: moo" khyoo: yhe: lo" ago" .
44003002	Young" lho , ga: myeung da" khoem" duang: moo khu: jang" mo nyang: khyid: yoin" su: dayug nyid . Hau: khyid: yoin" su: ri noku yhoem: moo" khyoo: vang yhe: loo" mo" , jang" mo ngei mho' zoo: baja" ga: - khoem" duang: yam , moo nyid" khang" moo" yhe: dang nyhed: too" too" koid boem .

44003006	Petru gi ngoo gi ngei dakyab , we' ayoo - nghoid loug we' ngoo yo" ja: nang ri byid: wa . Nazared mo yesu khristu da" myeing yo' ngoo nang ri amyeing" byid: da - to yab , lho: khyoo: so" loo" we' . ga: tid .

44003012	Petru gi meing byu yi ri myang lang - Israela byu yi we" nanu" cenoem wim wigi hid: yhi' moug" go" lha" . Nanu" ciwim wigi nga" eig yug ri yu" zhoug too" la" . 44003013	Abraham Isag yo' Yaku da" Mangsoo nghoid nyid ngoonu" phoug" phyid" yi da" Mangsoo gi Nya: deizoo: Yesu ri yoem: moo" phung yoeb , byid: to" abye: . 44005015	Petru lid lo" da" uri noo , phyoo" shau" bang: dayham" gi nya: yoeb , byoo , moo khyalhang" shau" zang" baja" ga - noo , phyoo" shau" mo , ri fu" moo" khyoo: dang thu' re" lho: yhoeb , yoo tho' moo pheing" thain: tho' moo re" lhang: to" boem ago" . 44007033	Aseing: gi nyang: ri re" da" khyid: baid' khyoid pyam' we' khasu" wim ga: ri Nang yab , jo , da" joyoo gi gyeungshang: da" myed jang: nghoid nyid ga: tid .
44007034	Nga" byumyu" yi gi Egu tu mung" moo dayam , dayoo: - yau: khe" jamjau shau" zo: nyid ziri ngoo myang bye . Ngoo gi nyangnu" da" nookyeing" thui: ri shaug" gyoo: bye: yoomo nyangnu" ri khyoid yu wa ein: ngoo ju" re" zi nghoid . Akhid" nyang: nang ri ngoo Egutu mung" khyoo: nhang: kaid' wa ga: tid .
44007035	Moshe gi Israela byumyu" yi wigi ngeug pyam zi shau" da" byu dayug nghoid . Nang ri ngoonu" tho' moo vhoeb khang" wa ziyo' tarha" agyi koid wa zi hang" wigi nyheung to" lha: ga: khyo" wigi ngeug pyam ago" . Moshe gi Israela byumyu" yi ri vhoeb khang" wa ziyo' nyangnu" ri khyoid yu wa shid' re" myi: nge" nyid da" mhain" pung moo yab , shug da" moug: lagyoo: da" lo , wigi Mangsoo nhang: kaid' su: nghoid nyid .
44007036	Nyang: gi Egutu Mung" moo we' - gyid thoem" ni moo we' - dain" pyoid yoo moo zain , loem: myed: xi: mau" pho" alhoo: again yo' mau" pho" moozoo" joem ri zei: shug lho: Israela byumyu" yi ri Egutu mung" mo shu" thu loo bye .
44007037	Mangsoo gi ngoori nhang: kaid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" Lapi: dayug ri nanu" jhang khyoo: nhang: kaid byid: wa nghoid . Nyang: gi nanu" byumyu" mo nghoid wa ga: tid su: gi Moshe nyang nghoid bye .
44007038	Nyang: gi dain" pyoid yoo moo Israela byumyu" yi yo' dage - shoin" nyid lho: houg: moo ngoonu" phoug" phyid" yi yo' dage" Sina boem tho' moo nang yo' dang: tid go" da" moug: lagyoo: yo' dage" nyid loo su: nyang: nghoid bye . Ngoonu" ri lhid" kaid' da" kangso' dei nyid da" Mangso jang" mo mungdang: we' yo" kham: yu su: nghoid .
44007039	Nghoid loug we' - ngoonu" da" phoug" phyid" yi gi nya: dang: ri zheung: ngeug pyam' boem bye . Nyang: nu" gi Moshe ri ngeug pyam lho: Egutu mung" khyoo: doem tau" loo" nau myid bo ago" .
44007040	Hau: lho: nyangnu" gi Arun ri ngoonu" ri shu" vhu" shi: wa da" phara" soolhoo joem ri ngoonu" ri koid: byid: we' - ngoonu" ri Egutu mung" mo shu" thu lo da" - Moshe ga: su: gi cidoid' byug bye: ziri - ngoonu" ase' boem loo - ga: tid ago" .
44007041	Hougsu" wigi nyangnu" nujung soolhoo: daloem: ri koid shab , to" lho: wigi hau: nujung lhoo: ri xoin" to' byid: ziyo' - nyangnu" koid to" da" phara" ri coung" nghei byid: da" pui" zeing koid boem ago" .
44007042	Houg: yoomo , lapi: yi da" jhoem: pug moo Israela mung" byu yi we" - dain" pyoid yoo moo myed: xi: zain , goin" nanu" gougnyhoug xoin" ngei" byid: da" khyoo: gi ngoori ngei" byid: zi anghoid go" da -
44007043	Nanu" nyang: goeb , pid' wa ga - koid to" da" phara" soolhoo: nghoid da - Moleg phara" - nanu" da" rephain: ga: kyi: phara" - soolhoo: ri nanu" loem khau: lo boem ago" . Houg: yoomo ngoo gi nanu" ri Babelon mung" lid' sho' myheug shu" loo" nhang: pyam' wa-ga: tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" Mangsoo gi nyangnu" jang" mo myonhoo: lheung: lo" lho: moug: khung: mo kyi: joem ri goeb , ped' nyid boem wa shid mo nyangnu" ri she: pyam' to" abye: .
44007044	Ngoonu" da" phoug" phyid" yi gi nyangnu" yo' dage" za: dain" pyoid yoo moo Mangsoo bo da" khyoo: sag si: zoem" ri koid boem bye . Mangsoo gi Moshe ri: koid we' ga: tid da" alhoo: yo' dakhyoo" ti" hau: zoem" ri koid boem bye .
44007045	Hau: thang: ri nyangnu" da" phoug" phyid" yi jang" mo Hau: da" zoem" ri xo' kham: yu boem ago" . Nyang: nu" da" phoug" phyid" yi gi Mangsoo wigi khaid sain" pyam' da" byumyu" yi khanan mung" khyoo: Yoshu yo' dage" vang lo" boem uri hau: zoem" ri we' vu , vang lo" boem ago" . Hau: da" zoem" gi David da" apyaid' moo ju" sho' hau: mungdain moo dajo , jo .
44007046	David khokham" gi Mangso shid khoin" moo myonhoo: yo" wigi Yaku da" Mangsoo nyid nyid wa shid re" joyoo koid wa shid mo akhang" mho' nyid ,
44007047	Nghoid loug we' Mangso shid re" yhoem: koid su: gi Sholumon danghoid nyid .
44007048	Nghoid loug we' myhang: thang da" Mangsoo gi byu yi da" lo , yo' koid to" da" yhoem: khoug: moo nyid wa zi anghoid . Hau: da" khyoo: ri lapi: phoo tid to" zigi moug: khung: moug: di gi nya: da" zhung: tang nghoid .
44007049	myidjang: gi nya: da' khyid: theing goo , nghoid - nang gi Nga" shid mo , khate" da" yhoem: yo" koid byid: wa lha" . Nga" shid mo nyid wa joyoo kha: khyi , moo nghoid lha" .
44007050	Hau: gu: dangain" ri ngoo , nyang: phain" to" zi anghoid la" » ga: wigi Aseing: tid nyid .
44007051	Stephain gi xo' lho: doem tid zigi nanu" gi nheigloem: gye" thain: nyid ago - nanu" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo gi Mangsoo ri ase' boem nghoid go . Nanu" gi nanu" nya: da" phoug" phyid" yi yhang: ti" Mangso mungdang: ri ashug" gyo: da" nujed' mo , nghoid boem ago" . Gyeungshang: da" Venyi ri khanham we' ngeug pyam mo , nghoid nyid boem ago" .
44007052	Nanu" da" phoug" phyid" yi wi gi ashen" yhen , yu" da" lapi: ga: zi kha: yug nyid yu go" Nyang: nu" gi Mangso da" deingmain" su: ju" ri" wa ga: da" khyoo: ri tid fu" kyo" da" Mangso lagyoo: yi ri we' said' pyam boem abye: go . Akhid" nanu" gi hau: yug ri ab , byid: pyam' lho: said' pyam' boem abye: go .
44007053	Nanu" gi lagyoo: yi da" nhoid' khoin" thui: khyo" - Mangso tarha" ri shau" kham: yu mo , nghoid ago" . nghoid loug we' nanu" gi hau: ziri aphau" cang boem nghoid ago - ga: tid .
44007054	Yuda tarha" yab , do' phung: mo bang: gi hau: da" dang: ri shaug" gyoo: lang" nyangnu" da" nheigloem: gi phoid' phoid' ga: zhu: ri" sho' nheig gyo: yo: boem wigi Stephain ei: zei , yang: ngaid' ci: sho' nheig yo: nyid abye: go .
44007055	Nghoid loug we' Stephain gi gyeungshang: da" Venyi byeung" jo , yoomo moug: khung: khyoo: tu: yu" kaid' ri Mangso phung" yoeb , yo' yesu gi Mangso lo , yo shoid moo yab , jo , ziri myang kaid .
44007056	Houg: lang" Stephain gi yu" ge' - moug: khung: gi bang" lo" wigi byu da" nya: zoo: gi Mangso da" lo , yo shoid moo yab , jo , ziri ngoo myang kaid' bye - ga: tid .
44007057	Houg: yoomo nyang: nu gi zeug yoid wigi nyangnu" da" nukhyab' moo lo , nyhau" thau" jhed' ci: lho: dangain" mo , dalheing: dam , Stephain jhang khyoo: gei , yhe: lo" ago" .
44007058	Hau: lho: nyang: ri vooyam , shoid khyoo: zheung: doin: goin' thu' lo" wigi lug go' yo' du" ago" . Sagsi: yi gi nyangnu" da" adang byisheing: joem ri sholu ga: da" zoolu: pho , khyid: yang: moo khyoid' boem , to" lho: zung" nhang: ago" .
44007059	Nyang: nu" gi Stepain ri houg: su" lug go' wigi du" go" nyid da" uri stephain gi Aseing" we" Aseing: we" - nga" Venyi ri kham: yu byid: we' ga: Aseing: ri mho' yoid nyid .
44007060	Nyang: gi poid' thug thoung lho: Aseing: we" - nyangnu" da" yooboo ri axoem" too" byid: o" ga: nyho: kaid' - he: dang: bain tid lang" Stephain gi kang: gyo" loo" bye .
44008001	Sholu gi stephain ri said' wa zi myid bo veing" su: nghoid . Hau: bidnyid moo Yerusalem voomoo" moo nyid da - loem" jeung" phung byu yi gi dayam , dayoo: shen" yhen zi gyisho' shau" nyid boem bye . Lagyoo: yi mo we' je" wigi loem" jeing" mo , dangain" gi Yuda mung" yo' Samari mung" gyoo: khyoo: goem: sho' phang: byo , sain" lo" boem abye: go .
44008002	Loem" jeung" nheigloem: kang: lung bu nyid bang: gi Stephain ri yhe: myhoeb , shoung: pyam boem lho: nyang: yoomo gye" koug shu: ngau , nyid boem ago" .
44008003	Nghoid loug we' sholu gi phung ri phyo' shoin , pyam' byid: wa shid re" yoem: kaid' nyid da . Nyang: gi dayhoem: bain' dayhoem: khyoo: cang vang yhe: lho: loem" jeung" da" yuggi myi: yi: dangain" bang: ri she: khyoid' thu yu lho: nyangnu" ri thung: lhoung pyam .
44008004	Joyoo loem: khang" moo khyoo: byo , sain" loo" mo , gi ju" lo" da" joyoo loem: khang" moo" moo Mungdang: ri cang kho" kyo" boem ago" .
44008005	Philib , gi Samari mung" mo voomoo" khyoo: yhe: lho: hau: voobyu yi ri Meshia yo' sen: da" khyoo: ri yhe: kho" kyoo" bye .
44008006	Meing: byu yi gi philib , tid da" dang: ri tam" gyo: yu boem lho: Nyang: koid da" mau" pho" alhoo: again joem ri myangboem yoomo nyangnu" gi nheigloem: zhug zhug za: mungdang: ri tam" gyo: yu boem ago" .
44008007	Akhyeung" yu , vang ci: da" byu yi myoo" sho' mo yu joem gi yoid nyho: lho: phang: thu lo" boem ago' ajoem: shid: mo , myoo" sho' yo' Khyid: yoin" mo , myoo" sho' bang: we' ge lo" boem ago" .
44008008	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo voomoo" khoug: mo byu yi gi gye" agau yi ngei pyo: lo boem bye .
44008009	Hau: voogung mo Simun ga: su: dayug gi nyang: fa" da" phajhi" khyo" - Samari byu yi ri moug" nhang: nyid .
44008010	Simun gi nya: gung ri gye" bui" su: nghoid ga - phau: fu" nyid yoomo houg: moo nyid da" byu yi ngi , mo , gyi: mo , dangain" gi nya: dang: ri zhug zhug za: tam" gyo: nyid ago" . Nyang: gi" gyi: da" yoem: moo" ga: da - Mangso yoem: moo" boo su: nghoid ga - nyangnu" tid nyid boem .
44008011	Nyang: gi nyang: fa" da" phajhi" khyo" nyangnu" ri , moug" nhang: ziri myang bye: yoomo nyangnu" gi houg: su" nyang: ri zhug zhug za: tam" gyo: boem zi nghoid .
44008012	Nghoid loug we' - Mangso mungdain da" ludang: seig yo' yesu khristu da" khyoo: yo' sen: lho: wigi Philib , kho" kyo" da" mungdang: ri nyangnu" loem" jeung" lo boem wigi nyangnu" myiyi: yug gi dangain" bang: babtisma kham: yu boem bye .
44008013	Simun nyang: we' loem" jeung" lo wigi babtisma bain' kham: yu thang: ri Simun gi philib , da" thang: moo cang lho: Philib , koid da" mau" pho" alhoo: again joem yo' mau" pho" moozoo" joem ri shau" myang lang" nyang: gi gye" mau" nyid bye .
44008014	Yerusalem moo nyid da" lagyoo: yi gi Samari byu yi Mangso mungdang: ri lhoem: kham: yu bye: ga - da" thui: ri shaug" gyoo: lang" Nyang: nu" gi Petru yo' Yohan eig yug ri nyang: jhang khyoo: zheung: nhang: kaid ago" .
44008015	Nya: eig yug zheung: ju" yhi: lang" loem" jeing" bang: gi gyeungshang: da" Venyi ri yo" kham: yu boem wa shid re" nya: eig yug gi nyangnu" shid mo a akyu" mho' byid: bye .
44008016	Khasu" wim gari nyangnu" hang" da" atho' moo we' - gyeungshang: Venyi aju" gyo" loo shi" nghoid ago" . Nyang: nu" gi Aseing Yesu da" myeing: khyang" mo wigi babtisma kham: yu to" zishi" danghoid ago" .
44008017	Houg: yoomo Petru yo' Yohan eig yug gi nyangnu" da" a tho" moo nya: eig youg da" lo , ki" byid: lho: nyangnu" gi gyeungshang: da" Venyi ri yo" kham: yu boem ago" .
44008018	Lagyo: eig youg da" lo , nyangnu" da" atho' moo ki" byid: lang" loem" jeing" mo , gi gyeungshang: da" Venyi ri yo" kham: yu boem ziri Simun shau" myang lang" nyang: gi Petru yo' Yohan eig yug ri ngei byed , lho: wigi
44008019	Nga" lo , ki" byid: mo , hang" we' - gyeungshang: da" Venyi yo" yu wa shid mo hau: yoem: so' ngoori we' byid: ge' ga: mho' da .
44008020	Nghoid loug we' Petru gi nyang: ri nang gi Mangso da" jeju" ri ngei yo' yo" qei yu wa ga: jho: nyid yoomo nang yo' re" da" ngei gi myithoem" khyoo: vang loo" goo" baja" - ga: phoug tu .
44008021	Re" da" nheigloem: gi Mangso shid khoin" moo adain: yoomo ngoonu" da" moozoo" moo ayo" bo zei: nghoid da .
44008022	Houg: yoomo he: akhyeung" da" lo , moo" mo nheigloem: thid' we' . Houg: su" myed shoid' da" yooboo ri khyoid pyam' byid: zi shau" wa shid re" Aseing: ri akyu" mho' we' .
44008023	khasu" wim gari nang gi myid noug: myid khyoid' zi xoo: sho' byeung" sho' yo' yoobo wigi tei" joeb , to" da" byu dayug nghoid ziri ngoo yo" yu" myang bye" - ga: tid .
44008024	Simun gi Petru yo' yohan eig yug ri re" eig yug tid da" khyoo: ce: noem , daja" we' nga" vhuloem tho' moo azang" loo baja" nga" shid mo Mangsoo ri akyu" pang" mho' byid: ge' ga: tid .
44008025	Nya: eig yug gi Yesu da" khyoo: yo' sen: lho: sag si: kham , kyo" wigi Yesu da" mungdang: ri bain kho" kyoo" lang" Petru yo' Yohan gi Yerusalem voomoo" khyoo: doem , tau" lo" ago" . 44008026	Aseing: da" moug: lagyoo: dayug gi philib , ri too' we' - Yerusalem mo zi gaza: khyoo: ju" yhe: lo" da" khyoo: khyo" moug: thang: shoid khyoo: yhe: loo" we' . ( He: da" fu" moo" khyoo: gi dain" pyid' yoo khyoo: nghoid nyid )
44008027	Houg: yoomo philib , gi to' yhe: loo" bye - akhid" Etiopi mungdain ri vhoeb khang" nyid da - khokham , myhi , kandake da" soidgain ziyoo dangain" ri zoem: da" vhu" jhung: zoug: phoo - U" nug we' nghoid da - Etiopi zung: phoo dayug gi nya: yhoem: khyoo: lo" nyid da .
