44008028	Nyang: gi Yerusalem khyoo: yhe: lho: Mangsoo ri bain coung" nghei khoo lang" gi myang: rheing" tho' moo zhoung: lho: yhoem: khyoo: doem , lo nyid . Nyang: gi myang: rheing: tho' moo zhoung: jo , lho: Lapi: Esaia da" mougsoug" ri nghab nyid da - ga: tid .
44008029	Gyeungshang: da" Venyi gi Philip , ri hau: myang: rheing" khyoo: tab' tab' yhe: loo" we' ga: tid da .
44008030	Philib gi to' yhe: lo" ri Zoug: phoo gi lapi: Esaia mougsoug" nghab nyid ziri shau" gyo: wigi Philib , gi hau" zoug: phoo ri nang nghab nyid da" jhoem: dang: ri nang se' gyo: la" » ga: myed .
44008031	Hau zung: phoo gi dang kang: phoid: kyoo" su: abo ri ngoo khasu" se' gyoo: wa lha" » ga: phoug tu" lho: myang: rheing" lho' khyoo: do , lo wigi nyang: yo' dage" lo zhung: wa shid re" Philib , ri khe .
44008032	Nyang: nghab nyid da" jhoem: dang: gi he: zi nghoid - " Said pyam' wa da" " yang r ri yhang: ti" nyang: ri shu" yhe: lo" ago" . yang moug" yham" uri tam" to" da" yang nu" yi' dakhyoo" ti" Nyang: gi dang: dakhoin" we' ameing nghoid da .
44008033	Nyang: gi nyhoem: khyo , pyam' zi shau" wigi adeung amain" da" dang: phyed' zi shau" nyid . Nya: kangso' ri moug: myed tho' mo yu pyam byid: yoomo nya: myed: yi , zoo: yi da" byuxeig ri hang" ayo" shab , nghoid da - ga: zi nghoid .
44008034	Houg: lang" hau: da" zoug: phoo gi Philib , ri Lapi: phoo gi kha: youg khyoo: ri tid to" zi nghoid lha" . Nya: khyoo: ri nghoid la" . anghoid lang" gootu: dayoug da" khyoo: ri tid to" zi nghoid la" . ngoori tid kyoo" we' ga: tid nyid .
44008035	Hau: thang: ri Philib , gi hau: jhoem: dang: mo ayang: qei" lho: Yesu khyoo: yo' sen: da" ngeibu: ludang: seig ri kho" kyoo" byed .
44008036	Nya: eig yug gi hougsu" so" gyo" lo" da" uri gyid jo , da" joyoo moo ju" lo" ago" . Houg: lang" zoug: phoo gi yu" we' hidmoo gyid yau , da - ngoo babtisma kham: yu wa shid re" toem , too" cang ce: noem bo la" » ga: myed: yu" .
44008037	Philib , gi nyang: ri nang gi re" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: dangain" - Yesu khristu ri loem" jeing" bye: la" . loem" jeing" bye: nghoid rigi nang babtisma ge , kham: yu bye - Houg: lang" hau: zoug: phoo gi Yesu Khristu gi Mangso nya: zoo nghoid ziri ngoo loem" jeing" bye" ga: tid . ( Loem , ge" da" Grid" jhoem: mougsoug" " xoug" dayham" moo he: da" axeing zoo: gi aboo . )
44008038	Houg: lang" hau: zoug: phoo gi myang: rheing" ri theing: wa da" amyeing" byid: lho: nya: eig yug goin" gyid khyoo: gyoo" yhe: wigi Philib , gi hau: zoug: phoo ri babtisma kham: byid: bye .
44008039	Nya: eig yug gi gyid mo doem do' loo lang" Aseing: da" Venyi gi philib , ri shu" lo" byug bye . Hau: zoug: phoo gi Philib , ri adoem myang loo: nghoid da . Nyang: gi ngei pyo: ziyo' nya: gyung: khyoo: moo doem xo' so" lo" da .
44008040	Philib , gi Azutu voogung: moo ju" lo" ziri nya: gung nyang: boin: da . Hougsu" nyang: gi kesare khyoo: yhe: lo" khyoo: cang jo , da - voogung khang" moo" moo ngeibu: ludang: seig ri cang kho" kyo" lo .
44009001	Hau: ayo , moo sholu gi Yesu ri loem" jeung" loo mo , ri pyi: sho: shen" yhen wa shid re" kyoug nyid su nghoid . Nyang: gi khainjung agyi zeung jhang khyoo: yhe: lho:
44009002	Aseing: da" khyoo: ri phau" cang nyid mo Yuggi myiyi: yi ri myang lang" nyangnu" ri myheug yu lho: wigi Yerusalem voomoo" khyoo: shu" tau" loo" wa shid mo khainjung pho , jang" mo Damasku voo moo jo , da - tarha" jung yi jhang being" si' byid: da" akhang" mougsoug" ri yhe: mho' ci: da .
44009003	Sholu gi Damasku voogung moo ju" yhe: lo" nyid uri nyid' dain' tung" - moug: khung: mo bidbang gi nya: ayam , aqei: moo gye" bang lo .
44009004	Sholu koem gi myidjang: moo leung goeb , loo" khare" - hau: thang: ri nyang: gi Sholu - Sholu - nang ngoori ce: noem koid wigi shen" yhen nyid lha" » ga: da" thui: ri shau" gyo: kaid .
44009005	" Sholu gi Aseing: we' nang hang" nghoid lha" » ga: myed: - hau: thui: gi Ngoo gi nang shen" yhen nyid su - Yesu nghoid ga: tid .
44009006	Nghoid loug we' nang to' lho: voomoo" khyoo: vang loo" we' - houg: moo nang koid ca" da" moo" ri lhoem: tid kyoo" wa" - ga: tid .
44009007	Sholu yo' dage" gyung: so" loo" bang: gi yab , theug: lho: dang: dakhoin" we' ameing loo: nghoid ago" . Nyang: nu" gi thui: ri shau" gyo: boem nghoid loug we' - hang" ri we' amyang boem nghoid da .
44009008	Sholu gi myidjang: mo to' re" lho: nyang: myojid" ri phang kaid' nghoid loug we' - ci" we' amyang loo: nghoid da . Houg: yoomo Sholu ri nya: lo , mo she: lho: wigi Damasku voogung khyoo: shu" vang lo" boem ago" .
44009009	Sholu gi soem" nyid" loem: loem: nyang: myo , amyang loo - hau: bid , nyid gyoo: moo nyang: gi ci" we' azoo: ashug loo: nyid nyid .
44009010	Damasku voogung moo - loem" jeung" da" Anania ga: da" byu dayug nyid . Nyang: yoeb , myang myang jang" moo Aseing: gi Anania we" - ga: tid . Anania gi Aseing: we" ngoo hid: moo nyid o" - ga: phoug tu .
44009011	Houg: lang" Aseing: gi nyang: ri to' lho: khyoo: dain: thung" ga: da" fu" moo" khyoo: moo yhe: loo" we' hau: lho: Yuda yhoem: mo , Tarshu voobyu sholu ga: su: ri yhe: sho: myed: yu we' . Nyang: gi akyu" mho' lho: nyid nyid .
44009012	Nyang: gi yoeb , myang moo Anania ga: su: dayug vang re" wigi nya: myo , doem myang loo wa shid mo Nya: vhuloem tho' moo lo , ki" byid: ziri myang bye: - ga: tid .
44009013	Houg: lang" Anania gi Aseing: we" - he: yug gi Yerusalem voomoo" moo nyid shi" uri Re" phung byu yi ri agyug alhung: nyang - shen" yhen lid loo bye - ga: tid go" thui: ri byu myoo" sho' nhoid mo shaug" gyoo: bye .
44009014	Hau: tho' moo agoo" - Nang ri coung" nghei bang: dangain" ri we' myheug yu wa shid re" khainjung agyi moo" yi jang" mo amyeing" mougsoug" ri mho' voin , lho: wigi he: Damasku voogung moo ju" ri su: nghoid - ga: tid .
44009015	Aseing: gi Anania ri doem tid zigi yhe: loo" we' tungboug yi ri we' khokham" ri we' Israela byu yi ri we' nga" myeing ri cang tid fu" Yen" zoore - ngoori coung" nghei byid: wa shid mo ngoo khyen: yu too" su: nghoid .
44009016	Nga" myeing yoomo nyang: dayam , dayoo: kham , zoo: ca" gu: ri dangain" ngoo , Nyang: ri toin" shid' wa nghoid - ga: tid .
44009017	Houg: yoomo Anania gi Sholu nyid da" yhoem: khyoo: vang yhe: lho: Sholu da" atho' moo nya: lo , yhe: ki" byid: wigi mang: nhung" phoo Sholu we" - nang he: voogung khyoo: do , lo da" uri khyoo: moo nang ri toin" shid' byid: da - Aseing Yesu nyang: wigi ngoori re" jang" moo nhang: kaid' zi nghoid . Nyang: gi nang myo , doem myang loo wa shid mo we' gyeungshang: da" venyi yoo" baja" ga: we' ngoori nhang: kaid' zi nghoid - ga: nyang: ri tid kyo .
44009018	Houg: lang" Sholu da" myojid" mo ngoo: kyab , te" zi , zheung: yed" gyo" lho: nyang: gi myo , doem myang loo bye . Houg: lang" nyang: gi to' re" lho: babtisma ri kham: yu bye .
44009019	Hau: thang: ri nyang: gi zoo: noem ri doem zo: lho: yoem: doem bo loo bye . Sholu gi Damasaku voogung mo loem" jeing" bang: yo' dayo , koo: nyid nyid da .
44009020	Nyang: gi Yuda tarha" jung joem khyoo: dain: yhe: lo" lho: Yesu gi Mangso nya: zoo: nghoid - ga: khyoo: ri kho" kyoo" byid: bye .
44009021	Nya: dang: ri shaug" gyoo: mo , dangain" bang: gi gyo: mau" byug boem wigi byu he: yug gi Yerusalem voomoo" moo Yesu ga: su: ri Noku coung" nghei mo , ri lhoung said' pyam' nyid su: nghoid - anghoid goo" la" » ga: myed go" nyid boem .
44009022	Nghoid loug we' - sholu gi kho" jang" moo je" yoem: bo lo wigi Yesu gi Meshia nyang: nghoid ga: ziri sag si: yo' khyag khyag kho" kyoo" byid: yoomo Damasku voogung mo: da" Yuda byumyu" yi gi nya: dang: ri ayo" phoug lo: boem nghoid ago" .
44009023	Bidnyid myoo" sho' nyid" lid lo" thang: ri Yuda byu yi gi Sholu ri said' pyam' wa da" phajhi" khyau" ago" .
44009024	Nghoid loug we' hau: khyoo: ri sholu gi se' pyam' byid: bye . Yuda byu yi gi Sholu ri said' pyam wa shid re" voogoung khoem" duang: moo nyid" ri myen" ri lhoem: nyid boem ago ,
44009025	Nghoid loug we' damyen rigi sholu da" cangzoo: yi gi nyang: ri shu" yu lho: gyoin khoug: moo zhung: nhang: wigi vang khyam: yam , bang: zo: khoem" khyo" wigi nyang: ri shoid' khyo' kaid' ago" .
44009026	Sholu gi Yerusalem Voomoo" moo ju" yhi: lang" cangzoo: yi yo' zoem" khoug: wa shid mo yoem: kaid' nyid . Nghoid loug we' nyangnu" gi nyang: cangzoo: bue" loo bye: ziri aloem" boem yomo - nyangnu" dangain" bang: gi Sholu ri gyoug nyid boem ago" .
44009027	Hau: thang: ri Barnaba gi Sholu ri lagyoo: yi jhang khyoo: shu" yhe: lho: khyoo: moo sholu gi Aseing: yo' khasu" shau" go" da" khyoo: ri we' Aseing: gi Sholu ri khasu" ga: tid da" khyoo: ri we' sholu gi damasku voo , moo Aseing: yesu da" myeing ri lang: lho: agyug avoem , khasu" ga: kho" kyo" loo bye: da" khyoo: ri we' - lagyoo: yi ri tid kyoo" bye .
44009028	Houg: yoomo Sholu gi lagyoo: yi yo' dage" yhe - dage" nyid lho: wigi Yerusalem voomoo" moo Aseing: myeing: ri lang: wigi agyug avoem , loo: cang kho" kyo" yen" boem ago" .
44009029	Sholu gi Grid" myeing" kaid' da" Yuda yi we' - tid ngeig go" nyid . Nyang: nu" gi sholu ri said' pyam' wa ga: soin' ago" .

44009031	Houg: yoomo yuda meing: - Galile meing: yo' Samari meing: goin" jang" mo , phung byu yi gi shen" yhen zi ashug" loo: dayo , daboin: zoo: shau" nyid boem ago" . 44009033	Hau: da" voogung moo gung joem: shid: lho: ayo" too , loo: shed' zain' loem: loem: nyang - yhoeb , joyoo moo leung jo , da - Ainea ga: su: dayug ri Petru gi yhe: myang bye .
44009034	Houg: lang" Petru gi hau: gung joem: shid: su: ri Ainea we" - Yesu khristu gi nang ri gi byid: bye - to lho: re" yhoeb , yoo nyheung we' ga: tid . Houg: lang" Ainea gi to' loo" bye .

44009036	Akhid" Yopa voogung moo Tabitha ga: loem" jeung" da" myiyi: dayug nyid - ( Nya: myeing ri Grid" myeing" khyo" - Dorka ga: zi nghoid wigi nya: da" dangkang: gi " Soo" cid" , , ga: zi nghoid ) Nyang: gi khanham we' ge da" moo" riza: zei: nyid wigi sho" jhen: bang: ri bo pang" thoug nyid da" myiyi: nghoid .
44009037	Hau: da" ayo , moo nyang: gi no wigi shid: loo" bye - nyang: mang ri ced" sain' pyam lho: atho' pyam: mo yab , moo mhang to" ago" .
44009038	Yopa voogung gi Luda voo yo' atoung" thei" vi: nghoid da - houg: yoomo Yopa voogung mo loem" jeing" bang: gi Luda voo moo Petru ju" nyid ziri shau" gyo: boem wigi nyangnu" gi byu eig yug ri Petru jhang khyoo: nhang: kaid' lho: ngoonu" jhang khyoo: myab , myab , jen" re" lhoo: we' ga: khi: nhang: kaid' ago" .
44009039	Houg: yoomo Petru gi hau: eig yug yo' dage" yhe: loo" bye - Petru gi ju" yhi: lang" nyangnu" gi Petru ri atho' pyam: khyoo: shu" do' lo" ago" . 44009040	Houg: lang" Petru gi Nyang: nu" dangain" mo , ri tung: gung kyoo: thu' loo" nhang: lho: poid thug thoug wigi akyu" mho' nyid . 44009041	Petru gi nya: lo , yhoin" kaid' lho: nyang: ri she: to' kaid' . Hau: thang: ri Petru gi cougmoo" myhi , yi yo' dage" loem" jeing" mo , dangain" - nyang: ri khe: yu wigi Dorka dei lo bye: zi nyangnu" ri ab , byid: bye .
44009042	He: ludang: gi Yopa voogung goin" moo byeung" sho' fu" lo" wigi byu myoo" sho' mo , gi Aseing: ri loem" lo boem bye .

44010033	Houg: yoomo ngoo gi houg: jang: nyang - re" jhang khyoo: byu nhang: kaid' bye - nang ju" ri" yoomo gye" goug bye . Nyang: nang ri tid nhang: kaid' da" mungdang: dangain" ri tam" gyo: yu wa shid mo akhid" ngoonu" dangain" mo , gi-Mangso shid' khoin" moo lang" nyid boem - ga: tid kyo .

44010036	Dangain" mo , da" aseing: nghoid - Aseing Yesu khristu khyo" wigi Israela byumyu" yi ri Mangsoo tid fu" byid: da" ngei pyoo: yug yo ludang: seig nghoid mungdang: ri nanu" nyang: se' abye: go .

44010048	Houg: yoomo Petru gi nyangnu" ri Yesu khristu da" myeing khyang" mo wigi babtisma kham: yu boem wa shid re" amyeing" byid: bye . Hau: thang: ri nyangnu" gi Petru yo' dage" dayo , zoo: theung: nyid wa shid mo mho' ago" .
44011001	Tungbau byumyu" yi we' Mangso mungdang: ri kham: yu boem bye . ga: da" khyoo: ri lagyoo: yi yo' Yuda meing: goin" jang" moo nyid da" loem" jeing" mo , gi shau" gyo: lo" boem bye .
44011002	Petru gi Yerusalem voogung moo ju" loo" lang" tungbau byumyu" yi a thang: yham" da" thung" Ri: kham: yu ca" ga - myed ngei nyid mo , gi Petru ri hid su" ga: ngeug: tid boem .
44011003	Nang gi athang: ayham" da" tung: boug: yi da" yhoem: moo lam" yhe: lho: nyangnu" yo' lang" dage" zo: shug nyid da - ga: yooboo foin: ago" .
44011004	Houg: yoomo Petru gi bue" lo da" khyoo: ri ayang: aphyoo" ju" sho' goolhoo: za: tid kyoo" bye .
44011005	" Ngoo gi Yopa voogung moo akyu" mho' nyid uri yoeb , myang da ja: ri shau" myang bye . myed: khyau: jang" moo zei: ci: da" mi , join' yo' dei , zi da ja: moug: khung: khyo" yhoin" khyo' kaid' ziri ngoo myang - Hau: zigi nga" nam , moo re" theung: jo .
44011006	Hau: akhoug: moo ngoo nyeing" za: yu" kaid' ri me" ziyo' kyang: zi myed: khyid: dab , ja: gougnyhoug joem - do: yu: yen" se' da" gougnyhoug joem - ngho' zoo: yen" zoo: acang: joeb sho' ri ngoo myang .

44011009	Hau: thang: rigi Mangso wigi gyeungshang: nhang: bye: gu: rigi agyeing" ashang: ein: nang atid - ga: moug: khung: khyo" doem tid thu lo .

44011012	Gyeungshang: da" Venyi gi da jhi , we' a - ug vhoo" loo: za: nyangnu" da" thang: khyoo: cang yhe: loo" wa zi ngoori tid . 44013028	Nyang: nu" gi nyang: ri shid: wa da" yoobo dam kaid' wa zi ci" we' amyang to" boem nghoid loug we' - nyang: ri said' pyam' wa shid mo nyangnu" gi Pilaid' zoug: phoo ri damho , nyid ago" .
44013029	Nyang: nu" gi nyang: yo' sen: lho: jhoem: mougsoug" moo bo ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" dangain" nyang: ri bain' koid lang" gi nyang: gi nyang: ri pyang" zeing tho' mo phoid: khyo , yu lho: loeb , daloem: akhoug: moo yhe: kaid' to" ago" .
44013030	Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi Nyang: ri shid: jang" mo doem dei , to' loo nhang: wigi
44013031	Galile mung" mo Yerusalem voomoo" khyoo: nyang: yo' dage" yhe: lo" nyid mo , ri bidnyid myang" sho' nyid" nyid , shug yen" da - nyangnu" gi akhid" Israela yi ri sag si: kham , byid: nyid mo , nghoid ago" . Houg: bang: gi sag si: nghoid nyid .
44013032	Coung" nghei , jikhoin" mougsoug" abeing: eig loem: moo Nang gi nga" zoo: nghoid - Akhid" nyid" ngoo nang ri khu: kaid da" Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" Mangsoo gi Yesu ri dei , to loo" nhang: khyo" - ngoonu" da" phoug" phyid" yi ri byid: to" da" dang: soo" khon" gi nyangnu" da" myed: zoo: yi nghoid mo , ngoonu" moo zei: pyeung byid: abye: . Houg: yoomo ngoonu" gi he: da" ludang: gi , ri nanu" ri tid kyoo" wa shid mo he: joyoo moo ju" re" zi nghoid .
44013033	Nyang: gi khanham we' ashid: loo: wa ga: yoomo nyang: ri shid: jang" mo doem dei to' loo nhang: ziyo' sen: lho: wigi Mangsoo gi Ngoo David ri byid: wa ein: da" dang: soo" khoin" ri byid: too" bye .
44013034	
44013035	Goo tu: da" coung" nghei ji: dakhoin" moo we' nang gi dang: soo" khoin" deung da - Re" dei , zoo: ri loeb , khoug: moo boeb , lo" byug nhang: wa zi anghoid - ga: tid to .
44013036	David gi nyang: dei nyid da" bidnyid gu: moo Mangsoo myed soin' to" moozoo" joem ri zei: so' lho: shid: loo" bye . Nyang: gi nya: phoug" phyid" yi loeb , nam , moo myhoeb , shug: pyam' zi shau" lho: nya: manggung gi loeb , khoug: moo boeb , yoem: lo" byug bye .
44013037	Nghoid sho' l: oug we' Mangso wigi doem dei , to loo nhang: su: gi aboeb yoem: loo" loo: nghoid da .
44013038	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo Israela mang: nhung" yi we" - hau: Yesu khyo" wigi yooboo khyoid pyam' byid: zi shau" ziyo' sen: lho: nanu" ri kho" kyo" nyid da" Yesu ri loem" jeing" bang: dangain" gi Moshe da" tarha" wigi ayo" lhoid' pyoin , kaid' da - yooboo dangain" jang" mo , yo" loid byoin lo" da" khyoo: ri we' nanu" ri ngoo si' nhang: nau , zi nghoid .
44013039	
44013040	Houg: yoomo yu" ge' - juang" yi mo , yo' mau , lho: shid: loo" ge' . khasu" wim gari-akhid" nyid" ngoo koid wa da" moozoo" daloem: ri byu dayug yug wigi nanu" ri tid sho' kyoo" nghoid l ; oug we' - nanu" gi hau: khyoo: ri loem" jeing: goo" wa zi anghoid . ga: wigi Lapi yi tid to" da" jhoem: mungdang: gi nanu" moo abue" loo wa shid mo , lhid' zed" nyid ge' . ga: kho" khyoo" byid: da .
44013041	Polu yo' Barnaba gi hau: tarha" jung mo thu' lo" nyid uri mung" byu yi gi nya: eig yug ri thang: Dougno: Bidnyid moo doem re" kho" kyoo" byid: wa shid mo mho' kaid ago" .
44013042	
44013043	Hau" zoeb , phung mo , mung" byu yi byo , lo" boem thang: ri Yuda byu yi myoo" sho' mo , gi Yuda noku thung" khyoo: phoug vang loo bye: da - tungbau byu yi myoo" sho' mo , gi Polu yo' Barnaba thang: cang lo" ago" . Polu yo' Barnaba eig yug gi Mangsoo nheig khyeug da" akhoug: moo xo' lho: kangso' yo" dei nyid wa shid re" nyangnu" ri yoem: byid: da" dang: ri tid ago" .
44013044	Hau: thang: mo , da" Dougno: Bidnyid rigi Mangso mugdang: ri tam" gyoo: wa shid mo voobyu dangain" ein: wa yhi' ju" re" boem ago" .
44013045	Yuda byumyu" yi gi hau: mung" byu yi ri re" zheung: myang lang - nyangnu" gi myid yu" nau: boem yoomo-Polu kho" kyo" da" mungdang: ri ngeug pyam' boem lho: wigi nyang: ri aphoug" akhyoid ga: rue" da" dang: ri tid ago" .
44013046	Nghoid loug we' Polu yo' Barnaba eig yug gi je" ri agyug avoem , loo: za: Mangso mungdang: gi nyangnu" rishi" - xang: shed" tid kyoo" wa da" khyoo: eung: nyid . Nghoid loug we' nyangnu" gi hau: mungdang: ri ngeug pyam lho: hau: apyaid' atoo: mo , kangso' yo' amoin: yi" ga - nyhang: nu" nyang: dang: zheung: phyed' yu lho: nga" eig yug gi nanu" ri too" kho' lho: tungbau byu yi jhang khyoo: yhe: loo" wa zi nghoid .
44013047	Khasu" wim gari Aseing: gi ngoonu" ri amyeing" byid: to" zigi Moug: myed tho' moo nyid mo , dangain" ri khyoid yu zi shau" boem wa shid mo ngoo gi nang ri tungbau , yi shid' mo bidbang bui" nhang: bye - ga: tid too" bye - ga: tid ago" .
44013048	Tungbau byumyu" yi gi he: da" dang: ri shau" gyo: boem lang" gyo: ngei boem ziyo' Mangso mungdang: ri coung" nghei ago" . Apyaid' atoo: mo , da" kangso' ri yo" yu wa shid re" khyen: yu zi shau" bye: mo , gu: gi Yesu ri Loem" jeung" lo boem bye .
44013049	Mangso mungdang: gi hau: damung" goin" jang" moo fu" nheung lo" boem bye .
44013050	Nghoid loug we' Yuda byumyu" yi gi Mangsoo ri noku coung" nghei mo , nghoid da - Byu nyid azhang" myhang: bye: da - tungbau byu myiyi: yi ri we' hau: voogung moo vhu" jhung: koid nyid mo , ri we' myid lhu: zhuang" to' kaid ago" . Houg: lang" nyangnu" gi Polu yo' Barnaba eig yug ri shen" yhen lho: nya: eig yug ri nyangnu" da" mung" mo khaid thu' kaid' ago" .
44013051	Polu yo' Barnaba eig yug gi nyangnu" ri ngeug pyam' da" aved' khyo" nya: eig youg da" khyid: voo: mo pheilhoug: joem ri ko: khyoo , kho' lho: Ikoni voo khyoo: yhe: lo" ago" .

44014001	Ikoni Voogung moo Polu yo' Barnaba eig yug gi Yuda byu yi da" Tarha" jung moo zheung: vang lo" lho: kho" kyo" nyid uri Yuda byumyu" yi yo' nghi: zain , byumyu" yi gi Aseing Yesu ri loem" jeung" loem khau: lo byu myoo" sho' bo lo .
44014002	Nghoid loug we' - aloem" ajeung" da" Yuda byumyu" yi yo' nghi: zain , byumyu" yi gi khristain ri pyi: sho: lho: aveing" goo" wa shid' mo lhu: nhoug" byid: nyid boem .

44014015	Byu yi nanu" we" - khasu" wim wigi hid: su" koid' go" lha" . Nga" eig yug gi nanu" yo' dakhyoo" te" da" xang: su: byu za: danghoid . 44014019	Pasidi mung" Antioki Voogung yo' Ikoni voogung mo da" Yuda byu yi dayham" bang: re" lho: mung" byu yi ri nyangnu" jhang khyoo: yo" re" ngoug yu boem ago" . 44014020	Nghoid loug we' - nya: da" ayam , aqei: mo da" loem" jeing" bang: gi nyang: ri re" lheung khoem , to" boem , Nyang: gi to' re" lho: voogung khoug: khyoo: doem , vang lo . Hau: thang: nyid" ri Polu yo' Barnaba eig yug gi Dabe voogung khyoo: yhe: lo" ago" .

44014022	Nya: eig yug gi loem" jeung" loo bang: ri yoem: byid: lho: loem" jeung" da" khyoo: moo - dain: dain: dayab , jo , boem wa shid re we' - nyangnu" ri tid poin" tid kyeing" byid: wigi Ngoonu" gi Mangso mungdain khyoo: vang loo" wa shid re" yau: khe" da" khyoo: myoo" sho' ri yo" lid phyed' loo" ca" - ga: kho" kyo" ago" .

44015004	Nyang: nu" gi Yerusalem voomoo" moo ju" yhe: lo" boem uri houg: mo da" phung byu yo' dage" za: lagyoo: yi yo' phung ludaid yi gi nyangnu" ri lhoem: tau , yu boem bye . 44015007	Soo" soo" myang" sho' bain tid sham: go" thang: ri Petru gi to' yab , lho: nga" mang: nhung" yi we" - tungbau byumyu" yi shau" gyo: lho: loem" jeung" lo boem wa shid re" - Mangsoo gi goonham , mo wigi tungbau byumyu" yi ri ngeibu: ludang: seig yhe: kho" kyoo" wa shid re" ngoori nanu" phung mo khyen: thu' yu too" bye: ziri nanu" nyang: si' bye .
44015008	Byu yug khang" mo" da" ung: khoug: nheigloem: ri se' da" Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri gyeungshang: da" Venyi byid: bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" tungbau byumyu" yi ri we' - gyeungshang: Venyi byid: bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" nyangnu" ri we' vho: nghei nyid bye: da" khyoo: ri toin" shid' too" bye .

44015010	Houg: su" danghoid rigi ngoonu" da" phoug" phyid" yi we' - ngoonu" nyang: we' ayo" voin , da" yoovoin , ri loem" jeing" bang: da" atho' moo foin: byid: bye - akhid" ciwim wigi ngoonu" Mangsoo ri leig yu jham" ca: yu" noug go" la" .
44015011	Ngoonu" we' nyangnu" yo' dakhyoo" ti" loem" jeing" yoomo Aseing Yesu da" jeju" khyo" wigi khyoid yu khyoo: ri shau" yu boem bye - ga: tid .
44015012	Barnaba yo' Polu eig yug gi-nya: eig youg da" lo , khyo" wigi tungboug yi da" shid khoin" moo Mangsoo koid shug da" mau" pho" moozoo" yo' mau" pho" alhoo: again khyoo: ri tid kyo" nyid da" uri zoeb , phoung nyid mo , dangain" gi sam" zoo: gyo: nyid boem ago" .
44015013	Nyang: nu" bain tid thang: ri Yaku we' Nga" mang: nhung" yi we" - Nga" dang: ri we' tam" gyo: yu" ge' .
44015014	Mangsoo gi tungbau byumyu" yi mo dayham" ri nya: byumyu" bue" loo nhang: wa shid mo khyen: yu to" khyo" wigi tungboug nyang: goin , coung: da" khyoo: xang: shed" mo wigi khasu" toin" shid' bye: da" khyoo: ri Simun gi sho' kyo" abye: .
44015015	Lapi: yi tid to" da" mungdang: yi yo' we' he: khyoo: gi dangain" zi du , go" nyid da .
44015016	Jhoem: mougsoug" moo he: thang: nab , ri ngoo doem tau" re" lho: David da" mungdain ri doem , tam: too" byid: wa Byo , yoin" jo , da" zi , ri ngoo doem nyheung koid too" wa Hau: lho: hau: ziri yoem: doem , bo loo nhang: wa ga: Aseing: tid .
44015017	Houg: lang" deung nyid da" byu xang: su: dangain" mo , gi Nga" byumyu" yi bue" loo wa shid re" ngoo khe: yu bye . Tungbau byumyu" yi dangain" bang: gi nga" jang" moo ju" ri" goo" wa zi nghoid .
44015018	He: khyoo: ri goonham , goo co , mo wigi si' nhang: to" da" Aseing: gi hid: su" ga: tid nyid .
44015019	Yaku we' xo' tid nyid zigi Ngoo myed khyo" nghoid rigi Mangso shoid khyoo: phoug lo da" tungbau byumyu" yi ri ngoonu" gi ayoug: akhi: age koid byed .
44015020	Hau: tho' moo phara" soolhoo: ri ngei" byid: ziyo' asain asen" ayung" alho , da" zoo: noem , ri abo zoo: wa shid re" gain: tho' zung" khyoo: acang wa shid re" leung zeung: mo , cu" said' da" shoo" yo' suid" ri azoo: goo" wa shid re" mougsoug" lhid" lho: nyangnu" ri kyo" kaid' ri gi , wa" - ein: ngoo myed yu" .
44015021	Khasu" wim gari Moshe da" tarha" ri Dougno: Bidnyid khang" moo" tarha" jung joem moo goonham , mo nyang: - zheung: nghab nyid boem lho: wigi voogung loem: khang" moo" mo: nya: mungdang: ri kho" kyo" nyid boem abye: go - ga: tid kyo .
44015022	Houg: Lang" lagyoo: yi yo' phung ludaid yi dangain" mo , gi sham: go" lho: nyangnu" mo byu dayham" ri khyen: yu wigi Polu eig yug Barnaba yo' dage - Antioki voogung khyoo: bo nhang: kaid' wa shid re" sham: go" to" boem ago" . Hougsu" loem" jeing" bang: dangain" wigi phau" myang: da" Basaba ga: da" Yuda yo' Sila eig yug ri khyen: yu lho: nya: eig youg lo , khyo" mougsoug" dakhyab , lhid" foin: kaid' ago" .
44015023	Hougsu" lhid" foin: kaid da" mougsoug" moo Ngoonu" da" mang: nhung" yi nghoid da - ngoonu" lagyoo: yi yo' phung ludaid yi gi Antioki voogung yo' Suri mung" kilik mung" moo zheung: nyid da - tungbau byumyu" mang: nhung" yi ri vhu" kaid .
44015024	Ngoonu" da" phung mo byu dayham" bang: gi ngoonu" wigi ci: we' apyeung: kaid' ziri nanu" jang" moo ju" re" lho: myid myo: ja: dang: aja: ja: ri zheung: tid wigi nanu" ri myid zheung: myoo: nhang: ga: da" thui: ri ngoonu" shau" gyo: loem bye .
44015025	Houg: yoomo ngoonu" ce: noem , sham: go" lo" lho: lagyoo: bue" loo wa da" byu dayham" ri khyen: yu wigi nyangnu" jhang . khyoo: nhang: kaid wa shid' mo dangain" bang: coem myed veung" to": boem bye .
44015026	Nyang: nu" gi ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" moo" zo" shid re nyang: nya: kang: so' ri lang" vhu" abyid: loo: zei: so' lo" boem ago" . nyangnu" jheddab da" Barnaba yo' Polu eig yug yo' dage" nanu" jhang cang re" lo boem wa zi nghoid .
44015027	Houg: yoomo ngoonu" gi Yuda eig yug Sila ri nanu" jhang khyoo: zheung: nhang: kaid' bye . Nya: eig yug gi lhid" foin: da" mougsoug" moo ngoonu" lhid" to" gu ri nya: eig youg da" nhoid mo we' tid kyoo" goo" wa , .
44015028	Phara" soolhoo: ri ngei" byid: bye: da" zoo: noem - suid" yo' leung zeung: mo cu" said' da" gougnyhoug shoo" ri azoo: goo" . Gain: tho' zung" da" moo" ri we' akoid goo" ein: da: jang" mo jain" lho: nanu" ri yoovoin , gootu: afoin: wa shid re" gyeungshang: da" Venyi moo ngoonu" e" myed , sham: coem , shoin" to" boem bye .
44015029	Nanu" hau: khyoo: ri jang" pyam' boem nghoid rigi gi , bye: - yang" zain" nyid goo" baja" o" ga: zheung: lhid" kaid' ago" .
44015030	Houg: lang" lagyoo: yi ri hougsu" zheung: nhang: kaid' lho: wigi loem" jeung" nyid mo , dangain" ri zheung: khe: zheung" yu lho: nyangnu" ri hau: lhid" foin: mougsoug" thoid' byid: ago" .
44015031	Hau" mougsoug" ri nyangnu" bain' nghab lang" gi houg: su" yoem: byid: kaid' da" mungdang: yoomo nyangnu" gi gye" ngeibu: nyid boem .
44015032	Yuda yo' Sila eig yug gi lapi: zheung: nghoid yoomo loem" jeing" bang: ri myang" sho' yoem: byid: da" mungdang: tid poin" tid kyeing" byid: nyid ago" .
44015033	Nya: eig yug gi hau: voogung moo dayo , zoo: theung: nyid wigi hau: thang: ri loem khoug: bang: gi nya: eig yug ri gyoonoug tung" vhu" dang: tid boem lho: zheung: nhang: kaid' boem bye . Nya: eig yug we' nya: eig yug ri nhang: kaid' bang: jhang khyoo: doem tau" lo" ago" .
44015034	Nghoid loug we' - Sila gi houg: moo jha" theung: nyid wa shid re" myed phyed' pyam da .
44015035	Polu yo' Barnaba eig yug gi Antioki voogung moo dayo , zoo: zheung: theung: nyid lho: Mangso mungdang: ri gooji bang: yo' dage" jhoug" byid: nyid ago" .
44015036	Dayo , zoo: kyo: lo" thang: ri Polu gi Barnaba ri Mangso mungdang: ri ngoonu" kho" kyoo" ca" shi" joyoo khyoo: mang: nhung" yi khasu" koid nyid boem ziri yhe: cang koem" yu" wa shid re" nga" eig yug nyangnu" jhang khyoo: doem tau" loo" shang - ga: tid go .
44015037	Barnaba gi nya: eig yug yo' dage" Marku ga: da" Yohan ri we' bo lhoung: shu" loo" nau , da .
44015038	Nghoid loug we' Polu gi nya: eig youg da" moozoo" moo thang sho abo zei: loo: - Pamphuli voogung moo nya: eig yug ri nyhed: too" khare" lho: doem , tau" phang: loo" su: nghoid yoomo Marku ri shu" wa shid re" agi , ga: myed nyid .
44015039	Nya: eig yug gi he: da" khyoo: yo' sen: lho: gyi" sho' ngeug go" wigi gang: go" lo" ago" . Houg: lang" Barnaba gi Marku ri shu" lho: wigi Kupro gugyoo: kang: khyoo: lhid' zhoung: lho: yhe: lo" ago" .
44015040	Polu gi Sila ri khyen: yu lho: loem" jeing" bang: gi Polu ri Aseing: da" nheig khyeug khyoo: moo bain , ab , nung" byid: boem lang" gi to' lo" ago" .
44015041	Houg: su" wi Polu gi - Suri mung" yo' Kiliki mung" khyo" lid: jang: lo" wigi phung byu yi ri loem" jeung" da" nheigloem: lhei , teing byed .
44016001	Polu gi Debe yo' Lustra voogung khyoo: yhe: lo - Lustra voogung moo Timothi ga: da" Khristain phung byu dayug nyid nyid . Nya: myhi' gi Yuda Byumyu" Khristain nghoid wigi Grid" byumyu" nghoid .
44016002	Tomothi gi Lustra voo bang: yo' Ikoni voogung moo nyid da" loem" jeing" mo , dangain" bang - coem , coung" byid: nyid su: nghoid .
44016003	Polu gi Timothi ri nyang: yo' dage" shu" yen" noug yoomo nyang: ri shooyid thang: yham" da" thung" koid byid: khasu" wim gari nya: phoo gi Grid" byumyu" nghoid ziri hau: gyoo: mo mo , si' byid: boem yoomo Polu gi hougsu" koid byid: khyo" nghoid .
44016004	Nyang: nu" gi voogung joem cang lid: jang: lo" boem wigi Yerusalem voomoo" moo nyid da" lagyoo: yi yo' phung ludaid' yi wigi yoem: byid: to" da" loem" jeing" bang - phau" cang loo" wa da" tarha" nyangnu" ri byid: wigi hau: tarha" joem ri phau" cang loo" ca" da" khyoo: ri jhoug" byid: ago" .
44016005	Houg: yoomo phung byu yi gi-hau: loem" jeung" khyoo: moo je" geung: teung lo wigi nyid" khang" moo" phung byu je" myo: loung: lo nyid ago" .
44016006	Houg: lang" gyeungshang: da" Venyi gi nyangnu" ri Asha mung" gyoo: moo mungdang: ri kho" kyoo" wa akhang" abyid: yoomo nyangnu" gi phrugi mung" yo' Galile mung" gyoo: khyo" so" lid lo .
44016007	Nyang: nu" gi Musi mung" moug: kyoo" moo ju" yhe: loo" lang" gi Nyang: nu" gi Bithuni mung" khyoo: yhi: wa ga: soin' ago" . Nghoid loug we' Yesu da" Venyi gi nyangnu" ri akhang" abyid: nghoid da .
44016008	Houg: yoomo nyangnu" gi Musi mung" ri lid: yhe: lo" lho: Troa voogung moo ju" yhe: lo" boem bye .
44016009	Polu gi myen" ri yoeb , myang myang jang" moo Makedoni byu dayug gi yab , jo , lho: Makedoni mung" khyoo: gu: re" lho: nyangnu" ri re" khyoid yu we' ga: mho' nyid ziri myang .
44016010	Polu gi he: da" yoeb , myang ri bain myang lang" - nyangnu" gi Makedoni mung" khyoo: yhe: loo" wa shid re" soin' nyheung boem bye . khasu" wim gari Makedoni mung" moo nyid , mo , ri ludang: seig kho" kyoo" byid: wa shid re" Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri khe: yu zi nghoid bye" ein: ngoonu" myed jhoo: yoomo nghoid .
44016011	Hougsu" wigi ngoonu" gi lhid' khyo" wigi Troa mo zi Samothrake gugyoo: kang: khyo" dain: za: gu: phyed' yhe: lo" wigi thang: nyid rigi Neapoli voogung moo ju" yhe: lo" boem bye .
44016012	Ngoonu" gi hau: voogung wigi Roma koluni we' nghoid da - Makedoni mung" moo myoo" sho' nyid" yhe: theung: nyid boem .
44016013	Dougno: Bidnyid ri ngoonu" gi Yuda byumyu" yi zeung: foem: lho: akyu" mho' da" joyoo jo , wa ein: jhoo: yoomo voogung nghe: shoid , gyid yam , khyoo: thu' yhe: lo" wigi yhe: zhoung: jo , ri houg: moo zeung: foem: re" da" myiyi: yi ri kho" kyoo" byid: boem bye .
44016014	Houg: bang: da" phung: mo Thuathra voogung mo pain" mi , phaga: koid da" Ludi ga: da" myiyi: we' dayug bo . Nyang: gi Mangsoo ri coung" pid' noku da" myiyi: dayug nghoid wigi Polu kho" kyo" nyid da" mungdang: ri nheigloem: zhug zhug za: tam" gyo: yu wa shid re" aseing: gi nya: nheigloem: khoem" duang: ri phang byed .
44016015	Nyang: yo' nya: yhoem: byu yi gi Babtisma bain kham: yu thang: ri Ludi tid zigi Ngoo gi Aseing: ri gi" gi , nyang: loem" jeung" zi nghoid bye" - ein: nanu" myed loem , bye: nghoid rigi nga" yhoem: moo re" beung" nyid yu" ge' . ga: ngoonu" ri lhoung: da - houg: su" wigi nyang: gi ngoonu" ri ngoug oung: yu da .
44016016	Bidnyid danyed" moo ngoonu" gi hau: akyu" mho' joyoo khyoo: yhe: lo" nyid boem da" uri akhyeung" yu vang ci: da" - goem , phain" se' phain" da" join' myhi , dayug yo' ngoonu" shau" go . Nyang: gi goem , phan" phain" lho: wigi join' seing: ri ngei myoo" sho' kung: byid: nyid su: nghoid .
44016017	Nyang: gi Polu yo' ngoonu" da" thang: moo cang lho: hid: bang: gi myhang: thang da" Mangso dei zoo: yi nghoid ago" - nyangnu" gi ngoonu" khyoid yu da" khyoo: khasu" shau" wa da" khyoo: ri tidfu" yen" mo , nghoid da - ga: wigi nyho: tid nyid .
44016018	Hau: myiyi: nu" gi hougsu" myoo" sho' nyid" nyho: nyid yoomo Polu gi nheig gye" yoo: nau , lo wigi lheung: lo lho: Yesu khristu da" myeing ri lang: wigi ngoo nang ri amyeing" byid: ba - nya: khoug: mo phang: thu' loo" we' ga: hau: akhyeung" da" yu ri tid kaid' . Houg: lang" jang: hau: akhyeung" da": yu gi myiyi: nu" akhoug: mo , phang: thu' lo" byug bye .
44016019	Hau: myiyi: nu" da" join , seing: gi nyang: ngei yo" nyid da" khyoo: jed" byug . ziri si' lang" nyangnu" gi Polu yo' Sila eig yug ri myheug yu lho: kid" vang" moo zeung: foem: nyid da" amyeing" yoo" mo , jhang khyoo: she: khyoid' yhe: lo" boem ago" .
44016020	Nyang: nu" gi nya: eig yug ri Roma zoug: yi da" shid' moo shu" vang yhe: lo" lho: He: eig yug gi Yuda byumyu" zheung: nghoid lho: wigi nya: eig yug gi ngoonu" da" byumyu" yi ri ayoug: akhi" bui" nhang: nyid ago" .
44016021	Ngoonu" da" tarha" yo' adu go" da - thung" khin' ri nya: eig yug gi jhoug" byid: nyid ago" . Ngoonu" gi Roma byumyu" yi nghoid wigi he: da" thung" khin' rigi ayo" lhoem: yu - ayo" phau" cang ga: tid ago" .
44016022	Houg: lang" mung" byu yi we' - houg: bang: thang: bo dab , lho: Polu yo' Sila eig yug ri gyi bo koid lho: sarhi' koid ago" . Houg: yoomo zoug: yi gi Polu yo' Sila eig yug ri byimi , lang" ceug pyam' byid: lho: gyoem , thoung" wigi baid' wa da" amyeing" byid: kaid' ago" .
44016023	Hougsu" nya: eig yug ri dam xoo" sho' - bain , baid' yu thang: ri thung: khoug: moo yhe: lhoung to" boem bye . Nya: eig yug ri teung" teing myheug lhoung too" wa shid re" nyangnu" da" thung: agyi , phoo ri amyeing" khyo , to" ago" .
44016024	Thung: agyi phoo gi hau: da" amyeing" ri yo" yu ci: lang" nya: eig yug ri thung: yhoem: akhau: yab , khyoo: kaid' lho: khyid: moo we' kyoem" xang lho: lhoung to" .
44016025	Gam , gung myen: koo: moo gi Polu yo' Sila eig yug gi Akyu" mho' lho: Mangsoo ri coung" nghei ji: khoin" ri khoin" nyid ago" . Thung: byu gooji yi gi hau: ziri tam" gyo: lho: nyid boem .
44016026	Hau: uri nyeigdain tung" - myid leig gyi" sho' leug lo wigi thung: yhoem: apoem: we' dei , ga: nain" lo . Houg: lang" jang: khoem" duang: joem gi dangain" bang" loo" khare" wigi thung: byu yi dangain" bang: da" jangcoo" doem , joem gi gyoid , gyo" lo" byug boem bye .
44016027	Thung: agyi phoo gi yhoeb , jo , jang" mo so" re" lho: thung: yhoem: mo , khoem" duang: joem dangain" bang" jo , ziri to' myang lang" nyang: gi thung: byu yi dangain" phang: thu' loo" wam: bye" - ga: myed wigi nya: sham: coin" ri she: yu lho: nyang: ri thau" said' wa ga: soin' loo" bye .
44016028	Nghoid loug we' Polu gi nya: thui: ri myhang: thang mo nyho: yoid , kaid' lho: Nanya: gung ri ci" we' akoid' - ngoonu" dangain" mo , hid: moo danyed nyid boem .
44016029	Thung: agyi phoo gi myedoem' mho' yu lho: gei , vang re" wigi Polu yo' Sila eig youg da" khyid: yang: moo ko , ko , nain" zi re" goeb , pid' to .
44016030	Hau: thang: ri nyang: gi nya: eig yug ri tung gung khyoo: shu" thu' lo" lho: nheig bo eig yug we" - ngoo khyoid yu zi shau" sho' khasu" koid wa lha" . - ga: myed: yu" .
44016031	Nya: eig yug gi Aseing Yesu ri loem" jeing" we' - houg: lang" nang yo' re" da" yheom: khau: byu yi khyoid yu zi shau" wa nghoid - ga: phoug tu .
44016032	Hau: thang: ri nya: eig yug gi nyang: yo' nya: yhoem: byu dangain" mo , ri Aseing: da" mungdang: kho" kyoo" byid: ago" .
44016033	Hau: myen , nyang: thung: agyi phoo gi nya: eig yug ri shu" yu lho: nya: eig youg da" dam noo joem ri ced" san byed . Nyang: yo' nya: da" yhoem: byu yi dangain" mo , gi houg: lang" jang: Babtisma ri zheung: kham: yu boem bye .
44016034	Hau: thang: ri nyang: gi Polu yo' Sila eig yug ri nya: yhoem: khyoo: shu" lo" wigi zoo: noem we' doo" zhoo" bye . Thung: agyi phoo yo' nya: yhoem: byu yi gi Mangsoo ri shau" loem" jeung" lo boem bye: yoomo gye" nyang: ngeibu: gau yi nyid boem bye .
44016035	Thang: nyid nab , kyoo ri Roma amyeing" ci: mo , gi pya: da: zoug: ri hau: eig yug ri lhoid , kaid' ge' ga: da" amyeing" yo' dage" nhang: kaid' bye .
44016036	Hougsu" wi hau: thung: agyi , phoo gi Polu yo' Sila eig yug ri Zoug: yi gi nang yo' Sila ri nhang: kaid' wa da" amyeing" khyo' kaid abye: go" - Houg: yoomo re" eig yug ngei pyoo: tung" za: loo" loo: ge" ga: tid kaid' da .
44016037	Nghoid loug we' Polu gi hau: da" pya: da: zoug: yi ri nga" eig yug gi Roma mung" byu nghoid - nyangnu" gi nga" eig" yug ri ce" yooboo we' amyang zi mung" byu yi da" shid' khoin" moo gyoem , thoung" wigi baid' lho: thung: moo lhoung kaid' boem , hau: lho: akhid" nghoid lang" yen , gi nga" eig yug ri sam" zoo: nhang: kaid' noug goonhung: lha" . khasu" se' gi wa Roma zoug: yi nyang: hid: khyoo: re" wigi nga" eig yug ri re" khe: thu' yu goo" baja" - ga: tid da .
44016038	Pya: da: zoug: yi gi hau: dang: ri Roma zoug: yi ri lo" tid kyo" ago" . Nyang: nu" gi Polu yo' Sila eig yug gi Roma mung" byu zheung: nghoid ziri shaug" gyoo: lang" gi gyo: gyoug nyid boem ago" .
44016039	Houg: lang" nyangnu" gi yhe: lho: Polu yo' Sila eig yug ri zheung: toung" pain: ago" . Hau: thang: ri nyangnu" gi nya: eig yug ri thung: khoug: mo yhe: shu" thu' yu lho: hau: voogung mo thu' loo" wa shid re" nya: eig yug ri mho' ago" .
44016040	Polu yo' Sila eig yug gi thung: yhoem: mo thu' lo" lho: ludi da" yhoem: khyoo: zheung: yhe: lo" ago" . Houg: moo loem" jeing" bang: yo' zheung: shau" go" wigi nyangnu" ri yoem: byid: dang: ri bain tid lang" nya: eig yug gi hau: voogung mo doem thu' lo" ago" .
44017001	Polu yo' Sila eig yug gi Ampipholi yo' Apoloni Voogung ri so" lid , lo" wigi Thesaloni voogung khyoo: ju" yhe: lo" ago" . Hau: voogung moo Yuda tarha" jung daloem: jo .
44017002	Polu gi nyang: khanham we' lhoung koid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti-Yuda Tarha jung khyoo: yhe: lo" - Houg: moo labain' nyid" ri jhoem: mungdang: yo' cang lho: mung" byu yi yo' doem , go" nyid .
44017003	Meshia gi dayam , dayoo: kham' zoo: ca" wa ziyo' - shid: jang" mo doem , dei to'' loo wa" - ga: da" khyoo: joem ri jhoem: mougsoug" moo shid' lho: nyangnu" ri phyed' phyed' kho' kho' tid kyo" nyid . 44017005	Nghoid loug we' Yuda byu yi gi myed , zheung: noug: yoomo fu" moo" khyoo: cang nyid yen" da" - byugang: yi ri khe: zheung" yu lho: byu phung: daloem: koid yu boem ago" . 44017006	Nyang: nu" gi azheung: shau" sho: myang lang" nyangnu" gi Yasun yo' loem" jeing" bang: dayham" ri hau: voogung mo amyeing" ci: mo , shid' moo she: khyoid re" lho:" Hid: bang: gi joyoo khyi , khang" moo" moo yau: khe" da" khyoo: ri ze" bue byid: loo mo , nghoid ago' - akhid" ngoonu" da" voogung moo we' ju" lo boem abye: go" - , , Yasun we' nya: yhoem: moo he: eig yug ri lhoem: kham: yu to" da" - ga: zheung: tid kyo" .
44017007	Nyang: nu" gi Yesu ga: da" khokham" dayug nyid ga: zheung: tid wigi Khosen" da" tarha" joem ri shoid rue" nyid mo , nghoid ago - ga: zheung: zeug yoid boem .
44017008	He: da" dang: ri shau" gyo: boem lang" mung" byu yi yo' voogung mo amyeing" akhang" ci: bang: gi gye" lu: fu: go" lo boem bye .
44017009	Amyheing ci: bang: gi Yesun yo' gooji bang: ri Pakham: ngei khyoug" nhang: lho: nyangnu" ri nhang: kaid' ago" .
44017010	Moug: coid' loo yo' - loem" jeing" bang: gi Polu yo' Sila eig yug ri Beria voogung khyoo: nhang: kaid' ago" . Hau: voogung moo zheung: ju" yhi: lang" = nya: eig yug gi Yuda yi da" tarha" jung khyoo: yhe: lo .
44017011	Beria voobyu yi gi Thesaloni voobyu yi da" tho' re - khoin: lheing: mo , nghoid boem . Nyang: nu" gi mungdang: ri nheigloem: zhug zhug za: tam" gyo: yu boem wigi Polu kho" kyo" da" mungdang: gi deung adeung ziri si' wa shid re" nyid" khang" moo" jhoem: mougsoug" ri nghab xoin: se' nyid ago" .
44017012	Nyang: nu" mo myoo" sho' mo , gi loem" jeung" lo boem bye - byunyed , azhang myhang: bye: da" - Grid" myiyi: yi myoo" sho' mo , yo' Grid" yuggi yi myoo" sho' bang: we' loem" jeung" lo boem ago" .
44017013	Nghoid loug we' Polu gi Beria voogung moo we' - Mangso mungdang: ri tid kyo" nyid ga: da" ludang: ri Thesaloni voogung: mo Yuda byumyu" yi shau" gyo: boem wigi nyangnu" gi Beria voo khyoo: zheung: ju" re" lho: mung" byu yi ri lu: fu: loo wa shid re" re" pue: boem ago" .
44017014	Loem" jeing" bang: gi houg: lang" jang - Polu ri panglai gyid yam , moo ju" sho' yhe: de" kaid' boem ago" . Nghoid loug we' Sila yo' Timothi eig yug gi Beria voogung moo theung: nyid shi" ago" .
44017015	Polu ri yhe: de" kaid' khoo , mo , gi Athen voo moo ju" sho' Polu yo" dage" zheung: cang yhe: wigi Sila yo' Timothi eig yug ri ge , bue" yhi' myab , khyo" nya: jang" moo cang ri nhang: ge' ga: Polu pyeung: kaid' da" dang: ri voin , lho: Beria voo khyoo: doem tau" lo ago" .
44017016	Polu gi Athen voogung moo Sila yo' Timothi ri lang" nyid da" uri nyang: gi hau: voogung moo phara" soolhoo: za: byeung" jo , ziri myang wigi nya: nheigloem: gye" apyoo: loo .
44017017	Houg: yoomo Polu gi tarha" jung moo Yuda byumyu" yi yo' Mangsoo ri noku da" tungbau byumyu" yi yo' we' - Shava kid vang" cang so" lid , yen" da" mung" byu dangain" mo , ri we' - nyid" khang" moo" tid sham: go" nyid .
44017018	Epikuri yo: Ati - yi nheigloem: phajhi" sara: yi dayham" we' polu yo' gye" tid ngeig go" nyid boem . Nyang: nu" mo dayham" gi He: ci: ase' da" koopyoid' khyoid' gi ce" noem , ri tid nau nyid lha" » ga: tid boem lho: gootu: dayham" bang: gi goo tu: byumyu" yi da" phara" khyoo: tid nyid sam" ga: tid go" nyid boem . Nyang: nu" hidsu" tid nyid boem zigi Yesu Khyoo: yo' nyang: doem dei to'' lo da" khyoo: ri Polu kho" kyo" nyid yoomo nghoid .
44017019	Houg: yoomo nyangnu" gi Aripagu boug voogoung da" Kongsi: yung" shid' moo Polu ri shu" do , yhe: lho: nang tid kyo" nyid da" he: jhoug" byid: khyoo: aseig yo' sen: lho: ngoonu" si' nau .
44017020	Nang jhoug" byid: da" khyoo: dayham" gi ngoonu" gyo: ri gye" gyo: mau" - Hau: da" dangkang: joem ri ngoonu" si' nau" ga: tid boem ago" .
44017021	( Khasu" wim gari Athen voobyu yi yo' houg: moo zeung: nyid da" tungbau byumyu" yi gi lo" thang da" ludang: aseig khyoo: ri tid kyo" gyo: yu khyo" nyangnu" da" ayo , joem bain sho' ri lhai: kaid' nyid boem ago" .
44017022	Polu gi voogoung kongsi: yung" mo byu yi da" shid khoin" moo yab , jo , lho: wigi - Athen voobyu yi we" - nanu" gi noku thung" ri gye" kang: lung bu mo , nghoid da" khyoo: ri khyookhaid gu: khang" moo" ri yu" lho: ngoo si' bye .
44017023	Khasu" wim gari ngoo nanu" da" voogung khoug: moo so" yen" ri nanu" da" coung" pid' joyoo joem ri cang yu" yen" ri" Ngoonu" ase' da" Mangso shid mo , , ga: lhid" tab to" da" phoin: daloem: ri ngoo myang . Hau: nanu" asi looza: noku nyid da" Mangso khyoo: ri akhid" ngoo tid khyo" nyid zi nghoid .
44017024	Moug: myid yo' houg: moo nyid ja: - jo moo jo , ri phain" to" da" Mnagsoo gi Moug: khung: yo' myed jang: da" Aseing: nghoid wigi byu yi , lo , yo' koid to" da" noku yhoem: moo anyed nghoid da .
44017025	Hau: Aseing: nyang: byu yug khang" moo" ri kangso' yo' so' shi: nhang: ziyo' - ca" nyid da" zi dangain" ri byid: too" su: nyang: nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi nyang: ri daja: ja: koid byid: aca" .
44017026	Mangsoo gi xangsu: byu dayug ri shi" phain" to" lho: hau: yug mo , byumyu" acang: joeb , sho' nyid thu' loo nhang: wigi mougmyid gyab , goin" jang" moo byeung" loo" nhang: bye . 44017027	Mangsoo hidsu" koid to" zigi ngoonu" nyang: ri sho: lho: Nyang: ri soeb , sho: yen" ri myang ri myang boem abe - ga: koid zi nghoid .
44017028	Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi ngoonu" hang" yo" we" ve: nyid zi anghoid . Byu dayug tid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" ngoonu" gi nyang: moo kang: so dei nyid lho: so" yen" do: yen" boem . 44017029	Ngoonu" gi Mangso zoo: du yi nghoid boem yoomo Mangsoo gi byu da" lo , moo" phajhi" khyo" koid to" da - ngei sheing: soolhoo - lug boem' soolhoo: yo' du ein: age jhoo: nghoid da .
44017030	Mangsoo gi xangsu: byu yi nyang: ri asi loo: nyid lid: lo da" ayo , akhyeing: ri yu" lhai: kaid' bye - nghoid loug we' akhid" gi khyi khang" moo" mo xangsu: byu dangain" ri nyangnu" da" akhyeing" ashoeb , da" moozoo" dangain" jang" mo nheigloem: thed' lheung: loo wa shid re" amyeing" byid: kaid' bye .
44017031	Khasu" wim gari nyang: khyen: yu too" su: da" lo , khyo" wigi nyang: gi mougmyid gyab , goin" ziri dain: nyeung khyo" tarha" dang: phyed' wa da" bidnyid' ri mhe , phyed' to" abye: . 44019030	Polu nyang: gi-Meing: byu yi da" shid khoin" khyoo: yhi: nau , nghoid loug we' - Loem" jeing" bang: gi nyang: ri ayhi: nhang: nghoid ago" .
44019031	Polu nya: bidnoem yi zheung: nghoid da - mungdain moo amyeing" yoo" mo , dayham" we' pui" mo , goo" jang: moo ayhe: nyid shug wa shid re byu nhang: kaid' wigi Polu ri mho' tid boem .
44019032	Hau: ayo , moo byu yi gi houg: su" mo , thei" mo , yug phoug: go" nyid boem yoomo mung" byu yi gi dayham" daja: ga: nyhoo: go" nyid boem . Nyang: nu" mo myoo" sho' bang: gi nyangnu" ce: noem koid phoug: go" nyid da" Khyoo: ri lang" asi shi" nghoid ago" .
44019033	Yuda byu yi gi Alexandru mung" byu yi da" shid' vhu" khyoo: yhi: nhang: kaid' yoomo mung" byu yi dayham" gi Alexandru we'-mo , thei" mo , yug lu: fu: go" lo da" khyoo: yo' sen: wigi nghoid wa" - ga: jho: ago" . Houg: lang" Alexandru gi mung" byu yi ri sam" zoo: nyid boem wa shid re-lo , tu , tu , lho: nyang: ashoid da" khyoo: ri tid yed: yu wa shid mo , yoem: kaid' nyid .
44019034	Nghoid loug we' nyang: gi Yuda byu nghoid da" khyoo: ri mung" byu yi zheung: se' yu" boem lang" gi Ephesu voogoung da" Atemi gi gyi: sheung: jo , ga:-eig na: yi: koo: nyangnu" dangain" mo , dage" za: zheung: deug yoid nyid boem ago" .
44019035	Lo" thang jang" moo gi voo goung jare" phoo gi mung" byu yi ri sam" zoo: tam" too" nhang: lho: Ephesu voobyu yi we' - Ephesu voogung gi gyi: sheung: da - Atemi phara" yhoem: yo' moug: khung: mo gyoo" re" da" lug zeing ri zoem: ci: da" voogung nghoid ziri yug khang" moo" se' ago" .
44019036	Hang" we' he: da" khyoo: rigi ayo" ngeug pyam' nghoid ago - houg: yoomo nanu" gi sam" zoo: nyid ri gi bye - daja: ja: ri anau , yu" loo: koid wa zigi a eung: nghoid da .
44019037	Nanu" gi he: eig yug ri phara" yhoem: ri lhoid zo: zi we' anghoid - Nanu" da" phara" myhi , ri tid japhue: pyam' byid: zi we' anghoid zi he: joyoo khyoo: dashu" re" ago" .
44019038	Demetri yo' nya: lo , moo" zei: mo , gi dayug yug ri yooboo foin: nau , nghoid rigi tarha" yung" phang to" ziyo' - amyeing" ci: bang: we' nyid nyid ago - tarha" yung" moo yooboo ri ge , tid da .
44019039	Nghoid loug we' nanu" gi hau: tho' je" je" wigi - daja: ja: ri da tid noug shigo" nghoid rigi mung" byu yi da" tarha" vang zoeb , phung moo" moo tid phyed' yu boem ca" wa nghoid .
44019040	Khasu" wim gari - akhid" nyid" bue" lo da" mo , thei" mo , yug lu: fu: go" da" moozoo" gang: mo ngoonu" ri yooboo foin: loo wa ziri gyoug ca" . Hid: yhang: ti" mo , thei" mo , yug lu: fu: go" da" khyoo: gi Ce: noem yoomo bue" lo da" khyoo: ri toin" shid' wa ziyo' akhyoo" zhug zhug za: zei: wa khyoo: ngoonu" ayoo"-ga: tid .
44019041	He: da" dang: bain tid thang: ri nyang: gi mung" byu yi ri phang: loo" nhang: kaid .
44020001	Houg: su" mo , thei" mo , yug lu: fu: go" da" khyoo: joem tam" lo" thang: ri Polu gi loem" jeing" bang: ri khe: zheung" yu lho-yoem: byid: dang: tid . hau: thang: ri nyangnu" ri vhu" too" khare" lho: Makedoni mung" khyoo: yhe: loo" bye .
44020002	Hau: mung" khyo" so" lid: yhe: lo" wigi loem" jeung" da" mung" byu yi ri yoem: byid: lho: mungdang: myoo" sho' tid kyoo" bye - hau: thang: ri nyang: gi Akhaia mung" khyoo: ju" yhe: lo .

Hau: thang: ri nyang: gi noku yhoem: moo" khyoo: vang yhe: lho: kyeung sain' da" ayo , bidnyid dayo , bain wa ziyo' nyangnu" yug khang" mo" shid re" xoin" ngei" byid: wa da" ayo , dayo , nghoid wa da" khyoo: ri tid kyo" too" kho' da .
44021027	Nghoid loug we' bidnyid nyhed nyid" byeung" loo lang" gi Asia mung" mo Yuda byu yi dayham" bang: gi noku yhoem: moo" moo shau" myang abye: go . Nyang: nu" gi mung" byu phung: goin" ziri lhu: nhau" pu: to' kaid lho: Polu ri myheung yu ago" .
44021028	Nyang: nu" tid zigi Israela byumyu" yi we" - pang" ge' byu he: yug gi khyi , khang" moo" moo cang so" yen" lho: yug khang" moo" ri we' Israela byumyu" yi ri we' - Moshe da" tarha" ri we' hid: noku yhoem: moo" ri we' gyi , koid lho: khoug" byid: yen" su: nghoid da . 44026012	Houg: su" koid wa shid re" ngoo gi khainjung agyi moo" yi jang" mo amyeing" ri mho' ci: lho: wigi Damasku voogung khyoo: do , loo" bye .
44026013	Khyoolaid' moo do , lo" nyid uri nyid" khyoug bidnyid" gung tu: ayo , moo Khokham" phoo we" - Bid' tho' moo je bang da" bidbang daloem: gi moug: khung: khyo" bang thu' lo wigi nga" da" ayam , aqei: yo' ngoo yo' dage" nghoid mo , da" ayam , aqei: moo bang jo , ziri ngoo myang .
44026014	Ngoonu" dangain" bang: gi myidjang: moo leung lo" byug boem wigi Hebre" myeing" khyo" Sho" lu - Sho" lu Nang ngoori cikoid shen" yhen nyid lha" . Nujung loo: gi nya: Aseung: da" voosi" zucoin: moo khyid: peig peug yu ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" nang gi ngoori gyi , koid wigi - nanya: gung ri nanyang: noo nhang: da - ga: tid da" thui: ri ngoo shau" gyo .
44026015	Houg: lang" ngoo gi Aseing: we" - Nang hang" su: nghoid lha" . ein: myed: kaid . Aseing: gi nang shen" yhen nyid da" Yesu nghoid - ga: tid .
44026016	Nghoid loug we' to' lho: so" yhe: loo" we' nang ri nga" dei , zoo: khyo" nyheung too" wa shid re" nga" gung nang ri toin" shid' bye . Akhid" nyid" ngoo nang ri ce: noem toin" shid' bye: da" khyoo: yo' Thang: phyang" ngoo nang ri toin" shid' shi" wa khyoo: ri Nang gi subi" gooji yi ri sagsi: kham , byid: ca" wa zi nghoid da .
44026017	Ngoo gi Israela byumyu" yi da" lo , mo we' - nang ri ngoo nhang: kaid' wa da" - tungbau byumyu" da" lo , mo we' nang ri khyoid yu wa zi nghoid .
44026018	Nang gi nyangnu" da" myojid" ri bang" loo nhang: lho: nyangnu" ri moug: coid' khoug: mo zi bidbang khoug: khyoo: Satan da" yoem: so' khoug: mo wigi Mangso yoem: so' khoug: khyoo: phoug loo nhang: wa nghoid . 44026019	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo Khokham" Agripa we" - moug: Khung: khyo" toin" shid' da" myo , myang ri ngoo gi angeug pyam .

44028008	Hau: Bobli da" nya: phoo gi nooyoem" yo' voem: ni no nyid wigi yhoeb cuang moo leung jo . Houg: lang" Polu gi hau: youg da" yab , khyoo: vang lo" wigi akyu" mho' byid: lho: hau: youg da" atho' moo nya: lo , ki" byid: wigi mainkaid byed .
44028009	Hidsu" bain bue" lo" thang: ri hau: gugyoo: kang: moo nyid da" noo , phyoo" aja: ja: shau" nyid bang: gi Polu jang" moo re" lo boem wigi nyangnu" dangain" bang: gi noo: phyoo" ge: , shang: lo" boem bye .
44028010	Nyang: nu" gi ngoonu" ri jhung: shug joem myoo" sho' ja: byid: ago - ngoonu" doem , gu: loo" wa ein: soin' lo" ri ngoonu" gyung: khyoo: moo zoo: ca" da" - zookhoo: joem ri sangphoo' tho' moo re" cang kaid' byid: kaid' boem shi .
44028011	Lham" moo" soem" khyab , kyo: lo" da" thang: ri hau: gugyoo: kang: mo da" ngam" yo , lo" Khau: nyid da" - Alexandru voogung mo phara" zoozoem , tang: ga: da" - sangphoo' tho' moo yhe: do , zhoung: lho: gu: lo" boem bye .
44028012	Ngoonu" gi Surakusa voogung khyoo: ju" yhe: lo" wigi hau: voogung moo soem" nyid" yhe: theung: nyid boem .
44028013	Hau: voogung mo wigi ngoonu" doem xo' gu: yhe: lo" ri Regi voogung moo ju" yhe: lo" boem bye . Thang: nyid rigi moug: thang: khyo" lid' hau , lo wigi eig nyid" ein: da" nyid ri she' Potioli voogung khyoo: ju" yhe: lo" boem bye .
44028014	Ngoonu" gi hau: voogung moo loem" jeing" bang: dayham" ri yhe: zheung: myang wigi nyangnu" gi ngoonu" ri nyangnu" yo' dage" labain daloem: theung: nyid khoo , wa shid re" mho' ago" . Hau: thang: ri ngoonu" gi Roma voomoo" khyoo: yhe: lo" boem bye .
44028015	Roma voomoo" mo loem" jeing" bang: gi ngoonu" da" khyoo: ri shau" gyo: boem lang" gi Api: ga: da" kid" vang" joyoo ju" sho' we' being" do , yhoem: soem" loem: ga: da" joyoo ju" sho' we' - zheung: ju" re" boem wigi ngoonu" ri tau , yu ago , Polu gi nyangnu" ri myang lang" - nyangnu" gi Mangso jeju" ri coung" nghei boem lho: nheigloem: yoem: gyi" sho' yo" lo boem bye .
44028016	Ngoonu" gi Roma voomoo" khyoo: ju" yhe: boem thang ri Polu rigi zung" da" gyizoo: dayug yo' nyang: kyeing" nyid wa da" akhang" yo" .
44028017	Soem" nyid" kyo: lo" thang: ri Polu gi hau: voogung mo Yuda ludaid' vhu" jhung: yi ri khe: yu da - nyangnu" gi zheung: zeung: ri lang" Nga" Israela mang: nhung" yi we" - ngoo gi ngoonu" da" byumyu" yi ri we' ngoonu" phoug" phyid" yi mo xo' kham: yu lo da" thung: ri joem ri we' - shoid vhang: da" moozoo" ri ngoo gi daja" we' akoid nghoid loug we' Yerusalem voomoo" moo ngoori thung: lhoung wigi Roma byu yi da" lo , moo ab , byid: pyam' boem ago" .
44028018	Ngoori bain ca: yu" boem thang: ri we' - ngoo shid: moin: da" yooboo - ce" daja: we' abo ziri myang boem yoomo Roma byu yi gi ngoori phoid: kaid' nau nyid ago" .
44028019	Nghoid loug we' he: khyoo: ri Yuda byumyu" yi ngeug pyam' boem wigi ngoo gi nga" byumyu" yi ri ce" yooboo foin: jang: ajo , loug we' Roma khosen" pho , jhang khyoo: ngoori lhai: to' kaid' ge" ein: - mho' ca" byug bye .
44028020	Houg: yoomo ngoo gi nanu" yo' shau" doem , goo" wa shid mo khe: yu zi nghoid . Gyeing" nyang: ga: rigi ngoo hidsu" jang coo" doem , wigi tei" zi dashau" rigi Israela byumyu" yi myid byu nyid su: gang mo nghoid da - ga: tid .
44028021	Houg: lang" nyangnu" gi ngoonu" gi re" da" khyoo: yo' sen: lho: Yuda mung" mo lhid" foin: da" mougsoug" dakhyab , khyoolhang" we' ashau" yu . Hau: lho: houg: mo da" byu yi ju" re" wigi re" khyoo: yo' sen: da" ludang: age zi hang" we' are" tid kyoo" nghoid ago" .
44028022	Khasu" wim gari nang bo da" phung: ri khyi , khang" moo mung" byu yi ngeug thoug shang" nyid ziri ngoonu" se . Nghoid loug we' nang myed khyoo: ri ngoonu" we' tam" gyoo: nau - ga: tid ago" .
44028023	Houg: yoomo nyangnu" gi Polu yo' bidnyid deing go" ci: ago" . deing go" to" da" bidnyid moo Polu nyid da" joyoo moo byu myoo" sho' zeung: ju" re" boem ago" . 44028026	Nyang: tid da" khyoo: gi Nang gi hau" mung" byu yi jhang khyoo: yhe: tid we' . Nanu" gi tam" gyoo: nghoid loug we' ase' gyoo: goo" wa Nanu" gi yu" nghoid loug we' amyang goo" wa .
44028027	Khasu" wim gari - he: da" byumyu" yi da" nheigloem: gi nheig coid' coid' jo , boem zi nghoid nyid wigi nyangnu" da" nukhyab' joem gi jhed' yoin" to" boem ziyo' Nyang: nu" da" myo , jid , joem gi coem" ci: boem yoomo nghoid . 44028028	Houg: lang" Polu gi dang: thang khyo" ( Dang: thang khyo" Polu gi ) Hau: Mangso da" khyoid khyi: yu da" mungdang: ri tungbau byumyu" yi khyoo: byid: pyam' lho: wigi nyangnu" gi hau: da" mungdang: ri tam" gyo: yu lo" boem wa khyoo: ri nanu" se' too" ge" - ga: tid kaid' bye .
44028029	Ngoo gi tarha" shod lho: shid: moin: da" yooboo yoo" su: nghoid ri gi loid byoin wa shid' re" ngoo amho , wa nghoid loug we' nanu" ngoori yooboo foin: nyid da" khyoo: gi adeung amain" khyoo: nghoid ziri nyangnu" da" lo , moo ngoori hang" we' ayo" ab , byid: nghoid ago" - ngoori khosen" pho , da" shid' khoin" khyoo ; lhai to' kaid wa ziri ngoo mho' nau - ga: tid .
44028030	Polu gi eig zain' loem: lei: - nyang: ngho" to" da" yhoem: moo nyid nyid lho: nya: jhang ri" bang: ri being" lhoem: tau , yu nyid .

45001001	Nya: ngeibu lu dang: gi ri fu" kaid' wa shid' re" lagyoo: gyeing" dayug khyo" Pho Mangsoo: khyen yu nyheing too" su: - Khristu Yesu da" dei zoo: ngoo Polu gi - mougsoug" lhid" kaid' .
45001002	Goonham' mo Mangsoo: gi nyada" lapi: yi khyo" hau: ngei bu lu dang: ri kyo" kaid' wa ga: dang: soo" to" zi yo" dakhyoo" gyeungshang: jhoem: mungdang: moo lhid" to" .

45001020	He mougmyid ri Mangsoo: phain" to" da akhyeing: mo nyang: xangsu: byu yi gi - Aseing da" athang agoin myonhoo: phung" yoeb ri we' Aseing gi Mangsoo: agyeing" nyang nghoid da" khyoo: ri we' goolhoo: nyang: si bye: - nyangnu" gi hid te" da" Mangso: myonhoo: ngeilang: ri amyang yu" nghoid loug yo" se' boem . 45001027	Houg: yo" dakhyoo" ti" yuggi yi we" - myiyi: yi yo" zoem" jeung" nyid akhyoo" khyo" akoid' loo: za: - yuggi nyang: cang" nyam' yo: avoid avhu: khyo" cang wigi - yuggi nyang: cang" asho' ashid: koid' nyid: lho: - nyang: nya: aco' ajhoid' zei: da moo" zo" moin: yi" yooboo aphoug" ri kham: zo nyid abye: go" .

45001030	Dang: soso' subi" myo nhoo: shoem: nhang: Mangsoo: ri we' ngheung" avhoo: mo nghoid . 45001031	Nheugloem: azoung" mo , - dang: soo" lid: mo , subi" ri nheig khyeug nheig myen: nheigloem: we' nyanu" ayo" toin" shid' .

45002001	Haugsu" nghoid yoomo - byu gooji ri tarha" dang: phyed' su we' re" yooboo khyoid' byid wa khyoo: thang bye . 45002004	Houg: za: we' anghoid shi" - nang gi Aseing jheddab nheig khyeug nyid da khyoo: - nheigloem: sheing: byid nyid khyoo: yo' kham' zeing: byid nyid da" khyoo: ri aphoug" akhyoid' koid' bye .
