45002005	Nghoidloug we' - nang gi u" loem' thain: ci: lho: wigi nheigloem: ayo" thid' . Houg: yoomo - Mangsoo: nheig yo ; lo lho: - dain: khyo" tarha" dang: phyed' lo da" bidnyid ri - re" shid' re" je lid: da" yoo bo dam ri shau" kham zoo: wa .
45002006	Hau: bidnyid ri byu yug khang" moo" gi nyang: nya: da" koid' moozoo" yo" dakhyoo" ti" - Mangsoo: gi aphoug" shang: byid wa zi nghoid .
45002007	Ge da" moozoo" ri xo' zei lho: myonho: phung" yoeb ri we' ayo" shid: lo" da" pyaid ri we' - sho: nyid da" byu yi rigi - Mangsoo: gi - aphaid' ato: kangso' ri byid wa nghoid .
45002008	Nyang: nya: akyu" ri te: sho: lho: - jo , da" khyoo: ri she: pyam' wigi - shoid' da khyoo: moo cang loo" da" byu yi gi - Mangsoo: nheig khoo" yo: zi shau" boem wa .
45002009	Xang: shid" ri Yuda byumyu" yi hau: thang: ri tungbau byumyu" yi yo' age khyoo: mo , byu dangain" gi - kyi" khyeug sho" jhen: zi yo" - khe" ngau nyid da dam shau" kham: zo: boem wa .
45002010	Xang: shid" ri Yuda byumyu" yi houg yo" dakhyoo" ti" tungbau byumyu" dangain" mo yo' ge da" moo" zei: mo rigi - myonhoo: ngeilang: we' - myenjham" ngeipyo: khyoo: we' - kham: zoo: nhang: wa zi nghoid .
45002011	Phoo Mangsoo: gi byu xang: su dangain" ri dakhyoo" ti" tarha" dang: phyed' loo wa zi nghoid .
45002012	Moshe da tarha" ri dajhi' we' ase' da" Yuda byumyu" anghoid tungbau byumyu" tarha" shoid' lo" nghoid rigi - nyanu" gi tarha" ri asi' mo nghoid . Moshe tarha" ri se' da" Yuda byumyu" yi tarha" shoid' lo" ri nyanu" gi - lhid" to" tarha" moo tid to" zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" yooboo dam shau" kham wa zi nghoid . '
45002013	Byu gi - lhid" to" tarha" ti" shau" gyo: ziyo' - Mangsoo: shid' moo deingbyeing" mo ayo" bui . Lhid" to" tarha" moo bo zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" cang lo" ri za: Mangso: da shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" mo dayo" bue" lo .
45002014	Tungbau byumyu" yi gi - hau: da tarha" ri ashau" kham: yu boem . Nghoidloug we' - tarha" moo tid to" zi ri nyang: tu: nyang: myid vho: khyo" cang lo" da" uri tarha" ri shau" kham: yu mo bue" lo .
45002015	Moshe tarha" moo tid to" da" khyoo: joem gi - houg: bang" da" nheigloem: seing" khyab' moo lhid" tab' to" yhang: ti" nyang: bo jo da" khyoo: ri houg bang: nyid yab zei sid yen" jang" mo toin" shid nyid . Nyanu" da" nheigloem: jeung" mo we' deingmain: khyoo: toin" shid' nyid . Nyanu" myid soin: khyoo: gi - dalheing: lheing: nyanu" ri yooboo foin: lho: dao lheing: lheing: gi - nyanu" ri gooloo , goem nyid .
45002016	Houg: yoomo - ngoo phyed" kyo" da" ngeibu lu dang: seig yo" dakhyoo" ti" - tarha" dang: phyed' da bidnyid moo Mangsoo: gi - Yesu Khristu khyo" wigi - byu dangain" mo , - zau" nyhoem" to" da" myid soin: khyoo: yi ri - tarha" dang: phyed' loo wa nghoid .
45002017	Nghoidloug we' bidnoem phoo we" - nang gi nanya: gung ri Yuda byumyu" nghoid ga: wigi - Yuda tarha" moo yoem: loem lho: - Mangsoo: shid' khoin" moo nang nghoid boin: nyid .
45002018	Nang gi Mangsoo: ce: noem zei: wa vho: zi se' nyid su: nghoid . Yuda tarha" khyo" jo ziri khyen yu wa shid' re" jhau" yu bye: su: nghoid .
45002019	Nang gi - Myo amyang mo da" khyoo: shed' su: - moug: coid' moo nyid mo da" bidbang - deing" deing nghoid .
45002020	Byu gang yi ri khyoo: shed' su: - phajhi" asi' shi" mo da sara nghoid ga: deing" deing nang nghoid . Nang gi Yuda tarha" phajhi" yo" deingmain" da" khyoo: ri se .
45002021	Nang gi subi" ri gi jhoug" byid: - ciwim nanya gung ri gi ajhau" lha" . Nang gi subi" ri akhoug" wa shid' re" kho" kyo" lho: ciwim na nyang: gi khau" nyid lha" .
45002022	Nang gi subi" myi: ri alhoid' goo" ga: tid lho: - ciwim wigi nang nyang: gi subi" myiyi: lhoid' nyid lha" . Nyang gi soolhoo no' zi ri nheig no ga: lho: ciwim wigi nanya gung gi noku yhoem: ri phyo' nyid lha" .
45002023	Nang gi Mangso: tarha" yo" khyoo: ri phau khuang yen" lho: - ce: noem wigi nya: tarha" ri shoid' vhang: khyo" Mangso: da" myo nhoo: ri ze" shoem: nyid lha" .
45002024	Jhoem: mungdang: moo tid zi gi - Nghizain byumyu" yi gi Mangso: da" myeing khyang" ri akhyeing" ashoeb' tid nyid boem zi gi nanu" Yuda byu yi yoomo nghoid - ga: tid .
45002025	Nang gi Yuda tarha" ri cang" su nghoid lho: re" da sho" yid thang: yham" ziri phoug" tab' ga nghoid loug we' nang gi gyeing" nyang: Yuda tarha" ri atam gyoo: su danghoid nyid rigi sho" yid thang: ayham" ri je gi wa .
45002026	Gyeing" nyang ga ri sho" yid thang ayham" da tungbau byumyu" dayug gi - lhid" to" tarha" moo tid to" ziri cang nghoid rigi hau: yug ri Mangsoo: gi sho" yid thang: yham" ci: su: yhang: ti" soin: yu wa zi anghoid la" .
45002027	Nang gi lhid" cab' wim lhid" to" da" sho" yid thang: yham" da" khyoo: ri cang loug we' . tarha" ri shoid' nyid . Houg: yoomo tungbau byumyu" yi gi - nanu" Yuda byumyu" yiri tarha" dang: phyed boem wa nghoid . Nyanu" gi gungshoo" yo" sen: da" sho" yid thang: yham" zi akham: boem nghoid loug we' tarha" rigi cang boem .
45002028	Dang: thang: said' ba ein: rigi - hang" gi Yuda byumyu" agyeing" nghoid la" . sho" yid thang: yham" su: la" . ( Goobang: gi Yuda byumyu" anghoid ) byu dayug gi sho" yid thang: yham" ci: khyo" Yuda byumyu" ayo" bue" loo" .
45002029	Gyeing" da" Yuda koem' gi - nheigloem: khoug ; mo sho" yid thang: yham" ci: su: nghoid nyid . Hau yug ri Yuda byumyu" bue" loo nhang: da" zigi - lhid" to" da" tarha" khyo" anghoid - Hau yug gi byu yi wi coung" nghei byid: zi shau" su: anghoid . Mangso: wigi coung" nghei" too" su danghoid .
45003001	Houg su" nghoid yoomo Yuda byumyu" yigi nghi zain byumyu" yi tho' moo ci: noem je ngoid' boin:" Nyanu" da sho" yid thang: yham" yoomo ce: akyu" bo ?
45003002	Akyu" gi shoid' khang" moo" bo . Xang: shid" mo yuda byumyu" yigi Mangso: da" mungdang: ri loem" khou boem .
45003003	Ngoid' loug houg: bang: dayham" gi Mangso: dang: theing khoin" to" myhid' yoomo - Mangsoo: we' nya: dang: theing khoin" to" myhid' bye: ein: tid wa la" .
45003004	Gyeing" ga: rigi houg: su" ayo" tid . Byu yug khang" moo" mhoug nghoid loug we' - Mangsoo: gi deingmain" wa zi nghoid . Jhoem: mungdang: moo - nang tid to" dang: gi deing byeung" loo wa . Tarha" dang: phyed nyid" ri nang za: oung: loo" wa . - ga: lhid" to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" nghoid .
45003005	Nghoidloug we' byu dayham" gi - ngoonu" zei shoid' vhang: khyoo: gi - Mangso: da deungmain" khyoo: ri je myang loo nhang: zi nghoid la" . ngoonu" ri dam kaid' zigi atarha" ein: wigi ngoonu" tid wa la" . ( Hidsu" ngoo tid zi gi - byu yi lhoung tid zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" nghoid )
45003006	Mangsoo: ri atarha" ein: cekhyo" we' ayo" tid . Gyeing" nyang: Mangsoo: atarha" nghoid rigi he: mougmyid ri khakhyo" tarha" dang: phyed wa la" .
45003007	Gyeing" nyang: Mangso: deingmain" khyoo: ri ngoo adeung amain" nghoid loug we' nya: deingmain" khyoo: ri je bang myang nhang: khyo" wigi mang" so: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb ri je doug bang nhang: la" . Ciwim gari ngoo yooboo shoid' vhang: su dayug khyo" yooboo dam kaid' zi shau" kham ca" wa la" .
45003008	Ge zi bue" loo wa shid' re" age moo" ri ngoonu" zei: shang ein: ciwim atid' go" Hidsu" nyang: ngoo tid ga: byu dayham" gi - cang joeb' yooboo foin: lho: - ngoori roi" boem bye . Houg: bang: gi yooboo dam kham: moin: zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" - gyeing" gyeing" nyang: shau" kham: boem wa .
45003009	Hougsu" nghoid loug we' ngoonu" Yuda byumyu" yi gi - tungbau byumyu" yi da tho' moo ci jegi mo nghoid la" . Jege khyoo: ci aboo . Yuda byumyu" we' tungbau byumyu" we' yooboo yoem: so' khoug: moo danyid da" khyoo: ri nanu" ri ngoo toin" shid' bye .
45003010	Jhoem: mungdang: moo tid zigi - Mangso shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" su: dayug we' anyid .
45003011	Deingmain" tarha" ri si su: we' anyid . Mangsoo: ri noku su: we' anyid .
45003012	Byu dangain" mo gi Mangsoo: ri nung phug pyam' bye: - nyanu" dangain" mo , khyoo: vhang: byug boem bye . Ge da" moo" zei su anyid - dayug we' anyid .
45003013	Nyanu" da khyung" kang: gi - phang to" da loeb duang: nghoid nyid . Lhangmyu no , dug - nyanu" da" nhoid' khoug: moo bo jo ,
45003014	Nyanu" da nhoid' khoug: gi - gye" kho" ziyo' nheing" myeing" nheing" thui: yo" byeung" jo .
45003015	Nyanu" gi - shid: nhang: wa zi yo" byu kang: ri said' wa lo , myab ago" .
45003016	Nyanu" ju" lo" joyoo khang" moo" moo - lhu: shoin' lhu: phyo' zi yo" - kougshu: khyoo: za: koid' .
45003017	Nyanu" gi myenjham" ngei pyo: khyoo: ri ase' boem .
45003018	Nyanu" mo: Mangsoo: ri gyoug voem nheigloem: yo' phau" myang: khyoo: abo boem - ga: wigi lhid" to" .
45003019	Tarha" moo bo da" zi dangain" gi - tarha" khoug: moo nyid mo shid' re" za: danghoid da" khyoo: - byu yi da" kyiyang myeing da" nhoid' joem ri nghoeb' pyam' byid: wa zi yo" - xangsu: byu dangain" gi - Mangso: da" tarha" dang: phyed' da khyoo: ri kham nhang: wa shid' re" nghoid . da" zi ri akhid" ngoonu" se boem bye .
45003020	Tarha" ri cang lo" khyo" - hang" we' Mangso: da" shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" jang" moo ayo" ju . Tarha" gi - nyang: nyang: shoid' da" yooboo ri nyang: nyang: si wa shid' re" nghoid .
45003021	Hougsu" nghoid loug akhid" uri - Mangso: da" shid' khoin" moo - xangsu: byu yi khasu" koid' lho: yo" deingbyeing" wa da" khyoo: ri - toin" shid' too" bye . Hau: zigi tarha" cang khyoo: khyo" anghoid . He: da" khyoo: ri - Moshe da" tarha" yo" lapi: yi da mungdang: gi sagsi: kham byid: nyid .
45003022	Mangso: da" shid' khoin" moo byu xang: su yi gi Khristu Yesu ri loem jeung" khyo" za: deingbyeing" khyoo: yo" lo . Byu gi Mangso: shid' khoin" moo Khristu ri loem jeing" mo , dangain" gi dayhang: ti" nghoid .
45003023	Byu yug khang" moo" gi yooboo yoo" mo , za: nghoid wigi Mangsoo: khyoid' yu khyoo: mo ve: gang: lo" byug boem bye .
45003024	Xangsu: byu yi ri yooboo mo loid' byoin loo: nhang: da" Khristu Yesu khyo" Mangsoo: gi ce: phoug" asang: da" jeju" jhung: shug khyo" wigi xangsu: byu yi ri deing byeung" mo ga: lhoem: kham: yu bye .
45003025	Khristu shid: kham: khyoo: khyo" xangsu: byu yi gi yooboo mo yo" loid' loo" wa shid' re" Mangsoo: gi hau Aseing ri gung leig xoin" gyeing" khyo" nyang: soin' phyed pyam' bye . Xangsu: byu yi gi Khristu ri loem" jeung" khyoo: khyo" youg noo yooboo mo yo" loid lo" boem bye . Mangsoo: gi Khristu ri gungleig xoin" gyeing" ga: soin: pyam' da" khyoo: gi nya: shid' khoin" moo xangsu: byu yi deingmain" daingbyeing" mo agyeing" khyo" khasu" koid' lhoem kham: yu da" khyoo: ri toin" shid' wa shid' re" nghoid . He pyaid he yo , ju" sho' Mangsoo: gi nheigloem: sheing: sheing: zeing: kham nyid lho: byu yi shoid' da" yooboo ri we' khyoid' pyam' byid .
45003026	Nghoidloug we' akhid" da" pyaid ayo moo Mangsoo: gi nya: deingmain" khyoo: ri toin" shid' wa shid' re" xangsu: byu yi da yooboo ri xoem" too" bye . Mangsoo: gi nyang: nya: gung nyang: deingmain" su: nghoid da" khyoo: ri we' Aseing Yesu ri loem" jeung" loo mo dangain" ri deingbyeing" mo , nghoid ein: kham: yu wa da" khyoo: ri we' toin" shid .
45003027	Houg: yoomo ngoonu" gi ci: phau: khuang cang bo la" . Ngoonu" phau: khuang jang: ci ajo , tarha" ri ngoonu" cang yhi: yoomo anghoid . loem" jeung" khyo" za: danghoid .
45003028	Loem jeung" khyoo: khyo" za Mangso da shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" khyoo: dayo" yu yoomo toung: to: da: tarha" mo ayo" yu da" khyoo: ngoonu" akhid" se boem bye .
45003029	Mangsoo: gi Yuda byumyu" yi da" Mangsoo: za danghoid la" . Tungbau byumyu" yi da" Mangsoo: gi abo nghoid la" . Tungbau byumyu" Mangsoo: gyeing" gyeing" nghoid .
45003030	Mangsoo: gi dayug kyeing" nyid . Nyang: ri loem" jeung" khyoo: ayang: qei yoomo Yuda byumyu" yi ri deing byeung" mo ga: lhoem: kham yu . Hougsu" loem" jeung" da" tungbau byumyu" yi ri we' deingbyeing" mo ga: lhoem kham yu .
45003031	Hougsu" nghoid ri ngoo nu" gi loem" jeung" khyoo: khyo" tarha" ri she: lhei" pyam boem wa la" . Ashe: lhei" tarha" ri je geing: teing nhang: wa khyoo: nghoid .
45004001	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" Abraham: da" khyoo: ri myid yu" boem shang - nyang: thoung" shau" lo khyoo: gi hid vhoo: moo lhid" to" .
45004002	Nyang: gi nyang: koid' - ge da" leig yu jang: yoomo Mangsoo: da shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" khyoo: dayo" yu nghoid rigi - nyang: moo myo nhoo: sho: lho: phau: khuang cang bo . Nghoidloug we' nyang: gi Mangsoo: sheud' khyoo: gi hougsu" myonhoo: sho: phau: khuang khyoo: akoid' .
45004003	Jhoem: mungdang: moo Abraham: gi Mangsoo: ri loem" jeing" yoomo Mangsoo: gi nyang: ri deingbyeing" su: ga: soin: byid bye: ga: tid to .
45004004	Byu dayug yug gi moo" daja: ri zei: lho: - vhukung: phoug" ngei ri yo" yu lang" hau: da" ngei gi subi" jeju" koid' da" ngei anghoid loo za: nyang: kham: zoo eung: yoomo yo" yu ngei nghoid .
45004005	Nghoidloug we' xangsu: byu yi gi nyang: nyang cang da" ge khyoo: ri aloem loo za: Mangsoo: ri za: loem" jeung" nghoid rigi Mangsoo gi nya: da" loem" jeung" khyoo: ri yu" lho: wigi nyang: ri yooboo ayo" ga: dang: phyed' soin: teing to' wa he: khyo" wigi Mangsoo: gi xangsu" byu ri lhoem: kham: yu nyid .
45004006	Geda" akyang" nheigloem: mo anghoid ga: wi Mangsoo: gi deingbyeing" mo agyeing" khyo" soin: byid: khyoo: ri yo" kham: yu su gi ngi lhoo bye: ga tid kyo" jang" moo David Khokham" gi
45004007	Tarha" shoid' da" jang" mo Mangsoo: lhoid' pyoin' zi yo' nya: yooboo mo yo" loid , byoin loo" sugi ngi lho' .
45004008	Nya: yooboo ri Aseing wigi alhid" xoem" too" sugi ngi lho' ga wigi tid to" .
45004009	David khokham" toin" shid' to" da" ngi lho' khyoo: gi sho" yid thang: yham" mo , za: yo" la" . Anghoid . sho" yid thang: ayham" mo we' yo" yu boem . ngoonu" tid kyo" da jhoem: dang: yo" dakhyoo" ti" Abraham: gi Mangsoo: ri loem" jeing" yoomo Mangsoo: gi nyang: ri deingbyeing" su: ga: soin: byid: bye .
45004010	Hid: yhang: ti" Mangsoo: gi Abraham: ri deingbyeing" su: nghoid ga: soin: byid uri - Abraham: gi sho" yid thang: yham" bye la" . Ayham" shi" la" . bain kham: thang: ri anghoid akham: shi" u" ri nghoid bye .
45004011	Nyang: ri Mangsoo: houg: su" soin: byid: thang: ri Abraham: gi sho" yid thang: yham" da: khyoo: ri kham bye . Hau: sho" yid thang: yham" da moo" gi Mangsoo: Abraham: da' loem" jeung" khyoo: ri yu" lho: sho" yid thang: ayham" shi" mo deingbyeing" da byu ga: soin: byid: shau" da" thang" cab' nghoid . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo Abraham: gi athang: yham" da" moo" akham: yu nghoid loug we' Mangsoo: ri loem" jeung" shoid' khyo" deingbyeing" su: nyang: nghoid bye . Deingbyeing" mo ga: Mangsoo: soin: byid: shau" byu dangain" mo da" venyi phoo jhung: bui" loo bye .
45004012	Nyang: gi shooyid' thang: yham" mo da" nya: phoo we' nghoid . Dakhyo" ein: rigi nyang: gi shooyid thang: yham" zi kham: yu su: za: anghoid ngoonu" phoo Abraham: sho" yid thang: ayham" shi" mo Mangsoo: ri loem" jeung" lho: - kangso' dei so" yen" su: nghoid .
45004013	Mangsoo: gi Abraham: yo' nya: zoo: yi ri mougmyid ri shau" seing: wa ga: dang: soo" byid: to" - hau: dangsoo" gi Abraham: Moshe tarha" ri cang nyid yoomo anghoid . Ciwim gari Mangsoo: ri loem" jeung" yoomo nyang: ri deingbyeing" su: nghoid ga: Mangsoo: soin: yu yoomo nghoid .
45004014	Gyeing" nyang: Moshe tarha" ri yo" cang mo za: - dang: soo" khoin" ri shau" kham: zoo: wa ein: rigi - Mangsoo: ri loem" jeung" khyoo: gi akoem: za: te: nghoid lho: Mangso: dang: soo" khoin" gi akoem: we' ce akyu" aboo loo .
45004015	Moshe da tarha" gi Mangso: da" nheig yoo: yoo" bue" nhang: nghoid loug we' tarha" ajo rigi tarha" shoid' ga: zi we' ajo .
45004016	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo Abraham: da nyamyid nyazoo: yi dangain" mo gi - Mangso: da" dang: soo" khoin" aphoug" asang: loo: kham: zo: da" akhang" jo da" khyoo: sagsi yo" kham: - loem" jeung" da" tho' moo ayang: qei" lho: dang: soo" khoin" too" byid bye . Hau: dang: soo" khoin" gi Moshe da" tarha" ri cang mo shid' re" za nghoid . Abraham: yhang: ti" Mangsoo: ri loem" jeung" mo shid' re" we' nghoid . Khasu" wim ga: ri Abraham: gi ngoonu" dangain" mo da" venyi: phoojhung: nghoid .
45004017	Ngoo gi nang ri byumyu" myoo" sho' mo da" nya: phoo bui" nhang: bye: ga: jhoem: mungdang: moo tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" nghoid . Hougsu" Mangsoo: dang: soo" khoin" too" yoomo - Hauda dang: soo" khoin" gi deing nyid . Mangsoo: gi Abraham loem" jeung" da" Mangsoo: shid' mo doem dei loo nhang: da" Mangsoo yo' xang: shid" ri ci: ajo , jang" moo jo , loo nhang: wa shid' re" amyeing" byid da" Mangsoo: nghoid .
45004018	Abraham gi nheig tei" jang: ci: ajo , lo jang" molang" loem" jeung" nheig byu nyid yoomo nyang: gi byumyu" myoo" sho' mo da" phoo jhung: bue" lo . Jhoem: mungdang: moo nya: da" byumyu" akung: ako'' yi gi moug khung kyi: myhoo' myoo: wa ga: zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" bue" loo bye .
45004019	Hau: ayo moo Abraham: gi apyaid' dashoo: zain koo: bo lho: nya: da" gung du: gi shid: loo: yid danghoid lo sara: we' zoo: age boo lo: khyoo: ri si' nghoid loug nya: da" loem" jeung" khyoo: gi geing: geing: teing teing dabo jo .
45004020	Nyang: gi khanham we' Mangso: da" dang: soo" khoin" ri loem shoid' jeung" shoid' aloem" jeung" da" myid aboo . Mangsoo: ri loem" jeung" khyoo: khanham we' ashe: pyam . Mangsoo: ri loem" jeung" nyid yoomo yoem so' byeung" lo . Houg: yoomo nyang: gi Mangsoo: ri coung" nghei" byid: nyid .
45004021	Mangsoo: gi nyang: tid to" da" dang: soo" khoin" ri yo" bue" loo nhang: wa" ga nyang bain" bain loem" ci .
45004022	Hougsu" leom jeung" ci: yoomo Mangsoo: gi Abraham: ri deingbyeing" su: amain" khyo" kham: yu bye .
45004023	Mangsoo: gi nyang: ri deingbyeing" su: amain" khyo" kham: yu bye: ga: da" dang: gi Abraham: dayug kyeing" ri za: yeing lho: lhid" to" zi nghoid .
45004024	ngoonu" ri we' yeing lho: lhid" to" zi nghoid . Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoonu" da Aseing" Yesu Khristu ri shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: da" Mangsoo: ri ngoonu" nyang: ri loem" jeung" yoomo ngoonu" ri we' deingbyeing" mo , amain" khyo" Mangsoo: gi lhid" xoem" too" bye .
45004025	Mangsoo: gi nyang ri ngoonu" da yoobo shid' re" shid: kham: nhang: bye . Hau: thang: ngoonu" ri deing byeung" mo amain" khyo" nyang: yo kham: yu baja" ga: nyang: ri shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: bye .
45005001	Ngoonu" gi loem" jeung" khyoo: khyo" wigi Mangsoo: da" shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" mo yo" bue" loo bye: yoomo ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu khyo" Mangso: da shid' khoin" moo ngei pyoo: myenjham" khyoo: ri ngoonu" yo" kham zo: boem bye .
45005002	ngoonu" gi Aseing Yesu ri loem" jeung" bye: yoomo Yesu gi ngoonu" ri Mangsoo: jeju" bid shoem: khoug: khyoo: shu" vang loo" bye . Hau: jeju" ri akhid" ngoonu" kham zo: nyid boem bye . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi Mangso: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb ri yo" thoin" pang wam: bye: ein: nheig byu zi yo" phau: khuang myid boem bye .
45005003	Sho" jhen: koug shu: nyid loug we' ngoonu" gau yi ngei pyo: nyid . Sho" jhen: koug shu: da" khyoo: ri yo" zeing: oung: pyam' wa khyoo:
45005004	Zeing: oung: lo" da" khyoo: gi Mangsoo: yo" tain" tab nhang: - hau: tain" lo" khyoo: gi nheig shid" nheig byu khyoo: ri bui" nhang: zi ngoonu" se' boem bye .
45005005	Hidsu" nheig deig nheig byu khyoo: gi - ngoonu" ri neig loem: byo yoin" nhang: wa zi anghoid - Khasu" wim ga ri Mangsoo: gi ngoonu" ri nyang: byid: da jeju" gyeungshang: venyi: dang khyo" nyang khayhi' jheddab khyoo: ri toin" shid' too" yoomo nghoid .
45005006	ngoonu" gi nheig nhei: yoo ayoo" wim nyid da u" ri Khristu gi Mangsoo: khyen: to" ayo , akhyeing: moo akhyeing" ashoeb' mo da" shid' re" shid: kham bye .
45005007	Deingmain" su dayug shid' re" voem" shid: kham byu nyid wa gye au: . Nghoidloug byu gi dayug shid' re" voem" shid: kham: wa su: gi gyeing" gyeing" nyid ri nyid wa .
45005008	Nghoidloug we' ngoonu" gi yooboo shoid' mo danghoid nyid shi" uri Khristu gi ngoonu" shid' re" shid: kham too" bye . Houg khyo" Mangsoo: gi ngoonu" ri khayhi' jheddab da" khyoo: toin" shid' too" bye .
45005009	ngoonu" gi Khristu shid: kham da" khyoo: khyo" Mangso: da" shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" mo khyo" yo" vang loo" wa nghoid bye: yoomo Mangsoo: nheig yo: nyid jang" mo nyang khyo" yo" loid byoin loo" wa zi deing" deing nghoid nyid bye .
45005010	ngoonu" gi Mangso: gyivoo nghoid nyid loug we' nya: zoo: ri shid: kham: nhang: khyo" ngoonu" ri bidnoem bui" nhang: bye . Akhid" ngoonu" gi Mangso: da" bidnoem bui" loo bye: yoomo dei nyid da" Khristu khyo" wigi khyoid' yu khyoo: shau" yu wa zi deing bye .
45005011	Hid: kyeing" za anghoid - Mangsoo: gi ngoonu" Aseing Yesu Khristu khyo" wigi Mangso: da" bidnoem bue" nhang: bye yoomo gau yi cang bo boem bye .
45005012	Yooboo gi byu dayug khyo" he: mougmyid moo ju" vang loo bye . Hau yug shoid' da" yooboo mo shid: da" khyoo: bue" loo bye . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo byumyu" bain sho' mo , gi yooboo shoid' yoomo shid: loo" ca" boem bye .
45005013	Moshe da" tarha" ajo , shi" mo xang: su: byu yi yooboo shoid' bye: - nghoid loug we' hau uri tarha" ajo , shi" yoomo Mangsoo: gi xangsu: byu yi da" yooboo ri axoem" too" .
45005014	Nghoidloug we' shid: lo" da tarha" gi Adam da" bidnyid mo wigi Moshe da" bidnyid ju" sho' byu dangain" ri vhoeb' khang" ci: bye . Hau: da byu dangain" mo gi Adam: yhang: ti" Mangso: da" tarha" ri rhoi lho: yooboo akoid' nghoid loug we' nyanu" ri nyang: shid: da" tarha" gi vhoeb' khang" zeing: ci bye . Hau: Adam: gi thang: phyang" ju" ri" wa Aseing: da" vhoid ri voin su: nghoid .
45005015	Nghoidloug we' hau: eig yug gi adu goo" . Mangsoo: gi akyu" jeju" koid' da" khyoo: yi we' Adam: yooboo koid' zi gootu: tu: nghoid yoomo nya: eig yug gi adu goo" da . Byu dayug shoid' vhang: yooboo mo - byu bain sho' mo shid: wa khyoo: bue" lo ga khyoo: gi deing nyid . Nghoidloug we' Mangsoo: da" lhoid byoin jeju" gi gootu: byu dayug nghoid su: Aseing Yesu Khristu da jeju" khyo" byu myoo" sho' mo , mainkaid jeju" gi - gootu: tho' mo je ge zi nghoid .
45005016	Mangsoo: byid: da" jhung: shug da" akyu" xo' lo zi yo" byu dayug zei: shoid' da" yoobo akyu" gi adu goo" - Hau: thang: ri byu dayug yooboo koid' da" uri - yooboo yoo" bye: ga: dang: phyed' byid: bye . Nghoidloug we' - Adam: thang: ri kangso' xo' dei lo da" byumyu" myoosho' mo yooboo zei: shoid' da" uri gi - amoin: ayi" loo: nghoid loug we' - yooboo ayoo" ga: wigi dang: phyed' byid .
45005017	Byu dayug shoid' da" yooboo gi - shid: lo" da khyoo: ri bue" loo nhang: nghoid rigi gootu byu dayug nghoid da" Khristu Yesu koid' da" moozoo" gi khayhi' je gyi: myo: tham: wa lha" . Mangsoo: da" joeb byeung" da" jeju" zeing ri we' Mangso: da" shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" mo yo" bue" lo da" jeju" ri we' shau" kham: yu da byu dangain" mo gi Khristu khyo" oung: doid lo" da" kangso' yo" dei boem wam bye .
45005018	Houg: nghoid yoomo byu dayug gi - yooboo shoid' yoomo xangsu: byu bain sho' mo yooboo dam shau" zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" byu gootu: dayug gi deingbyeing" yoomo xangsu: byu dangain" mo yoobo dam kaid' wa ga: dang: phyed' jang: mo yo" loid lo" lho: nyanu" ri kang byid: bye .
45005019	Byu dayug gi Mangso: da" dang: ri atam" gyo: da" akhyoo" gi byu dangain" mo yooboo yoo" mo bue" lo zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" byu dayug Mangso: da" dang: ri tam" gyo akyu" yoomo byu dangain" mo Mangso: da" shid' khoin" moo - deingbyeing" mo yo" bue" loo wa .
45005020	Shoid' vhang: moozoo" je myo: loo wa shid' re" Moshe tarha" gi ju" vang loo bye . Nghoidloug we' yooboo myo: lo joyoo mo Mangso: jeju" gi je myo: loo bye .
45005021	Yooboo gi byu ri yo" shid nhang: da" dangkang: nghoid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" ngoonu" Aseing Yesu Khristu khyo" wigi Mangso: da" jeju" akhyoo" again gi ngoonu" ri apyaid' ato: kangso' khyoo: shu" yhe: lo" lho: deingbyeing" mo yo" bue" loo nhang: da" dangkang: nghoid .
45006001	Hougsu" nghoid rigi khasu" ein: tid boem wa lha" . Mangso: da" jeju" ri je myo: loo wa shid re" yooboo khoug: moo daxo' loung" jo shi" wa la" .
45006002	Hougsu" anghoid o" - yooboo yoomo ngoonu" bain shid: bye: mo ngoonu" gi khasu" wigi yooboo khoug: moo daloung" jo , shi" wa la" .
45006003	ngoonu" gi Aseing Yesu yo" dadeing: daloem: za bui" wa shid' re" Babtisma ri kham: yu da" uri - Khristu yo" dage" shid: kham bye: da" khyoo: ri nanu" gyeing" nyang: se boem bye .
45006004	Houg: yoomo nyangnu" gi Babtisma kham khyo" wigi Khristu yo" dage" shid: kham: lho: - nyang: yo" dage" myhoeb pyam' zi shau" boem bye . Aseing yo" dage" shid: kham: da" khyoo: gi pho da phung" yoeb yoem: so' yo" Khristu ri shid: da" jang" mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: zi yo" dakhyoo" - ngoonu" gi kangso' Aseing moo doem yo" dei nyid wa shid' re" nghoid .
45006005	Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoonu" gi nyang: yo" dakhyoo" ti" nyang: yo' dage" shid: lo" boem nghoid loug we' nyang: yo" dakhyoo" ti" shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo wa zi nghoid .
45006006	Hau: tho' moo gootu: ngoonu" da" byu xoug" nheigloem: ri Khristu yo" dage" pyang" zeing moo baid jen" said' pyam' nhang: bye: da" khyoo: - hidsu" baid jen" said' pyam' nhang: da" khyoo: gi yooboo da" yoem: so' da" byuxoug" nheigloem: ri phyo' koid pyam' khyo" wigi yooboo join pyaid mo lhoid' byoin loo" nhang: wa zi nghoid da" khyoo: ngoonu" se boem .
45006007	Khristu yo" dage" shid: kham su: gi yooboo yoemso' khoug: moo anyid loo .
45006008	ngoonu" gi Khristu yo" dage" shid: rigi nyang: yo" dage" kangso' dei nyid wim bye: zi ri loem" jeung"
45006009	Khristu gi shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo" bye: yoomo thang: phyang" khanham we' ashid: loo wa zi ngoonu" se' . Shid: lo" da" khyoo: gi nyang: ri ayo" vhoeb khang" ci loo .
45006010	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nyang: shid: kham khyoo: gi youg: noo yooboo shid' re" dalheing: za shid: kham zi nghoid . Nyang: gi Mangsoo: shid' khoin" moo kangso' dei zoem" khau: nyid bye .
45006011	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" nanu" we' yougnoo yooboo moo shid: lo" nghoid loug we' Khristu Yesu yo" dadeing: daloem: khyo" Mangsoo: shid' khoin" moo kangso' dei zoem" khoug: nyid bye .
45006012	Houg: yoomo nanu" gi nanu" nya: da" gung sho" nheigloem: ri acang loo" wa shid' re" yooboo yougnoo gi shid" loo" se' da" nanu" gungdu: ri thang: phang" khanham we' vhoeb khang" loo: wa anghoid .
45006013	Nanu" da gungdu akung: ako'' joem ri we' Khanham we' yooboo akoid' nhang: loogoo . Houg: yooboo koid wa tho' rigi nanu" gi shid: jang" mo doem dei loo mo agyeing" khyo" we' deingbyeing" moozoo" dagung goin" ci: yhung: nyid khyo" we' nyang: tu: nyang: gung ri Mangso: jang" moo xoin" to' pyam' ge' .
45006014	Yooboo gi nanu" da Aseing anghoid loo - khasu" wigi nanu" gi Moshe tarha" vhoo moo anyid loo: Mangso: jeju" khoug: moo nyid mo danghoid lo .
45006015	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi Moshe da tarha" vhoo moo anyid loo yoomo ngoonu" gi ciwim yooboo koid' shi" wa go" la" . Hougsu" koid' wa shid' re" dangkang: ajo , loo .
45006016	Byu dayoug nhang: zo zi shau" nyid sugi nhang: zoo: su: da" join nghoid zi nanu" goo" lhoo: si bye . Gyeing" nyang: nanu" ri yooboo wi nhang zo zi dashau" nyid shi" rigi - Nanu" gi yooboo join nghoid nyid shi" - Nanu" koid' da" yoobo aphoug" gi shid: lo" da" khyoo: nghoid . Gyeing" nyang: nanu" gi Mangso: da" dang: ri tam" gyo: da" aphoug" gi Mangsoo: da" shid moo deingbyeing" mo bue" loo wa .
45006017	Nanu" gi dalheing: ri - Yoobo join koid' yu" nghoid loug we' akhid" gi jhau" mho' khyoo: ri tam" gyo: loem" jeung" da" deing byeung" khyoo: ri nheigloem: ung: khoug: dangain" yo" nanu" kham: yu bye: yoomo ngoo gi Mangso: da jeju" ri coung" nghei" nyid .
45006018	Nanu" gi yoobo da join pyaid mo loid byoin lo lho: - deing byeung" da join bue" lo boem bye .
45006019	( Nanu" gi gungsho" nheigloem: khyo" ase' gyoo: yoomo lei da" dang: khyo" tid nyid ) . Goonham' gi age akhyeing da khyoo: aja: ja: ri zei: wa shid' re" - nanu" nya: da" gungdoem: ri - anyhoin: athoung" aco' ajhoid' khoug: moo join khyo" bain sho' ab pyam' boem bye . Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - akhid" nanu" gi - gyeungshang: ge thang da" moo" ri zei: wa shid' re" nyang: tu: nya: da" gung doem ri - deingbyeing" da" khoug: moo join gyeing" khyo" nanu" gung ri ab pyam' ge' .
45006020	Nanu" gi Yoobo da" join koid' nyid da uri - deingbyeing" da" khoug: mo loid byoin lo" boem .
45006021	Hau: da" uri nanu" zei: nyid da" moozoo" gi - nanu" nyang: ri akhid" ju" sho' asho" ashid: bui" nhang: zi nghoid . Hau: da akyu" gi - shid: lo" khyoo: nghoid .
45006022	Nghoidloug we' akhid" nanu" gi yoobo da" lo , khoug: mo , loid byoin thu' lo lho: - Mangso: da: join yi bue" lo loem bye . Nanu" yo" yu da" akyu" gi Aseing: da" shid' re" nyang: nya: kangso' dei khyoo: bain" sho' xoin" to' pyam' bye yoomo lo" thang moo gi apyaid' ato: kangso' akyu" yo" yu wa khyoo: nghoid bye .
45006023	Yooboo da aphoug" gi shid: lo" khyoo: nghoid . Nghoidloug we' Mangsoo: da" phoug" asang: jeju" jhungshug koem' gi - ngoonu" da Aseing Yesu Khristu yo" dadeing: daloem khoug mo yo" da" apyaid' ato: kangso' nghoid .
45007001	Nga" mang: nhung" yi we" nanu" gi tarha" ri soo" soo" si' mo nghoid yoomo - ngoo ci: tid wa zi ri nanu" gyeing" nyang: se' gyoo: wa byu gi kangso' dei nyid daloo gyoo: ri tarha" gi byu yi da" atho' moo jo .
45007002	Dang: tu' tid shang ein: rigi Deingkhu: vang da myiyi dayug gi nya: yhoem: seing: phoo dadei nyid nyid gi hau: yug yo" loxo' to" tarha" khyo" nyid ca . nghoid loug we' yhoem: seing: phoo shid: thang: ri koem' gi loxo' to" da tarha" mo nyang: loid loo" bye .
45007003	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nyang: gi - yhoem: seing: phoo kangso' dei nyid shi" ri - gootu: yug gi dayug yo" zoem" nyid nghoid rigi yuggi lhoid' da" myiyi: ga tid wa zi nghoid . nghoid loug we' yhoem ; seing: phoo shid: loo" bye su: nghoid rigi gootu: yuggi yo" lo , doem xo' rigi yuggi lhoid' da" myiyi: ga: wa zi anghoid loo .
45007004	Nga: mang: nhung" yi we" - he: da" khyoo: gi nanu" yo" we' sen: nyid . Nanu" gi Khristu da" gung doem nghoid wigi Moshe tarha" khoug: moo nyid da" pyaid she: lhei" pyam' phyed' boem bye . Mangsoo: moozoo" moo - akyu" bo da" dei zoo: yi bui" loo wa shid' re" nanu" gi shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' lo da" nya: byu yi nghoid boem bye .
45007005	Ngoonu" gi gungsho" nheigloem: ri cang lho: - Kangso' dei nyid boem uri Moshe da" tarha" yo" shu" u" she: zi Yo" dakhyoo" - yooboo koid' nau da" nheigloem: gi ngoonu" da" gungdu: ri - shid: wa jang" moo thang loo" nhang:
45007006	Moshe da" tarha" gi ngoonu" ri tei" to" yu" bye . Nghoidloug we' akhid" ngoonu" gi hau: da" tarha" khoug: mo loid lo" boem bye . Akhid" uri ngoonu" gi lhid" to" da tarha" khyooxoug" khyo" anghoid looza: venyi: khyoo khyo" Mangso: moo" voin vu , nyid boem bye .
45007007	Hougsu" nghoid rigi ngoonu" khasu" ein: tid boem wa lha" . Moshe da" tarha" gi yoobo da" tarha" ein: wa la" . Hougsu" age tid . Nghoidloug we' yooboo ga: zi ri Moshe tarha" wigi ngoori si nhang: . Gyeing" nyang: Moshe da" tarha" gi myo no , vhoo: age boo ga: atid' to" nghoid rigi myo no , vhoo: bo ga: zi ci: nghoid zi ngoo si wa zi anghoid .
45007008	Youg: noo yooboo gi ngoonu" ri - hau: Moshe da" tarha" ri myid boin: yoomo ngoonu" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo myo no vhoo: bo da" shoid' vhang: khyoo: - aja: ja: ri bue" loo nhang: Moshe tarha" ga: zi ajo nghoid rigi yooboo gi jo zi anghoid .
45007009	Ngoo gi Moshe da" tarha" ri dajhi' we' asi' loo: nyid lid: lo yu" bye . Nghoidloug we' toung: to" da tarha" ri se' lo da" zi yo" dage" yooboo jo lo lho:
45007010	Ngoo shid: loo" bye . Ngoo ri doem dei loo nhang: wa shid' re" byid to" da" Moshe da" tarha" nyang: - nga" da" kangso' ri shid: nhang: nyid .
45007011	Yooboo gi - ngoori lhid" to" da" tarha" ri myid boin: nhang: wi ngoori lheing jhoem' - ngoori shid: nhang .
45007012	Houg: yoomo Moshe da" tarha" gi gyeungshang: lho: hau: dangkang: gi gye ge gyeungshang: deingbyeing .
45007013	Hougsu" nghoid ri gye ge da" zi gi ngoonu" ri ciwim shid: nhang: la" . Ashid: nhang: nghoid da: - ngoori shid: loo" nhang: zi gi yooboo nghoid da . Yooboo gi shid: lo" khyoo: ri kang kaid' lho: - agung yab shug loo nhang: wa shid' re" ge da" tarha" ri ci: lho: ngoori shid: nhang: da" khyoo: za nghoid . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo yoobo gi khayhi' gyoug ge da" khyoo: ri Moshe tarha" wigi toin" shid' nyid .
45007014	Moshe da" tarha" gi venyi khyoo: yo" ngoonu" se' nghoid lhoug we' ngoo gi yoobo join doid da" byu nghoid .
45007015	Ngoo nyang: koid' da" moo" ri ngoo ase' gyoo . Khasu" wim lha" ga: ri - ngoo nyang: koid' nau zi ri gi akoid' loo za: ngoo ngheing" da" moo" ngoo koid' nyid yoomo nghoid .
45007016	Ngoo gi - ngoonyang: anau koid' da" moo" ri zi nyid da" uri Moshe da" tarha" deingmain" nyid khyoo: ri ngoo yhen: yu .
45007017	Houg: yoomo ngoo koid' da" moo" ri bo koid' su gi - gyeing" nyang: ga ri - ngoo anghoid . Nga" da" nheigloem: jeung" moo dei nyid da" yooboo wigi koid' nyid zi nghoid .
45007018	Xangsu: byu nghoid da" ngoo moo ge da" moo" ri yo" zei: wa da" yoem: so' abo zi ngoo se' . Khasu" wim ga ri ngoo moo ge da" moo" ri zei wa da" amyeing" boo nghoid loug we' yo" zei: wa yoem: so' aboo .
45007019	Ngoo gi ge da" moo" ri - zei: noug nghoid loug we' azei: loo: za: - anau koid' da" akhyeing" ashoeb' moo" ri za: te: zei: nyid .
45007020	Ngoo anau koid' da" moo" ri zei: nyid su: gi - ngoo anghoid . Nga" dangkang: gi nheigloem: jeung" moo dei nyid da" yooboo nghoid .
45007021	Hougsu" yoomo ngoo gi ge da" khyoo: koid' nau da" uri - akhyeing" da" khyoo: ri za: khyen: yu nhang: da" tarha" ri za myang .
45007022	Mangso: da" tarha" ri nga" nheigloem: gi gau yi ngei pyoo: za lhoem: yu bye .
45007023	Nghoidloug we' nga" gungdu: khoug: moo hau vhoo ngei khyoo: yo" shai" lho: khaid zain: lu: khang nyid da nheigloem: gootu boo shi . Hauda" nheigloem: gi ngoo moo khaid zain: lu khang nyid lho: - ngoori yoobo tarha" khoug ; khyoo: doem doin: jhoin" kaid .
45007024	Ngoo gi nheigloem: gye" apyoo: su: nghoid nyid ngoori shid: loo" nhang: da" he: gungdu: mo hang" se' khyoid' yu loo wa lha" .
45007025	ngoonu" da Aseing Yesu' Khristu khyo" khyoid' yu da" Mangsoo: jeju" zeing gi gyi: sheung: jo nhung: Jhung: shoem: khyo" wigi - ngoo moo bue" da" khyoo: ri tid phoid' kyo" nghoid ri ngoo gi nheigloem: khyo" Mangso: deizoo: koid' nyid nghoid loug xangsu: gung sho" nheigloem: xoug" gi yoobo da" deizoo: dakoid' nhang: nyid .
45008001	Hougsu" yoomo Khristu Yesu dadeing: za: nyid mo gi tarha" dang: phyed' khyoo: aboo loo .
45008002	Khasu" wim gari - Khristu Yesu yo' dadeing: daloem: za nyid nhang: da" venyi: yo" tarha" gi shid: lo" khyoo: yo" yoobo da tarha" mo ngoori lhoid pyoin' kaid' bye .
45008003	Byu xangsu: gung sho" nheigloem: yoem: neing: khyoo: yoomo - Moshe da tarha" wi ayo" voin vu da" moo" ri Mangsoo: gi voin vu pang" byid: bye . Mangsoo: gi byu xangsu: gungshoo" zei: shoid' moozoo" khyoo: tid yooboo dang: phyed' wa shid' re" nya: zooti" ri nhang: kaid' bye . Hau: nya: zooti" zoo: gi yoobo tarha" ri phyo' shoin' pyam' wa shid' re" xangsu: byugung re" void yu bye .
45008004	Hid: su" Mangsoo: yoovoin yu lho: bo voin vu da" deingmain khyoo: gi ngoonu" gi xangsu: gungshoo" nheigloem: khyo" anghoid loo: za: venyi da" myid vho: khyoo: khyo" - kangso' dei da" ngoonu" gi Moshe da" tarha" ri yo" cang pyeing wa shid' re" nheig shid: jang: nghoid .
45008005	Gungsho" nheigloem: wigi koid' nhang: da" moozoo" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - kangso' dei nyid mo gi - gungshoo" nheigloem: vho: khyo" za: nheigloem: zhug se' boem ago" . Nghoidloug we' venyi khyoo: shid' khyo" cang koid' loo" mo gi venyi vho: ngei da khyoo: cang nyid mo , gi - nya gung ri nyang: yo" vhoeb khang" mo , nghoid .
45008006	Xangsu: gungshoo" nheigloem: khyo" vhoeb khang" su: gi - kangso' soem" wa nghoid . Venyi vho: da" khyo" vhoeb' khang" too" su: gi - kangso' yo" lho: myenjham" ngei pyoo: wa .
45008007	Xangsu: gungshoo" nheigloem: za: dabo nyid su: gi - Mangso: gyi nghoid . Houg: te" nheigloem: za dabo nyid su: gi Mangso: mungdang: ri acang su: nghoid . Gyeing" nyang: ayo" cang su: nghoid .
45008008	Nyang: nya: gungsho" nheigloem: khyo" za: cang loo" mo gi Mangso: nheigloem: yo" azhoung" goo" .
45008009	Hougsu" nghoid loug we' Mangso: da" venyi gi nanu" da" ung: khoug: moo bo nghoid rigi nanu" gi gungshoo: nheigloem: lhu: nhau khyo" acang loo: venyi wi lhu: poin" lhu: nhau jhoug" byid: da" khyoo: moo cang loo" goo" wa . Khristu da" venyi aboo mo , hang" we' Khristu yo" dajhi' we' asen .
45008010	Nghoidloug we' nanu" moo Khristu re" loung" jo nghoid ri gi - yooboo koid' yoomo nanu" da" gungdu: shid: wa khyoo: yhe: loo" loug we' khasu" wim ga ri young" gyeing" da" venyi gi nanu" ri kangso' dei nyid nhang: wa nghoid . Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" gi Mangso: da" shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" mo bue" wa amyeing" yoo" yoomo nghoid .
45008011	Aseing Yesu shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: da Mangso: venyi gi nanu" da akhoug: moo bo nyid rigi Yesu Khristu ri shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: da" Aseing gi nya: da" venyi khyo" wigi nanu" da" xangshid" gungdoem: joem ri we' doem dei to'' loo nhang: wa zi nghoid .
45008012	Houg: yoomo mang: nhung" yi we" - Mangso: da" venyi wigi jhau" mho' byid: zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" Myid soin: zei so' nyid boem ca" . Gungshoo" vho: khyo" akoid' nyid goo" .
45008013	Gyeing" nyang: nanu" gi nyang: nya: gungshoo" vho: da" khyo" za cang lho: kangso' dei nyid rigi shid: lo" boem wa . Nghoidloug: we' nanu" gi nyang: nya: da" akhyeing" ashoeb' da" asam" aveid ri Venyi wigi bo pang" thoug khyo" bain' sho' she: pyam' boem nghoid rigi dei da" kangso' yo" boem wa .
45008014	Mangso: da venyi khyoo: shid' u" she: da zi ri kham: yu da" byu yi gi Mangso: da" nya: zoo: yi nghoid bye .
45008015	Mangso: jang" mo nanu" yo" kham yu da" young" gyeing" da" venyi nanu" ri join , doid loo" nhang: zi anghoid . Gyoug da" nheigloem: ri kaid' bye: zi we' anghoid . Young" gyeing" venyi gi ngoonu" ri Mangso: da nya: zoo: yi yo" bui" nhang: yoomo ngoonu" gi Mangsoo: ri - Phoo we" - nga" phoo we" ein: yo" yoid da" akhang" yo" yu boem bye .
45008016	Ngoonu" gi Mangso: da nya: zoo: yi yo" bui" lo da" khyoo: ri young" gyeing" venyi nya: gung nyang: lang" ngoonu" da" venyi yo" dage" sagsi kham: nyid .
45008017	Ngoonu" gi Mangso: da" nya: zoo yi nghoid yoomo nya: da" byumyu" shid' re" nyheing to" da" mainkaid jeju joem ri ngoonu" shau" kham: zo: boem wa . Khristu da shid' re" Mangsoo: nyheing to" zi ri we' bo shau" kham: zo: boem wa . Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoonu" gi Khristu yo" dage" yaukhe" kyi" khyeug noo bo kham: nghoid ri - nyang: yo" dage" nya: myo nhoo: phung" yoeb bo shau" vang kham: zoo: wa nghoid .
45008018	Akhid" he: da" pyaid moo ngoonu" thoung" shau" nyid da" koug shu: sho" jhen: khyoo: gi thang: phyang" pyaid Mangsoo: gi ngoonu" ri shau" kham: zoo: nhang: wa da" myo nhoo: phung" yoeb yo" citham: atu' yu" ein: ngoo loem" jeing" nyid .
45008019	Moug: myid goin" mo phain" too" shau" su: gi Mangsoo: nya: zoo: yi ri thu' myang loo nhang: wa da" moozoo" joem ri gye nheig byu myid lang" nyid boem .
45008020	Mangsoo: gi he mougmyid ri akoem: bue" loo wa shid' re" yoobo dang: phyed' byid: - Hougsu" dang: phyed' da" khyoo: gi mougmyid nyang: vhoo: yoomo anghoid . Mangsoo: nyang: dang: phyed' yoomo nghoid . Nghoidloug we' nheig byu jang: jo shi" .
45008021	Hau da nheig byu jang: gi danyid" da" bidnyid ri he phain" too" shau" da mougmyid gi - fain" vo byo yoin da' zi wigi myheig tei" to" jang mo loid byoin lo" lho: - Mangso: da nya: zoo: yi yo" da ge" loid byoin khyoo yo" myo nhoo: phung" yoeb ri shau" kham: zoo: wa .
45008022	Phain" too" shau" da mougmyid goin" gi - zoo: khu: noo no , da u" ri yhang: te" da" kyi" khyeug da" jam jau kyiyang myeing khyo" akhid" nyid" ju" sho' kham: zo: yau: nyid da khyoo: ngoonu" se' .
45008023	Phain" too" shau" da moug: nyid za anghoid . Mangso: da xang: shid" mo jhung: shug nghoid da" venyi ri shau" kham: yu da" ngoonu" we' Mangso: da nya: zoo yo" bui" wa da akhang" ri we' ngoonu" da" gungdu: goin" bain' sho' khyoid' yu shau" ri we' - lang" nyid zoo" re" kyiyang myeing nyid boem .
45008024	Ngoonu" gi nheig byu khyo" wigi khyoid' yu zi shau" nghoid loug we' nheig byu jang: ri nganu' myang nghoid rigi hau: da" nheig byu jang: gi gyeing" gyeing" da" nheig byu jo yoo anghoid . . Bain myang bye zi ri hang" su: nheig se' byu nyid loo wa .
45008025	Nghoidloug we' ngoonu" gi amyang yu shi" da" zi ri - loem" jeung" nheig byu nyid nghoid ri gi hau da zi ri nheigloem: sheing" sheing" lang" nyid .
45008026	Dalheing: dam nyang: young" gyeing" venyi gi yoem: neing: nyid da ngoonu" ri pang" thoug wa shid' re" gyoo" lo zi nghoid . ngoonu" gi akyu" khasu" mho' wa zi ase' boem yoomo nghoid: wigi ayo" tid kyo" da" kyiyang myeing: da" khyoo: ri venyi nya: gung du nyang: Ngoonu" da" shid' re" Mangso: jhang bo pang" mho' byid: nyid .
45008027	Byu da" nheigloem: ri myang: byid: da" Mangsoo: gi venyi: da" nheigloem: ri we' bo si byid: . Khasu" wim ga ri young" gyeing" Venyi gi Mangsoo: vho: zi yo" dakhyoo" Aseing nya: byu yi shid' re" bo mho' toung" bain: nyid yoomo nghoid .
45008028	Mangsoo: gi jheddab yoomo Aseing: myid vho: zi yo" dakhyoo" khe: khyen: yu shau" mo ri thoung" shau" zoo: wa da" moo" dangain" mo akyu" bo thu' loo wa shid' re" Aseing gi nyangnu" yo" dage" zei: so' khyoo: ri ngoonu" se' .
45008029	Mangsoo: gi - nyang: khyen yu too" mo , ri nya: zoo: Yesu yhang: ti" bue" loo wa shid' re" nghoid .
45008030	Houg: yoomo Mangsoo: gi nyang: khyen: thu' too" mo ri khe: yu . Hougsu" khe: yu too" mo nya: shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" mo agyeing" khyo" kham: yu lho: nya: myonhoo: phung yoeb ri - nyang: yo" dage" yo" bo kham: zoo: wa akhang" byid bye .
45008031	Tho' moo tid lid lo da" khyoo: ri agung kaid' lho: dang: thang: said' loo wa . Mangsoo: gi ngoonu" thang: dab jo rigi hang" we' ngoonu" ri yo" ung: wa zi anghoid .
45008032	Mangsoo: gi nya: zoo: gyeing" ri - vhoo" abyid' looza: - ngoonu" dangain" mo shid' re" gung leig xoin" to' pyam' bye: nhung . Ngoonu" shid' re" nya: zoo: ri byid: da" Aseing gi zi jo , moo jo , ngoonu" ri noug noug za: abyid: loo: khasu" se' nyid wa la" .
45008033	Mangsoo: khyen: to" da byu yi ri - yooboo hang" yo" foin: wa lha" . Nyanu" moo yooboo abo da" khyoo: ri Mangsoo: nyang: thoid' shid' tid fu" too" bye .
45008034	Houg: yoomo nyangnu" ri hang" we' yoobo dam yo" byid: wa zi anghoid . Shid: kham: da" zi za anghoid . Shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' lo da" Aseing Yesu Khristu gi Mangso: da lo yo shoid' moo zhoung: jo lho: ngoonu" da" shid' re" bo mho' tung" bain: byid: nyid .
45008035	Houg: yoomo - ngoonu" ri Khristu da" jheddab jang" mo - hang" yo" kang" pyam' wa lha" . Yau: khe" khyoo myid myoo: ung: loug khyoo: - shen" jhen' khyoo: - zooyoid gyid shid' khyoo: - myoung: joid sho" jhen: da" khyoo: - shid: gyoin noo gyoin thoung" shau" khyoo: said' pyam' shau" da" khyoo: yi gi yo" kang" wa la" .
45008036	Aseing da" shid' re" - ngoonu" gi nyid" khang" nyid" shid: gyoin noo gyoin yo" dathoung" shau" nyid . Said' wa ga: tei" to" da" yang joem yhang: ti" ngoonu" ri subi" houg: su" soin: too" bye . - ga: da" jhoem: mungdang: yo" dakhyoo" ti" nghoid nyid .
45008037	Nghoidloug we' agang: alain loo" nhang: tho' moo gootu: ngoonu" gi hau khyoo: dangain" yo" thoung" shau" goo" wa jang" moo ngoonu" ri jheddab da Aseing: khyo" wigi atho' tid oung: doid loo" bye .
45008038	Khasu" wim ga: gi ce: zi we' ngoonu" ri nya: jang" mo ayo" kang" pyam' . Shid: khyoo: nghoid loug we' - kangso' dei khyoo: nghoid loug we' - mau lagyoo: yi nghoid loug we' - moug: khung: tho' mo vhoeb khang" mo , nghoid loug we' - yoem: vho" yoem: so' nghoid loug we' - lid: loo" bye zi nghoid loug we' .
45008039	Moug: khung: tho' mo zi nghoid loug myid thi" khoug: mo , zi nghoid loug we' - ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu' Khristu khyo" wigi Mangsoo: toin" shid' da" jheddab jang" mo - ngoonu" ri yo" kang" pyam' zi anghoid .
45009001	Ngoo gi Khristu yo' nyid . Ngoo amhoug - main" da" dang: ri tid . Ngoo main: da" dang: ri da tid da" khyoo: gyeungshang: da" Venyi: vhoeb' khang" khyo" wigi nya: ung: jeung" nheigloem: gi thangcab nghoid .
45009002	Nga" da" nheigloem: gi nga" byumyu" - nga" suid" shoo" yi da" shid' re" - myid myoo: ung: loug nyid . Atho' tid sho' nheig moo no nyid .
45009003	Ngoonu" da" akyu" shid' re" - ngoo gi Mangso: da" nheing" myeing" ri we' - Khristu mo gang: goo" nau da" nheigloem: bo .
45009004	ngoonu" gi Mangsoo: khyen' yu to" da" byumyu" nghoid . Mangsoo: gi nyanu" ri zoo: gi joem khyo" coung" nghei tu: to' to" lho: nya: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri yo" bo kham: zoo: wa akhang" byid to . Mangsoo: gi nyanu" yo" dang: theing go" to" zi ri we' - tarha" byid: to" zi ri we' - deingmain" da" noku khyoo: ri we' - yo" yu lho: - nyanu" gi Mangso: da" dang: theing" khoin" joem ri yo" too" mo , nghoid .
45009005	Ngoonu" gi Yuda byumyu" phoug" phyid" mo xo' gyoo" loo mo nghoid . Khristu we' - byuxeig khyo" ga: ri gi houg: bang: da" byukung: nghoid . Jo , moo jo , - nyid moo nyid ri vhoeb' khang" da: Mangsoo: gi - apyaid' atoo: moo myonhoo: phung yoeb dabo nyid baja" o" - Amen .
45009006	Mangso: da" dang: theing khoin" gi - abui" loo wa ein: ngoo atid' noug . Khasu" wim ga: ri Israela byumyu" dangain" gi Mangsoo: khyen: yu to" da" byu yi anghoid .
45009007	Hau tho' moo Abraham: mo ko' gyoo" loo mo dangain" mo gi Abraham: nya: myid: nya: zoo: gyeing" yi anghoid . Mangsoo: gi nang gi Isag mo za amyed ashen yi yo" loo wa ga wigi Abraham: ri tid to" .
45009008	Dakhyo" doem ein: rigi xangsu: gungshoo" khyo" khu: loo mo dangain" gi Mangsoo: nya: zoo yi anghoid . Mangsoo: dang: theing to" khyo" khu: loo mo za: Mangso: da" nya: zoo: agyeing" yi nghoid .

45009011	Houg: yoomo nya: eig yug akhu: loo shi" da" uri - ge da moo" - akhyeing" ashoeb' da moo" ci: akoid' shi" re nyang: - Mangsoo: gi Rebedkha: ri - re" zoo mang: moo" gi nya: nhung" ri shau" zei: zhoo" wa - ga: tid too" bye . 45009019	Hougsu" nghoid loug we' Mangsoo: gi byu xangsu: yi ri cisu" wim yooboo yo" foin: wa lha" . Hang" gi Mangsoo: vho: da" khyoo: ri yo" ngeig pyam' wa lha" . ga wigi ngoori myid: noug mo boo wa .
45009020	Bid noem phoo we" nang gi khate" su: nghoid lho: wigi Mangsoo: ri hidsu" yo" myid: lha" . Phain" too" su: wigi phain" to" Aseing ri - Aseing nang ci koid' ngoonu' ri phain" to" ein: yo" myid: wa lha" .
45009021	Oug" koid su: da" myid u" nug ri nyang: vho: khyo" oug" khu' ri yo" koid to" anghoid la" . Nyang: gi Myid u" nug dathung" mo za - oug" gi oug" gang: yo" koid thu anghoid la" .
45009022	Mangsoo: we' - houg: yo" dakhyoo" ti" koid . Mangsoo: gi - yo: phoin: myo nhoo: toin" shid' lho: nya yoem vhoo" phung" ri se' lo boem wa shid' re" - vho: ngei nyid . Nghoidloug we' nheig yo: zi thoung" shau" lho: byo yoin" shid: joem: loo" moin: mo ri gye kham zeing: yau: nyid .
45009023	Hau tho' mo gootu: Mangsoo: gi nyang: nheig khyeug nyid mo ri nya: da" joeb byeung" myonhoo: phung" yoeb ri shau" myang nhang: wa shid' re" vho: ngei nyid . 45009029	Hau tho' mo apyaid' atoo: mo yoem: moo" bo da Mangsoo: gi ngoonu" da" byumyu" dayham" ri khyam" sa ato' byid: nghoid rigi - ngoonu" gi Sodam yo" Gomora ti" thoung" shau" goo" wa ga: akhang: re lapi: Esaia tid kyoo" khare" zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" nyang: bue" loo bye .
45009030	ngoonu" tid nau da khyoo: gi hid: su" nghoid . Mangso: da" shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" mo bue" loo wa shid' re" - yoem: akaid' da: tungbau byumyu" yi gi - Aseing Yesu ri loem jeing" loem" jeung" khyoo: khyo" - Mangso: shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" mo yo" bue" lo da akhang" yo" yu boem .

45009032	Ce: noem wim amyang lha" . Nyanu" zei: da" moozoo" gi - Mangsoo: ri loem" jeung" jang" moo ayang: aqei" loo: - nyanu" da" tarha" cang pyeung da" jang" moo za: ayang: qei" yoomo nghoid . 45009033	Jhoem: mungdang: moo - Tam" gyoo: ge' - byu yi thoung" thoe: leung loo" nhang: wa shid' re" lug daloem: ri Zion boem tho' moo ngoo zhug too" wa . 45010001	Mang: nhung" yi we" - ngoo gi ngoonya: da" byumyu" khyoid' yu zi shau" wa shid' re" - nheigloem: ungkhoug: dangain" yo" myid byu zoo" re" - Mangso: da jhang ; moo akyu" mho' nyid .
45010002	Nyanu" gi Mangsoo: ri gye loem" jeing" loem" jeung" mo nghoid zi ri ngoo sag si yo" kham: loug we' - nyanu" da loem" jeung" da" akhyoo" ri shoid' vhang: nyid boem .
45010003	Nyanu" gi - Mangso: da shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" lo wa da akhyoo" ri asi yoomo hau: khyoo" moo acang loo za: nyang: nyang: myid soin: nyheing koid' to" da khyoo: ri cang lo" boem . Houg: yoomo nyanu" gi - Mangsoo: nyheing to" deingbyeing" khyoo: moo acang boem .
45010004	Houg: yoomo - Khristu gi tarha" pyaid ri thang loo" nhang: bye nghoid yoomo Aseing: ri loem" jeung" mo dangain" ri - nya: da" shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" mo bue" loo wa da" akhang" ri Mangsoo: byid: bye .
45010005	Moshe da" tarha" ri cang lho: Mangso: da" shid' moo deingbyeing" mo , yo" bue" lo da" khyoo: yo" lho: - Moshe gi tarha" cang mo gi kangso' dei nyid wa ga tid to" .
45010006	Nghoidloug we' loem" jeung" khyoo: khyo" Mangso: da shid' moo deingbyeung" zi yo" lho: jhoem: mungdang: moo - kha: yug gi moug: khung: khyoo: yo" ju" loo" wa lha" - ein: nanya: gung ri nanyang: atid' .
45010007	Khayug gi ngarai" mung" khyoo: yo" gyoo" loo" wa lha ga: - nyang: nya: gung ri amyid: yu" goo" - ga: wigi ( Tid' nau da" dang: gung gi - Khristu ri moug: khung: tho' mo ngoonu" jhang gyoo" loo wa shid' re" khayug gi moug: khung: khyoo: do lo" lho: khe: khyo yu la" . 45010008	Jhoem: mungdang: moo tid nau zi gi - Mungdang: tarha" gi re" da" nam moo nyang: jo bye .
