45010009	Hougsu" wigi Yesu gi Aseing: nghoid ga: wigi re" nhoid' moo yhen: yu lho: Mangsoo: gi - Hau da" Aseing: ri shid: da' jang" mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: da" khyoo: ri - re" nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo loem" jeung" nghoid rigi nang Mangsoo: da" khyoid' yu zi shau" wa nghoid .
45010010	Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" gi nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo loem" jeung" khyo" Mangsoo: da" shid' khoin" moo deingbyeing" mo yo" bui" wa akhang" yo" lho: nhoid' mo yhen: yu khyo" khyoid' yu khyoo: ri yo" yu zi nghoid .
45010011	Hau: jhoem mungdang: moo hang" nghoid loug we' - Aseing Yesu ri loem" jeung" mo , gi nheigloem: byo yoin loo" wa khyoo: aboo loo: ga: tid to" .
45010012	Phoo Mangsoo: gi byu xangsu: yi dangain" bang: da" kangso' Aseing: nghoid lho: - nyang: gi akyu" mho' mo dangain" ri joeb byeung" da mainkaid jeju" byid . Houg: yoomo Yuda byumyu" yo" - tungbau byumyu" - ga: suid" aphyed' .
45010013	Jhoem: mungdang: gi Mangsoo: ri akyu" mho' mo dangain" ri khyoid' yu khyoo: yo" yu wa ga: toin" shid' to .
45010014	Nghoidloug we' houg: bang: gi - u" vang loem" jeung" khyoo: abo rigi - Khasu" wigi - Aseing: jhang akyu" yhe ; se' mho' wa lha" . Mungdang: tarha" ashug" gyo: rigi - khasu" wim u" vang se' loem jeing" wa Mungdang: tarha" kho" kyoo" su: anyid ri khayo se' shaug" gyoo: wa
45010015	Kho" kyoo" wa shid' re" nhang: kaid' su: abo ri khasu" se' kho" kyoo" wa . Jhoem: mungdang: moo bo zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" - ngibu: lu dang: gi ri voin loo mo da" khyid: yi gi - khayhi' young" du nyid boem lha" » ga: lhid" to" .
45010016	Nghoidloug we' hau ngei bu: lu dang: gi ri byu dangain" mo aloem" jeung" boem . Lapi: Esaia tid to" zi gi - O phoo Mangsoo: we" ngoonu" tid fu" da" ngei bu: lu dang: gi ri - hang" loem" wa lha" » ga: tid .
45010017	Houg yoomo byu yi gi Mungdang: shaug" gyoo: yoomo u" vang loem" jeung" lo boem . Byu dayug gi Khristu da" khyoo: kho" kyoo" yoomo byu yi gi mungdang: ri yo" shau" gyo: boem .
45010018	Hougsu" nghoid loug byu yi gi - hau da" mungdang: shaug" gyoo: wa akhang" ajo la" ein: ngoo myid nau . Byu yi gi shaug" gyoo: wa da" akhang" gyeing" gyeing" yo" boem . Jhoem: mungdang: moo Mungdang: tarha" ri kho" khyoo" su: da" thui: gi - mougmyid , dagyab goin" moo fu" nheing" loo" bye . Nyanu" da" tarha" dang: yi gi moug myid ayam loem: kheing goem: sho' ngam' loo" bye . - ga: tid zi yo" dakhyoo" nyang: nghoid bye . Ngoo gi ci: anghoid da byumyu" ri ci lho: - no" zo' vo da nheigloem: kaid' byid wa . Agyeing" da" byumyu" khyo: wigi nga" da" byumyu" ri nheig ze" shoo" byid: wa . - ga: wigi xangshid" phoid: kyo .
45010019	Ngoo dalheing: doem myid shi" wa Israela byumyu" yi gi - hau da" khyoo: ri ase' gyo: boem la" . Mangsoo: gi Moshe khyo" wigi - Ngoo gi ci: anghoid da byumyu" ri ci lho: - no" zo' vo da nheigloem: kaid' byid wa . Agyeing" da" byumyu" khyo: wigi nga" da" byumyu" ri nheig ze" shoo" byid: wa . - ga: wigi xangshid" phoid: kyo .
45010020	Mangsoo gi Esaia khyo" tid to" zigi ngoori ; ashoo ; mo , gi shau" nyang beom - nga" da khyoo: ri amyid aphoid: sho: mo , gi ngoori shau" myang boem . ga wigi gyeing" nyang: tid to .
45010021	Nghoidloug we' - Israela byumyu" yi da khyoo: gi - Ngoo ri pyi: sho: gyi koid' lho: - nga" dang: ri atam" gyo: da" byumyu" ri - ngoo gi danyid" goin" lo fe: khye: nyid - ga: Mangsoo: tid da" khyoo: Esaia xo' tid to" .
45011001	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - ngoo gi myid kaid' bye . Mangsoo: gi nya: da byumyu" ri she: lhei" pyam' bye: la" . Gyeing" nyang: ashe: pyam . Ngoo nya: gung du: nyang: lang" Israela byumyu" dayug nghoid nyid . Ngoo gi Abraham mo ko' gyoo" loo su Benyamin kung: moo boo su" dayug nghoid .
45011002	Mangsoo: gi xang: shid" mo wigi nyang: khyen: yu to" da byumyu" ri ashe: pyam' - jhoem: mungdang: moo Elia gi Israela byumyu" yi ri tu: mhoug lho: - Mangso: jang" moo kau: to" mougsoug" du .
45011003	Elia gi - Mangsoo: we" - houg: bang: gi Mangso: da Lapi yi ri said' pyam' boem abye: . Aseing: da xoin" to phoin: ri lhu: phyo' pyam' boem abye: . Ngoo dayug kyeing" deing o" . Ngoo ri we' nyangnu" gi said' pyam' wa shid' re" yoem: kaid' nyid boem bye - ga: da" dang: ri nanu" asi' goo" la" .
45011004	Hougsu" nghoid loug we' - Elia ri Mangsoo: khasu" doem ga: lha" . Mangsoo: gi - Ngoo gi bala' phara" ri u" pid' apid' - no' we' ano' mo . Byu nyhed khyeing" ri - nga" shid' re" teung too" byid: bye . ga: wigi tid .
45011005	Akhid" ayo moo we' - houg: yo" dakhyoo" nghoid nyid . Mangsoo: nheig khyeug yoomo - khyen: to" da" byumyu" dajhi' zoo: deung nyid shi .
45011006	Mangsoo: gi houg: bang: ri nheig khyeug khyoo: khyo" khyen: yu to . ngoonu" da" aved ri yu" lho: khyen: yu zi anghoid . Gyeing" nyang: Mangso: khyen: yu da" khyoo: gi - byu avoidd ri yu" nghoid rigi - nya: nheig khyeug khyoo: gi gyeing" da" nheig khyeug khyoo: anghoid .
45011007	Houg: yoomo khasu" tid wa lha" . Israela byumyu" yi gi nyanu" sho: nyid ziri ashug" boem . Hau: zi ri myang mo gi Mangso: khyen: to" da" byuphung: nu" zoo: da nghoid . Jain" nyid mo gi Mangsoo: khi: thui" ashaug" gyoo: mo nghoid .
45011008	Jhoem: mungdang: moo Mangsoo: gi - nanu" da nheigloem: ri deing lid nhang . Akhid" nyid" ju" sho' nyanu" gi nyang: nya: da" khyoo: ri myang loug we' amyang boem . Shoug" gyoo: loug we' ashaug" gyoo: boem ga: tid to" zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" nghoid . '
45011009	Hau: tho' moo David khokham" gi - nyanu" da zoo: shug pui" joem gi nyanu" shid' re" teikhuang yhang: ti" we' thoung: to" lhid' yhang: ti" we' bue" nyid wigi nyanu" gi Joem: loo" wa yooboo dam kham zo: boem baja" .
45011010	Nyanu" gi yo" loug amyang nhang: wa shid' re" - myo , go jo , goo" baja" . Nyanu" phyid" doem we' zheing: voen da yooven yoomo khanham we' jha" gyau: jo boem baja" o' - ga: tid to .
45011011	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - Yuda byumyu" yi gi - Mangso: mungdang: ri she: pyam' boem lho: - apyaid' atoo: soem" joem: shid: lo" boem bye la" . ein: ngoo myid nau . Khasu" nghoid loug asoem" ajoem: loo" wa . Nyanu" yooboo shoid' nyid yoomo tungbau byumyu" yi gi khyoid' yu shau" lo . Hidsu" bue" loo yoomo Yuda byumyu" yi gi tungbau byumyu" yi ri - noo" zo: nheigloem: bolo boem .
45011012	Yuda byumyu" yi yooboo shoid' khyoo: yoomo myo: lug mainkaid jeju" gi mougmyid goin" byo loo" bye . Tungbau byumyu" yi we' mainkaid jeju" byeung" sho' yo" kham: zoo: bye . Hougsu" nghoid ri Yuda byu damyu" goin" gi Khristu ri loem" jeing kham: yu lo lang" nyanu" gi mainkaid jeju" lang" shau" kham: zo boem wa .
45011013	tungbau byumyu" nghoid mo nanu' ri ngoo tid nau . Ngoo gi tungbau byumyu" yi da" lagyoo: nghoid zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" ngoo nya: da" moozoo" moo myonhoo: sho: yo" phau: khuang wa .
45011014	Ngoo gi ngoonu" byumyu" yi ri no" zo: da" byu nheigloem: ri kaid' byid khyo" hau bang: khoug: mo dayham" gi khyoid' yu khyoo: yo" shau" yu boem wa .
45011015	Mangsoo: gi nga" da" byumyu" ri she: pyam da" uri mougmyid byu yi ri nya gyivoo nghoid nyid jang" mo bidnoem yi bue" loo nhang: - hougsu" nghoid yoomo - Yuda byumyu" ri Mangsoo: doem kham: yu da" uri - Khasu" bue" loo wa lha" . Shid: mang ri doem dei loo nhang: yhang: ti" mau" pho" moozoo" bue" loo wa nghoid .
45011016	Nyang: yo" da" zooyho' mo dajhi' za: yu lho: Mangsoo: ri xoin" ngei" nghoid ri zooyho' dangain" ri xoin" ngei" byid zi yo" du nyid . Seig gam mo seig gyi ri xoin" ngei" byid: nghoid ri seig gam goin" xoin" ngei" byid zi yo du .
45011017	Byu yi gi zhain lun: gi akung: yi dayham" ri cu: khyo' pyam' lho: deing jo da" angoid' moo zhainlun: lam" akung: ri deom xo lho: sho" too" se' nyid boem . Hau: zhainlun: lam" gi agam gyid: ri jhoeb' yu yhang: ti" Tungbau byumyu" nghoid mo nanu" gi Yuda byumyu" yi jang" mo akyu" jeju" myoo" sho' shau" kham: yu boem .
45011018	Houg: yoomo nanu" gi cu: khyo' pyam shau" da akung: yo" du mo ri ayu" rui" goo" . Nanu" gi khasu" ein: nghoid boin: nyid go" lha" . Nanu" gi akung: ako'' za danghoid yoomo seig gyi: ri yoem: yo" pyeing byid: wa zi anghoid . Agyi: gi nanu" ri yoem: je yo" pyeing byid .
45011019	Nghoidloug nanu" gi - ngoonu" ri jo yoo byid: wa shid' re" zhainlun: akung: gi yi ri cu: khyo' pyam' anghoid goo" lo" ga: wigi tid goo" wa .
45011020	Nanu" tid zi yo" dakhyoo" we' deing: houg: bang: cu: khyo' pyam' shau" da khyoo: gi nyanu" gi Mangsoo: ri aloem khoug: boem yoomo nghoid . Hau: su wi nanu" gi Mangsoo: ri we' loem" jeung" yoomo - zhainlun gam mo dakhyam" dayam' yo" bue" lo boem . Nghoidloug we' nanu" da gung ri nghoid aboin: loo za gyoug zid" nyid , ge' .
45011021	Mangsoo: gi zhainlun: gam mo akhang: dab gu akung: yhang: ti" nghoid mo ri lang" vhoo" abyid: nghoid rigi - khasu" wigi nang ri vhoo" se' byid: wa la" .
45011022	He jang" moo Mangsoo: gi - khayhi' gyeing" nheig khyeug shoo" se' myen: da" khyoo: yo' khayhi' gyeing" noo sho' yooboo dang: se' kho: da" khyoo: ri ngoonu" shau" myang boem . Mangsoo: gi yooboo shoid' mo ri gye thain: sho' yooboo dam yo" byid nyid da" khyo" ein: ri nanu" gi Mangso: nheig khyeug khyoo: ri yo" xo kham: yu sho' cang koid' zei: so' ri gi Mangsoo: gi nanu" da" tho' moo nheig khyeug nheig myen: nyid wa zi za nghoid . Hau: nheig khyeug myen: da" khyoo: ri shau" kham yu sho' akoid' acang loem boem ri koem' gi nanu" ri we' Mangsoo: gi cu: khyo' pyam' wa .
45011023	Yuda byumyu" yi gi nheigloem: thid' lho: Mangsoo: ri loem" jeung" lo boem nghoid rigi anghoid moo akung: doem xo' toid lho: sho" to" zi shau" boem shi" wa . Mangsoo: gi he: da" moo" ri yo" zei: su: nghoid .
45011024	Dang: thang: said' ba ein: rigi tungbau byumyu" nghoid mo nanu" ri akhang: nanu" nya: da" zhainlun: shi" lam" kung: mo zain: phyed yu lho: nanu" da" akhang mo agam nghoid da" zhainlun: gi mo ako moo yo" xo' sho" nghoid rigi akhang: zhainlun: akung: gi nghoid da" mo - Yuda byumyu" yi ri akhang: zhainlun: gam zeing moo doem xo' sho" too" wa zi gi je lei wa anghoid la" .
45011025	Mang: nhung" yi we" - nanu" gi nyang: nya: da" gungdu: ri gye se' nheig bo ein: amyid wa shid' re" ngoo gi Mangsoo: zau" yhoem" to" da" no thang da" khyoo: yi ri nanu" ri tid khoo" nau . Hau: zau" yhoem" to" da no thang da" khyoo: gi Hidsu" nghoid . Yuda byumyu" yi gi khanham we' u" loem' thain: nyid wa zi anghoid . Khyoid' yu khyoo: ri shau" wa da: nghizain' byumyu" yi bainsho' Mangso: byu yi bue" lo da" yo ju" sho' za nghoid .
45011026	Hau: thang: rigi Mangso: wigi Israela damyu" goin" khyoid' yu shau" wa zi nghoid . Jhoem: mungdang: moo Khyoid' yu da" Aseing: gi Zion boem mo thu' re" lho: Yaku da nya: myid: nya: zoo: yi jang" mo anyhoin: athung" khyoo: dangain" ri soid' pyam' wa nghoid . - ga: wigi toin" shid' wa zi nghoid .
45011027	Ngoo Mangsoo: gi houg: bang: da" yooboo dangain" ri khyoid' byid: uri nyanu" yo" he: thang" cab' too" wa ga: wigi tid to" zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" nghoid .
45011028	Khasu" wim ga: ri ludang: gi ri she: pyam' yoomo Israela byumyu" gi Mangso: da gyivoo bue" loo bye . Hang" bue" loo da" khyoo: gi tungbau byumyu" yi nanu" akyu" yoo" wa shid' re" nghoid . Nghoidloug we' Mangsoo: gi nyanu" ri khyen: yu yoomo nyanu" da" phoug" phyid" yi ri byid kaid' da" dang: theing khoin" ri yu" lho: nyanu" ri jheddab ashi" .
45011029	Mangsoo: gi hang" ri nghoid loug khyen: yu lho: mainkaid jeju" byid: wa ga: bain phyed: to" thang: ri - nheigloem: ase' fain" loo: su: nghoid .
45011030	Tungbau byumyu" ein: da" nanu" gi - daleing: ri Mangso: da" dang: ri atam" gyo: boem nghoid loug we' akhid" uri Mangso: da' nheig khyeug zi nanu" shau" kham zoo: nyid zi gi Yuda byumyu" yi gi Mangso: da" dang: atam" gyo: boem yoomo nghoid .
45011031	Houg: yo" dakhyoo" ti" Mangso: nheig khyeug da" jeju nanu" shau" kham: zoo wa shid' re" yuda byumyu" yi gi akhid" ju" sho' Mangso: da dang: ri atam" gyo: boem . Nanu" shau" kham yu da" jeju yo" dakhyoo" ti" shau" kham yu goo" baja" .
45011032	Xangsu: byu yi dangain" mo gi - nya: mungdang: ri atam" gyo: boem yoomo Mangsoo: gi nyanu" ri thung: loung" da byu yi yhang: ti" bue" byid nhang . Mangsoo: hidsu" koid' da" khyoo: gi nyanu" ri nheig khyeug nheig leom yo" toin" shid' wa shid' re" nghoid .
45011033	Apyaid' ato: Mangso: da jeju" gi gye gye jo nhung: lha" . Mangso: da" nyan phajhi" yo' se' yeig phajhi" gi gye no jo , nhung: nya: dang: phyed' dang: phyed' da" khyoo: ri hang" yo" phoid' kyoo" wa lha" . Nya: moozoo" ri hang" se' gyoo: byid: wa lha" .
45011034	Jhoem: mungdang: gi
45011035	Mangsoo: gi jeju" doem yo" toug" byid: sho' kha: yug gi Mangsoo: ri jeju" yo" koid' wa lha" » ga: wigi tid to" zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" nghoid .
45011036	mangsoo: gi - jo , moo jo , ri phain" to" lho: hau: zi joem gi Mangsoo: khyo" wigi we' Mangso: shid' re" nghoid loug we' dageing: teing" jo boem . Mangsoo: gi apyaid' atoo: myonhoo: phung" yoeb doug bang nyid baja" o" Amen .
45012001	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo Mang: nhung" yi we" - Mangsoo: gi ngoonu" ri gye jheddab nheig khyeug yoomo Mangso: moo" bo voin zi yo" dei nyid da" xoin" du: yhang: ti" bue" wa shid' re" nanu" da" gungdoem: ri xoin" to" ab noung" pyam' ge' . Houg lang" she' nanu" gi Aseing: ri deingbyeing" khyo" yo" noku boem wa .
45012002	Nanu" gi mougmyid asam" aved ri acang nyid goo" nanu" gi Mangsoo: ri nyang: tu: nya: da" nheigloem: xoug" bain' sho' thed' pyam' lho: nheigloem: ung: khoug: aseig khyo" kham: yu ge" . - Hougsu" koid' lang" gi geda" khyoo: - Mangsoo: vho: da" khyoo: ce: yooboo foin: jang: ajo lo: da" khyoo: ga: da" Mangsoo: vho: da khyoo: gi ci nghoid ga: ziri nanu" yo" se' lo boem wa .
45012003	Nanu' gi nyang: nyang: te: nghoid da tho' mo jain" lho: nghoid aboin: goo" wa shid' re" - ngoori Mangsoo: byid da" Venyi jhe" ju" jhung: shug ri yu" lho: - nanu" dangain" mo jhang khyoo: ngoo tid pyeing: kyo" kaid' . - Nanu" yug khang" moo" gi nyang: nya: gung doem: ri phung yau shang apyang: wa khyo" myid yu" nyid boem ge' .
45012004	Ngoonu" da" gungdoem: moo akung: ako'' myoo" sho' bo wigi hau: akung: ako'' loem: khang" moo" gi nyang: moo" nyang: bo boem .
45012005	Houg: yo" dakhyoo" ti" - ngoonu" gi myo" sho' bang: nghoid loug we' Khristu yo" dadeing: daloem: za nghoid boem yoomo gungdu: daloem: mo da" akung: ako'' za danghoid . ngoonu" dangain" mo gi - daloem: yo" daloem: tei" xo' go" to" da" gungdu: akung: ako'' za danghoid nyid .
45012006	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - ngoonu" yug kang" moo" gi nyang: nyang: yo" kham' zoo: da" jeju" yo" dakhyoo" ti" Mangsoo: byid: da" jeju" ri se' ci yhoung: boem ca" . Ngoonu" yo" yu da" jeju" yo" Mangso: mungdang: ri tid nghoid rigi nyang: nya: da" loem" jeung" jo , gyam: yo" dakhyoo" ti" hau: jeju" ri ci: yhoung: nyid boem ca" .
45012007	Gyeing" ngyeing" nyang: ngoonu" yo" jeju" gi - subi" ri pang" thoug wa jeju" nghoid rigi pang" thoug nyid boem ca . Jhoug" byid: wa jeju" yoo" su: gi - jhoug" byid: nyid ca" .
45012008	Ngoonu" yo" yu da" jeju" gi - subi" ri yoem: foin: byid wa jeju" nghoid rigi - yoem: foin: byid: ca" nyang: nya: da" soid' gain jo nu" subi" ri gam byid: jeju" yoo" su: gi ngei" ngei pyoo: pyoo: gam , byid: ca" . U" jhung: bui" wa jeju" yoo" su: gi yoem: kaid' lho: vho" jhung: koid' nyid ca . Jam joug shau" mo ri pang" thoug wa jeju" yoo" su: gi ngei pyo: gau yi ziyo' pang" thoug nyid baja" .
45012009	Nanu" da" jheddab nheigloem: moo ayid void khyoo: dajhi' we' age boo . Nanu" gi anyhoin: athoung" da" khyoo: ri ngheing" lho: wigi ge' lho' da" khyoo: ri vho: ngei nyid ge' .
45012010	Nanu" dayug yo' dayug gi mang: seing: nhung" seing: ri yhang: ti" jheddab kang: tei" go" nyid ge' . Dayug wigi dayug ri coung" byid wa so' phyed' nyid ge' .
45012011	Anei" ashu: loo: - moozoo" jid , zoo" ri yoem kaid zei: nyid ge' . Nheugloem: yoem: booboo Mangso: da" moozoo" ri zei: so voin vu nyid ge' .
45012012	Nanu" moo nheig nhei: jang: boo yoomo - gau yi ngei pyo: nyid ge' . Koug shu: sho" jhen: lo da bidnyid ri geing: geing: teing teing koid' nyid ge' . Ano: ayab loo: akyu" damho' nyid ge' .
45012013	Phung: byu mang: nhung" yi sho" jhen: lo da" uri coem' pang" thoug go" nyid ge' . Gyung: so" yen" da" Khristan mang: nhung" yi ri pang" thoug being" de" nyid ge' .
45012014	Nanu" ri pyi: sho: shen" yhen loo mo ri mainkaid dang: tid byid: ge' . Nghoidbye nyanu" ri atau" nheing" looza: mainkaid dang: da tid nyid ge' .
45012015	Gau yi mo yo" dage" gau yi nyid ge' . Ngau nyid mo yo" dage" bo ngau nyid ge' .
45012016	Nyang: cang" nyang: myid so" nheig tei" go" nyid ge' . Phoug" ashoid' goo" - azhei: kyeing" moo" ri we' bo pang" zei ge' . Nanya: gung ri phajhi" bo ein: nghoid aboin: nyid goo .
45012017	nanu" ri akhyeing" ashoeb khyo" re" koid' su ri latoo: aphug goo . Byu dangain" mo yo" veing" goo" wa shid' re" yoem: kaid' nyid ge' .
45012018	Byu dangain" yo" myenjham" ngei pyoo: za: zoem" jeung" nyid ge' .
45012019	Bid noem yi we" - khanham we' dam co' latoo: aphug goo . Mangsoo: za: dam co' latoo: daphug baja" . Jhoem: mungdang: moo Mangsoo: gi - ngoo gi dam co' latoo: phug wa . Nya: yooboo yo" dakhyoo" latoo phug byid: wa ga: tid nyid .
45012020	Houg: yoomo latoo: phug wa tho' re" - jhoem: dang: moo bo zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" koid' nyid ge' - Jhoem: dang: moo nanu" da" gyivoo yi zooyoid' nyid uri voem: zhoo" ge' . Gyid shed' nyid ri gyid byid: jhug ge' . Hougsu" koid' lang" gi - nya: da" u" leom tho' moo dab jo , da" myigyu: foid' boem" byid: zi nghoid ga: tid to .
45012021	Age khyo" wi nang ri aoung: loo" nhang: - ge khyo" wigi - age da" khyoo ri oung: loo" nhang: ge' .
45013001	Byu dangain" mo Asuya zoug: yi da" amyeing" ri tam" gyoo: ca" . Khasu" wim ga ri - kha: asuya' nghoid loug Mangso: akhang" mo za: anghoid ri hang" zoug: ayo" koid' . Amyeing" yo" da: zoug: yi gi Mangsoo: wigi nyheig too" shau" mo nghoid .
45013002	Amyeing" a: na: yo" da" Asuya ri thoug shang" tu: mhug su: hang" nghoid loug we' Mangsoo: nyheing soin' da" khyoo: ri thou' shang" tu: mhug su: nghoid . Houg su" koid' su: hang" we' nya: yooboo dam shau" kham: zoo: wa .
45013003	Byu gi yi gi Asuya zoug: yi ri gyoug nyid anoo" . Akhyeing" age moo" ri zei: nyid su: za: gyoug ca" zi nghoid . Nang gi a: na amyeing" yoo" mo ri agyug loo: nyid nau la" . Houg: rigi ge da" moo" ri zei: nyid we' . Houg: lang" zoug ; yi nang ri coung" ngei byid: wa .
45013004	Khasu" wim ga ri nyang: gi nang ri akyu" koid' baja" ga: Mangsoo nyheing nyhed: to" da" dei zoo: nghoid . Nghoidloug we' nang age da" moo" dazei: nyid nghoid rigi hau: zoug: ri gyoug ca" . Khasu" wim ga: ri nyang: gi gyeing" nyang: yooboo yo" byid: da" akhang" yoo" su: nghoid . Hau: yug gi apyaid' ato: Mangso: da" dei zoo: nghoid yoomo age da" moo" zei: mo , ri Mangso: da" gung thid' khyo" yoobo dam kaid' dang: phyed' wa su: nghoid .
45013005	Houg: yoomo - nang gi mangsoo: yooboo dam kaid' wa zi ri gyoug yoomo za we' anghoid shi" - nyang: nya: da" nheigloem: soozoo: lheing: lho: Asuya zoug: yi da" amyeing" ri tam" gyoo: ca . "
45013006	He: khyoo: yoomo nanu" gi khang" dug ri kaid' ca" . Khasu" wim ga: ri Asuya zoug: yi gi nyanu" da' moozoo" voin vu uri Mangso: da moo" bo zei khyo" nghoid yoomo nghoid nyid .
45013007	Houg yoomo Asuya zoug: yi ri byid: eung: da' zi ri byid: nyid ge' . Kheing" kaid' eung: su: kheing" - khang" dug kaid' eung: su: khain" dug kaid' nyid ge' - amyeing" a: na: yoo" mo dangain" ri gyoug phau" myang: nyid ge' .
45013008	Nanu" nyang: cang" jheddab go" da" jhen: mo lid lho: ce: jhen: we' adab goo" goo . Subi" ri se jheddab su: gi tarha" ri bain cang pyeing bye su: nghoid .
45013009	Khasu" wim ga: ri subi" myiyi: alhoid' . Byu asaid' . subi" da" zi akhoug" - myo , no: vhoo: aboo ga: da" Moshe tarha" yo" goo tu: da" tarha" dangain" gi re" yhoem: kyoo" cang ri nanya gung yo" dakhyoo" ti" jheddab we' - ga: da" tarha" moo jhung: shoem: nghoid bye .
45013010	Nyang: nya: yhoem: kyoo" cang" ri jheddab su: gi hau: yug ri khanham we' akyu" yoem" loo" nhang: wa zi anghoid . Houg: yoomo nya: yhoem: kyoo" cang" ri jhed' se' dab su: gi Moshe da" tarha" dangain" ri cang nyid su: nghoid .
45013011	Nanu" gi nyang: nya: yhoeb' jo yoo mo so" to' loo wa ayo , ju" bye: zi ri si' yoomo jhed' khyeing: kang: khyeing: tei" go" boem ca" bye . Khasu" ga: ri ngoonu" khyoid' yu shau" wa da" ayo , bidnyid gi Aseing Yesu' ri ngoonu" loem" jeung" shid" da" ayo mo je" ri jhang ju" lo nyid bye: yoomo nghoid .
45013012	Myen" ayo , lid lo" nyid bye . Nyid" kyo' ju" loo wam bye: - houg: yoomo ngoonu" gi moug: coid' mo da thung" khing sam" ved ri acang boem looza: bidbang moo ci: ca" da" gyikhin' lagnag ri yu ci: boem ca" bye .
45013013	Ngoonu" gi bidbang mo nya: zoo: yi yhang: ti" ge young" du khyoo: moo za: cang lo" boem ca . Yhid: shug foo" zo: lid khyoo: akyang byo yoin" khyoo: - shava myiyi: yug gi cang zo: khyoo: yo" aved avhu: khyoo - myeing" myo: yhoo she: zi yo" no" zo: da" khyoo: ri jang" pyam' lho: bidnyid" gung tu: yo , ti" nyang: daso" nyid shang .
45013014	Hau: tho' moo Aseing Yesu Khristu ri gyi byi: gyimi su" void ci: ge' . Gung shoo" vho: da" nheig shid: said' nau khyoo: moo cang wa asoin' anyheing nyid goo .
45014001	Nanu" gi Mangsoo: ri loem" jeung" yoem: nu" mo ri kham: yu nyid ge' . Nghoidloug we' - nya: myid soin: koid' lo" khyoo: yo" nyang: yo" angeig goo" goo .
45014002	loem" jeung" khyoo: geing ; teing su: gi ce: ja: zoo: noem ri we' yo" zo: nghoid loug we' loem" jeung" khyoo: ageing: teung su: gi - nghang" pho nyoug yu: za: zo: .
45014003	Ce: ja: zoo: noem ri nghoid loug we' se' zoo: su: gi houg ; su" ase' zoo: su: ri - aphoug" akhyoid' akoid' . Nghang" pho nyoug yu: za: te: se' zoo: su: we' ce: ja: zoo: noem we' se' zoo: su: ri yooboo foin: gei sang: zi akoid' . Khasu" wim ga: ri ce: ja" zoo: noem ri nghoid loug se' zoo: su: ri Mangsoo: kham: yu too" bye: su: nghoid .
45014004	Nang gi khate" su: nghoid lho: subi" da" dei zoo: koid' su: ri joeb' ca" dang: yo" phyed' lha" . Hau: da" dei zoo: koid' moozoo" ge age gi nya: da" yhoem: seing: gi dang: phyed' byid: wa . Nya: da" moo" gi nyang: ri deig joung: nghoid wa . Khasu" wim ga: ri Aseing: gi nyang: ri yo" pang" thoug su: nghoid .
45014005	Byu dayham" bang: gi - bidnyid danyid" gi goo" ru: danyid" tho' moo je ge ga: soin: yu" ago" . Goo" tu: dayham" gi bidnyid dangain" gi dakhyoo" ti" ga: myid ci: ago" . Kha: yug gi khasu" soin: ci nghoid loug nyang: myid zi jo ga: loem" jeung" nheig deig ca .
45014006	Bidnyid je ge ga: soin: ci: su: gi Aseing: ri coung" nghi wa shid' re" soin: ci baja" - ce: ja" zoo: noem ri se' zoo: su: we' - Aseing: ri coung" nghei" wa shid' re" zo: nyid baja nyang: we' hau: zoo: noem shid' re" Mangso: da" mainkaid jeju" ri coung" byid . Zoo: noem dajaja: ri jang" pyam' su: nghoid loug we' Mangso: da" myonhoo: phung yoeb ri coung" byid: wa shid' re" jang" pyam" da" khyoo: nghoid . Nyang: we' hougsu" jang" pyam' yoomo Mangso: da" jeju" ri coung" byid .
45014007	Ngoonu" mo khayug we' - nya: shid' re" za te: dei nyid zi anghoid . Shid: loo" nghoid loug nya: shid' re" za: te: shid: lo" zi anghoid .
45014008	ngoonu" dei nyid zi gi - Aseing: shid' re" dei nyid lho: shid: loo: nghoid loug we' Aseing: shid' re" ngoonu" shid: lo . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi kangso' dei nyid u" ri we' shid: lo" nyid" ri we' Aseing: yo' sen: nyid .
45014009	Khasu" wim ga: ri Khristu gi - shid: loo" mo dei nyid mo da" Aseing: bue" loo" wa da" shid' re" shid: kham: lho: doem dei to'' loo bye .
45014010	Houg: yoomo nanu" gi ciwim wigi re" mang: nhung" ri dang: phyed' nyid go" lha" . Ciwim wigi nyanu" ri aphoug" akhyoid' koid' nyid go" . Ngoonu" dangain" mo gi tarha" dang: phyed' zi kham: wa shid' re" Mangso: da tarha" zhoug: tang shid' khoin" moo ju" yab boem wa .
45014011	Jhoem: mungdang ; moo Aseing: tid to" zi gi Ngoo dei nyid zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" nga" da" shid' khoin" moo byu dangain" mo , poid' thoug thug lho: - yhoo: dab moo dab ngoo Mangsoo: nghoid khyoo: ri yhen: yu boem wa ga: - tid to .
45014012	Houg: nghoid yoomo ngoonu" dangain" mo gi nyang: nyang: koid' da" moozoo" yo" dakhyoo" ti" Mangsoo: ri shau" tid khyo" da bidnyid ju" loo wa .
45014013	Houg: yoomo ngoonu" gi nyang: cang" nyang: yooboo foin: go" da" khyoo: akoid' looza re" mang: nhung" phoo thoem: tho: leung jang: khyoo: kyoo" age kaid' byid . Houg su" anghoid lang" gi yu" shoid' wa da" akyang" daja: we' azei: shug wa shid' re" myid phyed' too" ge' .
45014014	Ce: ja: zoo: noem ri we' phain" to" zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" aco' ajhoid' anghoid da" khyoo: ri ngoonu" gi Khristu yo" dadeing: daloem: nghoid khyo" yo" boem nghoid loug we' zoo: noem daja: ja: gi aco' ajhoid' nghoid ga: myid su: shid' re" gi aco' ajhoid' nghoid .
45014015	Gyeing" nyang: ga ri nang gi nanyang: zo: nyid da" zoo: noem yoomo mang: nhung" dayug yug nheigloem: byo loo" nhang: nghoid rigi - hau: yug ri nang ajhed' dab zi lo" eung: - hau youg shid' re" Khristu gi shid: kham: byid: too" bye yoomo zoo: noem daja ja: nanu" zoo: yoomo hau: yug da" akyu" ri aze" jhoem" pyam' byid .
45014016	Nanu" ge ga: myid nyid da" khyoo: gi subi" goo" youg wi jhuang" yi lho: yooboo foin: jang: abui" nhang: goo .
45014017	Ngoonu" ri Mangso: mungdain: ein: da" zi gi zoo: zoo: shug shug koid' khyoo: anghoid loo za: gyeungshang: Venyi: khyo" byid: da: deingbyeing" khyoo: - myenjham" yug yo khyoo: yo" gau yi ngei pyo: khyoo: nghoid nyid .
45014018	Hid: khyo" wigi Khristu da" moozoo" ri voin vu su: ri Mangso: da' jheddab nheig shid: khyoo: yo" xangsu: byu yi da" coung" nghei" byid: khyoo: yo" yu wa .
45014019	Houg nghoid yoomo ngoonu" dayug yo" dayug myenjham" ngei loug jen" zoem" jeung" da" khyoo: bui" nhang: da" zi yo" nyang: dayoug wigi dayug ri Venyi: yoem: pyeing so' pyeing byid: da" moozoo" yi ri Khanham we yoem: kaid' zei: so' nyid boem ca .
45014020	Zoo: noem yo" Mangso: moozoo" ri alhu: phyo . Zoo: noem dangain" gi ge zo: nghoid loug we' nang gi hau: zoo: noem ri zoo yoomo subi dayug yug ri yo" shoid' khyoo: vhang: loo" nhang: nghoid rigi - nang yooboo yo .
45014021	Re" mang: nhung" ri datu: lheing: wa nghoid rigi - shoo" nghoid loug - yhid: ri nghoid loug goo tu: ce: ja: zoo: noem ri nghoid loug we' - jang" pyam' wa ge nyid .
45014022	He: da" khyoo: yo" lho: nang khasu" loem" jeing" kham: yu nyid zi gi nang yo" Mangsoo: za: dase' . Nangnyang: zei: da" moozoo" gi yooboo foin: cang abo ri gi young" gyeing" rigi nang ngei lho' wa .
45014023	Nghoidloug we' nang myid gyam da" nheigloem: yo" zoo: noem daja: ja: zoo: nyid su: nghoid rigi Mangsoo: gi yoobo dam byid: wa zi nghoid . Khasu" wim ga: ri - nang zo ; shug khyoo: gi - loem" jeing nheigloem: moo ayang: aboo yoomo nghoid . Houg: su" loem" jeung" nheig deig khyoo: aboo loo koid' da" moozoo" dangain" gi yoo boo nghoid nyid .
45015001	Apyaid' ato: da" Mangsoo: ri leom jeung" khyoo: nheigloem: geing: teing yoem: boomo ngoonu" gi - loem" jeung" nheigloem: yoem nu: mo ri - loem" jeung" khyoo: abyo , loo" wa shid' re" bo pang" thoug ge' . Ngoonu" gi ngoonu" nya: myid pyo: khyoo: ri za: akoid' goo .
45015002	Ngoonu" yug khang" moo" gi - nyang: nya: byen cang" - nyid gi nyid ge wa khyoo: ri myid yu" lho: - loem" jeung" khyoo: geing: teing sho' ngei pyoo: nhang: ge' .
45015003	Khristu gi nya: da" akyu" ri re" sho: khare" zi anghoid . Aseing: gi nya: akyu" shoo: wa tho' moo jhoem: mungdang: moo - - Aseing: ri subi" juang" yi da' khyoo: gi gyeing" nyang: ngoori juang" yi khyoo: nghoid - ga: wigi tid to" zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" subi" juang" yi da" khyoo: kham zo .
45015004	Jhoem: mungdang: moo lhid" to" da" khyoo dangain" gi - kham' zeing: yoem: vhoo" yo' nheugloem: geing: teing khyo" nyang: nya: nheig byu loem" jeung" khyoo: ri yo" yu wa shid' re" - ngoonu" ri jhau" mho' tid kyeing" to" da" mungdang: nghoid .
45015005	Nanu" dangain" mo gi - Khristu koid' shug aved asam" ri cang lho: wigi nheigloem: ung: khoug: daloem: za: boo wa shid' re" kham' zeing: yoem: vhoo" yo" geing: teing nheigloem: ri kaid' byid: da" Mangsoo: gi Nanu" ri pang" thoug nyid baja" .
45015006	Houg: lang" she' nanu" gi dadeing: daveing" za zi yo" ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" nya: phoo Mangsoo: ri damyeing" dathui: yo' za: yo" coung" nghei" nyid boem wa .
45015007	Houg: yoomo Khristu gi nanu" ri lhoem: kham: yu yhang: ti" Mangso: da myo nhoo: phung" yoeb doug bang: loo wa shid' re" - nanu" we' nyang: cang" nyang: lhoem: kham: yu go" nyid ge' .
45015008	Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo: gi dang: theing khoen" zung" su: nghoid yoomo phoug" phyid" yi ri tid to" dang: theing khoin" byeung: loo nhang: wa shid' re" gyoo" lo ein: ngoo tid nau .
45015009	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" tungbau byumyu" yi gi Mangso: da nheig khyeig da" khyoo: ri shau" coung" nghei" wa shid' re" we' nghoid . Jhoem: mungdang: moo Houg: yoomo ngoo gi nghizain da" byumyu" yi da" khoug: moo Mangso: da" phung" yoeb ri coung" nghei byid wa . Nya: myeing" khyang" ri coung" nghei lid jhoem" kaid' wa - ga: tid to" zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" nghoid . Tungbau byumyu" yi we" Aseing: da" byu phung: yi yo' dage" ngeipyo: gau yi nyid ge" ga wigi we' . byumyu" bai ri sho mo we" nyang: ri coung" byid: nyid ge' ga: tid to . nyang: gi tungbau byumyu" ri tu: to' vhoeb' khang" nhang: lho: nyanu" gi nyang: moo - nheig shid: nheig deig da" nheig byu , nheig nhei: khyoo: yoo" wa - ga: tid to .
45015010	Jhoem: mungdang: moo doem tid zi gi Tungbau byumyu" yi we" Aseing: da" byu phung: yi yo' dage" ngeipyo: gau yi nyid ge" ga wigi we' .
45015011	Nghizain byumyu" bain sho' bang: we" Aseing: ri coung" nghei byid: ge' byumyu" bai ri sho mo we" nyang: ri coung" byid: nyid ge' ga: tid to .
45015012	Xo' lho: Esaia tid zi gi Yesu da" nya: myid: nya: zoo: dayug gi nyid ri" wa - tungbau byumyu" ri vhoeb' khang: wa shid' re" - nyang: gi tungbau byumyu" ri tu: to' vhoeb' khang" nhang: lho: nyanu" gi nyang: moo - nheig shid: nheig deig da" nheig byu , nheig nhei: khyoo: yoo" wa - ga: tid to .
45015013	Gyeungshang: da" Venyi: phung" yoeb gi nanu" da" loem" jeung" nheig shid: nheig deig da" khyoo: ri geing: teing tho' moo geing: teing loo wa shid' re" loem" jeung" nheig shid: neig deig nhang: da" Mangsoo: gi nanu" da" loem" jeung" yoomo nanu" ri gau yi ngei pyo: joeb byeung" nhang: zi yo" myenjham" khyoo: ri byid: baja" o" .
45015014	Mang: nhung" yi we" nanu" gi ge da" khyoo: ri nghoid loug we' nyain: phajhi" yo" nghoid loug we' - Joeb byeung" lho: - nyang: cang" nyang: yo" jhoug" yo" mho' go" da" khyoo: ri ngoo loem jeing" nyid .
45015015	Nghoidloug we' he: mougsoug" moo moozoo" dayham" yo" lho: nanu" ri tid poin" da" khyoo: moo ngoo gi mougsoug" bang bang lhid" to" zi nghoid .
45015016	Hau: da" amyeing" zeing gi nghizain byumyu" yi jang" moo moo" voin wa shid' re" Khristu Yesu da" dei zoo: yo" bue" da" khyoo: nyang: nghoid bye . Gyeungshang: Venyi: khyo" tungbau byumyu" yi Mangsoo: vhoo: ngei da" xoin" du: bue" loo wa shid' re" ngoo gi khainjung dayug yhang: ti" - Mangso: ngei bu: lu dang: ri kho" kyo" moo" voin vu nyid .
45015017	Houg: yoomo ngoo gi Khristu Yesu yo" dadeing: daloem: za: nyid lho: - Mangso: da" moo" ri yo" voin nyid yoomo ngoo yo" nghoid boin: nyid bye .
45015018	Tungbau byumyu" yi gi Mangso: da" mungdang: ri tam" gyo: lo boem wa shid' re" Khristu gi ngoori tid khyo" we' zei moo" khyo" we' ci nyid khyoo: ri ngoo agyug asho' loo tid kyoo" wa .
45015019	Houg: su" Mangso: da" mungdang: ri yo" tam" gyo: lo da" khyoo: gi ngoo tid dang: zei so' yoomo we' goo" ki lid toin" shid' da" mau" pho" moozoo" yoomo we' young" gyeing" Venyi: da" yoem: vhoo" yoomo we' nghoid nyid . - Houg: su" nghoid yoomo ngoo gi Yerusalem voomoo" mo Iluri moug: jo yoo khyi khang" moo" moo ju" sho' Khristu da" ngei bu: lu dang: ri kho" kyoo" bye .
45015020	Subi" qei" to" da" ayang: tho' moo anau poug koid . Nga" nheigloem: moo gi Khristu da" khyoo: ashug" gyo: yu" shi" da" jo yoomoo za: ngei bu lu dang: ri kho" kyoo" wa shid' re" myid to" .
45015021	Jhoem: mungdang: moo Ashug" gyo: yu" nghoid loug we' nyanu" gi se' gyo: boem wa - ga: lhid" to" zi yo" dakhyoo" ti nghoid nyid .
45015022	He: da" khyoo: yoomo ngoo gi myoo" sho' lheing: yoem: kaid' yu" nghoid loug we' nanu" jang" moo ayo" ju" ri .
45015023	Nghoidloug we' ngoo gi he: jo yoo moo zi ci: ca" da" moo" ri bain zei pyam bye . Nanu" jhang khyoo: ri" wa shid' re" zain void myang" sho' mo nyang: nheigloem: moo bo jo zi yo" dakhyoo" ti" -
45015024	Akhid" nanu" jang" moo ju" re" wa ein: myid byu to . Ngoo spin: mung" khyoo: gyung: so" lo" da" uri - nanu" jhang khyo" vang jang: wa shid' re" myid soin: to . Nanu" jang" moo daso' re" theing: jang: lho: - Sping: mung" khyoo: gyung: xo' so" loo" wa shid' re" - ngoori pang" thoug kaid' nhang: nau .
45015025	Nghoidloug we' akhid" lei lei zoo: ngoo gi - Mangso: da" phung: byu yi ri pang" thoug byid wa shid' re" Yerusalem voomoo" khyoo: yhi: ca" .
45015026	Khasu" wim lha" ga: ri - Makedoni mung" yo' Greed' mung" phung: byu yi gi - Yerusalem boomoo" moo zheing: nyid sho" jhen: da" Mangso: phung: byu yi ri Alu: jhung: shug yhe: di" byid: wa myid phyed' to" zi nghoid .
45015027	Nyanu" hougsu" pang" thoug go" da" khyoo: gi - gootu: yoomo anghoid . Nyang: nheig myen: khyo" yoomo za: danghoid . 45015028	Houg: yoomo ngoo gi yo" khyu: yu da" alu: ngei ri - nyanu" ri yhe: yo" byid lho: ri she Sping: mung" khyoo: gyung: xo' so" loo" wa nghoid . Khyoo: eung: yoomo nanu" jang" mo: vang jang: loo wa .
45015029	Ngoo nanu" jhang ju" lang" Aseing Yesu da" jang" mo joeb byeung" da" mainkaid jeju" shau" kham: zo: boem wa shid' re" ngoo vang jang: loo zi nghoid .
45015030	Mang: nhung" yi we" - Aseing Yesu Khristu ri ngoonu" loem khoug ; yoomo we' - Young" gyeing" Venyi gi ngoonu" ri nheig . khyeug jheddab yoomo we' nga" shid' re" ngoo yo" dage" Mangso: jang" moo yoem: kaid' akyu" mho' wa shid' re" nanu" ri ngoo yoem: byid: kaid' .
45015031	Aseing Yesu ri khyag aloem" jeing" da" Yuda byu yi ngoori kuang jang" mo yo" loid , loo" wa shid' re" we' - ngoo gazi: pang" thoug da" khyoo: ri Yerusalem voo moo nyid da" yung" lho' Mangso: da" phung: byu yi goug goug yi yi yo" lhoem: kham: yu wa shid' re" akyu" bo mho' byid: ge' .
45015032	Hau: thang: ri Mangsoo: vho: ngei nghoid ri gi - ngoo gi goug goug yi yi nanu" jhang ju" re" lho: nanu" yo" dage" shau" nyid wa nghoid .
45015033	Myenjham" da Aseing: Mangsoo: gi nanu" dangain" mo yo" dage" danyid" nyid" baja" o" - Amen .
45016001	Kenkhrea phung: mo phungtau nghoid da" nga" nham" moo" phobe: ri nanu" jhang khyoo: nhang: kaid' . Nyang: gi phung: moo aja: ja: gye bo se' pang" zei: su nghoid .
45016002	Nanu" gi Mangso: da" phung" byu yi nyang: cang" koid' kham: yu go" moo" khyo" nyang: ri we' Aseing: da" myeing mo kham: yu ge' . Nyang: moo ca" da" khyoo: bo ri coem' pang" thoug byid: ge' . Nyang: gi byu myoo" sho' ri pang" thoug lid: loo su: nghoid . Ngoori we' gye pang" thoug yu" su: nghoid .
45016003	Khristu Yesu da" moozoo" coem' zei: jang" moo nga" moo" zei: byen cang" Priska yo" Akula tang: ri we' ngoo u" kaid' .
45016004	Nya: eig yug gi nga" shid' re" kang: ab so' ab sho' moozoo" bo voin vu yu" su: eig yug nghoid . Nya: eig yug ri ngoo kyeing" za: anghoid nghizain: byumyu" phung: byu dangain" mo we' jeju" boin: nyid boem .
45016005	Nyanu" da" yhoem: moo lhoung no' ku" nyid da' phung: byu yi ri we' ngoo u" kaid' da" khyoo: ri bo tid khyoo" byid: ge' . Asha' moug: moo xang: shid" phung: vang loo su: nga" da' bidnoem phoo Eponetu ri we' bo u" byid ge' .
45016006	Nanu" da shid' re" moo" ri gye bo zei: byid: su nghoid da' Mari ri we' bo u" byid: ge' .
45016007	Nga" byukung: mo ngoo yo" dage" thung: loung" yu" da" Androniku yo' Yuni eig yug riwe' bo u" byid: ge' . Nyang: eig yug gi Lagyoo: amain" khyo" myeing fu" lho: nga" shid' mo Khristan bue" loo su: eig yug nghoid .
45016008	Khristu yo" dadeing: daloem: za nyid su nyang: yo" zoem" jeung" bidnoem Ampliatu: ri we' bo u" byid ge' .
45016009	Khristu da" moozoo" ri voin vu da jang" moo nga" moo" voin luzoem" cang" nghoid da' Orban yo' ngoo jed' dab da" bidnoem Staku ri we' bo u" byid: ge' .
45016010	Khristu moo byu gyeing" nghoid da" Apele ri we' bo u" byid: ge' . Aristobulu da yhoem bang: ri we' bo u" byid ge' .
45016011	Ngoo yhang: ti" Yuda byumyu" dayug nghoid da" Herodoin ri we' bo u" byid: ge' . Narkiso da" yhoem: mo Khristan mang: nhung" yi ri we' bo u" kaid' byid: ge' .
45016012	Aseing: Mangso: da" moo" bo voin vu su: Truphena yo" Truphosa eig yug ri we' bo u" kaid' ge' . Hau Aseing: moo" moo gye yoem: bo kaid' da" nga" jheddab byen cang" Persi ri bo u" byid ge' .
45016013	Hau: Aseing: moo Ruphu ri we' - ngoori nya: zoo: dayug ti" yu" coung: su: Ruphu nya: myhi' ri we' bo u" byid ge' .
45016014	Asunkritu: - Phelegu - Herea - Patroba - Herma yo' nyanu" yo' dage" nyid da' gootu: Khristan: mang: nhung" yi dangain" mo ri bo u" byid: ge' .
45016015	Philogu - yo" Yulia - Nerea yo' nya: nham" moo" Olumpa yo' nyanu" yo" dage" nyid da" Mangso: da" phung: byu dangain" mo ri we' bo u" byid: ge' .
45016016	Nanu' dayug yo" dayug jhed' jhed' kug kug yung" lho' boobug yo" u" goo" ge' Khristu da" phung: byu dangain" mo gi nanu" ri u" kaid' boem ago" .
45016017	Mang: nhung" yi we" nanu" shau" jhau" yu da: tid poin" tid khyeing" mungdang: ri nung phug pyam' lho: subi" ri aveing" goo" nhang: da" zi - khyoo vhang: shu" vhang: loo" mo ri zid" nyid ge' . Houg: bang: ri jhang" pyam' ge' .
45016018	Houg: bang: gi ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da moo" voin mo anghoid . Nyanu' nya: da" zoo: noem kha: ja: shau" zoo wa ashug" zoo: wa da" khyoo: ri za: te: myid yu" mo nghoid . Nyanu" gi nu" nham' cau: main da" dang: ri tid coung" myeing" coung" thui: yo" wigi deingmain" nyid mo ri lang" yo" mhoug zoo: se' ago" .
45016019	Nanu' gi ge da ngei bu: lu dang: ri khayhi' ju" sho' loem" jeung" geing: teing ci: da" khyoo: ri byu dangain" mo nyang: shau" gyo: ci: boem bye: - houg: yoomo ngoo gi nanu" da' shid' re" gye gau yi nyid .
45016020	Myenjham" Aseing: Mangsoo: khamyhang amyang" ri Nanu" da" khavoo: khoug: moo satan: ri nang: zeug pyam' nhang: wa ngoonu" da" Aseing: Yesu da" jeju" ri Nanu" shau" kham zoo: baja" o" .
45016021	Ngoo ri pang" thoug nyid da" byen cang - Timothi' yo" nga" byumyu" nghoid da" Luki - Yason yo" Sosipata gi nanu" ri u" kaid' ago" .
45016022	He: mougsoug" lhid" su: gi ngoo Tertiu nyang: lhid" da" zi nghoid . Ngoo we' phung: byu dayug khyo" nanu" ri u" kaid' zi nghoid .
45016023	Ngoo ri being" di" su: - phung: byu yi akyu" mho' zeing: foem: nyid da" yhoem: seing: Ge u we' nanu" ri u" kaid' Hau: voomo ngei deig zoem: su: Erastu eig yug Kuartu we' nanu" ri u" kaid' .
45016024	Ngoo nu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" jeju" ri nanu" dangain" mo shau" kham: zo: boem baja" o" Amen .
45016025	Mangsoo: da" phung" yoeb myho , nhoo: ri ngoo nu" coung" nghei" boem shang ngoo khyo" kyo" tid Khristu Yesu da" lu dang: gi khyo" we' shid' phyang" pyaid mo , zau" to" da" no thang deungmain" tarha" khyoo: ri toin" shid' khyo" we' Mangsoo: gi ngoonu" da" loem jeing" khyoo: ri o" geing: teing nhang .
45016026	Nghoidloug we' Akhid" uri hau: tarha" gi Lapi yi da" jhoem: dang: khyo" wigi bang myang thu' loo nhang: abye: . Byumyu" bain sho' mo gi Mangso: da" mungdang: ri yo" tam" gyo: lo boem wa shid' re" apyaid' atoo: dei nyid da" Mangso: amyeing" yo" dakhyoo" ti" hau tarha" ri tid fu" kaid' bye .
45016027	Dayug kyeing" nghoid lho: dangain" ri yo" myang se' da" Mangsoo: gi Aseing Yesu Khristu khyo" wigi apyaid' atoo: moo bug thu' sheing" jhu" da" myo nhoo: phung" yoeb dajo jo nyid baja" o" Amen .
46001001	Mangsoo vho: ngei ziyo' dakhyoo" Khristu Yesu da" lagyo: aya moo: khe: too" shau" da - ngoo Polu yo' ngoonu" da" mang: nhung" phoo , Sosteni gi
46001002	Korinthu voo mo Mangso da" phung moo: boo mo , yo' joyoo khyi , khang" moo" mo , ngoonu" yo' nyangnu" da" Aseing: nghoid nyid da - Aseing Yesu Khirstu ri noku loem khau: da - Yesu Khristu khyo" wigi: Mangso da" gyeungshang: byumyu" bue" loo wa shid re" khe: yu zi shoug" bang: dangain" mo , jhang khyoo: dang: pyeung: kaid .
46001003	Ngoonu" da" phoo , Mangsoo yo' Aseing Yesu Khristu jang" mo , - ngei pyo: myenjham" khyoo: gi dajo , jo , baja" o" .
46001004	Ngoo gi nanu" ri Khristu khoug: khyo" Mangsoo nanu" ri byid: da - main , kaid jeju" shid re" nga" Mangsoo ri: khanham we' jeju" boin: coung" ngei nyid .
46001005	Nanu" gi Yesu Khristu yo' dadeing: daloem: za: bue" jo , bye: yoomo - nanu" gi nhoid' khoin" thui: moo: we' phajhi" juyi: dangain" jang" moo: we' khyoo: khaid ja: khang" moo" moo: yoo" mo , di mo , bue" lo boem bye .
46001006	Ngoonu" kho" kyo" kaid da" Khristu da" khyoo: ngei bu: ludang: gi ri - nanu" moo: geing: geing: teing teing agyi: zoug jo , bye .
46001007	Houg: yoomo ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu thu' myang loo wa ziri: dalang" nyid da" ayo , moo - nanu" moo: ashau" kham: yu da" main , kaid jeju" gi ci" we' aboo loo .
46001008	Ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu doem ju" re" wigi - Tarha" dang: phyed' lo da" bidnyid moo - yooboo foin: cang aboo loo: sho' - nyang: gi nanu" ri lo" thang moo: ju" sho' - geung: teung jo , nhang: wa zi nghoid .
46001009	Ngoonu" da" Aseing: ein: da" - nya: zoo: Yesu Khristu yo' shau" zoem" khoug: goo" baja" ga - nanu" ri khe: yu da" Mangsoo koem gi:-loem gi" su: nyang: nghoid nyid .
46001010	Mang nhung yi we" - ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" amying" akhang" yo' nanu" dangain" bang: ri ngoo mho' sang: kaid . Nanu" moo: emyid , aveing" goo" wigi - byo , sain" lo" zi abue" loo wa shid re nanu" ji , sang: da" khyoo: moo - nyang: cang" nyang: sham" shoin" goo" ge' . Nanu" da" myid soin: lo" khyoo: moo - nheigloem: dadeing: dakhaid za: koid nyid ge' .
46001011	Ci: yoomo ga: ri - nga" mang: nhung" yi we" - nanu" myeing" tid myoo: go" nyid da" khyoo: ri - khloe da" yheom: mo byu yi dayham" bang: gi ngoori bang bang nyang: re" tid kyo" boem bye .
46001012	Ngoo hid: su" ein: tid yu" ba' - Nanu" mo byu dayham" bang: gi" Ngoo gi Polu da" cang zoo nghoid - Ngoo gi Apolu da" cang: zoo: nghoid . Ngoo gi Kepha da" cang: zoo: nghoid - Ngoo gi Khristu da" cang: zoo: nghoid ga: wigi: nanu" dayug yo" dayug gi adu , go" khyo" tid ngeig: go" nyid boem ago" .
46001013	Khirstu gi adu , atoem koid pyam' zi shoug" bye: la" ( Lo , lhid" khyo" lhed" to" da" gootu: xang: shid" mougsoug" moo - Khristu gi adu , atoem yo" phyed , pyam' zi anghoid ga: bo jo , ) Polu gi nanu" shid re" pyeing:" zeing moo: shid: kham: bye: la" Nanu" gi Polu da" myeing khyang" mo Babtisma yu bye: go" la"
46001014	Khirstu yo' Ge-u mo lai lho: wigi - nanu" mo hang" ri we' ngoo gyid myhoeb akham byid: yoomo - Mangso jeju" ri coung" byid: nyid .
46001015	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi nga" da" myeing khyang" mo Babtisma yu bye: ga - hang" we' ayo" tid nghoid ago" .
46001016	( O" nghoid , Stephain yo' nya: yhoem: byu yi ri we' - ngoo gyid myhoeb kham byid: bye . Hau: tho' gooji bang" ri gyid myhoeb kham byid: zi ngoo asoo" loo . )
46001017	Khasu" wim gari - Khristu ngoori nhang: kaid da" khyoo: gi Babtisma cang kham byid: yen" wa shid mo anghoid . Hau: da" ludang: gi ri - cang kho" kyo" yen" wa shid re" Khristu gi ngoori nhang: kaid . Nghoid loug we' - Khristu gi pyeing:" zeing tho' moo: shid: kham: jang" mo yoem: vhoo" gi akoem: za: abue" lo" byug wa shid re" - byu da" nhoid , khoin" thu: yoem: vhoo" ri aci: loo: za: ngoo kho" kyo" yen .
46001018	Khasu" wim ga: ri Khristu gi pyeing:" zeing tho' moo: shid: kham: ein: da - hau: pyeing:" zeing da" dang: kang: gi kangso venyi: soem" loo" mo , shid re" gi ce" akhyoo" avang da" dang: za: bue" nyid . Nghoid loug we' khyoid khyi: yu zi shoug" bang: da" shid re" koem gi Mangso da" yoem: moo" so' moo" nyang: nghoid bye .
46001019	Khasu" wim gari - hau: jhoem: mungdang: moo - se' yeig da" zoug: yi da" lasi , laleig ri ngoo cishu: anhang: pyam' byid: wa nghoid - ga: lhid" to" .
46001020	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo - lasi , laleig phajhi" boo su: ga: zigi: khayoo: nyid lha" Mougsoug" lhid" da" sara: ga: zi khayoo: nyid lha" He: mougmyid tho' moo: dang: yo" tid shi , goo" su: ga: zi - khayoo: nyid la" Mangsoo gi he: da" mougmyid tho' mo phajhi" juyi: ri - akoo" afang: anyhoin: athung" zi bue" loo" nhang: bye: anghoid la"
46001021	Khasu" wim ga: ri byu xangsu: yi gi nyang: nya: da" phajhi" juyi: yo' za: Mangsoo ri se' loo baja" ga: - Mangsoo gi nyang: phajhi" khyau" too" bye . Hau: da" gung khyoo: moo - Mangsoo gi ngoonu" kho" kyo" da" akoo" apyoid' da" mungdang: yo' loem" jeing" loo mo , ri khyoid yu wa shid re" myid phyed' to" abye .
46001022	Yuda byu yi gi sagsi: bui" nhang: wa shid re" - alhoo: again' ri vho: nyid ziyo' - Heleni byu yi gi lasi , laleig phajhi" ri sho: nyid boem ago" .
46001023	Ngoonu" koem gi pyeing: zeing tho' moo: shid: kham bye: Khristu da" khyoo: ri kho" kyo" nyid boem . Hidsu" kho" kyo" da" mungdang: gi Yuda yi shid re" nheigloem: thei , leung joyoo nghoid wigi - tungbau byumyu" yi shid re" ce" akhyoo" abo da" dang: za: nghoid nyid .
46001024	Nghoid loug we' - Mangso khe: yu shau" da" Yuda yi shid re" gi hau: mungdang: gi Mangso yoem: so' yo' Mangso phajhi" juyi: nghoid da - Khristu nyang: nghoid bye .
46001025	Khasu" wim gari - sube" wigi: yu" myang ri - Mangso da" akoo" apyoid' da" zigi - xangsu: byu yi da" phajhi" juyi: tho' moo: je" wigi - gyi: da" phajhi" nghoid jo , Mangso yoem: neing: zigi - xangsu: byu yi yoem: boo ga: mo , tho' moo: yoem: je bo nyid .
46001026	Akhid" gi mangnhung" yi we" - nanu" ri Mangsoo khe: yu da" ayo , mo khyoo: joem ri myid yu" ge' Xangsu: byu yi da" myojid" khyo" yu" kaid shang ein: rigi - nanu" gi phajhi" lasi , laleig boo mo , Amyeing" akhang" yoo" mo , zau: byumyu" mo thu loo mo , myoo" sho' bo zi anghoid .
46001027	Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi zhoo: gyi: koid khyo" - phajhi" lasi , laleig boo bang: ri: sho' thu' nhang: wa shid re" mougmyid mo , akoo" apyoid , mo , ga: soin: too" bang: ri khyen: yu bye . Yoem: moo" boo bang: ri sho' thu' nhang: wa shid re-mougmyid moo: yoem: neing: bang: ga: soin: too" mo , ri khyen: yu bye .
46001028	Mougmyid moo: gye" nyang: akhyag nghoid ga: myid ci: mo , ri - phyo' shoin' pyam wa shid re" yu" nge khyo' to" da" ci" asoin: bang: ri khyen: yu abye .
46001029	Hid: yhang: ti" koid da" khyoo: gi Mangso da" shid khoin" moo - hang" we' ayo" phau khuang wa shid re" nghoid nyid .
46001030	Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri - Khristu yo' dadeing: daloem: za: bue" loo nhang: bye: yoomo Mangsoo gi Khristu ri ngoonu" da" phajhi" lasi , laleig bue" loo nhang: bye . nyang: khyo" wigi: Mangso da" shid khoin" moo - deing byeung" bang: yo" bue" loo bye - Mangso da" gyeungshang: byumyu" yo" bue" lo boem bye: ziyo' - ngoonu" gi lhoid pyoin kaid zi we' shau" boem bye .
46001031	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo - jhoem: mungdang: moo: tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti hang" nghoid loug we' - phau: khuang nau rigi - Aseing wigi: zei: bye: da" moozoo" yoomo - phau: khuang nyid goo" baja" .
46002001	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo mang: nhung" yi we" - Mangsoo yhoem" to" da" mungdang: tid kyoo" wa shid re" ngoo nanu" jang" moo: ju" re" uri - gye" no , da" dang: khoin" joem , yo' phajhi" yo' sen: da" dang: zeing khoin" joem ri ngoo aci .
46002002	Khasu" wim gari - ngoo nanu" yo' nyid da" ayo , moo: Yesu Khristu da" khyoo: ri je" wigi - pyang" zeing tho' moo: Aseing shid: kham: tho' mo , jain" wigi - khyoo: goo tu: jo , moo: jo , ri to" myhed , pyam wa shid re" ngoo myid phyed' pyam bye .
46002003	Houg: yoomo ngoo nanu" jang" moo: re" ju" nyid da" ayo , bain sho moo - yoem: nu: ziyo' gyoug nain" zoore" danyid nyid .
46002004	Ngoo tid kyo" ziyo' kho" kyo" da" mungdang: joem ri - byu yi da" phajhi" akhyoo" again ri aci: loo: za: Mangso Venyi da" yoem: vhoo" ri - bang da" sagsi: joem yo' ngoo kho" kyoo" bye .
46002005	Houg: yoomo Mangsoo ri nanu" loem" jeung" lo da" khyoo: gi byu yi da" phajhi" moo: nghe: kau: khyo" anghoid loo: za: Mangso da" yoem: so' moo: nghe: khau: nyid zi nghoid .
46002006	Nghoid loug we' ngoo gi Venyi: moo: nheig boo ung: gyeing: bye: bang: rigi - phajhi" mungdang: yo' tid kyo" . Nghoid loug we' hau: zigi: he: moug: myid yo' sen: da" phajhi" anghoid . Moug: myid tho' mo zau: ludaid' yi da" lasi , laleig gi bei: lo" koung" nyid bye .
46002007	Ngoo kho" kyo" da" phajhi" gi moug: myid byu yi asi' loo: sho' yhoem" to" da" Mangso no , thang phajhi" khyoo: nghoid - hau: zigi: moug: phain" myid aphain" shi" mo ngoonu" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , yo" kham: yu wa shid re" Mangsoo khyen: yu too" bye: zi nghoid .
46002008	Moug: myid tho' mo zoug: khokham yi hang" nghoid loug we' - he: da" lasi , laleig ri yo" se' zi anghoid . Dato , se' boem nghoid rigi - myonhoo: phung" yoeb , bo da" Aseing ri - nyangnu" gi pyang" zeing tho' moo: baid' jen" said pyam wa zi anghoid .
46002009	Nghoid loug jhoem: mungdang: moo - hang" we' amyang yu" ashoug" gyo: yu" da" khyoo: bue" loo wa zi nghoid ga: wigi - Hang" amyid , ju" da" khyoo: ri - Mangsoo gi nyang: ri jheddab bang: shid re" - nyheung too" bye ga: lhid" to" .
46002010	Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo koem gi nya: da" Venyi: khyo" wigi - nya: da" nghoeb , yhoem" to" khyoo: ngoonu" ri phang shug bye . Hau: da" Venyi gi ziyoo jo , moo: jo , ri za: we' anghoid - Mangso da" no , thang khyo" myid soin: to" khyoo: joem ri - cang phoid: sho: yu" nyid .
46002011	Byu dayug da" nheigloem: moo: bo da" khyoo: dangain" ri - hau: Venyi wigi: za: yo" si' byid: nyid . Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" Mangso da" Venyi wigi: za: Mangso khyoo: dangain" ri yo" se' nyid .
46002012	Ngoonu" koem gi he: moug: myid yo' sen: da" Venyi: ri shau" kham: yu bye: zi anghoid - Mangsoo ngoonu" ri byid: to" da" jeju" dangain" ri yo" si' baja" ga - Mangso nhang: kaid da" Venyi ri ngoonu" yo" yu mo , nghoid nyid .
46002013	Houg: yoomo Venyi: ri shau" kham: yu ngoonu" yo" yu mo , nghoid nyid . da" deing: byeung" khyoo: joem ri - kho" kyo" nyid boem uri - ngoonu" gi byu yi da" phajhi" dang: yo' atid loo: za: Venyi wigi: jhoug" byid: da" dang: joem yo' dakho" kyo" nyid boem .
46002014	Hau: Venyi khyo" kangso adei mo , hang" nghoid loug we' - Mangso Venyi wigi: byid: da" jhung: shug ri ashau" kham: yu boem . Hau: gu: gi nya: shid re" akoo" apyoid da" khyoo: za: nghoid wigi - Venyi nheigloem: wigi: za: - hau: khyoo: ri yo" tid pang byid: nyid yoomo - nyang: gi hau: gu: ri se' gyoo: su: anghoid .
46002015	Venyi boo su: koem gi ziyoo jo , moo: jo , da" aphoug" ri yo" phyed' byid: nyid . Nyang: ri koem gi hang" we' aphoug" yo" phyed' byid: zi anghoid .
46002016	Jhoem: mungdang: moo - Khayug gi hau" Aseing myid' to" khyoo: ri - yo" si' byid: wa la" khayug gi nyang: ri phajhi" yo" byid: wa la" ga: wigi: lhid" to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" nghoid . Ngoonu" koem gi Khristu da" myid to" khyoo: ri yo" yu mo , nghoid bye .
46003001	Gyeing" nyang tid shang ein: rigi: mang: nhung yi we" - Venyi myid boo mo , ri yhang: ti" ngoo yo" tid zi anghoid - he: moug: myid yo' sen: da" byu yi Khristain loem khau: khyoo: moo zoonu" yhang: ti" - ngoo nanu" ri tid sang ca" nyid .
46003002	Akhid" nanu" gi pyeig yau da" thain: zoo: noem ri ayo" zoo: shi" yoomo - thain: da" zoo: noem anghoid loo: za: noug" riza: ngoo nanu" ri dabyid: shi" . Akhid" lang" nanu" gi atho' jen" shi" nghoid ago" .
46003003	Houg: su" yoomo nanu" gi moug: myid byu yi khyo" danyid nyid boem shi" yoomo - nanu" nyang: cang" noo" goo" zoo go" ziyo' myeing" myoo: yhoo: she: khyoo: dakoid nyid boem ago" . Hau: khyoo: gi nanu" he: moug: myid yo' sen: khyo" kangso dadei nyid shi" ein: da" sagsi: kham nyid zi anghoid goo" la"
46003004	Nanu" mo byu dayug yug gi" ngoo gi Polu da" thang: cang su: nghoid - gootu: dayug gi ngoo gi Apolo thang: cang su: nghoid ga - tid nyid shi" rigi - nanu" gi moug: myid byu yi ti" kangso dadei nyid shi" anghoid goo" la"
46003005	Tid shang ein: rigi - Apolo gi hang" nghoid la" Polu gi hang" nghoid la" Ngoonu" gi Mangso dei zoo: yi za: danghoid nyid boem ziyo' nyang: tu: nyang: ri byid: to" da" moo" ri zei: nyid mo , za: nghoid . ngoonu" khyo" wigi - nanu" Mangsoo ri shau" loem" jeung" loo goo" baja" - khyoo: shid' shu" vhu" shi: bang: za: da nghoid . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" dayug yo' dayug gi Aseing wigi: nyang: tu: nyang: ri byid: to" da" moo" voin mo , nghoid .
46003006	Ngoo gi myoug: shi" sain" lho: Apolo gi gyid shoin" - Mangsoo wigi: dayoug loo nhang .
46003007	Houg: yhang: ti" sho" too" su: yo' gyid shoin" su: gi ci" we' anghoid - youg gyi: loo nhang: da" Mangsoo za: akhyag zeing nghoid nyid .
46003008	Amyoug: ri sain" kaid su: yo' gyid shoin" su: eig yug gi ci: shai" go" khyoo: ajo , Mangsoo gi byu dayug yo' dayug ri - nyang: tu: nyang: yoem: kaid zei too" bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" coung" nghei ngi: shab , jhung: shug ri byid: wa zi nghoid .
46003009	Khasu" wim gari - ngoonu" gi Mangso shid re" moo" zoem" zei: bang: nghoid nyid boem" . Nanu" gi Mangso da" tung yoo yoothung" yo' Mangso da" zhoo" cuang vo phang yhoem: we' nghoid nyid ago" .
46003010	Mangsoo ngoori: byid: da" jeju" jhung: shug ri ci: lho: gye" se' da" yhoem: zhoug lag sama phoo yhang: ti" ngoo gi apoem: ayang: ri qei" too" byid: bye . Gootu: byu dayug yug gi hau: da" apoem: moo: doem bo zhang qei" do , lo" nyid nghoid loug we' zhang qei" do , loo" mo , dayug yo , dayug gi nyang: tu: nyang: khasu" zhang qei" do , lo" nyid ziri: - zid" lhid' nyid goo" baja" .
46003011	Khasu" wim gari - Mangsoo gi Yesu Khristu ri dayug kyeung" da" apoem: nyang: mo , ayang: qei" too" bye: ziyo' - gootu: apoem: ayang: yo" qei" too" loo: wa zi anghoid .
46003012	Byu dayham" gi hau: apoem: ayang: da" atho' moo - ngei sheing: lug nyoug joem yo' zhang qei" do , loo" goo" wa nghoid . Byu dayham" gi seig - mhain" - khoofoo: - yo' zhang qei" do , loo" goo" wa nghoid .
46003013	Byu yug khang" mo" da"-zhang qei" do , lo" khyoo: ge age ein: da" khyoo: gi Khristu da" bidnyid moo: thoid pang shug wa zi nghoid . Houg: su" kyeung shoug loo wa nghoid yoomo - hau: myi: gi byu yug khang" mo" da" moozoo" ge age ziri: - nghe , kyeung shug wa zi nghoid .
46003014	Hau: da" apoem: ayang: moo: doem poug zhoug do , lo" da" zi joem gi myi: moo: nghe , kyeung yu" ri ange" lo" nghoid rigi - poug lho: bo , zhoug do , loo" su: gi vhu" kung: phoug" yoo" wa zi nghoid .
46003015	Nghoid loug we' byu dayug yug da" moozoo" nge" joem: lo" nghoid rigi - nyang: soem" lo" byug wa nghoid . Nghoid loug we' myi: gyi mo yo" xue: yu yhang: ti" nya: gung du: za: khyoid yu zi shoug" wa .
46003016	Nanu" koem gi Mangso da" - noku yhoem: nghoid nyid wigi - Mangso da" Venyi gi nanu" moo: bo ziri nanu" asi' loo: goo" la .
46003017	Houg: yoomo byu dayug yug gi Mangso da" noku yhoem: ri lhu: phyo' lhu: shoin' nyid nghoid rigi - Mangsoo gi hau: yug ri phyo' shoin pyam wa . Khasu" wim gari - Mangso da" noku yhoem: gi young" lho , zi nghoid wigi - nanu" nyang: hau: noku yhoem: nghoid nyid ago" .
46003018	Hang" nghoid loug we' - nyang: gung nyang: ri amhau , nyid goo - nanu" mo byu dayug yug gi he: moug: myid da" zhang khyo" soin: lho: nyang: nya: gung ri phajhi" boo su: nghoid ga - si' boin" nyid nghoid rigi - gyeing" nyang: phajhi" boo su: bui" wa shid re" akoo" apyoid da" byu bui" ca" nyid .
46003019	Khasu" wim gari - he: moug: myid tho' moo - phajhi" bo , da" ga: jho: nyid khyoo: gi Mangso shid moo: ce" akhyoo" abo , da" khyoo: za: nghoid nyid . Hau: jhoem: mungdang: moo: tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo ti" Mangsoo gi ung: yeig phajhi" boo mo , ri - nyangnu" da" phajhi" moo: myi" ye" jo , nhang - ga: wigi: tid to .
46003020	Hau: lho: gootu: da" jhoem: mungdang: moo: we' phajhi" boo bang: myid da" khyoo: gi ce" aphoug" adab , da" khyoo: ri - Hau Aseing gi se' nyid ga: wigi: lhid" to" .
46003021	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo hang" nghoid loug we' - byu wigi: yo" koid da" yoem: ri myonhoo: age , shoo: - gyeing" nyang: ga: rigi - jo , moo: jo , ri - nanu" seung: nyid bye: zi nghoid .
46003022	Polu we' Apolu we' Kepha we' - he: da" moug: myid we' kangso dei nyid ziyo' shid: lo" khyoo: we' - akhid" jo , da" zi yo' thang: phyang" ju" loo wa da" khyoo: joem we' jo , moo: jo , ri nanu" seung: ci: bye .
46003023	Khristu gi nanu" ri seung: ci: wigi - Mangsoo gi Khristu ri seung: ci .
46004001	Ngoonu" gi Mangso no , thang da" yhoem" nghoeb , to" deingmain" khyoo: ri - yu" nyheing wa shid re" khyen: to" da" - Khristu dei zoo: yi nghoid ga: nanu" myid yu , eung: nyid da .
46004002	Houg: su" yoovoin yu lho: wigi - voin vu , nhang: da" dei zoo: yi moo: boo ca" da" nheigloem: daja" gi Aseing da" atho' moo: zid" lhid' lho: nheigloem: zung" ca" da" khyoo: nghoid .
46004003	Akhid" nanu" moug: myid , byu yi da" azhang khyo" - ngoori: tarha" dang: phyed khyoo: moo - ngoo ce" yhoug: gyen: atoo" . Ngoo nya: gung ri we' ngoo ce: tarha" dang: phyed khyoo: ajo .
46004004	Khasu" wim gari - nga" phug soo" lheig myid yu" khyoo: moo - gyeing: gyeing: za: danghoid . Nghoid loug we' hau: khyoo: gi ngoo yooboo ayoo" ein: khyoo: ri sagsi: kham' nyid zi anghoid . Ngoo ri tarha" dang: phyed su: gi hau: Aseing nghoid nyid .
46004005	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo ayo , aju" shi" ri - nanu" dayug yo' dayug gi hang" ri nghoid loug we' tarha" dang: aphyed byid: nyid goo . Lo" thang bidnyid moo: tarha" dang: phyed wa da" Aseing ju" ri" sho' dalang" nyid ge' . Nyang: gi moug: coid khoug: moo: yhoem" to" da" moozoo" ri we' - byu yi da" nheigloem: khoug: moo: zau" to" da" myid soin: khyoo: ri we' - thoid' shoug thu' loo wa zi nghoid . Hau: bidnyid ri byu yug khang" moo" gi nyang: yo' moin: yi" da" Mangso wigi: coung" nghei ngi: shab , khyoo: ri shau" kham: yu boem wa zi nghoid .
46004006	Mang: nhung" yi we" - nanu" shid mo , ge da" khyoo: ri myid yu" zoore - He: da" khyoo: moo: ngoo yo' Apolo da" khyoo: ri dang: tu , khyo" wigi - tid kyo" zi nghoid . Hougsu" tid kyo" zigi: young" du da" tarha" ri cang pyeung nyid ge ga: da" dang: khyang" mo da" dang: kang: ri - nanu" se' gyo: yu wa shid re" nghoid . Nanu" mo , dayug rigi: khyeig nghoid khyo" myid gyi: to" lho: dayug rigi: aphoug" akhyoid akoid nyid goo .
46004007	Kha: youg wigi: nang ri - sube" tho' moo: je nghoid ga: tid nyid la" nanu" yo" da" zi dangain" gi Mangsoo byid: to" zi anghoid goo" la" Hougsu" nghoid ri nanu" yo" yu to" da" zi dangain" gi jeju" jhung: shug anghoid yhang: ti" nanu" phau: khuang nghoid boin: khyoo: gi ce: noem' yoomo koid nyid go" lha"
46004008	Akhid" nanu" moo: ca" moo: ca" joeb byeung" sho' yoo" bye: anghoid goo" la" Nanu" yo" de , lo bye: go" la" Nghoid bye: ngoonu" gi nanu" yo' dage" khokham yo" bui" sho' - nanu" gyeing nyang: khokham bue" yu" ge mhai" .
46004009	Khasu" wim gari - meing zain: pa moo: oung: lo wigi - doem: yain: do , lo shoug da" uri: - said pyam shoug" wa da" thung: byu yi rigi: - thang: moo: cang yain: loo nhang: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" Mangsoo gi byu xangsu: yi yo' mouglagyoo: yi shid' khoin" moo" coem yu" yu" goo" baja" ga - ngoonu" lagyoo: yi ri gam , thang: moo: nyid nhang: sam" ein: ngoo shau" myid yu .
46004010	Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoonu" gi Khirstu yoomo - koo" pyoid joem bue" byug bye Nanu" koem gi Khristu yo' daloem: za: nghoid nyid jang" moo - Phajhi" boo mo , nghoid nyid abye: go . Ngoonu" gi ce" - yoem: we' aboo - nanu" koem gi yoem: gye" boo mo , nghoid - ngoonu" gi juang" yi zi shoug" mo , nghoid . Nanu" koem: gi coung" nghei ngi: shab , zi shoug" mo , nghoid ago" .
46004011	Akhid" da" ayo , moo: ju" sho' - ngoonu" gi zooyoid , gyid shid - shoo" cen: doem: baid' said' ziri: shau" nyid wigi - nyid wa joyoo we' ayoo" loo: za: dakhyi , mo zi dakhyi , moo: so" lam" yen" bang: nghoid nyid boem .
46004012	Ngoonu" nya: lo , yo' yoem: kaid lho: moo" zei: zo: boem - ngoonu" nheing" myeing" nheing" thui: shau" boem loug we' mainkaid byid: da" dang: gi tid . Pyi: sho: shen" yhen zi shau" boem nghoid loug we' kham zeung: nyid boem .
46004013	Ngoonu" ri juang" yi gei sang: zi shau" boem nghoid loug we' - ngei pyo: dang: thui: yo' datid sang: nyid boem - ngoonu" gi akhid" ju" sho' - moug: myid mo boid , shoid' boem yo' subi" she: pyam lhu: sain" to" da" - phoojoid phalhoug: boem te" zi danghoid lo: boem .
46004014	Nanu" ri sho' thu' nhang: wa shid re" - ngoo he: da" moug soug" ri lhid" kaid zi anghoid . Ngoo jheddab da" zooshang: yi ri yhang: ti" ngoo nanu" ri tid poin" tid kyeung" da" khyoo: nghoid .
46004015	Khasu" wim gari - nanu" Khristain kangso dei yhe: lo" da" khyoo: moo - nanu" ri jhau" byid: wa shid re" sara: damoin koo: nyid nghoid loug we' - nanu" da" nya: phoo gi dayug kyeing" za: date: nghoid . Ngoo gi hau: ngei bu: lu dang: gi ri kho" kyo" khyo" wigi - nanu" ri Khristu yo' shoin" deung: lo" da" kangso khyoo: moo - ju" loo" nhang: zi nghoid nyid da" nanu" nya: phoo bui" bye .
46004016	Houg: yoomo nga" da" akhyoo" bo cang loo mo , bui" goo" baja" ein: - ngoo nanu" ri mho' tung" pain: nyid .
46004017	Hau: khyoo: yoomo - ngoo gi Khristain kangso dei da" khyoo: moo - nga" da" jheddab ziyo' - nheigloem: zung" da" zooshang - Timothi ri nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoo nhang: kaid bye . Nyang: gi Khristu Yesu yo' shoin" deung: da" kangso aseig moo - ngoo cang lo" da" tarha" yo' joyoo khyi khang" moo" moo: nyid da - phung: byu yi ri - ngoo jhoug" byid: bye: da" tarha" joem" ri - boem myid boin: loo nhang: wa zi nghoid .
46004018	Nanu" jang" moo: ngoo aju" ri" loo: wa yhang: ti" jho: lho: nanu" mo dayham" bang: gi phau: khuang nghoid boin: nyid boem bye .
46004019	Nghoid loug we' hau: Aseing nhang: kaid nghoid rigi - ngoo nanu" jang" moo: phyed' za: doem yo" ju" ri" wa zi nghoid . Hau: ayo , moo: houg: yhang: ti" phau: khuang nghoid boin: nyid mo , da" nhoid yhoo: yoem: so' ri za: we' anghoid - nyangnu" da" yoem: vhoo" yoem: so' ri we' ngoo shau" phoid: sho: yu wa zi nghoid .
46004020	Khasu" wim gari - Mangso da" mungdain gi nhoid yoem: so' anghoid - yoem: so' vhoo" goo: nghoid nyid .
46004021	Ngoo gi nanu" jang" moo: voosi" ci: lho: ri" wa la" Hougsu" anghoid lang" gi jheddab nu" nham , da" nheigloem: yo' ju" ri" wa la" Nanu" kha: loem: ri vho: nyid go" la"
46005001	Akhid" nyid" Khristain byu yi anghoid tungbau byu yi lang" akoid yu" da - myiyi: yuggi aved , avhu: koid da" khyoo: - nanu" moo: bo nyid zi - subi" khyag nyang: tid fu" go" nyid ziri: ngoo shoug" gyo . Byu dayug gi nya: myhi' thang yo' shoid' go" nyid khyoo: ri ngoo shoug" gyo .
46005002	Houg: yhang: ti" dakoid nyid zi-nanu" dayo" phau: khuang nyid shi" goonhung: lha" Hougsu" koid nyid wa gung khoo - nanu" moo: kougshu: emyid , yo' houg: su" koid nyid su: rigi: nanu" da" zoem" khau: phung: mo khaid thu' pyam ca" nyid ago" .
46005003	Ngoo gi gung shoo" nanu" yo' ve: gang: nyid nghoid loug we' - nheigloem: Venyi moo: gi nanu" yo' dage" nghoid nyid wigi - ngoo nya: gung du: nyang - nanu" jang" moo: ju" nyid bye: yhang: ti" hougsu" akhyeung" da" moo" zei: nyid su: tho' moo - Aseing Yesu da" myeing khyang" mo , ngoo je: yang: tarha" dang: phyed' kaid bye .
46005004	Nga" da" Venyi moo: ngoo nanu" yo' shoug" go" wigi nanu" zeung: foem: nyid jang" moo - nyhang" yo' dage" nghoid nyid da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" amyeing" akhang" yo' hau: yug ri nya: gung du: shoin , mhoin' pyam wa shid re" satan da" loo , moo: ap byid: pyam ca" . Hougsu" nghoid lang" - Aseing da" bidnyid moo: nya: da" kangso Venyi: ri yo" khyoid yu wa zi nghoid nyid .
