46005006	Nanu" gi nghoid boin: lho: phau: khuang nyid wa zigi - ajoo aeung: da" moo" nghoid doo , cid" dajhi , kyeung" zigi: - zooyho , loem: goin" ziri: gyi: myo: boung: loo" nhang: kaid - ga: da" dang: khyang" ri nanu" ashoug" gyo: yu" goo" la"
46005007	Nanu" dangain" bang: gyeungshang: bang: bue" loo wa shid re" doo , cid" axoug" ga: da - youg: noo yooboo ri shoem" shoung: pyam ge' . Houg: lang" nanu" gi doo , cid" abo da" zooyho , khi , zeing yhang: ti" nanu" yo" bue" loo wa zi nghoid . Nanu" hougsu" yo" bue" lo ziri - ngoo khyag nyang: si' bye . Khasu" wim gari - Khristu ga: da - yha" da" lhid: kaid da" pui" koid wa zi gi jen" jen" nyang: nghoid nyid bye .
46005008	Houg: yoomo - youg: noo yooboo yo' akhyeing" ashoeb da" asam" aved' ga: da - doo , cid" axoug" bo da" zooyho , khi , anghoid loo: za: gyeungshang: da" nheigloem: emyid , yo' deung: byeung" ga: da" doo , cid" abo zooyho , khi , yo' lhai: kaid da" pui" ri koid shang .
46005009	Xang: shi" lheing: ngoo nanu" jhang khyoo: lhid" kaid da" moug soug" moo - myiyi: yug gi aved avhu: moo" zei: mo , yo' azoem" goo" wa shid mo ngoo pyeung: kaid bye .
46005010	Hougsu" pyeung: kaid jang" moo - he: moug: myid da" young: shoo: mo , vhoo: boo myo , no , bang - khoug" mo , phara" soolhoo: no' bang: yo' age , zoem" ein: ngoo atid noug - nyangnu" ri jang" pyam ca" ga: nghoid rigi - nanu" gi he: da" moug: myid mo shang sho' - phang: thu' loo" ca" goo" wa .
46005011	Akhid" ngoo tid nau khyoo: gi nya: gungdu: ri Khristain byu nghoid ga: lho: wigi - youg: shoo: go" khyoo: moo: cang - myo , no , vho: bo phara" soolhoo: ri bo no" - sube" gei sang: shang pyang: lho: yhid: ya: vang ziyo' khau" yen" bang: yo' azoem" khoug: goo" ein: zi nghoid . Houg: yhang: te" su: yo' dage" zhoung: lho: voem: we' ashoin" zoo: goo .
46005012	Khasu" wim gari - Khristain phung: byu anghoid da - xangsu: byu yi ri - tarha" dang: phyed' byid: wa zigi: ngoo yo' ci: asen - Mangsoo gi nyangnu" ri tarha" dang: phyed' lo wa nghoid .
46005013	Nghoid loug we' - nanu" gi phung: khoug: mo bang: ri tarha" dang: yo' phyed' byid: ca" anghoid goo" la" Jhoem: mungdang: moo: lhid" to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - akhyeing" ashoeb da" byu rigi - nanu" mo wigi: khaid thu' pyam ge' .
46006001	Nanu" nyang: cang" moo" ze" bui" go" nghoid rigi - Mangso byu yi da" dang: phyed byid: zigi: kham: yu wa gung khoo - ci: yoomo tungbau tarha" agyi yi jhang khyoo: voem" yhi: go" lha"
46006002	Mangso da" byu yi gi moug: myid ri tarha" dang: phyed wa bang: nghoid ziri: nanu" asi' goo" la" Moug: myid ri lang" dang: phyed wa bang: nanu" ciwim - moo" zoo: ri lang" dang: ayo" phyed byid: goo" la"
46006003	Ngoonu" gi mouglagyoo: yi ri dang: phyed byid: wa mo , nghoid ziri - nanu" asi' goo" la" Houg: su" nghoid rigi: moug: myid mo khyoo: joem ri je" wigi: tarha" dang: yo" phyed byid: wa zi anghoid goo" la"
46006004	Houg: yhang: te" da" moo" thu' lo da" uri - phung: yo' ci: asen: - phung: moo: ce: akho akhang" ayoo" bang: ri - tarha" dang: phyed nhang: wa goo" la"
46006005	Nanu" sho' wa shid re" - ngoo hidsu" tid zi nghoid . Khristain phung: byu mang: nhung" nyang: cang" - myeing" myo: lo da" uri - nanu" da" khoug: moo - Tarha" dang: yo" se' phyed zi atham: thang phajhi" bo byu dayug khyalhang" gi nyid goo" wa nghoid .
46006006	Akhid" gi Aseing Yesu ri aloem" ajeung" bang: da" shid khoin" moo - Khristain mang: nhung" nyang: cang" yung" shug go" nyid goonhung: lha"
46006007	Hid: yhang: ti" nanu" nyang: cang" da" akhoug: moo - yung" shug go" zi thu' lo da" khyoo: gi nanu" bain" sho' soem" gyo" lo" da" khyoo: ri toin" shid , nyid bye . Nyang: cang" nyang: youg: sang: go" da" khyoo: moo - asoem" kham , pyam ziyo' - koid' zo: zi kham , khyoo: gi je genyid anghoid goo" la"
46006008	Nanu" gi hougsu" kham , zeung: pyam wa da" gung khoo - nanu" Khristain mang: nhung" nyang: cang" shoid' go" lho: dalhoid zoo: go" nyid goo" nhung" lha"
46006009	Akhyeing" ashoeb bang: gi Mangso mungdain ayo" vang seing: wa ziri: nanu" nyang: deing" deing se' nyid bye . Khyoo: avhang: goo" - youg: shoo: goo" mo , phara" soolhoo: no mo , sube" myi: lhoid mo , yug gi nyang: cang aved avhu: koid goo" mo
46006010	Khoug" mo , fain" mo , vhoo: boo myo , no , bang - yhid: ya: vang bang: juang" yi gei sang: shang pyang: yen" mo , - khoug" mo , mhoug mo , - hid: bang: mo hang" we' - Mangso mungdain ri yo" seing: boem wa zi anghoid .
46006011	Nanu" mo dayham" gi houg: yhang: te" da" moo" zei: lai loo mo , za: nghoid abye: go - nghoid loug we' nanu" gi yha" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" myeing khyang" yo' we' - yha" Mangso Venyi yo' we' - ced" khyoid ced" young" ziri: shau" wigi - Mangsoo ri ab pyam bye: mo , - Mangso shid khoin" moo: deing: byeung" bye: bang: - bue" lo boem bye .
46006012	Nanu" mo byu dayug yug gi" - Ngoo gi ce" noem ri we' koid wa da" akhang" yo" ga: wigi: tid wa zi nghoid . Nanu" tid ziyo' dakhyoo" deing wa nghoid loug we' dangain" gi re" da" shid mo ge zi anghoid . Ngoori: join , yo" koid nhang: -
46006013	Zoo: noem gi voem: shid re" - voem: doug: gi zoo: noem shid re , ga: wigi: byu dayug yug tid wa nghoid - nghoid houg: gi deung nyid - nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi hau: eig ja: goin" ziri: lhu: phyo' shoin pyam wa zi nghoid . Hau" gung deom: koem gi aved avhu: moozoo" shid re" anghoid loo: za: hau: Aseing ri coung" nghei wa shid re" nghoid - Mangsoo we' gung shoo" moo: ca" nyid khyoo: ri dabyid: nyid .
46006014	Mangsoo gi hau" Aseing ri shid: jang" mo doem dei to' loo nhang: khyo" wigi - ngoonu" ri we' nya: da" yoem: zeing mo doem dei to' loo nhang: wa zi nghoid .
46006015	Nanu" da" gung doem: joem gi-Khristu da" gung doem mo akung: ako'' joem nghoid ziri - nanu" si' go" la" Hougsu" nghoid ri Khristu da" ako' dakung: ri khyu , yu lho: shava myhi' da" akung: ako'' moo: xo' loo" nhang: wa la" Hougsu" we' age bui" wa .
46006016	Shava myhi' yo' hau: gung doem: ri poung" pyam su: gi hau: shava myhi' yo' gung doem: daloem: za: bue" loo" bye: ziri: nanu" asi' goo" la" Jhoem: mungdang: moo nya: eig yug gi gung doem: daloem: za: bui" wa nghoid ga: tid to .
46006017	Nghoid loug we' nya: gung doem: ri - Aseing yo' shoin" deung: too" su: gi Venyi khyoo: khyo" Aseing yo' gung doem: daloem: za: nghoid nyid .
46006018	Youg: shoo: go" da" moozoo" ri jang" pyam nyid ge' - byu wigi: zei: shoid da" yooboo dangain" gi nya: gung doem: ri shoid zi anghoid - nghoid loug we' soem" lid' sho: khyo" youg: da" yooboo yoo" su: gi nya: gung doem: ri nyang: shoid vhang: nyid su: nghoid .
46006019	Nanu" da" gung doem: gi nanu" moo: bo nyid da" Mangsoo byid: hau: gyeungshang: da" Venyi noku yhoem: nghoid ziri - nanu" asi' loo goo" la"
46006020	Hau: Aseing gi nanu" ri aphoug" phyed' lho: qei yu too" mo , nghoid - Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - nanu" da" gung doem: yo' Mangso da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri thu ri" nhang: wa shid re" ci: yhoung: nyid ge' .
46007001	Akhid" nanu" lhid" kaid da" khyoo: yo' sen: lho: wigi - tid pang kyoo" wa . Yuggi dayug gi ikoin deungkhu: avang ri ge' .
46007002	Nghoid loug we' aved' avhu: koid da" moozoo" soung myo: loo yoomo - yuggi kha: yug we' yhoem: seing: myhi' yoo" ja" - myiyi: yug khang" moo" we' yhoem: seing: phoo , yoo" goo" baja"
46007003	Yhoem: seing: phoo , gi yoovoin , jo , ziyo' dakhyoo" - yhoem: seing: myhi' yo' zoem" nyid goo" baja" - yhoem: seing: myhi' we' houg: yo' dakhyoo" - yhoem: seing: phoo , yo' zoem" khau: wigi - dayoug wigi: dayoug da" vho: ngei khyoo: ri cang pyeing" byid: nyid goo" baja" .
46007004	Yhoem: seing: myhi' gi nya: gung doem: ri ayo" seung: ci - yhoem: seing: phoo , ze daseung: ci - houg: yo' dakhyoo" yhoem: seing: phoo , we' nya: gung doem: ri ayo" seung: ci - yhoem: seing: myhi' ze daseung: ci .
46007005	Nanu" gi shid mo wigi - akyu" mho' wa shid re" - daso , zoo: azoem" goo" loo: nyid wa shid re" myid veing" go" to" da" ayo , lid' lang" gi yhoem: seing: phoo , yhoem: seing: myhi' gung shoo" zoem" khoug: wa shid re" - ajang" pyam goo . akyu" mho' da" ayo , lid' lang" gi doem zoem" khau: nyid ge' . Hougsu" nghoid lang" gi nanu" da" gung doem: ri ayo" khang" yoomo satan gunglau" zi ashoug" goo" baja" .
46007006	Hidsu" ein: ngoo tid nyid da" khyoo: gi nanu" ri amyeing" khyo' nyid zi anghoid . akhang" byid: nyid khyoo: za: nghoid .
46007007	Gyeing" nyang: ga: rigi - byu dangain" bang: ri ngoo yhang: ti" nyid nhang: nau zi nghoid . Nghoid loug we' byu yug khang" moo" gi Mangso jang" mo yo" yu da" mainkaid byid: jeju" gi adu , goo - byu dayug yug gi gootu: daja - gootu: dayug gi gootu: daja: ri yo" yu .
46007008	Akhid" gi ikoin deungkhu: avang shi" mo , yo' cougmoo" myhi' yi ri ngoo tid nau khyoo: gi ngoo yhang: ti" yo' xo' nyid lo" rigi: nanu" shid' mo je" ge da" khyoo: nghoid .
46007009	Nghoid loug we' - nanu" da" gung doem: ri ayo" khang" wa nghoid rigi - loxo' lho: ikoin deungkhu: qei" goo" baja" . Khasu" wim gari - gung sho" da" nyam , khyoo: ri kham , zo nyid wa gung khoo - loxo' lho: ikoin deungkhu: qei" zigi: je" ge zi nghoid .
46007010	Deingkhu: vang bye: bang: ri - ngoo daja: tid too" nau - hau: khyoo: gi ngoo mo anghoid - Aseing mo tid to" khyoo: nghoid - yhoem: seing: myhi' gi yhoem: seing: phoo , ri age to" pyam khoo .
46007011	Nghoid loug we' nyang: to" too" kho , nghoid rigi - nyang: ikoin deungkhu: avang loo: za: nyid baja" Hougsu" anghoid rigi - akhang: mo yhoem : seing: phoo , yo' doem veing" go" lho: doem zoem" nyid goo" baja" yhoem: seing: phoo we' yhoem: seing: myhi' ri age she: pyam .
46007012	Gootu: byu yi ri ngoo tid nau zigi - ( Aseing tid zi anghoid loo: za: ngoo tid zigi ) Khristain yuggi dayug gi aloem jeung da" yhoem: seing: myhi' yo" wigi - hau: myiyi: gi nyang: yo' xo' nyid wa shid re" myid veung" nghoid rigi - nyang: gi hau: myiyi: ri age , kang" pyam .
46007013	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" Khristain myiyi: dayug gi aloem" jeung" da" yhoem: seing: phoo , to' yoo' eung: nghoid rigi - hau: yuggi gi nyang: yo' xo' nyid shi" wa myid veung" rigi - nyang: gi hau: yuggi ri age kang" pyam .
46007014	Khasu" wim gari - aloem" jeung" da" yhoem: seing: phoo , gi loem" jeung" da" yhoem: seing: myhi' yoomo - loem" jeung" loo wa aloem" ajeung" da" yhoem: seing: myhi' we' loem" jeung" yhoem: seing: phoo , yoomo - Mangsoo ri lhoem: yu mo , bue" loo wa zi nghoid . Hougsu" anghoid ri - nyangnu" da" nya: zoo: nya: myid: yi gi aloem" ajeung" mo , nya: zooyi yo' dakhyoo" ti" za: bue" loo" goo" wa zi nghoid . Akhid" koem gi Mangsoo gi Mangso kham: yu moin mo , nanu" bue" lo abye: go .
46007015	Nghoid loug we' hau: aloem" jeung" da" - yhoem: seing: myhi' hougsu" anghoid lang" yhoem: seing: phoo gi gang: go" loo" nau ri gang: go" loo" baja" Houg: yhang: te" da" moozoo" moo - Khristain nghoid da" yhoem: seing: myhi' anghoid lang" yhoem: seing: phoo , gi nanu" ri ngei pyoo: myenjham" tung" nyid wa shid re" khe: yu to" zi nghoid bye .
46007016	Khristain yhoem: seing: myhi' we" - nang gi re" da" yhoem: seing: phoo , ri ayo" khyoid yu wa ein: khasu" yo" tid nyid lha" Houg: yo' dakhyoo" - Khristain yhoem: seing: phoo , we" - re" da" yhoem: seing: myhi' ri ayo" khyoid yu wa ein: khasu" yo" tid nyid lha"
46007017	Byu dayug yo' dayug gi nyang: ri Aseing gam , byid: too" bye: mainkaid jeju" yo' dakhyoo" ti" Mangsoo gi nyang: ri khe: yu ure yo' dakhyoo" ti" xo' lho: wigi: kangso dei nyid goo" baja" he: zigi: phung: khang" moo" ri - ngoo jhoug" byid: da" cang yhe: loo" wa tarha" joem nghoid .
46007018	Athang: yham" da" byu dayug khyo" wigi - Mangso khe: yu zi shau" nghoid rigi - athang: yham" da" akhoo: ri ci: akoid ca" loo . Athang: ayham shi" su: ri - Mangso khe: yu zi shau" nghoid rigi - nyang: gi athang: ayham" noo" loo .
46007019	Byu dayug athang: yham" ci: ayham" ci: ein: zigi: ce" akhyag anghoid . Mangso amyeing" tarha" ri cang yhe: loo" wa ziza: akhyag: da nghoid .
46007020	Byu yug khang" moo" gi Mangso khe: yu da" u" mo bue" nyid akhyoo" yo' dakhyoo" ti" za: kangso dei nyid goo" baja" .
46007021	Nang gi Mangso khe: yu da" ayo , moo: join , koid nyid su: nghoid la" nghoid ja" ci: aca" - Nghoid loug we' join , mo yo" loid wa akhang" yo" rigi - hau: amyeing" akhang" ri ci: loo" we' .
46007022	Khasu" wim gari - join danghoid nyid uri: - hau: Aseing wigi: khe: yu zi shoug" su: gi Aseing da" loid byoin byu nghoid bye . Houg: yo' dakhyoo" loid byoin bye: byu dayug nghoid uri: - Aseing khe: yu zi shoug" su: gi Khirstu da" join bue" loo bye .
46007023	Nanu" ri Mangsoo gi aphoug" phyed' lho: qei , yu too" mo , nghoid bye: yoomo - byu yi da join akoid nyid loo: goo .
46007024	Mang: nhung" yi we" - byu dayug yo' dayug gi khe: yu ure da" bue" nyid akhyoo" yo' dakhyoo" ti" Mangsoo yo' zoem" khau: lho: wigi - xo' wigi: kangso dei nyid yab , yhe: loo" ge' o" .
46007025	Akhid" nanu" moug soug" lhid" lho: myid: kaid da" ikoin deungkhu: avang shi" bang: khyoo" yo' sen: wigi - hau: Aseing mo pyeung: to" da" dang: ngoo ayoo . Nghoid loug we' Mangso nheig khyeig sho" myen: da" jeju" khoug: moo - loem" jeung" nyid su: dayoug khyo" wigi - ngoo shau" myid yu" khyoo: ri tid kyo" kaid zi nghoid .
46007026	Akhid" nyang: thoung" shau" nyid da" myid myoo: ung: loug da" khyoo: ri - yu" myang lho: ngoo tid nau da" khyoo: gi yuggi dayug gi nyang: akhid" yo" nyid nyid yhang: ti" yo" nyid nyid rigi: je" ge nyid .
46007027	Nang yhoem: seing: myhi' yoo" bye: nghoid rigi - kang" pyam wa shid re" amyid nyid , ikoin deungkhu: aqei: shi" su: nghoid rigi - ikoin deungkhu: qei" wa shid mo amyid nyid .
46007028	Nghoid loug we' - loxo' lho: ikoin deungkhu: qei" bye: nghoid rigi - nang ce: yooboo ayoo" - ikoin deungkhu: aqei" shi" myiyi: dayug yug nghoid rigi - nyang: loxo' ikoin deungkhu: qei" rigi: ce" yooboo ayoo" . Nghoid loug we' ikoin deungkhu: qei" bye: bang: nyid" khang" moo" thoung" shoug" wa da" yau: khe" khyoo - nanu" ri athoung" shoug" nhang: noug yoomo - ngoo hidsu" tid nyid zi nghoid .
46007029	Hau: lho: wigi: Mang: nhung" yi we" - ngoo tid nau nyid da" khyoo gi hidsu" nghoid - ayo , bidnyid myoo" sho' aboo loo - akhid" mo wigi: loxo' bye: da" byu yi gi lo , axo , shi" da" yuggi yi yhang: ti" nyid loo" goo" baja"
46007030	Ngoug byid ngoug nhab , shau" nyid bang: gi akug ashu: mo , yhang: ti" gauyi ngei pyo: nyid bang: gi agoug ayi loo: nyid bang: yhang: ti" ziyoo soid gain jo , nu" qei , yu ci: bye: bang: gi nyangnu" qei yu ci: bye: da" zi , seing: anghoid mo , yhang: ti" nyid goo" baja" .
46007031	Moug: myid mo , soidgain ziyoo , ci: yhoung: nyid bang: gi dangain ziri: seung: ci: wigi - ci" we' Aseing mo , yhang: ti" nyid loo" goo" baja" khasu" wim gari - Akhid" myang nyid da" moug: myid yoosoo" gi ayo , akhyeing: myang" sho' jo , loo: wa zi anghoid .
46007032	Ngoo gi nanu" ri myid myoo: ung: loug da" khyoo: mo loid loo" wa shid mo vho: ngei nyid . Myi: ayu shi" yuggi , gi hau" Aseing ri gau , yi nhang: noug yoomo - Aseing da" moozoo" moo: nheigloem: zoug jo .
46007033	Nghoid loug we' myi: yu bye: su: koem gi yhoem: seing: myhi' vho: da" khyoo: ri goug nhang: noug yoomo - moug: myid yo' sen: da" khyoo: moo: myid , myo: seing" kho" nyid .
46007034	Houg: yoomo nyang: gi nheigloem: eig gang gyo" jo , - ikoin deungkhu: avang shi" myiyi: anghoid lang" - zoomyi: agyeing" gi Aseing ri nyang: nya: gung doem: gyeungshang: Venyi: yo' nyid baja" ga - ab nung" xoin" to' byid: noug yoomo - Aseing da" mo" zoo" ri yo" myid loin" ziyo' - seing" kho" nyid . Nghoid loug we' yhoem" seing: phoo , yoo" bye: da" myiyi: gi nya: yhoem: seing: phoo , vho: ngei da" khyo" bui" byid: ca" yoomo - moug: myid yo' sen: khyoo: moo: za: myid myo: seing" kho" nyid .
46007035	He: da" khyoo: ri ngoo tid nau nyid zigi - ngoo nanu" ri pang" thoug noug yoomo nghoid . Ngoo nanu" ri tarha" yo' zei: zeung ci: wa shid re" anghoid . Nanu" ri deingmain" joeb , byeung" wigi - jo da" khyoo: moo: cang so" loo" nhang: nau , tho' moo: gootu - Aseing da" moozoo" moo: teung to" zi aboo loo sho' - bain sho ab nung" xoin" to' pyam nhang: noug yoomo - he: da" khyoo: ri tid nyid zi nghoid .
46007036	Dang: myid: to" thang: ri - loxo' ikoin deungkhu: aqei" loo: wa ga: - myid too" su: eig youg da" khyoo: gi yuggi gi myidyi: da" atho' moo - ayung" adu khyo" - nya: gung shoo" nyam , da" myid gye" thain: nyid wigi - loxo' ikoin deungkhu: daqei" loo: wa ga: myid vho: nghoid rigi - loxo' yu baja" hau: zigi: youg: noo yooboo anghoid .
46007037	Nghoid loug we' yuggi gi nya: yhoem: seing: myhi' ayu wa khyo" myid phyed ci: nghoid rigi - nya: nheigloem: ri we' goolhoo: zoo: yo" khang" zeung: ci: wigi - myi: ayu nghoid rigi: ge khyo" zei: khyoo: nghoid .
46007038	Hougsu" wigi: nyang: nyang: dang: myid: too" bye: myiyi: zoo: yo' loxo' su: gi ge' da" moo" zei: su: nghoid bye . Nghoid loug we' hau: myiyi: zoo: ri ayu loo: nyid su: we' - je ge khyo" koid su: nghoid bye .
46007039	Lo , bain' xo' yu bye: da" myiyi: myhi' gi nya: yhoem: seing: phoo , dadei nyid nyid gi nyang: yo' xo' zoem" khau: nyid ca . Nghoid loug we' yhoem: seing: phoo , shid: byug bye: nghoid rigi - nyang: vho: da" yuggi hang" yo' nghoid loug we' lo , doem yo" xo' - nghoid loug we' hau: su" lo , doem xo' yu su: gi Khristain phung byu nghoid ca .
46007040	Nghoid loug we' hau: myiyi: gi ikoin deungkhu: avang loo: yo" nyid nghoid rigi - nyang: gi je" nyid pyoo: wa zi nghoid . He: khyo" gi ngoo myid yu" da" khyoo: nghoid ziyo' - ngoo we' Mangso da" Venyi yo" kham: yu su: dayug nghoid ein: loem jeung" nyid o" .
46008001	Akhid" nanu" moug soug" khyo" myid: kaid da - phara" soolhoo: ri xoin" to' pyam bye: da" zoo: noem yo' sen: wigi - ngoo tid kyoo" wa nghoid . Nyhang" dangain" bang: gi lasi , laleig myid boo bang: za: nghoid boem , ga: wigi: nyangnu" tid nyid zigi: deung nyid . Nghoid loug we' houg: te" da" lasi , laleig gi byu yi ri phau: khyeung nghoid boin: nhang: nyid - nghoid loug we' jheddab da" emyid gi so' koid so' nyheing byid: se' nyid .
46008002	Byu dayug yug gi ngoo gi daja: se' ga: myid nghoid rigi - nyang: si' eung: ziri: lang" asi' shi" su: nghoid nyid .
46008003	Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo ri si' su: gi Mangsoo yo' zoem" khau: khyoo: ri kham: yu se' nyid .
46008004	Houg: yoomo phara" soolhoo: ri xoin" to' pyam bye: da" shoo" yo' sen: lho: tid shang ein: rigi: phara" soolhoo: ga: zigi - gyeing" nyang: kangso dei lho: so" yen" khyoo: ajo , ziyo' - dayug kyeung" da" Mangsoo mo lai wigi - gootu: Mangsoo anyid lo: ziri ngoonu" se' nyid boem bye .
46008005	Moug: khung: moug: di yo' moug: myid yooso" tho' moo" phara" joem , ga: myeing mo , nyid nyid boem wigi - phara" joem myoo: sho' yo' Aseing ga: bang: myoo" sho' nyid ago" .
46008006	Nghoid loug we' ngoonu" shid re" gi phoo , ga: da" Mangsoo dayug za: danyid . Nyang: gi jo , moo: jo , ri phain" too" su: nghoid yoomo - nya: shid re" ngoonu" kangso dadei nyid boem . Aseing Yesu Khristu ga: da" khyoid yu su: we' dayug za: nghoid wigi - nyang: yoomo jo , moo: jo , bue" lo ziyo' - nyang: yoomo ngoonu" kangso dadei nyid boem .
46008007	Nghoid loug we' byu yug khang" moo" gi he: deingmain" khyoo: ri asi' nghoid ago - byu dayham" gi phara" soolhoo: ri loem khau: lai lo yu" boem bye: yoomo - akhid" ju" sho' xoin" to' bye: da" zoo: noem ri shoug" zo: uri - he: zigi: soolhoo: ri ab nung" byid: zoo: noem nghoid ga: myid boin: nyid ago" . Nyangnu" da" phug soo" lheig: myid yu" da" emyid yoem: nu" boem yoomo - nyangnu" zo: da" zoo: noem gi nyangnu" ri aco' ajhoid bue" loo" nhang: ga: myid yu ago" .
46008008	Zoo: noem gi Mangsoo yo' ngoonu" tei" xo' go" da" khyoo: moo - ce: noem myo: loung: loo nhang: khyoo: ci: ajo . azoo: nghoid loug we' ngoonu" moo: ce: noem yoem" soem" loo" wa khyoo: ajo , zo: nghoid loug we' ci: loung: loo wa khyoo: aboo .
46008009	Nghoid loug we' - nanu" hidsu" agyug aci , loo: zo: shoug khyoo: gi Mangsoo ri loem khau: khyoo: moo: yoem: neung: nyid bang ri khyoo: shu" vhang: ziyo' - yooboo koid nhang: da" khyoo: abui" wa shid re" zed" nyid ge' .
46008010	Dang: tu , - he: da" khyoo: moo: phug soo" lheig myid yu" da" khyoo: moo - yoem: nu: nyid su: dayug gi lasi , laleig myid yu" emyid boo bang: nanu" - phara" soolhoo: jo , da" yhoem: moo: voem: zo: nyid ziri: myang rigi - phara" soolhoo: ri xoin" to' byid: da" zoo: noem ri voem" zoo: goo" baja" ein:-yoem: byid: zi abui" wa goo" la"
46008011	Houg: yoomo phug soo" lheig se' myid soin: yu da" emyid , yoem: nu: da re" mang: nhung" pho , shid re" Khristu gi shid: kham , byid: bye: nghoid loug we' - nang ase' myid yu" yoomo hau: yug gi byo , yoin" loo" wa zi anghoid la"
46008012	Hid: khyo" wigi - nanu" gi nyang: tu: nya: da" Khristain mang: nhung" yi ri shoid vhang: khyoo: lo" eung: wigi - yoem: neung: da" phug soo" lheig myid yu" da" emyid ri noo , nhang: nghoid rigi - nanu" gi Khristu ri shoid vhang: bang: bue" loo wa zi nghoid .
46008013	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo zo: noem khyo" nga" mang: nhung" phoo , ri - nheigloem: leung nhang: wigi - yooboo dakoid nhang: wa nghoid rigi - nga" mang: nhung phoo , aleung loo" wa shid re" - ngoo dapyaid' goin" shoo" azoo: loo: za: nyid wa .
46009001	Ngoo gi loid byoin da" akhang" yoo" su: dayug anghoid la" Ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu ri myang yu" bye: anghoid la" Nanu" bi" we' ngoo Aseing da" moozoo" zei: voin , vu , lo da" bidnyid mo ashi" zei: loo mo , anghoid goo" la"
46009002	Byu gooji ngoori lagyoo: dayug khyo" alhoem: kham: yu boem nghoid ri lang" gi nanu" gi gyeing" gyeing" nyang: lheom: kham: yu eung: nyid . Khasu" wim ga: ri Khristu yo' daloem: za: bue" lo wigi - kangso dei nyid mo , nanu" nyang - ngoo lagyoo: dayug nghoid deung da" sagsi: yi nghoid .
46009003	Ngoori: yooboo foin: lho: thougtheung loo bang: ri - doem phoug tid wa da" dang: gi he: zi nghoid .
46009004	Ngoo nyang: zei: da" moozoo" yoomo - ngoo zoo: wa shug wa akhang" yo" anghoid goo" la"
46009005	Gootu: da" lagyoo: yi - Aseing da" nya: nhoung" bi" yo' lagyoo: Petru yhang: te" bang - da" khoo" shid: ri bo yu" cang wigi - ngoo so" yen" da" joyoo joem moo: yhoem: seing: myhi' shu" yen" wa akhang" ayoo" la"
46009006	Ngoo yo' Barnaba nga" eig yug za: zoo: wa shug wa shid re" - moo" zei: ca" nyid la"
46009007	Gyizoo: khayug gi nya: zookhoo: voin lho: meing: zain: da" moo" zei: yu" la" Khyam: moo" zei: zo: yu" mo , hang" we' - nya: khyam: mo zabyid shi" ri aphyo' zoo: loo: nyid yu" boem la" yang zoem: bang: hang" we' nya: yang noug" ajhoeb' shoug byu boo go" la"
46009008	Nyid khang" moo" bue" nyid da" he: dang: khyang" za: we' anghoid shi" - tarha" khyoo" moo: we' houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" tid nyid .
46009009	Gug nang: nyid da" nu: nhoid phu" moo: mhang" kho' yo' azhoung" too" byid: - ga: Moshe da" tarha" moo: lhid" to" . Akhid" Mangsoo gi nulei: joem riza: - seing" khoo" yoomo tid nyid la"
46009010	Nyang: hidsu" ga: tid nyid zigi - ngoonu" shid re" tid nyid zi anghoid goo" la" Gyeing" nyang: ngoonu" shid re" lhid" to" zi nghoid . Yoothung" phug su: yo' gug shi" ri yham" yu su: gi nyang: nyang: yoo" wa da" gug gam boem ri - myid byu lho: dakoid nyid .
46009011	Ngoo gi nanu" moo: Venyi ashi" ri asain" to" lho: nanu" jang" mo moug: myid da" soidgain - akyu" jeju" ri ngoonu" shau" kham: yu nghoid rigi - ngoonu" ladu lid , da" khyoo: nghoid la"
46009012	Sara gooji yi gi nanu" jhang mo-yo" yu wa ga: nheig byu wa akhang" yo" boem rigi - ngoonu" gi je" yoo" wa anghoid goo" la" Nghoid loug we' hau: da" akho , akhang" ri ngoonu" ayu boem: hau: da" akho , akhang" ri yu wa gung khoo: gi Khristu da" ngei bu: lu dang: gi ri - xeung kyo" to" khyoo: aboo loo: za: kyi" khyeug khyoo: dangain" ziri: ngoonu" kham' zo: boem bye .
46009013	Noku yhoem: moo" khoug: moo: moo" voin bang: gi Noku yhoem: moo" khoug: moo - zoo: noem shau" yu nyid boem ziri: we' - nanu" gyeing" gyeing" nyang: se' nyid boem bye .
46009014	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" hau: ngei bu: lu dang: gi ri kho" kyo" nyid mo , gi hau: ngei bu: lu dang: mo , voem: doug: yo" khu: ca" - ga: tid to .
46009015	Nghoid loug we' - ngoo gi hau: da" akho , akhang" daloem: ri we' ayu ci . Houg yhang: te" da" akho , akhang" ri nga" shid re" - mho' wa ein: he: moug soug" ri lhid" kaid zi anghoid . Houg: su" damho' wa nghoid rigi - ngoo shi" shid: byoug ri je" gi wa nghoid . Nga" da" deingmain" phau: khuang joyoo ri - dang: koem: hang" ri we' abue" loo" nhang: noug .
46009016	He: da" ngei bu: lu dang: ri ngoo kho" kyoo" yoomo - nga" shid re" ce: phau: khuang nyid wa joyoo aboo - khasu" wim ga: ri ngoo gi Mangso amyeing" byid: to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" ngoo akho" kyoo" loo: za: ayo" nyid loo . Ngoo hau: ngei bu: lu dang: ri akho" kyo" nghoid rigi - nga" shid re" khayhi' mo gyoug pho" ja: nghoid wa lha"
46009017	Ngoo he: da" moozoo" ri - nga" myid khyo" khyen: yu lho: dato' zei: nghoid rigi - la , ga , yoo" wa ziri: ge myid yu" nyid . Nghoid loug we' he: da" moozoo" gi Mangsoo myid loem wigi ab byid: to" moo" nghoid yoomo - zei: ca" da" yoovoin' daloem: nghoid ein: ngoo dazei: nyid .
46009018	Hougsu" nghoid ri ngoo gi ce" noem da" amyaid' yo" yu wa lha" ngei bu: lu dang: shid re" nga" da" akhang" ri aci: ziyo'-aphoug" amho' loo: za: ngei bu: lu dang: yo" kho" kyo" khyoo: gi nga" amyaid' nghoid nyid .
46009019	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - ngoo gi hang" da" dei zoo: we' anghoid loo: za: yhoem: seing: koid su: nghoid nyid . Nghoid loug we' byu yi yo" myo: nhoo: myoo: sho' ri - yo" khyoid yu sho' - byu dangain" mo , da" deizoo: ngoo bue" loo bye .
46009020	Ngoo gi Yuda byu yi jang" moo: moo" zei: nyid da" uri - nyangnu" ri yo" khyoid yu sho' - Yuda byu dayug yhang: ti" bue" nyid . Ngoo nya: gung du: nyang: Moshe da" tarha" khoug: moo: anyid nghoid loug we' - hau: tarha" khoug: mo mo , ri yo" khyoid yu sho' - ngoo gi tarha" khoug: moo: nyid nyid su: yhang: ti" bue" nyid .
46009021	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" tungbau byumyu" yi da" akhoug: moo - moo" zei: nyid uri - nyangnu" ri Khristu jhang khyoo: yo" shu" yu sho' - Yuda tarha" ri acang loo: za: tungbau byumyu" dayug yhang: ti" ngoo bue" nyid . Hidsu" tid ri - ngoo gi Mangso da" tarha" ri acang loo: ein: tid nyid zi anghoid gyeung" nyang: ga: ri - ngoo gi Khristu da" tarha" khoug: moo: nyid nyid su nghoid .
46009022	Ngoo gi Mangsoo ri loem khau: khyoo: moo - yoem: nu: mo , da" akhoug: moo - vang lo" byoug da" ayo , moo - nyangnu" ri yo" khyoid yu sho' - nyangnu" mo dayug yhang: ti" ngoo bue" nyid . Hougsu" dayham" ri ge' bue" khyo" yo" khyoid yu sho' - ngoo gi byu aja" ja: bang: da" akhoug: moo: nyangnu" yo' dakhyoo" ti" danyid nyid .
46009023	Hau: ngei bu: lu dang: yoomo - mainkaid jeju" ri nanu" yo' dage" yo" kham: yu sho' - ein: he: khyoo: ri ngoo cang zei: lo zi nghoid .
46009024	Gei shi , go" da" pui" moo: dangain" mo , gei shi , goo" nghoid loug we' - byu dayug za: oung: doid lo" da" jhung: shug ri shau" kham: yu nyid khyoo - nanu" dangain" mo , se' nyid gu nghoid bye . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - nanu" we' oung: doid lo" da" jhung: shug ri yo" kham: yu sho' - gei shi , go" nyid ge' .
46009025	shi , go" da" pui" vang wa shid re" shi , goo wa soin nyid da" gei shi , sarhi' yi yug khang" moo" gi thain: da" tarha" ri cang byeung" nyid ago" . He: byu yi houg: su" koid da" khyoo: gi byo , yoin" loo" se' da" bain: khuang: yo" yu wa shid re nghoid . Nyhang" koem gi pyaid moo: too: moo: byo , yoin" loo" ase' da" - bidmug yo" yu wa shid re" gei shi , go" nyid zi nghoid .
46009026	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - ngoo gi gei , loo" wa shid re" ke' to" da" bain: zeing ju" sho' - dain" za: dagei lo" ziyo' - ngoo gi thung" goo" nghoid loug lid' moo: akoem: athoung" pyam da" thung" go" sarhi' phoo , ti" nghoid nyid .
46009027	Ngoo gi byu gootu: ri gei shi , goo" wa pui" bain' khi: lang" gi nga" gungdu: sugab , amyhi: wigi - khyen: khyo' pyam zi ashoug" wa shid re" ca" jang" moo: yo" ci: yhung: wa shid re" ngoo nyang: ung ri ngoo - yoem: kaid thoung" nyid ziyo' - bain sho nyang: khang" zeung: ci: bye .
46010001	Mang: nhung" yi we" - Moshe thang: moo: cang lo da" - ngoonu" phoug" phyid" yi moo: ce: noem bue" loo bye: khyoo: ngoo nanu" ri tid poin" nau . Nyangnu" dangain" ri jhoem" moug" khoug: khyo" shu" lo wigi - gyid , thoem" ni , ri we' pyoo" pyoo: za: yo" gu: lai lo boem bye .
46010002	Nyangnu" gi hau: jheom" moug" yo' Panglai moo: Babtisma zheung: kham , yu ziyo' - Moshe da" thang: cang bang: bue" lo boem bye .
46010003	Nyangnu" dangain" bang: gi Venyi: zooyho , daja: ri za: zheung: coem , zo: lho: Venyi shug phoo" daja: ri za: coem , shoug lo boem .
46010004	Nyangnu" gi nyangnu" yo' dage" so" lo da" - Venyi lung moo" boem' mo gyid ri shoug" shoug ago" . Hau: Venyi: lung: moo" boem gi Khristu nyang: nghoid bye .
46010005	Nghoid loug we' - nyangnu" mo , myoo: loo boug ri - Mangsoo ayu" noug yoomoo - nyangnu" da" shid: mang joem gi siyoo khoug: moo: leung yoin" to .
46010006	Akhid" he: da" khyoo: dangain" gi nyangnu" koid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" age , da" khyoo: ri ngoonu" age , myono , ziyo' - ngoonu" nyangnu" dayham" bang: yhang: ti" - phara" soolhoo: ri abo no" wa khyoo - ngoonu" ri yu" gyoug yu" ci , wa da" - khoo" shid: toin" shid too" bye .
46010007	Hau: tho' moo: gootu - jhoem: mungdang: moo: byu yi gi zo: shug pui" daloem: moo: zhoung: jo , lho: zo: shug go" nyid uri: hau" zoo: pui" gi zo: lai shoug lai wigi - aved , avhu: moozoo" khyoo: phoug loo" bye ga: tid to .
46010008	Nyangnu" dayham" gi aved , avhu: moo" ri zheung: zei: wigi - danyid" dam , byu - 23000 shid: joem: lo" beom yhang: ti" abui" sho' - ngoonu" gi aved avhu: youg: shoo: go" moozoo" koid yoomo yooboo dab , bang: bui" lo" ja" .
46010009	Nyangnu" dayham" gi hau: Aseing ri jham" ca: yu" boem yoomo - lhang: myu , thei" said' pyam zi shau" boem yhang: ti" ngoonu" gi hau: Aseing ri ge' jham" ca: yu boem wa zi anghoid .
46010010	Nyangnu" dayham" bang: gi nheig yoo: nheig jhug koid boem yoomo shid: zau: lagyoo: pho , da" lo , yo' lhu: phyo' shoin' pyam zi shau" boem yhang: ti ngoonu" gi nheig yoo: nheig jhug akoid' goo ja .
46010011	Hid: yhang: te" da" khyoo: myoo" sho' nyangnu" jang" moo: bue" lo da" khyoo: gi byu yi gootu: bang: yu" kyi" lho: khoo" shid: bue" wigi - ngoonu" ri tid poin" zid" nhang: wa shid re" lhid" to" zi nghoid . Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoonu" gi moug: myid apyaid' thang loo" wa da" ayo , moo: re" nyid eung: bang: nghoid nyid boem .
46010012	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo - byu dayug yug gi nyang: tu: nya: da" gung ri - ngoo gi geing: geing: teing teing yo" yab , jo , su: nghoid ga: myid su: gi nyang: aleung loo" wa shid mo zed' lhid' nyid ca .
46010013	Nanu" thoung" shau" yu" da" agung alau" gi byu hang" we' thoung" shau" yu" ja: za: date: nghoid . Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi dang: zung" Aseing nghoid nyid yoomo - Nanu" atho' kham' wa yhi' da" agung" alau" jham" ca: yu" khyoo" gi shoug" nhang: wa zi anghoid . Houg: su" jham" ca: yu" zi shau" nyid da" ayo , moo - yo" zeung: kham , wa da" yoem: so' byid: lho: wigi - houg: mo yo" loid thu' loo" wa da" khyoo: nyang: nyheung byid: wa nghoid .
46010014	Houg: yoomo ngoo jheddab mo , we" - phara" soolhoo: no" da" khyoo: ri jang" pyam nyid ge' .
46010015	Nanu" ri phug soo" lheig se' myid yu" da" - phajhi" boo mo , ri yhang: ti" ngoo tid nyid zi nghoid . Ngoo tid nyid dang: khoin" joem ri nanu" nyang: gyo: tu , yu" ge' .
46010016	Ngoonu" gi Mangso jeju" ri coung" nghei lho: wigi - Aseing da" myen" xoin: zo: da" zoeb , phung: mo goem ri yu shoug nyid uri - Khristu suid" yo' zoem" khau: da" khyoo: nghoid . ngoonu" gi zooyho , ri we' ajab , amoin" phe , yu lho: hau: ziri: zo: da" ayo , moo - ngoonu" gi Khristu da" gung doem: yo' zoem" khau: da" khyoo: nghoid .
46010017	Khasu" wim gari - zooyho , dakhi , kyeing" za: dajo , ngoonu" myoo" sho' nghoid nyid boem loug we' gung doem: daloem: za: danghoid nyid boem .
46010018	Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoonu" myoo" sho mo , gi zooyho , daloem: mo za: coem , gam , zoo: bang: nghoid boem bye . Israela byumyu" yi ri myid yu" ge' - phoin: tho' moo: xoin" to' byid: da" shoo" ri zoo: bang: gi hau: phoin: moo: dei dei mo , mo zoem" khoug: su: yo' dayug za: anghoid la"
46010019	Ngoo hidsu" ein: tid zigi - phara" soolhoo: yo' phara" soolhoo: ri - zoo: noem daja: ja: akhyag bo ein: tid nau zi anghoid .
46010020	Anghoid o" - tungbau byu yi da" phoin: tho' moo: to' byid: da" xoin" gi Mangsoo ri to' byid: da" xoin" anghoid - yu joem ri to' byid: da" xoin" danghoid ein: ngoo tid zi nghoid . Ngoo gi nanu" ri yu joem yo' zoem" khau: nyid mo , abui" nhang: noug .
46010021	Nanu" gi hau: Aseing da" goem mo shoug lho: wigi - yu joem da" goem' mo doem ge shug wa zi anghoid . Hau: Aseing da": zoo: bui" mo we' yu joem da" zoo: bui" mo we' dage" age shoin" zoo .
46010022	Houg: su" anghoid lang" ngoonu" gi Aseing ri yu" noo" nhang: nyid zi anghoid wa goo" la" Ngoonu" gi hau: Aseing tho' mo yoem: je bo ein: myid nyid goo" la"
46010023	Nyangnu" gi" - ngoonu" gi ce" ja: nghoid loug we' koid wa da" akhang" yo" ga: tid ago" . Houg: gi: deung nyid nghoid loug we' koid wa akhang" yo" nghoid loug we' dangain" gi akyu" bo la"
46010024	Nanu" kha: yug nghoid loug we' nyang: tu: nya: da" akyu" ri ashoo: loo za byu gooji yi da" akyu" ri shoo: byid: nyid boem ca .
46010025	Nanu" da" phyiri: phala se' soin: yu" da" emyid yoomo - dang: myid: aja: ja: ri amyid: nyid loo: za: kid" moo: oung" to" shoo" ri ayi" loo: yo" qei , zo .
46010026	Khasu" wim ga: ri moug: myid yoosoo" yo' dage" houg: moo: nyid nyid mo , gi hau: Aseing shid re" za: nghoid nyid , ga: wigi: jhoem: mungdang moo: tid to .
46010027	Aloem akhau: da" byu dayug yug gi nanu" ri doo" zhoo" wa shid re" khe: nghoid rigi - nanu" yhi: nau rigi: yhi: ge phyiri phala emyid yoo" mo myid: phed: sho: khyoo: aboo loo za: nanu" da" shid khoin" moo: soin' byid: gu: dangain" ri zoo: ge' .
46010028	Nghoid loug we' byu dayug gi he: zigi: phara" joem ri xoin" to' byid: zi nghoid , ga: wigi: nanu" ri tid kyoo" bye: nghoid rigi - tid lham , pyam bye: yoomo we' - phug soo" lheig myid yoomo we' - hau: ziri: azoo: loo: goo .
46010029	Hidsu" ngoo tid nau nyid zigi - re" da" phug soo" lheig myid yu" da" emyid , ri tid nau zi anghoid - gooji yi da" phug soo" lheig da" e" myed , ri tid nau nyid zi danghoid . Nghoid bye: nanu" mo byu dayug yug gi nga" da" yo" koid wa loid byoin da" akhang" ri - byu gooji yi da" phug soo" lheug nheigloem: wigi: - ci: yoomo yo" toung" pyam wa la" ga: myid: lo boem goo" wa nghoid .
46010030	Nga" da" zoo: noem shid re" - Mangsoo ri ngoo jeju" coung" nghei nghoid rigi - ngoo se' coung: nghei , bye: zoo: noem yoomo - khasu" wigi: - byu dayug yug gi ngoori pyi: shoo: wa lha"
46010031	Houg: yoomo nanu" zoo: nghoid loug we' shug nghoid loug we' - Mangso da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri yo" thoin" pang byid: wa shid re" dangain" ziri: zei: so' nyid ge' .
46010032	Yuda byumyu" yi shid re" we' - Greek byu yi shid re" nghoid loug we' - Mangso phung da" shid re" we' - thoung" thue: leung jang: abui" wa shid re" kangso dei nyid ge' .
46010033	Xangsu: byu yi nyid moo: › nyid bang: gi khyoid yu zi shoug" goo" baja" ein: - nga" shid re" amyid loo: za: nyid moo: nyid bang: da" akyu" ri sho: zoore" - subi" vho: ngei sho' ngoo yoem: kaid zei: nyid . Nanu" we' ngoo yhang: ti" zei: so' nyid ge' .
46011001	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - ngoo gi Khristu da" khoo" shid: ri cang lo yhang: ti" nanu" we' nga" da" khoo" shid: ri cang nyid ge' .
46011002	Nanu" gi khyoo: khaid gu: khang" moo" moo: ngoori: boin: so" nyid wigi - ngoo nanu' ri byid: too" bye: da" jhau" mho' thui' - nanu" cang zei: lo nyid boem bye: yoomo - ngoo nanu" ri coung" byid: nau .
46011003	Nghoid loug we' - yuggi yi dangain" bang: da" vhuloem gi Khristu nghoid nyid . Myi yi: yi da" vhuloem koem gi yuggi yi nghoid . Khristu da" vhuloem gi Mangsoo nghoid nyid da" khyoo: ngoo nanu" ri se' gyoo: nhang: nau .
46011004	Yuggi yi kha: yug we' - akyu" mho' nyid uri - hougsu" anghoid lang" shava noku phung moo - Mangso mungdang: kho" nyid uri - vhuloem moo: nghoeb , ci: nghoid ri - Khristu da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri phue: loo" nhang: zi nghoid .
46011005	Myiyi: yi kha: yug nghoid loug we' - akyu" mho' nyid uri - hougsu" anghoid lang" shava phung: moo: Mangso mungdang: tid nyid uri - vhuloem ri anghoeb , ci: loo: koid nghoid rigi - yhoem: seing: phoo , da" myonhoo: ri phue: loo" nhang: nyid ziyo' - vhu" dung: dung: pyam da" myiyi: yo' ci: ashai" loo: nghoid da .
46011006	Myiyi: yi , gi vhuloem ri anghoeb , ci: wa nghoid rigi - xam: ri we' pyoid pyam goo" baja" nghoid loug we' xam: ko' pyam wa anghoid lang" gi vhu" dung: dung: pyam zigi - myiyi: yi sho' ja: nghoid yoomo - nya: vhuloem ri nghoeb ci: baja" .
46011007	Yuggi yi gi Mangso da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri thu' loo nhang: mo , nghoid nyid boem yoomo - vhuloem moo: nghoeb , ci: anoo" - myiyi: zoo: gi yugge da" myonhoo: phung yoeb ri thu' loo byid: nhang: nyid su nghoid .
46011008	Khasu" wim ga: ri yuggi gi myiyi: mo phain" to" zi anghoid - nghoid loug myiyi: gi yuggi mo , phain" to" zi nghoid .
46011009	Hau: yuggi gi myiyi: shid mo , phain" to" zi anghoid - myiyi: ri gi yugge , shid re" phain" to" zi danghoid .
46011010	Hau: moug: khung: lagyoo: yi yoomo - myiyi: zooyi gi vhuloem ri nghoeb ci: ca" - hougsu" koid da" khyoo: gi nyang: nya: da" - yhoem: seing: pho , da" vhoo: moo: nyid nyid ein: da" alhoo: again , ri toin" shid' nyid zi nghoid .
46011011	Nghoid loug we' - hau: Aseing khoug: moo: myiyi: yi gi yuggi yi moo: nghe: khau: nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - yuggi yi nghoid loug we' - myiyi: moo: danghe: khau: nyid .
46011012	Khasu" wim ga: ri myiyi: gi yugge , jang" mo phain" to" zi nghoid loug - yuggi gi myiyi: mo khu: lo zi nghoid . Hau: tho' moo: gootu: - jo , moo: jo , ri bue" loo nhang: su: gi Mangsoo nyang: nghoid bye .
46011013	Myiyi: gi vhuloem ri anghoeb , ci: loo: za: noku joyoo moo: akyu" mho' nyid rigi - du , la" ein: ziri: nanu" myid , phyed' yu ge' .
46011014	Yuggi gi xam: sheing: to" ri nya: myonhoo: soem" joyoo nghoid ziri: xangsu: nyid yab , lo da" tarha" wigi: nanu' ri jhoug" byid: nyid .
46011015	Nghoid loug we' - myiyi: gi xam: sheing: to" nghoid rigi - nya: da" young" lho , khyoo: nghoid nyid . Nya: da" xam: sheing: gi nya: vhuloem ri nghoeb , too" wa shid mo byid: to" zi nghoid .
46011016	Nghoid loug we' byu dayug yug he: khyoo: yo' sen: lhoo: wigi - kyo , too" nau nghoid rigi: - ngoonu" moo: we' Mangso da" phung moo: we' - noku coung" nghei phung moo: houg: te" vhuloem ri nghoeb , da" thung" mo lai wigi - gootu: aboo loo" ein - ngoo hau" yug ri tid wa nghoid .
46011017	Nanu" da" noku coung" nghei da" zoeb , phung: gi deingmain" ziyo' akyu" yoo" wa khyo" phoung nyid zi anghoid loo: za: akyu" yoem" wa khyo" phoung nyid boem yoomo - vhoo: moo: tid to" da" khyoo: joem moo - ngoo nanu" ri acoung" byid: noug .
46011018	Xang: shid" moo - nanu" da" phung: khoug: moo: tu: lhoin" thoutheung da" zoeb , phung nghoid ziri: ngoo shoug" gyo . Hau: jang" moo: nyid mo , dayham" rigi: ngoo myid loem .
46011019	Houg: mo gam , thu' loo" mo , kha: phung: bang: gi jo shoid khyoo: yab , bang: nghoid ein: da" - deingmain" khyoo: gi bang bang nyang: myang loo wa shid re" - nanu" moo: kho' gam , gang: go" lo" zigi: nyid gu , nghoid .
46011020	Nanu" dage" zoeb , phoung: nyid shi" ri - hau: Aseing da" myen" xoin: zoo: pue" shid re" phoung nyid boem zi anghoid .
46011021	Khasu" wim gari - nanu" zo: nyid uri - nyang: tu: nya: zoo: noem , ri nyang: boug" zo: ago - dayham" bang: gi zooyoid boem wigi - houg su" shoug yed: zo yed koid nyid ago" .
46011022	Zoo: wa shug wa shid re" nyang: tu: nya: yhoem: ayoo" goo" la" Hougsu" anghoid lang" gi Mangso da" phung ri aphoug" amyang: - juang" yi wigi - asho" ajhen: bang: ri - sho' thu nhang: goo" wa la" Ngoo nanu" ri he: khyoo: yo' sen: lho: wigi - ce: noem tid wa ein: jho: nyid go" la" Ngoo nanu" ri coung" byid: goo" wa la" Gyeing" nyang: ngoo nanu" ri coung" byid: wa zi anghoid .
46011023	Khasu" wimgari - akhid" ngoo nanu" ri - byid: kaid da" jhoug" myeing" jhoug" thui: gi hau: Aseing jang" moo ngoo yo" kham: yu khyoo: nghoid . Hau: zigi: gyivoo joem da" lo , moo: ab byid: pyam zi shoug" wa da" myen" ri - Aseing Yesu gi zooyho , ri yu lho: wigi -
46011024	Jeju" bain coung" nghei lang" - zooyho , ri ajab , amoin" koid lho: he: zigi: nanu" shid re" byid: pyam da" - nga" gung doem: nghoid - ngoori: daboin: nyid wa shid re" hid: su" koid ge ga: tid .
46011025	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - myen" xoin: bain , zoo: lang" - goem ri we' yu wigi - he: da" goem gi nga" suid" yo' zhoug to" da" Mangso dang: thang cab , seig nghoid - he: ziri: shug khang" moo" nanu" ngoori: daboin: nyid wa shid re" hidsu" koid nyid ge" ga: tid .
46011026	Nanu" gi he: zooyho , ri zo: wigi: he: goem mo shug khang" moo" hau: Aseing shid: kham , da" khyoo: ri - nyang: doem ju" re" da" bidnyid ju" sho sagsi: kham , shoug nyid da" khyoo: nghoid .
46011027	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - hang" nghoid loug we' - amoin: ayi" ziyo' Aseing zooyho , ri zo wigi - goem mo , shoug nghoid rigi - hau: Aseng: da" gung doem: yo' suid" ri shoid' vhang: da" yooboo yoo" bye .
46011028	Houg: yoomo - hang" nghoid loug we' - nyang: tu: nya: da" gung ri xang: shid" myid soin: kho' yu" lho: wigi - hau: zooyho , zo: lho: goem' ri shug baja" .
46011029	Ci: yoomo gari - hau: zooyho , ri zo: lho: hau: goem ri shoug uri - Hau: Aseing gung doem: da" dang: kang: ri ase' gyo: su: gi nyang: tu: nyang: ri dang: phyed zi shoug" wa khyo" zo: shoug nyid zi danghoid .
46011030	Houg: yoomo nanu" moo: yoem: neung: lo" ziyo' noo phyoo" jamjau shau" lho: shid: lo" zi we' myoo" sho' mo , bo abye: go .
46011031	Ngoonu" gi nyang: tu: nya: gung doem: ri xang: shid" - myid phoid: sho: soin: kho' yu" boem nghoid rigi - Mangso wigi: jeyang: dang: phyed' zi shoug" wa anghoid .
46011032	Nghoid loug we' - ngoonu" gi Aseing da" lo , wigi: - dang: phyed noo , kham' zo: khyoo: gi moug: myid byu yi yo' dage" dang: phyed zi ashoug" wa shid mo nghoid nyid .
46011033	Houg: yoomo nga" mang: nhung" yi we" - Aseing da" myen" xoin: zoo: phung moo: bo loin" wa shid re" - nanu" zeung: foem: nyid boem rigi - nyang: cang nyang: lang" go" nyid ge' .
46011034	Hougsu" Aseing da" zoo: shug phoung bo loin" wa shid re" - nanu" zeung: foem: nyid uri - Mangso wigi: dang: phyed zi ashoug" baja" - byu dayug yug zooyoid nyid nghoid rigi - nya: yhoem: moo: lo" zo: yu baja" gootu: ca" da" khyoo: joem rigi - ngoo ju" ri lang" - tid kyo , shang: pyam wa nghoid .
46012001	Mang: nhung" yi we" - nanu" mougsoug" khyo" lhid" wigi myid: kaid da" gyeungshang: Venyi: da" jeju" jhung: shug yo' sen: wigi hau: da" deungmain" khyoo: nanu" ri tid kyoo" wa nghoid .
46012002	Nanu" gi tungbau byumyu" yi danghoid nyid boem shi" ayo , moo: khyoo: aja" ja: moo: khyoo: vhang: vhang: loo" bang: nghoid boem wigi - kangso abo da" soolhoo: joem ri - noku lai lo boem bye: ziri: nanu" nyang: si' gu nghoid .
46012003	Mangsoo ri nghoid loug we' - Mangso Venyi wigi: khyoo: shid' vhu" she: zi shau" kham: yu nghoid rigi-" Aseing Yesu ri mau: goin' baja" , , ga: avoem" tid . Gyeungshang: da" Venyi wigi - khyoo: shid' vhu" she: ziri: ashau" kham: yu su: gi Aseing Yesu gi Aseing nghoid ga - hang" we' ayo" yhen: yu nyid wa khyoo - ngoo nanu" ri si' nhang: nau .
46012004	Akhid" Venyi jeju" jhung shug aja" ja: boo nghoid loug we' - hau" jeju" jhung: shug joem ri - Venyi dayoug wigi: kyeing byid: nyid zi nghoid .
46012005	Dei zhoo' dei jhug wa moo" aja" ja: boo nghoid loug we' - yo" zhoo" yo" jhoug da" Aseing gi dayug za: date: nghoid .
46012006	Moozoo" jid: zoo" zei: loo" wa da" - yoem: so' myoo" sho' ja: boo nghoid loug we' - dangain" ziri: pang" thoug voinvu , nyid da - gooki" lid' da" moo" zo" shid re" yoem: so' kaid byid: nyid su gi Mangsoo dayug za: danghoid .
46012007	Dangain" bang: shid mo akyu" boo baja" ga: byu yug khang" mo" nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo - gyeungshang: da" Venyi loung" jo , bye: ziri - khyoo: aja: ja: khyo" toin" shid' nyid .
46012008	Khasu" wim gari - byu dayug rigi - hau: Venyi gi phajhi" mungdang: kho" kyoo" wa yoem: byid: nyid . Gootu: dayug ri hau: Venyi: gi lasi laleig da" mungdang: se' kho" kyo" da" yoem: vhoo" kaid byid nyid .
46012009	Hau: lho: wigi - gootu: dayug rigi: - hau: Venyi wigi: loem" jeung" da" nheigloem: kaid byid: nyid . Gootu: dayug ri hau: Venyi: gi noo phyoo yo" byang" ge da" yoem: vhoo" kaid byid: nyid .
46012010	Hau: Venyi wigi nyang - dayug rigi: mau" pho" alhoo: again yo" koid shug wa da" yoem: vhoo" - gootu: dayug rigi: lapi: wa da" akhang" gootu: dayug rigi - Venyi mo yo" yu da" yoem: vhoo" yo' Venyi khyo" anghoid da" jhung" shug joem ri se' yu" phoid: kho' se' da" yoem: so' - Gootu: dayug rigi: - myeing" aja" ja: se' kaid da" yoem: so' yo' gootu: dayug rigi: tid da" dang: khoin" mo dang: kang: joem ri se' phoid: kyo" da" yoem: vhoo" byid: to .
46012011	Nghoid loug we' hau: jeju" yoem: vhoo" joem gi hau: venyi dayoug wigi: za: bui" nhang: nyid yoomo - nyang: myid vho: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - dayug yo' dayug ri - gooki" lid' da" jhung: shug gootu: tu: ngab sho' - gam , byid: to" boem bye .
46012012	Khristu gi akung: ako'' myoo" sho' dab , da" dayug kyeung" da" gung doem: yo' du nyid . Hau: gung doem mo akung: ako'' joem gi myoo" sho' daboo nghoid loug we' - gung doem: gi dayug kyeung" nghoid .
46012013	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - nyhang" dangain" mo , gi Yuda yi nghoid loug - Yuda byumyu" yi anghoid loug we' - join' yi nghoid loug join' anghoid mo , nghoid loug we' - Venyi: dayug mo za: Babtisma ri zheung: kham' yu lho: dagung dashoo" za: bue" lo boem bye: ziyo' - dangain" bang: da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo: hau: Venyi dayug riza: coem , kham: yu boem bye .
46012014	Khasu" wim gari - hau: gung doem: moo: akung: ako'' daloem: za: anghoid - myoo" sho' bo nyid .
46012015	Khyid: gi ngoo lo , anghoid yoomo - gung doem: yo' ci: asen: ga: wigi: tid nghoid rigi - houg: su" tid yoomo nyang: gi gung doem: yo' ci" we' asen: khyo" anghoid .
46012016	Hau: lho: wigi - nookhyab , gi" ngoo gi myojid" anghoid yoomo - gung doem: yo' ci: asen , ga: tid nghoid ri houg: su" tid yoomo gung doem: yo' ci: asen: khyo" anghoid .
46012017	Dagung goin" myojid" za: nghoid rigi - khakhyo" se' shoug" gyoo: wa . dagung goin" nu khyab , za: te: nghoid rigi - khakhyo" se' nam yu" wa lha"
46012018	Akhid" Mangsoo koem gi nyang: vho: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - akung: ako'' daloem: yo' daloem: ri - nya: joyoo yo' joyoo moo: tab , too" byid: bye .
46012019	Hau: lho: dangain" gi ako' daloem: za: te: nghoid rigi - gung doem: daloem: za: ayo" bui" .
46012020	Akhid" koem gi akung: ako'' myoo" sho' boo nghoid loug we' - gung doem: daloem: za: date: nghoid .
46012021	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo myojid" gi" lo , nang rigi: ngoo avhoo: loo , ga: wigi: age tid . Vhuloem we' - " khyid: re" eig yug ri ngoo aci: noo" loo , ein: wigi: age tid .
46012022	Hau: tho' moo: je" wigi - gung doem: mo , yoem: neung: yhang: te" da" akung: ako'' aboo loo: za: ngoonu" ayo" nyid boem nghoid da .
46012023	Gung doem: mo houg: yhi' gyeing akyu" abo yhang: te" da - akung: ako'' joem ri je" wigi - yhoug: gyen: khyo" wigi - yu" coung: nyid boem . Ngoonu" da" ayung" alho , da" akung: ako'' joem ri - je" yung" sho' ngoonu" lhoo , yhung byid: nyid boem bye .
46012024	Yung" gu nghoid da" akung: ako'' rikoem gi lhoo , yhung byid: aca" loo . Myo , nhoo: abo da" akung: ako'' rigi - je" wigi: myonhoo: yoo" nhang: wa shid re" Mangsoo nyang: hau: ziri: lhoo , yhung byid: to .
46012025	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - gung doem: mo da" akung: ako'' joem gi nyang: cang" nyang: - suid" kho' go" khyoo: aboo loo: za: houg: yhang: te" adu , go" da" akung: ako'' joem gi dayoug shid re" dayug - seing" kho" gung youg youg go" se' nyid boem .
46012026	Houg: yhang" te" da" akung: ako'" daloem: gi noo , phyoo" jam , jau gye" shau" nyid uri - akung: ako'' gootu: we' houg: yo' dage" bo no nyid bye . Akung: ako' daloem: ri coung nghei , byid: zi shau" nghoid rigi - gootu: akung: ako'' joem dangain" we' - hau: da" gau yi ngei bu: khyoo: ri bo , shau" kham: yu nyid boem .
46012027	Akhid" nanu" dangain" bang: gi Khristu da" gung doem joem nghoid boem wigi - yug khang" moo" gi houg: mo akung: ako'' joem nghoid .
46012028	Mangsoo gi hau: da" phung: moo - daloem: ein: jang" moo: Lagyoo: yi-eig loem" ein: joyoo moo gi Lapi: yi - soem" loem: joyoo moo: gi Sara yi hau: thang: ri alhoo: again toin" shid' mo hau: thang: moo: byu gooji ri yo" pang" yo" thoug khyoo: se' toin" shid' mo hau: thang: moo:-noo phyoo" joem ri se' gai gi byid: da" yoem: boo bang - mung main: dang: se' tid da" ludaid' yi yo' gooki" lid' da" dang: aja: ja: se' tid mo , ri we' - nya: joyoo moo: nyid nhang: bye .
46012029	Nyangnu" dangain" bang: gi lagyoo: yi nghoid go" la" dangain" bang: lapi: nghoid go la" Nyangnu" dangain" bang: gi sara yi nghoid boem la" dangain" bang: gi alhoo: again yo" koid shug go" la"
46012030	Nyangnu" dangain" bang: gi noo phyoo" ri se' byang" ge da" jeju" yoo" bang: nghoid la" Nyangnu" dangain" bang: myeing aja: ja: se' kaid go" la" dangain" bang: gi tid nyid da" dang: kang: ri se' phoid: kyoo" bang: nghoid go" la"
46012031	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo - nanu" gi je" gyi: da" jeju" jhung: shug ri yo" kham: yu wa shid re" - nheig nhei: vho: ngei nyid ge' . Ngoo gi nanu" ri je" gyi: da" khyoo: zeing dakhaid ri toin" shid' shi" wa .
46013001	Ngoo gi byu da" dang: yo' mau lagyoo: yi da" dang - aja" ja: se' tid nghoid loug we' - jheddab nheigloem: abo rigi - baid' myheung da" mang" thui: yo' myeing tei" to" da" shab , sheing: yo' dadu nyid .
46013002	Ngoo gi lapi: se' pe: ziyo' - no , da" dang: kang dangain" ziri - se' myab , thang da" phajhi" aja" ja: yo' joeb , byeung" lho: wigi - boem , ri yo" doin: shu" pyam sho' da" - loem" jeung" emyid , boo nghoid loug we' - jheddab da" nheigloem: abo rigi: ngoo ci" we' anghoid .
46013003	Ngoo yo" da" nga" ziyoo soid gain' dangain" ri - ngoo cang gam byid: pyam lho: wigi-Ngoo nya: gung doem: ri: we' myi: moo: yo" nghe , pyamsho' da" xoin" yo" to' pyam ri nghoid loug we'-jheddab nheigloem: abo rigi: nga" shid re" ce" akyu" we' aboo .
46013004	jheddab , da" nheigloem: gi nheigloem: sheung: nyid - nheig khyeug nyid - no" zo , zi aboo - phau: khuang nghoid boin - khyoo: aboo .
46013005	Jheddab nheigloem: gi se' phoug" se' myang: - nya: akyu" ashoo - nheig yoo: ung: jhen: khyoo: aboo - jheddab da" nheigloem: gi sube' da" yooboo ri axoem" too .
46013006	Jheddab da" nheigloem: gi adeing: amain" ziyo' akhyeing" ashoeb da" khyoo: moo: agoug loo: za: hau: deingmain" khyoo: moo: gau , yi nyid .
46013007	Jheddab da" nheigloem: gi khanham we' asoem" kham' khyoo: ajo , - khanham we' loem" jeung" nyid - khanham we' nheig byu nyid - khanham we' kham' zeung: nyid .
46013008	Jheddab nheigloem: gi apyaid' atoo: moo: dajo , jo - gye" no , da" mungdang: joem , gi daso , moo: bei: lo" byug wa dang: aja: ja: se' tid khyoo: nghoid rigi - no: lo" byug wa lasi laleig khyoo: we' lai lo" byug wa zi nghoid .
46013009	Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoonu" da" lasi laleig jeju" jhung: shug joem yo' Venyi vang byid: lho: lapi: dang: khyo" kho" kyo" da" mungdang: joem gi ajoeb byeung" nghoid da .
46013010	Nghoid loug we' hau: joeb , byeung" zi ju" ri" lang" gi ajoeb abyeung" zigi: bei: lo" byug wa zi nghoid .
46013011	Ngoo zooshang: nghoid shi" ayo , moo: gi ngoo zooshang: myeing" kaid nyid . zoonu" myid boo - zoonu" ti" myid soin: thu' nyid . akhid" ngoo ludaid' bue" loo lang" - zooshang: aved , ri ngoo to" pyam .
46013012	Akhid" ngoo myang nyid zigi - bang teing moo - yoeb , yoeb , za: date: myang nyid . Thang: phyang" ngoonu" gi myo , moo: gyo' gyo' nyang: shau" myang goo" wa . Akhid" ngoo se' khyoo: gi ajoeb abyeung" za: danghoid - Hau: uri: gi Mangsoo ngoori: se' yhang: ti" - ngoo we' joeb , byeung" sho' se' wam: bye .
46013013	Akhid" koem gi loem" jeung da" khyoo - nheig byu joyoo yo' jheddab nheigloem: ein: zi soem" ja: jo , nghoid loug we' hau: gu: moo: je" gyi: thang zigi - jheddab nheigloem: nghoid .
46014001	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - jheddab da" nheigloem: ri yo" yu sho' - yoem: kaid nyid ge' . Venyi jeju" jhung" shug joem ri vho: ngei nyid ge' . Je" wigi: hau: mungdang: ri kho" kyoo" wa da" jeju" jhung: shug ri vho: ngei nyid ge' .
46014002	Gooki" lid' da" dang: ri se' tid su: gi gooji yo' doem' go" nyid zi anghoid . Mangsoo yo' doem' go" nyid zi nghoid . Khasu" wim ga: ri nya: da" dang: ri hang" we' ase' gyoo: byid nyang: gi Venyi yoem: vhoo" yo" sen: lho: dang: kang: no , da" - deingmain" khyoo: ri tid nyid zi nghoid .
46014003	Nghoid loug we' Mangso da" mungdang: ri kho" kyo" nyid su: gi byu yi ri geung: teung loo" nhang: da" dang: - yoem: byid: da" dang: - nheig teing ung: teing byid: da" dang: ri tid nyid .
46014004	Gooki" lid' da" dang: aja: ja: ri tid nyid su: gi nya: gung doem: ri za: da te: yo" geung" teing nhang: - nghoid loug we" Mangso da" mungdang: ri kho" kyo" nyid su: gi hau: da" phung: goin" ziri: yo" geung: teing loo nhang: nyid .
46014005	Nanu" nyid moo: nyid bang: gi gooki" lid' da" dang: tid wa ziri - ngoo vho: ngei nyid - nghoid loug we' Mangso mungdang: ri yo" kho" kyoo" wa da" - yoem: vhoo" yo' sen: da" jeju" ri je" yo" yu nhang: nau nyid . Khasu" wim ga: ri gooki" lid' da" dang: ri se' tid su: gi nyang: tid da" dang: kang: ri - phoid kyoo" su: nyid ri she' - hau: phung: ri dayo" geung: teing nhang . Hougsu" anghoid rigi - Mangso mungdang: kho" kyoo" su: gi gooki" lid' da" dang: se' tid su: tho' moo: phoung" je , dab , nyid .
46014006	Houg: yoomo mang: nhung" yi we" - Akhid" ngoo nanu" jang" moo: ju" re" lho: gooki" lid: da" dang: aj" a: ja: tid nghoid loug we' - Mangso jang" mo lapi: dang: - lasi laleig da" dang: - Venyi: wigi: fang byid: da" mungdang: jhoug" byid: mhoo , byid: da" dang: - ngoo nanu" ri atid nghoid rigi - nanu" shid re" ce: akyu" boo wa la" ce" akyu" we' aboo .
46014007	Khoolhang anghoid lang" gi teing yhang: te" kangso abo baid myheung ja: ri yu" shang . Hougsu" baid myheung da" thui: ri bang bang abaid myheung rigi - kha: yug gi khasu" ga: gyo: kho' yu wa la"
46014008	Laboo" ri moid' su: gi nya: thui: ri se' gyo: kho' wa khyo" - bang bang za: amoid nghoid rigi - kha: yug gi gyi too , wa shid re" se' nyheing soin' wa lha"
46014009	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" gooki" lid' da" dang: aja" ja: yo' nanu" tid nyid da" dang: gi bang" bang anghoid rigi - kha: yug khasu" ga: se' gyo: yu wa la" Nanu" da" dang: khoin" joem gi lid moo: bo , dang: lo" byug wa zi nghoid .
46014010	He: moug: myid tho' moo: myeing" aja" ja: boo nghoid loug we' - ce: ja: byumyu" yi da" myeing" nghoid loug we' - dang: kang: abo zi gi ajo .
46014011	Nghoid loug we' - ngoo ase' gyo: da" byumyu" myeing" kaid da" zigi - nga" shid re' tung boug nghoid wigi - ngoo we' hau: youg shid mo tung: boug za: bue" nyid wa nghoid .
46014012	Nanu" gi Venyi jhung: shug ri vho: ngei nyid boem yoomo - hau" da phung: gyi: sheung: loo wa shid re" - geung: teing nhang: da" Venyi jhung: shug ri je" wigi: yo" ci: yhung: wa shid re" - ziyoo jo , nu" dangain" tho' moo: je" wigi: - cang sho: yu nyid ge' .
46014013	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - gooki" lid da" dang: aja: ja: tid nyid su: gi nyang: nyang: tid nyid da" dang: akang: ri se' phoid: kyoo" jeju" yoem: vhoo" yo" yu wa shid re" nyang: akyu" mho' nyid baja" .
46014014	Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoo gi myeing" aja: ja: khyo" akyu" mho' nyid da" ayo , moo - gyeing" nyang: nga" da" venyi gi akyu" mho' nyid nghoid loug we' - nga" nheigloem: gi hau: jang" moo: aboo .
46014015	Houg: ri ngoo khasu" koid wa lha" Ngoo gi nga" Venyi yo' akyu" mho' lho: wigi - nga" emyid , yo" we' akyu" mho' wa zi nghoid . Nga" Venyi yo' ngoo jikhoin" khoin" wigi - nga" emyid , yo' we' jikhoin" khoin" nyid wa zi nghoid .
46014016	Nanu" gi Venyi khyo" za: Mangsoo ri jeju" boin: da" dang: tid nghoid rigi - akyu" mho' phung: moo: bo nyid da" - phung: byu dayug gi nanu" tid da" dang: ri ase' gyoo: yoomo - nanu" da" jeju" boin: akyu" mho' da" dang: ri - khasu" wigi: Amen , ga: yo" bo tid wa la"
46014017	Jeju" ri boin: coung" da" nanu" akyu" mho' dang: gi khayhi' gi nghoid loug we' - byu gootu: shid re" geung: teing" nhang: da" akyu" gi ci: yo" yu boem wa zi anghoid .
46014018	Nanu" hang" da" atho moo: we' - gooki" lid' da dang: aja" ja: ngoo se' tid yoomo - Mangsoo ri ngoo coung" nghei nyid .
46014019	Nghoid loug we' - noku akyu" mho' nyid uri - gooki" lid da" dang: aja" ja: khyeing" moin" yo" tid wa tho' re" gi byu gooji yi ri jhau" byid: wa shid re" - se' gyo: da" dang: khoin" wim: khoin" za: yo' ngoo je" wigi: tid nau nyid .
46014020	Mang: nhung" yi we" - myid soin: yu" ca" da" khyoo: moo: zooshang ti" akoid nyid goo" akhyeing" ashoeb khyoo: moo gi zooshang: ti" bui" nyid ge' . Myid soin: yu" khyoo: moo: gi nheig boo ludaid' bue" nyid loo: ge' .
46014021	Hau: jhoem: mungdang: moo: lhid" to" zigi - Nga" da" byumyu" yi ri - myeing" aja" ja: kaid mo , da" khoin" thui: yo' ngoo tid wa zi nghoid . Hougsu" nghoid lang" gi nga" da" byumyu" yi gi ngoori: tam" gyo: goo" zi anghoid ga: tid .
46014022	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - gooki" lid da" dang: tid da" yoem: vhoo" gi aloem" ajeung" bang: shid re" - sagsi: alhoo: nghoid nyid . Loem" jeing" bang: shid re" anghoid . Mangso mungdang: yo" kho" kyo" da" jeju" yoem: so' jhung: shug koem gi loem" jeing" bang: shid re" - sagsi: alhoo: nghoid . Aloem" ajeung" bang: shid re" anghoid .
46014023	Hougsu" wigi - hau: da" phung: goin" bang: zeung: foem: nyid boem: wigi - dangain" bang: gi gooki" lid da" myeing" aja: ja: khyo" tid go" nyid boem ri - ase' gyo: da" yu" maya" byu yi gi houg: su" anghoid lang" aloem" ajeung" bang: ju" vang lo rigi - nanu" dangain" koo" myeing" kaid nyid boem , ga: wigi: nyangnu" tid boem wa zi anghoid goo" la"
46014024	Nghoid loug we' byu yug khang" moo" gi Mangso mungdang: kho" kyo" nyid boem nghoid rigi - aloem" ajeung" bang - hougsu" anghoid lang" yu maya" byu yi ju" vang lo boem nghoid rigi - nyangnu" shoug" gyo: da" mungdang: yoomo - nyangnu" gi yooboo yoo" bang: nghoid ziri - goolhoo: nyang: se' gyo: boin: gyeung: lo" boem wa zi nghoid .
46014025	Nyangnu" shoug" gyo: da" mungdang: joem yoomo - nyangnu" da" nheigloem: emyid , khoug: moo: tarha" dang: kho' nyid zi shau" wigi - nyangnu" zau" to" da" age , khyoo: gi bang thu loo wa nghoid wigi - nyangnu" gi boe , no" lho: Mangsoo ri loem , khau: ziyo' - Gyeing" nyang: Mangsoo gi ngoonu" yo' dage" he: khyi , moo: nyid nyid nhung ga: yhen: yu boem wa zi nghoid .
46014026	Houg: yoomo mang: nhung" yi we" - ngoo tid nau khyoo: gi hidsu" nghoid . Nanu" noku wa ga: zeung: foem: to" uri - dayug gi jihkoin" shu" vhu" shi: baja" Gootu: dayug gi jhau" byid: khyoo - gootu: dayug gi Mangso jang" mo yoeb , myang dang hau: lho: gootu: dayug gi gooki" lid' da" dang: yo' tid da" mungdang - hau: lho: dayug gi hau: mungdang: da" dang: kang: ri phoid: kyo" da" moo" ri voin , vu , nyid ge' . Nanu" zei: da" moo" dangain" gi hau: phung ri pang" thoug geung: teing nhang: da" shid re zei: so' nyid ge' .
46014027	Byu dayug yug gi gooki" lid' da" dang: ri tid wa nghoid rigi - myo: thang gi byu eig yug - hougsu" anghoid lang" gi soem" yug dayoug thang: moo: dayug tid wigi - dayug gi hau: da" dang: kang: ri phoid: kyoo" baja" .
46014028	Nghoid loug we' - dang: kang: ri phoid: kyoo" wa da" byu anyid nghoid rigi - gooki" lid' da" dang: aja: ja: tid nau nghoid ri - hau: phung moo: nyang: gi sam" zoo: nyid lho: wigi - nya: gung doem: yo' Mangsoo ri nheigloem: khoug: moo: za: tid nyid baja" .
46014029	Mangso mungdang: kho" kyoo" wa shid re" yoeb , myang kham: yu da" byu eig yug dang: tid wigi - gooji yi gi nyangnu" tid da" dang: ri - myid soin: yu" nyid goo" baja" .
46014030	Nghoid loug we' hau: phung moo: bo zhoung: jo , da" byu dayug yug gi Mangso jang" mo mungdang: daja: ja: yo" yu nghoid rigi - dang: tid nyid su: no: loo" baja" .
46014031	Nanu" dayug yo' dayug gi jhau" mho' yu ziyo' yoem: yu" yu wa khyo" - nanu" dangain" bang: dayoug thang: moo: dayug - Mangso mungdang: ri yo" kho" kyo" nyid boem ago" .
46014032	He: da" Mangso mungdang: kho" kyo" da" jeju" jhung: shug gi kho" kyoo" su: da" vhoeb khang" da" akhoug: moo: nghoid nyid ca .
46014033	Khasu" wim gari - Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri - anhung akhoid' khyoo: moo: anyid nhang: nhoug looza - ngei pyoo: myenjham" ziyo' - ngeiloug jen" yisoem" si: khyo" danyid nhang: nau .
46014034	Mangso da" byu phung: yi dangain" jang" moo - cang nyid da" akyoo" again yi: dakhyoo" ti" myiyi: yi gi hau: zoeb , phung: moo: sam" zoo: nyid nyid goo" baja" nyangnu" gi dang: tid wa da" akhang" ajo , Yuda be" da" tarha" moo: tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" nyangnu" gi shu" vhu" shi: mo , age , koid .
46014035	Nyangnu" gi khyoo: daja: ja: ri si' nau boem nghoid rigi - yhoem: moo: nyangnu" da" yhoem: seing: phoo , be" jang" mo myid: yu goo" baja" . Phung zoeb , phung moo: myiyi: zoo: dayug yug dang: tid wa zigi: asho' ashid: danghoid nyid .
46014036	Mangso da" mungdang: gi nanu" jang" mo thu' lo zi nghoid go" la" Hougsu" anghoid lang" nanu" jang" moo: kyeing" hau: mungdang: ju" lo zi nghoid go" la"
46014037	Byu dayug yug gi nyang: nya: da" gung doem: ri - Mangso da" lagyoo: nghoid - hougsu" anghoid lang" gi Venyi jhung: shug yo" yu su: nghoid ga: shau" myid yu nghoid rigi - Aseing da" amyeing" yo' he: moug soug" ri ngoo lhid" kaid ziri: se' gyoo: baja" .
46014038	Byu dayug yug gi he: khyoo: ri atam" gyo: nghoid rigi - nyang: ri ci: we' asoin: byid: go" - nyang: tid dang: ri we' hang" atam" gyoo: byid: goo .
46014039	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo mang: nhung" yi we" - nanu" gi Mangso mungdang: ri - kho" kyoo" wa khyoo: moo: myid loem" lho: wigi - vho: ngei nyid ge' . Nghoid loug we' gooki" lid' da" myeing" aja: ja: kaid su: ri we' atoem: pyam byid: goo .
46014040	Khyoo: khaid gu: khang" moo" ri - yu" du yu" young" khyo" - voin , vu , yoem: kaid wa su: ca" nyid .
46015001	Mang: nhung" yi we" - ngoo nanu" ri kho" kyo" lho: wigi - nanu" we' lhoem: kham: yu bye: ziyo' - hau: jang" moo: nanu" da" loem" jeung myid' geung: geung: teing teing nghoid jo , bye: ziyo' - hau: ngei bu: lu dang: gi ri ngoo nanu" ri doem tid poin" nau .
46015002	Hau: ngei bu: lu dang: ein: zigi: ngoo nanu" ri kho" kyo" yu" bye: da" mungdang: nghoid . Nanu" gi hau: ngei bu: lu dang: moo: geung: geung: teing teing nghe: khau: nyid boem nghoid rigi - nanu" khyoid yu zi shau" boem wa nghoid . Hougsu" anghoid rigi - nanu" da" loem" jeung khyoo: gi amyed , afoo" loem" jeung" pyam zi za: danghoid wa .
46015003	Khasu" wim gari - ngoo kham: yu bye: da" akhyag thang da" khyoo: joem ri - ngoo nanu" ri tid kyo" kaid bye - Hau: khyoo: gi jhoem: mungdang: moo: lhid" to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" Khirstu gi ngoonu" da" youg: noo yooboo shid mo shid: kham: byid: bye .
46015004	Nyhoeb , pyam zi nyang: shau" lho: wigi - jhoem: mungdang: moo: tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" soem" nyid" soem" myen , ri doem dei too' loo bye .
46015005	Petru jang" moo: thu' shug byid: bye - hau: thang: ri cang: zoo: daxe: eig yug bang: jang" moo" thu' myang shug bye .
46015006	Hau: thang: ri dalheung: dam' - nyang: thang: moo: cang yu" bye: da" - mang: nhung" yi 500 yug bang: jang" moo: dalheing: dam' dam' thu' myhang shug bye . Nyang: nau" mo , myoo: loo boug gi akhid" kangso dei nyid ashi" go , dayham" bang: koem gi yhoeb , pyo: lo' byoug boem bye .
46015007	Hau: thang: ri Yaku , jang" moo - hau: thang: ri lagyoo: yi dangain" bang: jang" moo - nyang: thu' shug bye .
46015008	Lo" thang jang" moo: gi ngoo bidnyid abyeung" shi" ri khu: lo da" zooshang: te" su: jang" moo: we' nyang: thu' shug bye .
46015009	Khasu" wim gari - lagyoo: yi moo: nge thang su: ngoo nghoid . Mangso da" phung: ri shen" yhen bye: yoomo - lagyoo: ein: wa zi lang amoin: loo .
46015010	Hougsu" nghoid loug we' - Mangso jeju" yoomo - ngoo gi he: yam" nghoid nyid . Nyang: ngoori: byid: da" jeju" gi akoem: anghoid loo-gootu: lagyoo: yi tho' moo: ngoo moo" ri je" voin , vu , bye . Hougsu" yo" koid da" khyoo: gi nga" da" yoem: so' khyo" anghoid - ngoo yo' dage" moo" zei: nyid da" - Mangso jeju" yoomo za: date: nghoid .
46015011	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo - ngoo nghoid loug we' gootu: lagyoo: yi nghoid loug we' - he: da" mungdang: ri za: ngoonu" kho" kyo" tid fu" lo" ziyo' - nanu" we' hau: ziri: loem" jeing" lo abye: go .
46015012	Akhid" Khristu gi shid: jang" mo doem dei to loo bye: khyoo: ngoonu" kho" kyo" nyid uri - shid: byug bye: bang: doem dei to lo khyoo: ajo , - ga: wigi: nanu" mo dayham" gi khasu" gi yo" tid nyid go" lha"
46015013	Hau: dang: dajo Khristu gi shid: da" jang" mo doem dei to loo nhang: zi ashoug" shi" khyo" danghoid nyid .
46015014	Hau: lho: Khristu gi shid: da" jang" mo adoem dei to' loo nhang: shi" nghoid rigi - ngoonu" we' ci: kho" kyoo" joyoo ajo . Nanu" we' ce: loem" jeing" wa khyoo: ajo .
46015015	Hau: tho' moo: goo" tu - ngoonu" gi Mangso khyoo: moo: mhau , da" sagsi: yi bue" lo" boem bye . Khasu" wim ga: ri Mangsoo gi Khristu ri shid: jang" mo doem dei to' loo nhang: bye: ein: - ngoonu" tid boem bye . Gyeing" nyang shid: bye: bang: ri - kangso dei nyid jang" khyoo: adoem tu: to' kaid nghoid rigi - Mangsoo gi Khristu ri shid: jang" mo doem tu: to' kaid wa zi anghoid .
46015016	Mangsoo gi bain shid: bye: bang: ri - adoem tu: to kaid nghoid rigi - Khristu ri we' doem tu: to' kaid wa zi anghoid .
46015017	Khirstu gi doem tu: to' dei kaid zi ashau" rigi - nanu" da" loem jeung" khyoo: gi loem shoid da" khyoo: za: nghoid lho: nanu" gi nanu" nya: da" yooboo moo: danoeb , jo , boem shi" wa .
46015018	Hau: tho' moo: goo tu - Khristu ri loem" jeung" lho: shid: lo" byug bye: bang: we' - soem" byug zi shau" boem bye .
46015019	He: pyaid' moo: za: Khristu moo: nheig byu jo yoo bo nghoid rigi - moug: myid byu yi dangain" moo - je" ci: abui" adoid' mo , bue" boem bye .
46015020	Nghoid loug we' - gyeing" nyang: bue" loo bye: khyoo: gi Khirstu gi shid: bye: jang" mo doem dei to' loo nhang: zi shoug" bye - houg: yoomo nyang: gi yhoeb , pyo: loo" mo' mo xang: shid" zei: lo da" ashi" bue" loo bye .
46015021	Khasu" wim gari - byu dayug yoomo - shid: loo" no lo" zi bue" lo yhang ti" byu dayug yoomo we' shid: bye: bang: shid re" doem dei to' loo wa khyoo: bue" loo bye .
46015022	Xangsu" byu yi dangain" mo , gi Adam yo' dayug za: nghoid nyid boem yoomo - shid: lo" boem bye . Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" Khirstu yo' dayug za: nghoid nyid boem bye: yoomo - shid: bye: jang" mo kangso dei nyid jang" khyoo - doem tu: to' kaid zi shau" boem wa nghoid bye .
46015023	Nghoid loug we' - byu yug khang" moo" gi nyang: nya: da" too' eung: da" ayo , moo: doem tu: to' kaid wa zi nghoid . Khristu gi dangain" mo , da" shid' khyoo: doem dei to' loo" bye - hau: thang: ri Khristu doem ju" re" da" ayo , mo nyang: yo' sen: bang: doem dei to' loo wa zi nghoid .
46015024	Khristu gi Venyi soobyoo , dangain" ri vhoeb khang" mo , yo' yoem: zeing so' moo" boo bang: dangain" ziri - oung: doid' pyam lho: hau: mungdain ri nya: phoo Mangso da" lo , moo: ab byid: pyam wa . Hau: thang: ri she' lo" thang da" bidnyid ju" loo wa zi nghoid .
46015025	Khasu" wim ga: ri Mangsoo gi gyi phung dangain" ziri: oung: lo" lho: Nya: da" khyid: voo: khoug: khyoo: kaid pyam da" ayo , ju" sho' - Khristu gi vhoeb khang" nyid wa zi nghoid .
46015026	Lo" thang jang" moo: oung: doid' pyam wa da" gyi voo phoo , gi shid: zoug: nghoid nyid .
46015027	Jhoem: mungdang: moo: Mangsoo gi ziyoo jo , moo jo , ri - nya: khyid: voo: khoug: moo: kaid pyam bye ga: tid to . Ziyoo jo , moo: jo , ga: tid jang" moo - jo , moo jo , ri Khristu da" akhoug: moo: kaid pyam da" Mangsoo nya: gung nyang: - koem gi abo da" khyoo: bang bang myang nyid .
46015028	Nghoid loug we ziyoo jo , moo jo , ri - Khristu vhoeb khang" nyid da" akhoug: moo - bain kaid to" thang: rigi - hau: nya: zoo: nyang - Nya: gung doem ri ziyoo jo , moo jo , ri - nya: da" akhoug: moo: kaid too" byid: da" Mangso da" vhoo: moo - to" too" wa zi nghoid . Hougsu" wim Mangsoo gi jo , moo: jo , dangain" da" atho' moo: vhoeb khang" nyid wa zi nghoid .
46015029	Akhid" shid: loo" bye: bang: shid re" - nyangnu" da" gung thid' khyo" wigi - Babtisma yu da" byu yi khyoo: gi khasu" nghoid la" Ce: noem ri nheig byu lho: koid go" la" dayham" loem" jeung" nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" shid: byug bye: bang: kangso doem yo" dei nyid wa khyoo: tu: to' kaid khyoo: aboo lo zi deung nghoid rigi - shid: byug bye: bang: shid re" - ga: wigi: ci yoomo hid: bang: Babtisma yu boem la"
46015030	Yha" da" shid re" tid shang ein: rigi - ciyoomo ayo , loem: khang" moo" moo - gyoug dain' ci , mau" khyoo: ri ngoonu" kham' zo: nyid boem la"
46015031	Mang: nhung" yi we" - ngoo gi nyid" khang" moo" shid: gyoin' noogyoin' za: dathoung" shau" nyid . Yha" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu moo: daloem: dadeing: za: nghoid da - yha" da" kangso moo: nanu" da" atho' moo: phau: khuang myonhoo: shoo: yoomo - ngoo hidsu" yo" tid zi nghoid .
46015032	Byu da" myeing" khyo" tid rigi - Ephesu voo moo" mo da" myeing khuid" zeig ni joem yo' ngoo zain: go" zigi: nga" shid re" - ce: akyu" bo la" shid: byug bye: bang: ri adoem tu: to' dei loo nhang: nghoid rigi - dang: khyang jo , ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nyangnu" zoo: pyo: shug pyo: nyid boem shang ci yoomo ga: ri - nab , yo nyid" ngoonu" shid: lo" boem wam: bye .
46015033	Nanu gi khyoo: avhang: goo" age da" luzoem" cang" yi: ge da" asam" aved' ri lhu: phyo' pyam byid: nyid .
46015034	Nheig boo ung: gyeung: da" khyoo: moo - doem boin: gyeung: loo loo: ge' . Nanu" koid nyid da" yooboo khyoo: ri she: pyam khoo , loo: ge' . Nanu" mo byu dayham" bang: gi Mangsoo ri asi' nghoid ago" . Ngoo hidsu" ein: tid da" khyoo: gi nanu" ri sho' thu' nhang: wa shid re" nghoid .
46015035	Shid: bye: bang: ri - kha khyo" wigi: doem dei tu: to' kaid wa lha" khayhang: te" da" gung doem: doem yoo" wa lha" byu dayug yug gi: myid: loo wa zi nghoid .
46015036	Koo" pyoid' we" nang gi myid jang: moo: gug myoug: cab , ri sho" kaid ri - hau: myoug: shi" cab , gi ayoin" lo" rigi: yug thu' loo wa zi nghoid .
46015037	Nang myid' jang: moo: sho" kaid da" myoug shi" cab , gi sung: soo: gug shi" anghoid lang" - gootu: shivoo: myoug: shi" da cab , cab , za: nghoid . Thang: ri youg thu' re" da" agam , joem gi akhang nang sho" kaid da" myoug: shi" cab , gi anghoid loo .
46015038	Mangsoo gi vho: ngei da" gung doem byid nyid - nyang: gi myoug: shi" cab , khang" moo" ri - nyang: vho: ngei da" gung doem: byid: nyid .
46015039	Kangso dei nyid bang: da" gung doem: gi daja: za: anghoid . xangsu: byu yi da" gung shoo" gootu - gougnyhoug joem da" gung shoo: gootu - ngho' joem da" gung shoo" gi gootu - ngoo do' joem da" gung shoo" gi gootu: nghoid nyid .
46015040	Moug: khung: moug: di yo' sen: da" gung doem joem - moug myid yo' sen: da" gung doem joem - ga: wigi: jo , jo - moug: khung: moug: di yo' sen: da" gung doem: joem da' young" khyoo gi moug: myidmo , gung doem young" khyoo: yo' shai" jo .
46015041	Bid' we' young" bang khyoo: nyang: gootu: yo" - lham" moo" we' nya: young" du , khyoo: jo - kyi: joem we' nyangnu" da' young" khyoo: gootu: tu: yo" ago - kyi: joem moo: lang" ri dacab , yo' dacab , da' young khyoo: adu , goo" nghoid da .
46015042	Shid: byug bye: bang: ri - kangso doem kaid byid: lho: tu: to' kaid da" uri: we' - houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" nghoid nyid . Hau: gung doem: ri myhoeb , pyam uri: - houg: gi shid: se' da" gung doem nghoid - nghoid loug we' doem dei tu: to' kaid uri da" gung doem: gi ase' shid: lo da" gung doem nghoid wa nghoid .
46015043	Nyhoeb , pyam uri: gi ayung" alho , aco' ajhoid - ce: yoem: we' aboo lo: zi nghoid . Doem dei tu: to' kaid uri: gi gye" young" lho , ziyo' yoem: moo" so' moo" bo da" zi nghoid wa .
46015044	Nyhoeb , pyam uri: gi moug: myid gung shoo" za: date: nghoid . Deom dei tu: to' kaid uri: gi Venyi gung doem bui" wa zi nghoid . Moug: myid mo gung doem: ri yo" jo , yoomo - Venyi gung doem: we' yoo" ca" nyid .
46015045	Jhoem: mungdang: moo: tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" xang: shid" mo Adam: gi kangso dei da" xangsu: byu khyo" phain" so: too" bye - nghoid loug we' thang: mo da" Adam gi khang: so' dei loo: nhang: da Venyi: nghoid nyid .
46015046	Venyi gung doem: shi" xang: shid" moo: ju" re" zi anghoid - moug: myid mo da" gung deom: gi xang: shid" nyid lo wigi - thang: ri she , Venyi gung doem: nyid lo .
46015047	Xang: shid" mo da" byu Adam gi myid zhoo" yo' phain" to" wigi - myid jang: tho' moo: byu nghoid . Thang: re da" Adam koem gi moug: khung: moug di khyo" ju" re" zi nghoid nyid .
46015048	Moug: myid yo' sen: da" byu yi gi myid zhoo" phei" yo' phain" too" shoug" su: yo' du , go" nyid - moug: khung: yo' sen: bang: gi moug: khung: khyo" gyoo" lo da" byu yo' du go nyid .
46015049	Myid' zhoo" phei" yo' koid da' byu yo' du , go" da" gung du: ri ngoonu" void , ci: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" moug: khung: khyo" gyoo" re" da" byu yo' du , go" da" gung doem: ri we' - ngoonu" void , ci: boem wa nghoid .
46015050	Mang: nhung" yi we" - ngoo nanu" ri tid kyoo" nau da" dang: gi suid" shoo" yo' phain" so: to" da" gung doem: gi Mangso mungdain ri - agyid asoo: khyo" ayo" kham: yu ziyo' - se' shid: byug da" gung doem: gi ase' shid: byug da" gung doem: ri ayo" seing: yu .
46015051	Tam" gyo: yu" ge' - dang: kang: no , da" deingmain" da" khyoo: dakhaid - nanu' ri ngoo tid kyoo" ba , - nyhang" dangain" bang: jha" shid: byug wa zi anghoid .
46015052	Nghoid loug we' - lo" thang da" laboo" myeung lo da" uri - nyeigdain tung" myo , damyeig mo: - nyhang" dangain" bang: yo , zoo: ti" yoem" khyoid' loo" khari" wa nghoid .
