Khristu se' lo da" lasi , laleug gi nam , pyo: da" shoem: yhang: ti" - joyoo khyi khang" moo myoo - byo loo" nhang: wa shid re" Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri ci: yhoung" nyid bye .
47002015	Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" gi Mangso jang" moo Khristu xoin" to' bye: da" nampyo: shoem: yo' du nyid boem bye . Hougsu" nampyo" da" shoem: gi khyoid yu zi shau" bye: mo , moo we' soem" joem: lo" zi shau" bang: jang moo we' byo sain" loo" bye .
47002016	Hau: da" shoem: gi soem:" joem: loo" shau" mo , shid re" gi shid: loo" nhang: da" shid" gyoem: noo gyoem: bui: lo" lho: Khyoid yu zi shau" bye: bang: da" shid re" gi kangso' dei loo nhang: da" ngei pyo: da" shoem: nghoid nyid . Houg: yoomo houg: yhang: te" moozoo" ri voin wu , wa shid re" gi khayug moin: yi" nyid lha" .
47002017	Nyhang" gi byu gootu: myoo" sho' bang: yhang: ti" - Mangso da" mungdang: ri ce: phoug" adab da" phaga" zi yhang: ti" - oung" khyoo: qei khyoo: ngoonu" akoid boem . Nghoid loug we' ngoonu" gi Mangsoo nhang: kaid mo , nghoid wigi Khristu da" deizoo: yi khyo" wigi Mangso da" shidkhoin" moo hau: mungdang: ri deungmain" gyeung: shang: da" nheigloem: yo' kho" kyo" boem zi nghoid .
47003001	Hidsu" ein: tid zigi ngoonu" da" khyoo: ri ngoonu" nyang: phau: khuang tid zi nghoid la" . Byu dayham" bang: yhang: ti" - ngoonu" gi ngoonu" da" khyoo: bo pang" thoug byid: da" mougsoug" - nanu" ri byid: ca" shi" la" . Houg su" anghoid lang" gi nanu" jang" mo bo pang" thoug da" mougsoug" ri mho' voin ca" shi" la" .
47003002	Nanu" nya: gung nyang: byu hang" we' nghab yu" lho" si wa shid mo ngoonu" da" e" myed nheigloem: khoug: moo lhid" to" da" lhid" cab , nyang: nghoid boem bye .
47003003	Hau: lhid" cab ri Khristu nyang: nyang lhid" lho: ngoonu" ri foin: kaid zigi bang bang nyang nghoid nyid . Hau: moug soig" ri mhug yeung yo' alhid" loo: za: Dei nyid da" Mangso Venyi yo' hau: lug yho' joem moo anghoid loo: za: Xangsu: byu yi da" nheigloem: emyid khoug: moo lhid" yoin" to .
47003004	Ngoonu" hidsu" ein: tid zigi Ngoonu" gi Khristu yoomo Mangsoo jang" mo nheig shid: nheig deug da" khyoo: yo" yu boem yoomo nghoid nyid .
47003005	Ngoonu" gi he: da" moo" ri yo" zei: ein: yo" tid wa ngoonu" moo ce" yoem: so' we' abo boem › Ngoonu" yo" yu da" yoem: so' gi Mangso jang" mo za: nghoid nyid .
47003006	Ngoonu" gi dang: theung thang" cab , da" shid re" moozoo" yo" voin vu , boem baja" - ngoonu" ri yoem: vhoo" byid: su: gi hau: aseig: nyang: nghoid nyid hau: dang: theung da" thang" cab aseig gi lhid" to" da" mougsoug" moo bo zi anghoid loo za: Venyi jang" mo nghoid nyid . Khasumvimgari lhid" cab , yo' lhid" to" da" tarha" gi kangso ri said pyam nyid lho: Hau: Venyi koem gi kangso' ri dei loo nhang: nyid .
47003007	Lug yho' moo lhid" to" da" tarha" ri byid: da" uri Mangso da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb doug bang thu lo nyid . Hau: myonhoo: phung" yoeb da" bang yi lo zigi Moshe da" myonhoo: mo zo" re" bei: lo" byug bye . Nghoid loug we' gye" dabang nyid shi" yoomo Israela byumyu" yi gi nya: myonhoo: ri ayo" yu" nghoid ago" da: - shid gyoin , noogyoin , ri bue' loo nhang: da" tarha" gi haug: yhang":" te" doug bang da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb yo" dabyid: nghoid rigi
47003008	Hau: Venyi wigi moo" zei: lhu: nhau" kaid da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb je" sen: da khyoo: gi je" wigi doug bang da" khyoo: zeing anghoid wa la" .
47003009	Youg: noo yoobo da" dam kaid wa shi re" dang: phyed byid: ziyo' sen: da" moozoo" gi myonhoo: phung" yoeb yo' byeung" shoin: jo , nghoid rigi Khyoid yu khyoo: yo' sen: da" moozoo" gi khayhi' gyeung" myonhoo: phung" yoeb je doug bang jo , wa lha" .
47003010	Akhid" je" wigi doug bang jo , da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb yoomo shid' phyang" dalheung: - gye" doug bang: lo yu" bye: da - myonhoo: phung" yoeb gi bei: loo" bye: ein: ngoonu" tid ca" bye .
47003011	Daso" za: te" geung: jo , se' da" moozoo" lang" gi myonhoo: phung" yoeb bo nyid zi nghoid rigi dageung: jo , da" moozoo" moo gi khayhi' gyeing" je" wigi myonhoo: phung" yoeb bojo , wa anghoid la" .
47003012	Ngoonu" gi houg: yhang: te" da" nheig byu joyoo yo" boem yoomo ngoonu" yoem: zug nyid boem . Myonhoo: mo phung" yoeb bei: lo" byug bye: ziri Israela byu yi amyang boem baja" ga: nya: myonhoo: ri myonhoo: nghoeb , yo' nghoeb ci: da .
47003013	Ngoonu" gi Moshe yhang: ti" anghoid - nyang: gi nya: myonhoo: mo phung" yoeb bei: lo" byug bye: ziri Israela byu yi amyang boem baja" ga: nya: myonhoo: ri myo , nghoeb , za: pain" yo' nghoeb ci: da .
47003014	Israela byumyu" yi da" nheugloem: joem gi gyeung" nyang: myhed" nghoeb to" boem ago" . Akhid" nyid" ju" sho' lang" gi dang: theung mougsoug" xoug" ri nghab khang" moo" nyangnu" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: joem moo hau: da" myo , nghoeb za: pain" yo , danghoeb to" shi" ago" . Byu dayug gi Khristu moo kangso' dei loo" lang" she-hau: myo , nghoeb ri dayo" she' pyam .
47003015	Akhid" ju" sho' lang" nyangnu" gi Moshe da" tarha" ri nghab khang" moo" hau: da" myo , nghoeb gi nyangnu" da" myidsoin: khyoo: moo da nghoeb to" nyid shi" ago" .
47003016	Nghoid loug we hau: Aseing: shoid khyoo: nyang: phoug loo lang" gi hau: myo , nghoeb za: pain" shed' pyam byid: zi shau nyid ga: wigi Moshe da" khyoo: lhid" to" yhang: ti" shed' pyam byid: zi shau .
47003017	Akhid" ‹ Aseing: › ein: zigi hau: Venyi ri tid nyid zi nghoid . Aseing: da" Venyi nyid joyoo moo loid byoin akhang" we' jo , jo , gu nghoid .
47003018	Houg: yoomo ngoonu" dangain" bang: gi myonhoo: nghoeb ziri phang pyam boem bye: . Myonhoo: yo' hau: Aseing: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb da" alhoo: ri doem tau" pang shug nyid boem bye . Hau: myonhoo: phung" yoeb nyang: Venyi ein: da" Aseing: jang" mo ju" re" wigi Aseing: yo' jeje du go" lo da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb shoid khyoo: ngoonu" ri thed , shai" loo" nhang: nyid .
47004001	Mangsoo gi nya: nyeig khyeig shoo" go: da" nheigloem: yoomo ngoonu ri he: da: moozoo" voin wa moo" ab byid: bye: yoomo ngoonu" moo nheigloem: gyau: - yoem: shoin: wa khyoo: aboo .
47004002	Nyhang" gi yhoem" too" zau" to" - nghoeb to" da" moozoo" asho , ashed" moo" dangain" ri ngoonu" jhoid she: pyam boem bye . Ngoonu: gi mhau' fain" khyo" akoid loo: za: Mangso da" mungdang: ri we' mhau' fain" vo - aphug alhoin" atid boem ngoonu" gi Mangso da" shid khoin" moo hau: deung main" da" khyo" bidbang moo kangso' yeug co: phyu: da" nheugloem: bo loo sho' zei: so' so" yen" boem .
47004003	Ngoonu" kho" kyo" da" ngeibu: ludang: ri byu yi ato' se' gyo: nghoid rigi hau: Venyi moo soem" joem: loo" mo , za: ase' gyoo: zi nghoid .
47004004	He: da" mougmyid tho' mo akhyeing" ashoeb da" - Mangsoo ga: da" yu satan phoo gi nyangnu" da" neig loem: ri mougcoid , yo' nghoeb too" byid: bye: yoomo nyangnu" aloem" ajeung" boem loo . myo , jed too" nhang" bye . Nyhang" gi Mangso da" veddu , gungdu nyang: nghoid nyid nghoid loug we' Khristu da" phung" yoeb da" khyoo: - hau: ngeibu: ludang: mo thu' lo da" bidbang ri amyang nhang: loo: nghoid da .
47004005	Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" gi ngoonu" nya: khyoo: ri kho" kyo" zi anghoid . Yesu Khristu gi Aseing: nghoid nyid khyoo: - ngoonu" gi Yesu yoomo za: nanu" da" deizoo: yi nghoid da" khyoo: ri dakho" kyo" boem .
47004006	Yesu khrsitu da" myonhoo: mo bang lo da" - Myo nhoo: phung" yoeb khyoo: nanu" se' loo baja" - yha" da" nheig loem: moo bidbang zhoo: byid: da" Mangsoo: gi Moug coid mo bidbang bang loo wa ga: wigi tid da" Mangsoo nyang: nghoid bye .
47004007	Nghoid loug we' hau: athang agoin da" yoem: moo" so' moo" koem gi-ngoonu" jang" mo anghoid - Mangso jang" mo , nghoid nyid khyoo: ri yo" toin" shid baja" - He: Venyi soid gain yo" jo da - ngoonu" gi yu maya" moo zhoo" jhoem: yo" za: du nyid .
47004008	Ngoonu" gi daso' so' kyi" kyeug yau: khe" khyoo: shau" boem . Nghoid loug we' thoung" mhoin' pyam zi shau" zi anghoid . Dalheung: lheung: vhu" gyam gyam zi shau" boem - nghoid loug we' nheigloem: thang byug boem zi anghoid .
47004009	Ngoonu" ri gyi koid mo , myoo" sho' nyid boem - nghoid loug we' bidnoem dayug we' aboo loo - khanham we' anyid yu' boem , dalheung: lheung: noophyoo" gye" shau" boem - nghoid loug we' lhu: phyo' lhu: shoin , pyam zi anghoid .
47004010	Aseing Yesu gi ngoonu" da" gungdu: moo dei loeb kangso' kaid byid: nyid ziri bang bang se' loo wa shid mo ngoonu" da" shid: se' da" gungdu: joem gi Yesu kham zo: lid loo bye: da - shid: gyoin noogyoin , kyi" khyeug jam jau khyoo: ri khanham we' kham zo: nyid boem .
47004011	yesu da" kangso' dei nyid khyoo: gi ngoonu" da" shid: se' gungdu: moo bang thu' loo baja" - Ngoonu" nya: kangso' dei nyid bidnyid gu: moo ayo , khang" moo" Yesu shid re" shid: kham: wa khyoo: moo so" lo" nyid boem zi nghoid .
47004012	He: zigi ngoonu" jang" moo shid: loo" no lo" da" tarha" gi moo" zei: nyid zi nghoid . Nghoid loug we' nanu" jang" moo koem gi kangso' dei da" tarha" gi moo" zei: nyid .
47004013	Jhoem: mungdang: moo Ngoo loem" jeung" yoomo ngoo kho" kyo" ga: wigi tid nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoonu" we' loem:" jeung" yoomo kho" kyo" zi nghoid .
47004014	Aseing Yesu ri - shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo nhang" da" Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri we' Aseing: yesu yo' dage" doem dei to'' loo nhang: wa zi nghoid yoomo nanu" yo' dage" nya: shid khoin" moo shu" yu wa zi nghoid ziri ngoonu" se' nyid boem .
47004015	He: da" khyoo" dangain" gi nanu" moo akyu" ara: bo loo wa shid mo nghoid bye . Mangso da" jeju" ri kham: yu da" byu yi we' je" je myo: lo ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Aseing: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb ri jeju" boin: coung" nghei - akyu" mho' da" khyoo: joem moo we' je" wigi myo , tham: loo wa zi nghoid .
47004016	He: da" khyoo: joem yoomo ngoonu" gi khanham we' nheung loem: ayoin" - yoem: agyau: boem . Ngoonu" da" nghizain shoid khyo" yo' shau" myang nyid da" xangsu alhoo: gi yen , yen , za: byo , yoin" lo" nyid bye Nghoid loug we' akhoug: mo Venyi alhoo: gi nyid: khang" moo" - Aseig doem soin' nyeung byid: nyid ziri yo" shau" kham: yu nyid boem .
47004017	Hau: lho: ngoonu" daso' dadam thoung" shau" nyid da gyoug dain phoo: dajhi' dathang: gi je" gyi: ziyo' apyaid atoo: mo myonhoo: phung" yoeb ri kham: yu nhang: wa zi nghoid nyid .
47004018	Ngoonu" gi myo , jid" yo' yu" myang ja" - zi ri za: vhoo: bo nyid zi anghoid loo: za: myo , jed" amyang: ja: ri she - dayu" whoo: bo nyid boem . Khasu" wim gari myojid" myang nyid da" zijoem gi daso' dadam za: jo lho: myo jid" ayo" myang ja: gi apyaid atoo: moo dageung: jo , jo .
47005001	Moug: myid tho' moo ngoonu" nyid nyid da" zoem" - ein: da" yhoem: gungdu: gi byo , yoin" lo" uri Mangsoo gi moug: khug moug: di tho' moo ngoonu" nyid wa shid re" nyang: koid da" apyaid atoo: moo ngoonu" nyid wa shid re" nyang: koid da" apyadi atoo: moo dageung" jo , da" yhoem: - ngoonu" yo" ziri ngoonu" se' nyid boem .
47005002	Akhid" hau: zoem" moo ngoonu" loung" jo , ri moug khung: moug: di mo yhoem: ri ngoonu" yo" void zhoung" yu wa gye" nyang: vho: lang" nyid boem yoomo ngoonu" nookyeung" kyeung" zoore" danyid boem .
47005003	Hougsu" bain zhoung" yu lang" ngoonu" - gi gungdu: aboo lo: mo , bue" loo" wa zi anghoid .
47005004	He: da" moug myid mo zoem" moo loung" jo , shi" uri voin vu , wa da" yoo voin , wigi nhe' zeug ziri kham zo: da" nheigloem: yo' nookyeing" kyeung" nyid . hougsu" nookyeing" zigi he: da" moug myid mo gungshoo" ri khyoid pyam nau boem zi anghoid . shid: byug se' da" zi ri apyaid atoo: kangso' dei jang" khyoo: nyid lo" byu , wa shid mo moug khung: moug di mo da" gungshoo" ri ngoonu" khyoid zhoung" yu noug yoomo nghoid nyid .
47005005	Hougsu" thed loo" ca" da" khyoo: ri ngoonu" shid re" nyheung too" byid: su: gi Mangsoo nyang: nghoid . Nyang: gi ngoonu" shau: kham: yu wa da" jeju" dangain" da" shid mo jhoeb byeung" tung" koid byid: khyo" wigi nya: da" Venyi gi ngoonu" ri byid: bye .
47005006	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu' gi khanham we agyug avoem yoem: vhoo" yo' byeung" jo , boem , He: da" moug myid gungdu: yhoem: moo za: daloung" jo , jo , gi Mangso da" yhoem: yo' we: gang: jo .
47005007	Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" da" kangso' dei da" khyoo: gi-myo , jid" yo" myang jang" moo anghoid loo: za: loem" jeung" khyoo: moo kangso' dei nyid boem zi nghoid .
47005008	Ngoonu" gi yoem: moo" so' zeing yo' byeung" jo , boem yoomo gungdau: da" yhoem: ri to" pyam kho' lho: hau: Aseing: yo' dage" nyid nyid wa ziri je" vho: ngei nyid boem .
47005009	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi hid: moo nyid jo , da" gungshoo" yhoem: moo nghe: khau: nyid shi" ri nghoid loug we' foo: moo nghe: khau: nyid ri nghoid loug we' Nyang: ri vho ngei nhang: wa zigi tootu: dangain" tho moo je" yhoug: gyen: da" moo" nghoid .
47005010	Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" dangain" mo , gi tarha" dang: phyed zi shau" wa shid re" Khristu da" tang myhang shid moo thu' yab , ca" boem wa zi nghoid . Hau: da" uri ngoonu" dayug yo" dayug gi He" da gungsho" yhoem: moo nyid nyid shi" uri zei so" lid loo bye: da" ge da" moozoo" - age da" moozo" shid re" eung: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" shau":" kham , zo: boem wa nghoid .
47005011	Ngoonu" gi hau: Aseing: ri gyoug phau" ein: zigi ce: noem nghoid ziri se' boem yoomo byu gootu: bang" ri yo" mhoid" yu wa shid' re" yoem: kaid thoug shang" nyid boem . Mangsoo gi ngoonu" da" khyoo: ri jid" jid" nug nug se' nyid . Nanu" we' nanu" nya: da" nheigloem: khoug: moo nga" da" khyoo: ri goo" lhoo: se' nyid boem bye: ein: wigi ngoo nheig byu nyid .
47005012	Hidsu" ein: tid jang" moo ngoonu" gi-nyang: tu: nya: da" ge khyoo: ri nanu" da" shid khoin" moo phau: khuang shug nyid zi anghoid ngoonu" da" atho' moo nanu" ri yo" phau: khoung wa shid mo za: nghoid nyid . Nanu" gi byu dayug ga: asam" awed , ri ayu" loo: za: nghi: zain , asam:" aved , ri za: yu" wigi phau: khuang si' mo , nghoid ziri agung: yab shug wa nghoid ago" .
47005013	Ngoonu" gi gyeung" nyang: agyeung: loo: mo , nghoid boem bye: la" . agyeung: loo: nghoid rigi Mangso shid re" agyeung: zi nghoid . Hougsu" anghoid lang" gi ngoonu" gyeung: nyid boem la" . gyeung: nyid nghoid rigi nanu" shid re" gyeung: nyid zi nghoid .
47005014	Ngoonu" ri Khristu da" jheddab nheig loem: yo' vhoeb khang" too" bye . Khasu" wim gari byu dayug gi dangain" mo , shid re" shid: kham: bye: ziri ngoonu" nheig shid: nheig deug boem bye . Hougsu" wigi hau: khyoo: gi nyang: shid: kham: bye: jang" moo dangain" mo , bo shid" lklham bye: ga: da" dang kang: nghoid nyid .
47005015	Kangso' dei nyid mo , we' nyangnu" da" akyu" shid' re" kangso' adei loo za: nyangnu" shid re" shid: kham: lho: doem dei to'' loo su: shid re" za" dei nyid goo" baja" nyang gi dangain' bang : da" shid mo shid: kham: bye .
47005016	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi akhid" mo wigi hang" ri we' byu da" aklhyoo" laki khyo" cang lho: tarha" dang: phyed khyoo: akoid boem loo . Xang: shid" ayo , moo Khristu ri byu da" akhyoo" alai khyo" cang lho - soin: dang: phyed da" khyoo: koid lailo lboem bye . Nghoid loug we' akhid" hougsu" akoid lo: boem .
47005017	Hang" nghoid loug we' Khristu yo' dadeung" daloem: za: bue" lo" byug lang" gi-nyang: gi byu seig bue" loo bye - shid" phyang" mo axau" gu: gi lid lo" yu" bye - Yu" ge' dangain" gi aseig za: bue" loo bye .
47005018	Hau: khyoo: dangain" ri koem gi Mangsoo zei: bye: zi nghoid . Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri nya: gyivoo bue" nyid jang" mo nya: bidnoem yi bue" loo wa shid re" Khristu Yesu da" khoug: khyo" thed , shai" loo" nhang: bye: ziyo' byu gootu: bang: ri we' nya: bidnoem yi bue" loo wa shid mo ngoonu" ri moo" zo" yoo voin , ab byid: too" bye .
47005019	Ngoonu" kho" kyo" da" mungdang: gi Mangsoo gi Khristu mo byu nyid moo nyid bang: ri nya: bidnoem bue" loo nhang: da" mungdang:" nghoid nyid . Mangso da" byu yi yooboo joem ri axoem" too" byid: tho' moo agoo" - nyangnu" ri nya: bidnoem yi bue" loo sho' kha" yhi' koid bye: khyoo: ri tid sho kyo" da" mungdang: ngoonu" ri byid: too" bye .
47005020	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi Khristu da" khyoo: tid led: loo bye: da: - Lagyoo: yi nghoid wigi Mangsoo nyang ngoonu" da" nhoid khoin" thui: khyo"-nanu" ri khe: lhoung nyid zi nghoid lho: Mangsoo gi nanu" nya: gyivoo yi bue" nyid jang" mo nya: da" bidnoem yi bue" loo nhang: baja" ga: Khristu da" gungxung ngoonu" mho' sang: nyid boem .
47005021	Khristu gi ce: youg: noo yooboo adab su: nghoid loug we' ngoonu" gi Khristu yo' dadeung: daloem: za: bue" lo wigi Mangso da" deung: byeung" ziri kham: yu wa shid re" Mangsoo gi Khristu ri ngoonu" shid re" nyhang" yhang: te" yooboo yo" su: - bue" loo nhang: bye .
47006001	Nanu" gi Mangsoo da" jeju" yo" kham: yu mo , nghoid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - hau: jeju" ri amyib afoo" akoid pyam baja" - ngoonu" gi Mangso da" moozoo" bo pang" zei nyid mo , khyo" wigi nanu" ri mho' sang kaid zi nghoid .
47006002	Tam" gyoo: ge" - Mangsoo tid zigi Ngo nanu" ri jeju" byid: wa ayo , ju" loo lang" Ngoo nanu" ri khyoid yu wa da" bye ga: wigi nyang: tid nyid .
47006003	Ngoonu" zei: lo da" moozoo" yo' sen: lho" - hang" nghoid loug we' yooboo foin: lho:" juang" yi zi abue" loo" nhang: noug yoomo ngoonu" gi hang" khyoo: moo we' thei , leung jang" abui" nhang: sho' yoem: kaid nyid boem .
47006004	Kyi" kyeug jam jau khyoo: - shid: gyoin , noogyoin khyoo: - yau: khe" khyoo: joem ri gyi: sheung: nheigloem: yo' kham: zeung: wigi ngoonu" zei: lo da" klhyoo: khaid khang" moo" moo ngoonu" gi Mangso da" join' lang: jhang yi nghoid da" khyoo: ri datoin" shid boem .
47006005	Ngoonu" gi youg baid zi-thung" lhoung zi mung" byu yi lu: fu: khyoo: - shau" . Moo" zei: jang" moo dougnoo: jang: ayo oo" - yhoeb' agyi: khyoo: - zoo: noem ashug" zo: zi thoung" shau" lo boem .
47006006	nheigloem: young" khyoo: - yeug se' koung khyoo: - kham: zeung: khyoo: yo' nheung khyeug shoo" myen: khyoo: khyo" we' gyeungshang: da" Venyi da jeju" khyoo: khyo" - afain" da" jheddab myid khyo" we'
47006007	Ngoonu" kho" kyo" da" deungmain" mungdang: yo' Mangso da" yoem: vhoo" khyo" we' ngoonu" gi Mangso da" deizoo: lang: jhang yi nghoid da' khyoo: ri toin" shid lid loo bye . ngoonu" gi Venyi khyoo: yo" sen: da" gyipui" moo vang zain: wa ziyo' ngoonu" gungdu: ri lhoem: zung" lhug yu wa shid re" ngoonu" gi hau deungmain" da: khyoo: ri gyikhoo: koid lho: cid: lo boem bye .
47006008	Ngoonu" gi coung" byid: nghei , byid: zi we' juang" yi pyam zi we-shau" nyid boem . Ngoonu: ri mhoug zoo: mhoug shug yen" mo , ga: we' jho: ago" . Nghoid lug we' ngoonu" gi deingmain" da" dang ri da tid .
47006009	Ngoonu" gi-hang" we' aboin: ase' mo , ti nghoid loug we' fu" nheung: too" mo , shid: mang yhang: te" mo , nghoid loug we' Akhid" nyhang" myang nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoonu" dadei nyid mo , nghoid . Shid: gyoin shau" nghoid loug we' ngoonu" said pyam zi ashau" boem .
47006010	Koug shu" zi shau" boem nghoid loug we' ngoo gi khanham we' dagau yi nyid sho" jhen" bang: yhang: ti" nghoid loug we' byu myoo" sho' ri yoo: zoo: yo" shug nhang" mo , nghoid - ci" ayoo" mo , yhang: ti" nghoid loug we' ngoonu" gi gyeung" nyang" - jo , moo jo , ri seung: ci" mo , ngoid .
47006011	Korinthu' voo mo jheddab da" bidnoem yi we" - ngoonu" gi nanu" ri di: bang" za" tid bye - ngoonu" gi ngonu" da" emyid ri hain" lam: khyo" nyang: - nanu" shid mo khoem: phang too: bye .
47006012	Nanu" loem: she' ngoonu" da" jheddab e" myed ri-nanu" jhang aju: sho' khoem" myhed" to" ago" .
47006013	Nanu" da" nheigloem: khoem" duang: ri phang hain" too" ge' akhid" ngoo nanu" ri nga" zoo yi ri yhang: ti" tid sang: nyid . Nanu" we' ngoonu" ri-houg: yo' du khyo" myid khyoo: ri doem phug tu" kaid ge' .
47006014	Aloem" ajeung" mo , yo" dage" shoin" lho: moo" acoem' zei: goo . Khasu" wim gari dage" shoin" lho: moo" coem voin , wa zi age bui" . jo ziyo: shoid' da" zi gi dage" se' zoem" khoug: wa , la" . Bid bang yo' moug: coid gi khasu" koid dage" se' jo , wa lha" .
47006015	Khristu yo' satan gi Khasu" wim wigi e" myed se' zhung" goo wa Loem" jeung" su: dayug yo' aloem" jeung" da" byu dayug gi khasu" se' du goo" wa lha" .
47006016	Mangsoo da" noku yhoem: gi goug ngu shoolhoo joem yo' khasu" koid lho" e" myed se' zhung" goo" wa lha" . , Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" gi dadei nyid da" Mangso noku yhoem: moo" joem nghoid nyid boem . Mangsoo nyang: tid zigi-Ngoo gi nga" byumyu" yi moo nga" yhoem: koid wigi nyangnu" moo bo nyid wa zi nghoid . Ngoo gi nyangnu" da" Mangsoo bue" nyid a zi nghoid wigi nyangnu" gi nga" byumyu" yi bue" lo boem wa nghoid - ga: wigi tid nyid .
47006017	Houg: su" nghoid yoo mo Aseing: gi Nanu" gi nyangnu" ri to" pyam' kho' wa ziyo' nyangnu" mo nanu: da" gungdu: ri goo" zu: xen' gam , gang: goo" loo: ge' . Anyhoin: athoug" zi ce" ja: ri we' azang" thung" go" . Houg: lang:" she , ngoonanu" ri lhoem: kham: yu wa zi nghoid .
47006018	Nanu" da" nya: phoo ngoo byui" wa nghoid wigi nanu" gi nga" da" yuggi zoo: yo' myiyi: zoo: yi bui" wa zi nghoid - ga: wigi athang agoin yoem: moo" bo da" Aseing: gi da tid nyid .
47007001	Jheddab da" bidnoem yi we" - he: da" dang: soo" khoin" yi dangain" gi nyhang" ri byid: to" zi nghoid . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nyhang" gi gung shoo" yo' Venyi ri anhyoin: athung" byui" nhang: da" aco' ajhoid khyoo: dangain" mo nyang: tu: nya: gungdu: ced" yung" ced" lhoo , nhang: lho: wigi Mangsoo ri gyoug phau" myang: zoo re" gyeungshang: thang khyo" kangso' dei nyid shang .
47007002	Nanu" da" nheigloem: emyid khoug: moo _ ngonu" shid re" joyoo byid: wigi lheom: tau , yu ge' . Ngoonu" gi hang" ri we' ashoid avhang: yu" - hang" ri we' alhu" phyo' yu" , hang" tho' moo we' arue" yu .
47007003	Ngoo hidsu" ein: tid zigi ngoo nanu" ri yooboo foin: dang: phyed , noug: yoomo anghoid . Khasu" wim gari shid phyang" ngoo tid bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" ri ngoonu" gye" jheddab yoomo shid: nghoid loug - yang" nghoid loug nanu" yo' dage" khanham we' dage" danyid nyid .
47007004	Ngoo gi nanu" ri ahto' tid loo: sho' myid loem nyid . Nanu" da" shid' mo ngoo gye" phau: khuang nyid . yau: khe" jam jau shid: gyoin , noogyoin aja: ja: thoung" shau" nghoid loug we' ngoo moo yoem: so' yoem: vhoo" byeung" jo , ziyo' ngoo moo gau yi ngeipyo: khyoo: gi dabyeung" shoin: lo" .
47007005	Makedoni mung" khyoo: ngoonu" ju" yhe: uri lang" gi ngoonu" moo myenjham" khyoo: ci: ayo" yu boem nghoid da . Joyoo loem: khang" moo" moo yau khe" jam jau shid: gyoin noogyoin' - gootu: byu yo' myeng: myoo: yhoo: she: khyoo: bo . Ngoonu" nheigloem: khoug: moo myid myooung: loug khyoo: aja: ja: thoung" shau" boem .
47007006	Nghoid loug we' nheig koug nheig nge nyid bang: ri _ pang" thoug yoem: byid: nyid da" Mangsoo gi ngoonu: jang" moo ju" re" da" Titu khyo' wigi ngoonu" ri nheung loem: yoem: doem bo loo nhang .
47007007	Titu ju" ri " yoomo za: we' anghoid - nyang: ri nanu" khakhyo" yoem: lhoem: byid: da" khyoo: ri tid khyoo" yoomo we' ngoonu" myid pyo: khyoo: ri yo" kham: yu boem . Hau: tho' moo gootu: nanu" gi ngoo yo' khayhi' myang goo" nau khyoo: khayhi' nheig nge khyoo: ri nanu" khayhi' nheig koug nheig shu: nyid da" khyoo: joem - ngoori zung: lhoug goin coung: wa da" khyoo: - soin too" bye: khyoo: ri tid kyoo" byid: yoomo we' ngoo akhid" je" wigi gau yi ngeipyo: nyid .
47007008	Ngoo lhid" foin: kaid da" mougsoug" gi nanu" ri nheig to' kug nhang: zebi: nghoid rigi hau: mougsoug" shau" lhid" kaid ziri-dayo' daboin: kug nhang: zi shau" nyid ga: ziri ngoo boin yoomo koug khyoo: gi jo , lid: loo" bye .
47007009	Nghoid loug we' akhid" koem gi ngoo gau yi nyid bye . Hau: zigi ngoo nanu" ri kug nhang: yoomo anghoid . Nanu" da" nheig koug da" khyoo: gi nanu" da" xang: she" yo' mo kangso' dei da" khyoo: moo-nheugloem: thed , shai" loo bye: yoomo nghoid . Mangsoo gi hau: nheig koug khyoo: ri ci: yhoung: nyid yoomo ngoonu" gi nanu" ri nheig koug noo nhang: khyoo: gi ci" we' aze" bui" loo .
47007010	Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo ci" yhoung: da" koug shu: khyoo: gi khyoid yu khyoo: shau" nhang: nyid › Houg: yoomo nheigloem: apyoo: joyoo aboo . Nghoid loug we' nheigloem: athid' loo: za: xangsu: lid khyo" kougshu: khyoo: gi-shid: loo" no lo" khyoo: ri ze" bui" nhang" nyid .
47007011	Nanu" da" nheig koug nheig shu: khyoo: ri Mangsoo: khakhyo" ci: nyid ziri yu" yu" ge" . Hau zigi nanu" ri khayhi' nheigloem: too , nhang: - nanu" moo yooboo adab loo: ein: da" khyoo" toin" shid' nhang" - ge da" khyoo: ri byui" nhang: noug yoomo nheigloem: gye" to' lo ziyo' nheig dain yoo: nau khyoo" nheigloem: khoug: moo kham , zo: khyoo: - nanu da" loem" jeung" khyoo: moo nheigloem: zug zi shoid' vhang: su: ri shen" yhin wa shid re" jen" jen" nghoid nyid da" khyoo: gi khyoo: khaid gu: khang" moo" moo nanu" ce" yooboo adab loo: ein: ziri toin" shed nyid bye .
47007012	Hougsu" wigi ngoo hau: mougsoug" ri lhid" foin: kaid nghoid loug we' shoid vhang: nyid su: yoomo we' shoid vhang: shug" su: yoomo anghoid . Mangso shid moo ngoonu" ri nanu" khayhi' jheddab nheig nge" nyid ziri myang nhang: noug yoomo lhid" kaid da" khyoo: nghoid .
47007013	Houg yhang: ti" myang thu' loo: bye: yoomo ngoonu" yoem: so' ri gye" yo" yu bye . Ngoonu" gi nheigloem: yoem: yo" tho' agoo" - gye: gau yi boem bye . Khasu" wim gari nanu" dangain' bang: gi Titu ri ngeibu: nhang" bye: yoomo nyang" gau yi khyoo: nanu" myang yoomo nghoid .
47007014	Ngoo gi Titu ri nanu" da" khyoo: phau: kyoo" bye . Hougsu" phau: khuang kyo" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - deungmain" nyid khyoo: ri nanu" bain toin" shid' bye: wigi ngoori nheigloem: gyoug: nhang: zi anghoid . Ngoonu" gi nanu" ri khanham we' deungmain" khyo" za: tid nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Titu ri nanu" khyoo: phau: khuang kyo" zi we' deungmain" nyid ziri yo" si' bye .
47007015	Nyang: jhoug" byid: khyoo: ri-nanu' tam" gyoo: wa shid re" jen" nyid bye: ziri we' gyoug nain" ziyo' nanu" lhoem: tau yu da" khyoo: ri we' nyang: myid boin: nyid yomo - nanu" ri jheddab da" nya: emyid gi je wigi gyi: sheung:" yoem: bo lo nyid zi nghoid .
47007016	Nanu" moo khyoo: khaid khang" moo" moo loem , ge" nyid yoomo ngoo gye" gau yi nyid .
47008001	Jheddab , da" mang: nhung" yi we" - Makedoni mung" mo phungbyu yi ri Mangsoo gi cenoem jeju" byid: bye: ziri-nanu" ri ngoonu" si' nhang" nau nyid boem .
47008002	Nyangnu" kham zo: lid loo bye: da" shid: gyoin , noogyoin , moo nyangnu" gi gye" kyi" khyeug jham" ca yu" shau" abye: go" . 47008003	Hau: phung: bang: gi nyangnu" yo" koid yhi' byid: nyid boem khyoo: ri ngoo nanu" ri sagsi" khyag" kham kyo" nyid .
47008004	Nyangnu" gi Yuda mung" mo Mangso da" byu yi ri pang" thoug khyoo: moo boo nau boem yoomo yo" bo vang wa da" akhang" yoo" wa shid' re" nyangnu" da" myid khyo" ayoo" ri yoo" sho' - mho' boem .
47008005	Nyangnu" gi ngoonu" myid to" tho' moo jain" sho' byid nyid nyangnu" gi xang: shed" moo nyangnu gungdu nyang aveing: moo xoin" to' byid: ago - Hau: thang: ri Aseing: myid vho: ziyo' dakhyoo" - pang" thoug byid: da" khyoo: moo to' byid: ago" .
47008006	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo xang: shed" mo yoovoin , yu zei: so' nyid bye - Titu ri he: alu yo' sen: lho: nanu" da" goozu: zen' to' nung" byid: da: moo" bain sho' nanu" ri pang" thoug nyid baja" ngoonu" gi nyang: ri joug jhoin" nyid .
47008007	Nanu" gi loem" jeung" da" klhyoo: moo we dang: ji khyoo: moo we' Phajhi" leleig lasi , moo we'-nanu" da" pang thug nau emyid , moo we' ngoonu" ri jheddab da" khyoo: moo we' nanu" myo tham: joeb byeung" nyid boem bye . 47008008	Hidsu" tid zigi amyeung" khyo" tarha" khyo , to" zi anghoid . gootu: byu yi da" pang thoug khyoo: moo jheddab nheig loem: khayhi' gyi: bo ziri" - tid kyo" ziyo' nanu" da" jhed kang: da" nheig loem: e" myed , ri se' yu wa shid re" tid zi nghoid .
47008009	Nanu" gi ngoonu" Aseing Yesu Khristu ri se' nyid boem ago" Aseing Yesu gi nyang: di su: nghoid loug - nanu" da" shid re" nya gungdu: ri sho" jhen: byu bue" loo" nhang: bye . Nyang: asho" ajhen: koid jang" mo nanu" yo" de , lo boem bye .
47008010	He: da" alu byid: ziyo' sen: lho: ngoo myid yu" khyo" nghoid rigi lailoo bye: zain nyid moo nanu' zei shed" to" da" moozoo" ri akhid" zei: kyoeb pyam rigi nanu" shid mo gi wa zi nghoid . Nanu" gi jheddab emyid yo' byid: nau da" nheig loem: shid' boo mo , za: we' anghoid Alu xang: sheda" kaid byid: mo , nghoid .
47008011	Houg: yoomo hau: moo" ri xo' zei: pain , pyam ge" . Nanu" gi hau: moozoo" ri myid soin' yhe" lo" jang" moo nheig loem: to' - vho: ngei boem ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" nanu" yo": hain: yhi' moo nheigloem: to' lho: zei: pyam ge" .
47008012	Nanu" moo byid: gam nau da" emyid , bo vho" ngei nyid boem rigi mangsoo gi nanu" yo" byid: yhi' mo byid: da" alu joem ri lhoem: kham yu wa zi nghoid . Nanu" age bui" ziri Mangsoo: gi mho' wa zi anghoid .
47008013	Khasu" wim gari nanu" ri yoovoin , lid: nhang: lho: gootu: byu yi da" yoovoin ri soem" nhang: wa shid re" ngoo koid nyid zi anghoid .
47008014	Nhgoid loug we' akhid" ayo , moo nanu" gi agoin agoo" yo'" yu nyid boem yoomo-ca" yo , nyid bang: ri pang" thoug wa shid re" gi _ young" du nyid zi nghoid . Hid: khyo" wigi nyang: cang" dakhyoo" ti" yo" pang" yo" thug go .
47008015	Joem: mungdang: moo Myoo" sho' yo" zehung" young: too" su: we' ladu lid sho' jain" yoo" wa zi anghoid . za: te: yo" zheung" yu too" su: we' mala la , atham: wa zi anghoid - ga: wigi tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo: ti" nghoid .
47008016	Nanu" ri pang" thoug byid: wa shid re" ngoonu" moo nheigloem: to' vho: ngei nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Titu ri we' boo nhang: da" Mangso jeju" ri khayhi' coung" nghei , joyoo nghoid lha" .
47008017	Titu gi ngoonu" mho' tid da" dang: ri tam: gyo: ziyo' bo pang" thhug wa nheig loem: we' nyang: moo bo nyid yoomo nanu" jhang khyoo: ri" wa shid re" nya: myid mo nyang - myid phyed bye .
47008018	Hau ngeibu: mungdang: kho" kyo" da" mo: voin , wu , da" khyoo: moo Phung byu yi dangan" bang: da" shid moo myid loem to" da" mang: nhung" phoo dayug ri we' ngoonu" nyang: yo' dage" nhang: kaid .
47008019	Hau: tho' moo gootu: hidsu" jheddab da" myid yo' pang" thoug da" alu: ngei khyu: da" moozoo" moo we' ngoonu" yo' dage" so" yen" wa shid re" phung byu yi lo , tu: khyen: nyheung too" shau" su: dayug we' nyang: nghoid nyid . Hau: khyoo: gi Aseing: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb ri thoin" pang" byid: wa shid re" yo' ngoonu" da" bo pang bo thug nau da" emyid , ri we' toin" shed wa shid re" nghoid nyid .
47008020	Hidsu" gau yi ngei pyo: ziyo' byid: da" alu ri ci: yhoung" lo" khyoo: moo hang" we' nyhang" ri yooboo foin: jang" ajo , baja" - zid" lhid' nyid ge' .
47008021	Hau: Aseing: da" shid khoin" moo za: anghoid - byu da" shid' moo we' deungmain" du young" khyo" moo" zei: wa shid re" gi ngoonu" da" myid young nyheung soin to" a" khyoo: nyang: nghoid bye .
47008022	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi hau: da" mang: nhung" eig yug yo' dage" gootu mang nhung" Khristan dayug ri we' bo nhang: kaid . Hau: yug ri ngoonu" myo" sho' lheung: jham" ca: yu" ri nyang: gi khanham we' gau yi ziyo' bo" pang" thoug nyid su: nghoid ziri yo" myang yu boem bye . Akhid" nyang: gi nanu" tho' moo gye" myid loem" da" emyid , bo nyid yoomo-bo pang" thoug wa da" vho" ngei e" myed zhu" nyid ziri myang .
47008023	Titu yo' sen: lho: tid shang ein: rigi nyang: gi nga" da" bo pang thug su: nghoid wigi nanu" ri pang" thoug wa shid re" ngoo yo' dage moo" shoin" zei: su: nghoid nyid . Nyang: yo" dage" bo cang" re" da" gootu: mang: nhung" eig yug gi phung: yi da" lagyoo: yi nghoid wigi-Khristu da" myonhoo: phgung yoeb ri thoin" pang su: eig yug we' nghoid .
47008024	Houg: yoomo nanu" yo' sen: wigi-ngoonu" myonhoo: sho: phau: khuang khyoo: g ideung khyoo: ri phung byu yi khyag si goo" baja" nyangnu" ri nanu" da" jheddab nheigloem: toin" shid' ge' .
47009001	Yuda mung" mo Mangso da" byu yi yo" sen: da" bo pang" thoug khyoo" yo' sen: lho" wigi nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoo mougsoug" lhid" kaid anoo" loo .
47009002	Nanu bopang" bothoug nau da" jheddab e" myed bo nyid ziri ngoo se' nyid . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nanu" da" khyoo: ri Mawkedoni mung" byu yi jang khyoo: - phau: khuang fu" kaid bye . Akhaia mung" mo da" mang: nhung" yi gi anheug mo wigi lang" pang" thoug wa shid re nyheung soin jen" to" nyid bye - ein: wigi Makedoni bang: ri ngoo tid bye . Nanu" myid loem: vho: ngei nyid yoomo nyangnu" myoo: looboug bang: da" nheigloem: ri lhu: nhau" tu: to' byid: kaid nyid .
47009003	He: khyoo: yo" sen: lho: nanu" da" khyoo: ngoonu" phau: khuang zigi-dang: soem: abue" loo" baja" - he: da" mang: nhung" yi ri nanu" jhang khyoo: nhang" kaid . Houg: yoomo ngoo tid bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" bo pang" thoug wa shid re" jen" jen" nyheung: to" goo" wam: bye .
47009004	Hougsu" anghoid lang" gi Makedoni byu dayham" ngoo yo' dage" bo cang re" wigi nanu" ajen" jo , ziri re" shau" myang ri nanu" za: sho' thu' wa zi anghoid - ngoonu" we' nanu" ri gye" myid loem too" bye - khayhi' gyeung: sho' thu' wa zi asi !
47009005	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" jheddab da" alu jhung shug dang: lang" bo jo , bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" hau: ziri nyheung soin' jen" too" wa shid re" he: mang: nhung" yi ri nga" shid vho" khyoo: nhang: kaid wa ca" nyid ein: ngoo myid nyid . Ngoo ju" re" uri alu joem ri bain soin' nyheing too" gu: nghoid wa shid re" nanu" byid: ca" da alu gi agoin: za: te: koid pyam' zi anghoid loo: za: - byid: nau da" emyid , yo: byid: da: aved , thu' nyid ge' .
47009006	Gug myoug: dajhi' za: te" sain: su: gi dajhi' za: date: shau" yham" yu wa , gug myoug: myoo" sho' sain" kaid su: gi gug myoo" sho' doem shau" yham yu wa ein: ziri myid boin: zid" lhid" yoem: kaid nyid ge' .
47009007	Vhoo" byed' ziyo' anghoid - byid: ca" yoovoin , boo yoomo we' anghoid loo: za: yug khang" moo" gi nyang: nya: emyid moo myid kho' ziyo' dakhyoo" - byid: goo" baja" . Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo gi gau yi e" myed , yo' byid: su: ri jheddab nyid .
47009008	Mangsoo: gi nanu" vho" nyid tho' moo jain" sho' yo" byid: nyid . Houg: yoomo nanu" gi nyang: tu: nya: shid re" vho' ca" nyid gu: dangain" ri yo" yu boem va zi nghoid . Hou: tho' moo ge da" moo" zo" ja: khang" mo" shid mo ca" nyid hto' moo jan" sho' yo" yu wa .
47009009	Jhoem: mungdang: moo we" - Nyang: gi ca" yo nyid bang: ri amyung shaoo" loo: gam byid: bye: yoomo nya: da" nheig khyeig shoo" myen: khyoo: gi apyaid atoo: moo dajo , jo , ga: tid to" .
47009010	Amyoug: sain" su: ri amyoug: byid: wigi zoo: noem shug phoo" bue" loo nhang: nyid da - Mangsoo gi nanu" moo vho: nyid da" amyoug: ashi" myoo" sho' ri we' byid: nyid tho' moo gootu: hau: amyoug: ashi" ri - youg gyi: loo nhang: wigi ashi" myoo: sho' zei: loo nhang: nyid . Houg zigi nanu" jheddab e" nyid mo byid: da" alu jhung: shug: da" gug shi" mei: shi: ri tid nyid zi nghoid .
47009011	Nanu" da" lo , mo nyangnu" shau: kham yu da - nanu" byid: kaid da" alu jhung: shug joem yoomo Byu myoo" sho' bang: gi Mangso da" jeju" ri coung" nghei byid: boem wa nghoid . Nanu" ayo , loem: khang" moo" - Alu jhung: shug agoin ayu: yo" byid: sho' Aseing: gi nanu' ri khanham we' yo" loo jo , loo nhang: wa zi nghoid .
47009012	Khasu" wim gari hid: nanu" koid da" zei: zhoo" zei: jhoug da" moozoo" - Mangso da" byu yi ca" yo nyid jang" mooyo" pyeung byid: tho agoo" Mangso da" jeju" ri boin: so" coung" nghei da" thui: gi byeung" shoin: lo nyid bye .
47009013	Hidsu" nanu" da" doo" zho" da" moozoo" ge da" aved alhoo: yoomo byu yi myoo" sho' gi Khristu da" ngei bu: ngeilho , da" ludang: ri nanu" loem" jeung" lhoem: yu ci: bye: yoomo we' nanu: da" jheddab emyed yo" nyangnu" ri we' gootu: byu yi ri we' agoin ayu: alu: byid: bye: yoomo we' Mangso da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb ri coung" nghei nyid boem wam: bye .
47009014	Nanu" gi atho' tid goo ki" lid da" Mangso jeju" ri yo" kham , zo: boem bye: yoomo nyangnu" gi nanu" ri gye" jheddab da" emyid , yo' nanu" shid re" akyu' bo mho' byid: nyid boem wa nghoid .
47009015	Aphoug" atho' phyed da" Kangso da: jeju" jhung: shug jhung: lang: joem yoomo nyang: ri coung" nghei nyid boem shang o" .
47010001	Nanu" da" shid khoin" moo sam" dab nu: nham wigi nheigloem: khyo' nyhoem: khyoo: toin" shid' wigi nanu" yo' we: gang: loo" lang" asho , agyug nheigloem: toin" shid" su: nghoid ga: juang" yi shau" su: ngoo Polu nyang: - nanu" ri mho' tid kaid .
47010002	Khristu da" nu" nham , khyo' nyhoem: da" emyid ri yu" lho: nanu" jhang khyoo: ju" re" uri athoug" akhyoug: akhyoin' da" tid jang" moo aju" baja" - mho' tid kaid . Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" ri moug myid da" vhoo: boo myo , no , khyo" cang: lho: gau" soin' nyeung lo da" emyid yo' kang: dei nyid mo , nghoid ga: wigi tid nyid mo , ri zu" akhyoin" ein: gyeing" nyang: voem" tid .
47010003	Nanu" gi mougmyid dang: moo nyid mo , deung: nghoid loug - moug myid da" nyheung soin' khyo" meing: zain: nyid zi anghoid .
47010004	Ngoonu" da" meing: zain: jang: moo ci: da" gyizi gyikhoo: gi mougmyid xangsu: byu yi ci: da" gyizi gyikhyoo: anghoid . geung: teung jo , da" gyidab: joem ri yo" phyo' pyam da" Mangso yoem: so' yo' byeung" da" gyizi gyikhoo: joem nghoid nyid . Ngoonu" gi adeung amain" - ngeug yang: go" da" dang: joem ri dazain: lhu: phyo' boem .
47010005	Ngoonu" gi Mangsoo ri yo" se' koung lo da" phajhi" ri lhu: keug lhu: kyo' khyoo: dangain" ri zain: said lo" boem . ngoonu" gi byu yi myid soin: khyoo: dangain" ri myeug tei" to" wigi Khristu da" dang: ri tam" gyoo: nhang: nyid boem .
47010006	Nanu" gi ngoonu: dang: ri byeung" sho' khyag tam" gyo: nyid ziri yo" se' loo lang" ngoonu" gi alhid , azid" adeung amain" da" khyoo: ce: ja: ri we' saida" dam kaid wa shi re" jen" jen" nghoid .
47010007	Nanu" ce: ja" khyoo: ri we' ahto' dapyam: khyo" za: yu" nyid ago" . Ngoo gi Khristu yo" sen: su: nghoid nyid , ga: wigi nyang: nya: gungdu: myid jho: nyid su: dayug yug bo la" . gyeung" to' nghoid rigi nya: gung ri nyang: soin: yu" baja" - Khasuwimgar: nyang: gi Khristu shoid khyo" byu nghoid nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoonu" we' Khristu da" shoid mo byu yi nghoid .
47010008	Ngoo gi Mangsoo byid: da" akhang" aya yo' sen: lho: ladu lid sho' to' phau: khuang nghoid loug we' hau: akhang" aya gi nanu" ri lhu: phyo' pyam wa shid re" anghoid . Nanu" ri so' koid tu: to' kaid wa shid re" danghoid .
47010009	Houg: yoomo ngoo foin: kaid da" mougsoug" joem yo' nanu" ri kyoug nhain , da" aved , athu' nhang: noug .
47010010	Khasu" wim gari byu dayham" gi Polu da" mougsoug" joem gi gye" no , lho: yoem: moo" so' moo" bo" da" mougsoug" nghoid - nghoid loug we' nya: gung nyang: ngoonu" yo' dage" nyid uri nyang: gi yoem: nu: lho _ myonhoo: phung" yoeb abo ziyo' nya: dang: khoin" joem we' - ce" juid" we' arue" zi nghoid - ga: tid boem ago" .
47010011	Houg: yhang: te" da" byu yi se' gyo: too" wa zigi ngoonu" gi we: gang: go" nyid da" uri mougsoug" lhid" kaid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - byu gung nyang: nanu" jang" moo ju" re" uri we' houg: yo" dakhyoo" ti" ngoonu" zei: loo wa zi nghoid .
47010012	Gyung" ga: ri nyang: nya: gung ri coung" nghei , tuto' da" byu jang" moo bo nghab kaid wigi ngoonu" da" gungdu: yo' nyangnu" awoem" tu , goo" nghoid da . Nyangnu" gi nyang: nya: azhang ri se' ke' yu: wa shid re" nyang : nya: da" laki khoem: mhe , yu ago" . Hougsu" ke' to" da" laki , yo' ke' yu" nyid boem ago" . Houg: te" mo , gi khayhi' gyeung" ko" fang: kyi: mo , nghoid lha !
47010013	Ngoonu" koem gi-phau: khuang wa da" laki , mo lid lho: phau: khuang boem wa zi anghoid . Nanu" moo ngoonu" zei: voinvu , da" moozoo" yo' dage" Ngoonu" voinvu , wa shid re" Mangsoo nyang: ke' too": byid: da" moo zo" da" akhoug: moo za: ngoonu" phau: khuang .
47010014	Nanu" gi ngoonu" shid re" Mangsoo phyeda" soin' too" byid: da" moozoo" akhuang khoug: moo bo nyid mo nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi Khristu da" ngeibu: ludang: ri nanu" jhang moo ci: re" da" uri-moozoo: kyoo" doem: lid sho' akoid boem .
47010015	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi mangsoo: ke' too" byid: da" moozoo" mo lid lho: wigi byu goo" ji yi koid da" moozoo" yo' sen: wigi ngoonu phau: khuang dang: tid zi anghoid . Houg: su" koid wa tho' rigi khanham we' . 47010016	Hau: thang: ri ngoonu" gi nanu" da" moug: khyoo" lid lho: wigi gootu: mungdain joem moo Aseing Yesu da" khyoo: - ngeibu: ludang: gi ri yo" kho" kyo" loo" wa nghoid nyid .
47010017	Nghoid loug we' jhoem: mungdang: moo Myo , nhoo: shoo: noug su: gi hau: Aseing: koid da" moozoo" moo myonhoo: sho: phau: khuang nyid baja" - ga: tid to .
47010018	Khasu" wim gari deungmain" da" myonhoo: ngeilang: shau" kham: yu su: gi nyang: nya: gung ri nyang: - tu: to' coung" byid: su: anghoid . Mangsoo wigi tu: to coung" nghei , byid: zi shau" su: nghoid nyid .
47011001	Ngoo dajhi ko" go da" khyoo: ri nanu" seing: kham , byid: ngoo vho: nyid Jeju" yo'' gyeung" nyang: kham , zeung: byid: ge' .
47011002	Mangsoo gi nanu" da" atho' moo aloem" athoo: myid bo nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoo we' nanu" da" atho' moo aloem" athoo: myid bo nyid . Nanu" gi Khristu nyang: yo' loxo' ikoin deungkhu: de wa shid re" ngoo dang: myid: to" da" zoomyi: zoo: yo' du nyid .
47011003	Eva gi lhang: myu: da" phajhi" juyhi: yo' mhau' mhid" phyo' shau: yhang: ti" - nanu" we' nanu" myid to" khyoo: ri lhu: phyo' pyam zi shau" lho: nanu" da" joeb byeung" gyeung: shang: emyid yo' Khristu moo nheigloem: zug - loem" jeung" zei: so' khyoo: - she: pyam goo" wa ziri gung youg yau nyid .
47011004	Khasu" wim gari nanu" jang" moo byu dayug yug ju" re" wigi ngoonu" akho" kyo" yu" da" gootu: Yesu dayug da" khyoo: kho" kyo" da" uri nanu" gi goug goug yi yi loem: kham: yu ago" . 47011005	Ngoo gi houg: nanu" gyi: thang da" lagyoo: yi ga: coung" nghei tu: to' da" lagyoo: yi tho' moo dajhi' khyalhang" ngi , su: anghoid ein: ngoo jho: nyid .
47011006	Ngoo gi kho" kyo": khyoo: moo akung su: to' nghoid loug we' gyeung: nyang: ngoose' kung khyoo: moo gi hougsu" anghoid ngoonu" gi ayo , loem: khang" moo" moo bue" lo , da" akhyoo" azoo" dangain" jang" moo he: khyoo: dangain" nanu" ri bang bang si' nang boem bye .
47011007	Ngoo gi nanu" ri coung" nghei tu: to' kaid wa shid re" ngoo nya: gung ri gi khyo , nyhoem: pyam lho: aphoug" amho , loo:-Mangso da" ngeibu: ludang: nanu" ri kho" kyoo" bye . Hougsu" koid khyoo: gi ngoo moo shoid khyoo: nghoid la" .
47011008	Ngoo nanu" jang" moo moo" voin , nyid da" ayo , gu: moo gootu: voo , mo phung bang gi ngoori pang" thoug ago , hau: zigi nanu" ri pang" thoug wa shid mo gootu: phung: mo ngoo , lhoid yu zi nghoid ein: shang .
47011009	Hau: tho' moo gootu: ngoo gi nanu" yo , dage" nyid nyid da" ayo , moo ngei sheung: ca" lo da" u ri pang" thoug yu wa shid re" ngoo nanu ri phibu , apu' yu" . 47011010	Khristu da" deung main" da" dang: ngoo moo bo jo , ziyo' dakhyoo" - ngoo hidsu" phau: khuang da" khyoo: ri Akhaia mung" joyoo khyi , khang" moo" khyoo: hang: we: yo' toem , jham" loo" nhang: wa zi anghoid ein: wigi ngoo dang: soo" byid: to .
47011011	Ngoo hidsu" ein: tid zigi ngoo nanu" ri ajheddab yoomo nghoid la" . ngoo nanu" ri jheddab zigi Mangsoo se' nyid .
47011012	ngoonu" koid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nyangnu" we' lhoung koid yu" ga: wigi gootu: lagyoo: yi tid phau: khuang jang: yoo" baja" - akhid" ngoo koid yhang: ti" - xo' lho: we ngoo koid shi" wa .
47011013	Hau: byu yi gi deungmain" da" lagyoo , yi anghoid boem . nyangnu" gi Khristu da" lagyo: gyeung" yhang: ti: bui" sho' akug void lho: mhau' fain" koid yen" mo , nghoid ago" .
47011014	Hidsu" koid da" khyoo: gi mau" pho khyoo: anghoid . satan joem lang" gi bidbang mo moug: lagyoo: yi da" alhoo: se' shab , ci: ashi" go .
47011015	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nya: da" deizoo: yi nyang: lang" we' deungmain" da" khyoo: ri kho" kyo" sagsi: kham da" dei zoo: yi yo' yu" du sho' ayid void mhau zi gi mau" pho khyoo: anghoid . 47011016	Hau: lho: ngoo doem poug tid nau khyoo: gi ngoori goo , su: nghoid ein: hang we' age soin: yu . Nghoid loug we' nanu" hougsu" soin" yu bye: yoo: we' thang thang ngoori agoo dayug khyo" lhoem: kham yu ge , - Hougsu" ngoo we' phau: khuang da" dang: dajhi' tid ba .
47011017	Gyeing" nyang: ga: ri akhid" ngoo tid phau: khuang nyid da" khyoo: gi Mangsoo tid nhang: nau da" khyoo: anghoid . Hidsu" tid phau: khuang nyid khyoo: moo ngoo ri gyeung" nyang agoo dayug yang ti: - tid phau: khuang nyid khyoo: nghoid .
47011018	Nghoid loug we' byu myoo" sho' bang: gi byu yi koid da" khyoo: moo phau: khuang myonhoo: shoo: yoomo-ngoo we' khuang wa nghoid .

47011021	Nanu" gi houg: yhang: te" khyoo: ri koid wa shid re" yoem: nu: khyoo: ri yhen: yu wa shid re" lang" gi sho' boem bye . Nghoid loug we' byu dayug yug - khyoo: daja: ja: moo phau: khuang nghoid rigi ngoo we' afang: akyi: su: ti" voem" tid nyid .
47011022	Nyangnu" gi Hebre byu yi nghoid boem lha" . ngoo we' nghoid . Nyangnu" gi Abraham da" akung: ako'' bang: nghoid la" . ngoo we' nghoid nyid .
47011023	Nyangnu" gi Khristu da" deizoo: yi nghoid go" la" . koo" su: da" dang: yhang: te" zi gi nghoid . Nghoid loug we' ngoo gi-nyangnu" tho' moo je ge da: deizoo nghoid . 47011026	Ngoo gyung: so" yen" zi myoo" sho' lheung: moo gyid je: lo wigi shau" da" shid: gyoin' - khyangtoug: shau" da" shid: gyoin' - ngoo nya: da" Yuda byumyu" yi koid byid: da" shid: gyoin - tungbau byumyu"' yi koid byid: da: shid: gyon - voothoem" yi moo thoung" shau" da" shid: gyoin' - siyoo soogam moo shau" yen" da" shid: gyoin - mhau' da" mang: nhung" yi koid da' shid: gyoin noogyoin myoo" sho' shau" lid lo yu" bye .
47011027	Moozoo" yo" yau: khe" zi yhoeb , ashug" zo: zi myo" sho myen - zooyoid gyid shed shau" zi myo sho' lheung: - zookhoo: ayoo" loo - khau: nghi" jang: ajo - shoo" cen: doem: boi" lo shid: gyoin' joem ri sahu" nyid .
47011028	hau: tho moo gootu - phung byu yi dangain" bang: shid' re" myid myoo: ung: loug da" khyoo joem gi nyid" khang" moo" ngoo moo yau: khe: jam jau lo nyid .
47011029	Yoem: nu: su: dayug yug bo ri ngoo we' yoem nu zi shau" nyid . byu dayug yug yooboo moo leung vang lo" ri ngoo nheig koug myid myo: nyid .
47011030	Ngoo phau: khuang wa nghoid rigi ngoo khayhi' yoem: nu: da" khyoo: ri phau: khuang wa zi nghoid .
47011031	Ngoo mhau' fain" da" dang: atid nyid ziri Aseing Yesu da" nya: phoo Mangsoo gi se' nyid . Hau: Aseing: Mangso da" myeingkhyang" gi khanham we' ngi lho , nyid baja" o" .
47011032	Damasku voogung moo ngoo nyid a uri Khokham" areta da" vhoo: mo mung" zoug: phoo gi ngoori myheung yu wa shid re" vogung khoem" duang: joem moo goem leom ri zung" nhang: to" .
47011033	Nghoid loug we' phungbyu yi gi ngoori gyoin , moo kaid lho: vogung vang" khyam: tho' khyo" shu: khyo kaid wigi nya: da" lo , mo yo" loid , loo" bye .
47012001	Phau: khuang khyoo: gi akyu" aboo nghoid loug we hau: Aseing: jang" mo pang shuog da" khyoo: yo' myo , myang yo' sen: wigi ngoo phau: khuang kyoo shi" wa .
47012002	Khristan byu dayug gi dayung moo lid loo" bye: daxe: myid: zain ayo , moo myhang: thang da" moug: khung: seom" pyam moo shu" dang: do , lo" zi shau: khyoo: ngoo se' ( Hougsu" shu: dang: do , lo" ziri gung du: yo' nghoid loug hougsu" anghoid lang" gi gungdu" abo la" . zi ngoo asi Mangsoo za: dase' nyid .
47012003	Ngoo doem poug tid ba hau: byu ri pharadisu ju" sho' shu" dang: lo: zigi ngoose . Hau: zigi gyeung" nyang: bue" la" . hougsu" anghoid lang" gi yhoebmo , za: te: nghodi la" mangsoo: za: dase .
47012004	Hau: khyi , moo nyang: shug gyo: khyoo: gi xangsu: byu yi da myeung" khyo" age tid . Bu yi da" nhoid moo ayo" loung: ja: nghoid .
47012005	Hougsu" yoomo hau: youg da" khyoo: ri ngoo phau: khuang wa . Nghoid loug we' ngoo nyang: khayhi' yoem: nu: nyid tho' moo gootu - nga" khyoo: ri ngoo nyang: aphau: khuang noug .
47012006	Ngoo phau: khuang noug nghoid loug we' akoo" apyoid , su: ngoo bue" loo" wa za nghoid . Khasu" wim gari ngoo gi deugmain" khyoo: za: tid wa zi nghoid nyid . Nghoid loug we' ngoo aphau: khuang wa_Khasu" wim gari hang" nghoid loug we' ngoo zei da" moo" yo' tid da" dang: ri yo" myang boem wa nghoid wigi ngoori se' da" tho' moo ngoori myid gyi: khyoo: gi aboo goo" baja" .
47012007	Ngoo myang da" lo" thang aved' alhoo: yoomo ngo moo nheugloem: gyi: phau: khuang da" khyoo" aboo baja" . Nga" da" gung moozu: no da" zi daja kham ‹ zo: nyid . Hougsu" zu" nho: da" ziri satan wigi nhang" kaid da" lagyoo: phoo yhang: ti" - ngoori baid nhoug wigi nga" da" phau: khuang zi ri khyau" pyam' byid: nyid .
47012008	Hau: zu" nho: noo ri shoem" pyam byid: wa shid re" ngoo gi hau: Aseing: jang" moo soem" lheung: ju" sho' akhuyu" mho' bye .
47012009	Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi Nga" jeju" gi nangca" khyoo: shid re" ge" nyid bye - Khasu" wim gari nang: yoem: nu: lo" uri nga" yoem: moo" so' moo" gi reung: thang nyida" ga: wigi ngoori tu" byid: bye . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo Khristu da" yoem: zeing so' moo" gi-ngoo ri goem loem byid: lho: khau nghi: joyoo nghoid nyid tho' moo agoo" - ngoo yeom: nu: loo" yoomo ngo phau: khuang joyoo nghoid nyid .
47012010	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoo gi Khristu yoomo kham zeing: da" yoem: nu: khyoo joem - zeing:-kyi" khyeug khyoo: - pyishoo: lug lheung: khyoo: yo yau: khe" khyoo: yoomo gau yi nheig deug nyid .
47012011	Ngoo gi koo pyoid yhang: te" zi nghoid nyid nanu" ge" ngoori khugsu: bue" loo" nhang: zi nhgoid . Nanu" gi ngoori bo thug khain: mo , nghoid ca" nyid . Khasu" wim gari ngoo ci" we' anghoid su lang" gi nanu" da" akhyag ga: da" Lagyoo: yi , tho' moo khasu" koid loug nge loo wa zi anghoid .
47012012	Ngoo gi Lagyoo: dayug nghoid khyoo: sagsi: toin" shid wa shid re" myo: thang" da" alhoo: again joem yo' mau" pho" moozoo" - joem ri nanU" da" shid khoin" moo nheigloem: gyi: sheung: ziyo' toin" shed lid lo yu" bye .
47012013	Nanu" jang" mo pang" thoug da" ngei ayu tho' moo agoo" - ngoo nanu' ri gootu: phung: yi yo' azhang nyhoem: khyo" koid lid lo yu" bye: la" . Hougsu" myonhoo: khyen: da" yooboo koid shoid loo bye: nghoid rigi yooboo ri khyoid byid: ge' .
47012014	Akhid" ngoo nanu" jang" moo soem" lheung: ein: lheung: re" ju" loem: wa shid re" jen" jen" nghoid nyid bye . ngoo nanu" ri gootu: ci: amho , noug nyid loo: wa . Khasu" wim gari ngoo vho: da" khyoo: gi ngei sheung: anghoid . Nanu" ri za: ngoo vho:-gyeung" nyang ga: rigi amyed ashen yigi nya : myhi' nya pho be" shid mo soidgain young: too" byid: aeung . Nya: myhi' nya pho she , nya: zoo: myid: yi shid re" young" too" byid: eung: nyid .
47012015	Ngoo gi nanu" ri pang" thoug wa ein: nghoid rigi ngoo yo" zi dangain" yo' nga" gungdu: lhang ri ci: yhoung: pyam wa zi vho: ngei nyid su: nghoid . ngo nanu" ri gye" jheddab yoomo nanu" gi ngoori dajhi' za: te" jheddab wa zi nghoid la" .
47012016	Houg: yomo ngoo gi nanu" ri yoovoin lid: nhang: su: anghoid da" khyoo: nanu" myid eing: yhen: yu boem goo' wa nghoid . Nghoid loug we' ngoo gi nanu" ri mhau' fain" khyo" lid , mhoid thoung: to" lho: nyain: nyid ga: byu dayug yug gi tid loo goo" wa .
47012017	Ngoo kha khyo" mhoug zoo: fain" zo: lo yu" bye: la" . nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoo nhang: kaid da" lagyoo: yi mo khayug loem: nanu" ziyoo soid gain joem ri shoem" zo nyid go" la" .
47012018	Ngoo gi Titu ri nanu" jhang khyoo: ri" wa shid re" mho' lho: wigi da nhang" kaid . Gootu: mang: nhung" Khristan dayug we' nyang: yo' bo cang re" Titu gi nanu" tho' moo amyeung" ci: lho: jhoid shoem" zo: yu" la" . nyang: yo' ngoo gi myid soin: Khyoo: daloem: za: shoin" wigi khyoo: daja: moo za: so" zi anghoid la" .
47012019	Ngoonu" gi ngoonu" nya: gung - ce: yooboo ayoo" ein: - shoem" goem dang: tid bang: nghoid ga: jhoo: go" la" . Hougsu" anghoid o ! Khristu tid nhang: nau: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Mangso shid khoin" moo ngoonu" tid sang: nyid boem . Hau: tho' moo gootu: jheddab mo , we"-Ngoonu" zeiso' khyoo: dangain" gi nanu" ri pang" thoug wakhyoo" za dakoid nyid boem .
47012020	Nanu" jang" moo ngoo ju" re" ri ngoo vho: - myang nau khyo" nanu" anghoid nyid lang wa ziri we' nanu" we' hau: vho: khyoo: - myang nau khyo" ngo moo anghoid nyid wa ziri we' ngoo gung: youg yau nyid . Hau: lho: ngoo gi nanu" moo myeung" myoo: yhoo: she: da" khyoo: noo" goo" zoo go" da khyoo: - nheig yo phoin: khyoo: - nyang: nya: akyu" za: sho: khyoo: dayug yo' dayug gei sang: shang pyang: go" khyoo: dang: so' so' go" khyoo: ngeug goo hi: go" ziyo' atoug" ashu: lu: fu: go" adu aveing" go" khyoo: ri ngoo re" myang wa ziri gung: youg yau nyid .
47012021	Nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoo doem ju" re" uri Mangsoo gi ngoori nanu" da" shid khoin" moo doin: khyo' pyam zi shau" wa zi we ci' nyid akhid" nyid ju" sho' ri we' nheigloem: athid loo: za _ aved asam' akyang" byo , lho: nyam ziyo' gaintho' zung mo , myoo" sho' nyid boem yoomo ngoongoug byid thu' wa ziri ci nyid .
47013001	Akhid" ngoo gi nanu" jang" moo soem" lheung: eing: doem ju" ri wa zi nghoid . Jhoem: mungdang: moo we' Yooboo foin: ti" khyoo: daja: ja: bo ri bose' da" sagse eig yug - hougsu" anghoid lang" eig yug mo jan" mo , da" dang: yo' geung: teung jo , nhang: wa nghoid , ga: wigi tid to .
47013002	shid phyang" yoobo koid lid lo yu" bye: mo , yo' katu: dangain" ri ngoo tid nau nyid . Hau: khyoo: ri shid phyang: ngoo eig . lheung: lheung: ju" re" uri tid bye: ziyo' dakyoo" ti" - Akhid" nanu" yo' we: gang: nyid uri we' ngo dalheung: doem tid shi" wa . hau: khyoo: gi thang: lheung: ri ngoo doem ju" re" uri nanu" dayug we' dang: phyed shen" yhen: jang" mo yo" loid goo" wa zi anghoid .
47013003	Khristu gi ngoo moo dang: tid to" khyoo: - sagsi: joem ri nanu' vho" myhoo , shau" myang boem wa nghoid . Khristu gi nanu" yo' xo' tei" moozoo" zei: lo" uri nyang: gi yoem: nu: nyid su: anghoid . nya: da" yoem: vhoo" so' moo" gi-nanu" moo toin' shed , loo wa nghoid .
47013004	Khasu" wim gari Aseing: gi pyang" zeung moo baid jen" said to" uri yoem: neung: jang" moo ju" nghoid loug we' akhid" gi Mangso yoem: moo" phung" yoeb khoug: moo dei nyid bye Nyang: we" Khristu yo' dayug za: nghoid nyid boem yoomo yoem: neung: nyid boem - nghoid sho . loug we' nanu" moo bo da" yoem: moo" so' zeing yoomo ngoonu" nyang: yo' dage" dei nyid boem wa nghoid .
47013005	Nanu" gi hau: loem" jeung" khyoo: moo kangso' dei nyid mo , nghoid la" . anghoid la" . yo" myang si' wa shid re" nyang: nya: gungdu: ri myid: phoid sho: yu" nyid ge' . 47013006	Nanu" gi gyo" soem: pyam mo , anghoid ziri" nanu" nyang: si' mo , nghoid go" wa ein: ngoo = myid loem nyid .
47013007	Nanu" gi yooboo adoem koid wa shid re" ngoonu" gi Mangso jang" moo akyu" mho' nyid boem . hau: zigi ngoonu" jham" ca: yu" khyoo: ri oung: loo" wa shid re" toin" shid khyoo: anghoid . ngoonu" koem gi gyo" soem" pyam mo yhang: ti" nghoid loug we' nanu" deungmain" khyo" koid nyid wa shid re" damho , byid: nyid .

47013010	Nanu" yo' ve: lain nyid uri ngoo he: da" mougsoug" ri lhid" da" khyoo: gi ngoo nanu" jang" moo ju" re" uri Aseing: ngoori byid: to" da" myeung" akhang" gi nanu" ri lhu: phyo' pyam wa shid mo anghoid . Nanu" ri so' koid so' nyheung wa shid re" nghoid .
47013011	Nga mang nhung" yi we" - akhid" ngoonu" vhu" kaid boem . Nanu" dangain" bang: ngei pyo: nyid goo" baja" o" . 48001001	Byu da" amyeing" yo' lagyo: aya: moo nyhed: to" zi we' nghoid - byu yi da" byu nyid byu yab khyo" cang lho: wigi nyheung to" da" lagyoo: we' anghoid . 48001002	Hid: moo ngoo yo' dage" nghoid nyid da" mang: nhung" yi dangain" yo' Galati mung" mo phung byu yi jhang khyoo: mougsoug" lhid" lho: vhu" kaid' boem .

48001007	Gyeing" nyang: ga: rigi Aseing Yesu da" khyoo: mo lid lho: ngei bu: lu dang: gootu: ajo . 48001009	Nanu" lhoem: yu ci: bye: hau: ngei bu: lu dang: yo' shai" go" da" gootu: ngei bu: lu dang: daloem: ri byu dayug yug gi nanu" ri kho" kyo" nghoid rigi nyang: gi nheing" khoin" zang" baja" ein: wigi xang: shed" moo ngoonu" tid yu" bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" akhid" ngoo da tid nyid shi .
48001010	Khasu" wim gari ngoo hid: su" tid nyid zigi byu yi wigi coung" byid: nghei byid: zi yo" yu wa shid re" koid nyid zi nhghoid la" . Houg: su" we' anghoid o" . 48001011	Mang nhung" yi we" nanu" ri ngoo kho" kyo" da" ngei bu: lu dang: gi byu yi wigi jhau poin" kaid' zi anghoid loo: za: ngoo nanu" ri tid kyoo" bye .
48001012	Kahsu" wim gari byu yi hang" jang" mo we' hau: ngei bu: lu dang: ri ngoo jhau" yu yu" zi anghoid . Aseing Yesu Khristu nyang: Yo' se myang khyo" ngoori toin" shid bye .
48001013	Ngoo gi Yuda noku thung" moo danyid nyid shi" uri khasu" koid nyid lid loo bye: da" khyoo: nanu" nyang: shau" gyo: yu" boem bye - ngoo gi Mangso da" phung ri neig khyeug myid aboo loo za: pyi: sho: shen" yhen lo ziyo' lhu: phyo' mhoin' pyam wa shid re" yoem: kaid' lo yu" bye .

48001016	Hau: thang: ri tung bau , byumyu" yi ri nya: zo: da" ngei bu: lu dang: kho" kyoo" wa shid re" nya: zo: ngoori toin" shid' da" uri ngoo gi hang" da" phajhi" byid: khyoo: ri we' amho , yu yu" .

48002007	Nyang: nu" gi ngoori phajhi' aseig byid: wa gungkhoo: - Mangsoo gi Petru ri athang: yham" kham' byid: da" Yuda yi ri hau: ngei bu: lu dang: kho" kyoo" wa yoovoin , byid: to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoori gi athang: aphyed' da" tung bau byumyu" yi ri kho" kyoo" wa yoovoin , ab , byid: bye: da" khyoo: ri nyangnu" myang se' boem bye .

48002009	Hougsu" ngoori byid: too" bye: da" jeju" ri zheung: myang da" uri phoung: da" zeing bung: te" vhu" jhung: zheung: nghoid nyid da - Yaku , Petru yo' Yohan gi Mangsoo ngoori byid: to" da" kooki" lid' da" yoovoin ri-lazoem" asoo" so" too" byid: boem bye - Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" dangain" bang: gi moo" voin , luxoem" cang" yi nghoid da" khyoo: alhoo: ri thoin" shug khyoo" wigi nyangnu" gi Barnaba yo' ngoori lo , yo lo , khyo" lo , zei: zei: yu boem bye - Ngoonu" gi tungbau byumyu" yi jang" moo moo" voin wigi nyangnu" rigi Yuda byumyu" yi jang" moo moo" voin wa shid re" myid veung" to" boem bye .

48002011	Nghoid loug we' Antioki voogung khyoo: Petru ju" yhe: uri nyang: zei so nyid da" avoid asam" gishoid nyidda" khyoo: gi bang bang nyang: nghoid nyid yoomo ngoo ginyang: ri mung" byu yi da" shid' khoin" moo gyi koid .
48002012	Yaku nhang: kaid da" byu yi houg: moo aju" ri" shi" da" shid' moo Petru gi tungbau mang nhung" yi yo' dage" voem: shoin" zo: nyid ago - nghoid loug houg: nhang: kaid da" byu yi ju" re" da" uri athang: yham" bye: bang: ri gyoug yoomo tungbau byumyu" yi yo' voem: shoin" zo: nyid jang" mo yho' thu lo .
48002013	Yuda mangnhhung" gooji yi we' Petru yo' dage" seing" ayang" mo , yhang: ti" - bo zheung: thu' lo" boem yoomo Barnaba lang" nyangnu" yo' bo yho' thu lo" nyid .
48002014	Akhid" nyangnu" gi ngei bu lu dang: da" deingmain" da" khyoo: moo dain: dain: aso" nyid boem ziri ngoo shau" myang lang" gi nyangnu" dangain" bang: da shid' khoin" moo Petru ri nang gi Yuda byu nghoid lho: wigi Yuda byu yhang: ti" anghoid - tungbau byu yi yhang: ti" kangso dei nyid lho: tungbau byumyu" yi ri Yuda byumyu" yi yhang: ti" - kangso dei wa shid' re" khasu" koid yo" nyen" nhang: wa lha" . ein: wigi ngoo tid pye .
48002015	Ngoonu" gi khu: lo bidnyid mo nyang - Yuda byumyu" nghoid nyid Youg: noo yooboo yo" da" tungbau byumyu" yi , , ga: myeing myheung shau" bang anghoid boem .
48002016	Nghoid loug we' byu xangsu: yi gi toung: to" da" tarha" ri cang pyeung da" moozoo" yo' Mangso shid khoin" moo yo" deing byeung" lo" zi anghoid - Yesu Khritstu ri loem" jeung" da" shoid khyo" za: dayo" deing byeung" lo" ziri ngoonu" se' boem - Ngoonu" we' toung: to" tarha' ri cang byeung" khyo" wigi anghoid loo: za: Khristu yesu ri leom" jeung" da" yoomo Mangso shid' khoin" moo deing byeung" bang: bue" loo goo" baja" ga: Khristu Yesu ri loem" jeung" lo boem bye - Khasu" wim gari hau: toung: to" da" tarha" ri cang pyeung" da" moozoo" yo' hang" we' Mangso da" shid' khoin" moo deing byeugng" zi ayo" yu .
48002017	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi Khristu yo' dadeing: daloem: za: bue" loo bye: khyo" Mangso shid moo yo" deing byeung" loo baja" - ein: yoem: kaid jang" moo ngoonu" nyang: we' tungbau byumyu" yi yhang: ti" - yooboo yoo" mo , nghoid khyoo: bang thu' lo rigi Khristu nyang: yoobo da" moozoo" ri voin , vu , nyid su: nghoid ein: yo" tid wa la" . 48003001	Akoo" apyoid' da" Galati byu yi we" - pyang" zeing tho' moo Yesu Khristu shid: Kham: bye: da" khyoo: ri nanu" da" myonhoo: moo bang bang yo" myang sho' ngoo tid shid kyoo" bye: ri-nanu" ri hang" wigi mhoug cid" zho" lho: jhu , phyo' zi shau" go" la" .

48004031	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo mang nhung" yi we" - ngoonu" gi join , myhi , da" nya: zoo: anghoid - join , myi , anghoid da" sara: da" nya: zoo: yi danghoid boem .
48005001	Khristu gi ngoonu" ri join , bue" jo , jang" mo lhoid , kaid' bye: nghoid yoomo nyhang" gi loid byoin yoo" bang: nghoid boem bye houg: yoomo loid byoin , yoo" bye: bang: yhang: ti" yab , jo , ge' - join , da" dabu" khoug: moo adoem vang loo" goo" .
48005002	Tam" gyoo: ge' nanu" athang: yham" boem bye: nghoid rigi Khristu gi nanu" shid' re" ce" akyu" we' aboo - ein: ngoo Polu nyang: nanu" ri tid kyoo" ba' .
48005003	Hau: tho' moo gootu: athang: shau" yham" kham , bye: su: gi toung: to" tarha" dangain" ziri cang pyeing ca" - ein: wigi athang: yham" kham: ci: bye: bang: ri ngoo dalheing" doem tid poin" nyid .
48005004	Toung: to" da" tarha" ri cang pyeung khyo" wigi Mangso shid khoin" moo deing byeung" khyoo: yo" yu wa ga: yoem: kaid' nyid bang: nanu" gi Khristu yo' gang: lain lo" lho: Mangso da" jeju" ri ci: foid pyam' abye: go .
48005005	Ngoonu" koem gi Mangso da" venyi yoem: vhoo" yo' Khristu ri loem" jeung" da" khoug: mo Mangso da" shid khoin" moo deing byeung" ga: soin: yu byid: wa shid' re" myid byu lho: dalang" nyid boem .
48005006	Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" gi Khristu Yesu moo nyid nyid beom nghoid rigi athang: yham" ziri kham , akham' ein: zigi ce: ayhoug: gyen: - yhoug: gyen: da" khyoo: gi jheddab myid ri ci: lho: loem" jeung moo" zei: khyoo: nghoid .
48005007	Shid phyang" nanu" gi gye" yhoug: gyen: khyo" zei: so' yoem: kaid lo yu" boem bye - hau: deungmain" khyoo: ri atam" gyoo: goo" baja" ga: nanu" ri hang" toem , too" go"
48005008	Nanu" ri nyang: kha: khyo" joug jhoin" yu" la" . Houg: yhang: ti" jhoug jhoin" da" khyoo: gi nanu" ri khe: yu da" Mangso jang" mo ju" re" zi anghoid .
48005009	Zooyho' dangain" ziri do loo nhang: wa shid re" gi doo cid" dajhi' za date: vho: , , ga: da" dang: khyang" jo , .
48005010	Nghoid loug we' ngoo gi akhid" ju" sho' nanu" ri khanham we' damyid loem nyid ngoo yo' nanu" gi hau: Aseing: moo daloem: za: nghoid nyid yoomo nanu" gi ngoo myid khyoo: yo' adu goo" lho: gi akham: yu goo" wa ein: ngoo myid loem , nyid nanu" da" nheigloem: ri ze" shoin , ze" phyo' mo , hang" ri nghoid loug we' Mangso wigi shen" yhen loo wa .
48005011	Nghoid loug we' mang nhung yi we" - athang: dayham" ca" ein: - ngoo daxo , kho" nyid nghoid rigi ci: yoomo shen" yhen khyoo: ri ngoo shau" zo: nyid shi" wa la" . Hougsu" kho" kyo" ga: zi dadeung nghoid rigi Khristu da" pyang" zeing khyoo: ri ngoo kho" kyo" jang" moo ngoo yau: khe jam jau zi shau" loo wa anghod .
48005012	Nanu" ri nheigloem: ze" nhung ze" phyo' nyid mo , gi athang: yham" zi za: we' anghoid - nyang: tu: nyang: yham" phyed' pyam' goo" baja" .
48005013	Nanu" koem gi mang nhung" yi we" - loid byoin , da" akhang" yoo" goo" baja" ga: khe: yu zi shau" boem bye - nghoid loug we' hau: loid byoin , da" akhang" ri goo koid lho: wigi gung sho" da" vhoo: boo: loug gyi: nheigloem: ri nheig shid: said' wa shid re" agoo , ashoo: goo" - hougsu" koid wa gung khoo: - nanu" gi jheddab ziyo' nyang: cang" nyang: pang" thoug go" nyid ge' .
48005014	Khasu" wim gari re" yhoem: kyoo" cang" ri nanya: gung yo' dakhyoo" ti" jheddab we' ga: byid: to" da" dang: dakhoin" ricang pyeung ziyo' toung: to" da" tarha" dangain" ri bain' cang zi bui" bye .
48005015	Nghoid loug we' kyang: da" gougnyhoug lam" joem yhang: ti" - nanu" nyang cang" nyang: dangaid' zoo: go" nyid nghoid rigi nanu" nyang: cang" nyang: tu - jhoem" pyam' goo" wa ziri ze" lhid' nyid ge' .
48005016	He: khyoo: ri ngoo tid nyid zigi" nanu" gi venyi wigi khyoo" shed' ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - cang zei: nyid yab , yhe: lo" rigi gung sho" da" vhoo: boo myo , no , khyoo: ri nanu" yo" cang pyeing wa zi anghoid .
48005017	Khasu" wim gari gung sho" da" aco' ajhoid khyoo: yi gi venyi da" vho: ngei khyoo: yo' shai jo , - gung sho" da" vhoo: boo myo , no khyoo: yo' venyi da" vho: ngei da" khyoo: he: eig khaid gi gyi bui" go" nyid - hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi nyang: nya: myid vho: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ayo" koid boem .
48005018	Hau: venyi gi nanu" ri shu" vhu" she: lo" nghoid rigi nanu" gi hau: toung: to" da" tarha" khoug: moo nyid mo , anghoid loo .
48005019	Gung sho" da" moozoo" gi bang bang nyang: nghoid nyid wigi hau: gu: gi youg: shoo: go" moo" - avoid avhu: koid da" moo" - aco' ajhoid da" moo" .
48005020	Goug ngu soolhoo: no' khyoo: - maintain khyau" fa" lung khyoo: join: yu kau" phajhi" - anoug angei ziyo' myeing" myoo: yhoo: she: khyoo: - noo" goo" zoo go" - nheig yoo ung: jhen: - nyang: nya: da" akyu" te: sho: zi gang: loo" lain' lo" da" khyoo: - phung kho' go" lo" khyoo: -
48005021	Aloem" athoo: koid khyoo: - yhid: shug yhed khyoo: zoo: pyoo: shug bu zoo" re" youg: sho: avoid avhu: koid khyoo: yo' houg: yo" du go" da" khyoo: nghoid nyid Hidsu" koid nyid bang: gi Mangso mungdain da" agyid asoo: ri yo" kham: yu wa zi anghoid - ein: shid' phyang" tid kyoo" bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - akhid" we' nanu" ri ngoo tid nyid .
48005022	Nghoid loug we' hau: venyi da" ashi" koem gi jheddab zi gau yi zi ngei bu khyoo: nheigloem: sheung: khyoo: nheig khyeug khyoo: - ge , lho , khyoo: - dang sadi zung" khyoo: nghoid .
48005023	Khyo , nyhoem: ziyo' nyang: nya: da" nheigloem: ri yo" khang" khyoo: nghoid - he: khyoo: ri yo" toem , too" wa zigi ce" tarha" moo we' aboo .
48005024	Khristu Yesu yo' sen: bang: koem gi nyang: tu: nya: gung sho" nheigloem: yo' aco' ajhoid khyoo: ri vhoo: boo myo , no , khyoo: yo' dage" pyang" zeing moo bo baid' jen" too" bye .
48005025	Ngoonu" gi venyi moo kangso dei nyid boem nghoid rigi hau" venyi wigi shu" vhu" she: khyoo: shed ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - cang so" nyid boem shang .
48005026	Ngoonu" gi nghoid boin: khyoo: - nyang: cang" nyang: pyi: shoo: go" khyo" yooboo foin: ziyo' nyang: cang" nyang: noo" goo" zoo go" da" khyoo: joem ri to" pyam' ca" boem bye .
48006001	Mang nhung" yi we" - byu dayug yug gi aboin: asoo" loo: za: yooboo zei: shoid nghoid rigi venyi wigi khyoo: shed" khyo" kangso dei nyid mo , nanu" gi houg: yhang: te" su: ri nu" nham , da" myid yo' khyoo: shed byid: ca" nyid nanu" nyang: we' gunglau" wigi jhu , phyo' zi ashug" baja" nyang: tu: nyang: houg: lhed' zed" nyid ge' .
48006002	Nanu" nyang: cang" dayoug yoovoin , ri dayug - bo pang" voin goo" ge' - houg: su" nghoid lang" gi nanu" Khristu da" Tarha" ri cang pyeung zi nghoid wa .
48006003	Byu yi dayug yug gi yhoug: gyen: da" byu gyeing" nyang: anghoid nyid da" zi yhoug: gyen: da" byu nghoid ga: nyang: nya: da" gung ri nghoid boin: su: gi nyang: nya: da" gung ri mhau' nyid su nghoid .
48006004	Byu dayug yo' dayug gi nyang: nya: da" koid moozoo" ri soin kho' yu" nyid goo" baja" - nyang: nyang: koid da" moozoo" ge zi nghoid nyid rigi hau: ziri gootu: dayug yug da" moozoo" yo' ki' goo" cang aboo loo: za: nyang: zei: da" moozoo" moo gau yi ngei bu: phau: khuang nyid baja" .
48006005	Khasu" wim gari dayug yo' dayug gi nyang: tu: nya: da" yooboin , ri voin , vu , nyid boem wa zi nghoid nyid .
48006006	Khirstu da" mungdang: ri jhau" kham: yu su: gi jhoug" byid: da" sara: ri nyang: tu: nyang: yo" da" gye" ge da" soidgain' dangain" ziyo' bo pang" thoug byid: nyid baja" .
48006007	Nanu" gi nyang: nya: da" gung du: ri mhau' lho wigi khyoo: avhang: loo" goo" - Mangsoo ri hang" we' aphoug" akhyoid yo" koid wa zi anghoid - byu yi gi nyang: tu: nyang: sho" kaid ziyo' dakhyoo" shau" yham" yu wa zi nghoid .
48006008	Byu da" gung shoo" ein: da" myid' jang: moo sho" kaid su: gi shid: lo" ein: da" byo , yoin" da" amyoug: ashi" ri shau" yham" yu wa nghoid - Venyi ein: da" myid' jang: moo sho" kaid' su: gi apyad' atoo: mo kangso ein: da" amyoug: ashi" ri shau" yham" yu wa nghoid nyid .
48006009	Hougsu" yoomo ge da" moozoo" ri zei wa shid re" ngoonu" myung: soo" doug asoo" loo: koid nyid boem shang - Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" yoem: a shoin: rigi ayo , akhyeing: ju" lang" shau" yham" yu boem wa zi nghoid .
48006010	Hougsu" wigi ngoonu" gi ayo , akhyeing: bo jo , shi" uri ge bue" da" ayo , yoo" khang" moo" - byu dangain" mo , shid re" ge lho , da" moo" ri zei: nyid boem shang nghoid loug we' loem" jeung" da" ikoin deungkhu: yi shid re" je" wigi zei: nyid boem shang .
48006011	Kha: yhi' gyeing" gyi: da" lhid" cab , yo' ngoo nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoonya: lo , yo' nyang: lhid" to" ziri yu" yu" ge' .
48006012	Athang: yham" da" khyoo: rikham: yu wa shid re" nanu" ri aphoug" akhyoid koid lho: wigi koid nhang: nyid da" byu yi gi ngi zain' shoid mo , laxoem" alhoo: again da" shid re" myonhoo: sho: nyid mo , nghoid ago - nghoid loug we' nyangnu" hougsu" koid da" khyoo: gi Khristu da" pyang" zeing yoomo pyi: sho: shen" yhen zi ashug" wa shid mo koid zi nghoid .
48006013	Khasu" wim gari athang: yham" zi kham , ci: bang: lang" gi hau: toung: to" da" tarha" ri ayo" cang pyeing nghoid nyid ago" - nyangnu" gi nanu" tarha" khoug: khyoo: vang lo wigi athang: yham" zi kham: yu da" jang" moo phau: khuang nghoid boin: nyid nau boem yoomo nanu" ri houg: yhang: ti" koid nhang: nau zi nghoid ago" .
48006014	Ngoo koem gi ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" pyang" zeing mo goo tu: - ce: noem khyoo: moo we' myonhoo: sho: phau: khuang jang: ajo - Khasu" wim gari nya: pyang" zeing yoomo he: moug myid gi nga" shid mo shid: mang bue" byug wigi ngoo we' he: mougmyid shid re" shid: mang bue" byug bye .
48006015	Byu dayug yug giathang: yham" zi shau" kham: yu-hougsu" anghoid lang" ashau" kham: yu - zigi ce" yhoug: gyen: we' anghoid - byu aseig yo" bue" lo da" khyoo: za: yhoug: gyen: danghoid nyid .
48006016	He: da" avoid asam" akhyoo" again da" tarha" ri nyang: nya: da" kangso' dei khyoo: dangain" jang" moo cang yhe: loo" bang: da" atho' moo we' Mangsoo byumyu" yi da" atho' moo we' ngei bu ziyo' nheig khyeig sho" myen: da" khyoo: gi dajo , jo , baja" o" .
48006017	akhid" mo gi hang" nghoid loug we' ngoori aze" youg: aze" nhung byid: loo goo" - Khasu" wim gari nga" da" gung moo dab , dam noo joem gi ngoo Khristu da" moo" voin , join , phoo nghoid da" khyoo: ri sagsi: kham: nyid .
48006018	Nga" da" mang: nhung" yi we" - yha" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" jeju" gi nanu" da" Venyi yo' dage" danyid nyid baja" o" Amen .
49001001	Mangsoo myid vho: nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Khristu Yesu da" lagyoo: aya: moo nyheung too" shau" su: - ngoo Polu mo wigi Ephesu voo moo nyid lho: Khristu moo dadeing: daloem: za: voin: tang: koid nyid da" Mangso byu yi jhang khyoo: dang: pyeung: kaid .
49001002	Ngoonu" da" nya: phoo Mangsoo yo' Aseing Yesu Khristu gi nanu" ri jeju" yo' ngei pyo: khyoo: gi dabyid: nyid baja" o" .

49001004	Nyhang" nu" gi nya: da" shid khoin" moo gyeungshang: lho: yooboo adab loo: baja" ga: ngoonu" gi Khristu yo' dadeing: daloem: za: bue" lo khyo" wigi moug: phain" myid aphain" shi" mo lang" Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri khyen: yu too" bye - nyang: gi nya: da" jheddab nheigloem: khyo" wigi Mangsoo gi Yesu Khristu khyo" wigi ngoonu" ri nya: zooyi ga: yhen: yu wa shid mo myid phyed too" bye .
49001005	Hau: khyoo: gi nyang: myid soin: ziyo' vho: ngei khyoo: nghoid .
49001006	Nyang: jheddab da" nya: zoo: khyo" wigi aphoug" amho , loo: ngoonu" ri byid: da" jeju" jhung: shug yoomo phung" yoeb , bo da" nya: jeju" ri coung" nghei boem shang .
49001007	Khasu" wim gari Khristu gi xoin" du: khyo" shid: kham: ziyo' ngoonu" ri loid byoin , loo" nhang: bye - hau: zigi ngoonu" da" youg: noo yooboo ri khyoid pyam byid: wa da" khyoo: nghoid - nyang: ngoonu" ri hid: yhi' agoin ayu: byid: to" da" Mangso jeju" gi khayhi' gyi: sheung: jo , bye: lha" . 49001008	Nya: jhedab nheigloem: khoug: mo no , thang khyoo: ngoonu" ri toin" shid' bye .
