49001010	Ayo , bidnyid byeung" loo lang" gi Mangso wigi joeb byeung" loo nhang: wa da" hau: soin nyheung lo" da" khyoo: gi moug: khung: moug: di mo we' myid' jang: tho' moo we' phain" too" moo too" dangain" ri Khristu moo dadeing: daloem: za: bui" wa khyoo: nghoid .
49001011	Jo , moo jo , koem gi Mangso da" myid soin nyheung lo" da" khyoo: yo' myid phyed' to" khyo" bue" loo bye - hau: lho: xang: shid" mo myid soin to" da" khyoo: moo ayang: qei" lho: Khristu moo dadeing: daloem: za: nghoid nyid khyo" wigi nyang: myid soin to" khyo" nyangnu" ri nya: da" byumyu" yi bue" loo wa shid mo khyen: nyheung too" bye .
49001012	Hougsu" nghoid rigi Khristu moo xang: shid" mo myid byu too" bang: ngoonu" gi Mangso da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb ricoung nghei nyid boem loo shang o" .
49001013	Nanu" ri khyoid yu khyoo: byid: da" hau: deungmain" da" mungdang: ein: da" ngei bu: lu dang: ri nanu" tungbau byumyu" yi shau" gyo: boem da" uri nanu" we' Mangso da" byumyu" yi bue" lo abye: go - Khristu ri nanu" loem jeung" boem bye: nghoid rigi nyang: tid too" khare" da" gyeungshang: venyi: ri byid: yoomo nyang: gi nanu" da" Aseing: nghoid nyid bye: khyoo: ri dazid thung" byid: bye .
49001014	Hau: da" gyeungshang: venyi gi Mangsoo nya: byumyu" yi ri byid: to" da" dang: soo" khoin" ri ngoonu" shau" kham: yu wa da" pakham: nghoid nyid hau: zigi Mangsoo gi nya: da" byumyu" yi ri joeb byeung" da" loid byoin nhang: da" khyoo: - ngoonu" ri nheig shid: nheig deig nhang: nyid zi nghoid - ngoonu" gi nya: da" myonhoo: phung: yoeb , ri coung" nghei byid: nyid boem shang o" .
49001015	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi Aseing Yesu ri loem" jeung nyid bye: ziri we' Mangso da" byu yi ri jheddab nyid bye: da" khyoo: ri we' ngoonu" shau" gyo: jang" mo wigi
49001016	Nanu" da" shid mo Mangsoo ri anoo: ayab , jeju" boin: zoore" - nga" akyu" mho' jang" moo nanu" ri daboin: so" nyid .
49001017	Nanu" Mangsoo ri je" se' loo goo" baja" - nanu" ri phajhi" boo nhang: lho: Mangsoo khyo" yo" pang shug da" Venyi nanu" ri byid: wa shid re" phung" yoeb , bo da" phoo - nanu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" Mangsoo moo ngoo mho' nyid .
49001018	Hau: lho: wigi Aseing: nanu" ri nheig byu khyoo: moo khe: yu too" bye: ziri we' Aseing: gi nya: byumyu" yi ri byid: wa ga: da" mau" pho" jeju" agyid asoo: joem gi -
49001019	Khamyho , agoin ayu: nghoid nyid da" khyoo: ri we' Aseing: ri loem" jeing" bang: ngoonu" moo nya: yoem: so' gi khayhi' gyi: sheung: jo , ziri we' nanu" shau" myang se' lo boem baja" - nanu" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: - soozoo: lheung: lo wigi nya: da" bidbang ri myang loo: baja" - ngoonu" moo moo" zei: nyid da" he: da" yoem: so' gi
49001020	Khirstu ri shid: bye: jang" mo doem dei to'" loo nhang: wigi moug: khung: moug di mo Mangso lo , yo shoid moo zhoung: jo , nhang: da" uri ci: yhoung: da" yoem: moo" so' moo" nyang: nghoid bye .
49001021	Hau: joyoomoo Khristu gi moug: khung: moug di: ri vhoeb khang" nyid mo , amyeing" akhang" yoo" bang: - yoem: so' boo bang: - Aseing yi dangain" bang: tho' moo vhoeb khang" byid wigi nya: myonhoo: ngei lang: gi he: mougmyid yo' thang: phyang" pyaid ju" loo wa da" mougmyid tho' moo amyeing" akhang" yoo" bang: dangain" tho' moo je gyi: jo .
49001022	Mangsoo gi jo , moo jo , nyid moo nyid ri Khristu da" khoovoo: khoug: moo kaid' to" wigi dangain" da" atho' moo gyi: thang da" Aseing: bue" nyid khyo" nyang: ri phung: khyoo: ab , byid: bye .
49001023	Hau: da" phung: gi Khristu da" gung doem: nghoid wigi joyoo khang" moo" mo dangain" rigi nya: gung du: nyang: joeb byeung" nhang: da" joeb byeung" khyoo: nghoid .
49002001	Lai loo" bye: da" ayo , moo nanu" gi nanu" nyang: atam" gyoo: wigi shoid vhang: lo" da" moozoo" yo' youg: noo yooboo yoomo venyi: khyoo: moo shid: mang danghoid loo: ago" .
49002002	Hau: da" ayo , moo nanu" gi mougmyid da" akhyeing" ashoeb khyoo: moo za: cang lo" boem wigi akhui" Mangsoo ri aphoug" akhyoid koid nyid da" byu yi ri vhoeb khang" nyid da" venyi gi moug: laid moug di ri vhoeb khang" lho: yoem: so' bo da" venyi joem jhang khyoo: nanu" cang lo" boem abye: go" .
49002003	Gyeung" nyang: ngoonu" dangain" bang: we' nyangnu" yhang: ti" ngoonu" nya: da" gung sho" aco' ajhoid da" khyoo: moo cang lo" lho: gung shoo" vho: ngei da" khyoo: yo' nheigloem: da" khyoo: ri cang zei: lo yu" boem bye . Ngoonu" da" nyid yab , khyoo: gi gootu: byu yi yo' dakhyoo" ti" - Mangsoo nheig khoo" yo: da" dam shau" moin: mo , nghoid nyid .
49002004	Nghoid loug we' Mangso da" nheig khyeig shoo" myen: khyoo: gi athang agoin zi nghoid wigi nyangnu" ri jheddab da" jhed khyeing: kang: khyeing: gi gyi: sheung: jo , lho .
49002005	Ngoonu" da" atam" gyoo: loo: shoid vhang: lo" da" khyoo: yoomo venyi moo shid: leung jo , uri Khristu yo' dage" ngoonu" ri doem dei loo nhang: bye hau: khyoo: gi Mangsoo da" jeju" yo' ngoonu" gi khyoid yu zi shau" da" khyoo: nghoid .
49002006	Ngoonu" gi Khirstu yo' dadeing: daloem: za: bui" bye: yoomo Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri moug: khung: moug di tho' moo nyang: yo' dage" vhoeb , khang" nyid wa shid re" Khristu yo' dage" shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: bye .
49002007	Nyang: hidsu" koid da" khyoo: gi Khristu Yesu moo ngoonu" ri toin" shid da" nya: jhed khyeing: kang: khyeing: khyo" wigi nya: da" jeju" gi gooki" lid' gyi: sheung: jo , da" khyoo: ri myang se' loo wa shid re" toin" shid nyid .
49002008	Khasu" wim gari loem" jeung" khyoo: yoomo nanu" gi Mangso da" jeju" khyo" za: khyoid khyi: yu zi shau" khyoo: nghoid . Hau: zigi nanu" yoem: kaid' yoomo yo" yu da" akyu" anghoid - hang" we' phau: khuang jang: ajo , baja" - Mangso da" jeju" jhung: shug za: danghoid .
49002009	
49002010	Ngoonu" gi Mangsoo nyang: myid vho ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - phain" so: to" zi shau" mo , nghoid nyid wigi Khristu Yesu yo' ngoonu" deung: shoin" to" khyoo: yoomo nyang: gi ngoonu" ri ge da" moozoo" joem shid re" phain" so: too" bye - hau: ge , da" moozoo" joem ri ngoonu" zei: soo , wa shid re" soin' nyheung too" byid: bye .
49002011	Nyang: nya: da" gung ri athang: yham" mo , ga: tid nyid da-Yuda byu yi wigi Athang: ayham" mo , ga: wigi myheung too" shau" mo , gung sho" shoid khyo" tungbau byumyu" bue" nyid mo , nanu" we' nanu" nya: da" lid loo bye: ayo , mo , bue" loo bye: da" khyoo: joem ri boin: so" nyid ge' .
49002012	Hau" ayo , moo nanu" gi Khristu yo' gang: go" jo , boem ago - nanu" gi tungbau byumyu" yi nghoid nyid wigi Mangsoo khyen: yu da" byumyu" moo aboo bang: nghoid nyid boem nya: byumyu" yi ri byid: to" da" Mangso dang: theing khoin" yo' sen: da" dang: soo" khoin" moo akhang mo nanu" gi abo tho' moo agoo" - mougmyid moo ce" nheig byu jang: we' ayoo" - Mangsoo we' ayo" khyo" nyid lid lo boem abye: go .
49002013	Nghoid loug we' akhid" koem gi Khristu Yesu moo zheung" shoin" too" bye: yoomo ve: gang: nyid lo yu" da" manu" gi Khristu da" shid: kham , xoin" yoomo shu" tain" tab yu zi shau" boem bye .
49002014	Khasu" wim gari Khristu nyang: - Yuda byumyu" yi yo' tung bau byumyu" yi ri damyu" za: bue" loo nhang: wigi ngoonu" ri ngei pyo: myenjham" khyoo: byid: bye nyang: gi nya: da" gung yo' nyang: - nyangnu" ri byumyu" kho' to" wigi nyang: gi nya: da" gung yo' nyang: - nyangnu" ri byumyu" kho' to" wigi nyang: cang" nya: gyi bui" nhang: go" da" kyo lhung ri phyo' shoin pyam byid: bye .
49002015	Nyang: gi nyang: yo' dagung dashoo' za: bue" lo khyo" wigi byu eig myu" ziri byumyu" aseig damyu" za: bue" loo nhang: lho: ngei pyo: myenjham" da" khyoo: byid: wa shid re" nyang: gi Yuda tarha" da" amyeing" dang: yo' tarha" joem ri phyo' shoin pyam bye .
49002016	Khirstu gi pyang" zeing tho' moo shid: kham: khyoo" wigi nyangnu" da" gyi koid go" khyoo: ri lhu: phyo' lhu: shoin shoem" shoung: pyam lho: wigi nya: da" pyang" zeing khyoo: khyo" hau: byu eig myu" ziri damyu" za: Mangso jhang khyoo: deom shu" loo" bye .
49002017	Hougsu" Mangsoo yo' ve: gang: jo , da" nanu" tung bau byumyu" yi ri we' Mangsoo yo' jhang byid da" Yuda byumyu" yi ri we' Khristu ju" re" wigi hau: ngei pyo: myenjham" khyo: da" ngei bu: lu dang: gi , re" kho" kyoo" byid: bye .
49002018	Tungbau byumyu" yi yo' Yuda byumyu" yi zheung: nghoid da" ngoonu" dangain" bang: gi Khristu da" gung moo hau: venyi daloem: za: yo' Pho , da" shid khoin" khyoo: yo" vang lo" beom bye .
49002019	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo akhid" nanu" gi tungbau byumyu" hougsu" anghoid lang" gi nghi: zain' byumyu" yi anghoid boem loo - akhid" nanu" gi Mangso byumyu" yi moo bo da" moug: seung: byumyu" yi nyang: nghoid wigi Mangso da" ikoin deungkhu: byu yi nyang: nghoid bye .
49002020	Nanu" gi lagyoo: yi yo' lapi: yi zhoug to" da"-apoem: ayang: moo poug zhug do , loo" shau" mo , we' nghoid - Khristu Yesu nyang: koem gi hau" yhoem: mo geung: teung ayang: lug boem nyang: nghoid bye .
49002021	Nyang: gi he: noku yhoem: goin" ri geing ; teing gyi: sheing ; nhang: su ; nghoid yoomo hau: zigi Aseing: ri ab noung" da" noku yhoem: bue" loo bye .
49002022	Khristu yo' dagung dashoo" za: bue" khyo" wigi nanu" we' gootu: da" byumyu" dangain" yo' dage" Mangsoo gi nya: venyi khyo" nyid nyid da" joyoo daloem: byu yi" we' khyo" we' nyheung zhug to" zi shau" boem bye . .
49003001	He: da" khyoo: yoomo nanu" ngi zain byumyu" yi shid re" Khristu Yesu da" thung: byu ngoo Polu gi Mangso jang" moo akyu" mho' nyid .
49003002	Nanu" da" ge , lho khyo: shid re" Mangsoo gi nya: jeju" yo' ngoori - he: da" moo" ab , byid: bye: da" khyoo: ri gyeing" nyang: nanu" shau" gyo: yu" boem bye .
49003003	Mangsoo gi nya: da" no , thang khyo" nyheung soin' to" khyoo: ri toin" shid' lho: wigi hau: khyoo: ngoori si' nhang: bye - leung" khyo" lhid" kaid' bye .
49003004	Nanu" gi houg: ngoo lhid" kaid' da" khyoo: ri nghab yu" boem nghoid rigi Khristu yo' sen: da" no , thang khyoo: ri ngoo khasu" se' gyo: da" khyoo: ri nanu" we' se' gyo: boem wa nghoid .
49003005	Lai loo" bye: da" ayo , joem moo he: no , thang da" khyoo: byu xangsu: yi ri atid kyo" yu" shi" - Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi akhid" nya: da" gyeungshang: lagyoo: yi yo' Lapi: yi ri hau: venyi khyo" wigi pang shug byid: bye .
49003006	Hau: no , thang da" khyoo: gi ngei bu: lu dang: yoomo nghi: zain' byumyu" yi gi Mangso da" mainkaid jeju" joem ri Yuda byumyu" yi yo" kham: yu da" akhang" ri yo" yu loo bye: khyoo: nghoid . Nyang: nu" yo' Yuda byumyu" yi gi gung shoo" daloem: za: mo akung: ako'' nghoid nyid wigi Khristu Yesu khyo" wigi Mangsoo byid: to" da" dang: soo" khoin" mo akyu" ri kham: yu da" akhang" yo" boem bye .
49003007	Nya: da" yoem: so' khyo" wigi ngoori byid: to" da" goozu: xen' nghoid da" Mangso jeju" yo' ngei bu: lu dang: ge , da" dei zoo: ngoori bue" loo nhang: bye .
49003008	Ngoo gi Mangso byu yi dangain" bang: mo nge thang su: tho' moo lang" je" ngi su nghoid - Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi Khristu da" athang agoin soidgain da" khyoo: ngei bu: lu dang: gi , ri nghi: zain' byumyu" yi jhang khyoo: ci: yhe: wa akhang" ngo ri byid: bye .
49003009	xo' lho: wigi Mangso da: no , thang myid soin' to" khyoo: khasu" bue" thu' loo wa da" khyoo: xangsu: byu dangain" bang: ri myang se' loo nhang: wa shid re" we' Mangsoo gi hau" amyeing" akhang" ngoori byid: bye - jo , moo jo , ri phain" so: to" da" nya: da" no , thang khyoo: ri lid loo" bye: da" pyaid dangain" jang" moo yhoem" to" gyo" loo bye .
49003010	Hougsu" koid da" khyoo: gi akhid" pyaid moo vhoeb khang" nyid da" moug: lagyoo: yi yo' moug: khung: moug di mo yoem: so' yoo" mo , gi Mangso phajhi" aja: ja: ri noku phung mo se' yu wa shid re" nghoid .
49003011	Mangsoo gi ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu khyo" wigi bain zei: too" bye: da" nya: apyaid atoo: mo soin nyheung to" da" khyoo: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - nyang: gi he: da" khyoo: ri bain zei: bye .
49003012	Khristu yo' dadeing: daloem: za: yo" bue" lo zoore" - nyang: ri loem" jeung" da" ngoonu" laloem , lakhau: gang mo ngoonu" gi nheig shid: nheig deug ziyo' Mangso da" shid khoin" khyoo: agyug avoem loo: yo" vang nyid boem bye .
49003013	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoo nanu" ri mho' sang: nau - ngoo gi nanu" shid re" sho" jhen: jam jau kham nyid yoomo nheigloem: moo agyug yoem: ashoin: - hau: khyoo: joem dangain" zigi nanu" da" akyu" shid re" danghoid nyid .
49003014	He: da" khyoo: yoomo moug: khung: moug di mougmyid yooso" tho' moo nyid da" cang: joeb bang: ri myeing khyang" byid: su - phoo Mangso shid khoin" moo ngoo poid thug thoug nyid .
49003015	
49003016	Nanu" da" akhoug: mo byu ein: da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: yoem: bo loo goo" baja" - Mangsoo gi nya: myo: tham: da" myonhoo: phung yoeb , mo nya: venyi: nanu" ri yoem: so' byid: nyid baja" - ngoo gi Mangsoo moo akyu" mho' nyid .
49003017	Hau: lho: loem" jeung" khyoo: khyo" Khristu gi nanu" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: joem moo nyang: nyid nyid' wa ziyo' jheddab da" emyid moo agyi: zug lho: ayang: ri zhoug too" wa shid mo ngoo akyu" mho' nyid .
49003018	Hougsu" nghoid lang" nanu" gi Khristu da" jheddab nheigloem: gi khayhi' gyi: lam: zi khayhi' gyi: sheung: lho: khamyhang myhang: - khayhi' no , da" khyoo: ri Mangso da" byumyu" yi yo' dage" yo" se' lo da" yoem: vhoo" ri yo" yu boem wa zi nghoid .
49003019	Nghoid bye" - nya: da" jheddab nheigloem: rigi khanham we' bain si wa zi anghoid - Nghoid loug we' nanu" gi nya: da" jheddab nheigloem: ri se' lo wigi nanu" moo we' dabo jo , baja" ein: akyu" mho' nyid .
49003020	Ngoonu" da" akhoug: moo moo" zei: nyid da" nya: yoem: so' khyo" wigi ngoonu" se' mho' khyoo: dangain" yo' myid soin' da" tho' moo jain" sho' yo" koid nhang: da" .
49003021	Mangsoo gi phung: tho' moo we' Khristu Yesu da" tho' moo we' apyaid' atoo: moo phung" yoeb , dabo jo , baja" o" - Amen .
49004001	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo hau: Aseing: da" moo" voin vu , da" gang mo thung: oung" jo , su: ngo Polu gi Mangso wigi nanu" ri nyang: khe: yu da" bidnyid moo nyang: ke' too" byid: da" laleig laki , azhang myhi: da" kangso dei khyoo: moo kangso dei so" loo" wa shid re" ngoo nanu" ri joug jhoin" nyid .
49004002	Khanham we' khyo' nyhoem: lho: wigi nu" nham , ziyo' kham , zeung: nyid ge' - nanu" nyang: cang" zeung: kham , go" lho: jheddab emyid ri toin" shid go" nyid ge' .
49004003	Nanu" ri myeug deung: to" ngei pyo: myenjham" khyoo: yo' hau: Venyi: wigi byid: lo da" nheigloem: shikain" shoin" zheung" shoin" deung: foem: khyoo: ri zoem: too" wa shid re" yoem: so' thang sho' kaid' nyid ge' .
49004004	Mangsoo nanu" ri khe: yu da" khyoo: gi nheig byu khyoo: dakhaid moo za: nghoid nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - gung du: daloem: za: yo' venyi we' daloem: za: nghoid nyid .
49004005	Aseing: dayug za: loem" jeung" khyoo: dakhaid za: Babtisma khyoo: dakhaid za: nghoid nyid .
49004006	Byumyu" bain' sho' bang: da" nya: phoo yo' Mangsoo we' dayug za: nghoid - nyang: gi dangain" da" Aseing: nghoid wigi dangain" bang: da" atho' moo we' dangain" bang: da" akhoug: moo we' yo" bo nyid
49004007	Nyhang" dangain" bang: gi goozu: xen , da" mainkaid jeju" jhung: shug - Khristu da" laleig laki , yo" dakhyoo" ti" - yo" yu boem bye .
49004008	Joem mungdang: moo tid ziyo' dakyoo" ti" - thung: byu yi myoo" sho' ri shu" do , lo" - nyang: gi byu yi ri jhung: shug joem gam , byid: - ga: tid to .
49004009	akhid" nyang: do , lo" ein: da" khyoo: gi ce: noem ri tid lha" . Aseing: gi nyhoem: thang da" myidjang: moo-xang: shid" gyoo" loo" bye: ga: tid nau zi nghoid .
49004010	Hougsu" gyoo" loo" su: gi nya: da" phung: nghoid bye .
49004011	Nyang: gi byu yi ri jeju" jhung: shug joem ri gam , byid: su: nyang: nghoid bye - nyang: gi dayham" bang: ri lagyoo - dayham" bang: rigi lapi - dayham" bang: rigi ngei bu: lu dang: gi , kho" kyo" yen" mo , dayham" rigi phung vhoeb yi yo' sara yi bui" wa shid mo zheung: nyheung too" bye .
49004012	Nyang: hougsu" koid da" khyoo: gi Khristu da" gung doem: ri so' koid nyheung zhoug too" baja" - ga: Khristain moozoo" yo" zei: sho' Mangsoo gi nya: zooyi dangain" bang: ri soin' nyheing wa shid re" nghoid nyid .
49004013	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" da" loem" jeung" khyoo: khyo" we' hau: Mangso nya: zoo: ri se' loo bye: khyo" we' ngoonu" nyid , moo nyid bang: dangain" gi dagung dashoo" za: bue" lo wigi ngoonu" gi Khristu da" joeb , byeung" - myhang: thang da" gung du: laki , moo myhi: sho' nheig boo ung: gyeung: gyi: myhang: loo mo , bue" lo" boem bye .
49004014	Hougsu" nghoid lang" ngoonu" gi subi" ri nyangnu" da" phajhi" khyau" ziyo' khyoo: shu" vhang: mo , da" jhau" mhau' khyoo: ein: da" being: mhoid' ug lig zo" wigi moid' tang" loo" shau nyid da" zoonu" yi yhang: ti" abue" nyid boem loo: wa .
49004015	Hau: gung khoo: jheddab da" emyid yo' deingmain" da" dang: ri tid nyid khyo" vhuloem nghoid da" Khristu moo khyoo: khaid khang" moo" moo gyi: sheung: to' loo ca" nyid boem .
49004016	Hau" vhuloem da" vhoeb , khang" lo" da" akhoug: moo nyang: cang" adu go" da" gung shoo" akung: ako'' joem gi daloem: yo' daloem: tei" xo' go" ziyo' gung du: goin" ziri youg: xeig youg: myo , mo wigi tei" xo' go" to" - hougsu" nghoid yoomo adu go" da" akung: ako'' gi nyang: tu: nya: da" moozoo" ri voin vu , nyid nghoid rigi jheddab da" nheigloem: yo' dagung goin" ziri zhoug to' gyi: sheung: loo" nhang: nyid .
49004017	Ce" phoug" adab da" nheig byu khyoo: yo" da" tungbau byu yi yhang" ti" - kangso' adei nyid wa shid re" Aseing: da" myeing khyang" yo' ngoo nanu" ri zed" lhid' nhang: nyid bye .
49004018	Nyang: nu" da" se' yeug nyain: phajhi" gi moug: coid nghoid nyid wigi bain sho' nyang: akoo" afang: nghoid nyid nheigloem: thain: nyid boem yoomo Mangsoo byid: da" kangso' gam boem' moo nyangnu" gi aboo bang: nghoid nyid ago" .
49004019	Nyang: nu" moo gi gyoug sho' ga: da" nheigloem: dangain" ci: phyoug pyam boem bye: yoomo nyangnu" gi aco' ajhoid da" khyoo: moo cang zoore" - aved avhu: anyhoin: athoung" da" moo" aja: ja: yo' noug moo noug koid wa shid re" nyang: nya: da" gung ri ab byid: too" bye: mo , nghoid .
49004020	Khirstu da" khyoo: ri nanu" gi hougsu" jhau" yu boem zi anghoid .
49004021	Nya: khyoo: ri nanu" gyeing" nyang: shau" gyo: yu" boem bye: wigi nya: thang: moo cang soo" mo , nghoid boem yoomo Yesu moo bo da" hau: deingmain" khyoo: ri nanu" shau" jhau" kham: yu boem bye .
49004022	Hougsu" nghoid nyid yoomo nanu" gi shid phyang" nanu" nyang: cang lo yu" bye: da" kangso' dei khyoo: mo byu xoug" ri we' mougmyid pyo: khyoo: ri vhoo: boo myo , no , yoomo mhoug zoo: fain" zoo: nau da" nheugloem: yoomo byo , yoin" loo" bye: da" byuxoug" ri she: pyam loo ge' .
49004023	Nanu" da" ung: khoug: nheigloem: yo' myid soin: khyoo: dangain" gi aseig bue" loo nhang: ca" bye .
49004024	Nanu" gi Mangso da" ved , du gung du: yo' phain" to" lho: deing byeung" ziyo' gyeungshang: da" kangso' ein: da" kangso' dei khyoo: aseig moo soo" ge' .
49004025	Houg: yoomo mhau' da" dang: ri atid nyid goo" - yug khang" moo" gi nyang: nya: da" loem" jeung" phung byu mang nhung" phoo ri deingmain" da" dang: za: da tid nyid goo" baja" - Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" dangain" bang: gi Khristu da" gung du: mo akung: ako'' joem za: nghoid nyid boem .
49004026	Nanu" nheig yo: ri hau: yoo: nau da" nheigloem: yo' yooboo akoid nhang: goo" - bidvang sho' we' nheig ayo: nyid goo" .
49004027	Yu ri we' vang wa akhang" abyid: nyid goo" .
49004028	Lhoung khau" yu" su: gi khau" da" moozoo" ri to" pyam' lho: adoem khoug" loo goo" - ca" yo nyid bang: ri yo" pang" thoug sho' nyang: nya: da" lo , yo' deingmain" da" voem: doug: khu: da" moozoo" ri zei: shid" lo" boem loo: ge' .
49004029	Subi" ri noo , nhang: da" dang: dakhoin" we' nanu" da" nhoid mo athu' nhang: goo" - tam" gyo: nyid bang: akyu" yoo" sho' byu yi ri yo" se' koid so' nyheing byid: ziyo' ca" yo nyid mo , ri yo" pang" thoug byid: da" dang: gi , riza: da tid nyid ge' .
49004030	Hau: tho' moo gootu - gyeungshang: da" venyi ri nheig akug nhang: goo" - Khasu" wim gari hau: gyeungshang: da" venyi gi nanu" ri Mangso seung: nyid khyoo-sagsi: dazid' nghoid lho: Mangso wigi nanu" ri lhoid pyoin kaid' shau" da" bidnyid ju" loo wa ziri koo" kham: kham: byid: su: nghoid nyid .
49004031	Houg: yoomo nheigloem: moo no khyoo: nheig khoo" yo: khyoo: nyho: yoid phau: nheung" ziyo' aphoug" akhyoid koid zi anoug angei da" nheigloem: aja: ja: yo' houg: yo' du go" da" khyoo: joem dangain" ziri shoem" shoung: pyam ge' .
49004032	Hougsu" koid wa da" gung khoo: gi nanu" nyang: cang" nyang: nheig khyeig go" khyoo: nheigloem: nu" nham , ziri toin" shid go" nyid wigi Mangsoo gi Khristu khyo" wigi nanu" da" yooboo ri khyoid pyam byid: bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" we' nyang: cang" nya: da" yooboo ri khyoid pyam' byid: go" nyid ge' .
49005001	Nanu" gi Mangso da" jheddab nya: zooyi nghoid boem bye: yoomo nyang: yo' du goo" sho' yoem: kaid' loo" ca" nyid boem bye .
49005002	Khritstu gi nanu" ri jheddab ziyo' nanu" da" shid re" nya: da" gung ri Mangsoo vho: ngei da" nam , pyo: xoin" to' pyam wigi ab , nung" byid: pyam yhang: ti" - nanu" da kangso' khyoo: ri jheddab da" nheigloem: yo' vhoeb khang" nyid ge' .
49005003	Nanu" gi Mangso da" byumyu" yi nghoid beom bye: yoomo youg: shoo: go" da" moozoo" - ayung" alho , da" asam" aved joem yo' vhoo: boo myo , no , da" khyoo: ri nanu" da" nhoid yo' lang" atid' nyid goo .
49005004	Aved avhu: da" khoin" co' dang - anyhoin: athoung" da" dang: co , joem - kyang: da" dang: ri tid wa shid re" we' nanu" shid re" adu nghoid da - hau: gung khoo: nanu" gi Mangsoo ri jeju" daboin: nyid ge' .
49005005	aco' ajhoid da" nheigloem: boo su - sho' ase' ziyo' phoug" shoid , yen" su - vhoo: boo: loug gyi: su - hang" nghoid loug we' Khristu yo' Mangso da" mungdain mo agyid aso: gam , boem" ri khanham we' yo" kham: yu boem wa anghoid ziri nanu" se' too" ge' - Khasu" wim gari vhoo: boo myo , no' loug gyi: da" khyoo: gi soolhoo: no" da" khyoo: daja: nghoid .
49005006	Hang" wigi we' adu: adam: wim , da" dang: nanu" ri ayo" jhu , phyo' pyam' nhang: goo" - Khasu" wim gari hau" khyoo: joem yoomo Mangso nheig khoo" yo: da" khoo: gi atam" gyoo: acang loo" mo , da" atho' moo gyoo" loo wa zi nghoid .
49005007	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo houg: yhang: te" da" byu yi yo' dajhi' we' azoem" goo" .
49005008	Shid' phyang" gi nanu" we' moug: coid' khoug: moo nyid lid lo yu" boem bye - Nghoid loug we' akhid" gi Aseing: da" byumyu" yi bue" lo boem bye: yoomo bidbang khoug: moo ju" vang lo boem bye - hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi bidbang da" nya: zooyi yhang: ti" zei: so' nyid yab , loo: ge' .
49005009	Khasu" wim gari hau: bidbang gi ge da" khyoo: aja: ja: deing byeung" ziyo' deingmain" khyoo: ri myoo" sho' bue" loo nhang: nyid .
49005010	Aseing: vho: ngei nyid zigi ce: noem nghoid nyid ziri yoem: kaid' lho: jhau" kham: yu nyid ge' .
49005011	Byu yi koid nyid da" moug: coid yo' sen: da" akyu" abo ce" ja: moozoo" moo we' dajhi' lang" abo zei: loo: za: houg: yhang: te" da" moozoo" ri bidbang moo pang shug nyid ge' .
49005012	( Khasu" wim gari nyangnu" amyang afu' gau" koid da" moozoo" joem ri khyag tid thu shang ein: rigi tid thu' wa zi lang" gye" sho' cang bo da" moozoo" nghoid nyid . )
49005013	Hau: khyoo: joem jo , moo jo , ri bidbang moo to ci: thu' kaid' nghoid rigi nyangnu" asam" aved agung ri bang bang nyang: myang loo wa nghoid .
49005014	Khasu" wimg gari bidbang gi dangain" ziri pang shug byid: nyid houg: yoomo jhoeom: mungdang: moo tid to" ziri Khirstu gi re" tho' moo thoin" pang byid: wa nghoid .
49005015	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi khasu" koid lho: kangso' dei so" yen" boem zigi jid" jid" myid yu" nyid ge' - phajhi" abo da" koo" fang: joem yhang: ti" akoid loo: za: phajhi" bo da" byu yi yhang: ti" daso" yen" ge' .
49005016	Khasu" wim gari akhid" da" bidnyid ayo , joem gi akhyeing" ashoeb , da" bidnyid nghoid nyid yoomo nanu" yo" da" ayo , gi ri goolhoo: za: akyu" boo sho' ci: yhoung: nyid ge' .
49005017	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo akoo" afang: akoid nyid goo" - hau: Aseing: nang ri zei: nhang: nau da" khyoo: ri yoem: kaid' lho: phoid: sho: zei: so nyid ge' .
49005018	Yhid: ashug yed , nyid goo" - hau: zigi nanyang: ri lhu: phyo' shoin pyam wa zi nghoid nyid . Hau: gung khoo: venyi: yo' joeb byeung" nyid ge' .
49005019	Nanu" nyang: cang" nyang - coung" nghei da" jikhoin" dang - venyi loem" jeung" khyoo: yo' sen: da"-gyeungshang: da" lid' jhoem" dang: yo' tid go" nyid lho: nanu" da" emyid khoug: moo Mangsoo ri jikhoin" khoin" wigi coung" nghei nyid boem ge' .
49005020	Nanu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" myeing ri lang: lho: khyoo: khaid gu: khang" moo" moo phoo Mangsoo gi khanham we' jeju" boin: coung" nghei nyid ge' .
49005021	Nanu" gi Khirstu ri gyoug phau" da" nheigloem: yoomo nyang: cang" nya: vhoo: moo tam" gyoo: go" nyid ge' .
49005022	Yhoem: seing: myhi' yi we" - nanu" gi Mangso da" vhoeb khang" khyoo: ri tam" gyo: nyid boem ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" yhoem: seing: phoo yi da" vhoeb , khang" khyoo: moo tam" gyo: nyid ge' .
49005023	Khristu gi hau: phung: da" atho' moo vhuloem bui" wa da" amyeing" akhang" yo" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - hau" yhoem: seing: phoo we' yhoem: seing: myhi' da" atho' moo vhuloem bui" wa da" akhang" yo" - Khristu gi nya: gung doem: nghoid nyid da" hau: phoung: da" khyoid yu Aseing: we' nghoid nyid .
49005024	Hau: phung: gi Khristu da" vhoeb da" khyoo: ri kham: yu nyid yhang: ti" - yhoem: seing: myhi' we' yhoem: seing: phoo yi vhoeb khang" da" khyoo: ri bain sho' kham: yu ca" nyid boem .
49005025	Yhoem: seing: pho , we" - Khristu gi hau: phung: ri jheddab yoomo hau: shid re" kangso' ab , noung" pyam byid: yhang: ti" - nanu" da" yhoem: seing: myhi' yi ri hougsu" jheddab nyid ge' .
49005026	Nyang: hougsu" koid da" khyoo: gi phung ri gyid yo' bain ced" kyeung pyam thang: moo nya: mungdang: yo' hau" phung: ri Mangso jhang khyoo: ab , nung" byid: khyoo: nghoid .
49005027	Hougsu" nyang: gi hau" phung: ri yung" lho' gyeungshang: nhang: ziyo' ca" yo da" khyoo: ci" we' aboo - atug atuang akoin: ajoeb , zi anghoid loo: za: joeb byeung" ce" yoo , aboo loo: sho' nya: shid re" ced" young" kyeung shang: yu da" khyoo: nghoid .
49005028	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo yhoem: seing: pho , gi nyang: tu: nya: da" gung du: ri jheddab nyid yhang: ti" nya: da" yhoem: seing: myhi' ri jheddab nyid wa zigi young" du da" khyoo: nghoid - nya: yhoem: seing: myhi' ri jheddab su: gi nya: gung ri nyang: jheddab nyid su: nghoid .
49005029	Hang" nghoid loug we' nyang: nya: da" gung du: ri anoug angei koid nyid su: gi hang" anyid - Khristu gi hau: phung ri coung: goin nyid yhang: ti" - nyhang" gi nyhang" nya: da" gung du: ri coung: goin nyid .
49005030	Hougsu" wigi nyhang" gi nya: da" gung du: mo da" akung: ako'' joem nghoid nyid boem .
49005031	Hau" jhoem: mungdang: moo tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - He: khyoo: yoomo yug gi zoo: gi nya: myhi' nya: phoo ri to" pyam' kho' lho: nya: yhoem: seing: myhi' yo' shoin" nyid lo" wigi nya: eig yug gidagung dashoo" za: bue" loo wa zi nghoid .
49005032	He: khyoo: gi jhoem: mungdang: moo tid shed to" da" deingmain" khyoo: dakhaid nghoid wigi Khristu yo' phung: da" khyoo: ri yeung lho: tid zi nghoid ein: ngoo se' gyoo: bye .
49005033	Nghoid loug we' hau: zigi nanu" yo' we' sen: nyid yhoem: seing: pho , yug khang" moo" gi nya: yheom: seing: myhi , ri nya: gung ri yhang: ti" jheddab nyid ca" wigi yhoem: seing: myhi' yi yug khang" moo" we' nya: yheom: seing: phoo ri gyoug phau" nyid ca" .
49006001	Zoo: shang yi we" - nanu" da" myhi , phoo yi da" dang: ri tam" gyo: nyid ge' - hougsu" koid khyoo: gi Khristain yi da" koid eung: moo" nghoid .
49006002	Jhoem: mungdang: moo re" myhi , yo' re" phoo ri phau" myang: nyid we' ga: da" dang: gi Mangsoo tid to" da" xang: shid" mo amyeing" dang: nghoid .
49006003	Hau: da" dang: soo" gi mougmyid tho' moo kang: sheing: myo , myi: lho: nyid gi nyid de zi shau" wa" ga: zi nghoid .
49006004	Myhi , phoo yi we" - nanu" da" nya: zoo: yi ri nheigloem: yoin" wa khyo" ci" we' akoid byid nyid goo" - hau" gung khoo: - nyangnu" ri Khristain byu nyid byu yab , khyoo: khyo" jhau" mo , khu: gyi: kaid' ge' .
49006005	Join , yi we" - Khristu ri tam" gyo: phau" myang: nyid yhang: ti" - nanu" da" xangsu: yhoem: seing: yi ri gyoug phau" ziyo' nheigloem:" dain: khyo" tam" gyo: nyid ge' .
49006006	Yhoem: seing: yi yu" nyid yoomo myonhoo: rua nau khyo" za: akoid goo" - Khristu da" join , yi yhang: ti" - Mangsoo myid vho: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nheigloem: bain' sho' yo' zei: so' nyid ge' .
49006007	Byu shid re" zei: byid: yhang: ti" za: anghoid - hau: Aseing: shid re" yhang: ti" - vho: ngei nheigloem: yo' nanu" da" moozoo" ri zei: nyid ge' .
49006008	Join , yi ri nghoid loug we' join , seing: yi ri nghoid loug we' Magsoo gi yug khang" moo" ri nyang: zei: lo ge da" moo" zo" shid re" coung" byid: aphoug" shang" loo wa ziri boin: so" nyid ge' .
49006009	Yhoem: seing: yi we" - nanu" we' houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" da" join , yi tho' moo cang zei: so" nyid ge' - nyangnu" ri kyoug nhain' khyoo: no: pyam' ge' - nanu" yo' nanu" da" join , yi gi moug: khung: mo Aseing: dayug yo' za: sen: bang: nghoid - hau" aseing: gi yug khang" moo" ri myonhoo: akhyin: loo: za: tarha" dang: phyed' nyid su: nghoid ziri myid boin: nyid ge' .
49006010	Lo" thang jang" moo hau: Aseing: yo' dagung za: bue" khyo" wigi we' nya: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , yoem: vhoo" khyo" we' nanu" da" yoem: zeing so' zeing ri loung: yu nyid ge' .
49006011	Yu wigi mo" da" age khyoo: dangain" ziri nanu" lhoem: oung: doid pyam baja" - Mangsoo nanu" ri byid: to" da" gyikhin" dangain" ziri yu void zhoung ci: loo: ge' .
49006012	Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" gi byu xang: su: yi yo' khaid zain: go" nyid zi anghoid - moug: khung: moug: laid' phyoo" moo nyid da" akhyeing" ashoeb da" yu gyiphung: moo" joem yo' we' he: coid no , thu: jo , da" apyaid' ri vhoeb khang" nyid da" coid doem: boo" doem: da" zoug: yi amyeing" akhang" ci: bang: yo" we' zain: go" nyid boem .
49006013	Hougsu" nghoid nyid yoomo Mangso da" gyikhin' dangain" ziri akhed" nya: nyang: yu void: ci: loo: ge' - hougsu" lang" she' akhyeing" ashoeb ziyo' yau: khe" da" bidnyid ju" lo da" uri nanu" ri gyivoo joem khaid zain: said' lo ziri loem: yo" oung: pyam' wa zi nghoid - lo" thang moo ju" sho' bain' zain: pyam thang: ri we'-nanu" gi geing" geing: teing teing theung shang" yab , jo , boem ca" shi" wa .
49006014	Houg: yoomo nanu" da" phyid" doem: moo deingmain" khyoo: ri phyid" cu" su" cu" ci: lho: deing byeung" da" khyoo: ri re" da" yang gang nghoeb koid lho: wigi jen" jen" soin yab , jo , ge' .
49006015	Ngei pyo: da" ngei bu: lu dang: kho" kyoo" wa shid re" jen" jen" nghoid nyid da" khyoo: ri re" da" khyid: moo khyid: baid' yhang: ti" - baid' ci: lho: theung" shang" yab , jo , loo: ge' .
49006016	Hau: tho' moo gootu: loem" jeung" ein: da" goo ri khanham we' vhoid ci: ge' . Khasu" wim gari nanu" gi hau: goo yo' akhyeing" ashoeb su" da" myi: myoo: dangain" ziri lhoem: yo" said' oung: pyam wa zi nghoid .
49006017	Hau: lho: khyoid yu khyoo: ri sham: mug yhang: ti" yu zhoung" ci: lho: Venyi khyo" byid: to" da" Mangso mungdang: ein: da" lhab , sham: ri we' voin , ci: ge' .
49006018	Mangso jang" mo pang" thoug khyoo: yo" yu baja" - goeb khyo' akyu" mho' ziyo' he: khyoo: dangain" gu: ri zei: so' nyid ge' - gyeungshang: da" venyi vhu" she: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ayo , khang" moo" moo akyu" mho' nyid ge' - he: gang mo nheigloem: soozoo: lheung: nyid ziyo' khanham we' asoem" akham' goo" Mangso byu yi shid re" khanham we' akyu" mho' nyid ge' .
49006019	Ngoo tid wa zi jen" uri mangsoo ngoori mungdang: byid: baja" - hau: ngei bu: lu dang: da" no , thang dangkang: ri agyug avoem , loo: - seing" yang" yang" yo" tid kyoo" sho' nga" shid re" we' akyu" bo mho' ge' .
49006020	akhid" ngoo gi thung: loung" jo , su: danghoid loug we' hau" ngei bu: lu dang: ge shid re" lagyoo: zeing dayug nghoid - hau: ngei bu: lu dang: gi ri kho" kyoo" wa shid' re" ngoo kho" kyoo" eung: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - seing" yang" ziyo' yo" tid kyoo" baja" - akyu" bo mho' byid: nyid ge' .
49006021	Ngoo ciwim nyid ziyo' khasu" koid nyid da" khyoo: ri nanu" yo" si' sho' hau: Aseing da" moozoo" moo lho: nheigloem: zung" da" dei zoo - nghoid da" ngoonu" jheddab mang: nhung" phoo - Tukhiku gi nanu" ri nga" khyoo: lo tid kyoo" wa zi nghoid .
49006022	Houg: yoomo ngoonu" dangain" bang: khasu" wim nyid da" khyoo: lu dang: dangain" nanu" ri tid kyoo" baja" - houg: yo' nanu" ri yoem: byid: baja" ein: - nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoo , nyang: ri nhang: kaid' zi nghoid .
49006023	Nyha" Phoo , Mangsoo yo' Aseing Yesu Khristu gi Khristain mang nhung" yi dangain" bang: ri ngei pyo: khyoo: ri jheddab ziyo' loem" jeung emyid kaid' byid: baja" o" .
49006024	Khanham we' abei: ashaem: da" jheddab nheigloem: yo' ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu ri jheddab nyid bang: dangain" mo jhangk moo Mangso da" jeju" gi dajo , jo , baja" o" .
50001001	Khristu da" join , yi nghoid da" Polu yo' Timothi gi Philipi voo moo nyid nyid da" phung vhoeb , phung tau bi: yo' dage" Khristu Yesu moo daloem: za: nghoid da" Mangso gyeungshang: byumyu" yi bain' sho' bang: jang khyoo: mougsoug" lhid" kaid .
50001002	Ngoonu" da" Phoo , Mangsoo yo' Aseing: Yesu Khristu jang" mo , jeju" yo' ngei pyo: da" khyoo: gi nanu" moo dajo , jo baja" o" .
50001003	Nanu" da" khyoo: ri ngoo myid boin" soin: yu" nyid ayo , dangain" jang" moo _ Mangso jeju" ri ngoo coung" nghei nyid .
50001004	Ngoo nanu" shid mo , akyu" mho' da" ayo , khang" moo" moo gau yi nheug loem: yo' mho' byid: nyid .
50001005	Khasu" wim gari ngeibu: ge: da" moozoo" ri ngoo voin , yu , shed" lo da" bidnyid mo akhid" nyid" ju sho' hau" ngei bu lu dang: kho" kyo" da" khyoo: moo ngoori bo pang" thoug voin , vu , lid lo boem bye .
50001006	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" moohe: da" ge moozoo" ri zei: shed" too" byid: su: Mangsoo gi Khristu Yesu doem gyoo" loo wa bidnyid moo hau: moo" ri joeb byeung" sho' zei: too" goo" wa" ein: ngoo myid loem nyid .
50001007	Ngoo nanu" da" atho' moo too" byid: da" myid' gi young" du nyid khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" ri jheddab nyid da" khyoo: gi nga" da" emyid moodabo jo . Nanu" dangain" bang: gi ngoo thung: loung" jo , uri nghoid loug we' ngoo ngei bu: lu dang: ri kho" kyo" zoore" - geung: teing jo , nhang: uri nghoid loug we' Mangsoo ngoori byid: da" akhang" jeju" ri bo kham zoo ; mo , nghoid ago" .
50001008	Ngoo gi Khristu Yesu nyang: myid moo bo da" ashoem: apyang: da" myid yo' nanu" ri myid boin: nheug nge nyid ein: ngoo tid nyid da" dang: deung nyid da" khyoo: gi Mangsoo gi nga" sagsi: nghoid .
50001009	Hau" tho' moo nanu" da" jheddab nheigloem: gi je" gyi: sheung: lo wigi se' yeung jang" moo joeb , byeung" da" dang: phyed' dang: kho' da" yoem: vhoo: yoo" goo" baja" - nanu" shid re" ngoo akyu" mho' nyid .
50001010	Houg: lang" she' nanu" gi Khristu doem ju" re" da" bidnyid moo ayung" alhoo , aco' ajhoid khyoo: mo loid lo" lho: - yooboo adab bang: bue" wa zi nghoid .
50001011	Nanu" da" kangso' dei khyoo: moo Yesu Khristu za: date: yo" byid: da" ge , da" aved asam" ein: da" ashi" yo' joeb byeung" lo wigi mangsoo da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri coung" nghei tu: to' zi shau" wa nghoid .
50001012	Hau: lho: mang: nhung" yi we" - ngoo moo bue" lo da" khyoo: joem gi hau: ngeibu: ludang: gyi: sheung: loung: loo wa shid re" gyeng" nyang: bo pang: thug byid: wa shid re" bui" lo khyoo: nghoid ziri nanu" ri si' nhang nau .
50001013	Hau: khokham" da" yhoem: moo" ri zung" lhug da" gyizoo: yi dab , goin" yo' hid: moo nyid bang: gootu: dangain" ri ngoo thung: loung" zigi Khristu da" dei zoo: koid yoomo nghoid khyoo: ri se' lo" boem bye . .
50001014	Hau: tho' moo gootu: ngoo thung: lung" yoomo mang: nhung" yi myoo: loo boug gi Hau: Aseing: moo loem" jeung" nheug loem: je , to' lo wigi Mangso mungdang: ri agyug avoem loo: za: tid kyoo" wa da" khyoo: je" wigi voem lo ago" .
50001015	Gyeung" nyang: nyhang" mo dayham" gi no" zoo yoomo myeung" myoo: nau boem ziyo' kho" kyo" nyid ago" . Nghoid loug we' gootu: bang: gi-young" gyeung" ge , lho , nheigloem: yo' kho" kyo" ago" .
50001016	Houg: bang: gi ngei bu: lu dang: ri goem , loem byid: wa shid re" ngoori khyen: nyheung to" khyoo: ri nyangnu" se' nyid boem yoomo jheddab nheigloem: yo' kho" kyo" nyid boem ago" .
50001017	Hau: lho" gootu: dayham" bang: gi gyeungshang: da" nheigloem: yo' anghoid loo: za: nyang: nya: da" akyu" sho: khyo" kho" kyo" ago - nyangnu" gi ngoo thung: moo loung jo , uri nga" tho' moo shid: gyoin noo gyoin je myo: loo wa shid re" myid soin' nyid ago" .
50001018	Kho" kyo" da" akhyoo" again joem gi ce: yhoug: gyen: khyoo: anghoid - anoug angei da" nheigloem: khyo" nghoid loug we' deingmain" da" nheigloem: khyo" nghoid loug we' khyoo: khaid khang" moo" Khristu da" khyoo: za: kho" kyo" nyid boem nghoid rigi hau: khyoo: moo ngoo gau yi nyid - gyeing" nyang: ngoo xo' lho: gau yi ngei bu: nyid shi" wa nghoid .
50001019	Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" akyu" mho' da" khoin" thui: joem yoomo we' Yesu Khristu da" venyi bo pang" thoug yoomo we' ngoo gi lhoid pyoin kaid' zi shau" wa nghoid .
50001020	Ngoo gi khanham we' ngoo nya: yoovoin moo sho' athu sho' ayo , khang" moo" moo nghoid loug we' je" wigi akhid" uri nghoid loug we' agyug avoem da" yoem: vhoo" azeing yo' byeung" jo , zoore" - ngoo gi dei nyid loug shid: loo" loug we' nga" da" kangso' gyung: khyoo: bain sho' moo Khristu da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri bang thu loo nhang: wa da" khyoo: gi nga" da" vho: ngei thang ziyo' nheig byu khyoo: nghoid .
50001021	Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoo kangso' dei nyid zigi Khristu nyang: nghoid - shid: lo" ri we' amyaid' nghoid bye .
50001022	Nghoid loug we' nga" gung du: moo kangso' dei nyid shi" ziyo' akyu" bo da" moozoo" myoo" sho' yo" zei: shi" nghoid rigi dei nyid wa ziyo' shid: loo" wa khyoo: kha: khaid ri ngoo khyen: yu wa zi asi .
50001023	Ngoo gi khyoo ; eig khaid da" agyoo: moo nghoid nyid wigi shoid' khang" moo" khyo" lang: lo" nyid ziri ngoo shau" - ngoo gi akhid" dei nyid da" kangso' khyoo: ri to" pyam kho' lho: Khristu yo' dage" kang: so' dei nyid noug bye - houg: gi nga" shid re" je" ge zi nghoid .
50001024	Nghoid loug we' nanu" da" shid re" ngoo kangso' xo' dei nyid wa zigi je" yhoug: gyen: da" khyoo: nghoid .
50001025	He: da" khyoo: ri ngoo goolhoo: za: se' gyoo ; bye: yoomo ngoo nanu" yo' dage" xo' nyid nyid wa zi ri se - nanu" ri je" gyi: sheung: loung: loo nhang: wa ziyo' loem" jeung" jang moo gau yi nyid wa shid re" ngoo nanu" dangain" bang: yo' dage" nyid nyid wa ziri se' nyid .
50001026	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoo nanu" jang" moo doem ju" lo da" uri ngoo yoomo nanu" da" phau: khaung joyoo - Yesu Khristu mooje" wigi loung: lo boem wa zi nghoid .
50001027	Akhid" uri nanu" shid re" je" ca" thang da" khyoo ; gi Khristu Yesu da" ngei bu: lu dang: yo' du veung" moin: yi" khyo" kangso' dei nyid boem ca" - hougsu" nghoid lang" gi ngoo nanu" jang" moo ju" re" uri nghoid loug we' aju" re" uringhoid loug we' nanu" gi nheigloem: sham: shoin" go" lho: theung shang" yab , jo , wigi myid to" khyoo ; dakhaid za: yo , - hau" ngei bu: lu dang: da" loem" jeung" khyoo: shid re" dage" za: zain: shi" go" nyid da" khyoo: ri ngoo shaug" gyoo: wa zi nghoid .
50001028	Nanu" gi hau da" gyi voo joem ri agyug nyid goo" khanham we' yoem: zeing so' zeing bo nyid ge' - hougsu" koid da" yhe , khyoo ; gi nyangnu" soem" joem: lo" lho: nanu" gi oung: doid lo" da" alhoo: sagsi: bue" nyid wa khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" ri oung: doid lo" da" khyoo: byid: su: gi Mangsoo nyang: nghoid nyid .
50001029	Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" gi Khristu ri loem" jeung" khyo" za: we' anghoid shi" - nya: shid' re" shen" yhen jam jau kham khyo" we' Aseing: da" moo" ri voin vu , akhang" jeju" gam , byid: zi shau" abye: go .
50001030	Akhui" nanu" gi ngoo yo' we" - meing: zain: jang: moo shau" vang yhe: boem abye: go" - hau: khyoo: gi lid: loo bye: da" ayo , moo ngoo thoung" shau" nyid da" meing: zain: khyoo: ri nanu" myang yu" wigi akhid" ngoo thoung shau" nyid da" khyoo ; ri nanu" shau" gyo: nyid da" meing: zain: khyoo: nghoid nyid .
50002001	Nanu" gi Khristu yo' dage" kangso' dei nyid boem yoomo yoem: so' byeung" lo boem ziyo' - nya: jheddab nheigloem: gi nanu" ri nheig teing ung: teing byid: ziri shau" yu boem bye - hau: tho' moo venyi: moo zoem" khau: zi shau" ziyo' nyang: cang" nyang: athang agoin khyoo ; ri shau" kham: yu nyid boem .
50002002	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi myid soin: khyoo dakhaid za: - nheigloem: sham: shoin" go" khyoo: dakhaid za: yo' nheigloem: daloem: za: khyo" wigi ngoori joeb byeung" da" gau yi khyoo: yo" yu nhang: goo" la' ein: - ngoo nanu" ri yoem: byid: dang: sang: kaid .
50002003	Phau: khuang nghoid boin: da" nheigloem: - nya: akyu" ri za: shoo: nau da" nheigloem: yo' ci" we' akoid nyid goo" - subi" gi nga" tho' re" je gi mo , nghoid ein: - khanham we' myid yu zoore" - sube" vhoo: moo khyo , nyhoem: zoem" khau: nyid ge' .
50002004	Yug khang" moo" nyang: nya: akyu" ri kyeing" sho: khyo" anghoid loo: za: byu gooji yi da" akyu" ri sho: nyid ge' .
50002005	Khristu Yesu moo bo da" nheigloem: nyang: - nanu" moo we' boo ge' . Mangsoo yo' dakhyoo" ti" nghoid nyid wa shid re" mi , shi , go" khyo" amyid loo: za . Nyang: nya: yoo" moo yoo" ri tu: mhoug pyam' kho' lho: gyeing" nyang: pyang" zeing moo shid: jang" moo ju" sho' tam" gyo: nyid . myeing khyang" dangain" tho' moo je , gyi: da" voolang myeing yung" khyang" ri byid: too" bye . vho: pyam: mo da" poind' lug dangain" gi Yesu da" voolang myeing yung" khyang" ri tu: to' tu: coung" phau" myang vhu" pid' pid' zoore" - poid thug thoug nyid boem wa nghoid . yhoo: dab , moo dab , gi tid fu" yhen: yu nyid boem wa nghoid .
50002006	Nyang: gi khanham we' Mangso gung yo' joeb byeung" sho' nyid nyid zi nghoid loug we' Mangsoo yo' dakhyoo" ti" nghoid nyid wa shid re" mi , shi , go" khyo" amyid loo: za .
50002007	Hougsu" koid wa gung khoo: - nyang: nya: kang: lung bu , ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Nyang: nya: yoo" moo yoo" ri tu: mhoug pyam' kho' lho: join , mhug ri re" zhoung" yu wigi xangsu: byu yo' du sho' bue" thu' loo bye .
50002008	Hougsu" nya: gung ri khyo , nyhoem: pyam wigi tam" gyo: da" khyoo: moo shid: jang" moo ju" sho'-cang so" loo" bye - gyeing" nyang: pyang" zeing moo shid: jang" moo ju" sho' tam" gyo: nyid .
50002009	Houg: khyo" nghoid yoomo Mangsoo gi nyang: ri myhang: thang joyoo moo ju" sho' tu: to' kaid wigi myeing khyang" dangain" tho' moo je , gyi: da" voolang myeing yung" khyang" ri byid: too" bye .
50002010	Houg: yoomo moug: khung: moug di tho' mo mougmyid' gyab , yo' vho: pyam: mo da" poind' lug dangain" gi Yesu da" voolang myeing yung" khyang" ri tu: to' tu: coung" phau" myang vhu" pid' pid' zoore" - poid thug thoug nyid boem wa nghoid .
50002011	Phoo , Mangso da" myo , nhoo" phung" yoeb shid re" Khristu gi Aseing: nghoid nyid" ga: wigi yhoo: dab , moo dab , gi tid fu" yhen: yu nyid boem wa nghoid .
50002012	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo ngoo jheddab nyid bang: we" - nanu" yo' ngoo dage" nyid da" ayo , moo nanu" khanham we' nga" dang: ri tam" gyo: nyid boem yhang: ti" - akhid" nanu" yo' ngoo ve: gang: nyid da" ayo , moo we' nga" da" dang: ri tam" gyoo: wa zigi je" wigi yhoug: gyen: zeing nyang: nghoid nyid houg: yoomo nanu" da" khyoid yu khyoo: joeb , byeung" loo sho' gyoug nain" ziyo' cang pyeung nyid ge' .
50002013	Khasu" wim ga: ri Mangsoo gi nya: da" myid vho: khyoo: ri nanu" tam" gyo: cang loo" nau , da" myid yo' cang lo" nhang: da" yoem: vhoo" ri nanu" yo" yu goo" baja" ga - Mangsoo gi nanu" moo khanham we' moo" dazei: byid: nyid .
50002014	Nanu" koid ca" da" moozoo" ce" ja" khyoo: ri we' ngeug go" lho: nheig yoo: nheig jhug akoid nyid goo .
50002015	Houg: su" koid nyid lang" nanu" gi akyang" alai byo , yoin" lho: yooboo yoo" bang: ga: goo" wa . He: mougmyid tho' moo ce" yooboo we' adab loo: za: nheigloem: gyeungshang: da" Mangso nya: zoo: yi yhang: ti" - bue" loo: goo" wa zi nghoid-Hougsu" nanu" gi kangso dei da" mungdang: ri kho" kyo" nyid zoore" moug: khung: goin" ziri thoin" pang byid: da" bidbang gung du: yi yhang: ti" - nyangnu" da" mo , phung: gung moo thoin" pang byid: nyid boem , ca" wa nghoid .
50002016	Nanu" hougsu" koid nyid boem nghoid rigi ngoo yoem: kaid' lho: voin , vu , khyoo: gi akoem: amyed anghoid loo: yoomo Khristu da" bidnyid moo nanu" yoomo ngoo gi gau yi phau: khuang joyoo nghoid .
50002017	Ngoori said' pyam zi to shau" nghoid rigi nanu" da" loem" jeung" phoin: tho' moo nga" da" suid" rixoin" to' gyid: ca" nghoid loug - ngoo gi gau yi nyid nanu" dangain" bang: yo' we' gau yi nyid .
50002018	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" we' ngoo yo' dage gau yi nyid ca" boem .
50002019	Ngoo gi nanu" jang" mo ludang: shau" gyo: wigi yoem: yo" yu baja" - Mangso da" myed , vho: khyoo: nghoid rigi Timothi ri khamyhang amyang" ri nanu" jhang khyoo: yo" nhang: kaid' abe ein: - ngoo myid byu nyid .
50002020	Timothi nyang: kyeing" za: ngoo yhang: ti" - nanu" da" ge , khyo: shid' re" bo ci' byid: su nghoid .
50002021	Byu gooji dangain" mo , gi-nyang: tu: nya: khyoo: ri za: seing" kho" - gung youg yau nyid boem ago - Khristu Yesu yo' sen: da" khyoo: moo myid' abo boem nghoid ago" .
50002022	Nya: zoo: gi nya: phoo ri bo pang" thoug yhang: ti" - hau: gau yingei bu: da" lu dang: - Kho" kyo" fu" pyo: lo" da" khyoo: moo ngoo yo' dage" moozoo" ri bo voin , vu , theung shang" nyid yoomo nyang: gi khayhi' phoug" dab , su: nghoid ziri nanu" nyang: si' bye .
50002023	Hougsu" wigi nga" khyoo: khasu" bue" loo wa ziri ngoo si' lang" hau: yug ri nanu" jhang khyoo: - nhang: kaid' wa ein: ngoo myid byu to .
50002024	Hau: tho' moo gootu: khamyhang ade: myang" ri ngoo nya: gung nyang: we' nanu" jang" moo ju" ri" wa nghoid ein:-hau: Aseing: moo myid loem nyid .
50002025	Hau: lho: wigi nanu" da" mang nhung" phoo nga" moo" zei: byen , cang" yo' dage" za: meing: zain: jang: mo , byen , cang" gyidzoo: phoo - ngoori bo pang" wa shid re" nanu" nhang: kaid' byid: su - Epaphrodi ri nanu" jhang khyoo: nhang: nyang: doem nhang: kaid' wa ein: wigi ngoo myid nyid .
50002026	Nyang: gi nanu" dangain" bang: yo' gye" shau" goo" nau nyid khasu" wim ga: ri nyang: yhe: no da" khyoo: ri nanu" shau" gyo: boem yoomo nghoid .
50002027	Gyeing" nyang: - nyang: gi alug lug shid: sho' noo bye: nghoid loug - Mangsoo ginyang: ri nheig khyeug nyid nyang: ri za: we' anghoid - ngoori koug shu: zi azeing dapyam: yo' dapyam: ashug" baja" ga - nheig khyeug yu byid: bye .
50002028	Houg: yoomo nanu" gi nyang: ri doem shau" myang wigi shau" gau yi wa ziyo' nga" da" kougshu: khyoo: we' byug loo" baja" - nyang: ri nanu" jhang khyoo: nhang: kaid' wa zi ngoo je" myid hain: nyid .
50002029	Houg: yoomo nanu" nyang: ri Khristain mang nhung" phoo dayug khyo" wigi lhoem: tau , yu ge' . houg: yhang: te" bang: ri phau" myang: byid: ge' .
50002030	Khasu" wim gari nyang: gi nanu" ayo" byid: da" pang" thoug khyoo: - ngoori byid: wa shid re" kangso' rinoung" pyam lho: Khristu da" moozoo" ri alug lug shid: sho' voin vu , yoem: kaid' lid lo abye: .
50003001	Mang nhung" yi we" lo" thang khyo" tid shang ein: rigi hau: Aseing: moo dayug za: yo" bue" yoomo gau yi nyid ge' - shid phyang" nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoo lhid" kaid' yu" bye: da" khyoo: ri doem poug lhid" wa shid mo ngoo moo yoovoin alid" nyid loo: za: nanu" shid re" je wigi gau: nyu: khyoo: ri yo" yu nyid .
50003002	Akhyeing" ashoeb da" moo" zei: nyid bang ri lhed' zed" nyid ge' . lakhuid" joem ri zed" nyid ge' . nyang: tu: nya: gung shoo" joem ri yham" phyed pyam bang: ri zed" nyid ge' .
50003003	Athang: yham" da" khyoo: agyeing" ri kham: yu mo , gi nyang: nu" anghoid - nyhang: nu" she' danghoid nyid boem - khasu" wim gari nyhang" gi Mangsoo ri nya: venyi yo' noku coung" nghei wigi Khristu Yesu moo dayug za: yo" bue" da" kangso' dei khyoo: moo gau yi phau: khuang mo , nghoid boem - ngoonu" gi noku thung" mo nghe: shoid' khyo" alhoo: aved , ri aloem" jeing" .
50003004	Datid shang ein: rigi houg: yhang: te" da" moozoo" moo ngoo we' loem , khoug: jang" yoo" su: nghoid nyid nanu" mo dayug gi nghe: shoid mo aved asam" da" moozoo" joem moo loem , khoug: jang: yo" ein: jho: nghoid rigi ngoo gi je" wigi loem , khoug: jang: yoo" su: nghoid .
50003005	Ngoo gi apyaid' ngi shi" da" ayo , mo nyang: - athang: yham" ci: bye - Israela byumyu" Ben-yamin akung: ako'' yo' Hebre byumyu" yi mo we' Hebre suid" agyeing" nyang: nghoid nyid Yuda yi da" toung ; to" tarha" ri cang pyeing shang ga: rigi ngoo Pharishe" nyang: nghoid bye .
50003006	Myid' loin" yoem: kaid' khyoo: ri da tid shang ga: rigi ngoo gi phung ri shen" yhen loo su: nghoid - tarha" cang byeung" shoid , khyo" deing byeung" khyoo: ri tid shang ein: rigi ngoo moo ce" yooboo we' adab -
50003007	Nghoid loug we' shid phyang" nga" shid re" amyaid' nghoid bye" ein: soin" to" da" khyoo: dangain" gi akhid" uri gi Khristu yoomo soem" lo" khyoo: nghoid ein: ngoo soin: pyam' bye .
50003008	Mau: tho' moo gootu - nga" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu ri yo" se' boin: gyeung: lo da" khyoo: gi gu , jhoo: aphoug" dangain" tho' moo je" phoug" dab , thang zi nghoid yoomo ngoo yoo" mayoo" dangain" gi soem" pyam' bye" ein: soin: pyam bye - ngoo yoo" mayoo" dangain" gi soem" pyam bye - ngoo Aseing: shid' re" nga" ziyoo jonu" dangain" ri she: pyam' bye - Khristu ein: da" amyaid' ri yo" yu wa ziyo' Khristu yo' dadeing: daloem: za: yo" bye" loo" wa shid re" jo , moo jo , ri joid' nhoin soid' boem ti" soin: pyam bye .
50003009	Ngoo gi toung: to" da" tarha" ri cang byeung" yhe: lo" khyo" wigi deing" byeung" khyoo: ayo" yu - akhid" Khristu ri loem" jeung" lo khyo" wigi deing byeung" khyoo: ri ngoo yo" yu bye _ hau: khyoo: gi loem" jeung" yoomo Mangsoo byid: da" nheig khyeug jeju" jhung: shug za: nghoid nyid .
50003010	Ngoo gi Khristu ri yo" se' lo khyoo: Nyang: doem dei to'' lo da" yoem: vhoo" ri shau" myang kham , zo: wigi ngoo nya: gung du: nyang: shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' yu wa ziri nheig byu zoore - nya: da" shid: kham: ziyo' du goo" wa ziri za: ngoo vho: ngei nyid .

50003012	Ngoo gi akhid" lang" he: da" khyoo: moo oung: doid' bye: ein: we' joeb , byeung" bye" ein: we' atid noug - Khristu nyang: ngoori nya: da" byu bue" loo nhang: bye: yoomo ngoo we' jhung: shug ri yo" yu sho' yoem" kaid' lho: gei loo" bye - ngoo gi hau: jhung: shug ri yo" yu sho' we' shid moo jo , da" zi joem ri myhi: sho' we' nga" thang: mo khyoo: dangain" ri to" myhed' pyam .
50003013	Mang nhung" yi we" - ngoo gi hau: jhung shug ri yo" yu bye: ein: - gyaing" nyang: ngoo amyid - nghoid loug we' ngoo koid da" khyoo: dangain" gi nga" nung thang mo zi joem dangain" ri ngoo to" myhed pyam' wigi shid moo jo , da" zi jeom ri yo" myhi: loo" sho' yoem: kaid' yhe: lo .
50003014	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoo gi hau" jhung: shug ri yo" yu wa shid re" bain: zeing ju" sho' dain" dain: yoem: kaid' gei yhe: lo - hau: jhung shug gi moug: khung: moo kangso' yo" dei nyid sho' Khristu Yesu khyo" wigi Mangsoo khe: yu da" khyoo: nghoid nyid .
50003015	Venyi khyoo: moo nheig bo lho: myheung yang" bye: da" ngoonu" gi he: da" myid nyid azoo" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - myid nyid ca" boem bye - nghoid loug we' nanu" dayham" moo adu go" khyoo: ri myid nyid mo , to boo shi" nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi hau" khyoo: ri we' myang se' loo nhang: shi" wa zi nghoid .
50003016	Kha: khyo" nghoid loug we' ngoonu" gi akhid" nyid" ju" sho' ngoo nyang: cang lid loo bye: da" akhyoo" aved , joem yo" dakhyoo" ti" - shid' khyoo: jhen" yhe: lo" nyid boem shang .
50003017	Mang nhung" yi dangain" mo we" - nanu" dangain" nga" jang" mo khooshid: ri yu" yu ge' . ngoonu" toin" shid' too" bye: da" akhyoo" again ge da" khooshid: ri yu" yu lho: cang loo" bang: ri yu" xoem" nyid ge' .
50003018	He: khyoo: ngoo nanu" ri shid' phyang" myoo" sho' lheing" tid kyo" yu" bye - akhui" we' ngoug byid' yo' doem poug tid kyo" nyid Khristu gi pyang" zeing tho' moo kham" shid: da" khyoo: ri gyi koid lho: kangso' di nyid bang: myoo" sho' bo .
50003019	Houg: bang: gi ngarai mung" moo nyangnu" da" khyoo: lo" thang wa zi nghoid-khasu" wim gari houg: bang: da" Mangsoo gi nyangnu" da" voem: doug: ein: da" gung sho" vhoo: boo myo , no , da" khyoo: nghoid nyid nyangnu" gi asho' ashid: da" khyoo: ri myonhoo: sho: phau: khuang nyid boem ziyo' he: mougmyid mo da" zi yoo joem riza: - nheig tei" nyid boem ago" .
50003020	Ngoonu" koem gi moug: khung ; mo da" mung" byu yi nghoid boem yoomo moug: khung: moug di mo ngoonu" da" khyoid yu Aseing Yesu Khristu ri shau" goo" wa kang: lung bu dalang" nyid boem .
50003021	Nyang: gi jo , moo jo , ri nya: vhoo: moo yo" kaid' pyam da" phung" yoeb , yoem: moo" bo nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoonu" da" shid: loo" se' gung du: joem ri thed' pyam' lho: nya: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb bo gung du: yo' du goo" sho' aseig thid' byid: loo wa zi nghoid .
50004001	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo mang nhung" yi we" - nanu" ri gye" jheddab nyid ziyo' gye" myid' boin: nheig nge nyid nanu" gi nga" da" gau yi joyoo yo' bidmug nghoid nyid ago - jheddab bang: we" hau" Aseing: yo' dayugza: bue" lho: wigi kangso' dei da" khyoo: moo geing: geing: dayab , jo , ge' .
50004002	Eodia yo' Suntuki eig yug we" - hau: Aseing: moo abi: anhung" nghoid nyid boem ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nheigloem: shikain" shoin" wa shid re" ngoo re" eig yug ri mho' kaid' .
50004003	Nga" da" bo pang" bo thoug da" loem ge" da" byen cang phoo we" - nang khyo" we' hau: myi: yi eig yug ri bo pang" thoug yu we' khasu" wim ga: ri hau: ngei bu: lu dang: kho" kyo" da" khyoo: moo ngoo yo' dage" moo" gye" bo zei: loo bye - nya: eig yug yo' dage" Klemen yo' Mangso kang: so' mougsoug" zhayen" pug moo nyangnu" da" myeing bo - nga" da" moo" voin byen cang" gootu: we' zheung: bo .
50004004	Hau" Aseing: yo' deung: shoin" da" khyoo: moo nanu" khanham we' gau yi ngei pyo: nyid goo" baja" - ngoo deom tid ba - gau yi ngei pyo: nyid goo" baja" .
50004005	Nanu" da" sam" dab , nu" nham , da" nheigloem: ri byu dangain" bang: da" shid khoin" moo toin" shid' nyid ge' - Hau" Aseing: ju" ri" wa da" ayo , gi jhang lo nyid bye .
50004006	Ce" khyoo: moo we' myid' amyo: nyid goo" nanu" da" akyu" mho' dang: khoin" khang" moo" moo-khanham we' jeju" boin: so" nheigloem: yo' nanu" ca" vho: khyoo: dangain" Mangso jhang mho' nyid ge' .
50004007	Houg: lang" byu yi se' da" nyain: dangain" tho' mo je" lid da" Mangso ngei pyoo: myenjham" khyoo: gi Khristu Yesu yo' deung: shoin" da" khyoo: moo nanu" da" nheigloem: e" myed , yo' myid soin: khyoo: dangain" moo zung" lhug byid: wa .
50004008	Mang nhung" yi we" - ce: da" ge , lho , deingmain" khyoo: young" du khyoo: deing byeung" khyoo: gyeungshang: khyoo: vho: ngei khyoo: coung" ngei byid: ge" da" khyoo: - ngi lho , khyoo: yo' coung" nghei moin: da" khyoo: joem ri damyid' yu" nyid ge' .
50004009	Ngoo tid da" khoin" thui: joem yo' ngoo zei: so' da" lo , moo" joem khyo" nanu" nga" jang" mo shau" jhau" yu bye: da" khyoo: joem ri lo , ju" khyid: yug - cang zei: loo" ge' houg: lang" ngei pyo: da" apoem: Mangsoo gi nanu" yo' dage" danyid nyid wa zi nghoid .
50004010	Hid: yhi' gyeing" ayo , myang" lo" thang: ri nanu" da" jheddab nheigloem: - ngoori dalheing: doem , toin" shid boem yoomo ngoo gi hau" Aseing Yesu moo gye" nyang: gau yi nyid Hougsu" ein: ri shid phyang" nanu" ngoori yu" goin , coung: khyoo: ri no: pyam' byid: boem ein: tid nau zi anghoid - hau: jheddab nheigloem: toin" shid' wa shid re" akhyoo" aboo loo: bue" ein: tid nau zi we' anghoid .
50004011	Ngoo hid: su" ein: tid da" khyoo: gi nanu" ngoori nung phoug pyam boem bye: ein: tid nau zi we' anghoid - khasu" wim ga: ri ngoo gi ngoo nyang: te: yo" gu: yo' nheig deug ; lho: se' nyid ca" khyoo: ri se' yu bye .
50004012	Ca" nyid yo nyid wa ziyo' agoin ayu: yo" loo: jo , lo ri khasu" nyid wa ziri we' ngoo se - yoo" zoo: yoo" shug nghoid loug - zooyoid gyid shed' nghoid loug - myoo" sho' yoo" nghoid loug - dajhi' za: te: yoo" nghoid loug - kha: joyoo moo nghoid loug - kha: yo , kha: khyeing: moo nghoid loug - nheig shid: nheig deig tung" se' nyid da" he: da" yhoem" to" zau" to" da" phajhi" ringoo se' yu bye .
50004013	Ngoori yoem: lung: so' lung: byid: da" Khristu yoomo khyoo: khaid gu: khang" moo" yo" oung ; lo" da" yoem: so' ngoo yo" yu nyid .
50004014	Nghoid loug we' ngoo kyi" khyeug shen" yhen zi shau" nyid da" ayo , moo ngoori nanu" bo pang" thoug khyo" wigi gye" ge da" moo" ri zei: abye: go .
50004015	Philipi mo da" phung byu yi we" - Makedoni mung" mo ngoo thu lo wigi ngei bu: lu dang: kho" kyo" lo" da" xang: shed" ayo , moo nanu" Philipi phung daloem: za: ngoori pang" thoug kaid' da" khyoo: ri we' nanung" kyeing" , , myaid' da" khyoo: yo' soem" lo" da" zhayen" moo ngoo yo' dage" bo kham , zoo: mo , nghoid ago" boem da" khyoo: joem ri nanu" nyang: goolhoo: se' nyid boem bye .
50004016	Thesaloni voomoo ngoo nyid nyid shi" da" uri lang" nanu" gi ngoo moo ca" yo lo da" uri hougsu" ca" nyid da" khyoo: ri dalheing: za: anghoid - foin: byid: nyid boem bye .
50004017	Hidsu" ein: ngoo tid nyid da" khyoo: gi jhung: shug jhung: lang: ri ngoo mho' nau nyid zi anghoid - nanu" da" zhayen" moo amyid' myo: loo wa ziri ngoo myang nau nyid .
50004018	Hid: the' nanu" byid: bye: da" zi dangain" ri ngoo yo" yu bye - zhayen" sagsi: gi he: zi nghoid bye - hau: zigi ca" tho' moo jain" sho' lang" nghoid bye - akhid" gi nanu" da" jhung: shug ri Epaphrodi ci: ri" byid: yoomo ngoo moo ca" moo ca" dangain" ri yo" yu bye - he: da" zi joem gi Mangso jang" moo xoin" to' byid: da" nam , pyo: shoem: yhang: tri" we' Mangsoo vho: ngei ziyo' lhoem: yu moin: da" xoin" du: yhang: ti" we' nghoid bye .
50004019	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo Mangsoo koem gi myonhoo: phung" yoeb , yo' phajhi" soid gain' athang agoin yo" jo , nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" ri Khristu khoug: moo nanu" da" ca" moo ca" ri jhoeb , pyeing" byid: wa nghoid .
50004020	Akhid" yha" phoo Mangsoo moo pyaid moo too: moo myonhoo: phung yoeb , gi dabo jo , baja" o" - A men .
50004021	Mangso byumyu" yi nghoid da" Khristu Yesu da" thang: cang bang: dangain" mo , ri vhu" kaid' boem - hid: moo ngoo yo' dange" nyid da" loem" jeung" mang nhung" yi gi nanu" ri vhu" kaid' boem ago" .
50004022	Hid: moo nyid da" Mangso byu yi dangain" bang: gi nanu" ri vhu" kaid' ago - je" wigi Ketha Khokham" vang" mo bang: gi gooki" lid' khyo" vhu" kaid' ago" .
50004023	Khristu Yesu da" jeju" gi nanu" yo' dage" dajo , jo , baja" o" .
51001001	Mansoo myid' vho: da" khyoo: yoomo Khristu Yesu da" lagyoo: nghoid da" ngoo Polu yo' Mang nhung" phoo Timothi gi
51001002	Kolose voogung mo Mangso da" byu yi nghoid da" Khristu moo deung: shoin" nyid ngoonu" da" loem" jeung" loem , khau: nyid mang nhung" yi jhang khyoo: dang: pyeung: kaid - ngoonu" da" nya: phoo Mangso jang" mo jeju" yo' ngei pyo: khyoo: gi nanu" moo dajo , jo , baja" o" .
51001003	Ngoonu" gi nanu" da" shid re" akyu" mho' da" ayo , khang" moo" - ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" nya: phoo - Mangsoo ri jeju" boin: coung" nghei nyid boem .
51001004	Khasu" wim" gari Khristu Yesu ri loem" jeung" da" nanu" da" laloem , lakhoug: yo' Mangso byu yi dangain" bang: ri jheddab da" nanu" jhed khyeing: kang: khyeing: ri ngoonu" shau" gyo: nyid boem bye .
51001005	Hau: deingmain" mungdang: ein: da" ngei bu: lu dang: nanu" jang" moo xang: shed" ju" lo da" uri hau: ngei bu: lu dang: wigi byid: lo da" nheig byu joyoo ri shau" gyo: yu" boem bye - ( Hougsu" nghoid yoo mo nanu" da" loem" jeung" khyoo: yo' jheddab da" nheigloem: gi moug: khung: moo nanu" shid re" shoung: too" byid: ziri shau" kham: yu wa da" khyoo: nanu" nheig byu joyoo ayang: zug jo .
51001006	Nanu" gi Mangso jeju" khyo" xang: shed" shau" gyo: yu da" bidnyid mo wigi hau: jeju" gi gyeing" nyang: se' gyo: kham' zoo: bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - hau: ngei bu: lu dang: gi nanu" jang" moo ju" loo bye - houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - hau" ngei bu: lu dang: gi ashi" myoo" sho' zei lo lho: mougmyid gyab , goin" jang" moo byo sain" loo" bye .
51001007	Nanu" gi Mangso jeju" khyoo: ri ngoonu" da" moo" voin , byen , cang" - Epaphra jang" mo jhau" yu agoo" bye - nyang: gi ngoonu" da" gung thid' Khristu da" moozoo" moo voin , su: nghoid nyid .
51001008	Nanu" ri gyeung shang: Venyi wigi byid: da" jheddab khyoo: ngoonu" ri tid kyo" boem bye .
51001009	Houg: yoomo nanu" da" khyoo: ri shau" gyo: yu da" bidnyid mo wigi ngoonu" gi nanu" shid re" anoo: ayab , loo: za: akyu" mho' nyid boem bye - nanu" gi hau: gyeungshang: Venyi wigi byid: da" phajhi" byen - ya dangain" yo' Mangsoo myid vho: khyoo: ri yo" se' loo wa lasi , nanu" moo joeb , byeung" loo wa shid re" Mangso jang" moo ngoonu" akyu" mho' nyid boem .
51001010	Hougsu" nghoid lang" gi nanu" gi Mangsoo myid vho: khyo" kangso dei nyid wigi nya: da" vho: ngei khyoo: moo khanham we' nanu" yo" cang zei: loo" wa zi nghoid - houg: lang" nanu" da" kangso dei khyoo: gi ge da" moozoo" ja" khang" moo" moo ashi" zei: lo wigi Mangsoo ri se' lo da" khyoo: moo gyi: sheung: loung: lo boem wa zi nghoid .
51001011	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" thoung" shau" lo da" khyoo: khaid khang" moo" ri nheigloem: sheung: ziyo' yo" kham , zeung: nyid boem wa shid re" nya: da" phung" yoeb bo da" yoem: so' khoug: mo ju" re" da" yoem: vhoo" dangain" yo' nanu" ri yoem: lung: byid: zi shau" goo" baja" .
51001012	Hau: tho' moo gootu - bidbang da" mungdain khoug: moo bo jo , da" nya: da" gyeungshang: bang: shid re" Mangsoo nyheung soin' to" da" agyid asoo: joem ri nanu" ri shau" kham: zhoung" yu moin: bang: bue" lho:
51001013	Mangsoo jeju" ri gau , yi ngei bu: coung" nghei nyid baja" o" . Nyang: gi nyhang" ri akhyeing" ashoeb da" moug: coid' yoem: so' khoug: mo khyoid khyi: yu lho: nya: da" jheddab nya: zo: da" mungdain khyoo: fang kaid' bye .
51001014	Hau: da" nya: zoo: khyo" ngoonu" gi lhoid pyoin , kaid zi shau" boem bye - hau: zigi ngoonu" da" youg: noo yooboo ri khyoid pyam byid: da" khyoo: nyang: nghoid bye .
51001015	Khristu gi myo , jed" ze ayo" myang da" Mangso ved , voin , su: - ngoonu" myo , jed" ze shau" myang da" phain" so: to" zi yoo dangain" da" atho' moo je" tho' xeig zoo: shid" nyang: nghoid bye .
51001016	Khasu" wim gari moug: khung: moug: di yo' mougmyid yooso" da" tho' moo yoem: moo" so' moo" bo da" yu join: soobyoo: joem seing: nyid mo , vhoeb khang" nyid mo , - amyeing" akhang" yoo" bang: yo' dage" myo , jed" yo' shau" myang zi ashau" myang gu: ri we' hau: nya: zo: khoug: khyo" phain" so: too" bye .
51001017	Nyang: gi dangain" da" shid' mo nyid nyid wigi jo , moo jo , gi nyang: nya: joyoo yo' joyoo moo geung: jo , ago" .
51001018	Nyang: gi nya: gung du: ein: da" phoung: da" vhuloem nghoid nyid nyang: gi hau: gung du: da" kangso' apoem: we' nghoid nyid nyang: kyeing" za: dangain" da" yhoug: gyen: thang nam: baid' daloem: da" jo yoo ri yo" yu baja" - shid: bye: bang: mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: da" zooshid" mang: moo" nyang: nghoid .
51001019	Khasu" wim ga: ri Mangsoo nyang: myid vho: myid phyed' to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nya: zoo: gi nyang: moo Mangso layung gung joeb , byeung" sho' kham: yu ci: bye .
51001020	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo Mangsoo gi-nyid moo nyid jo , moo jo , dangain" gu: gi nyang: yo' doem veing" go" loo baja" ga - myid phyed' to" abye: - Mangsoo gi pyang" zing tho' moo-ab , noung" shid: kham: bye: da" nya: zo: suid" yo' doem nyeung veung" go" da" myenjham" ngei pyo: khyoo: koid wigi moug: khung: moug: di yo' mougmyid' yoosoo" moo jo , moo jo , nyid moo nyid ri nya: jhang khyoo: shu" yu bye .
51001021	Nanu" we' shid' phyang" dalheing: gi nanu" nyang: koid da" akhyeing" ashoeb moozoo" yo' - myid soin' khyoo: yoomo Mangsoo yo' ve: gang: lo" wigi nya: da" gyivoo jeom bue" yu" boem bye .
51001022	Nghoid loug we' akhid" Mangsoo gi nya: zo: da" xangsu: gung shoo" shid: lo" khyo" wigi nanu" ri nya: bidnoem , yi doem , koid pyam bye - Hougsu" koid da" khyoo: gi nanu" gi gyeungshang: lho: aco' ajhoid zi adab wa ziyo' yooboo aboo loo: za: nya: shid khoin" moo nanu" ri yo" fang yu wa shid re" nghoid nyid .
51001023	Nanu" gi geung: teung da" ayang: moo nheigloem: zung" ziyo' agyi: zug wigi geung: teung jo , ge' . hau: lho: nanu" gi hau" ngei bu: lu dang: shau" gyo: da" uri nanu" yo" yu ci: da" nheig byu khyoo: ri moo" yoin da" dei zoo: dayug bue" loo bye - hau: ngei bu: lu dang: koem gi moug: gyab , goin" jang" mo byu yug khang" moo" ri kho" kyoo" bye: da" mungdang: nghoid nyid .
51001024	akhid" koem gi nanu" da" shid re" ngoo thoung" shau" da" shid: gyoin , noogyoin , moo gau yi ngei pyo: nyid Khristu gi nya: gung du: ein: da" phoung: shid re" kyi" khyeug khyoo: thoung" shau" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoo gi ngoo nya: gung du: shid re" kyi" khyeug kham , khyo" wigi Khristu gi nya: gung doem: ein: da" hau" phoung: shid re" kham , da" kyi" khyeung khyoo: moo ca" nyid shi" da" kyi" khyeug khyoo: ri nga" da" gung moo kham , zo: nyid da" kyi" khyeug khyoo: yo' joeb byeung" byid: nyid .
51001025	Nanu" shid re" ge , da" khyoo: ri koid baja" - Mangsoo gi phoung: da" moo" voin , su: dayug khyo" wigi ngoori soin' nyheung to" zi shau" bye - ngoori ab , byid: to" da" yoovoin , gi hau: ngei bu: lu dang: ri myhed' to" zi aboo loo: sho' kho" kyoo" wa shid re" nghoid nyid .
51001026	Nyang: gi hau: no , thang lho:-zau" yhoem" to" da" mungdang: ri mougmyid xangsu: byu yi asi loo: sho' goonham , gooco' mo dapyaid' yo' dapyaid' moo ju" sho' zau" yhoem" too" nghoid loug we' akhid" gi nya: da" byumyu" yi ri ci: shug kaid' abye: .
51001027	Mangsoo nyheung soin' to" khyoo: gi byumyu" bain' sho' bang: shid re" nyang: yo" jo , da" myo: tham: phung" yoeb myonhoo: bo da" yhoem" shoung: to" da" phajhi" ri nya: da" byu yi jhang moo-pang shug byid: da" khyoo: nghoid - hougsu" yhoem" to" da" phajhi" gi nyangnu" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo vang jo , bye: ein: da" khyoo: nghoid - hau: da" dangkang: gi nanu" Mangsoo yo' dage" hau: phung" yoeb , ri coem kham: yu da" khyoo: nghoid .
51001028	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi byu yug khang" moo" ri Khristu da" khyoo: ri kho" kyo" boem bye - byu yug khang" moo" ri Khristu moo nheig bo myheung yang" da" Khristain byu yug khang" moo" bue" lo wigi Mangso shid moo yo" vang lo" boem baja" - ngoonu" gi phajhi" byen-ya boo moo boo yo' nyangnu" ri zed" lhid' nhang: khyoo: jhau mhoo , byid: nyid boem .
51001029	Hougsu" hau: khyoo: yo" bui" sho' ngoo gi Khristu wigi byid: da" mau" pho" yoem: moo" yo' jam , jau kham lho: yoem: kaid' zei: nyid hau: yoem: so' gi ngoo moo moo" zei: nyid .
51002001	Ngoo gi nanu" shid re" we' Ladoki byu yi shid re" we' ngoo yo' myonhoo: ashau" myang go" yu" da" gootu: byu yi shid re" we' ngoo khayhi' yoem: kaid' voin , wu , lid loo: bye: da" khyoo: nanu" ri ngoo tid kyoo" ba .
51002002	Hougsu" ngoo yoem: kaid' voin yu , da" khyoo: gi nyangnu" dangain" tho' moo myo , yang" da" nheigloem: yo' joeb , byeung" wigi dayug yo' dayoung da" jheddab da" emyid moo-tei" xo' go" lo" ziyo' nyangnu" gi deingmain" da" lasi , phajhi" mo myo: tham: da" nheig shid: nheig deig khyoo: ri nyangnu" yo" yu wa shid re" nghoid - hougsu" wi nyangnu" gi-he: khyo" wigi Mangso zau" yheom" to" da" no , thang phajhi" ri se' gyo: lo boem wa nghoid hau: phajhi" gi Khritstu nyang: nghoid bye .
51002003	Nyang: gi Mangsoo nghoeb , too" yhoem" to" da" phajhi" byen-ya yo' lasi , phajhi" soidgain' dangain" ziri phang byid: da" khoem" thoug" nyang: nghoid nyid .
