51002006	Nanu' gi Khristu Yesu ri Aseing: ga: wigi lhoem: yu bye ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nyang: yo' dage" deung: shoin" lho: kangso' dei nyid ge' .
51002007	Jhau" mho' ziri kham: yu bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nyang: moo agyi: no" no , cen , lho: nyang: moo yha" da" kangso' dei khyoo: qei" to" wigi nanu" da" loem" jeung" khyoo: ri je" geung: teung jo , nhang: ge' . jeju" ri coung" nghei myid' nanu" moo byeung" jo , baja" .
51002008	Khristu da" akhyoo" shed' to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - anghoid loo: za: byu xangsu: yi da" akhyoo" shid' khyoo: mo thu' da" jhau" shed' dang: joem yo' dei moo dei nyid moo nyid ri vhoeb khang" da" yu join: joem jang" mo thu' lo da" jhau" shed' dang: nghoid da" ce" akyu" we' abo mhau' fain" da" xangsu: phajhi" yo' hang" wigi we' nanu" ri join , akoid nhang: pyam' goo"-zed" lhid" nyid ge' .
51002009	Mangso da" joeb byeung" layung gung gi-xangsu: gung du: nghoid da" Khristu moo bo jo .
51002010	Nanu" gi nyang: yo' shoin" deung: to" jang mo joeb byeung" da" kangso' riyo" yu boem bye - hau: nyang: vhoeb khang" da" venyi dangain" yo' amyeing" akhang" yoo" bang: dangain" mo , da" atho' moo je" gyi: lho: myhang: thang su: nghoid nyid .
51002011	Nanu" gi hau: Aseing: yo' dadeing: daloem za: bue" lho: wigi kangso' dei da" uri athang: yham" khyoo: ri kham: yu bye: nghoid nyid hau: zigi byu yi da" lo , wigi koid zi anghoid loo za: he: yooboo dab , da" gung sho" yoem: so' mo lhoid pyoin , kaid' ein: da" Khristu wigi ze" bui" byid: da" athang: yham" khyoo: nghoid .
51002012	Nanu" gi Babtisma kham: yu da" bidnyid ri nyang: yo' dage" myhoeb , pyam' zi shau" wigi Khristu ri shid: jang" mo doem dei to' loo nhang: Mangso da"-yoem: moo" ri loem" jeung da" laloem , lakhoug: yoomo Khristu yo' dage" dei to'' loo nhang: zi shau" boem bye .
51002013	Nanu" gi shid' phyang" venyi moo shid: mang nghoid nyid ago - khasu" wim gari nanu" gi yooboo koid da" tung: to" tarha" ayo" da" tung: bau byumyu" yi nghoid ago - nghoid loug we' akhid" Mangsoo gi Khristu yo , dage" dei da" khyoo: khyoo: shu" loo" bye -
51002014	Mangsoo gi yha" da" yooboo dangain" ri khyoid pyam' byid: wigi . Nyang: gi yha" da" anghoid akhuang da" yoobo jhen: zhayen" ri we' houg: yo' sen: da" tarha" joem ri we' pyang" zeing tho' moo ten" zei: yo' baid' jen" tab' wigi shoem" shoung: pyam' byid: bye .
51002015	Hau" da" pyang" zeing tho' moo Khristu gi vhoeb , khang" da" venyi joem amyeing" akhang" yoo" mo , ri-oung: pyam' wigi nyangnu" ri thung: byu bui" nhang: pyam' lho: oung: doid' loo" bang: yain: so" lo" jang" mo cang so" loo" nhang: ziyo' byu dangain" bang: wigi coem , yu" zi shau" da" byu yi bue" loo" nhang: pyam' bye .
51002016	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo zoo: noem shug noem , yo' sen: khyo" we' ayo , bidnyid moo cang lho: lhoo , xain" nyid" yo' gyeungshang: Bidnyid mo pui" joem yo' sen: lho: hang" wigi we' nanu" ri yoobo dang: aphyed' nhang: go" .
51002017	Houg: yhang: te" da" khyoo: dangain" gi ju" lo da" ayo , moo bue" thu' loo wa da" khyoo: joem da" ayoeb , abang za: nghoid nyid agung gyeing" nyang: gi Khristu nyang: nghoid nyid .
51002018	Ladu lid' sho' shoid vhang: da" khyoo: - nyang: tu: nya: da" gung du: ri khyo , nyhoem: pyam' wa ziyo' moug: lagyoo: yi ri no" ca" ga: goozu: xen , da" yoeb , myang yo" we' shoid vhang: da" khyo , nyhoem: khyoo: moo nyhen" zei: nyid bang: yo' moug: lagyoo: yi ri noku da" khyo" we' nyang: nya: gung du: ri dangain" tho' moo je" nghoid thang su: ga: khyo" tid phau: nyid mo , - hang" su: wigi we' nanu' ri yoobo dang: phyed' wa da" akhang" abyid: goo" - Houg: yhang: te" da" byu yi gi ce: sei abo da" xang: su: myid soin: khyo" nyang: nya: gung ri tid phau: yu lho .
51002019	Gung du: da" vhuloem nghoid nyid Khristu moo xo' nhei: khau: nghe: jang" mo phoug pyeug loo" mo , nghoid ago - Khristu vhoeb , khang" da" akhoug: moo dagung goin" gi hau: da" youg: xeig youg: myo , yo' shoo" gyi: youg: khyang: joem wigi myheug shoin" to" lho: khu: gyi: kaid' ziyo' Mangsoo myid vho: khyo" gyi: sheung: loo wa nghoid .
51002020	Nanu" gi Khristu yo' dage" shid: byug boem bye: nghoid yoomo jo , moo jo , ri seung: nyid da" venyi joem khoug: mo lhoid pyoin , kaid' ziri shau" boem bye - houg: su" nghoid rigi ci: yoomo nanu" gi he: mougmyid da" join , yi yhang: ti" - kangso' dei nyid go" la" .
51002021	He: ziri ajham" yu" - he: ziri azang" thung goo" , ga: da" tarha" ri datam" gyo: nyid shigo" la" .
51002022	Hau" tarha" joem dangain" gi dalheing: ci: yhung: bye: thang: rigi ce: akyu" aboo lo: ziyo' sen: da" tarha" za: nghoid lho: byu xangsu: yi koid thu' da" tarha" ri jhoug" byid: khyoo: joem za: date: nghoid .
51002023	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - moug: lagyoo: yi ri agyoo: ayoid noku nhang: da" khyoo: we' nyang: nya: gung ri shoid vhang: khyo" khyo , nyhoem: khyoo: moo we' hau: da" taha" joem gi phajhi" bo yhang: ti" du nyid nghoid loug we' gung shoo" vho: da" nyam , nheigloem: ri vhoeb khang" khyoo: mooce" akyu" we' aboo nghoid da .
51003001	Nanu" gi Khristu yo' dage" doem dei to'' loo bye: ziri shau" kham: yu boem , bye: yoomo Mangsoo , yo shoid mo nya: Khokham" zhung: tang moo zhoung: jo , da" Khristu nyid da" moug: khung: mo zi joem ri nheig danhei: nyid ge' .
51003002	Moug: myid tho' moo jo , da" zi joem ri anghoid loo: za: moug: khung: tho' moo jo , da" ziyoo joem moo nheigloem: zug jo , ge' .
51003003	Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" gi shid: bye: mo , nghoid - nanu" da" kangso' gi Khristu yo' dae" - Mangsoo moo yheom" shoung: to" boem bye .
51003004	Re" da" kang: so' gyeing" gi Khristu nghoid lho: nyang: doem , thu' myang lo da" uri nang we' nyang: yo' dage" thu' myang lo wigi nya: myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri bo shau" kham: yu wa zi nghoid .
51003005	Houg: yoomo nanu" da" akhoug: moo bo da" aved , avhu: moo" - myo , jang anyau , da" moo" - nyam , da" moozoo" - akhyeing" ashoeb , khyoo: yo' vhoo: boo loug gyi: da" khyoo: gi soolhoo: no" da" khyoo: daja: nghoid - hau: ziri said' pyam' boem ge' .
51003006	Houg: yhang: te" da" khyoo: joem ri koid nyid boem yoomo nyang: ri atam" gyoo: bang: da" atho' moo Mangso da" nheig khoo" yo: khyoo: gi ju" ri" wa zi nghoid .
51003007	shid' phyang" mo nanu" da" kangso' khyoo: bain' sho' moo hau: khyoo: joem wigi nghoeb , oung: ci uri gi nanu" nyang: we' houg: yhang: te" da" yooboo ri koid lho: wigi kangso' dei lid lo boem bye .
51003008	Akhid" koem gi nheig yo: zi nheig no , nyang: yo: khyoo: anoug angei da" nheig loem-yooboo ri xoem" to" khyoo: sube" da" gei , sang: shang pyang: ziyo' khoin" co' loeb , khyoo: ri nanu" da" nhoid mo athu' nhang: loo: go .
51003009	Nyang: cang" nyang: - mhau' da" dang: ri atid nyid lo go" - khasu" wim ga: ri ri byu xoug" yo' dage" hau: da" akyang joem ri nanu" khyoid pyam' lho: gung du: aseig zhoug yu boem abye: go .
51003010	Phain" so: to" da" Aseing: Mangsoo gi hau: byu seig ri Mangsoo nya: da" alhoo: aved' yo' je" je du goo" sho' khanham we' daso koid daso' nyheung nyid houg: su" so' koid so' nyheung: khyoo: gi nanu" gi hau: Aseing: ri joeb , byeung" sho' se' loo wa shid mo nghoid .
51003011	He: khyoo: yoomo Yuda byumyu" yi yo' Heleni byumyu" yi gi athang: yham" kham' su: yo' akham' su: siyoo soogam: byu yi-byu kyang: byu lam" joem - join , yi yo' loid byoin , byu yi ga - nyangnu" da" akhoug: moo kho' go" koin , nyid wa khyoo: ajo , loo - Khristu gi nanu" dangain" bang: tho' moo-je" yhoug: gyen: su: nghoid wigi nanu" dangain" bang: yo' dage" nyid nyid .
51003012	Nanu" gi Mangso byu yi nghoid boem bye: yoomo nyang: gi nanu" ri jheddab wigi nya: shid re" khyen: yu shau" bang: nghoid - houg: yoomo nanu" gi jhed' thang kang: athang - nheig khyeig shoo" myen: zi nheigloem: nyhoem: zi sam" dab , nu" nham , ziyo' nheigloem: gyi: sheung: ziri void . ci: ge' .
51003013	Nanu" mo dayug yug da" atho' moo yooboo foin: jang: jo , nghoid rigi nyang: cang" nyang - kham , zeing: go" ziyo' nyang: cang" nyang: yooboo ri khyoid pyam' byid: go" nyid ge' - hau: Aseing: gi nanu" da" yooboo ri khyoid pyam' byid: bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" nyang: cang" we' yooboo ri khyoid pyam byid: goo" ca" nyid .
51003014	Hau" yoem: so' dangain" da" atho' moo joeb , byeung" da" nheigloem: shikain" shoin" khyoo: bue" loo sho'-houg: dangain" tho' moo ziyoo jo , moo jo , ri yo" myeug deung: da" jhed' khyeing: kang: khyeing: ri pug void ci: ge' .
51003015	Khristu byid: da" ngei pyo: khyoo: gi nanu' da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo davhoeb , khang" nyid wigi houg: gi nanu" myid phyed' pharan da" khyoo: moo khyoo: shed' vhu" she: nyid baja" - khasu" wim ga: ri hau: ngei pyo: da" khyoo: ri shau" kham: zoo wa shid re" Mangsoo gi nanu" ri gung du: daloem: za: khyo" khe: yu bye: yoomo jeju" ri boin: so" nyid ge' .
51003016	Khristu da" mungdang: gi nanu" da" nheigloem: khoug: moo byeung jo , nhang: ge' - phajhi" byen - ya jo , moo jo , yo' nanu" nyang: cang" jhoug" goo" mhoo , goo" ge' . coung" nghei dang - Jikhoin" nghei , coung" dang: joem - venyi yo' sen: da" lid' jhoem" dang: joem yo' nanu" da" emyid , khoug: moo Mangsoo ri jeju" boin: ziyo'-coung" nghei nyid ge' .
51003017	Houg: yoomo nanu" ce" moo" thu' nghoid loug we' mung main: khyoo: moo we' moozoo" jid: zo" khyoo: moo we' Aseing Yesu myeing ri lang: lho: dangain" ziri dakoid nyid wigi nya: khoug: khyo" phoo mangsoo ri jeju" daboin: so" nyid ge' .
51003018	Yhoem: seing: myhi' we" - nyang: nya: da" yhoem: seing: pho , tid khyo" cang nyid ge' - hau: khyoo: gi Khristain byu dayug khyo" wigi hau: Aseing: moo cang yhe: loo" wa du , da" khyoo: nghoid .
51003019	Yhoem: seing: pho , we' nanu" da" yhoem: seing: myhi' ri jheddab nyid wigi nyangnu" ri anoug akhyoid' pyi: sho: da" dang: ri atid nyid goo .
51003020	Zoo: shang: mi" we" - ce" ja: khyoo: moo we" - re" myhi , yo' re" pho , da" dang: ri khanham we' datam" gyo: nyid ge' - hau: khyoo: gi Khristain yi cang zei: loo" eung: da" moo" nghoid - Khasu" wim gari hau: khyoo: gi Mangsoo vho: da" khyoo: nghoid .
51003021	Myhi , phoo yi we" - nanu" da" nya: zoo: yi ri nheigloem: aze" sho" nyid goo" - houg: su" koid lang" nyangnu" gi nheig nge yoem: gyau: lo" byug boem wa zi nghoid .
51003022	Join , yi we" - nanu" da" xangsu: yhoem: seing: yi ri khyoo: khaid khang" moo" moo tam" gyoo: byid: nyid ge , nanu" gi myonhoo: shoo: nau , ziyo' nyangnu" shid' moo dang: tam" gyo: khyo" akoid loo: za: Aseing: ri gyoug phau" zoo re" nyangnu" da" dang: ri gyeungshang: ziyo' tam" gyo: nyid ge' .
51003023	Nanu" gi ce" ja: koid nghoid loug we' byu shid' re" koid ti" anghoid loo: za: Aseing: shid re" koid yahg: ti" - nanu" da" nheigloem: emyid dangain" yo' yoem: kaid' nyid ge' .
51003024	Aseing: gi nya: byumyu" yi shid' re" shoung: to" da" agyid asoo: ri jhung: shug khyo" wigi nanu" ri byid: zi nghoid ziri daboin: so" nyid ge' - khasu" wim ga: ri Khristu koem gi pang" zei: nyid da" Aseing: agyeing" nyang: nghoid bye .
51003025	Adeung amain" khyo" koid nyid da" byu yug khang" moo" ri nyang: koid nyid adeung amain" da" moo" zo" shid re" latoo: doem , phoug zi shau" zoo: wa nghoid - khasu" wim ga: ri Mangsoo gi tarha" dang: phyed khyoo: moo myonhoo: khyen: nyid su: anghoid .
51004001	Yhoem: seing: yi we" - nasnu" we' moug: khung: tho' moo Aseing: dayug nyid ziri myid boin: zoore" - nyang: tu: nya: da" join , yi ri dei nhang: zo: nyid da" khyoo: moo yu" tu , lho: tarha" ziyo' nyeung veung" dain: khyo" dakoid nyid ge' .
51004002	Anoo: loo - atheing: loo: akyu" damho , nyid ge' . hau: tho' moo gootu: nanu" akyu" mho' khyoo: moo zed" zoore" - Mangsoo ri jeju" daboin: nyid ge' .
51004003	Aseing Yesu da" no , thang mungdang: ri yo" kho" kyoo" wa shid re" amyeing" akhang" akhyoo" ayo , ge zi Mangsoo gi nyhang" ri byid: baja" ngoonu" shid re" we' akyu" dabo mho' nyid ge' - Khasu" wim gari Khristu da" no , thang mungdang: ri kho" kyoo" yoomo akhid" ngoo gi thung moo loung" jo .
51004004	Ngoo kho" kyoo" eung: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - bang bang yo" kho" kyoo" wa shid re" akyu" bo mho' nyid ge' .
51004005	Nanu" yo" yu da" amyeing" akhang" ri goolhoo: zoo: ci: yhoung: lho: aloem" ajeung" bang: yo' zoem" khau: uri-phajhi" bo nyid ge' .
51004006	Nanu" tid da" dang: khoin" joem gi-khanham we' gyo: da" dang: yo' myid' loem" zi nghoid baja" - nyangnu" doem , myed: da" dang: khoin: joem ri jo da" dang: phuid: yo" byid: sho' xei , too" ge' .
51004007	Nanu" da" jheddab mang nhung" phoo - kyed , da" moo" voin , su: - Aseing: da" moozoo" jid: zoo" moo bo pang" bo thoug da" dei zoo: nghoid da" Tukhiku gi ngoo yo' sen: da" lu dang: dangain" ri nanu" jhang tid kyoo" wam: bye .
51004008	Ngoonu" dangain" bang: khasu" bue" nyid boem da" khyoo: nanu" ri tid kyo" ziyo' nanu" da" nheigloem: emyid joem ri yoem: foin , byid: zi shug: goo" baja" - ngoo , gi nyang: ri nanu" jhang khyoo: nhang: kaid' zi nghoid .
51004009	Nya: tho' moo je" wigi nanu" jang" mo nghoid da-gye" kyed , da" jheddab mang nhung phoo - Onesimo ri we' ngoo nhang: kaid' bye - nya: eig yug gi hid: moo bue" khyoo: dangain" ri nanu" jang moo tid kyoo" goo" wa su .
51004010	Nga" da" thung: loung" luzoem" cang" - Aristaku we' nanu" ri vhu" kaid - hau: lho: Barnaba da" zoo: oug: Marku we' nanu" ri vhu" kaid' ( Nanu" jhang khyoo: Marku ju" re" lo uri lhoem: tau , yu byid: ge' ein: tid kaid' da" khyoo: joem ri ) nanu" yo" yu too" gu nghoid bye .
51004011	Yustu ein: we' myheung to" da" Yoshu we' nanu" ri vhu" kaid' hid: bang: seom" yug za: Mangso mungdain shid re" ngoo yo' dage" moo" voin , da" byen , cang" - loem" jeung" da" Yuda byu yi nghoid ago" - hid: bang: gi ngoori gye" bo pang" thoug bye: mo , nghoid ago" .
51004012	Nanu" jang" mo nghoid da" Khristu da" join , phoo'-Epaphra gi nanu" ri vhu" kaid' da-nanu" gi loem" jeung da" khyoo: moo geung: teung jo , wa ziyo' nheig boo ung: gyeung: ziyo' jhug zug da" Khristain yi bue" loo sho' Mangsoo vho: ngei khyoo: ri khyag cang: lho: nyang: gi nanu" da" shid re" gye" loem" jeung" myid' yo' akyu" mho' nyid .
51004013	Nyang: gi nanu" da" shid re" we' Ladoki yo' Herapoli moo nyid bang: shid re" we' moozoo" ri ashid: asoo" yoem: kaid' nyid zigi ngoo gi nya: shid re" sagsi: kham , byid .
51004014	Nga" da" jheddab moocid" sara: Luka yo' Dema gi nanu" ri vhu" kaid' ago" .
51004015	Ladoki moo nyid da" mang nhung" yi yo' ludaid' myhi , Numpha nya: yhoem: moo shau" go" wigi noku da" phung ri bo vhu" byid: kaid .
51004016	Hid: foin: kaid' da" mougsoug" ri nanu" bain' nghab yu lang" Ladoki phung byu yi ri we' nghab nhang: kaid' ge' - Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - Ladoki phung: ri foin: kaid' mougsoug" ri we' nanu" nghab yu" ge' .
51004017	Hau: Aseung: moozoo" ri voin , vu , wa shid re" nang ri ab , byid: to" da" yoovoin , ri bain' sho' zei: we' ein: wigi Arkhripo ri bo tid kyoo" byid: ge' .
51004018	Ngoo Polu nyang: - nga" lo , yo' he: da" vhu" kaid' mougsoug" ri lhid" kaid' zi nghoid - ngoo gi thung: moo loung" jo , uri we' nanu" ato" myhed , pyam goo" lhe" - Mangso jeju" gi nanu" yo' dage" dabo jo , baja" .
52001001	Polu - Sila ( Silas ) Sivanu ( Silvanus ) he: da" myeing eig ja: gi Greek mying: mo nghoid wigi dakhyoo" ti" nghoid . Kha: ja: ci: nghoid loug we' ashoid da - Polu yo' Timothi mo wigi Phoo , Mangsoo yo' Aseing Yesu nghoid da" Thesaloni voogung mo phung: byu yi jhang khyoo: mougsoug" lhid" foin: kaid . Jeju" yo' ngeo pyo da" khyoo: gi nanu" moo dajo , jo , baja" o" .
52001002	Ngoonu" gi nanu" dangain" bang: shid mo khanham we' jeju" ri dacoung" nghei nyid boem ziyo' ngoonu" da" akyu" mho' dang: moo nanu" da" myeing ri dabo kaid' mho' nyid boem .
52001003	Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" da" loem" jeung" khyoo: moo zei: nyang: khasu" zei: yhe: lo" nyid boem ziri we' nanu" da" jheddab e" myed yo' khayhi' gyeing" - moozoo" ri zei: so' nyid boem bye: ziri we' Aseing Yesu Khirstu moo nanu" da"
52001004	Mang nhung" yi we' Mangsoo nanu" ri jheddab wigi nya: byumyu" yi bue" lo boem wa shid re" khe: yu bye: khyoo: ri nanu" se' nyid boem bye .
52001005	Khasu" wim gari-ngoonu" gi hau" ngei bu: lu dang: gi , ri-mung dang: khyo" za: we' anghoid - yoem: vhoo" khyo" we' gyeungshang: da" venyi khyo" we' hau" ngei bu: lu dang: da" deingmain" khyoo: ri bain" sho' nyang: loem" jeung" da" myid' yo" we' nanu" jhang khyoo: ci: re" lho: kho" kyo" boem bye . Ngoonu" gi nanu" yo' dage" nyid nyid da" ayo , moo nanu" ge , loo wa shid re" ngoonu" khasu" koid lho: kangso' dei so" yen" bye: da" khyoo: - nanu" nyang: se' nyid boem bye .
52001006	Nanu" gi ngoonu" da" khoo" shid: yo' Aseing: da" khoo" shid: ri yu" yu cang lo" nyid boem bye - nanu" gi kyi" khyeug shen" yhen da" jam jau , myoo" sho' shau" boem nghoid loug we' hau: ngei bu: lu dang: ri gyeungshang: venyi khyo" yo" yu da" gau , yi ngei bu: kang: lung bu , ziyo' lhoem: yu boem abye: .
52001007	Houg: su nghoid yoomo nanu" gi Makedoni mung" yo' Akhaia mung" mo loem" jeung" da" byu yi shid khoin" moo akhyoo" again da" khoo" shid: daloem" bue" lo boem bye .
52001008	Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" jang" mo wigi hau" Aseung: da" mungdang: gi Makedoni mung" yo' Akhaia mung" goin" jang" moo fu" nheung lo" ziza: we' anghoid loo - Mangsoo moo nanu" da" loem" jeung" loem , khau: khyoo: ri we' joyoo khyi khang" moo" moo byo ngam , loo" bye - Koug: su" nghoid yoomo nanu" ri citid' cang aboo loo .
52001009	Nanu" jang" moo ngoonu" ju" re" da" uri nanu" gi kha: khyo" ngoonu" ri lhoem: tau yu boem bye: da" khyoo: ri we' nanu" gi dadei nyid ziyo' deingmain" nyid da" Mangsoo ri noku loem , khoug: wa shid' re" gug ngu soolhoo: joem rinung phoug pyam lho: Mangso jhang khyoo: khasu" phoug leung: lo boem khyoo: ri we' .
52001010	Moug: khung: moug: di khyo" ju" ri" wa da" Mangso nya: zoo: ri dalang" nyid boem ziri we' hau" byu yi dangain" mo , gi tid fu" nyid boem abye: go - Hau: nya: zoo: Yesu gi shid: bye: jang" mo Mangso wigi doem dei to'' loo nhang: yoomo ju" loo wa da" Mangso nheig yo: lo bidnyid mo , nanu" ri khyoid khyi: yu su: nghoid nyid .
52002001	Mang nhung" yi we" - nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoonu" re" da" khyoo: gi-akoem: be" be , anghoid khyoo: ri nanu' nyang: si' gu nghoid abye: go .
52002002	Ngoonu" gi nanu" nyid da" Thesaloni voogung khyoo: ari" shi" uri Philipi voo gung moo ngoonu" ri khayhi' shen" yhen da" khyoo: yo' juang" yi shau" ziri nanu" se' nyid bye - houg: yhang: ti" adu aveing" go" da" thoutheung khyoo: myoo" sho' boo nghoid loug we' nanu" ri Mangso jang" mo ngeibu: lu dang: yo" tid kyoo" wa shid re" ngoonu" da" Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri asho' agyug da" yoem: moo" byid: too" bye .
52002003	Ngoonu" gi shoid da" khyoo: yo' asain asen" khyo" khoug: lhung: lhoung: ziyo' yug khang" moo" ri mhoug noug fain" nau myid' yo' nanu" ri tid poin" tid kyeing" nau zi anghoid .
52002004	Hougsu" koid wa gung khoo: - ngoonu" gi Mangsoo tid nhang": ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - khanham we' da tid nyid boem-khasu" wim gari Mangsoo gi-nanu" gi moin: yi" mo , nghoid bye: ziri soeb , myang bye: mo , nghoid yoomo hau" ngei bu: lu dang: kho" kyoo" wa shid mo loem , too" bye - ngoonu" gi byu yi vho: ngei boem wa khyo" yoem: kaid' nyid mo , anghoid - nanu" myid soin: da" khyoo: joem ri phoid: sho: pe: yu" se' da" Mangsoo ri vho: ngei nhang: wa shid re" yoem: dakaid' nyid boem .
52002005	Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" goo" lhoo: za: se' nyid boem bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoonu" gi nanu" jhang khyoo: adeung amain" khyo" mhau' mhoin" da" dang: tid zoore" - houg: su" anghoid lang" gi vhoo: boo myo , no , khyoo: ri nghoeb , to" lho: ju" re" boem , zi anghoid - hau: khyoo: moo Mangsoo nyang: sagsi: nghoid nyid .
52002006	Ngoonu" gi sube" wigicoung" nghei byid: da" khyoo: - nanu" jang" mo , we' goo" tu: byu yi jang" mo we' yo" yu sho' yoem: kaid' nyid zi anghoid .
52002007	Ngoonu' gi Khristu da" lagyoo: yi nghoid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" jang" mo akho: akhang" yo' mho' wa ga: riyo" mho' nghoid loug we' ngoonu" gi nanu" yo' dage" nyid nyid shi" ayo , moo nya: zooyi ri yu" goin' yu" coung: da" nya: myhi' yhang: ti" - nu" nham ziyo' yu" goin' yu" coung: boem bye .
52002008	Nanu" gi ngoonu" da" atho' tid loo: sho' jheddab bang: bue" lo boem bye - Mangso jang" mo ngei bu: lu dang: - we' anghoid - ngoonu" da" kangso rilang" gam byid: pyam wa zigi jen" jen" nghoid nyid boem .
52002009	mang nhung" yi we" - ngoonu" khayhi' moozoo" zei lid loo bye: khyoo: ri gyeing" nyang: nanu" boin: so" nyid boem - nanu" ri ce" yoolid: we' afoin: - ajoin , zoo: baja" - ngoonu" gi ngoonu" nya: da" voem: doug: khu: moozoo" ri nyid" ri myen" ri yoem: kaid' zei: so' wigi Mangso ngei bu: lu dang: ri kho" kyo" lo boem bye .
52002010	Loem" jeung" nyid mo , nanu" da" shid khoin" moo ngoonu" da" aved asam" joem gi gyeungshang: wigi deingmain" ziyo' ce" yooboo we' abo zigi nanu" shid' re" nanu" nyang: sagsi: nghoid boem bye - houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" Mangsoo we' sagsi: nghoid nyid bye .
52002011	Nya: phoo gi nya: zooyi ri yu" goin , coung: nyid yhang: ti" - nanu" yug khang" moo" ri ngoonu" yu" goin , coung: lid loo bye: khyoo: ri nanu" nyang: se' nyid gu nghoid boem bye .
52002012	Ngoonu" gi nanu" ri yoem: byid: khyoo: yo' nheig teing byid: khyoo: koid lid lo yu" boem bye - nya: da" mungdain moo yo" bo vang zoo: wa ziyo' myonhoo: phung yoeb , yo" bo kham: yu goo" baja" ga - nanu' ri khe: yu da" Mangsoo ri vho: ngei nhang: da" kangso' dei khyoo: moo daso" lo" nyid wa shid re" ngoonu" gi xo loo: xo' jhoug" byid: nyid boem bye .
52002013	Hau: lho: wigi Mangso jeju" ri anoo: atheing: loo - coung" nghei byid: nyid wa da" khyoo: - gootu: dakhaid bo jo , shi" - nanu" jang" moo ngoonu" hau: Mangso da" mungdang: ri re" kho" kyo" da" uri byu yi da" mungdang: ri yhang: ti" anghoid - Mangso mungdang: nghoid deung nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" shau" gyo: wigi loem" jeung" ziyo' lhoem: kham: yu boem bye - hau: mungdang ri loem" jeung" bang: nanu" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo moo" zei: nyid .
52002014	Mang nhung" yi we" - nanu" moo bue" lo da" thoung" shau" khyoo: joem gi Yuda mung" mo Mangso phung nghoid da" Khristu da" byu yi moo we' thoung" shau" nyid boem - nanu" gi nyhang" nya: moug: mo byu yi da" lo , moo shen" yhen khyoo: thoung" shau" yhang: ti" ngoonu" we' Yuda byumyu" yi da" lo , moo thoung" shau" nyid boem bye .
52002015	Yuda byu yi ein: bang: gi Aseing Yesu ri we' Lapi: yi ri we' said' pyam nyid bang: nghoid wigi ngoonu" ri we' shen" yhen nyid bang: nyid nyangnu" gi Mangsoo vho: ngei khyo" akoid boem - yug khang" mo" da" aveing" go" da" gyi bue" nyid boem .
52002016	Tung: bau byumyu" yi khyoid yu zi shau" wa shid re" houg: yo' sen: da" mungdang: ngoonu" dakho" kyo" ri lang" nyangnu" gi toung: nghoed , pyam wa shid re" yoem: kaid' lo boem ago - he: lid khyo" nyangnu" shoid vhang: lid lo yu" bye: da" yooboo joem ri joeb , sho' koid boem abye: go" - Houg: yoomo lo thang jang" moo gi Mangsoo nheig yo: da" khyoo: gi nyangnu" da" atho' moo ju" gyo" loo bye .
52002017	Ngoonu' we' mang nhung" yi we" - nheig" loem: ung: khoug: khyo" anghoid - gung du: khyo" za: dayo , daboin: nanu" rigye" myid boin: nyid boem ziyo' doem yo" shau" goo" wa shid re" gye' yoem: kaid' nyid boem .
52002018	Ngoonu" gi nanu" jhang khyoo: gye" loo nau , boem - ngoo nya: gung nyang: nanu" jang" moo doem ju" ri" wa shid re" dalheing: za: anghoid yoem: gye" kaid' yu" bye - nghoid loug we' satan gi ngoonu" ri baid' toem nyid bye .
52002019	Ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu doem ju" re" uri nya: shid' khoin" moo gooji hang" we' anghoid - nanu" kyeing" za: ngoonu" da" nheig byu gau yi joyoo yo' oung: doid lo" da" phau: khuang bidmug nghoid nyid .
52002020	Gyeing" nyang: nanu" gi ngoonu" da" myonhoo: phung yoeb yo' gau , yi ngei pyo: joyoo nyang: nghoid bye .
52003001	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi ayo" zeung: nyid boem loo yoomo Athen voogung moongoonu" nyang: kyeing" - nyid gyoo" khoo , wa ein: myid' phyed' boem lho .
52003002	Khristu da" ngei bu: lu dang: kho" kyo" jang" moo ngoonu" dage" za: moozoo" ri voin , vu , nyid da" ngoonu" da" mang nhung" phoo Timothi ri nhang: kaid' boem bye .
52003003	Nanu" mo hang" nghoid loug we' hid: akhid" thoung shau" nyid da" shen" yhen jam , jau khyoo: yoomo loem" jeung" khyoo: moo adei aloeb , goo" baja" - nanu" ri nheig teing ung: teung yoem: byid: wa shid re" nanu" jhang khyoo: nyang: ri nhang: kaid' boem - hid: su" shen" yhen nyid da" khyoo: joem ri ngoonu" thoung" shau" nyid boem zigi yha" shid' re" Mangsoo nyang: myid' soin: to" da" khyoo: - dakhyam" dayam , nghoid nyid ein: wigi nanu" nyang: se' nyid boem bye .
52003004	Khasu" wim gari goonu" gi-shen" yhen , pyi: sho: zi shau" ca" boem da" khyoo: nanu" yo' dage' ngoonu" nyid nyid shi" re nyang - nanu" ri lhid' ca" khyoo: tid poin" too" khoo , bye - houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" akhid" khyag nyang: thoung" shau" nyid bye: ziri nanu" gi goo" lhoo: za: se' nyid boem bye .
52003005	Ngoo gi xo' lho: atho' lang" nyid loo: yoomo nanu" da" loem" jeung" khyoo: khasu" bue" nyid da" khyoo: ri se' yu wa shid re" Timothi ri ngoo nhang: kaid' bye - gyeing" nyang: nanu" gi yu zhadain gung" lau" jang" moo bo cang lo" byug boem wigi ngoonu" da" yoem: kaid' loo bye: khyoo: joem gi akoem: be: be: abue" loo" nhang: noug .
52003006	Akhid" Timothi gi nanu" jang" moo doem ju" loo bye: nghoid rigi nanu" moo loem" jeung" khyoo: yo' jheddab khyoo: gi je myo: loo bye: ziri gau , kham: yu ge da" lu dang: ri voin , ju" loo bye-nanu" gi ngoonu" ri khanham nghoid loug we' goolhoo: za: myid' boin: jheddab nyid boem tho' moo agoo" - nanu" ri ngoonu" gye" shau" goo" nau , ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" nanu" we' ngoonu" ri shau" myang goo: nau nyid boem da" khyoo: ri lo tid kyoo" bye .
52003007	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo mang nhung" yi we" - ngoonu" gi yau: khe" jam jau ziyo' kyi" kyeung zi shau" nyid da" ayo , moo nanu" da" khyoo: ri yo" shaug" gyoo: yoomo yoem: vhoo" yo" yu nyid boem bye - hau: zigi nanu" da" loem" jeung" nheigloem: yoomo yoem: yo" yu khyoo: nghoid .
52003008	Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" gi Aseing: moo dadeing: daloem: za: bue" wigi kangso dei khyoo: moo geing: geing: teing teing yab , jo , yoomo ngoonu" nheig shid: khyo" yo" dei nyid boem bye .
52003009	Akhid" koem gi nanu" yoomo ngoonu" da" Mangsoo ri jeju" boin: coung" byid: nyid boem bye - nanu" yoomo Aseung: da" shid' khoin" moo ngoonu" yo" yu da" ngei bu: khyo: shid' re" ngoonu" nyang: ri jeju" yo" boin: coung" ngei nyid boem bye .
52003010	Ngoonu" gi nanu" yo' myo , moo gyo , nyang: shau" myang goo" wa ziyo' nanu" da" loem" jeung" khyoo: moo ca" nyid shi" gu: ri joeb , byeung" loo nhang: wa shid re" ngoonu" da" e" myed , dangain" ziyo' nya: jhang mho' nyid boem .
52003011	Ngoonu" da" phoo mangsoo nyang: yo' Aseing Yesu Khristu gi ngoonu" ri nanu" jhang khyoo: yo" re" loo wa khyoo: ri nyheing byid: baja" .
52003012	Nyang: cang" nyang: da" atho' moo we' byu gooji yi dangain" bang: da" atho' moo we' nanu" to" to" da" jheddab nheigloem: gi je je gyi: lo wigi Hau: da" jheddab nheigloem: gi nanu" da" atho' moo ngoonu" to" to" da" jheddab nheigloem: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - gyi: loo wa shid' re" - Aseing: gi nanu" ri pang" thoug byid: baja" o .
52003013	He: khyoo: khyo" wigi nyang: gi nanu" ri pang" thoug geung: teing loo nhang: wa zi nghoid - yha" da" Aseing: yesu gi nya: d a" gyeungshang: bang: yo' dage" doem , ju" re" da" uri nanu" gi yha" phoo Mangso da" shid' khoin" moo joeb , byeung" lho: gyeungshang: moin: yi" mo , bue" lo boem wa zi nghoid .
52004001	Lo" thang jang" moo gi-mang nhung yi we" - mangsoo vho: ngei wa shid re" nanu" gi kha: khyo" kangso' dei nyid ca" da" khyoo: ngoonu" jang" mo nanu" jhau" yu abye: go - nanu" gi hau: khyoo: khyo" nyang: kangso dei nyid boem bye - hau: tho' moo je" yo" zei: soo , wa shid re" Yesu Khristu da" myeing khyang" khoug: moo nau" ri ngoonu" mho' tung" pain: joug jhoin" kaid' boem .
52004002	Khasu" wim ga: ri khate" da" khyoo" shed' dang: joem ri Aseing Yesu da" akho: akhang" yo' ngoonu" byid: too" bye: ziri gi nanu" nyang: se' nyid boem bye .
52004003	Ngoo gi nanu" ri gyeungshang: mo , bue" loo nhang: nau , ziyo' nyam , da" moozoo" mo bain' sho' yo" loid loo" wa shid' re" vho: ngei nyid .
52004004	Nanu" yug gi yi dayug yo' dayug gi nyang: nya: da" yhoem: seing: myhi' yo' gyeungshang: lho: yu" yung" sho' khakhyo" nyid wa da" khyoo: ri si' ca" .
52004005	Mangsoo ri ase' da" tungbau byumyu" yi yhang: ti" - nyam , mhain: da" nheigloem: age boo .
52004006	Hid: yhang: te" da" moozoo" moo nanu" mo hang" nghoid loug we' nyang: nya: da"Khristain mang nhung phoo ri shoid vhang: da" khyoo: - houg: su" anghoid lang" gi mang: nhung" pho , da" atho' moo lhoid , sham: zain: da" khyoo: ge , koid - he: khyoo: xang: shed" moo nanu" ri tid kyo" yu" bye nghoid yoomo Mangsoo gishoid vhang: bang: ri shen" yhen wa da" khyoo: nanu" rithain: thain: nyang: tid poin' kaid' bye .
52004007	Mangsoo gi nyangnu" ri agyeing" ashang: da" - kangso' dei khyoo: moo kangso' dei nyid wa shid re" khe: yu to" zi anghoid - gyeungshang: da" kangso' dei khyoo: moo lhid wa shid re" dakhe: yu to .
52004008	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo he: da" jhau" mho' khyoo: ri ngeug pyam mo , hang" nghoid sho loug we' - byu yi ri anghoid - gyeungshang: da" venyi ri byid: kaid' su: Mangsoo ri ngeug pyam su: nghoid .
52004009	Nanu" da" loem" jeung" mang nhung" phoo ri jheddab wa da" khyoo: yo' sen: lho: wigi ngoo nanu" jhang khyoo: lhid" kaid' anoo" loo - nyang: cang" nyang: jheddab go" nyid wa shid re" Mangso wigi jhau" mhoo , byid: nyid ziri nanu' shau" kham: yu boem bye .
52004010	Gyeing" nyang: ga: rigi nanu" gi Makedoni mung" goin" jang" mo Khristain mang nhung" yi dangain" bang: yo' zoem" khau: jang" moo houg: khyo" jheddab go" da" khyoo: ri cang lo" boem bye - houg: yoomo mang nhung yi we" - nanu" da" jheddab nheigloem: je gyi: loo wa shid re" nanu" ri ngoonu" mho' nyid .
52004011	Nanu" gi xang: shed" ri ngoonu" tid pyeung: too" kho' ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - myen , jham" za: cang yhe: kangso' dei nyid wa shid re" we' byu gooji yi da" khyoo: moo abo tid phyo' lhu: lheug yen" wa shid re" we' nyang: nya: da" voem: doug: khu: moo' zoo" ri nyang: nyang: hougsu" da zei: zo: nyid wa shid' re" we' myid' soin: to" boem goo" baja" .
52004012	Khyoo: he: khaid khyo" wigi nanu' giloem" jeing" bang: phung byu anghoid mo , da" - phau" myang: khyoo: ri shau" kham: yu boem wa zi nghoid - hau: tho' moo gootu: nanu" da" ca" yo , khyoo: yo' sen: lho: hang" ri we' anghe: khoug ca" lo: boem wa zi nghoid .
52004013	Ngoonu" da" mang nhung" yi we' nheig byu jang: ayoo" lo: da" byu gooji yi yhang: ti" - nanu" koug shu: zi ashug" goo" baja" nyhang" gi shid: loo" bang: yo' sen: lho: wigi hau: deingmain" da" khyoo: nanu" ri se' gyoo: nhang: nau .
52004014	Aseing Yesu gi shid: jang" mo doem dei to' . lo da" khyoo: ri nanu" loem" jeung" nyid boem nghoid rigi Yesu ri loem" jeung" lho: shid: lo" byug bang: ri we' Mangsoo gi Yesu yo' dage" - nya: jhang khyoo: shu" loo wa zi nghoid - ein: ngoonu" loem" jeung" nyid boem .
52004015	Akhid" vhoo: moo ngoonu" ri jhoug" byid: to" da" khyoo: gi Aseing Yesu nyang: jhoug" byid: da" khyoo: nghoid bye - Aseing Yesu nyang doem ju" re" da" bidnyid moo ngoonu" dei nyid shi" bang: gi shid: loo" bye: bang: da" shid' khyoo: dajhi' we' yhe: loo" lang" wa zi anghoid .
52004016	Hau" Aseung: da" yoid nyho: amyeing" thui: yo' mauglagyo: agyi da" thui: - Mangso laboo" thui: zeing yo' Aseing: nyang: moug: khung: moug: di mo gyoo" loo wa zi nghoid - Khristu riloem" jeung" lho: shid: loo" bang: gi xang: shed" moodei to'' lo boem wa zi nghoid .
52004017	Hau: thang: ri hau: Aseing: yo' moug: laid' phyoo" moo shau" goo" wa shid re" ngoonu" dei nyid shi" mo , gi shid: loo" bye: mo , yo' dage" jhoem" moug" phyoo" moo shu" do , lo" zi shau" boem wa nghoid wigi ngoonu" gi hau" Aseing: yo' dage" khanham we' danyid nyid wa zi nghoid .
52004018	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo he: dang: joem yo' nanu" nyang: cang" nheig teung yoem: byid: go" nyid ge' .
52005001	Mang nhung yi we" - he: mungdang" khyoo: bue" loo wa da" bidnyid yo' ayo , - khanham nghoid wa khyoo: ri nanu" jhang lhid" kaid' cang aboo loo .
52005002	Khasu" wim gari Aseing: doem ju" ri" wa bidnyid gi myen" ri khoug" su" re" yhang: ti" - ju" ri" wa nghoid ziri nanu" nyang: voin: tang: si' bye .
52005003	Byu yi gi jo , moo jo , myenjham" lho: wigi gau: nyu: bye ga: tid goo" wa zi nghoid - houg: su" ga: tid uri - zoonu" gung nghoid su: gi zoo: khu: wa shid' re" bidnyid noo no re" yhang: ti" - ci: amyid' too" lo: za: hau: byo , yoin" lo" khyoo: gi nyid' dain' tung nanu" jang" moo ju" loo wa zi nghoid wigi byu yi gi hang" we' yo" loid , loo' wa zi anghoid .
52005004	Nghoid loug we' mang nhung yi we" - nanu" koem gi moug coid khoug: moo nyid nyid , mo , anghoid boem lo: yoomo hau" Aseing: doem ju" re bidnyid gi khoug" su: yhang: ti" nyid , dain' tung" nanu" ri re" myhi: wa zi nghoid .
52005005	Khasu" wim gari nanu" dangain" bang: gi bidbang mo nya: zoo: yi nghoid nyid boem bye: yoomo nyid" khyoug mo nya: myid: nya: zoo: yi we' nghoid boem bye - ngoonu" gi myen" mo nya: zoo: nya: myid: yi we' anghoid moug: coid' mo nya: zoo: nya: myid: yi we' anghoid loo .
52005006	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi byu gooji yi yhang: ti" ayhoeb , myhed jo , boem loo: za: gyeung: boin: zoore" - gyeing gyeing: koid lho: lhed' zed" nyid boem shang .
52005007	Byu yi gi myen" ayo , moo yhoeb , jo , boem ago - myen" ayo , moo yhid: shug yed , nyid boem ago" .
52005008	Nghoid loug we' nyhang" nu" gi bidbang mo nya: zoo: nya: myid: yi nghoid nyid boem yoomo-boin: gyeung: ziyo' zed" lhed' nyid boem ca" - Ngoonu" gi loem" jeung" khyoo: yo' jheddab ein: da" yang gang nghoeb ri nghoeb , ci: lho: wigi ngoonu" da" khyoid yu khyoo: ri nheig byu nyid ein: da" joto' mug ri zhoung" ci: shang .
52005009	Mangsoo gi nya: nheig khoo" yo" da" khyoo: ri kham , zoo: wa shid re" nyhang" ri khyen: yu t o" zi anghoid - Aseing Yesu Khyo" wigi khyoid yu da" khyoo: ri yo" seung: yu wa shid re" khyen: yu to" zi nghoid .
52005010	Khristu doem ju , re" da" uri gi nyhang" gi shid: byug boem wam: bye: nghoid loug we' dei nyid boem shi" nghoid loug we' nyang: yo' dage" kang so shau" dei nyid wa shid re" nyang: gi yha" shid' re" bo shid: kham: byid: bye .
52005011	Khyoo: he: khaid yoomo nanu" akhid" koid nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - dayug yo' dayug nyang: cang" nyang: yoem: byid: go" ziyo' pang" goo" thug go" khyoo: ri dakoid nyidge' .
52005012	Mang nhung" yi we" nanu" moo moo" voin , nyid banhg: ri we' nanu" ri khyoo: shed , vhu" she: - jhoug" byid: mhoo , byid: wa shid re" Mangso wigi nyheung soin' too" bang: ri goolhoo: za: zei: eung: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - phau" myang: nyid ge" ein: ngoonu" joug jhoin" yoe: byid: kaid .
52005013	Nyang: nu" voin , vu , da" moozoo" jid: zoo" yoomo nyangnu" ri gye" nyang: phau" myang: ziyo' jheddab khyo" dakoid nyid ge' - nanu" nya: da" akhoug: moo we' nyang: cang" nyang: gei pyo: myne , jham" khyo" dazoem" khau: nyid ge' .
52005014	Hau: lho: mang nhung yi we" - nei" nyid bang: ri tid poin" tid kyeing" go" nyid ge' - nheigloem: nge loem: nge nyid bang: ri nheig teing ung: teing byid: nyid ge' . hoem: nu: bang: ribo pang" bo thug byid: nyid ge' - dangain" mo , da" atho' moo zeung: kham' nyid ge' .
52005015	Hang" ri nghoid loug-shoid' su: ri shoid khyo" latoo: aphug goo" goo" - nanu" nyang: cang" moo we' byu dangain" bang: shid' re" we' ge da" moo" zei: wa jang" moo nanu" da" nheigloem: moo khanham we' soin' jen" too" ge' .
52005016	Kha: nham , we' dagau yi nyid ge' .
52005017	Anoo: atheing: loo: za: akyu" damho , nyid ge' .
52005018	Khyoo khaid gu khang" moo" moo jeju" boin: lho: coung" nghei nyid ge' hau: zigi Khristu moo nanu" da" kangso' dei da" khyoo: yo' sen: lho: Mangso d" myid vho: khyoo: nghoid nyid .
52005019	Gyeungshang: da" Venyi ri akyo' xeung ci: goo" .
52005020	Mangso venyi ri vang nhang: lho: kho" kyo" da" mungdang: ri aphoug" akhyoid akoid nyid goo" .
52005021	Dangain" ziri leug kyeung yu" lho: wigi ge da" khyoo: ri lhoem: yu wigi lhei , teung too" ge' .
52005022	Age da" akhyeing" ashoeb khyoo: - dangain" ziri jang" pyam nyid ge' .
52005023	Nyhang" ri ngei pyo: myen , jham" khyoo: byid: nyid da" Mangsoo gi nanu" ri khyoo: khaid gu: khang" moo" moo ced" yung" ced" shang: lho: wigi ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu doem ju" re" da" uri nanu" da" venyi nheigloem: yo' gung du: goin" ziri yooboo adab loo: sho' zung" lhug goin , coung" byid: baja" .
52005024	Nanu" ri khe: yu su: gi kyed' su: nghoid nyid yoomo he: khyoo: ri zei: byid: loo wa zi nghoid .
52005025	Mang nhung" yi we" - ngoonu" da" shid re" we' akyu" bo mho' byid: ge' .
52005026	Loem" jeing" bang: dangain" ri gyeungshang: da" aved , asam" ( gyeungshang: da" boobug yo' ) ga: wigi lagyoo: Polu tid nyid - he: khyoo: gi bidvang mungdain gyoo: mo thung" khin' nghoid wigi nyangnu" bidthu shoid mo mungdain: bang: gi ci: noug mo , ci: lho: aci: bang: myo: - ( Ngoonu" nyang: cang" shau" doem go" lho: lo , zei: ze: go" lid gootu: nghoid ) ziyo' lo , zei: shau" zei: goo" ge' .
52005027	Hid: su" foin: kaid' da" mougsoug" ri loem" jeing" bang: dangain" mo , ri nghab kyoo" wa shid re" hau: Aseing: ab , byid: to" da" amyeing" yo' nanu" ri ngoo pyyeung: kaid .
52005028	Ngoonu" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" jeju" gi nanu" yo' dage" dajo , jo , baja" o" .
53001001	Polu - Sila - Timothi ngoonu" gi ngoonu" da phoo Mang soo: yo' Aseing Yesu Khristu byu yi nghoid da" - Thesa loni phung: bang: jhang khyoo: mougsoug" doem , lhid" kaid' boem .
53001002	Ngoonu" da" nya: phoo Mangsoo yo' Aseing Yesu Khristu gi nanu" ri jeju" yo' ngei pyo: da" khyoo: dabyid: nyid baja" o" .
53001003	Jheddab , da" mang nhung" yi we" - nanu" da" khyoo ; yo' sen: lho: wigi Mangso jeju" ri nyhang" khanham we' coung" nghei nyid boem ca: . Hougsu" coung" nghei byid: da" khyoo: moo ngoonu" zei: wa zigi ngoonu" nyang: zei: ca" khyoo: nyang: nghoid bye - khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" da" loem" jeung" khyoo: gi gye" gyi: sheung: loo bye: ziyo' byu yi ri jheddab da" e" myed we' je" je ; gyi: sheung: yang" deung lo nyid boem bye .
53001004	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" nyang: nanu" da" khyoo: ri Mangso da" phung yi moo gau yi phau: khuang zoo" re" tid fu" kyo" yen" boem - ngoonu" gi nanu" xo' lho: wigi thoung" shau" zo: nyid da" shen" yhen ziyo' kyi: khyeug da" khyoo: ri tid gau , phau: khuang yen" boem .
53001005	He: khyoo: joem dangain" gi Mangso tarha" dang: phyed khyoo: deung ziri sagsi: toin" shid nyid hau: da" akyu" jeju" yoomo nanu" gi nya: da" mungdain yo' moin: yi" bang: bue" lo boem wa zi nghoid - hau" shid re" ein: nanu" gi kyi" kyeig jam jau zi shau" kham nyid boem bye .
53001006	Mangsoo gi tarha" dain: khyoo: ri koid wa zi nghoid yoomo nanu" ri kyi" khyeug jam jau shau" nhang: mo , da" atho' moo kyi" khyeug jam jau doem toug" byid: wa zi nghoid .
53001007	Nyang: gi kyi" khyeug jam jau shau" nyid da" nanu" yo' dage" ngoonu" ri we' dajhi' dathang: khyam: sa khyoo: ri shau" yu nhang: wa zi nghoid - nyang: gi yoem: moo" bo da" mau: lagyoo ; yi yo" dage" myiyham: doem yo' moug: khung: mo thu re" da" uri .
53001008	Mangsoo gi nyang: ri a lhoem: yu ziyo' ngeug pyam nyid bang: yo' yha" Aseing Yesu da" khyoo: ngei bu: lu dang: ri atam" gyoo: bang: ri shen" yhen wa zi nghoid .
53001009	Nyang: nu" ri gi Aseing: da" shid' khoin" mo gang: loo" nhang: lho: nya: yoem: moo" bo da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , yo' byed , gang: lo" ein: da" pyaid moo too" moo lhu: phyo' lhu: shoin pyam' da" shid: gyoin , ri shau" boem wa zi nghoid .
53001010	Aseing: gi nyang: doem ju" re" da" bidnyid moo nya: byumyu" yi dangain" bang: da" shid' moo myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri we' shau" kham: yu boem wa nghoid - ngoonu" kho" kyo" da" mungdang: ri nanu" loem" jeung" nyid boem bye: yoomo Aseing: ri coung" nghei myonhoo: byid: da" jang" moo nanu" we' bo boem bye .
53001011	Khyoo: he: khaid yoomo nanu" da" shid' re" ngoonu" khanham we' akyu" dabo mho' nyid boem - nanu' gi mangsoo khe: yu shau" bang: da" kangso' dei khyoo: yo' moin: yi" khyo" kangso' dei nyid goo" baja" - ngoonu" gi Mangso jang" mo akyu" bo mho' nyid boem - nyang: gi nya ; da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , zeing yo' nanu' da" ge , lho khyoo ; ri bui" nhang: nau , da" nheigloem: boo moo boo ri joeb , byeung" loo nhang: wigi nanu" da" loem" jeung" moozoo" jid: zoo" joem ri zei: pain' byid: baja" .
53001012	Hid: khyo" wigi ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu da" voolang myeing" khyang" gi nanu" yoomo doug bang loo wa ziyo' Yha" da" mangsoo yo' Aseing Yesu Khristu da" jeju" gang mo nanu" moo we' hau: phung" yoeb bang gi yo" kham: yu wa .
53002001	Nga" mang nhung" yi we" - yha" Aseing Yesu Khristu doem ju" ri" wa khyoo: yo' = Aseing: yo' dage" zoeb , foem: wa khyoo: yo' sen: wigi nanu" ri ngoo mho' kaid' nau zigi
53002002	Aseing: doem ju" ri wa bidnyid ju" bye - ga: wigi byu yi tid da" dang: yoomo nanu" da" myid soin: khyoo: moo dalheing: dam nheigloem: myid nhoung lo" ziyo' amyen , akhyoid , lhu: khang lo zi abui" baja" - nanu" ri tid poin" tid kyeung" kaid' - houg: yhang: te" da" dang: gi ngoonu" lapi ; dang: tid uri houg: su" anghoid lang" gi moug" soug" lhid" uri bo da" dang: nghoid wa" - ga: myid ri myid yu" goo" wa nghoid .
53002003	Kha: khyo" nghoid loug we' nanu' ri hang" wigi we' ayo" mhoid" goo" baja" - khasu" wim gari thang" thang da" Mangsoo ri gyi koid zi abui" shi" ri ngarai" mung" khyoo: khyo , pyam' zi shau" wa nghoid nyid hau: akhyeung" su: athu' loo shi" da" uri hau" bidnyid ju loo zi anghoid .
53002004	Nyang: gi ; byu yi noku loem khau: nyid phara ein: ja: nyid moo nyid ri thoutheung shai" go" lho: nya: gung du: ri nyang: houg: dangain" da" atho' moo phung" yoeb , je boo su: nghoid ga: wigi tu: to' coung" nghei loo wa nyang: gi Mangso noku yhoem: khoug: moo lang" yhe: vang zhoung: jo , lho: wigi nya: gung ri nyang: Mangsoo: nghoid - ga: tid fu" nyid wa zi nghoid .
53002005	Ngoo gi nanu" yo' dage" nyid shi" uri hid: bang: da" khyoo: dangain" nanu" ri tid kyo" yu" bye: ziri nanu" aboin: loo: goo" la" .
53002006	Houg: su" yhi' nghoid loug we' hau: khyoo ; akhid" abue" loo sho' kyo' xeung ci: zi daja: ja: bo nyid hau: zigi ce: noem nghoid ziri nanu" si' gu nghoid bye - nya: ayo ju" lang" hau: akhyeing" su ; gi thu' loo wa zi nghoid .
53002007	Se , gyoo: ja: zau" yhoem" to" da" akhyeung" da" yoem: so' gI ; akhid" lang" moo" zei: nyid bye - nghoid loug we' toem , xeung too" su ; ri nya: joyoo mo thoid shu" pyam' da' ayo , aju" shi" ri hau: khyoo ; bue" loo wa zi anghoid .
53002008	Hau: thang: rigi he: da" akhyeing" su: ri myang thu loo wa zi nghoid - nghoid loug we' Aseing Yesu ju" re" uri gi hau: akhyeing" su: ri nya: nhoid' mo thu da" so' yo' said' pyam lho: nya: da" doug bang phung" yoeb , yo' lhu: mhoin' pyam wa zi nghoid .
53002009	Hau: akhyeung" su: gi zhadain da" yoem: so' khyo" ju" ri wa zi nghoid . yoomo mhau' da" alhoo: again aja: ja: yo' mau" pho" moozoo" ri koid shug loo wa zi nghoid .
53002010	Hau: tho' moo gootu: byo , yoin" shau" bang: da" atho' moo akhyeing" ashoeb , khyo: mhau' fain" vo da" khyoo: aja: ja: koid wa zi nghoid - nyangnu" gi khyoid yu shau" wa shid re" hau ; deingmain" da" khyoo ; ri alhoem: yu ziyo' avhoo: angei , boem yoomo nyangnu" nyang: byo , yoin" shid: joem: lo" boem wa zi nghoid .
53002011	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo hau: da" shoid vhang: khyoo: ri nyangnu" loem" jeung" boem sho' Mangsoo gi hau: yo" loem" shoid' nhang: da" yoem: so' - nyangnu" moo moo" ri zei ; wa shid re" nhang: kaid .
53002012	Hau: da" moo" thang: gi hau: deingmain" khyoo ; ri aloem" jeing" wigi yoobo da" pyo: khyoo: moo cang loo" mo , dangain" gi tarha" dang: phyed , zi shau" boem wa nghoid .
53002013	Aseung: da" jheddab mang nhung" yi we" - nanu" yoomo ngoonu" gi Mangso da" jeju" ri khanham we' yo" coung" nghei nyid baja" - Khasu" wim gari mangsoo: gi ngoonu ri gyeungshang: da" byu yi bue" loo nhang: da" venyi yoem: so' khyo" we'-deing main" khyoo: ri loem" jeung da" nanu" laloem lakhoug: we' xang: shed" mo , khyoid yu shau" bang: khyo" wigi nanu' ri khyen: yu bye .
53002014	Mangsoo gi nanu" ri ngoonu" kho" kyo" da" hau: ngei bu: lu dang: khyo" wigi khe: yu zi nghoid bye - nyang: gi yha" da" Aseing Yesu myonhoo: phung" yoeb , khyo" nanu" kham: yu eung: da" gam , boem ri yo" yu goo" baja" ein: wigi khe: yu to" zi nghoid .
53002015	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo mang nhung" yi we" - ngoonu" da" kho" kyo" mungdang: khyo" we' nanu" ri ngoonu" jhoug" byid: bye: da" hau: deingmain" da" khyoo ; moo geing: geing: teing teing theung shang" yab , jo , lho: pu" lhang" too" be .
53002016	Yha" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu nyang: yo' ngoonu" jheddab nyid da" phoo Mangsoo gi nya: jeju yo' ngoonu" ri geung: teung da" yoem: vhoo" khyo" ge , lho , da" nheig byu joyoo byid: too" bye .
53002017	Nanu" ri we' ge , lho , da" khyoo: - khanham we' koid nyid wa ziyo' tid sang: wa shid re" yoem: teing byid: nyid boem .
53003001	Ngoonu" da" mang nhung" yi we" - lo" thang moo nanu" ri pyeung" kaid' nau da" khyoo: gi Aseung: da" mungdang: gi nanu" moo bue" lo yhang: ti" - xo' lho: wigi gye" myab , khyo" byo ngam loo" wa shid re" phoug" tab zoore" kham: yu goo" baja" - ngoonu" shid re" akyu" bo mho' byid: nyid ge' .
53003002	Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri akhyeing" ashoeb da" age byu yi da" lo , mo khyoid yu baja" akyu" mho' byid: ge' . khasu" wim ga: ri hau" ngei bu: lu dang: ri byu yug khang" moo" loem" jeung" boem zi anghoid .
53003003	Nghoid loug we' Aseing: gi kyed' su: nghoid nyid yoomo nyang: gi nanu" ri nheigloem: yoem: fain , byid: lho: akhyeing" ashoeb , bang: gyi koid lo jang" mo zung" lhug byid: wa nghoid .
53003004	Nghoonu" tid pyeung: too" moo too" - dangain" ri nanu' zei: nyid bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - xo' lho: we' zei: lo" boem , goo" wam: bye" ein: we' nau" da" atho' moo ngoonu" nheig shid: nheig deug ziyo' loem" nheigloem: ri Aseing: gi ngoonu" ri byid: bye .
53003005	Nanu" gi Mangso da" jheddab nheigloem: ri je" wigi se' gyo: loo wa shid re" yo' Khristu byid: da" yoem: kaid' thoug shang" da" nheig loem: ri je se' gyo: loo wa shid re" we' hau" Aseing: gi nanu" ri shu" vhu" she: nyid baja" .
53003006	Mang nhung" yi we" - nei" zoore" kangso' dei nyid bang: dangain" yo' we' ngoonu" jhoug" byid: khyoo: ri acang lo" bang: yo" we' azoem" goo" loo - gootu: sain' sain' koid nyid wa shid re" we' Khristu da" myeing khyang" kyo" nanu" ri ngoonu' tid poin" kaid' .
53003007	Nanu" gi ngoonu' koid shug da" khoo' shid: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - cang zei: loo" ca" boem da" khyoo ; - nanu" nyang: goolhoo: se' nyid boem bye - nanu" yo' dage" ngoonu" nyid shi" uri ngoonu" gi nei" da" khoo" shid: ri atoin" shid' boem .
53003008	Ngoonu" gi ce: aphoug" abyid: loo: za-hang" da" zoo: noem , ri ; we' ayu zo: yu" boem - hau: tho' moo ngoonu" gi hang" ri we' yoo lid: afoin: baja" ngoonu" nyang: nyid" ri we' myen" ri we' bu kyu" thu lho: moozoo" ri zei: lid lo yu" boem bye .
53003009	Ngoonu" hid: su" koid lo da" khyoo ; gi ngoonu" gi nanu" jang" mo mho' wa da" akhang" ayoo" yoomo we' anghoid - nanu" bo cang zei: wa khoo" shid: bue" nyid baja" ein - dakoid boem .
53003010	Nanu" yo' dage" ngoonu" nyid nyid shi" uri Moozoo" jid: zoo' anau zei ; su: gi voem: we' azoo: baja" , ein: wigi nanu" ri ngoonu' tid yu" boem bye .
53003011	Ngoonu" gi he: da" khyoo: ri ci: wim tid lha" » ga: rigi nanu" mo byu dayham" bang: gi nei" lho: kang: so' dei nyid boem wigi ce" moo" we' azei: boem loo ; za: byu gooji da" moozoo" moo vang lhu: nhoung yen" bang: nyid se' boem ziri ngoonu" shau" gyo: nyid .
53003012	Houg: su" koid yen" da" byu yi gi nyeing" za: khyag nyid lho: wigi nyang: tu: nya: da" voem: doug: khu: moo' zoo" ri zei: nyid boem lho: kangso' dei nyid boem goo" baja" - ein: wigi Aseing Yesu da" myeing khyang" khoug: moo ngoonu" pyeung ziyo' zid" nhang: kaid .
53003013	Nghoid loug we' mang nhung" yi we" - nanu" ge , da" moo" ri ; zei: wa shid re" myhung ; soo' doug asoo" goo .
53003014	He: d a" mougsoug" moo nanu" jhang khyoo: - ngoonu" lhid" foin: kaid' da" mungdang: ri atam" gyo: d" byu dayug yug nyid nghoid rigi nyang: ri xoem" to" lho: nyang: sho' thu' byug baja" - nyang: yo' azoem" goo" loo: goo .
53003015	Nghoid loug se' nyang: ri gyivoo phoo ri yhang: ti" gi asoin: too" goo mang nhung ohoo , dayug riyhang: ti" - zed" lhid' nhang: lho: tid poin" tid kyeung" nyid ge' .
53003016	Yha" da" ngei pyo: apoem: nghoid nyid da" Aseing: gi nanu" ri khanham we' khyoo: khaid khang" moo" moo ngei pyo: khyoo' dabyid: nyid baja" .
53003017	Ngoo nya: lo , yo' nyang: - vhoo: moo lhid" to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoo lhid" zi nghoid - vhu" kadi' su: gi ngoo Polu , moug suoug" khang" moo" moo nga" da" lo , lhid" laxoem" gi he: zi nyang: nghoid bye - hid: gi nga" da" mougsoug" lhid" da" lid nyang: nghoid bye .
53003018	Ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu jeju" gi nanu" dangain" bang: yo' dabo jo , baja" o" .
54001001	Ngoonu" ri khyoid khyi: yu da" Mangsoo yo' ngoonu" da" nheig byu jang: nghoid nyid da" Aseing Yesu da" khyoo: yoomo lagyoo: nghoid nyid da" ngoo Polu gi
54001002	Hau: da" loem" jeung" khyoo: moo nga" da" zoogyeing" nyang: nghoid da" Timothi jhang khyoo: mougsoug" lhid" foin: kaid . Phoo Mangsoo yo' ngoonu" da" aseing: Yesu Khristu jang" mo jeju" yo' nheig khyeug nheigloem: mo , ngei pyo: khyoo: gi man' shau" kham: yu baja" o" .
54001003	Ngoo Makedoni mung" khyoo: yhe: lo" uri nang ri ngoo pyeung: too" kho' ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Ephesu voogung moo nang ri xo' nyid nhang: noug shi" - hau: khyi , mo byu dayham" shoid da" loem" jeung" khyoo: ri jhoug" byid: nyid boem . Hau: khyoo: ri nang gi toem , pyam' lho: noo: nhang: ca .
54001004	Gyeing" nyang: bue" yu" bye: da" mhoo: myid: shendam joem - phoug" phyid" yi da" byuxeig shab , da" khyoo: ri to" no: pyam boem wa shid re" nyangnu" ri tid poin" we' . Hau: khyoo: joem gi myeing" myoo: yhoo: she: - byo , goo" ngeig go" da" khyoo" riza: dabue" thu' loo nhang: nyid wigi loem" jeung" khyoo: khyo" za: dayo" se' da" Mangsoo nyheung soin' da" khyoo: ri ayo" bui" nhang: nghoid nyid da .
54001005	Hidsu" pyeung: to" da" myid soin' , khyoo: gi gyeungshang: nheigloem: khoug: mo thu' lo da" phug soo" lheig se' myid yu" da" e" myed , yo' akug ase' void loem" jeung" khyoo: mo thu' lo da" jheddab da" nheigloem: ri nhau" to' kaid' wa shid re" nghoid nyid .
54001006	Byu yi dayham" bang: gi hau: da" khyoo: joem mo-vhang: lo" boem wigi akoo" apyoid , ga: ngeug byo , go" khyoo: moo nyangnu" da" myid soin' khyoo: ri ci: phyoug pyam boem abye: go .
54001007	Nyang: nu" gi Mangso tarha" ri jhoug" byid: mo , bui: nau boem nghoid loug we' nyangnu" gi gye" jo , boin: lho: tid nyid da" dang: khoin" joem ri lang" gi nyangnu" ase' gyo: boem nghoid ago" .
54001008	Hau: toung: to" da" tarha" gi jo eung: khyoo" ci: yhoung: nghoid rigi ge , zi nghoid khyoo: ri ngoonu" se' nyid boem .
54001009	Gyeing" nyang: ein: rigi ngoonu" se' gyo: too" ca" da" khyoo: gi hau: toung: to" da" tarha" gi byugi yi shid re" anghoid . Tarha" ri shoid nyid mo , yo' yooboo yoo" bang: - Mangsoo ayoo" mo , yo' yooboo dab , bang: - loem , khau: da" noku thung ri acang bang: - loem" jeung" khyoo: - hougsu" anghoid lang" gi Venyi khyoo: moo nheigloem: aboo mo , nyang: nya: myhi' phoo yi ri said' pyam' bang: yo' byu ri said' mo ,
54001010	Nheugloem: avoid agi bang: - myi: yi nyang: cang" - yuggi nyang: cang" - youg: shoo: goo" bang: - byu myheug yhoem" to" lho: ngei yo' doem khyoid yu nhang: bang: - mhau' lho: adeung amain" da" sagsi: kham , bang: - ce: ja" khyoo: moo we' hau: loem" jeung" da" khyoo: yo' azhung" goo' mo , shid re" koid to" da" tarha" nghoid nyid .
54001011	Hau: jhau" mho' da" khyoo: gi myonhoo: phung" yoeb , bo lho: wigi ngi lho , da" Mangso jang" mo , ngei bu: lu dang: yo' dakhyoo" ti" nghoid - hau" ngei bu: dang: ri tid fu" wa shid mo Mangsoo gi ngoori ab , byid: too' bye .
54001012	Ngoo zei: voin , vu , nyid da" moo" zo" shid mo ngoori yoem: so' lung: byid: nyid da" yha" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu ri jeju" boin: coung" ngei nyid . Nyang: gi ngoori moin: yi" su: nghoid ga: soin: yu wigi nyang: ri noku coung" ngei wa khyen: nyheung to" zi shau" yoomo we' nya: jeju" ri boin: coung" nghei nyid .
54001013	Ngoo koem' gi lid loo bye: da" ayo , moo Aseing: ri age khyo" yooboo foin: - juang" yi pyi: sho: shen" yhen ziyo' rue" lid lo yu" su: nghoid , nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi ngoori nheig khyeug nyid shi" - Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoo moo loem" jeung da" myid , aboo shi" yoomo ngoo cikoid nyid ziri" ngoo nyang: asi .
54001014	Yha" Aseing: gi nya: da" athang agoin da" jeju" ri nga" tho' moo foid , gyoin: byid: wigi Khristu yo' dadeing: daloem: za: bue" lo" lho: kangso' shau" dei nyid yoomo ngoonu" yo" yu eung: da" loem" jeung" khyoo: yo' jheddab nheigloem: ngoori byid: too" bye .
54001015	Yooboo dab , mo , ri khyoid yu wa shid re" Yesu Khristu gi mougmyid' khyoo: ju" ri bye" - ga: da" dang: khoin" gi khyag nyang: kham: yu ge ziyo' loem , ge" da" dang: khoin" nyang: nghoid bye . Hau: yooboo dab , bang: moo ngoo gi gyi: thang da" yooboo dab , su: nghoid nyid .
54001016	Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo ngoori nheig khyeug yu da" khyoo: gi thang: phyang" pyaid Aseing: ri loem" jeung" wigi apyaid' ato: kangso' yo" yu wa bang: dangain" mo , shid re" yu" yu ge da" khoo" shid: daloem: bue" jo , baja" - Khristu Yesu gi ngoo yhang: te" da" yooboo yoo" mo , mo ca" thang su: da" atho' moo nya: da" nheigloem: gyi: sheung: kham , zeung: khyoo: ri toin" shid' byid: nyid zi nghoid .
54001017	Akhe" apyaid' atoo: mo Khokham" nghoid wigi abyo , ayoin" lo: khyoo: ri myojid" yo' ayo" myang - dayug kyeung" da" Mangso jang" moo myonhoo: phung yoeb , bug thu sheing" jhu" khyoo: gi apyaid' atoo: moo dajo , jo , baja" - Amen .
54001018	Nga" zoo: Timothi we" - lid loo bye: da" ayo , moo nang ri zhoo: gyi: kho" kyo" da" lapi: dang: joem yo' dakhyoo" ti" - voin , vu , kho" kyoo" wa da" amyeing" ri ab , byid: bye - goo" lhoo: yo" zain: oung: loo" wa shid' re" Hau" lapi: yi tid to" da" mungdang: joem ri gyizi , gyikhoo: ti" daci: yhoung nyid we' .
54001019	Hau: tho' moo gootu: nang moo loem" jeung" khyoo: yo' gyeungshang: da" boin: gyeing: se' nheigloem: bo jo , baja" - byu dayham" bang: gi houg: yhang: te" - gyeungshang: boin: soo" se' da" nheigloem: soozoo: wigi tid poin" tid kyeung ziri atam" gyo: boem yoomo nyangnu" da" loem" jeung" nheigloem: ri lhu: phyo' pyam' boem ago" .
54001020	Nyang: nu" ri satan da" lo , moo ab , pyam byid: khyo" wigi ngoo shen" yhen da" Humeni yo' Alesandaru ga: da" eig yug we' bo ago" . Hougsu" koid da" khyoo: gi nyangnu" tid da" nheing" myeing" nheing" thui: gi sube" gei sang: shang pyang: byid: da" khyoo: ri to" pyam' goo" baja" - ein: jhoug" byid: da" khyoo: nghoid .
54002001	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo dangain" mo , da" shid' moo-byu bain' sho' bang: da" shid' re" Mangso jang" moo akyu" mho' xo' byid: da" khyoo: - mho' tung" bain: byid: da" khyoo: joem yo' jeju" ri coung" byid: da" khyoo: dakoid nyid boem wa shid re" doin: nyheun" yoem: byid: kaid .
54002002	Ngoonu" gi Mangsoo ri gyoug phau" khyoo: moo goolho: za: cang lo" wigi ge , da" young" du , du asam" avoid , bo lho: ngei pyoo: myen , jham" za: kangso' yo" dei nyid goo" baja" - Kho: kham yi yo' amyeing" akhang" ci: bang: dangain" shid re" akyu" mho' nyid ge' .
54002003	He: moozoo" gi ge , da" moozoo" nghoid wigi yha" da" khyoid yu Mangsoo ri vho: ngei nhang: da" khyoo: nghoid .
54002004	Nyang: gi byu dangain" mo , khyoid yu zi shau" lho: hau: deingmain" da" khyoo: ri se' loo wa shid re" vho: ngei nyid khyoo: nghoid .
54002005	Khasu" wim ga: ri Mangsoo gi dayug za: danghoid ziyo' byu yi ri tid nyheing tid feing" byid: su: - xang: su: byu re" bue" da" Khristu Yesu ein: zi we' dayug kyeing" danghoid .
54002006	Nyang: gi byumyu" bain' sho' mo , ri khyoid yu wa shid re" nya: gung du: ri nyang: ab , byid: pyam' bye . Hau: zigi ayo , ju" lang" ngoonu" byu xangsu yug khang" moo" ri khyoid yu nau da" sag si: toin" shid' to" zi nghoid .
54002007	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo Aseing: gi ngori lagyoo: dayug khyo" we' tung: bau byu yi da" jhoug" byid: sara: dayug khyo" we' hau: loem" jeung" da" khyoo: yo' deingmain" da" mungdang: ri kho" kyoo" wa shid re" nhang: kaid' zi shau" bye . Ngoo mhau' tid zi anghoid - deingmain" da" dang: ri tid nyid .
54002008	Phung: mo mo , da" akyu" mho' ayo , khang" moo" moo yug gi yi ri akyu" mho' nhang: nau - Mangso jhang khyoo: mho' ab , xoin" to' byid: da" yug gi yi gi nheig yoo: go" zi ngeung byo , go" zi aboo loo: za: gyeungshang: da" lo , ri tu: lho: akyu" mho' nyid goo" baja" .
54002009	Myi: yi: zoo: yi gi avoid' ge , sam" dab , nu" nham , ziyo' nyangnu" da" void , mi void byi: void , da" khyoo: moo young" du , phoug" dab , tung" void , ci: nhang: nau . 54002010	Loem , khau: khyoo: moo goolhoo: za: cang lo" da" myiyi: zooyi lhoo , yhung eung: da" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - yu" du , yu" ge , da" asam" avoid , yo' nyang: nya: gung ri lhoo , yhoung nyid goo" baja" .
54002011	Myiyi: zoo: yi gi nheigloem: khyo , nyhoem: ziyo' myen , myenjham" jham" jhau" mho' khyoo: ri kham: yu nyid goo" baja" .
54002012	Jhoug" byid: mhoo , byid: wa ziyo' yug gi yi da" atho' moo amyeing" ci: lho jhau" mhoo , byid: nyid wa shid re" vhoeb , khang" nyid wa da" khyoo: myiyi: zoo: yi ri ngoo akhang" abyid - nyangnu" gi sam" zoo: tam" too" goo" baja" .
54002013	Khasu" wim ga: ri Mangsoo gi Adam: ri xang shed" phain" to" lho: thang: ri she , Eva , ri daphain" to .
54002014	Satan wigi mhau' mhoid" jhu , phyo' zi shau" su: gi Adam: anghoid - myiyi: zoo: she , mhau' mhoid" jhu , phyo' zi shau" wigi Mangso da" tarha" ri peug rhue , pyam' bye .

54003001	Phoung: da" vhu" jhung: bui" nhoug su: gi ge , thang da" moo" daloem: ri vho: ngei nyid su: nghoid - ga: wigi tid to" da" dang: gi deingmain" da" dang: dakhoin" nghoid nyid .
54003002	Phung moo vhu" jhung: koid su: dayug gi yooboo adab su - myi: dayug za: yoo' su - se' zed" lhid' nyid su - nyang: nya: da" gung du: ri yo" khang" su - akhyoo" joo joo kang: so' se' dei nyid su - nya: yhoem: moo tungbau being" voo ri doo' zhoo" doo" jhug noug su - se' jhoug" se' mhoo , byid: su: nghoid ca .
54003003	Yhid: ashug main: su - angheing" ayang akoid su: nghoid lho: wigi sam" dab , nu" nham , su - myen , jham" khyoo: ri vhoo: su - nyang: gi ngei myo , ano , su: nghoid wigi

54003011	Nyang: nu" da" myi: yi we' akyang" gi mo , nghoid ca" juang" yi gei sang: mo , a gi nyangnu" gi yhid: ayed ziyo' khyoo: khaid khang" moo" moo ding main" loem gi mo , nghoid ca" .

54003015	Nghoid loug we' ngoo to' myang" byug nghoid rigi dadei nyid Mangso phung: ein: da" hau: deingmain" apoem: ayang: nghoid da" Mangso yhoem: ikoin deungkhu: moo ngoonu" gi kha: yhang: te" da" avoid asam" - cang yhi: ca" khyoo: ri yo" se' yu baja" - ein: he: mougsoug" ri lhid" kaid' zi nghoid .
54003016	Yha" noku thung" mo loem" jeung" da" no , thang khyoo: gi kha: yhi' gyi: lam: jo , ziri hang" we' ngeug gyang: joyoo abo zigi vhoo: moo lhid" to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" nghoid nyid . hau: gyeungshang: da" venyi gi toin" shid nyid Moug: myid byu dangain" gi nyang: ri loem" jeung" boem abye: go - houg: su" nyang: ri moug: khung: tho' khyoo: shu" to' yu zi shau" abye: .
54004001	Thang: phyang" pyaid ri byu dayham" bang: gi loem" jeung" khyoo: ri she: pyam boem wa zi nghoid . 54004003	Houg: yhang: te" da" byu yi gi loxo' myi: pheing" fang da" khyoo: joem ri jhed' xeung toem to" lho: zoo: noem , dayham" ri jang" pyam' wa shid re" jhoug" byid: lo ago" . 54004004	Mangsoo phain" to" da" zi dangain" koem' gi ge zi nghoid wigi ce: ja" zoo: noem , ri we' lhid' jang" pyam' ca" zi anghoid . Nghoid loug we' zoo: noem , dangain" ri jeju" coung" nghei akyu" mho' ziyo' zoo: ge nyid .

54004016	Nanya: gung ri we' re" da" jhoug" myeing" jhoug" thui: ri we' lhed zed" zoore" goin , coung: nyid we' nang gi he: d a" khyoo: joem ri d acang zei: nyid we' Khasu" wim gari hougsu" koid nyid nghoid rigi nanya: da" gung du: ri we' nang kho" da" mungdang: ri shaug" gyoo: mo , ri we' yo" khyoid yu wa zi nghoid .
54005001	Apyaid' gyi: bye: da" ludaid' phoo ri agyikoid' re" phoo ri yhang: ti": khyo , nyhoem: ji sang" nyid we' apyaid' ngi shi" da" zoolu: yi ri gi re mang: re" nhoung" ri yhang: ti" - zoem" khau: nyid we' .

54005003	Lo , ti" phyeug nyid da" coug: moo" myhi , yi ri phau" myang: nyid we' .
54005004	Nghoid loug we' cougmoo" dayug yug gi zoo: myiyi yo" nghoid rigi nyangnu" gi nyang: nya: ikoin deungkhu: shid re" loem , khau: da" noku thung" yo' sen: lho: wigi zei: ca" da" yoovoin , joem ri xang: shed" moo jhau" yu nyid goo" baja" .
