54005009	Apyaid' khyug xi: zain za: ajain" rigi coug moo" myhi , kha: yug ri we' cougmoo" zhayen" moo akaid' goo" baja" nyang: gi dalheing: za: loxo' e" koin qei" su: nghoid ca" .
54005010	Hau: tho' moo gootu: nyang: gi asam" avoid ge khyoo: moo we' myeing thu nmyid su - nya: myid: nya: zoo: yi ri we' voin: tang: se' shu" jhoug" shu" mho' nyid su - tungbau being" voo , yi ri nya: yhoem: moo goo" lhoo: zoo: kham: yu lho: doo" zhoo" doo" jhug su - Khristain mang: nhung" yi yo' sen: lho: zei: ca" da" khyoo: joem ri khyo , nyhoem: da" myid yo' zei: so' voin vu , si su - yau: khe" jam jau shau" nyid bang: ri-se' pang" thoug su - ge da" moozoo" joem ri voin , vu , xoin" yo" to' su: nghoid ca" nyid .
54005011	Nghoid loug we' pyaid ngi shi" da" cougmoo" myhi , yi rigi coug" mo" da" zheyen" moo akaid' shi" goo" baja" - khasu" wim ga: ri nyang: myid vho: da" nheigloem: wigi doin: jhen" loo yoomo lo , doem xo' lo" rigi Khristu jhang khyoo: doem , phoug loo se' nyid .
54005012	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nyangnu" gi Aseing: ri xang: shid' mo wigi byid: too" bye: da" dang: thang" cab , ri she: pyam yoomo yooboo yoo" bang: bue" loboem ago" .
54005013	Hau: tho' mo gootu: nyangnu" gi dayhoem: mo dayhoem: khyoo: cangv ang lam" yen" lho: ayo , ri thang loo" nhang: se' nyid boem . Hau: tho' mo , aje ge da" khyoo: gi nyangnu" atid' eung: da" dang: ri cang tid - gei sang: lu wum , yen" boem ziyo' nyang: yo' ci" we' asen: khyoo: moo cang ‹ vang lhu: lheug yen" boem .
54005014	Houg: yoomo gyivoo yi gi ngoonu" da" khyoo: ri age khyo" tid wa joyoo ajo , loo: sho' apyaid' ngi shi" da" cougmoo" myhi , yi gi lo , doem xo' lho: zookhu: du , yau ziyo' nyangnu" da" e" koin , ikoin deungkhu: ri-yu" nyheung goin , coung: nyid wa ziri ngoo je" vho: nyid .
54005015	Khasu" wim gari akhid" lhang" ri cougmoo" myhi , yi dayham" bang: gi satan thang: khyoo: cang loo" wa shid re" byamphoug lo" boem abye: go .
54005016	Loem" jeung" da" phung byu myi: yi dayug gi nyang: nya: da" ikoin deungkhu: moo cougmoo" bue" lo" nghoid rigi nyangnu" ri yu" goin , coung: zei: zho" da" khyoo: koid boem ca , nyangnu" shid re" phung mo yoolid gootu: age byid - houg: su" ri she' phung gi gyeing" nyang: nghe: khoug: jang: aboo lo da" cougmoo" myhi , yi ri yo" pang" thoug wa zi nghoid .
54005017	Shu" vhu" shu" she: da" moozoo" ri goolhoo: shu" vhu" she: da" phung shu" vhu" bang: gi laga' aphoug" eig zhang kham: yu moin: ein: - soin: yu ge nyid . Je" wigi mungdang: jhoug" byid: da" khyoo: moo yoem: kaid' voinvu , bang: gi houg: su" kham: yu moin: mo , nghoid nyid .
54005018	Khasu" wim ga: ri jhoem: mungdang: moo gug nang: nyid da" nu: nhoid moo mhang" kho' yo" zhung" byid: zi anghoid - hau: lho moo" zei: su: gi nya: vhukung: phoug" shau" kham: yu wa zi nghoid . ga: wigi tid nyid .
54005019	Sagsi: kham , mo , atham: thang - eig soem" yug abo ri phung shu" vhu" shi: su: ri yooboo foin: dang: ri age loem" .
54005020	Byu gooji yu" gyoug goo" baja" - yooboo koid bang: dangain" ri shava byu yi dangain" mo , shid khoin" moo yau , jhoug" byid: ge' .
54005021	Hid: su" tid to" khyoo: ri myonhoo: akhyen: loo nang zei: so' yhe: lo" jang" moo dashoid' shoid khyoo: abo dab , loo: za: tam" gyo: cang loo" wa shid mo Aseing Yesu Khrisru yo' Mangso da" shid' moo we' gyeungshang: da" moug: lagyoo: yi shid' moo we' ngoo nang ri amyeing" byid: kaid .
54005022	Aseing: da" moozoo" voin , vu , wa shid re" hang" ri nghoid loug we' lo , ke" lho: aya: tang: byid: wa ziri akhang: - subi" dakoid da" yooboo moo aye: bo vang lhu" - nang nyang: we' yooboo adab sho' gyeungshang: nyid we' .
54005023	Nang daso' dadam no loo loo wim nyid yoomo am: pham" zo: pyeug jang" moo bo pang" wa shid re" gyid za: ashug loo: za: zabyid yhid: ri dajhi' jhi , dashug nyid we' .
54005024	Byu dayham" bang: da" yooboo dayham" gi bang bang myang nyid zi nghoid wigi nyangnu" da" youg: noo yooboo joem gi nyangnu" da" shid' khyoo: - dang: phyed' wa joyoo moo yhe: lo" nyid bye - nghoid loug we' dayham" bang: da" youg: noo yooboo joem gi thang: ri she' bang bang myang lo .
54005025	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - ge , da" moozoo" ri we' bang bang za: yo" myang nyid amyang ase' ri lang - yo" nghoeb yo" yhoem" too" wa zi anghoid .
54006001	Join , koid nyid bang: gi nyang: nya: d a" yhoem: seing: ri phau" myang: moin: bang: nghoid ein: kham: yu ca" nyid boem - houg: lang" hang" we' Mangso myeing khyang" yo' ngoonu" da" jhoug" myeing" jhoug" thui: ri age khyo" juang" yi goo" wa zi anghoid .
54006002	Khristain join , seing: yi da" lo , khoug: moo nyid da" join , yi gi nyang: nya: da" yhoem: seing: biri - dakhyoo" te" da" mang: nhung" yi nghoid ein: aphoug" akhyoid age koid . Khasu" wim gari nyang: zei: byid: jang" mo akyu" shau" kham: zoo: mo , gi nyang: tu: nyang: loem khau: jheddab nyid bang: nghoid yoomo nyangnu" ri lang" je" wigi pang" dei: byid: ge nyid . Nang gi he: khyoo: ri jhau" mho' kho" kyo" nyid ca"
54006003	Hang" nghoid loug we' adu go" khyo" atoug" khyo" shoid vhang: khyoo: ri jhoug" byid: nyid su: gi ngoonu" Aseing: Yeesu Khristu da" deingmain" joeb , byeung" da" mungdang: joem yo' ngoonu" loem" jeung" da" khyoo: jhoug" byid: ziri abo cang soo" loo za:
54006004	Nya: gung ri nyang: nghoid boin: phau: khuang lho: wigi ci" asi su: nghoid . Nyang: gi dang: tid jang" moo ngei goo" wa shid re" myeing" myo: lho: byo , goo" wa shid re" age nheigloem: boo su: nghoid . Hau: tho' moo gootu: houg: su" koid yoomo noo" goo" zoo , go" da" khyoo: - phung kho' go" khyoo: - anoo: ayab , loo: ngeug byo , go" khyoo: - aphoug" amyang: loo: gei , yu" go" khyoo: - age da" aloem" atho: khyoo: ze thu' loo nhang: nyid .
54006005	Hau: tho' moo gootu: - nheig abo ziyo' deingmain" khyoo: ri amyang ase' bang: jang" mo ngeig goo" byo , go" da" khyoo: gi daso' so' bue" thu lo nyid . loem , khau: da" noku thung" eing: zigi yoo" zoo: yoo" shug da" de lo khyoo: nghoid - ga: nyangnu" myid yu ago" .
54006006	Gyeing" nyang: ga: rigi nyang: nyang: yo" gu: ri nheig se' deug nghoid rigi leom khau: noku thung" gi byu dayug ri yo" loo de loo nhang: wa zi nghoid nyid .
54006007	Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" gi he: mougmyid' moo ci" we' aci: loo vang re" boem - he: mougmyid mo deom , thu' lo" ri we' ce" noem ci: thu' loo" wa lha" . ci" we' ayo" ci: thu loo" .
54006008	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi zoo: noem , yo' voidmi void , byi: yoo" lang" gi hau: gu: yo' nheig deug nyid ge , boem bye .
54006009	Nghoid loug we' yoo" noug di noug mo , gi mhoid" jhu , phyo' da" zi shau" boem ziyo' akoo" afang: koid boem ziyo' shid: gyoin , noogyoin , ze" bui" nhang: da" vhoo: boo myo , no , da" khyo: myoo" sho' ja: mo joem: duang: khuang" moo gyoo" loo" se' boem ago" . Hau: zigi nyangnu" ri byo , yoin" soem" lo" joem: duang: khyoo: she: vang lo" boem abye: go .
54006010	Khasu" wim ga: ri ngei myo , no , da" khyoo: gi akhyeing" ashoeb , khyoo: aja: ja: ri bue" thu' loo nhang: da" nei yang: nyang: nghoid bye . Byu dayham" bang: gi hau" ngei ri yoo" wa shid re" nheigloem: gye" zhu: vho: ngei nyid boem yoomo loem" jeung" khyoo: mo vhang: lo" boem ziyo' koug shu: khyoo: aja: ja: yo' nyangnu" da" nheigloem: ri gyau: moin" loo" nhang: nyid boem ago" .
54006011	Nang koem gi Mangso da" byu phoo we" - he: khyoo: dangain" ziri yoem: kaid' nyid we' . Deing byeung" khyoo: - tarha" phau" cang khyoo: - loem" jeung" khyoo: jheddab khyoo: moo yoem: kaid' lho: thoug shang" ziyo' nu" nham , da" nheigloem: yo" yu sho' yoem: kaid' nyid we' .
54006012	Loem" jeung khyoo: yo" sen: da" tang" shi , go" pui" moo yoem: bain' sho' kaid' lho: gei lo" wigi apyaid' ato: da" kangso' ein: da" jhung: shug yo" yu sho' tang" we' . Khasu" wim ga: ri hau: kangso' dei nyid da" khyoo: moo nang ri mangsoo khe: yu da" uri nang gi sagsi: myo" sho' bang: da" shid' moo yhen: yu abye: .
54006013	Jo , moo jo , ri kangso' yo" kaid' byid: da" phoo Mangso shid' khoin" moo we' Pilaid' da" shid' khoin" moo we' nyang: loem" jeung da" khyoo: ri geing: geing: teing teing yhen: yu bye: da"Khristu da" shid' khoin" moo we' He: da" moozoo" yoovoin , ri voin , vu , wa shid mo ngoo nang ri amyeing" byid: kaid .
54006014	Nang gi nang ri amyeing" byid: to" da" khyoo: ri tam" gyo: wigi Khristu doem , thu myang loo wa da" ayo , bidnyid ju" sho' kyed , kyed za: cang pyeung nyid we' .
54006015	Dayug kyeing" nghoid lho: myonhoo: phung" yoeb , bo wigi vhoeb , khang" nyid da" kho: kham" yi tho' mo khokham" Aseing: yi tho' mo Aseing: - Mangsoo gi ayo , akhyeing: ju" lang" Aseing Yesu ri dalheing: doem thu' myang: loo wa zi nghoid nyid .
54006016	Nyang: kyeing" za: ashid: abyug su: nghoid wigi nyang: gi hang" we' ayo" tain" tab yhe: da" bidbang moo loung" jo . hang" we' nyang: ri amyang yu" ziyo' hang" we' nyang: ri age myang . Nyang: moo myonhoo: phung yoeb , yo' apyaid' atoo: moo ashoem: apyang: zi dajo , jo , baja" o" - Amen .
54006017	He: mougmyid' moo kangso' dei nyid shi" baja" - ageing: ateung da" sudgain' yo' nyid gi nyid de da" khyoo: moo nanu" da" nheig nhei: joyoo akoid loo: za: ngoonu" goug goug yi yi yo" kham: yu wa shid re" ziyoo soidgain' dangain" ri yo" byid: da" Mangsoo moo nheig nhei: jang: geung: teung jo , wa shid re" amyeing" byid: nyid we' .
54006018	Ge , lho , da" moo" ri zei: nyid wa shid re" ge , da' moozoo" mo , yo" de loo wa shid' re" we' byu gooji yi ri gam , byid: myhoo , byid: vho , lo" khyoo: moo we' amyug ashi loo: yo" gam , byid: wa shid re" jen" jen" koid nyid goo' baja" - nyangnu" ri jhoug" byid: nyid we' .
54006019	Hid: khyo" wigi nyangnu" gi thang: phyang" pyaid shid' re" geung: teung da" apoem: ayan: bue" nyid goo" baja" - phoug" dab , da" soidgain' ri nyangnu" shau" young: to" lho: Kangso' dei khyoo: gyeing" nyang: shau" yu to" boem wa zi nghoid .
54006020	Timothi we" - nang ri ab , byid: to" da" aya: ri goolhoo: za: zoem: shoung: too" we' . Aco' ajhoid da" khoin" co , loeb , khyoo: ri we' phajhi" dang: nghoid ga: . byu jha" bang: tid shoid' myid da" akoo" afang: ga: ngeig goo" yang: go" dang: ri we' jang" pyam' nyid we' .
54006021	Khasu" wim ga: ri byu dayham" bang: gi hau: ja" phajhi" si' bang: nghoid ga: boem lho: wigi hau: loem" jeung khyoo: mo vhang: lo" boem ago" . Mangso da" jeju" gi nanu" dangain" mo , yo' dage" dajo , jo , baja" o" .
55001001	Mangsoo nyang: myid' vho: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Khristu Yesu da" lagyoo: bue" lho: Khristu Yesu yo' dadeing: daleom: za: bue" nyid yoomo ngoonu" yo" yu wa da" dang: soo" khoin" yo' sen: lho: kangso' khyoo: tid fu" kyoo" wa shid re" nhang: kaid' zi shau" su: ngoo Polu gi
55001002	Ngoo jheddab da" nga" zoo: Timothi ri dang: pyeung: kaid . Yha" phoo Mangsoo yo' yha" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu gi nang ri nheig khyeug jeju" ngei pyo: khyoo: dabyid: nyid baja" o" .
55001003	Nga" phoug" phyid" yi koid yhang: ti" gyeungshang: da" e" myed yo' ngoo loemkhau: nyid da" Mangsoo ri ngoo coung" byid: nyid ngoo gi nyid" ri myen" ri akyu' mho' da" jang" moo nang ri ajang" daboin: so" nyid ziyo' Mangso jeju" ri boin: coung" nyid .
55001004	Re" da" ngoug byid' joem ri ngoo daboin: nyid wigi ngoo moo hau: gau , yi khyoo: byeung loo baja" - nang yo' shau" goo" wa shid mo , nheig gye" nge nyid .
55001005	Nang gi re" phyid" Lu-i yo' re" myhi , Uni moo xang: shed" bo jo , afain" avo da" - loem" jeung nheigloem: nang moo bo jo , ziri ngoo boin: nyid . Nya: eig yug moo bo jo , da" loem" jeung" khyoo: gi nang moo we' bo jo , wa ziri ngoo loem , nyid .
55001006	Houg: yoomo ngoo nang ri lo , ki" byid: lho: aya: tang: byid: uri Mangso jang" mo nang yo" kham: yu bye: da" jeju" jhung: shug ri Mangso jang" mo nang yo" kham: yu bye: da" jeju" jhung: shug ri xo' lho: wigi dei nyid nhang: shi" wa shid re" nang ri ngoo doem , tid poin" kaid' zi nghoid .
55001007	Khaswu" wim gari Mangsoo nyhang" ri byid: to" da" venyi gi ngoonu" ri gyoug voem , nheugloem: byid: to" zi anghoid . Hau" Aseing: da" venyi gi ngoonu" ri yoem: so' - jheddab nheugloem: yo' nyang: nya: da" nheigloem: ri yo" lang" zeung ci: wa da" yoem: vhoo" byeung" loo nhang: nyid .
55001008	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" Aseing: da" shid re" sagsi: kham , jang" moo asho' gyoug nyid , thung: loung" jo , su: ngoo yoomo we' nang asho' nyid Mangsoo gi hau: khyoo: ri zei: wa shid re" yoem: so' byid: to" bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - hau: ngei bu: lu dang ; yoomo kyi" khyeug jam jau kham , da" khyoo: moo ngoo yo' dage" shoin" kyi" khyeung nyid goo"
55001009	Mangsoo gi nyhang" koid bye: ge , da" moozoo" aja: ja: yoomo anghoid loo: za: nyang: myid nyeung soin' to" khyoo: yo' jeju" khyo" ngoonu" ri khyoid yu lho: nya: da" byumyu" bue" loo wa shid re" khe: yu to" zi nghoid bye . Nyang: gi moug: aphain" myid' aphain" shi" mo nyang: - Khristu Yesu khyo" wigi hau: jeju" ngoonu" ri byid: too" bye .
55001010	Nghoid loug we' akhid" gi yha" Aseing: Khristu Yesu ju" gyoo" los ayo , mo nyang: - hau: khyoo: ngoonu" ri toin" shid' kaid' bye . Nyang: gi shid: loo" no lo" da" yoem: so' ri yoeb , shoung ; pyam' lho: wigi hau" ngei bu: lu dang ; khyo" wigi ashid: abyug lo da" kangso' khyoo: ri ci: shug kaid' bye .
55001011	Hau: da" ngei bu: lu dang: ri tid fu" loo' wa shid re" mangsoo gi ngoori lagyoo ; dayug khyo" we' jhau" mhoo , byid: da" sara: khyo" we' nyheung soin' too" bye .
55001012	Hau: khyoo: yoomo he: da" kyi" khyeug shid: gyoin , noo gyoin khyoo: ri ngoo yo" kham: yu nyid zi nghoid . Nghoid loug we' nga" da" loem , khau: nheigloem: gi ngoo moo byeung" sho' bo jo , Khasu" wim gari Ngoo hang" ri loem , khau: nghe: nyid zigi ngoonyang: se' nyid ziyo' ngoo , nyang: ri ab , byid: to" da" ziyoo dangain" - hau: bidnyid ju" sho' zung" lhug goem , coung ; too" byid: wam bye" ein: ngoo nheig shid' nheig deug nyid bye .
55001013	Ngoo gi nang ri jhoug" byid: bye: deingmain" da" mungdang: ri nang cang loo" wa da" akhyoo: avoid bui" nhang: wigi geing" geing: zei: ci: lho: Yesu Khristu yo' dadeing: daloem: za: koid wigi kangso' dei nyid khyoo: moo loem" jeung" ziyo' jheddab da" nheigloem: ri geing: geing: dazei: ci: we' .
55001014	Nang ri loem , wigi ab , byid: too" bye: ge , da" ziyoo joem ri nyhang" moo bo loung" jo , bye: da" hau" gyeungshang: venyi yoem: so' khyo" dazoem: ci: nyid we' .
55001015	Nang se' nyid bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Phugelu yo' Heramoge eig yug yo' dage" Asi zoo: moo nyid bang: dangain" mo , ngoori she: pyam' khare" boem abye: go .
55001016	Hau" Aseing: gi Onesiphuru da" yhoem: bang: ri jeju" dabyid: nyid baja" Khasu" wim ga: ri nyang: myoo" sho' lheing: - ngoori nheigloem: yoem: yo" yu nhang: bye: wigi nyang: gi ngoo thung: loung" khyoo: ri asho' su: nghoid .
55001017	Nyang: gi Roma voogung moo ju" lo" uri ngoori amyang ri myang sho' cang myed: sho: yu su: nghoid .
55001018	Aseing: gi nyang: ri hau: tarha" dang: phyed' da" bidnyid moo nheig khyeug khyoo: byid: baja" - Ephesu voogung moo nyang: gi ngoori khayhi' pang" thoug bye: khyoo: ri nanyang: goo" lhoo: si' bye .
55002001	Nga" zoo: we" - yha" da" Aseing: Khristu Yesu moo dadeing: daloem: za: bue" lho: wigi kangso' dei khyoo: mo yo" yu da" jeju" moo yoem: bo nyid we' .
55002002	Sagsi: myoo" sho' bang: da" shid' khoin" moo nga" jang" mo nang jhau" yu gyo: yu bye: da" jhoug" myeing" jhoug" thui: ri ci: lho: byu gooji" ri we' yo" doem , jhoug" byid: wa zi nghoid ein: wigi nang leom , ge" da" byu yi ri doem , thoid' ab , byid: wa .
55002003	Khristu Yesu tho' moo nheigloem: zung" da" gyi zoonu" yhang: ti" - kyi" khyeug khyoo: ri bo kham: voin , we' .
55002004	Gyimoo" voin , vu , nyid da" gyizoo: nu" dayug gi nya ; atho' mo da" gyi zoug: phoo nheig shid: nheig deig sho' zei: noug yoomo gyizoo: yo" asen: da" mung" byu yi khyoo: moo-ayo" bo cang vang lhu: koung" keug yen" loo .
55002005	Gei , shi , go" da" pui" moo bo vang gei shi , nyid da" sa" rhi , phoo dayug gi nyang: cang ca" da" thung" tarha" yo' dakhyoo" ti" acang lo" nghoid rigi coung" nghei ngi shab , jhung: shug ri shau" kham: yu wa zi anghoid .
55002006	Yoothung" phoug khyam: koid su: we' shivoo: shiloem , xang: shed" shau" shab , yu wa gam , boem' shau" yu ca" nyid .
55002007	Ngoo tid nyid khyoo: ri myid soin: yu" we' khasu" wim ga: ri Aseing ; gi hau: khyoo: dangain" ri yo" se' da" emyid , nang ri byid: loo wa zi nghoid
55002008	Ngoo kho" kyo" da" ngei bu: lu dang: moo bo ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - shid: byug bye: bang: mo doem , dei to'' lo da" David da" akung: ako'' nghoid nyid da" Khristu Yesu ri boin: so" nyid we' .
55002009	Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoo gi hau: ngei bu: lu dang: kho" kyoo" yoomo kyi" khyeug zi shau" nyid . youg: shau" jhen: bo nyid su: yhang: ti" - myheug tei" to" zilang" thoung" shau" nyid . Nghoid loug we' hau: Mangso da" mungdang: koem gi myheug tei" too" shau" nyid zi anghoid .
55002010	Hougsu" nghoid nyid yoomo ngoo gi Mangso khyen: yu shau" nyid da" byu yi shid re" kyi" khyeug yau: khe" zi: kham' zo: nyid hougsu" kham , zo: nyid da" khyoo: gi nyang: nu" we' Khristu Yesu da" khoug: moo khyoid yu da" jeju" yo' hau: apyaid' atoo: mo da" myonhoo: phung yoeb , ri shau" kham: yu wa da" khyoo: nghoid .
55002011	He: dang: khoin" gi deingmain" da" dang: nghoid . Nyhang" gi nyang: yo' dage" shid: lo" boem nghoid rigi nyhang" gi nyang: yo' dage" doem , dei to'' lo boem wa zi nghoid nyid . Khasu" wim gari nyang: gungt' du: ri nyang: mhau' lho , he: gyang pyam nyid su: anghoid .
55002012	Ngoonu" xo' lho: wigi kham' zeung nyid boem nghoid rigi ngoonu' nyang: yo' dage" mung" ri shau" vhoeb nyid boem wa zi nghoid .
55002013	Ngoonu" gi nheigloem: azoung" boem nghoid loug we' nyang: gi nheigloem: zung" su: nghoid nyid . Khasu" wim gari nyang: gungt' du: ri nyang: mhau' lho , he: gyang pyam nyid su: anghoid .
55002014	Byu yi ri khyoo: he: khaid ri tid poin" tid kyeung" nyid we' dang: tid ziyo' ngeug byo , go" khyoo: aboo wa shid re" Mangso da" shid khoin" moo nyangnu" ri thain: thain: zid" nhang: too" we' . Hougsu" hi: go" ngeug byo , go" nyid da" khyoo ; gi ce" akyu" we' abo tho' moo agoo" - tam" gyoo: bang: ri lhu: phyo' lhu: shoin , byid: da" khyoo: za: bui" nhang: nyid .
55002015	Nang koem gi nya: da" moozoo" moo ce" gyoug sho' cang abo da" moo" voin su: khyo" we' Mangso mungdang: ri deingmain" jo eung: khyo" kho" kyo" jhoug" byid: su: khyo" we' Mangso shoid' moomyo , nhoo: rua loo sho' yoem: so' bain' sho' yoem: kaid' nyid we' .
55002016	Mangsoo yo' gang: go" loo" nhang: da" avoid avhu: anyhoin: athoung" moozoo" koid ziyo' akoo" afang: ga: tid da" dang: ri jang" pyam' nyid we' .
55002017	Houg: yhang: ti" jhau" mhoo , byid: da" khyoo: gi gung shoo" ri zo: toung" lo" da" m ang: gam: nooboug: yo' du nyid . Hougsu" jhoug" byid: jang" moo bo da" byu eig yug gi Humeno yo' Philetu zheung: nghoid nyid ago" .
55002018	Nyang: nu" gi hau: deingmain" khyoo: mo vhang: lo" wigi ngoonu" da" dei to'' lo khyoo: gi bain" bue" lid loo" bye" - ga: tid nyid ziyo' byu dayham" bang: da" loem" jeung" nheigloem: ri lhu: nhung lhu: phyo' byid: pyam' bye .
55002019	Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo zhoug too" byid: bye: geung" teung da" apoem: ayang ; koem' gi dei loeb , yu: yen" nhang: zi anghoid . Hau" apoem: ayang: da" atho' moo hau: Aseing: gi nya: da" byu yi nghoid bang: ri se' yu" nyid . ga: wigi we' Aseing: yo' sen: su: nghoid , , ga: wigi tid bang ; dangain" mo , gi shoid vhang: da" moo" dangain" ri she: pyam' khook goo" baja" - ga: wigi laxoem" dazid' lhid" tab to .
55002020	Gyi: sheung ; da" yhoem: daloem: moo khu , bain' aja: ja: jo - dayham" gi ngei khu , yo' sheing: khu , - dayham" gi seig yo' koid zi myid zhoo" yo' koid da" khu , joem - dayham" gi myonhoo: ngeilang: shid re" yhoug: gyen: uri ci: wigi dayham" rigi khyi khang" moo" moo ci: da" zi joem nghoid nyid .
55002021	Byu dayug yug gi tid lid loo bye: da" akhyeing" ashoeb khyoo: mo nyang: nya: da" gungdu: ri ced" san pyam nghoid rigi hau: yug gi Aseing: yhoug: gyen: khyo" soin nyheung to" da" khyoo: moo yo" bo ci: yhoung: da" zi bue" lo khasu" wim ga: ri ri nyang: gi ge , da" moozoo" ja" khang" moo" moo-bo zei: wa shid re" jen" jen" nghoid nyid .
55002022	Zoolu: ayo , mo nheigloem: aco' ajhoid khyoo: ri jang" pyam' lho: Mangsoo ri gyeungshang: da" nheigloem: yo' pang" thoug wa ga: mho' nyid mo , yo' dage" deing byeung" khyoo: - jheddab da" khyoo: - ngei pyo: myen , jham" khyoo: joem ri yoem kaid' cang sho: nyid we' .
55002023	Nghoid loug we' afang: akyi: koid ziyo' athung" azhug koid ngeig goo" yang: go" da" dang: khoin" joem ri jang pyam' nyid we' . Houg: yhang: te" mo , da" lo" thang jang" moo gi myeing" myoo ; yhoo: she: da" khyoo: za: bue" lo nyid ziri nang se' nyid gu nghoid .
55002024	Hau" Aseing: da" dei zoo: yug koem gi myeing" myoo: yhoo: she: khyoo: age koid loo: za: nyang: gi byu dangain" ri nheig se' khyeug ziyo' nheigloem: sheung ; wigi se' jhoug" se' mhoo , byid: da" sara: nghoid ca" .
55002025	Nyhang" nyang: ri ngeug se: doin: lhoem" keung" lo da" byu yi ri so' koid so' nyheung: jang" moo nu" nham , sam" dab , khyoo: se' koid su: nghoid ca" nyid . Khasu" wim ga: ri nyangnu" gi nheigloem: thed' lo lho: hau" deingmain" da" khyoo: ri se' gyo: loo wa da" akhang" - Mangsoo gi nyangnu" ri byid: ri byid: loo wa zi nghoid .
55002026	Houg: lang" nyangnu" gi jo , da" khyoo: ri doem myang lo wigi boin: gyeung: lo lho: satan da" lhid' mo yo" loid lo boem wa zi nghoid . hau: gyeung: lo lho: satan da" hid' mo yo" loid lo boem wa zi nghoid hau ; satan gi nyangnu" ri myeug yu wigi nyang: myid vho: da" khyoo: moo cang loo" nhang yu" bye: su: nghoid .
55003001	Lo" thang da" bidnyid moo yau: khe" da" ayo , gi ju" loo wa ziri se' nyid we' .
55003002	Byu yi gi nyang: nya: da" akyu" ri za: shoo: mo , myo , no , vhoo: boo mo , nghoid thui: gyoo: mo , nheigloem: myhang: phau: khuang mo , za: bue" loo wa . Nyang: nu" gi juang" yi gei sang: yen" mo , myhi , phoo ri thougtheung mo , - jeju" ase' boin: mo , noku loem , khoug: khyoo: ci: aboo mo , bue" lo boem wa nghoid .
55003003	Nyang: nu" gi nheig ase' khyeig bang: - jheddab da" nheigloem: abo boem ziyo' nheig ashid: mo , akhyeing" ashoeb moo" zei: nyid mo , sube" myonhoo: ri lhu: pyang: byid: wa shid re" gei sang ; shang pyang: yen" mo , subi" yo' sham: ashoin" wa da" khyoo: acang loo: za: lhoid zoo: lhoid shug cang nyhen " zhoung: yen" mo , athoug" akhyoug: koid yen" mo , ju" lo boem wa . Hau: tho' moo gootu: nyangnu" gi ge , khyoo: ce" ja: ri nghoid loug we' avhoo: angei mo , nghoid boem wa .
55003004	Khoug: zoug" myhang moid mo , khoug: vhoid' loo: zhu: zoo: noug mo , nheigloem: azoung" ziyo' nheigloem: myhang: yoomo phau: khuang nghoid boin: wigi nyangnu" gi Mangsoo ri jheddab wa gung khoo: - nyang: nya: da" pyo: khyoo: ri je" vhoo: bang: nghoid boem wa .
55003005	Nyang: nu" gi yha" da" noku thung ri ri atho' dapyam: za: bo cang mhau' boem lho: wigi hau: noku thung" mo , phung" yoeb , rigi ngeug pyam mo , nghoid nyid boem ago" . Houg: yhang: te" byu yi ri we' jang" pyam' nyid we' .
55003006	Nyang: nu" mo dayham" bang: gi sube" yhoem: moo ; cang vang yen" lho: asi aboin: khyo" ase' myid soin: yu" da" yoem: nu: nyid myi: yi: yi ri nyangnu" lo , moo vang sho' mhe , yu ago - hau" myi: yi: yi gi nyangnu" shoid lid lo" yooboo yoomo nheigloem: yoolid: voin , lho: myid' apyo: zoore" - gung shoo" aco' ajhoid khyoo: aja: ja: moo bo myu: lo" wigi
55003007	Jhau" mho' khyoo: ri kham: yu wa shid re" kha: nham , we' vhongei yoem: kaid' nyid boem nghoid loug we' nyangnu" gi hau" deingmain" da" khyoo: ri se' jhang: jang" khyoo: kha: nham , we' ayo" ju" loo , lo: boem .
55003008	Akhui" yanne" yo' Yanbre eig yug gi Moshe ri thoutheung ngeug pyam' ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - he: byu joem we' hau: deingmain" khyoo: ri thoutheung ngeug pyam nyid boem ago" . Hau" byu joem gi nyangnu" ase' myid soin: yu" boem , loo: yoomo loem" jeung" khyoo: moo byo , yoin" soem" joem: lo" boem , ago" .
55003009	Nghoid loug we' nyangnu" da" oung: doid' lo" khyoo: gi hau: gu" mo jain" lho: myang" sho' yo" kham , zoo: goo" wa zi anghoid . Khasu" wim ga: ri Yanne yo' Yanbre" eig yug moo bue" lo da" khyoo: - myang thu' lo yhang: ti" - he: da" byu yi khayhi' ko" nyid boem khyoo: joem ri we' yu dangain" bang: da" shid khoin" moo myang thu loo wa zi nghoid .
55003010	Nghoid loug we' nang koem gi nga" da" jhoug" myeing" jhoug" thui: nga" asam" avoid yo' nga" kang: so' dei khyoo: moo myid soin' nyheung lo ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" cang lo" abye: . nga" da" loem" jeung khyoo: - ngoo nheigloem: sheung: kham , zeung: khyoo: - nga" da" jheddab myid - ngoo yoem: kaid' thoug shang" lo da" khyoo: -
55003011	Nga' da" kyi" khyeug shen" yhen lo da" khyoo: joem ri bo myang bo si' bye . Antioki voo , Ikoni voo , Lustra voo joem moo ngoo thoung" shau" da" gyoug pho" shen" yhen pyi: sho: khyoo: yo' ngoo kham , zo: loo bye: da" khyoo: joem dangain" ri nang se' nyid gu nghoid bye . Aseing: koem gi hau: khyoo: dangain" jang mo ngoori khyoid yu abye: .
55003012	Gyeing" nyang: Khristu moo kangso' dei lho: tarha" ri phau" cang khyoo: moo kangso' dei nyid noug mo , hang" nghoid loug we' shen" yhen kyi" khyeug da" jam , jau ri shau" boem wa zi nghoid .
55003013	Akhyeing" ashoeb , da" byu yi yo' mhoug zoo: mhoug shug yen" da" byu yi koem gi-subi" yo" mhoug zoo: lang" nyang: nyang: ri we' mhoug zo: zi doem , thoung" shau" wigi akhyeing" ashoeb , ziyo' age da" khyoo: moo age da" khyoo: khyoo: - je" je , jhen" vang lo boem wa zi nghoid nyid .
55003014	Nghoid loug we' nang koem gi jhau" mho' da" khyoo: ri kham: yu wigi geing: geing: teing teing loem" jeung" nyid bye: da" hau: deingmain" da" khyoo: moo xo' lho: d acang yhe: loo" we' . Re" sara: gi hang" nghoid ziri nang se' nyid gu nhgoid bye .
55003015	Nang gi zoonu" pyaid mo nyang: - se' da" akhyoo" bo jo , wigi Khristu Yesu ri loem" jeung" khyoo: yoomo khyoid yu khyoo: ri shau" yu wa shid re" khyoo: shed' vhu" she: da" hau: gyeungshang: da" jhoem: mougsoug" ri goolhoo" za: si' bye: su nghoid ziri we' daboin: nyid we' .
55003016	Hau: jhoem: mungdang: dangain" gi Mangsoo nyang: yoem: foin: byid: ziyo' lhid" to" zi nghoid yoomo deingmain" khyoo: ri jhoug" byid: wa ziyo' shoid vhang ; khyoo: ri we' yoobo toin" shid' gyikoid lho: jhoug" byid: nyid . Shoid vhang: lo" khyoo: ri so' koid so' nyheung wa ziyo' jo da" kangso' dei khyoo: moo jhoug" byid: mhoo , byid: wa shid re" akyu" bo .
55003017	Houg: yoomo Mangso da" moo" ri voin , vu , su: gi ge da" moozoo" ja" khang" moo" ri zei: wa shid re" yoem: so' byeung" sho' kaid' ci: lo" jang" moo Khin' azi akhoo: joeb , loo wa zi nghoid bye .
55004001	Mangso da" shid' khoin" moo we' dei nyid bang: yo' shid: jo , mo , ri tarha" dang: phyed' wa da" Khristu shid' khoin" moo we' hau: Aseing ; gi vhoeb , khang" wa da" kho: kham" khyo" ju" ri" wa zi nghoid wigi
55004002	Hau" mungdang: kho" kyoo" wa shid re" se' gyoo: nhang: wa shid re" yooboo toin" shid' lhoo: gyikoid wa shid re" yoem: foin , byid: wa shid re" - nheugloem: sheing:' sheing: jhoug" byid: mhoo , byid: wa shid re" ayo , aboin: eung: nghoid loug we' acoung: nghoid loug we' yoem: dakhaid nyid we ein: ngoo nang ri doin: nyhen" nyid .
55004003	Byu yi gi hau" deingmain" ziyo' ca yoo abo da" jhoug" myeing" jhoug" thui: ri atam" gyo: boem wigi nyang: tu: nya: nheigloem: aco' ajhoid khyoo: moo za: te: cang lo" boem ziyo' nyangnu" da" nheigloem: moo yo: phoin: loo" sho' nyang: tam" gyoo: nau da" se' jhoug" byid: da" sara: yi je" je , myo: lo boem sho' khyu: zheung" yu da" ayo , gi ju" loo wa zi nghoid .

55004005	Nang koem gi khayhang: te" da" akhyoo: again thoung" shau" loo nghoid loug we' re" da" gung du: ri zei: zeung" ci: lho: wigi kyi" khyeug khyoo: ri kham' zeung: nyid we' . 56002007	Khyoo: khaid gu: khang" moo" zei: so' lo" da" jang" moo nyang: gung nyang: yu" yu ge , da" khyoo shid: bue" nyid we' Dain: da" nheigloem: yo' abui" atho' - thain" thain: yhoug: gyen: khyo" jhau" poin" khoo" kyeung" nyid we' .
56002008	Nang ri thougtheung loo mo , gi ngoonu" ri ce: khyoo: moo we' ce: yooboo we' ashau" shoo: lo: yoomo sho' thu goo" baja" nang gi sube" wigi yooboo foin: zi ashug" loo: sho' deingmain" da" dang: joem yo' jhoug" byid: mhoo , byid: nyid we' .

56002010	Khoug" soo" lanyham" daja: we' akoid loo: za: houg: su" koid wa gung khoo: gi nyangnu" gi khanham we' ge reung: kyed koeb ziyo' dang: zung" bang: nghoid khyoo: ri toin" shid nyid boem ca" . 56003001	Mung" dain ri vhoeb khang" nyid bang: yo' amyeing" akhang ci: bang: da" vhoo: moo tam' gyo: nyid wa ziyo' ge da" moozoo" jid: zoo: jo , moo jo , ri zei: soo , wa jen" jen" nghoid nyid wa shid re" re" da" byu yi ri tid poin" nyid we' .

58002010	Nya: zoo: yi myoo" sho' we' myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri shau" kham: yu wa shid re" Jo , moo jo , ri phain" to" lho: yu goin yu" coung: zung" loug nyid da" Mangsoo gi Yesu Khristu ri kyi" khyeug jamjau shau" nhang: khyo" wigi joeb , byeung" su: bue" loo nhang: da" khyoo: gi yu" du , jo eung: da" khyoo: nghoid . 58002011	Yesu gi byu xang: su yi nyangnu" da" youg: noo yooboo mo ced" kyeung ced" shang: yu bye - nyang: yo' dage" ced" shang: yu bye: bang: gi nya: phoo dayug za: yoo" yoomo nyangnu" ri mang nhung" yi ga: wa ziri nyang: sho' wa zi anghoid .
58002012	Yesu gi " Nang zei: da" moo" zo" khyoo: nga" mang: nhung" yi ri ngoo tid kyoo" wa nyangnu" da" mo , phung: gung moo Nang ri ngoo jikhoin" yo' coung" nghei byid: wa , , ga: wigi Mangsoo ritid bye .
58002013	Hau: lho: Yesu doem tid zigi " Ngoo gi Mangsoo ri loem" jeung" khau: nghe: nyid wa nghoid , , ga: wigi we' Mangsoo ngoori byid: too" bye: da" nya: myid: nya: zoo: yi yo' dage" He: joyoo moo nyid nyid , , ga: wigi we' tid nyid .
58002014	Nya: zoo: yi ga: nyang: nyangnu" ri myheung byid: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - suid" shoo" kham: voin , da" byu yi nghoid ago - Yesu nyang: we' suid" shoo" kham: voin , da" xang: su: byugung re" kham: yu bye . 58002015	Hid: khyo" wigi shid: loo" no lo" khyoo: ri gyoug wigi pyaid goin" join , koid nyid bang: ri lhoid pyoin kaid' bye .
58002016	Khasu" wim gari nyang: gi moug: lagyoo: yi ri pang" thoug wa shid' mo re" zi anghoid - Jhoem: mougsoug" moo tid nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" te" - Abraham da" amyed , ashen , yi ri pang" thoug wa shid re" ju" re" khyoo: ri thoin" pang byid: nyid .
58002017	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nyang: gi byu yi da" yooboo ri yo" khyoid pyam byid: wa shid re" nheig se' khyeug deung byeung" da" khainjung moo" bue" lo khyo" Mangsoo moozoo" ri yo" voin , vu , baja" - khyoo: khaid zoo: khang" moo" moo Nya: mang: nya: nhung" yi thoung" shau" zo: nyid da" khyoo: ri nyangnu" yo' dage" bo shau" kham zoo: bye .
58002018	Akhid" nyang: gi Lahung" thoung" shau" zoore - nya: gung nyang: kyi" khyeug khyoo: shau" kham: yu bye: yoomo lahung" thoung" shau" mo , yo' kyi" khyeug zi shau" nyid mo , ri yo" pang" thoug nyid . .
58003001	Mangso khyen: khe: yu zishau" da" nga" Khristan mang: nhung" yi we" - ngoonu" yhen: kham: yu bye: da" noku thung" laloem lakhau: da" khainjung moo" zeung bue" loo wa shid re" Mangsoo nhang: kaid da" Yesu ri myid yu" ge' .
58003002	Moshe gi Mangso da" yhoem: mo nya: moozoo" moo kyed koeb yhangti" - he: moo" ri zei: wa shid re" khyen: yu shau" su: we' Mangsoo moo jhug zug nyid .
58003003	Yhoem: daloem: ri zheung" zhoug too" su: gi hau: yhoem: tho' moo je" gyi: da" myonhoo: yo" nyid yhangti" - Yesu we' Moshe da" tho' moo je gyi: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb yo' coung" byid: nghei byid: ziri kham: yu wa zi: moin: yi" nyid bye .

58003006	Khristu gi Mangso yhoem: ri zung" da" nya: zoo: deung byeung" su: yo' kyed' su: nghoid nyid . 58003012	Loem" jeung" nyid da" mang: nhung" yi we" - dei nyid da" Mangso jang" mo vhang: lam" loo" sho'-akhyeing" ashoeb da" loem , shoid nheigloem: boo da" byu - nanu" moo dayug we' aboo loo: sho' zed" nyid ge' .
58003013	Nanu" mo dayug we' - youg: noo yoobo wigi mhau , mhed" jhu , phyo' zi shau" lho: nheigloem: thain: nyid da" byu yi abui" goo" baja" - Jhoem: mungdang: moo tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Akhid" nyid" ein: ngoonu" shid re" yo" tid nyid shi" da" ayo , bidnyid moo nyid" khang" moo" nyang: cang" nyang: pang" thoug go" nyid ge' .

58003015	Jhoem: mungdang: moo tid to" khyoo: gi " Akhid" nyid" nanu" Mangso da" thui: shau" gyo: boem nghoid rigi Mangsoo ri nanu" da" nya: phoo nya: phoug" - gyi koid lo boem yhang: ti" - nheigloem: thain: nyid agoo" ga: tid nyid .
58003016	Mangso da" thui: ri gi shau" gyo: nyid lho: nyang: ri gyi koid nyid bang: gi hang" nghoid nyid boem lha" . Nyangnu" gi Egutu meing: mo Moshe shu" thu' loo mo , dangain" bang: nghoid nyid ago" .

58004003	Loem" jeung" nyid mo , ngoonu" koem gi Mangsoo dang: theung to" da" ngei bu doug no: khyoo: ri shau" kham: yu boem bye . 58004011	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nyangnu" aloem" ajeung" jang" mo wigi doug noo: jang: moo ayo" vang lo" da" Israela byumyu" yi yhang: ti" - ngoonu" hang" we' houg: su" abue" loo" baja" - hau" doug noo: joyoo khyoo: yo" vang loo" wa shid mo yha" da" yoem: vhoo" bain' sho' yoem: kaid boem shang .
58004012	Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo mungdang: khoin" gi dadei nyid ziyo' - sham: soo" eig shoid tho' lho: ce: ja" lhab , sham: tho' mo we' je , tho' jo . 58004014	Hougsu" nghoid nyid yoomo ngoonu" yhen: yu lho: loem" jeing" bye: da" loem khau: khyoo: moo nheigloem: zug jo , shang - Khasu" wim gari Mangso da" shid khoin" moo khyang: vang loo" bye: Mangsoo da" nya: zoo: - Yesu ga: da" Khainjung zeing dayug - ngoonu" yoo" nyid bye .
58004015	Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" da" khainjung agyi moo" gi ngoonu" ca" nyid da" gung nham , yoem: nu: khyoo: ri nheig ase' khyeig su: anghoid - ngoonu" yhang: ti" - khyoo: khaid khang" moo" moo gung" lau" thoung" shau" yu" nghoid loug we' youg: noo yooboo akoid yu" da" khainjung moo" nghoid .
58004016	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi nheigloem: moo yoem: bo ziyo' Mangso jeju" zhung: tang shid' khoin" khyoo: yu: vang yhe: lo" boem shang . Houg: su" nghoid lang" gi ngoonu" ca" yo lo da" ayo , moo - ngoonu" moo pang" thoug da" je ju" joem ri shau" kham: yu boem wa zi nghoid nyid . .
58005001	Khainjung agyi yug khang" moo" gi yooboo yoomo xoin" du: yo' jhung: shug jhung: lang: ngei" byid: baja" - byumyu" yi mo khyen: yu lho: xang: su" byu yi dangain" mo , shid re" Mangsoo ri noku coung" nghei wa shid' mo nyheung to" zi shau" su: nghoid nyid .
58005002	Nya: gung du: nyang: we' khyoo: ja: khang" moo" moo yoem: nu: su: nghoid yoomo ci" we' asi abui" mo , shoid vhang: khyoo: dam: dam: loo" mo , ri gyi: sheung: da" nheigloem: yo" toin" shid' su nghoid .
58005003	Nyang: nya: da" gung du: yoem: nu: su anghoid nyid yoomo byu gootu: yi da" youg: noo yoobo shid re" za: we' anghoid - nya: yoobo shid re" we' xoin" to' yu ca" .
58005004	Hang" nghoid loug we' nya: gung ri khainjung agyi moo" bui" wa myonhoo: ngeilang: mo yo" khyen: tang: to" zi anghoid . Arun ri yhang: ti" Mangsoo khyen: yu yug za: khainjung agyi moo" dayo" bue" lo .
58005005	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - Khristu gi khain: jung agyi zeing bue" da" myonhoo: aya: yo' nya: gung du: ri nyang: phau: khuang tu: to' zi anghoid . Houg: su" koid wa gung khoo: gi nang gi nga" zoo: nghoid da - Akhid" nyid" gi ngoo re" phoo bue" loo bye ga: tid nyid da" Mangsoo wigi nyang: ri coung" nghei tu: to' byid: zi nghoid .

58005007	Yesu gi mougmyid tho' moo kang: so' dei nyid shi" ayo , - Nyang: ri shid: jang" mo yo" khyoid yu da" Mangso jhang thui: zeing yo' ngoug byid' ngoug nhab , thu' wigi akyu" mho' toung" pain zi koid yu" bye . 58005008	Nyang: gi Mangso nya: zoo: gyeing" nyang: nghoid nyid loug we' kyi" khyeug sho" jhen: khyoo: ri kham lho: tam" gyo: khyoo: ri jhau" yu bye .
58005009	Nyang: ri joeb , byeung" su: ga: bain koid yu thang: ri nyang: gi tam" gyo: nyid mo , dangain" shid re" apyaid' ato: da" khyoid yu khyoo: mo apoem: ayang: bue" loo" bye .
58005010	Mangsoo we' nyang: ri Melkhizedeg da" khainjung aya: ri khyoid zhoung" yu da" khainjung agyi moo" nghoid ga - Mangsoo gi nyang ri tid fu" byid: bye .
58005011	He: da" khyoo: yo' sen: lho: wigi ngoonu" tid wa joyoo myoo" sho' boo shi" - nghoid loug we' nanu" gi myab , ase' gyo: yu mo , nghoid nyid boem yoomo nanu" ri tid phoid kyoo" wa zi yau: nyid .
58005012	Ayo , akhyeing: khyo" soin: yu" rigi nanu" gi sara bui" moin: yo , nghoid boem bye - nghoid loug we' Mangso da" apoem: ayang: mungdang: ri lang" gi byu dayug yug wigi nanu" ri dajhoug" byid: ca" shi" - nanu" gi thain: da" zoo: noem ri zoo: wa shid mo noug" za: dashug ca" nyid boem shi" .
58005013	Noug" za: dashug ca" nyid mo , hang" we' jo: ziyo' shoid da" khyoo: ri ci" we' ase' kho' yu" shi" da" zoonu" danghoid nyid shi" .
58005014	Thain: da" zoo: noem , koem gi ludaid' yi shid' re" nghoid nyid wigi nyangnu" gi cang zei: jhau" lo" khyo" ge: ziyo' age zi ri se' soin: se' kho' mo , nghoid nyid boem . .
58006001	Houg: su" nghoid nyid yoomo nanu" gi Khristain yi da" loem" jeung" khyoo: apoem: ayang: lhid" cab , myhi , yi ri to" pyam' kho boem lho: loem , khau: khyoo: moo nheig bo - gyi: deung loo bye: mo , yo' young" du , joeb byeung" gyi: sheung: da" jhau" mho' khyoo: khyoo: - byi , ce" yhe: lo" boem loo: shang .
58006002	Babtisma kham: khyoo: - lo , ke" aya: tang: byid: khyoo: - shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' lo da" khyoo: yo' apyaid' atoo: moo tarha" dang: phyed' khyoo: ri apoem: ayang: mo wigi doem poug jhau" nyid anoo" loo .
58006003	Akhid" Mangso akhang" byid: nghoid ri gi ngoonu" he: khyoo: ri zei: lo" boem wa nghoid .
58006004	Khasu" wim gari hau" loem" jeung" da" khyoo: mo dalheing: doem , phoug tau" loo" bye: bang: gi nheigloem: dalheing: doem thed' loo wa shid re" khasu" se' ge , bui" loo wa . Nyangnu" gi Mangso da" bidbang moo dalheing: nyid yu" bye: mo , nghoid wigi Moug: khung: mo jeju" jhung: shug ri da lheing: bain ca yu" bye: ziyo' hau: gyeungshang: da" Venyi ri dalheing: coem , kham: yu yu" bye: bang: nghoid nyid boem .
58006005	Hau: lho: nyangnu" gi Mangso mungdang: ge zi nghoid ziri we' thang: phyang" pyaid yo' sen: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb ei: we' yoem: vhoo: ri we' nyang: tu: nya: gung du: nyang - shau" kham: zo: lho: se' yu bye: bang: nghoid nyid boem .
58006006	Nghoid loug we' nyangnu" gi nyang: nya: da" loem" jeung" loem , khau khyoo: ri she: pyam boem bye - nyangnu" gi Mangso da" nya: zoo: ri pyang" zeing moo dalheing: doem baid jen" lhang" lho: mung" byu yi da" shid' khoin" moo aphoug" akhyoid' sho' thu' nhang: boem yoomo nyangnu" ri nheigloem: doem thed' loo wa da" shid re" gi kha: su" we' age bui" loo .
58006007	Myoo" sho' lheing: vo , shoin" byid: da" moug: gyid' ri kham: yu lho: phoug shoo" mo , shid' re" akyu" bo da" shivoo: shiloem , joem ri youg gyi: loo nhang: da" myid' jang: ri Mangsoo gi mainkaid jeju" byid: nyid .
58006008	Nghoid loug we' hau" myidjang: gi zugam yo' myo , gam ri za: youg thu' loo nhang: nghoid rigi ce" akyu" we' abo tho' moo agoo" - Mangsoo da" nheing" khoin" yo' gyoug pho" khyoo: za: thoung" shau" lho: myi: moo nghe , jhoem" pyam' shau" wa nghoid . 9Jheddab , bang: we" - ngoonu" hid: su" ein: da tid nyid nghoid loug we' nanu" yo' sen: lho: ngoonu" gi gye" myid loem , nyid nanu" gi hau: khyoid yu khyoo: yo' sen: lho: je" ge , da" khyoid yu khyoo: ri yo" yu ziri ngoonu" se' nyid bye .
58006009	Jheddab , bang: we" - ngoonu" hid: su" ein: da tid nyid nghoid loug we' nanu" yo' sen: lho: ngoonu" gi gye" myid loem , nyid nanu" gi hau: khyoid yu khyoo: yo' sen: lho: je" ge , da" khyoid yu khyoo: ri yo" yu ziri ngoonu" se' nyid bye .
58006010	Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo gi atarha" koid nyid su: anghoid - nyang: gi nanu" zei: so' voin , vu , lid loo bye: da" moozoo" ri we' Aseing: ri jheddab khyoo: toin" shid' wa shid re" lid loo" bye: da" ayo , mo zi akhid" ju" sho' phung byu nyang: cang" pang" thoug go" da" khyoo: ri we' Mangsoo gi to" myhed' pyam byid: wa zi anghoid . 11Ngoonu" myid vho: nyid da" khyoo: zeing gi nanu" nheig byu nyid boem da" khyoo: byeung" joeb , lo da" jang" moo ju" sho' yug khang" moo" gi nyang: nyang: vho: ngei nyid da" khyoo: ri za: lo" thang moo ju" sho' geung: teung jo , nhang: wa shid re" nghoid .
58006011	Ngoonu" myid vho: nyid da" khyoo: zeing gi nanu" nheig byu nyid boem da" khyoo: byeung" joeb , lo da" jang" moo ju" sho' yug khang" moo" gi nyang: nyang: vho: ngei nyid da" khyoo: ri za: lo" thang moo ju" sho' geung: teung jo , nhang: wa shid re" nghoid .
58006012	Ngoonu" gi nanu" ri nei" mo , abue" loo" nhang: noug - nghoid loug we' loem" jeung" khyoo: yo' nheigloem: sheung: wigi Mangsoo dang: soo" to" da" agyid asoo: ri kham: yu bye: bang: yhang: ti" bue" nyid ge' .
58006013	Mangsoo gi Abraham ri dang: soo" khoin" byid: to" uri Nya: dang: soo" khoin" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - nyang: koid wa da" khyoo: ri je gyi: thang da Mangsoo mying ri lang jham , tang: to .
58006014	Ngoo gi nang ri gyeing" nyang: mainkaid byid: lho: amyed Ahsen yi myoo" sho' byid: wa" - ga: dang: soo" too" bye ga: wigi tid .
58006015	Abraham gi kham , zeung: ziyo' lang" nyid yoomo Mangso dang: soo" khoin" yo' sen: - agyid asoo: ri shau" kham: yu bye .
58006016	Byu yi gi jham , tang: go" da" uri nyang: nya: tho' moo je gyi: su: dayug yug da" myeing ri lang: lho: lhoung tang: go" ziyo' nyangnu" nyang: ngeig goo" gyang: go" da" khyoo: dangain" ri hau: jham , tang: go" dang: yo' lhoung zei: pain pyam ago" .
58006017	Mangsoo gi nyang: myid soin' nyheung lo" da" khyoo: joem ri thed' pyam' - shai" loo" nhang: wa zi anghoid loo: za: dang: soo" khoin" yo' sen: da" agyid asoo: kham: yu mo , ri bang bang toin" shid' nau nyid . Houg: yoomo nya: da" dang: soo" khoin" moo jham , tang: dang: lung: kaid to .
58006018	Mangsoo gi mhoug su: anghoid - houg: yoomo nya: da" dang: soo" khoin" yo' nya: jham , tang: khyoo: eig khaid gi khanham we' athid' loo" - ashai" lo" da" dang: eig khoin" nghoid nyid . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nyang: moo nghe: khau: lho: goem , loem khyoo: yo" yu mo , ein: da" ngoonu" gi ngoonu" ri byid: to" da" nheig byu joyoo ri geing: geing: zei: lho: pu" lhang" too" wa shid mo yoem: lung: byid: zi shau" boem bye .
58006019	Ngoonu" gi hau nheig byu joyoo ri ngoonu" da" kangso' dei khyoo: moo joto' nghui" zeing daloem: yhang: ti" - yo" kham: yu boem bye . Hau: zigigoem , loem , khyoo: yo' geung: teung khyoo: - nghoid wigi moug: khung: tho' mo noku yhoem: yo' pain" yam , akhau: shoid mo yab , khyoo: yo" kyang lid vang lo" boem bye .
58006020	Aseing Yesu gi ngoonu" da" gung thid' - hau: joyoo khyoo: - ju" vang loo" bye: zi nghoid yoomo Melikhizedeg da" khainjung nyhoug boo yoomoo - apyaid' atoo: mo khainjung agyi moo" bue" loo bye .
58007001	He: da" Melkhizedeg gi salem voogung mo khokham" yo' Myhang: thang da" Mangso khainjung agyi phoo nghoid . Khokham" myid: yug ri zain: ong: lho: Abraham doem ju" lo da" uri Melkhizedeg gi nyang: ri lhoem: tau , yu lho: main , kaid' byid .
58007002	Abraham we' nyang: ci: lo da" zi yoo joem mo xi: boem , mo daboem gi Melkhezedeg ri byid: da . ( Melkhizedeg ein: da" myeing dangkang: gi Deing byeung" da" khokham" nghoid wigi Salem Khokham" ga: zigi Ngei bu da" khokham" ein: da" dangkang: nghoid . )
58007003	Melkhizedeg da" nya: myhi' nya: phoo - byu kung: byuko' byu jhung" ri we' Nyang: khu: lo ziyo' shid: lo" da" mhoo: myid: ri we' agyo: yu" amyang yu" yoomo nyang: giMangso da" nya: zoo: yo' du , nyid wigi pyaid moo too: moo danyid nyid da" khainjung phoo nghoid .
58007004	Nya: da" dain' thu nya: phoug" nya: phoo Abraham gi Gyipui" mo yo" yu lo da" dangain" jang" mo daxi: boem mo daboem - Melkhizedeg ri xoin" to' byid: nghoid rigi houg: yhang: te" xoin" to' byid: zi rikham: yu su: gi khayhi' gyi: su: nghoid ein: ziri nanu" myid soin: yu" ge' .
58007005	Khain: jung aya: yo" yu da" Levi nya: myid: nya: zoo: yi gi Abraham da" akung: ako' mo byo gyo" loo bang: nghoid loug we' nyang: nya: da" mang: nhung" - Israela byumyu" yi lang" gi daxi: boem , mo daboem: ri kuid: yu wa shid mo hau: toung: to" da" tarha" moo tid too" bye .
58007006	Melkhizedeg gi Levi amyu" mo anghoid loug we' Abraham jang" mo daxi: boem , daboem , ri kham: yu lho: Mangsoo jang" mo dang: soo" khoin" yo" yu ci: da" Abraham ri main , kaid' byid: bye .
58007007	Main kaid' byid: su: gi main , kaid' byid: ziri kham: yu su: tho' mo je gyi: su: nghoid zigi ci: ngeig goo" wa khyoo: ajo .
58007008	Khain: jung agyi yi khyo" daxi: boem , mo daboem da" alu: ri kuid: yu zigi shid: loo" se' da" byu yi jang" mo nghoid nyid nghoid loug we' Melkhizedeg yu da" daxi: boem mo daboem gi jhoem: mungdang: moo tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" dadei nyid su: kuid: yu da" xi: boem mo daboem nghoid .
58007009	Xi: boem mo daboem: da" alu: ri kuid: yu da" Levi byumyu" yi gi Abraham da" lo , khyo" wigi daxi: boem mo daboem ri Melkhizedeg ri byid bye - ein: we' yo" tid bye .
58007010	Khasu" wim gari Melkhizedeg gi Abraham ri lhoem: tau yu da" uri Levi akhu: ri" shi" - nya: phoug" Abraham da" phyid" doem: moo dabo jo , shi ein: wigi yo" tid nyid .
58007011	Israela byumyu" yi ri hau: toung: to" da" tarha" byid: uri Levi da" akung: ako' mo khainjung aya: moo apoem: ayang: qei" lho: byid: too" bye . Akhid" Levi da" byumyu" akung: mo khainjung aya: ri joeb byeung" sho' yo" voin , vu , deung" deung nghoid rigi Arun da" gung thid' Melkhizedeg da" aya: ri kham: yu da" khainjung goo" tu dayug thu loo anoo" loo .
58007012	Khasu" wim gari hau" khainjung aya: ri dayo" thed' pyam nghoid rigi hau: toung: to" da" tarha" we' yo" thed' pyam wa zi nghoid .
58007013	Hid: akhid" tid nyid ziyo' sen: su: - ngoonu" da" Aseing: gi Amyu" goo" tu: yo' sen: su: nghoid wigi hau: amyu" mo hang" we' khainjung dayug khyo" wigi khanham we' phoin: tho' moo xoin" ri ngei" yu" zi anghoid .
58007014	Aseing: gi Yuda byumyu" mo khu: thu' lo zigi bang bang nyang nghoid nyid Moshe gi khain: jung yi yo' sen: lho: wigi tid uri Yuda byumyu" da" mhoomyid: ci" we' atid too .
58007015	Melkhizedeg yo' du go" da" gootu: khain: jung - dayug thu loo yoomo khainjung amyu" thed' lo" byug bye: zigi je" bang thu' loo bye .
58007016	Hau: yug gi Khain: jung aya: moo byu wigi nyheung soin' to" da" akhyoo" again khyo" cang lho: aya: tang: too" shau" su: anghoid . Athang agoin da" kangso' yoem: moo" khyo" tang: too" shau" su: nghoid .
58007017	Khasu" wim gari jhoem: mungdang: moo ( Nang gi Melkhizedeg da" aya: moo xo' lho: wigi apyaid' atoo: mo khainjung dayug bue" loo wa ga: tid to .
58007018	Xang: shed" mo da" tarha" gi yoem: neung: lo" lho: akyu" aboo loo: yoomo dangain" shoem" shoung: pyam zi shau" nyid bye .
58007019	Khasu" wim gari Moshe da" tarha" gi ce" ja: khyoo: moo we' joeb , byeung" sho' yo" koid bue" khyoo: ajo - akhid" koem gi hau" toung: to" da" tarha" da" gung thid' - je" ge da" nheig byu joyoo yo" byid: bye: yoomo ngoonu" gi Mangso jhang khyoo: yo" yu: tain" vang lo" boem bye .
58007020	Hau: tho" moo gootu - Mangsoo thang" cab to" da" dang: jo , shi" - hau: lho: gootu: bang: gi jham , tang: zi aboo loo: za: khainjung aya: moo tang: to" zi shau" ago" .
58007021	Nghoid loug we' Yesu gi jham , tang: to" dang: yo' khainjung bue" loo bye . Mangsoo nyang: ri tid zigi ( Nang gi apyaid' atoo: mo khainjung bue" loo wa" ga: wigi hau: Aseing: gi datheung tid bye: yoomo Nyang: tid to" dang: ri yoeb , yu loo: wa zi anghoid , ga: wigi tid .
58007022	Hid: yhang: ti" aya: kham: yu jang" moo shai" go" nyid yoomo Aseing Yesu gi je" ge da" dang: khoin" ri koo" kham: kham: byid: su: bue" loo bye .
58007023	Hau: lho: wigi-shai" go" khyoo: gootu: boo shi"-khainjung aya: ri kham: yu da" khainjung gootu: myoo" sho' yug boo shi" - nyangnu" gi shid: lo" da" khyoo: ri ayo" jang" pyam' boem yoomo nyangnu" da" moozoo" ri ayo" xo' zei: loo" nghoid ago" .
58007024	Nghoid loug we' Aseing Yesu gi apyaid' atoo: mo kangso' dei nyid su: nghoid wigi nya: da" khainjung aya: we' byu dayug yug da" lo , moo yo" thoid' vang loo" wa zi anghoid .
58007025	Hougsu" nghoid nyid yoomo-nyhang" gi nyang: ri loem , nghe: khau: lho: Mangso jhang khyoo: yu: tain" vang loo bang: ri-khanham we' khyoid khyu: yu wa da" yoem: moo" bo nyid . Khasu" wim gari" nyang: gi nyangnu" nya: shid re" - Mangso jang" moo mho' tung" bain: byid: wa shid' mo khanham we' dadei nyid .
58007026	Hougsu" wigi Aseing Yesu gi ngoonu" moo bue" nyid da" ca" vho: khyoo: joem ri pang" byid: thug byid: wa ngoonu" shid re" gye" yhoug: gyen: da" khainjung agyi moo" nyang nghoid bye . Nyang: gi gyeungshang: su: nghoid nyid wigi-nyang: moo shoid vhang: zi youg: noo yooboo ci" we' aboo . Nyang: gi yooboo yoo" mo , phung: moo aboo - gooki" led' da" moug: khung: moug di moo ju" sho' coung" nghei tu: to' kaid zi shau" su: nghoid .
58007027	Nyang: gi gootu: da" khainjung agyi yi yhangti"-xang shed" ri nyang: tu: nya: da" youg: noo yooboo shid re"-nyid" khang" moo" xoin" nghei" byid: nyid wa ca" su: anghoid . Nyang: gi nya: da" gung du: ri xoin" du: koid lho:-xoin" to' byid: uri-dalheing: za: yo' bain' sho' ngei" byid: pyam bye .
58007028	Moshe da" tung: to" tarha" gi-yoem: neung: lo" lho: ajoeb , abyeung" da" byu yi ri-khainjung aya: moo tang: too" byid . Nghoid loug we' toung: to" da" tarha" thu lo thang: ri apyaid atoo: moo joeb byeung" da" nya: zoo: ri Mangso dangtheung yo' thang" cab byid: wigi khainjung agyi zeung da" aya moo tang: byid: to" zi nghoid .
58008001	Akhid" ngoonu" tid kyo" nyid da" khyoo: joem mo yhau: gyeung: thang da" dang" zeing khoin" gi Houg: yhangte" da" khainjung agyi moo" ngoonu" yo" boem bye . Nyang: gi moug: khung: moug: di tho' mo amyeing" akhang" bo da" zhung: tang lo , yo shoid moo lo" zhoung: jo , bye .
58008002	Nyang: gi moug: khung: moug: di tho' mo gyeungshang: thang da" joyoo moo khainjung agyi zeung da" moo" ri voin , vu , nyid hau: joyoo gi moug: khung: moug: ein: da" byu da" lo , wigi akoid to" da" Mangsoo zoem" gyeing" nyang: nghoid nyid .
58008003	Khain: jung agyi zeing yi yug khang" moo" gi jhung: shug jhung: lang: yo' gougnyhoug xoin" ri ci: lho: Mangsoo ri xoin" ngei" byid: wa shid re" tang: too" mo , nghoid boem ago" . Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" ngoonu" da" khainjung agyi moo" we' nyang: moo ngei" byid: wa xoin" daja: gi yoo" ca" nyid .
58008004	Nyang: gi mougmyid tho' moo danyid shi" nghoid rigi nyang: gi kha: khyo" we' khainjung agyi bui" wa zi anghoid . Khasu" wim gari Yuda yi da" tarha" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - jhung: shug jhung: lang: ci: lho: xoin" to' byid: mo , nyid nyid gu nghoid boem bye .
58008005	Khain: jung yi khyo" nyangnu" koid da" moozoo" joem gi moug: khung: moug: di mo noku xoin" ngei" byid: da" alhoo: ayoeb , za: nghoid nyid . Moshe zei: lid loo" bye: da" moozoo" joem we' houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" za: nghoid nyid . Khasu" wim gari Moshe gi hau: dang: theung thang" cab , yo' sen: da" zoem" koid shed" lo" uri Mangsoo gi nyang: ri-boem tho' moo ngoo nang ri toin" shid' da" azuang khoo" shid yo' dakhyoo" te" dangain" da goo" sho' yo" koid wa zi zed" lhid nyid we' ga: tid too" yoomo nghoid .
58008006	Nghoid loug we' akhid" koem gi hau: khainjung yi yo" da" aya: dangain" tho' mo je gyi: da" khainjung moozoo" aya: gi Yesu ri byid: too" bye . Mangsoo yo' byu yi da" agyoo: moo - Yesu nyheing byid: to" da" dang: theung thang" cab , gi je" ge da" dang: theung thang" cab , nghoid bye . Khasu" wim gari hau: dang: theung thang" cab , gi xang: shed" mo dang: theung to" da" thang" cab , tho' moo je" ge da" thang" cab , ayang: qei" to" zi nghoid bye .
58008007	Xang: shed" mo da" dang: soo" khoin" moo aci: ca" loo: nghoid rigi thang: mo eig loem: ein: da" dang: soo" khoin" rigi doem koid too" gi aca" loo .
58008008	Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi nya: byumyu" yi ri yooboo foin: zoore" tid zigi ( Israela byumyu" yi yo" we' Yuda byumyu" yi yo' we' dang: theing khoin" theing go" too" wa da" bidnyid gi ju" loo bye ga: Aseing: tid nyid .
58008009	He: da" dang: thang" cab , gi Nyang: nu" ri nga" lo , yo' she: yu wigi Egutu meing: mo shu" thu' lo da" uri nya: phoug" nya: pho , yo' too" go" da" dang: soo" khoin" yo' du , goo" loo: wa zi anghoid . Nyang: nu" gi ngoo nyangnu" yo' too" go" da" dang: soo" ri lhed: pyam' yoomoo - ngoo nyangnu" ri ayu" acoung: loo wa , ga: hau: Aseing: gi tid nyid .
58008010	Akhid" he: da" dang: soo" khoin" gi ju" loo wa da" bidnyid yi thang: moo Israela byumyu" yi yo' ngoo too" too" wa da" dang: soo" thang" cab , nghoid nyid . Nyang: nu" da" nheigloem: e" myed khoug: moo nga" da" tarha" kaid' byid: too" wa zi nghoid . Nyang: nu" da" Mangsoo gi ngoo koid wa nghoid wigi nyangnu" gi nga" da" byumyu" yi bue" lo boem wa nghoid .
58008011	Nyangnu" mo hang" nghoid loug we' nyang: nya: da" moug: seing: byu yi nghoid loug we' nyang: nya: da" seing" tain" byumyu" nyang: cang" nghoid loug we' Mangsoo ri se' lo boem sho' jhau" mhoo , byid: ca" loo: wa zi anghoid . Khasu" wim gari nge thang jang" mo zi gyi: thang jang" moo ju" sho' nyangnu" dangain" mo , gi ngoori se' lo boem bye .
58008012	Nyang: nu" da" yooboo ri ngoo khyoid pyam byid: wigi Nyang: nu" shoid vhang: lo" khyoo: ri ngoo doem , boin: byid: loo: wa zi anghoid . ga: hau: Aseing: tid nyid .
58008013	Hau: dang" soo" thang" cab , khyoo: - Aseing: ri tid ziyo' Mangsoo gi xang: shed" mo da" dang: soo" thang" cab , ri axoug" koid pyam byid: bye - axoug" bue" lho: yoem: zam: lo" da" zi ce" noem nghoid loug we' kha: myhang anghoid ri gi byug wa zi za: nghoid nyid .
58009001	Xang: shed" mo dang: soo" to" da" thang" cab , moo noku coung" nghei khyoo: bo nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - byu lo , yo' koid da" noku joyoo we' jo , ca" wa nghoid .
58009002	Khasu" wim gari gyeungshang: da" joyoo ga: da" xang: shed" pyaid moo noku zoem" daloem: koid to" boem . Houg: mo xang: shed" yab , moo myibung: ki" jang: yo' Mangsoo ri xoin" to' byid: zooyho' ke" da" zoobui" jo , jo .
58009003	Hau: lho: eig loem: ein: da" pain" xiyam , da" akhau: shoid moo gyeungshang: thang da" joyoo ein: da" zoem" jo , jo .
58009004	Hau: jang" moo nam , pyo: ja: nghe , nghei" byid: da" sheing: yo' koid to" da" phoin: yo' dagung goin" sheing: yeing shoin" da" Dang: Theing Kuid: bo jo . Hau" kuid: zei: khoug: moo Mana' zooyho' bo da" dibu: we' afu' nu" toid' lo nyid da" Arun da" lham: dung: we' tung: to" tarha" lhid" to" da" lug yho' eig khyab , we' bo jo .
58009005	Hau" soodeug da" atho' moo - dung eig khyab , dab , da" Kherubim soolhoo: eig khyab , jo wigi Mangsoo bo zung" nyid da" aved , ri thu nhang: boem . Nyangnu" da" dung joem ri youg: noo yooboo ri khyoid pyam byid: joyoo ein: da" soodeug amyhid" tho' moo pyo: nghoeb , to" boem . he: da" dangkang: ri jid" nug nug phoid: kho" nyid aca" loo .
58009006	He: da" noku coung" nghei byid: da" thung" ri yo' dakhyoo" ti" - azi akhoo: ri bain' jhoeb , to" thang: ri khainjung agyi yi gi nyangnu" da" noku shu" vhu" she: da" moo" ri voin , vu , wa shid re" zoem" khoug: mo xang: shed" ju" vang lo" da" yab , moo nyid" khang" moo" vang lo" nyid boem .
58009007	Nghoid loug we' zoem" khoug: mo noku joyoo moo koem gi khainjung agyi gyi: thang su: za: nya: shid re" we' mung" byu yi asi aboin: loo: shoid vhang: da" yoobo shid re" we' xoin" to' byid: da" suid" ri ci: lho: dazain' ri dalheing: za: date: yo" vang lo .
58009008	Hau: da" thung" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - xang: shed" ju" vang lo" da" yab , goin" dageung: jo , jo , gi gyeungshang: da" yab , khyoo: khoem" aphang shi" wa da" khyoo: hau: gyeungshang: da" venyi gi bang bang jhoug" byid: nyid .
58009009	He: da" khyoo: gi he: pyaid mo da" khyoo: ri toin" shid nyid dang: tu , daloem: nghoid nyid Hau: da" dangkang: gi Mangso jhang khyoo: - ngei" byid: nyid da" jhung: shug jhung: lang: yi yo' gougnyhoug xoin" du: joem gi noku coung" nghei su: da" ung: khoug: nheigloem: ri yo" joeb , byeung" loo" nhang: wa zi anghoid .
58009010	Hau: gu: gi zoo: noem , shug phoo" yo' ced" yung" ced" lho , da" thung" aja: ja: yo' sen: lho: wigi zei: da" khyoo: za: nghoid nyid . Hau: gu: giMangso wigi aseig dioem nyheung so' da" apyaid' aju" shi" uri byam , koid to" da" atho' pyam: yo' sen: da" cang yhe: loo" wa tarha" thung" ri nghoid nyid .
58009011	Nghoid loug we' Khristu gi akhid" nyhang" yo" kham , zo: nyid bye: da" nyid ge nyid de , loo wa khyo: da" khainjung agyi moo" khyo" nyang: ju" ri" bye . Nyang: noku xoin" ngei" byid: da" zoem" gi lo , wigi akoid to" da" he: phain" too" shau" da" mougmyid yo" asen: da" je" gyi: lho: joeb , byeung" da" noku zoem" nghoid nyid .
58009012	Khristu gi gyeungshang: da" joyoo khoug: khyoo: - pyaid mo too: mo shid re" dalheing: dam - bain' sho' vang lo" da" uri xoin" ngei" byid: wa shid' re" shoobaid' suid" - nujung lo: suid" ri aci: vang loo" loo: za: Nya: da" suid" yo' vang lo" wigi ngoonu" shid re" apyaid' atoo: mo khyoid yu khyoo: ri yo" yu nhang: bye .
58009013	Shoobaid' suid" nujung lo: suid" - myi: moo nghe , pyam bye: nujung nu" da" myimoeb , yo' aco' ajhoid bue" da" byu yi tho' moo noku coung" nghei da" thung" tarha" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - byeug shoin" gyoin: kaid' ri-ayung" asain lo: da" byu yi ri yo" ced" yung" ced" lho , zi dadeung nghoid rigi
58009014	Khristu da" suid" gi hau: tho' mo je" wigi yo" ced" yung" ced" lho , byid: zi anghoid goo" la" . Khristu gi hau: apyaid' atoo: mo venyi yo' nya: da" gung du: ri ce" noo abo da" xoin" khyo" wigi Mangsoo ri ngei" byid: pyam bye . Dadei nyid da" Mangsoo ri ngoonu" yo" noku coung" nghei sho' Khristu da" suid" gi ngoonu" da" nheigloem: e" myed ri akyu" abo da" noku loem , khau: khyoo: moo cang lo" jang" mo yo" ced" yung" ced" shang: yu byid: bye .
58009015	Khyoo: he: khaid khyo" Mangso khe: yu zi shau" bang: gi Mangsoo nyang: dang: soo" khoin" byid: too" bye: da" apyaid' atoo: mo mainkaid jeju" - shau" kham: yu boem baja" ga: Khristu gi dang: thang" cab , aseig rinyheing byid: bye . Hougsu" kham: yu wa da" amyeing" akhang" ri yo" yu da" khyoo: gi xang: shed" mo da" dang: theing khoin" akhoug: moo nyid uri shoid vhang: lo" da" youg: noo yooboo mo khyoid lhoid kaid' wa shid re" shid: kham , khyoo: dakhaid bue" thu loo yoomo nghoid bye .
58009016	Agyid asoo: yo' sen: da" dang: soo: khoin" ri bue" thu' loo nhang: wa da" shid re" dang: theing go" too" bye . Gyeing" nyang: shid: bye: khyoo: sagsi: ri toin" shid' ca" nyid .
58009017	khasu" wim gari dang: soo" too" su: dadei nyid shi" uri gi dang: soo" age bui" shi" - dang: soo" too" su: gi shid: lo" thang: rishe , - hau: dang: soo" khoin" gi dageung: jo .
58009018	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo xang: shed" mo dang: theing khoin" lang" ri suid" ci: lho: dageung: teung jo .
58009019	Xang: shed" ri Moshe gi tung: to" tarha" moopyeung: to" khyoo: dangain" ziri byumyu" yi ri bain tid kyoo" lang" gi ne" da' yan , moug" yo' husub , seig kung: riyu lho: nushain: lo: suid" shoobaid suid" joem yo' gyid yo' cam" wigi tarha" mougsoug" deing: moo we' byu yi dangain" ri we' byeug sain" gyoin: kaid' da .
58009020	Hau: thang: ri nyang: gi ‹ ‹ He: zi gi nanu" tam" gyo: lho: cang yhe: loo" wa shid re" to" da" dang" theing khoin" ri dazid' baid' lho" geung: teung jo , nhang: da" suid" nghoid ga tid .
58009021	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - Moshe gi noku zoem" khung: tho' moo we' noku coung" nghei uri ci: da" zi joem dangain" da" atho' moo we'-hau: suid" yo' byeug sain" gyoin: da .
58009022	Toung: to" tarha" yo' dakhyoo" ti" ga: rigi-ziyoo jo , moo jo , alug bain sho' ri suid" yo' yo" ced" yung" ced" shang: loo nhang" wigi suid" shoin: byid: khyoo: khyo" za: youg: noo yooboo ri yo" khyoid pyam byid: nyid .
58009023	Mougkhung: moug: di tho' moo akhang: re jo' gu zi joem yi da" la: du - hau: khyoo: khyo" za: yo" ced" shang: gyeung yu nyid . Nghoid loug we' Moug: khung: mo zi joem ri nyang: gi je" ge da" xoin" to' byid: ziyo' yo" ced" shang: byid: ca" nyid .
58009024	Khasu" wim gari Khristu gi gyeing" nyang: gyeungshang: joyoo gyeung" da" ladu nghoid - byu yi da" lo , wigi koid to" da" gyeungshang: joyoo moo avang loo" loo: za: moug: khung: khyoo: nyang: vang lo" wigi akhid" yha" da" gung thid' Mangso shid' khoin" moo thu' myhang loo" bye .
58009025	Yuda khainjung agyi moo" gi gougnyhoug suid" ci: lho: hau: gyeungshang: da" yab , moo zain' khang" moo" vang lo" . Nghoid loug we' Khristu gi nya: gung du: rimyoo" sho' lheing: xoin" to' ca" nyid zi anghoid .
58009026	Houg: su" xoin" myo" sho' lheing: dato' nyid ca" shi" nghoid rigi mougmyid' ri phain" shed" jang" mo nyang - myo" sho' lheing: doem: shid: kham: kham: koid nyid wam: bye . Akhid" koem' gi mougmyid pyaid thang wa zi jhang lo nyid uri pyaid didu shid mo dalheing: dam , bain sho' nya: gung du: ri xoin" to' pyam' bye: ziyo' youg: noo yooboo ri shoem" shoung: pyam byid: bye .
58009027	Xang: su: byu yi yug khang" moo" gi dalheing: za: shid: lo" lho: hau: thang: ri Mangso da" dang: phyed zi shau" shi" wa nghoid .
58009028	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - Khristu we' byu yi myoo" sho' mo , da" youg: noo yooboo joem ri pyaid didu shid' re" dalheing: dam , bain sho' nya: gung du: ri xoin" du: koid lho: to' ngei' byid: pyam bye . Yooboo ri bo voin , pyam byid: wa khyoo: yo' asen: loo: za: nyang: ri dalang" nyid mo , ri khyoid yu wa shid re" eig lheing: ein: lheing: moo doem , thu' myang loo wa zi nghoid nyid .
58010001	Yuda yi da" tarha" gi gyeing" nyang: agyeing" nghoid da" khyoo: - deingmain" joeb , byeung" da" akhyoo" again anghoid loo: za: ju" loo wa da" shau" void' shau" zoo: wa da" khyoo: mo amyang abang da" khyoo: za: date: nghoid nyid . Nyangnu" gi khanham we' to' byid: nyid da" xoin" daja: riza: - zain khang" moo" xoin" to' byid: boem ago" . Hougsu" wigi he: da" mungdang: yo' Mangso jhang khyoo: yu: vang lo" da" byu yi ri hau: toung: to" da" tarha" gi khasu" wim gi joeb , byeung" mo , yo" bue" loo nhang: wa lha" .
58010002	Mangsoo ri loem , khau: noku nyid mo , ri yooboo mo dayo" to ced" yung" ced" shang: byid: nghoid rigi nyangnu" gi yooboo yoo" mo nghoid ein: - khanham we' amyid jho: nyid byid: lho: xoin" to' byid: khyoo: we' dangain" no: pyam' byid: ca" loo wa zi nghoid .
58010003	Akhid" gi zain khang" moo" to' byid: da" xoin" du: joem gi byu yi ri nyangnu" da" youg: noo yooboo rimyid boin: nhang: nyid wa shid mo nghoid nyid .
58010004	Khasu" wim garinushain: lo da" suid" yo' shoobaid' suid" gi youg: noo yooboo ri khanham we' yo" ced" shang: pyam' byid: wa zi anghoid .
58010005	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo Khristu gi he: mougmyid mooju" ri" wa ga: soin' nyid da uri Mangsoo ri Nang gi xoin" du: joem yo' jhung: shug ri vho: ngei nyid zi anghoid , nga" shid re" gung du: ri nang nyheung too" byid: abye: .
58010006	Phoin: tho' mo gung du: goin" ngei" to" da" gougnyhoug xoin" yo' yooboo khyoid' pyam' da" xoin" ri nang vho: ngei zi nghoid .
58010007	Houg: lang" ngoo gi phoo Mangsoo we" - tarha" mougsoug" joem moo nga" da" khyoo: lhid" to" nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nang myid vho: khyo" koid wa akhid" ngoo hid: moo ju" ri" bye - ein: tid bye" - ga: wigi tid .
58010008	Hau: lho: nyang: gi " To' byid: da" xoin" du: joem yo' jhung: shug joem ri we' phoin: tho' moo nghe , to' ngei" byid: da" myinghi , xoin" ri we' yooboo khyoid da" xoin" joem ri we' Hau: tung: to" tarha" yo' dakhyoo" ti" xoin" to' ngei" byid: nghoid loug we' hau: xoin" du: joem ri Aseing: nang gi vho: ngei nyid zi anghoid , ga: wigi nyang: shid' re tid too" bye .
58010009	Hau: thang: ri nyang: gi Mangsoo we" - nang vho: khyo" cang koid wa shid re" ngoo hid: moo nyid nyid , ga: wigi tid . Houg: yoomo Mangsoo gi xang: shed" to' byid: da" xoin" axoug" dangain" ri yoeb shoung pyam lho: Khristu to' byid: da" xoin" ri houg: bang: da" joo yoo moo gung thid' kaid' byid: bye .
58010010	Yesu Khristu gi Mangsoo myid vho: lho: koid nhang: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nya: gung du: ri pyaid mo too: mo shid re" dalheing: za: yo' bain' sho' xoin" ri to' pyam byid: bye: yoomo nyang: nu: dangain" bang: gi youg: noo yoo boo mo yo" ced" kyeing ced" shang: yu zi shau" boem bye .
58010011	Yuda Khain: jung yi yug khang" moo" gi nyang: to' byid: da" xoin" to' khyoo ri nyid" khang" moo" zei: nyid lho: xoin" du: daja: riza: myoo" sho' lheing: koid nyid nghoid loug we' hid: su" to' byid: nyid da" xoin" du: joem gi youg: noo yooboo joem ri khanham we' yo" shoem" shoung: pyam da" khyoo: ajo .
58010012	Khristu koem gi youg: noo yooboo ri khyoid pyam byid: wa shid' mo pyaid didu moo akyu" bo da' xoin" daja: yo' za: bain to' byid: pyam' thang: ri Mangso lo , yo shoid moo lo" zhoung: jo , bye .
58010013	Akhid" nyang: gi hau: jang" moo nya: gyivoo joem ri nya: da" khoovoo: khoug: moo khyid: nang: tang khug khyo" Mangsoo too" byid: jang" moo ju" sho' lang" zoore" danyid nyid .
58010014	Khasu" wim gari nyang: gi to' byid: da" xoin" daja: yo' za: ced" yung" ced" shang: yu zi shau" bye: mo , ri Pyaid' didu mo shid re" joeb , byeung" nhang: bye .

58010017	Hau: thang: ri nyang: gi " Nyang: nu" da" youg: noo: yooboo ri we' nyangnu" da" akhyeing" ashoeb khyoo: joem ri we' ngoo doem boin: loo: wa zi anghoid , ga: tid .
58010018	Houg: su" wigi youg: noo yooboo ri khyoid pyam' byid: zi shau" bye: nghoid rigi youg: noo yooboo khyoid pyam byid: zi shau" wa shid' mo xoin" gootu: ngei" byid: anoo" loo .
58010019	Houg: su" nghoid nyid yoomo nga" da" mang: nhung" yi we" - Yesu gi shid: kham: byid: bye: yoomo ngoonu" gi hau: gyeungshang: thang da" joyoo khyoo: vang lo" boem wa shid re" joeb , byeung" da" amyeing" yoo" mo , nghoid nyid boem bye .
58010020	Nyang: gi nya: gung du: ga: da" Mangso yhoem: moo" khoug: mo pain" xiyam , ri lid vang lo" wigi Mangso da" shid' khoin" khyoo: khyang: lo" da" kang: so' khyoo: seig dakhaid ngoonu" shid re" phang too" byid: bye .
58010021	Ngoonu" moo Mangso da" yhoem: ikoin deungkhu: ri vhoeb , khang" zung" lhug nyid wa da" khainjung agyi moo" dayug yo" boem bye .
58010022	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi yooboo yoo" boin: da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: joem ri ced" yung" ced' shang: pyam' lho: ngoonu" da" gung doem: ri we' gyeungshang: da" gyid yo' bain' ced" shang: pyam' lang" ashoid' avhang: loo: - jhug zug da" loem" jeung" nheigloem: yo' Mangso jhang khyoo: yu: tain" vang lo" boem shang .
58010023	Ngoonu" yhen: yu lho: loem" jeung" da" loem , khau: nheig byu khyoo: moo aloeb , adei loo: nyhang" geung: teung jo , loo: shang . Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo gi nyang: dang: soo" to" da' khyoo: moo kyed , da" dang: zung" su: nghoid khyoo: ri ngoonu" loem , jeung" nyid boem .
58010024	Ngoonu" gi ngoonu" nyang: cang" - pang" goo" thug goo" wa shid re" nyhang" nyang: cang" jheddab da" nheigloem: toin" shid' go" zoore" - ge da" moozoo" rizei: wa shid mo nheigloem: tu: to' lho: pang" goo" thug go" nyid shang .
58010025	Nyhang" nyang: cang" zeung: foem: da" thung" ri ri dayham" gi she: pyam' nyid boem ago" . Nyhang" gi houg: su" akoid boem loo: za: hau: Aseing: doem ju" ri" wa da" bidnyid jhang loo bye: ziri se' nyid boem bye: yoomo nyang: cang" nyang: je" wigi yoem: byid: go" nyid boem shang .
58010026	Khasu" wim gari nyangnu" gi hau deingmain" khyoo: ri bain' se' gyo: kham: yu thang: ri yooboo ri zhoogyi: gyi: dadoem koid nyid boem nghoid rigi ngoonu" da" yoobo shid re" to' byid: wa da" xoin" gootu: jo , loo: wa zi anghoid .
58010027	Ngoonu" gi ju" loo wa nghoid da" tarha" dang: phyed khyoo: yo' Mangsoo yo' aveing" goo" mo , ri nghe , jhoem" pyam' wa da" atho' tid loo: sho' gyoug pho" ngarai myi: ri gyoug nain" zoore" lang nyid wa zi za: danghoid lo .
58010028	Moshe da" tarha" ri atam" gyoo: loo: shoid vhang: mo , hang" ri nghoid loug we' sagsi: eig soem" youg dang: yo' yooboo yo" ga: dang: phyed zi shau" nghoid rigi nheig akhyeig loo: said' pyam nyid boem .
58010029	Houg: su" nghoid rigi Mangso da" nya: zoo: ri aphoug" akhyoid' koid su: gi ngoonu" gi nyang: ri youg: noo yooboo mo ced" gyeing ced" shang: yu da" Mangso dang: theing khoin" yo' sen: da" suid" ri ci: asoin: cishu: anhang: su: gi jeju" byid: nyid da' Venyi ri aphoug" zoo: wa da" shid: gyoin , noo gyoin gi khayhi' je" no , wa lha" . damyid yu" ge' .
58010030	Khasu" wim gari ngoo latoo: phoug wigi yoobo da" jhen: ri ngoo do' wa" - ga: wigi we' Hau: lho: hau" Aseing: gi nya: byumyu" yi ri tarha" dang: phyed' wa ga: wigi we' tid nyid su: gi hang" nghoid ziri ngoonu" se' nyid .
58010031	Dei nyid da" Mangso lo , moo gyo" vhang lo" ein: zigi atho' tid loo: sho' gyoug ca" da" khyoo: nghoid .
58010032	Lai loo" bye: da" bidnyid joem moo nanu" gi khayhang: te" mo , nghoid nyid boem ziri doem boin: so" nyid ge' . Hau: bidnyid joem moo Mangso bidbang ri zheung: yo" kham: yu ci: boem lho: shid: gyoin , noogyoin , myoo" sho' ri shau" kham , zo: lid lo boem bye - nghoid loug we' nanu" yoem: kaid thoug shang" lo boem yoomo hau: shid: gyoin , noo gyoin gi nanu" riyo" oung: lo" khyoo: ajo .
58010033	Nanu" nyang: - mung" byu yi da" shid' moo juang" yi gei sang: ziyo' shen" yhen khyoo: ri daso' so' thoung" shau" lid lo boem bye . Hau: lho: goo tu: da" ayo , joem moo gi nanu" yhang: ti" shen" yhen ziri thoung" shau" nyid da" byen cang" yi tab khyoo: bo nyid lho: wigi sho" jhen: jamjau ri bo kham , zo: khyo" yoem: byid: pang" thoug go" lid lo boem bye .
58010034	Nanu" gi thung: lung" mo , ri we' nheig khyeug ago - nanu" da" soid gain ziyoo joem ri lhoid yu zi shau" lo da" uri gau yi ziyo' kham zo: boem bye - Khasu" wim gari abyo , abei lo da" soid gain daja: yoo" shi" zigi nanu" se' ago" .
58010035	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nanu" da" yoem: vhoo" ri ashe: pyam - aci: phyug goo . Houg: lang" gi nanu" da" vhu" kung: phoug" azeing yo" yu goo" wa zi nghoid .
58010036	Mangsoo myid vho: khyoo: ri cang zei: wa ziyo' nya: da" dang: soo" khoin" joem yo' dakhyoo" ti" - akyu" yo" kham: yu boem sho' nanu" gi gyi: sheung: nheigloem: yo' zeung: kham , ca" nyid boem .
58010037	Khasu" wim gari jhoem: mungdang: moo " daso' ri ju" ri" wa su: gi ayo , daso' lang" ju" ri" wam: bye - Nyang: gi no: nyid theung: nyid wa zi anghoid .
58010038	Nga" da" deing byeung" byu yi koem gi loem" jeung" ziyo' dei nyid boem wa zi nghoid . Nghoid loug we' nyangnu" mo dayug yug - thang: khyoo: doem tau" thu' byam , lo" nghoid rigi ngoo gi nyang: ri vho: ngei loo: wa zi anghoid - ga: wigi tid nyid .
58010039	Ngoonu" gi doem tau" zoid phang: lo" da" byu yi anghoid loo: za: loem" jeung" lho: khyoid yu shau" da" byu yi nghoid nyid boem bye .
58011001	Loem" jeung" khyoo: ein: zigi ngoonu" nheig byu to" da" zi joem ri gyeing" nyang: bue" loo wa" ein: da" khyoo: ri nheig shid: nheig deug nyid ziyo' amyang yu" shi" da" zi joem ri gyeing" nyang: jo , bye" ein: se' gyo: loem" yu khyoo: ri loem" jeung" khyoo: ga: zi nghoid .
58011002	Goo" nham mo da" byu yi gi nyangnu" gi loem" jeung" da" nheigloem: bo boem yoo mo Mangsoo myed vhoo: myed ngei lho: joo bye: ga: da" khyoo: ri yo" yu boem bye .
58011003	Amyang yu" shi" da" zi joem mo myang yu" bye: da" zi joem bue" loo wa shid re" Mangso mungdang: yo' he: da" jo , moo jo , ri phain" too" bye" khyoo: rinyang: nu" gi yo" se' yu boem bye: zigi hau: loem" jeung" da" nheigloem: yoomo nghoid nyid .
58011004	Loem" jeung" da" nheigloem: yo' Abela gi Ka-in tho' moo je" ge da" xoin" ri ngei" byid: bye . Nyang: loem" jeung" khyoo: ri yu" yu" lho: nyang: ri deing byeung" da" byu - ga: wigi Mangsoo lhoem: kham: yu byid: abye: . Khasu" wim gari nyang: to' byid: da" xoin ri Mangsoo nyang: vho: ngei nyid yoomo nghoid - Abela gi shid: byug bye: nghoid loug we' loem" jeung" khyoo: yoomo akhid" nyid ju" sho' nyang: gi dang: da tid nyid ashi .
58011005	Loem" jeing" yoomo Enug gi ashid: loo: za: Mangso wigi shu" to' yu ziri shau" abye: . Houg: yoomo nyang: ri hang" we' amyang loo - Mangso wigi shu" to' yu zi ashug" shi" da" uri Enug gi Mangsoo vho: ngei nyid su: nghoid , ga: wigi jhoem: mungdang: moo bo nyid .
58011006	Loem" jeung" zi abo nghoid rigi hang" we' Mangsoo vho: ngei zi ayo" bui . Khasu" wim gari Mangso jhang khyoo: yu: vang loo" mo , hang" we' Mangsoo nyid nyid ziyo' nyang: ri cang shoo: bang: ri jeju" toug" byid: nyid ein: da" khyoo: ri yo" loem" jeing" su: nghoid wa zi nghoid .
58011007	Ju" loo wa da" ayo , moo bue" loo wa da" amyang yu" shi" da" zi joem yo' sen: lho: wigi Mangsoo tid poin" nyid ziri No - a shau" gyo: zigi nyang: loem" jeung" nyid yoomo nghoid . Nyang: gi Mangso dang: ri tam" gyo: wigi Sang phoo lhid' daloem: ri zhug lho: nya: yhoem: ikoin deungkhu: ri yo" khyoid yu abye: . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo mougmyid ri nyang: dang: phyed' wigi No-a gi loem" jeung" khyoo: yo' sen: da" deingmain" da" agyid asoo: riyo" kham: yu abye: .
58011008	Abraham gi Mangsoo nyang: ri byid: wa" - ga: da" dang: soo" bo nyid da" mung" khyoo: - thu' yhe: loo" wa da" shid re" loem" jeung" nheigloem: gi nyang: ri tam" gyoo: nhang: nyid . Houg: yoomo nyang: gi khakhyoo: yhe: loo" wa zi lang" ase' zi nya: mungdain: mo wigi thu' so" loo" bye .
58011009	Mangsoo dang: soo" byid: to" da" mung" khyoo: - nyang: gi being" voo , yhang: ti" yhe: nyid yen" . Nyang: gi Mangso jang" mo , nyang: yhang: te" dang: soo" khoin" da" agyid asoo: ri yo" coem , kham: yu da" Isag yo' Yaku , yhang: ti" - pain" zoem" khoug joem moo loung" jo .
58011010	Khasu" wim gari Abraham gi Mangso wigi akhyoo" toin" shid lho: geung: teung da" apoem: ayang: yo' bain' zhoug too" bye: da" voogung ri nyang: gi nheig byu lho: dalang" nyid .
58011011	Abraham gi gye" mang: hau: loo" bye - Sa: ra nyang: we' apyaid bain' lid loo" bye: yoomo zoo: age yoo" loo . Nghoid loug we' Abraham da" loem" jeung" nheigloem: yoomo zoonu" nya: ba" doem , yo" bue" loo bye . Mangsoo gi Nya: dang: soo" khoin" byid: to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - kyed' da" Aseing: nghoid nyid ziri Abraham gi loem , khau: nyid .
58011012	Abraham gi gyeing" nyang: sushid: gung te" da" yug gi danghoid loo: loug we' nyang: dayug mo nyid byo lo da" nya: amyed ashen yi gi Moug: khung: mo kyi: joem myhoo , - Panglai gyid yam , mo atho' nghab da" mid' coo: doem: yhang ti" - myo: lug da" myid: yi zoo: yi nyid je: lo boem abye: go .
58011013	He: da" byumyu" yi dangain" bang: gi hau: loem" jeung" khyoo: moo shid: lo" boem abye: go . Nyangnu" gi Mangsoo byid: da" dang: soo" khoin" yo' sen: da" agyid asoo: ri ashau" kham: yu boem - nghoid loug we' nyangnu" gi hau: khyoo: ri vi" vi: mo yo" yu" myang boem bye: ziyo' lhoem: yo" tau , yu nyid boem bye . Nyangnu" gi he: moug: myid tho' moo lam" yen" da" tungbau , being" voo joem yhang: ti" - te: nghe: khau: nyid mo , date: nghoid nyid boem ziri bang bang za: yhen: yu khare" boem bye .
58011014	Hau: khyoo: joem ri hougsu" ga: wigi tid mo , gi nyangnu" nyid wa da" mungdain daloem: sho: nyid boem zigi bang bang myang nyid .
58011015	Nyangnu" gi nyangnu" thu' too" kho' da - voogung mungdain ri myid boin: lho: nheig nge nyid boem zi anghoid - hau: mung" moo dato' loo" nau: rigi yo" lo" da" akhang" yoo" mo , nghoid .
58011016	Akhid" koem gi hau: tho' mo je" pyo: da" moug: khung: moug di mo voogung mungdain ri nheig nge nyid boem - houg: su" nghoid yoomo Mangsoo gi nyangnu" da" Mangsoo ein: wa ziri sho: nyid zi anghoid . Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo gi nyangnu" nyid wa da" joyoo daloem: ri nyheung too" byid bye .
58011017	Abraham gi Mangso wigi ca: yu" zi shau" nyid uri loem" jeung" ziyo' nya: zoo Isag ri xoin" du: khyo" ngei" byid: pyam bye . Abraham gi Mangso jang" mo dang: soo" khoin" kham: yu shau" su: nghoid - nghoid loug we' nyang: gi nya: zooti" zoo: ri xoin" du: khyo" ngei" byid: pyam' wa zi jen" nyid gu nghoid .
58011018	Mangsoo gi Abraham ri " Ngoo nang ri dang: soo" khoin" byid: to" da" amyu" akung: ako'' joem - Isag mo wigi nyid yab , byo lo boem wa , , ga: wigi tid to .

58011020	Loem" jeung" ziyo' Isag ri ju" loo wa da" ayo , moo kham: yu wa zi nghoid da" mainkaid jeju" yo' sen: lho: wigi Yaku yo' Eso eig yug ri dang: soo" khoin" khyo" mainkaid byid: bye .
58011021	Loem" jeung" ziyo' Yaku gi nyang: shid: lo" nyid uri Yoseb da" nya: zo: eig yug ri mainkaid byid wigi nya: lham: dung: phyoo" moo thoug nghe: ci: lho: noku da .
58011022	Loem" jeung" ziyo' Yoseb gi nyang: shid: wa zi jhang lo da" uri Israela byumyu" yi Egutu meing: mo byoin , thu loo wa da" khyoo: ri tid kyeing" tid poin" kyo" lho: nya: shoo" youg: shoo" yang joem ri khasu" koid wa da" khyoo: ri we' pyeung: too" kho .
58011023	Loem" jeung" ziyo' Moshe da" nya: myhi' yo' nya: pho eig yug gi nyang: ri bain' khu: lang" lham" moo" soem" khyab , - nyang: ri yhoem" to . Moshe gi gye" young" da" zoonu" nghoid ziri nya: eig yug myang yoomo Khokham" tid to" dang: ri ngeug pyam wa ziri agyug nghoid ago" .

58011025	Nyang: gi dayo' daboin: za: yubag yoobo da" pyo: khyoo: moo Mangso da" byumyu" yi yo' dage" kyi" khyeug jamjau shau" wa ziri nyang: je vho: nyid .
58011026	Nyang: gi Meshia shid mo juang" yi boem zi shau" wa shid re" gi Egutu soid' gain' dangain" tho' moo gi je ge nyid" - ga: myid soin: bye . Khasu" wim gari nyang: gi ju" loo wa da" ayo , moo shau" kham: yu wa da" myonhoo: ngi shab , jhung shug ri nheig byu lho: dalang" nyid .
58011027	Loem" jeung" ziyo' Moshe gi Khokham" phoo nheig yoo: wa ziri agyug loo: za: Egutu meing: mo thu lo" abye: - Nyang: gi myojid" yo' amyang da" Mangsoo ri myang yhang: ti" nyang - Egutu meing: khyoo: doem tau" loo" khyoo: ri ngeug pyam bye .
58011028	Nyang: gi loem" jeung" ziyo' zooshid" yi ri said pyam lo da" mau: Lagyoo: yiri Israela byumyu" yi da" zooshid" yi ri abo said pyam wa shid re" lhed: kai da" pui" ri shu" koid shed" wigi yang suid" joem ri khoem" bung zeing yo' khoem" baid joem moo byeug sain" gyoin: too" wa shid re" pyeung: too" bye .
58011029	Loem" jeung" ziyo' Israela byumyu" yi gi tung: gung yhang: ti" - gyid thoem" ni khoug: khyo" yo" phyed lo boem bye . Egutu byu yi we' houg: su" bo gu: neug ca: yu" boem ga: rigi noeb , shid: lo" pyam' byug boem bye .
58011030	Loem" jeung" ziyo' Israela byumyu" yi gi nyhed nyid" bain' sho' Yerikho" voogung ri bain so" lheung yu thang: ri hau: voomoo" vang khyam: ri yo" khyau" mhoin' phyo' sain" byid: pyam' boem bye .
58011031	Loem" jeung" ziyo' shava myhi , Rahab , gi Israela dab , mo jooyu" mo , ri si' go" khyo" lhoem: zoem" khau: kham yu yoomo Mangsoo ri atam" gyo: da"-yooboo yo" mo , ri said pyam' da" jang" moo abo shid: .
58011032	Ngoo xo' tid shi" wa la" . Khasu" wim gari Gidon gi Barag Samson yeb tha: - David Samuela yo' lapi yi dangain" mo , da" khyoo: ri tid kyoo ba , ein: rigi nga" da" ayo , gi tho' tham: wa zi anghoid .
58011033	Houg: bang: gi loem" jeung" ziyo' sube" mung" ri gyi zain: lho: yo" oung: lo boem - nyangnu" gi deingmain" khyoo: ri cang zei: lo" boem wigi Mangsoo byid: to" da" dang: soo" khoin" ri shau" kham: yu boem bye .
58011034	Gye" thain: nge" da" myi: so' ri we' yo" said' pyam boem wigi sube" sham: soo" mo we' yo" loid byoin , lo" boem bye . 58011035	Myi: yi yi we' loem" jeung" ziyo' shid: byug bye: ngoonu" da" bidnoem yi ri doem , dei to'' loo nhang: khyoo: ri doem , yo" yu boem bye . 58012001	Akhid" ngoonu" da" shid re" hid: myho , da" sagsi: joem gi ngoonu" ri jhoem: moug" su" thoem" lhoung too" bye . 58012002	Ngoonu" da" loem" jeung" khyoo: ri Apoem: mo aphyoo" thang loo" sho' joeb , byeung" nhang: su: - Yesu Khristu ri yu" zhug too" shang . 58012003	Yooboo yoo" mo , wigi atho' tid loo: sho' koid da" anoug angei khyoo: ri hau: Aseing: gi khayhi' gyeing" kham' zoo: bye: da" khyoo: ri nanu" bo myid yu" ge' . Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nanu" moo nheigloem: byo , yoin" gyoeb , gyo" khyoo: aboo goo" baja" .

58012005	Jhoem: mungdang: moo Mangsoo tid to" zigi " Nga" zoo: we' hau" Aseung: wigi nang ri so' koid so nyheung uri tam" gyoo: we' . Nyang: nang ri gyi koid lho: jhau" mho' nyid uri nheigloem: abyo , ayoin" loo" .

58013004	Lo , xo' khyoo: rigi byu dangain" mo , phau" myang: coung" nghei byid: nyid boem yoomo yhoem: seing: phoo yhoem: seing: myhi' gi dayug yo' dayug - zed" lhed' nyid boem ca" - Mangsoo gi akyang" byo , yoin" lho: myi: lhoid' lang lhoid bang: ri Tarha" dang: phyed loo wa zi nghoid .

58013006	Houg: su" nghoid nyid yoomo " Hau" Aseing: gi ngoori pang" thoug su: nghoid , ngoo ce" ja" ri we' gyoug aca" - ngoori hang" ciyo" koid wa lha" . ein: wigi nheigloem: kyung: kyung: ngoonu" tid nyid boem shang .
58013007	Nanu" ri Mangso mungdang: tid kyo" lid loo bye: da" shid' phyang" mo nanu" da" khyoo: shed' vhu" she: loo bye: mo , ri myed boin: nyid ge' .
