58013008	Yesu Khristu gi anyi nab , akhid" nyid" - thang: phyang" apyaid atoo: moo we' - dakhyoo" ti" danyid nyid .
58013009	Shid' phyang" alhoung myang yu" - alhoung gyo: yu" da" jhau" mhoo , byid: da" khyoo: joem ri tungbau byumyu" yi gi nanu" ri hau: deingmain" khyoo: mo ashu" hang: lam" loo" nhang: goo . Zoo: noem , yo' sen: da" cang yhe: tarha" ri tam" gyo: cang pyeung khyoo: anghoid loo: za: Mangso jeju" mo yoem: so' ri yo" kham: yu zigi je ge zi nghoid .
58013010	Yuda byu yi da" noku jo , yoomo - xoin" to' byid: da" khainjung yi gi ngoonu" da" phoin: tho' mo ce: ja: ri nghoid loug we' zoo: wa da" akhang" ayo" boem nghoid da .
58013011	Yuda khainjung agyi moo" gi gougnyhoug da" suid" ri yooboo khyoid da" xoin" khyo" wigi gyeungshang: thang da" joyoo khoug: khyoo: ci: vang loo" nghoid loug we' hau: gougnyhoug da" xoin" mang joem rigi dab , nghe: shoid moo lhoung nghe , pyam ago" .
58013012	He: khyoo: yoomo Yesu we' nya: da" suid" yo' byu xang: su: yi ri Youg: noo yooboo mo ced" shang: yu wa shid re" voogung nghe: shoid' moo shid: kham: abye: .
58013013	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" we' - voogung nghe: shoid mo nya: jhang khyoo: bo thu' yhe: lo" lho: nyang: kham' zo: da" asho , ashid: aphoug" akhyoid' koid ziri coem kham zo: boem shang .
58013014	Khasu" wim gari he: da" moug: myid tho' moo ngoonu" shid re" geung: teung da" joyoo ajo , yoomo thang: phyang" ju" loo wa da" voogung ri ngoonu" dasho: nyid boem .
58013015	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi nyang: ri ngoonu" da" Aseing: nghoid ein: yhen: yu da' nhoid joem yo' jeju" ri coung" byid: da" ngoonu" xoin" joem ri Aseing Yesu khyo" wigi Mangso jhang khyoo: khanham we' dangei" byid: nyid boem shang .
58013016	Ge , da" moozoo" moo nanu" nyang: cang" nyang: pang" thoug goo" wa da" khyoo: ri ato" myhed pyam goo . Khasu" wim gari houg: yhang: te" da" xoin" gi Mangsoo vho: ngei nyid xoin" nghoid .
58013017	Nanu" ri khyoo: shed' vhu" shu" she: nyid mo , da" dang: ri tam" gyo: nyid lho: wigi nyangnu" tid to" da" dang: khoin" joem ri cang yhe: loo" ge' . Nyangnu" ginyang: nu" zei: byid: loo bye: da" moo" zo" zhayen" joem ri Mangsoo ri toin" shid boem wa zi nghoid wigi nyangnu" gi nanu" da" nheigloem: ri anoo: ayab , loo: zung" lhug nyid . Nyangnu" dang: ri nanu" tam" gyo: nyid boem nghoid rigi nyangnu" zei: da" moozoo" ri-gau , yi ziyo' zei: boem wa zi nghoid . Houg: su" anghoid rigi nyangnu" nheig koug ziyo' zei: boem wa nghoid wigi nanu" shid' re" ce" akyu" we' yo" ze" bui" goo" wa zi anghoid .
58013018	Ngoonu" shid re" anoo: ayab , loo: akyu" mho' nyid ge' . ngoonu" gi ngoonu" nya: da' phug soo" lheig myid yu" e" myed gi gyeing" gyeungshang: shang: nghoid da" khyoo: ri loem" jeung" nyid boem . Khasu" wim gari ngoonu" gi ayo , loem: khang" moo" moo deingmain" da" moo" zei: nau nheigloem: bo nyid boem .
58013019	Mangsoo gi ngoorinanu" jhang khyoo: phyed' doem" ju" ri" nhang: wa shid re" soo" soo" nyang: akyu" mho' goo" baja" - ein: ngoo nanu" ri joug jhoin" lho: mho' kaid' zi nghoid .
58013020	Nya: kangso' ri xoin" to' pyam' lho: shid: kham: ziyo' apyaid atoo: moo dang: theing go" to" da' dazig ri thung" bye: yoomo Yang phung: yi da" yang lhug zoug: moo" ein: da" ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu ri Mangsoo gi shid: jang" mo doem dei to' loo nhang: bye . Nanu" gi nyang: myid vho: khyoo: ri yo" cang dei: loo" wa shid mo nanu" moo ca" nyid da" khyoo: khaid khang" moo" ri-ngei pyo: Aseing: Mangsoo gi nanu" ri joeb , byeung" loo nhang: baja" - Aseing: gi nyang: myid vho: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Khristu da" gang mo nanu" ri joeb , byeung" loo nhang: loo nhang: bye . Yesu Khristu moo myonhoo: phung" yoeb , gi apyaid atoo: dajo , jo , baja" o" .

58013022	Mang: nhung" yi we" - he: da" yoem: byid: tid poin" tid kyeung" nyid da" mungdang: ri kham , zeung: ziyo' tam" gyo: yu wa shid' mo ngoo nanu" ri mho' sang: kaid . Khasu" wim gari ngoo nanu" jhang khyoo: lhid" kaid da" he" mougsoug" gi gye" sheung: zi anghoid .
58013023	Ngoo nu" da' mang: nhung" phoo Timothi gi thung: yhoem: mo loid , thu lo da" khyoo: - nanu" ri si nhang: nau . Nyang: gi nga" jhang khyoo: ayo , myhi: ju" re" nghoid rigi nanu" yo" we' shau" goo" wa shid' mo ngoo ju" re " uri nyang: ri ngoo yo' dage" bo shu" ri" wa .
58013024	Nanu" da" khyooshed' vhu" shi: bang: dangain" yo' Mangsoo da" byumyu" dangain" bang: ri bo vhu" byid ge' . Itali mung" mo mang: nhung" yi gi nanu" ri vhu" kaid ago" .
58013025	Mangso jeju" gi nanu" dangain" bang: yo' dage" dajo , jo , baja" o" . TINGNAM 14 . 2 . 2002
59001001	Phoo Mangsoo yo' Aseing Yesu Khristu da" dei zoo: nghoid nyid ngoo Yaku gi moug: gyab , goin" jang" moo byo sain" jo , da" Mangso byu yi jhang khyoo: jheddab dang: sang: kaid .
59001002	Nga" mang: nga" nhung" yi we" - ca: jhu , phyo' da" khyoo: aja: ja: thoung" shau" nyid da" uri gau , yi cang boo bye" ein: myed nyid loo: ge' .
59001003	Khasu" wim gari houg: yhang: te" da" ca: jhu , phyo' yu" da" khyoo: ri nanu" loem" jeung" nheigloem: yo' oung: doid' lo" da" uri nanu" gi yo" kham , zeung" da" yoem: moo" yo" yu nyid bye: ziri nanu" se' nyid ago" .
59001004	Nanu" gi ci: we' ca" yo khyoo: aboo loo sho' joeb , byeung" jo , baja" - nanu" da" kham , zeung: khyoo: gi nanu" rikhyoo: thang sho' moo oung: doid khyo" shu" vhu" goem nhang: nyid ge' .
59001005	Nghoid loug we' nanu" mo dayug yug gi Phajhi" juyi: thang byug nghoid rigi Mangso: jang" mo mho' ge' nyang: gi houg: su" mho' mo , ri nyain: phajhi" byid: wa zi nghoid . Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo: gi byu bain sho' mo , rigau ziyo' agoin ayu: da" phajhi" ri byid: nyid .
59001006	Nghoid loug we' nanu" gi loem shoid da" nheigloem: yo' anghoid loo: za: Mangsoo: ri loem: jeing" nheigloem: yo' mho' nyid ge , loem shoid lho: vhu" gyam , gyam nyid su: gi ug lid wigi doin: to lo da" panglai gyid thoem" being: mhoid yo" dadu nyid .
59001007	Houg: yhang: te" su: gi Mangso jhang mo daja: ja: shau" yu abe ein: lang" nyid cang aboo .
59001008	Nyang: gi nheigloem: eig pyam: boo su: nghoid yoomo moozoo" dangain" jang: moo geung: teung khyoo: aboo su: nghoid nyid .
59001009	Khristain mang nhung" dayug yug gi sho" jhen: nyid jang" mo Mangso wigi tu: to' kaid uri gau yi nyid baja" .
59001010	Yoo" zoo: yoo" shug da" Khristain mang nhung" phoo gi nyang: ri Mangso wigi nyhoem: gyo" loo" nhang: da" uri gau yi cang bo nyid . Khasu" wim gari - yoo" zoo: yoo" shug mo , gi siyoo mo bain: boo" yhang: ti" doem shoem: loo" wa zi za: nghoid .
59001011	Gye" nge" da" bid dug gi bain: gam ri lhab , nyhau" pyam' lho: aboo" ri shu: gyo" loo" nhang: pyam . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo hau: bo" young" to" da" bain: boo" byo , yoin" lo" yhang: ti" yoo" zoo: yoo" shug mo , gi nyang: nya: da" moozoo" zei: nyid uri shid: joem: byo , yoin" loo" goo" wa zi nghoid .
59001012	Jhu , phyo' khyoo: thoung" shau" nyid uri aleung loo" su: gi ngi lho , nyid . Khasu" wim gari houg: su" yo" kham: zeung: nghoid rigi Mangsoo ri jheddab mo , ri byid: wa ga: da" kangso' bidmug ri shau" zhoung" boem wa .
59001013	Jhu , phyo zi thoung" shau" nyid nghoid rigi ngoori jhu , phyo' zigi Mangsoo mo nghoid ein: atid nyid goo" - age zigi Mangsoo ri yo" jhu' phyo' wa zi anghoid . hau: tho' moo gootu: Mangsoo gi hang" ri we' ajhu , phyo' yu" .
59001014	Nghoidsho' loug we' jhu , phyo' da" khyoo: gi byu yi nyang: nya: da" akhoug: mo aco' ajhoid nheigloem: wigi lang: she: jang" khyoo: bo myi" lo" da" khyoo: nghoid .
59001015	Nyang: myed vhoo: myed ngei da" khyoo: gi gung lid: lo lho: yooboo ri khu: kaid bye - hau: yooboo yang" deung loo lang" gi shid: lo" ziri khu: kaid .
59001016	Jheddab da" mangnhung" yi we"-mhau' lho: jhu , phyo' nyid mo , yoomo khyoo: avhang: nyid goo"
59001017	Ge , da" joeb byeung" jeju" dangain" gi moug: khung: mo bidbang joem ri phain" to" da" Mangsoo jang" mo wigi we" - gyoo" lo zi nghoid . Mangsoo moo khanham we' athed loo" alid loo" atoug" ashu: aphug asi: wim yoomo nyang: moo bid shoem: yoeb , bui" nhang: zi ci" we' aboo .
59001018	Mangsoo gi nyang: phain" to" da" byu xang: su: yimoo - xang: shed" ri zei: lo da" ashi" yhang: ti" bui" wa shid re" deingmain" da" tarha" mo wigi nyang: myed vho: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoonu" da" pyaid seig ri doem thid' byid: bye .
59001019	Jheddab da" mangnhung" yi we" - he: khyoo: ri xoem" too" ge' . Nanu" gi tam" gyoo: wa jang" moo myab , ge' dang: tid wa jang" moo nheig yoo: wa jang" moo gi ahain: goo" .
59001020	Byu yi da" nheig yo: khyoo: gi Mangso da" deing main" khyoo: - ngoonu" moo yo" ze" bui" wa zi anghoid .
59001021	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi aco' ajhoid da" aved asam" yo' akhyeing" ashoeb da" khyoo: bain sho' ri she: pyam ge' . Nanu" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: moo Mangso wigi kaid' byid: to" da" yo" khyoid yu da" nya: mungdang: ri nu" nham , da" e" myed , yo' kham: yu nyid ge' .
59001022	Nya: mungdang: ri houg: yhang: ti" shau" gyo: yu" khyo" nyang: nya: gung ri amhau , nyid goo . Mungdang: ri cang nyang: cang loo" mo , bue" nyid ge' .
59001023	Mungdang: ri acang loo: za: te: tam" gyo: yid sugi - nya: da" myonhoo: ri bang teing moo yu" myang su: yo" du nyid .
59001024	Nyang hougsu" yu" myang lho thu lo" ziyo' dalheing: dam - nya: da" ayoeb , abang ri doem to" myhed pyam su: yo' du nyid .
59001025	Nghoid loug we' byu yi ri yoobo wigi tei" to" da: jang" mo loid byoin loo" nhang: da" joeb byeung" da" tarha" ri goolhoo: jhau" yu yu" su: gi mungdang: ri gyoo: za: te: tam" gyo: lho: to" myhed' pyam su: anghoid loo: za: xo' zei: cang loo" su: nghoid nyid yoomo nyang: gi ce: ja: moozoo" ri zei: nyid nghoid loug we' Mangso mainkaid da" jeju" ri shau" kham: zoo: wa zi nghoid nyid .
59001026	Nanu" mo byu dayug yug gi laloem lakhoug: byeung" su: nghoid ein: myid , nyid go" la" . Nang gi nanya: da" yhoo: ri ayo" zei: ci: nghoid rigi re" da" laloem lakhoug: gi ce" phoug" we' adab ziyo' nang gi nanya: gung du: ri mhau' nyid su: nghoid .
59001027	Phoo Mangso: da" shid khoin" moo gyeungshang: ziyo' gyeung" da" laloem , lakhoug: ein: zigi jam jau jam , khi" shau" nyid da" coug" zoo: yi yo' cougmoo" myhi , ri yu" coung: da" khyoo: - nyang: nya: da" gung du: ri we' moug: myed , da" anyhoin: athoung" da" khyoo: - abo dab , nhang: da" khyoo: nhgoid nyid .
59002001	Nga: mang nhung" yi we" - nanu" gi ngoonu" da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , da" Aseing Yesu Khristu ri loem khau: loem" jeing" mo , nghoid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - byu ri myonhoo: akhyen: goo .
59002002	Gyeing" nyang: nanu" da" zoeb phung: moo vang lo da byu eig yug mo dayug gi sheing: lo , pain" pain" ci: lho:-byi: gi void ci: wigi gootu: dayug gi sho" jhen su: nghoid yoomo byi joid , lhoo" joid te" void , ci: zi nghoid ein: shang .
59002003	Nanu" gi byi: gi mi gi void ci: su: ri gi yhoug: gyen: koid lho: hid: ge thang da" joyoo moo zhung: we' ga: tid lho: wigi sho" jhen su: rigi thei: joyoo moo yab , jo , shi" we' houg: su" anghoid lang" gi nga" khyid: yang: phyang" gung moo zhung: we' ga: tid nghoid rigi
59002004	Nanu" da" akhoug: moo nyang: cang" nyang: myonhoo: khyen: go" lho: age khyo" zei: so' nyid zi anghoid goo" la" .
59002005	Jheddab da" mangnhung" yi we" - tam" gyo: yu" ge' . loem khau: khyoo: moo joeb byeung" mo , byui: wa shid re" Aseing: ri jheddab mo , shid re" gi dang: theung to" mungdain moo yo" vang loo" wa shid mo Aseing: gi moug myid' mo sho" jhen: mo , ri khyen: yu zi nghoid .
59002006	Nghoid loug we' nanu" gi sho" jhen mo , ri aphoug" goo" nhung ? Yoo" mo , di mo , gi nanu" ri zeig zo: lho: tarha" agyi yi da" shid' moo she: khyoid yhe: boem anghoid goo" la" .

59002008	Nanu" gi nanya: yhoem: kyoo" cang" ri nanya: gung yo' dakhyoo" ti" - jheddab goo" ge' ga: bo da" dang: ri cang lo" rigi ge zi nghoid .
59002009	Nghoid loug we' myonhoo: dakhyen: nyid rigi yooboo yoo" mo , nghoid shi" lho: tarha" shoid mo , nghoid ga: dang: phyed zi shau" boem shi" nghoid nyid .
59002010	Tarha" daloem: ri shoid su: hang" nghoid loug we' tarha" dangain" ziri shoid nyid su: nghoid .
59002011	Khasu" wim gari sube" myi: alhoid - ga: tid to" da" Aseing: gi-Byu asaid' ga: we tid to" - nang gi sube" myi: alhoid nghoid ri lang" byu said nghoid rigi tarha" shoid su: nghoid bye .
59002012	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo lhoid pyoin kaid da" tarha" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - dang: phyed zi shau" wa bang: yhang: ti" - tid sang: voin , vu , yhe: loo" ge' .
59002013	Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo gi nheig ase' khyeig su: ri nheig akhyeig loo: za: dang: phyed' byid: loo wa zi nghoid . Nghoid loug we' nheig khyeig shoo" myen: khyoo: gi tahra" dang: phyed' khyo: tho' moo yoem: je bo .
59002014	Nga: mangnhung" yi we" - byu dayug yug gi loem" jeing" bye ga: tid nyid nghoid loug we' moozoo" abo nghoid ri gi ce: akyu" boo wa lha" . Hau: yug loem" jeung" khyoo: gi nyang ri yo" khyoid yu wa la" .
59002015	Dang: tu , tid ba ein: rigi nanu" da" mang nhung" yi void noem zo: noem , ayoo" - sho" jhen: nyid ziri myang lho:

59002017	Loem jeing" khyoo: we' houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" nghoid . Moozoo" abo da" loem" jeung" khyoo" gi shid: mang nghoid nyid .
59002018	Nghoid loug we' byu dayu yug gi loem" jeung" nheigloem: bo lho: gootu: dayug gi moozoo" bo ga: dang: gain' ze nghoid rigi moozoo" abo da" loem" jeung" khyoo: ngoori toin" shid we' ngoo koem gi moozoo" khyo" wigi nga" loem" jeung" khyoo: ri toin" shid' ba - ein: ngoo tid ba .
59002019	Mangsoo gi dayug kyeing" danyid ziri nang aloem" jeing" la" . nghoid bye" - yu joem lang" hau: ziri loem" jeung" gyoug nain" nyid boem .
59002020	Hau: tho' moo gootu: hang: su: we" - moozoo" abo da" loem" jeung" khyoo: gi akoem: za: danghoid ziri si' nau la" .
59002021	Ngoonu" da" nya: phoug" Abraham gi Mangsoo vho ngei da" khyoo: ri khasu" kham: yu bye: lha" . Nyang: gi nya: zoo: Isag ri Mangso da" phoin: tho' moo dang ke" lho: xoin" to" pyam da" moozoo" khyoo" yo" yu" myang bye .
59002022	Nya: loem" jeung" khyoo: yo' moozoo" gi tei" xo' go" to" da" khyoo: ri nang asi amyang la" . moozoo" koid yoomo nya: da" loem" jeung" khyoo: gi joeb , byeung" loo bye .
59002023	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo Abraham gi Mangsoo ri loem" jeung" khyoo: yoomo Mangsoo gi nyang ri deung byeung" su: - ga: soin: byid bye ga: da" jhoem: mungdang: gi deung loo bye . Houg: yoomo Abraham gi Mangso da" bidnoem zeing ga: myheing byid: zi we shau" bye .
59002024	Hougsu: nghoid yoomo byu gi loem" jeung" khyo" za: anghoid - moozoo" khyo" we' Mangsoo vho: da" khyoo: ri yo" kham: yu ziri nanu" se' bye .
59002025	Shava myhi , Rahab da" khyoo: we' houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" nghoid . Nyang: gi Israela byumyu" yi da" jooyu" mo , ri loem: kham: yu pang: thoug yu lho: khyoo: goo" khaid khyo" doem , yo" gau" nhang: kaid . Houg: su" koid yoomo moozoo" zei: yoomo deungmain" ga: Mangso soin: byid bye .
59002026	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - gungdu: mookang: so' aboo lang" gi shid: mang nghoid nyid yhang: ti" - moozoo" abo da" loem" jeung" khyoo: we' shid: mang nghoid nyid .
59003001	Nga" da" mang nhung" yi we" - Sara koid mo , nanu" gi taraha" dang: phyed da" khyoo: byu gooje tho' moo je" shau" wa ziri se' nyid ge' . Houg: yoomo nanu" yug khang" moo" sara ade: koid nau nyid goo .
59003002	Ngoonu" dangain" mo , gi atheing: loo: shoid vhang" loo" se' nyid . Kha: uri we' ci: tid cang aboo: su: gi joeb byeung" su: nghoid - Houg: yhang: te" su: gi Nya: gungdu" dangain" ri yo" vhoeb khang" ung: su: nghoid nyid .
59003003	Ngoonu" gi myang: nhoid moo lung" thung" kaid' byid: lho: ngoonu" da" amyeing" ri cang nhang - ngoonu" vho: khyoo: yo' loo" nhang .
59003004	Gye" gyi: da" gyid sang phoo zeing ri we' ug lid moo" hau , lo da" uri lang" nyhab , cam" nu" zo: wigi khang" lo" lho: sang phoo khang" su: vho: jang" khyoo: yo" khang" lheung: lo" ziri myid , yu" shang .
59003005	Yhoo: we' houg: yo" dakhyoo" ti" nghoid - hau: zigi gunggoin" jang" moo nge thang da" ako zoo: te: nghoid loug we' gye" yo" phau: khuang nyid . Houg: yo' dakhyoo: ti" dajhi' kyeung" da" myi: we' houg: yhi' gyi: da" siyoo zeing ri yo" nge" pyam' ziri myid , yu" ge' .
59003006	Yhoo: we' myi: yo' du nyid wigi shoid vhang: da" khyoo: yo' byeung" jo - hau: zigi gung du: mo ako' daloem: za: te: nghoid loug we' - ngoonu" da" gung goin" moo yooboo yo" dab , loo nhang: nyid . Hau: yhoo: gi ngoonu" da" gung goin: ziri aco' ajhoid koid pyam wigi ngarai mung" mo myi: yo' nyang: - ngoonu" da" kangso' gyung: khyoo: dangain" ri yo" nge" joem: loo" nhang: pyam .
59003007	Byu xangsu: yi gi kyang: da" goug: nyhoug nghoid da" myeing khuid" zeig ni - ngo , joem yo' do: yu: yen" se' ja: yo' ngoo: do' joem ri yo" mhe , yu zi nghoid wigi houg: bang: gi me" lo boem bye .
59003008	Nghoid loug we nyang nya: da" yhoo: rigi hang" we' mi" sho' alhoung yo" mhe , yu boem nghoid ago" . Hau" yhoo: gi akhyeing" ashoeb , ziyo' - shid: nhang: se' myoo no , dug yo' byeung" jo , wigi ayo" zei: ci: loo: sho' akhyeing" ashoeb zi nghoid nyid .
59003009	Ngoonu" gi phoo Mangso: myeung ri coung" ngei nyid da" jang" moo yhoo: ri ci: boem , Mangso: da" aved alhoo: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - phain" so: to" da" byu xang: su: yi ri nheing" jang" moo we' hau: yhoo: ri ci nyid .
59003010	Nhoid dakhyab , za: mo coung nghei , thui: ge thu' loo nhung: lha" . Nga" mang nhung" yi we" hid: su" gi age koid .
59003011	Gyid bug dakhyung: mo za: gyid coug: gyid khoo" ge yau thu loo wa la" .
59003012	La form , gam moo zhain loin: shi" yo" zei: ri wa la" . zhabyid" nei moo la foem shi" yo" zei: ri" wa la" . Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" xoo" gyid bug gi gyid gi ayo" bue" loo .
59003013	Nanu" da" akhoug: moo se' yeug da" phajhi" boo su: dayug yug nyid nghoid rigi hau: yug gi nyang: se' da" phajhi" boo su: gi nyang: se' da" phajhi" khyoo: ri zei so' da" moozoo" khyo" we' khyo , nyhoem: khyoo: khyo" we' ge , da" moozoo" ri zei: so' khyo" we' sag si: kham , nyid baja" .
59003014	Nghoid loug we' gyeing" nyang: ga: rigi nanu" da" nheigloem: khoug: moo no" zo nheigloem: - nheig yo: da" nheigloem: yo' nya: akyu" za: shoo: nau ziyo' nghoid boin: phau: khuang khyoo: yo' za: byeung" jo , nghoid rigi hau: deungmain" da" khyoo: ri shoid vhang: khyo" koid nyid zi nghoid .
59003015	Houg: yhang: te" da" phajhi" gi tho' khyo" gyoo" lo da" phajhi" anghoid - moug: myid tho' mo Venyi yo' sen: da" yu join zhadain: da" phajhi" danghoid .
59003016	Khasu" wim gari no" zo da" nheigloem: - nyang: nya: da" akyu" ri za: te: shoo: nau , da" joyoo moo gi amyen , akhyoid myeing" myoo: yhoo: she: khyoo: ri we' akhyeing" ashoeb da" moozoo" aja: ja: ri we' bue" thu loo nhang: nyid .
59003017	Nghoid loug we' tho' khyo" ju" gyoo" lo da" phajhi" ju yhi: koem gi xang: shid" re young" gyeung" - hau: thang: moo myenjham" ngei pyo: khyoo:-nu" nham , khyoo: young" du , nyeung veung" khyoo: ri bue" thu loo nhang: - hau: tho' moo gootu: nheig khyeug khyoo: yo' joeb byeung" wigi ge thang moozoo" ein: da" aboo" bo" lho: ashi" zei: loo nhang: se' nyid . hau: zigi myonhoo: ase' khyen: - nghoid boin: da" khyoo: aboo - akug ase' void .
59003018	Myenjham" khyoo: vhoo: mo' - myenjham" tung" sho" to" da" amyoug: ashi" mo zei: thu' lo da" ashi" gi ge , lho , da" khyoo: za: nghoid nyid .
59004001	Nanu" moo ciwim myeing" myo: nyid go nheig yo: byo , go" khyoo: gi khayo , thu' lo ein: jhoo: go" Nanu" da" gung shoo" myo , no , loug gyi: vhoo: bo-zain goo" said' go" nyid da" nheigloem: mo thug lo nyid zi anghoid goo" la" .
59004002	Nanu" gi nanu" nyang: myid vho: khyoo: ri ayoo" yoomo byu ri said pyam wa zilang" jen" jen" nghoid nyid boem ago" . Nyang: tu: nya: da" myoo" sho' jain" sho' vhoo: boo loug gyi: nyid ziri ayo" yu yoomo myeing myo: lho: gyi , bui" go" nyid . Nanu" vhoo: bo nyid da" zi joem ri ayo" yu da" khyoo: gi Mangso jang" moo amho , ayoid , yoomo nghoid nyid .
59004003	Nanu" gi mho' nghoid loug we' ashau" yu nghoid ago - Khasu" wim gari nanu" da" myid soin: khyoo: agi nghoid ago - nanu" gi nyang: tu: nya: da" gung du: pyoo: wa da" khyoo: za: damho , nyid ago" .
59004004	Dang: azung" mo , nanu" gi mougmyid yo' bidnoem koid nyid mo , nanu" gi Mangsoo ri gyi koid shoo" koid nyid mo , nghoid ziri nanu" nyang: si' shi" go" la" . Moug: myid ri bidnoem koid noug su: gi Mangso da" gyivoo danghoid nyid .
59004005	Jhoem: mungdang: moo Ngoonu" da" akhoug: moo Mangsoo kaid byid: to" da" Venyi gi-gye" thain: da" vho: ngei nheigloem: yo' byeung" jo , ga: wigi tid to" da" zigi agoin: danghoid ein: amyid nyid goo .
59004006	Nghoid loug we' ngoonu" gi Mangsoo byid: to" da" jeju" azeing ri je" wigi yoem: moo" bo nyid boem . Mangsoo gi nghoid boin: nyid mo , ri lang: khyo , pyam lho: nyhoem: khyo , nyid mo , ri jeju" byid: nyid ga: jhoem: mungdang: moo bo nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" nghoid .
59004007	Houg: su: nghoid yoomo Mangsoo: khasu" vho" ri hougsu" cang loo" ge" . Zhadan ri lhoem: theing shang" - zain: oung: nyid ge" . Hougsu" nghoid lang" nyang: gi nanu" jang" mo phang: loo" wa nghoid .
59004008	Mangso jhang yu: tain" ri" ge' . houg: lang" Mangsoo we' nanu" jhang khyoo: yu: tain" loo wa yooboo yoo" bang: we" nanu" da" lo , ri cid" pyam' ge' nheigloem: eigkoo , boo mo , we" - nanu" da" nheigloem: ri cid" shang: pyam ge' .
59004009	Myed kug myed shu: lho: ngoug myeing" shoo" thui: to" nyid ge' - nanu" da" gau yi khyoo: gi kug myeing" shoo" thui: yo' thid' go" lho: nanu" da" gau yi khyoo: gi nheig koug nheig shu: khyoo: yo' thid' go" nyid ge' .
59004010	Nanu" gi nanu" nya: da" gung du: ri Aseung da" shid khoin" moo khyo , nyhoem: nyid ge' . houg: lang" nyang: gi nanu" ri coung" nghei tu: to' kaid wa zi nghoid nyid .
59004011	Mang: nhung" yi we" - nanu" gi nyang cang" nyang: - aloem" athoo: dang: tid juang" yi go" nyid boem nghoid loug we' ca: joeb" dang: kho' go" nyid uri nghoid loug we' hau: tarha" ri aloem" athoo: - juang" yi dang: kho' go" khyo" dalo" eung: nyid . Hau: tarha" ri dang: phyed' nghoid rigi nanu" gi hau: tarha" ri cang nyid mo , anghoid loo: za: tarha" ri dang: kho' mo , za: danghoid nyid .
59004012	Mangsoo dayug kyeing" za: tarha" ri byid: to" lho: tarha" dang: yo" kho' su: nghoid . Mangsoo dayug kyeing" za: kangso' ri yo" byid: lho: yo" phyo' shoin pyam nyid . nang gi khayhang: te" su: nghoid lho: nanya: myid khyo" cang lho: dang: phyed' nyid la" .
59004013	Akhid nyid anghoid lang" gi nab yo nyid" voogung daleom: khyoo: ngoonu" yhe: lho: dazain koo: nyid shang - hau: voo moo phaga: koid wigi ngei myoo" sho' sho: boem shang ga: wigi nanu" tid go" nyid boem . Nghoid loug we' ngoo tid ziri tam" gyo: yu" ge' .
59004014	Nanu" moo nab , yo nyid" cibui" wa ziri asi - byu yi da" apyaid gi ci: za: te: nghoid lha" . - houg: gi ce: noem , za: te: nghoid nyid lha" . Houg: gi daso' za: te: thu' re" lho: doem , bei: lo" byug da" myikhoug" so yo' date: du nyid .
59004015	Mangsoo myid vho: nghoid rigi ngoonu" gi kangso dei nyid lho: he: da" moo" ri we' thei: da" moo" ri we' yo" zei: wa ein: za: nanu" dage tid ago" .
59004016	Akhid" nanu" koem gi nheigloem: gyi: lho: phau: khuang se' nyid ago" - hougsu" phau: khuang da" khyoo: bain sho' gi shoid da" khyoo: nghoid .
59004017	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ge da" moozoo" ri ngoonu" se' to" lho: azei: loo" su: gi yooboo dab , nyid .
59005001	Yoo" mo , di mo , we' nga" da" thui: ri tam" gyoo: ge' . nanu" gi nanu" nyang: moo ju" lo nyid da" sho" jhen kyi" khyeug wa khyoo: yoomo jha" yoid ngau nyid loo: ge
59005002	Nanu" da" soidgain jo , nu" joem gi yoem: lo" nyid bye: - nanu" da" mi byi: joem ri we' nhau zo: shoin , pyam byid bye .
59005003	Nanu" da" ngei sheing: joem we' zo wigi zo: shoin , pyam byid: bye . hau" zoo joem gi nanu" shoid khyo" sagsi: joem nghoid nyid wigi nanu" da" gung shoo" ri we' myi: yhang: ti" nge" joem: loo" nhang: wa hid: lo" thang da" bidnyid ayo , joem shid re" nanu" gi soidgain ri dazheung" to" nyid goonhung: lha" .
59005004	Nanu" gi nanu" nya: da" tung yoo yoothung" joem moo moo" zei: nyid da" byu yi gi ce" vhu" kung: phoug" we' ashang" kaid boem . Nyang: nu" nheig yoo: nheig jhug nyho: nyid thui: ri tam" gyo: yu" ge' . Nanu" da" shivoo: shiloem , shung: byid: nyid mo da" thui: gi athang agoin da" yoem: moo" bo da" Aseing: Mangso nukhyab' moo khyang: vang loo" bye .
59005005	He: mougmyid moo nanu" da" byu nyid byuyab , khyoo: gi yoo" zoo: yoo" shug nyid pyoo: yab , pyo: lho: pyo: khyoo: aja: ja: yo' byeung" jo . Nanu" gi said pyam wa da" bidnyid shid re" nyang: nya: da" gung du: ri myhug to" boem abye: go .
59005006	Nanu" gi deing byeung" su: ri dang: phyed' lho: said pyam abye: go . Nyang: gi nanu" ri thoutheung nyid su: anghoid .
59005007	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo mang: nhung" yi we" - Nanu" gi Aseing: gyoo" lo da" ayo , ju" sho' zeing: kham lho: nheig byu zoore" dalang" nyid ge' . Yoo thung" phug su: gi nya: yoo thung" mo phoug" dab , da" amyoug: ashi" ri yo" yu sho-zain moug: vo shid" lo jang" mo zi lid" jhin" yu: moo ju" sho' yoem: kaid zeing: shang" lho: lang" nyid .
59005008	Nanu" we" zeing: shang" lho: nheig byu lang" nyid ge' Aseing Yesu doem gyoo" loo wa da" ayo , gi jhang loo bye: yoomo nanu" geing: geing: teing teing dalang" nyid ge' .
59005009	Mang: nhung" yi we" - nanu" nyang: gung nyang: - Mangso ca: kyeing yu: zi ashug" wa shid re" nanu" nyang: cang" nyang: dayug gi gootu: dayug ri yooboo afoin: go" nyid goo" - tarha" agyi phoo gi khoem" moo" duang: moo yab , jo , bye .
59005010	Mang: nhung" yi we" - Mangso da" myeing yo' kho" kyo" da" lapi: yi da" khyoo ri myed boin myed so" nyid ge' . Nyangnu" gi shen" yhen zi shau" da" uri nheigloem: sheung: ziyo' yo" kham , zeung: nyid boem da" khyoo: ri khoo" shid: yu" yu ge' .
59005011	Nyangnu" gi yo" kham: zeing: mo , nghoid yoomo nyangnu" ri ngi: lhoo' mo , ein: ngoonu" tid boem bye . Yoba khasu" kham , zeung: khyoo: ri we' nanu" shau" gyo: yu" boem bye . Lo" thang moo Aseing: gi nyang: ri khasu" coung: goin , khyoo: ri nanu" si' bye . Khasu" wim gari Aseing: gi nheig khyeug wigi athang agoin myed yo' byeung" su: nghoid nyid .
59005012	Nga" mang: nhung" yi we" - nanu" jham tang: go" khyoo: gi dajhi' we' akoid goo" - moug: khung: ri we' anghoid - myidjang: myeing yu lho: we' anghoid - ce" noem myeing ri lang: lho: we' jham atang: goo" . Nanu" da" dang: gi nghoid ga: lang" gi nghoid bye - anghoid ga: lang" we' anghoid baja" - houg su: nghoid lang" gi nanu" ri Mangso dang: kho' zi ashau" boem wa .
59005013	Nanu" mo dayug yug noo phyoo" jam jau phu" nyid go" la" . Nyang gi akyu" mho' nyid baja" - dayug yug gi myid pyo: nyid go" la" . Nyang: gi coung" nghei jikhoin" khoin" nyid baja" .
59005014	Nanu" mo dayug yug gi noo phyoo" shau" nyid go" la" . nyang: gi phung ludaid' yi ri khi: baja" Hau" phoug: ludaid' yi gi nyangnu" shid re" akyu" mho' nyid: goo" baja" . Nyangnu" gi Aseung: da" myeing khyang" yo' nyangnu" ri namman" xu: joid byid: goo" baja" .
59005015	Loem" jeing" da" nheigloem: yo' akyu" mho' nyid su: da" dang: gi noo , su: ri yo" ge loo nhang: lho: Aseing: gi nyang: ri ge , loo" nhang: lho: nyang: shoid vhang da" yooboo joem ri we' khyoid pyam byid: zi shau" wa nghoid .
59005016	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi nyang: cang" nyang: - nyang: nya: da" yooboo ri tid thu toung" pain go" lho: dayug shid re" dayug - akyu" mho' byid: go" nyid ge' . Houg: su" koid lang" nanu" da" noo phyoo" jamjau mo ge yang" zain: loo wa zi nghoid . Deungmain" su: da" akyu" mho' yoid thui: gi yo" bue" loo" nhang: da" yoem: myoo" sho' bo nyid .
59005017	Elia gi ngoonu" yo" dakhyoo" te" da" xangsu: byu za: date: nghoid loug we' nyang: gi moug: avoo loo: wa shid re" nheigloem: yoem: moo" khyo" akyu" gyi" sho' mho' kaid . Houg: su" akyu" mho' yoomo mougmyid tho' moo soem" zain lham" moo" khyug" khyab thang sho' moug: avoo khari" loo .
59005018	Hau: thang: ri Elia akyu" doem mho' kaid lang" gi moug: khung: mo moug: gi doem vo lo lho: myidjang: gi amyoug: ashi" ri doem yug loo nhang .
59005019	Nga" mang: nhung" yi we" - nanu" mo dayug yug gi deungmain" da" khyo: mo khyoo: vhang: vhang: lo" lho: gootu: dayug yug ge" doem shu" tau" ju" lo ri
59005020	Hougsu" yooboo shoid su: dayug yug ri khyoo: vhang: lo" jang" mo doem yo" khe: shu" loo su: gi hau: yug da" kangso' ri shid: loo" bye: jang" moo deom yo" khyoid yu lho: nya: yooboo dangain" khyoid pyam byid: zi shau" wa shid re" voin , vu , zei: so' byid: su: nghoid ein: myid boin: nyid ge' .
60001001	Aseing Yesu Khristu da" lagyoo: Peteru jang" mo Puntu: Galati - Kapadoki Asha mung" yo' Bethuni mung" joem moo byo sain" nyid mo , Mangsoo khyen: yu to" da" byu phung: yi jhang khyoo: mougsoug" lhid" kaid .
60001002	Phoo , Mangsoo gi nyang: myid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Yesu Khristu ri tam" gyoo: wa ziyo' nya: suid" yo' ced" yung" ced" lhoo' wa shid re" phoo Mangsoo gi nyang: soin' nyheung ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" ri khyen: yu bye: ziyo' nya: da" Venyi gi nanu" ri gyeungshang: da" byu yi bue" loo nhang: bye jeju" yo' myen , jham" khyoo: gi nanu" moo myo: tham: loo baja" o" .
60001003	Ngoonu" gi ngoonu" Aseing Yesu da" nya: phoo Mangsoo ri jeju" boin: nyid boem shang - khasu" wim gari Mangsoo gi atho' tid da" nheig khyeig shoo" myen: si su: nghoid yoomo Aseing Yesu Khristu ri shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: khyo" wigi ngoonu" ri kangso' aseig byid: bye - houg: yoomo ngoonu" moo dei nyid wa da" nheig byu joyoo ri yo" yu boem bye .
60001004	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi Mangso byu phung: shid re" Mangsoo nyang: shoung: too" byid: bye: da" agyid asoo: ri yo" kham: zoo: wa ziri nheig byu lang" nyid boem . Mangsoo gi hau: da" agyid asoo: ri nanu" shid re" moug: khung: moug di moo young: too" byid: bye - houg: yoomo hau" agyid asoo: gi abyo , abei ashoem: apyang: lo: da" zi nghoid .
60001005	Hau: agyid asoo: gi nanu" shid' re" nghoid - nanu" gi loem , khau loem" jeung" yoomo Mangso yoem: so' yo' lo" thang bidnyid moo yo" toin' shed' wa jen" bye: da" khyoid yu khyoo: yoo" sho' zung" lhug zi shau" mo , nghoid ago" .
60001006	Nanu" gi jham" ca , yu' da" gunglau aja: ja: thoung" shau" yoomo akhid" daso' dadam myid myoo: ung: loug zi shau" nyid boem nghoid loug we' tid lid loo bye: da" khyoo: yoomo gau yi ngei pyo: nyid ge' .
60001007	Hougsu" jham" ca , yu" da" gunglau" shau" khyoo: gi Mangsoo ri nanu" loem" jeung" khyoo: gyeung" ziri toin" shid khyoo: nghoid . byug thang loo" se' da" ngei sheing: ri lang" myi: yo' jham" ca , yu" zi shau" nyid Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - sheing: tho' moo je phau" da" nanu" da" loem" jeung nheigloem: ri we' gyeungshang: lho: geung: teing wa shid re" myi: moo kyeung zi shau" nyid Hougsu" nghoid lang" nanu" gi Aseing Yesu doem gyoo" lo da" bidnyid moo myonhoo: bug thu' sheing" jhu" ziyo' coung" nghei zi shau" kham: yu boem wa zi nghoid .
60001008	Nanu" gi Khristu ri amyang yu" boem nghoid loug we' jheddab nyid-akhuid" amyang shi" nghoid loug we' nanu" gi Aseing: ri loem" jeung" nyid bye - hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi nhoid , yo' tid loo , a-oung: loo: sho' gau yi ngei pyo: ziyo' ngei pyo: nyid boem bye .
60001009	Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" gi Aseing Yesu ri loem , khau: loem" jeing" bye: yoomo nanu" da" kangso' ri khyoid yu zi shau" boem bye .
60001010	Lapi: yi gi hau: khyoid yu khyoo: yo' sen: lho: wigi voin: tang: cang phoid: sho: lo" boem bye - nanu" gi Mangsoo nanu' ri byid: wa ga: da" he: da" jhung: shug khyoo: ri Lapi: pe: kyo" boem bye .
60001011	He: da" khyoid yu khyoo: gi kha: yo' kha: khyeing: mo: ju" ri" wa zi we' ce: ja: ce: khyoo" re" bue" thu' loo wa ziri se' loo" wa shid re" phoid: sho: yu" boem bye . Nyangnu" da" akhoug: moo bo vang zei: nyid da" Khristu da" venyi gi Yesu shau" kham' zoo: wa dam shid' re" we' haugsu" bain' kham zo: da" thang: ri shau" kham' zoo: wa da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri we' no re toin" shid' to" uri he: da" ayo , ri toin" shid zi nghoid nyid .
60001012	Mangsoo hid: bang: ri' toin" shid' zigi akyu" yoo" wa shid re" anghoid - nanu' da" akyu" shid re" danghoid . Khasu" wim ga: ri nyangnu" gi nanu" akhid" lagyoo: yi jang" mo shau" gyo: yu da" ngei bu: lu dang: yo' sen: lho: no re tid to" boem - hau" ngei bu: lu dang: gi moug: khung: khyo" nhang: kaid' da" gyeungshang: da" venyi yoem: so' yo' lu dang: voin lagyoo: yi tid fu" byid: bye - hau: da" khyoo: yi ri moug: lagyoo: yi lang" bo , se' gyoo: nau nyid boem .
60001013	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" da" nheigloem: moo moo" zei: wa shid re" jen" jen" koid lho: akhyoo" cang nyid ge , - Aseing Yesu doem gyoo" lo da' uri nanu" kham: yu wa da" jeju" jhung: shug yo" yu wa shid re" khanham we' nheig byu nyid ge' .
60001014	Mangsoo ri tam" gyoo: ge' - shid' phyang" aboin: asi shi' da" ayo , moo nanu' cang lo yu" bye: da" vhoo: boo myo , no , kangso' dei khyoo: akoid loo: za: .
60001015	Nanu" ri khe: yu su: Mangsoo gi gyeungshang: nyid yhang: ti" - nanu" we' byu nyid byu yab , khyoo: ja: khang" moo" moo gyeungshang: nyid ge' .
60001016	Khasu" wim ga: ri ngoo gyeungshang: nyid yhang: ti" - nanu' we' gyeungshang: nyid ge' ga: jhoem: mungdang: moo lhid" to" .
60001017	Hau: tho' moo gootu: byu dangain" ri myonhoo: vhu" zung akhyen: loo za-nyangnu" da" moozoo" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - tarha" dang: phyed' byid: nyid da" Mangso jang" moo akyu" mho' nyid uri nanu" gi Mangsoo ri nga" phoo we" ga: mho' yoid nyid boem bye - Houg: yoomo mougmyid' moo dei nyid daloo gyoo: moo hau: Aseing: ri gyoug phau" nyid ge' .
60001018	Nanu" gi nya: phoug" nya: phyid" yi apyaid' mo wigi cang gyo" lo da" akyu' abo da" asam" aved mo byo , yoin" loo" se' nyid da" ngei sheing: yo' nanu" ri yo" qei khyoid yu to" zi anghoid .
60001019	Ce: noo adab da" yung" lho' yang nu" yo' du - Khristu da" phoug" dab , suid" yo' za: dayo" qei yu .
60001020	He: da" mougmyid ajo , shi" mo Mangsoo gi nyang: ri khyen: yu to" lho: he: mougmyid' lo" thang da" bidnyid moo nanu" da" akyu" shid re" nyang: ri myang nhang: bye .
60001021	Nyang: mo wigi nanu" Mangsoo ri loem , khau: loo bye - Mangsoo gi Yesu ri shid: jang" mo doem dei to'' loo nhang: wigi myonhoo: phung" yoeb , thu loo nhang: bye - Yesu khyo" wigi nanu" hougsu" loem" jeung loem khau: nheig byu khyoo: gi Mangsoo moo zoug jo , wa zi nghoid .
60001022	Nanu" gi deingmain" da" tarha" ri cang so" loo" yoomo nanu" da" nheigloem: ung: khoug: ri ced" yung ced" lho , wigi nanu" nyang: cang" we' nheigloem: ung: khoug: bain sho' yo' jheddab go" nyid ge' .
60001023	Khasu" wim ga: ri dadei nyid da" apyaid' ato: Mangso mungdang: mo nanu' gi dalheing: dam khu: lo boem bye - hougsu" nanu" gi shid: noo ase' myhi , pho da" nya: zoo: yi yo" bue" lo boem bye .
60001024	Xang: su: byu yi dangain" mo , gi vu , fu" myo , yhang: ti" we' vu , fu" myo , gi kyoug nyhau" lo" lho: bain: boo" we' te: shoem: lo .
60001025	Nghoid loug we' Mangso da" mungdang: koem gi apyaid' atoo: moo geung: teung jo , - ga: wigi jhoem:
60002001	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo nanu' gi age da" khyoo: aja: ja: yo' mhau' fain" da" khyoo: aja: ja: - ayid void da" khyoo: - no" zo dang: tid ziyo' juang" yi dang: joem ri she: pyam' loo: ge'
60002002	Aseig co' phyed' to" da" zoonu' yi yhang: ti" - nanu" we' Venyi noug" gyeing" ri khanham we shug nau nyid ge' - - Hougsu" nghoid lang" she , nanu" gi gyi: sheung: lo lho: khyoid yu zi shau" boem wa nghoid .
60002003	Jhoem: mungdang: moo gi Aseing: gi khayhi' mo nheig se' khyeug nyid khyoo: ri nanu" nyang: se' abye: go" - ga: tid to .
60002004	Houg: yoomo Aseung: jhang khyoo: tain" tab loo ge' nyang: gi kangso' dei nyid da" lung moo" beom nghoid . Hau: lug moo" boem' gi ce: phoug" adab ga: byu yi gi khyen: pyam' too" nghoid loug we' Mangso wigi phoug" dab , ga: khyen: yu bye .
60002005	Nanu" gi kangso' dei nyid da" lug moo" boem' khyoo" Mangso jang" moo re" lho: Venyi yhoem: moo" zhoug to" jang" moo akyu bo da" lug loem: bue" loo nhang: ge' . hau: da" venyi Noku yhoem: moo" moo nanu" gi Mangsoo vho: ngei da" venyi xoin" ri Yesu Khristu khyo" wigi-xoin" to' byid: da" gyeungshang: khainjung yi bue" loo wa nghoid .
60002006	Khasu" wim ga: ri jhoem: mungdang: moo ngoo gi phoug" dab , da" lug daloem: ri khyo" zhoug too" bye - nyang: ri loem" jeing" mo , hang" we' gyoug sho' zi shau" wa anghoid - ga: wigi lhid" to" . yhoug: gyen: thang da" yhoem: jhoin: mo geung: teung da" lug . Loem: bue" loo bye . Hau: khyoo: koem gi Mangsoo nyheung to" da" khyoo: nghoid .
60002007	Loem" jeung" mo , nanu" shid re" gi hau: lug moo" boem , gi gye" phau" zi nghoid . Nghoid loug we' aloem" ajeung" mo , shid re" gi lug yhoem: zhug mo , khyen: lhei" to" da lug loem" gi yhoug: gyen: thang da" yhoem: jhoin: mo geung: teung da" lug . Loem: bue" loo bye .
60002008	Gootu: da" jhoem: mungdang: daloem: moo gi hau: lug loem: gi byu yi ri khyid: vhu" thoung" leung nhang: da" lug loem: yo' nyangnu" ri leung loo" nhang: da" lug zeing ga: lhid" to" . Houg: bang: gi Yesu da" lu dang: gi , ri atam" gyo: boem yoomo thoung" thue: leung lo" boem bye - Hau: khyoo: koem gi Mangsoo nyheung to" da" khyoo: nghoid .
60002009	Nghoid loug we' nyangnu" koem gi moug: coid' khoug: mo wigi nya: da" mau" pho" bidbang khyoo: - nanu' ri khe: yu su: Mangso da" mau" pho moozoo" ri tid fu" loo" wa shid re" khyen: yu to" da" byumyu" - Khokham" da" khain: jung yi gyeungshang: da" byumyu" yo'
60002010	Mangsoo seung: ci: da" byumyu" yi nghoid bye . Nanu" gi xang: shed" ri Mangso da" byumyu" anghoid - akhid" koem gi Mangso da" byumyu" nghoid bye - xang: shed" ri nanu" gi nheig khyeug zi shau" mo , anghoid - nghoid loug we' akhid" koem gi nanu" nheig khyeug zi shau" boem bye .
60002011	Ngoo jheddab da" bidnoem yi we" - nanu" ri he: da" mougmyid moo gyung: so" nyid da" tungboug yi yo' phang: yen" mo , ri yhang: ti" - ngoo nanu" ri mho' kaid , nanu" gi khanham we' kangso' ri meing: zain: nyid da" gung shoo" vho: khyoo: moo nanu' da" gung du: ri meing: zain: nyid da" gung shoo" vho: khyoo: moo nanu" da" gung du: ri ab , pyam' ge' .
60002012	Aseing Yesu ri aloem" jeung" - aloem , khau: mo , gi nanu" ri age da" moo" ri zei: nyid mo , nghoid ga - yooboo foin: nyid uri nanu" koid ge da" moozoo" ri shau" yu" myang wigi Yesu doem gyoo" lo da" bidnyid moo Mangsoo riyo" coung" nghei byid: goo" baja" - nanu" gi nanu" nya: da" shid' khoin" moo ge , lho , da" asam" aved , yo' kang: so dei nyid ge' .
60002013	Aseung: da" myonhoo: ri tu: yu" lho: byu yi zhoug to" da" zoug: yi dangain" mo , da" vhoeb , khang" da" khyoo: ri tam" gyoo: byid: ge' . Gyi: thang da' amyeing" akhang" ci: da" khokham" zeing yo'
60002014	Age da" moo" zei: mo , ri dam byid: wa ziyo' ge da" moo" zei: mo , ri coung" byid: wa da" mung" zoug: yi ri tam" gyoo: ge' .
60002015	Nanu" gi nanu" nyang: zei: wa ge da" moozoo" yo' ci" ase' da' byugang: yi da" nhoid ri myhed" pyam' byid: wa shid re" we' Mangsoo myed vho: nyid zi nghoid .
60002016	Nanu" gi loid byoin , loo" mo , khyo" zei: so' nyid yab ge' - nghoid loug we' akhyeing" ashoeb , khyoo: ri nghoeb , too" wa shid' re" nanu" da" loid byoin , akhang" ri aci: goo" - nghoid loug we' nanu" gi Mangso da" join , yi yhang: ti" zei: so' nyid ge' .
60002017	Byu danghoid moo nghoid rigi phau" myang: nyid ge' - loem" jeung" da" mang nhung" gootu: yi ri jheddab nyid ge' - Mangsoo ri gyoug phau" nyid ge' - Khokham" yi riphau" myang: nyid ge' .
60002018	Dei zoo: yi we" - nanu" da" yhoem: seing: yi vhoeb khang" khyo" cang nyid ge , nheigloem: ge lho: se' pang" se' thug mo , ri za: we' anghoid - akhyeing" ashoeb da" yhoem: seing: yi ri we' phau" gyoug nyid ge' .
60002019	Nanu' gi Mangsoo vho: ngei nyid da" khyoo: joem ri si' byid: lho: athoung" shau" moin: da" yaukhe" kyi" khyeug da" khyoo: - nanu" thoung" shau" lo boem nghoid loug we' nyang: vho: khyo" myed boin: lho:-zeung: kham , nyid ri Mangsoo gi nanu" ri mainkaid jeju" byid: wa zi nghoid .
60002020	nanu" gi nanu" nyang: koid shoid da yooboo yoomo kham' moin: da" yoobo dam ri kham' zo: nyid nghoid rigi nanu" ri hang wigi se' coung" byid: wa nghoid loug we' deingmain" da" moozoo" yoomo yaukhe" kyi" khyeug da" dam kham nyid nghoid rigi Houg: yoomo Mangsoo gi nanu" ri mainkaid jeju" byid: wa zi nghoid .

60002024	Ngoonu" gi youg: noo yooboo ri she: pyam kho lho-deing main" mo , khyo" kangso' yo" dei nyid wa shid re" nyang: gi ngoonu" da" yooboo ri nya: gung du: moo nyang: voin , lho: pyang" zeing tho' khyoo: yhe: loo" bye -
60002025	Ngoonu" gi Yesu da" dam noo joem mo-noo ge lo boem bye . Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" gi yang joem yhang: ti" - khyoo: vhang: vhang: lo" byug boem bye - nghoid loug we' akhid" koem gi hau" yang lhug zoug: moo" yo' nanu" da" kang so' ri zung" byid: su: jhang: khyoo: - cang loo" wa shid' re" doem shu" lo zi shau" bye .
60003001	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - yhoem: seing: myhi' yi we" - nanu" da" yhoem: seing: pho , vhoeb , khang" khyo" cang nyid ge' . hid: su" koid khyo" wigi Mangso da" mungdang: ri aloem" jeing" shi" yhoem: seing: phoo yo" nghoid ri nanu" nyid yab , zei: so' da" aved , asam" yoomo loem" jeung" lo boem wa zi nghoid - nanu" da" nhoid mo wigi ci: tid anoo .
60003002	Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" da" aved , asam" khayhi' gyeing" phyu: young" da" khyoo: yo' phau" myang: nheigloem: ri nyangnu" shau" myang lo boem wa zi nghoid .
60003003	Nanu' da" gung du: yung" lho' khyoo: gi nghe: shoid mo lhoo , yhoung khyoo: - xam: kuid" kued" ziyo' byi: mi , yung: zi ngei sheing: lug nyoug tab shoung: yhoung khyo" anghoid baja" .
60003004	Nyang: nya: nheigloem: ung: khoug: yo' sen: da" khyoo: - gyeungshang: nu" nham , nheigloem: ein: da - khanham we' ashoem: apyang: lo" da" lhoo , ri yhoung ci: ge' . Houg: yhang: ti" lhoo , ri yhoung ci: da" khyoo: gi Mangso shid' khoin" moo phoug" dab , da" khyoo: nghoid .
60003005	Shid' phyang" Mangsoo ri loem , khau: nheig byu nyid da" myi: yi: yi gi nyangnu" da" yhoem: seing: pho , bang: da" dang: ri we' tam" gyo: khyo" nyangnu" da" gung ri lhoo , yhoung nyid boem ago" .
60003006	Sa ra: gi Abraham da" dang: ri tam" gyo: Abraham ri nga" yhoem: seing: ga: tid . Nanu" we' agyug avoem loo: ge da" moo" ri zei: nyid rigi nanu" we' Sara da" myiyi: zoo: yi nghoid .
60003007	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - yhoem: seing: pho we" - nanu" da" yhoem: seing: myhi' yi gi nanu" tho' moo yoem: neing: mo , nghoid ziri se' lho: nyangnu" yo' zoem" khau: nyid ge' - nyangnu" gi apyaid' ato: kangso yo' sen: da" jeju" ri nanu" yo' da khyoo" ti" yo" yu wa mo , nghoid yoomo nanu" gi nyangnu" ri phoug" phoug" myang myang zoem" khau: nyid ge' - hougsu" nghoid lang" she' nanu" da" akyu" mho' thui: gi khanham we' dakhyoo" ti" - yo' mho' nyid boem wa zi nghoid .
60003008	Lo" thang moo tid shed' nau da" khyoo: gi nanu" gi e" myed , nheigloem: daloem: za: dabo nyid ge' - dayug yo' dayug nheig khyeig shoo" myen: go" nyid ge' . dayug yo' dayug gi mang: kang nhung" kang yi yhang: ti" jheddab go" nyid ge' . nheig se' khyeug da" nheigloem: bo nyid ge' . khyo , nyhoem: ziyo' zoem" khau: nyid ge' .
60003009	Akhyeung" bang: rigi akhyeung" khyo"-nheung" mo , rigi doem , nheung" khyo" latoo: aphug goo" - hougsu" latoo: phug wa gung khoo: gi main' boo coug: bo da" dang: ri tid byid: nyid ge' - Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo gi nanu" ri khe: yu u ri mainkaid da" jeju" ri shau" kham , zoo: goo" baja" ga - nanu' ri dang: soo' byid: bye .
60003010	Jhoem: mungdang: moo ge da" bidnyid ri myang noug su: hang" nghoid loug we' akhyeung" dang: atid' loo: za-nyang: nya: da" nhoid moo mhau' fain" da" dang: tid jang" mo , no: pyam' ca" nyid .
60003011	Nyang: gi akhyeung" da" moozoo" mo lheung: lo" lho: ge da" moo" ri zei: ja" - nya: emyid , bain' sho' yo' ngei pyoo: myenjham" da" khyoo: shau" wa shid re" yoem: kaid' sho: nyid ca" . nyangnu" da" akyu" mho' thui: ri tam" gyoo: byid: nyid . 60003012	Khasu" wim ga: ri Aseing: gi deingmain" mo , riyu" coung" zung" lhug lho: nyangnu" da" akyu" mho' thui: ri tam" gyoo: byid: nyid . Nghoid loug we' a khyeing" ashoeb da" moo" zei: nyid mo , ri gi
60003013	Aseing: nheig yo: myonhoo: thoung: zhug to" . Gyeing" nyang: - nanu" gi ge , da" moo" zei: wa vho: ngei nyid rigi kha: yug gi nanu" ri gyi se' koid wa lha" .
60003014	Nghoid loug we' gyeing" nyang: nanu" gi deungmain" deing byeung da" moo" zei: yoomo shid: gyoin , noo gyoin yo' shen" yhen zi: shau" nyid rilang" - nanu" gi khayhi' ngi lho , boem bye lha" . hang" ri we' agyug nyid goo" - myid' we' amyo: nyid goo" .
60003015	Nanu" da" nheigloem: khoug: moo Khristu ri phau" myang: lho: wigi Aseing: gi yhoem: seing: khyo" nyang: - coung" nghei kham: yu nyid ge' - nanu" yo" kham: yu bye: da" nheig byu joyoo da" khyoo: ri myid: phoid: sho: loo su: ri kha: uringhoid loug we' tid phoid: sho' kyoo" wa shid re" jen" jen" koid too" ge' .
60003016	Nghoid loug we' nu" nham , phau" myang: khyo" phoid: kyo" nyid ge' - nanu" da" yeug koung nheigloem: moo ce" yooboo we' adab baja" - Houg: su" wigi nanu" ri juang" yi zi shau" nyid da" uri Khristu da" thang: cang mo , khyo" nanu" da" asam" aved , joem ri ge , khyo" tid mo , gi sho' thu goo" wa zi nghoid .
60003017	Mangsoo vho: khyo" nghoid rigi akhyeung" da" moo" zei: wa tho' moo gi ge , da" moo" ri zei: yoomo shen" yhen shau" zi gi je" ge , nyid .
60003018	Khasu" wim gari Khristu gi yooboo yoo" mo , gung thid' - dalheing: dam , bain' sho' shid: kham: pyam bye - nanu" ri Mangso jang" moo shu" ju" loo wa da" shid' re" yooboo yoo" mo , shid' mo byu gi dayug gi shid: bye-nyang: gi moug: myed , gung shoo" ri said' pyam zi shau" bye - nghoid loug we' venyi khyo" doem dei loo nhang: zi shau" bye .
60003019	Aseing: gi nya: venyi khyo" nyang: - thung: loung" jo , da" venyi yi jhang khyoo: tarha" lo" kho" kyo .
60003020	Hau: da" venyi joem gi No-a sangphoo' yhoem: zhug nyid uri Mangsoo gi nheigloem: sheing: sheing: lang" nyid da" ayo , moo nya: mungdang: ri atam" gyoo: mo , da" venyi joem nghoid . nghoid loug we' gyid mo yo" khyoid yu mo , gi sangphoo' khoug: moo dajhi' za: date: bo lho: nghab shang ein: rigi shed' yug za: date: nghoid .
60003021	He: da" khyoo: gi nanu" ri akhid" khyoid yu to" da" Babtisma kham da" khyoo: ri tu , to" alhoo: nghoid - hau: Babtisma kham da" khyoo: gi gung du: mo aco' ajhoid khyoo: ri ced" pyam' khyo" anghoid loo: za: gyeungshang: da" nheigloem: yo' Mangsoo yo' dang: theung thang" cab , zain: go" to" da" khyoo: nghoid - hau: khyoo: gi nanu" ri Aseing Yesu shid: da" jang" mo doem dei to'' lo da" yoem: khyo" wigi hau: Babtisma kham , khyoo: gi nanu" ri khyoid yu bye .
60003022	Hau: da" Aseing: gi moug: khung: khyoo: vang lo" lho: akhid" Mangso lo , yo shoid moo zhoung: jo , bye - moug: lagyoo: yi yo' moug: khung: mo aya: yoo" mo , yo' myonhoo: phung" yoeb , boo mo , tho' moo oung: doid' lo" wigi vhoeb khang" nyid bye .
60004001	Khristu gi nya: da" gung du: moo kyi" khyeug shen" yhen zi kham' bye: nghoid rigi nanu" we' Aseing: yhang: ti" kham' ca" boem wa nghoid - khasu" wim ga: ri gung du: moo kyi" khyeug kham' yu" bye: su: hang" we' yooboo yo' ci: asen: loo .
60004002	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo akhid" mo he: mougmyid' moo nanu" kangso' dei nyid wa deing shi" da" bidnyid gu: moo byu yi da" myo , no , vhoo: bo da" khyoo: - jhu , phyo' khyoo: moo abo cang loo" looza -
60004003	Mangsoo vho: da" khyoo: moo cang loo" ge' . Lai loo bye: da" ayo , moo tungbau byumyu" yi lang" koid nau da" moo" - nanu" koid lo zigi soung myang" bye - tarha" ri anau , cang khyo" - youg: shoo: go" khyo" yhid: shug shoo" zo: khyo" pyo: da" khyoo: moo cang lho: zoo: pui" shug pui" koid ziyo' aco' ajhoid da' soolhoo: no" khyoo: ri bo vang zei: khyo" kangso' dei lid lo boem bye .
60004004	Akhid" koem nanu" gi nyang: nu' yo' dage" aco' ajhoid koid zoo: pyoo: shug pyo: nyid a' khyoo: moo abo cang lo' boem loo: yoomo nanu" ri nyangnu" gi gye" mau" lho: gei sang: nyid boem bye .
60004005	Nghoid loug we' nyangnu" gi dei nyid mo , yo' shid: loo" mo , ri tarha" dang: phyed' byid: wa jen" jen" nghoid da" Mangso shid' khoin" moo nyangnu" da" kangso' dei da" zhayen" ri toin" shed' ca" boem wa nghoid .
60004006	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nyangnu" da" gung du: moo dei nyid ri byu yi gootu: ri yhang: ti" - dang: phyed' zi shau" lho: shid: byug bye: mo , ri we' ngei bu: lu dang: ri kho" kyoo" bye . hau" ngei bu: lu dang: ri kho" kyo" da" khyoo: gi nyangnu" da" venyi khyo" kangso' dei jang" moo Mangsoo gi dei nyid ti" - nyangnu" dei nyid wa shid re" nghoid .
60004007	Ziyoo jo , moo jo , thang loo" wa ayo , ju" bye: yoomo nanu" gi akyu" mho' wa shid re" nyang: nya: da" nheigloem: ri zed" lhed' lho: nheig boo ung: gyeung" nyid loo: ge' .
60004008	Je" wigi nyang: cang" nyang: - gyeung" da" jheddab myid' yo' jheddab go" nyid ge , khasu" wim ga: ri jheddab da" nheigloem: gi yooboo myoo" sho' ri yo" nghoeb , pyam byid .
60004009	Nanu" gi nheig yoo: nheig jhug akoid loo: za: nyang: cang" nyang: - being" did' go" nyid ge' .
60004010	Dangain" bang: gi venyi jhung: shug dayug daja: yo" kham: yu bang: za: nghoid nyid . Nanu" gi Mangso da" mainkaid jhung: shug aja: ja: ri zoem: ci: se' da" zi jung su: yhang: ti" - nyang: nya: shau' kham: yu bye: da" { jeju" ri byu gooje akyu shid' re" we' bo ci: yhoung nyid ge' .
60004011	Kho" kyo" nyid su: hang" we' Mangso da" mungdang: ri kho" kyo" nyid ca" - sube" dei zoo: koid nyid su: gi Mangsoo byid: to" da" yoem: so' yo' dakhyoo" ti" - deizoo: koid nyid ge' - houg: su" nghoid lang" she' zei: so' da" moo" zoo' dangain" jang" moo Aseing Yesu Khristu khyo" wigi phoo Mangsoo ge' wi coung" nghei tu: to' kaid' zi shau" wa nghoid . Yesu Khristu moo myonhoo: phung yoeb , bug thu' sheing" jhu" khyoo: gi pyaid didu moo dabo jo , baja" o" - Amen .
60004012	Ngoo jheddab da" byen , cang" yi we" - gye" no , khyo" ca: yu" da" noo shau" nyid uri khanham we' abue" yu" shi" da" gooki" lid' zi daja: bue" loo bye: ein: amau" nyid goo .
60004013	Mau" nyid wa shid' re" gi Khristu kham: yu bye: da" kyi" khyeug shen" yhen da" khyoo: ri Yesu yo' dage" bo shau" kham' zoo: yoomo gau , yi ngei pyo: nyid ge' - houg: su" nghoid lang" she' Yesu gi myonhoo: yoeb , bang zeing yo' doem ju" gyoo" lo da' bidnyid moo nanu" gye" gau yi zi shau" boem wa nghoid .
60004014	Nanu" gi Khristu da" thang: cang mo , bui' yoomo gei sang: shang pyang: zi shau" da" uri ngi lho , boem bye . Khasu" wim ga: ri houg: yhang: ti" thoung" shau" nyid da" uri Mangso venyi ein: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , yo' joeb byeung" da" venyi gi nanu' da" atho' moo ju" nyid bye: yoomo nghoid .
60004015	Nanu" mo hang" nghoid loug we' byu dayug yug shen" yhen shau" nyid zigi hau: yug gi byu said' khyoo: - khau" da" khyoo: tarha" ri shoid yoomo houg: su anghoid lang gi sube" da" moozoo" moo bo lhu: phyo' yoomo dam kaid' dang: phyed' zi kham' zoo: mo , abui" goo .
60004016	Nghoid loug we'-Khristain byu dayug nghoid yoomo shen" yhen zi shau" nyid nghoid rigi ce: sho' cang aboo . Khristu da" myeing voin , su: yo" bui' yoomo Mangsoo ri jeju" boin: nyid ge' .
60004017	Tarha" dang: phyed' da" bidnyid gi ju" shed" lo nyid bye - Mangso da" yhoem: khau: byu yi ri xang: shed" tarha" dang: phyed' zi shau" wa nghoid wigi gyeing" nyang: ngoonu" gi xang: shed" tarha" dang: phyed' zi shau" boem nghoid rigi Mangso ngei bu: lu dang: ri aloem" ajeung" mo , gi khate' zi je" thoung" shau" boem wa lha" .
60004018	Jhoem: mungdang: moo tid to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Mangsoo abo da" yooboo dab , da" byu yi tho' moo gi khasu" bue" loo wa lha" .
60004019	Hougsu" nghoid nyid yoomo Mangsoo byid: to" ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - sho" jhen: jam jau shau" mo , gi ge da" moo" ri zei: lho: nya: dang: thang" cab , ri zei pyeing byid: su: da" lo , moo nyangnu" da" kangso' ri ab , pyam ca .
60005001	Ngoo gi phung ludaid' dayug khyo" nanu" mo phung ludaid' yi ri mho' tung" pain: kaid . Ngoo gi Khristu kham' zo: da" kyi" khyeug khyoo: ri bo myang se' da" sag si: dayug khyo" thang: phyang" toin" shid' byid: loo wa da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri-bo shau" kham: yu wa su: nghoid nanu" gi nanu" nyang: riab , byid: too" bye: da" .
60005002	Mangso da" yang phung: ri Mangsoo nanu" ri koid nhang: nau ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - yu" coung goin , zung" lhug nyid ge , anoug akhyoid' khyo" akoid loo: za: nu" nham , vho: ngei da" myid' yo' koid nyi ge' - La , ga , nyho , khyo" anghoid loo: za: zhoo: gyi: zei: nau , khyo" gau yi ngei pyo: ziyo' zei: so' vhoin , wu , nyid ge' .
60005003	Nanu" ri ab , byid: to" da" phung: ri seing: zoo: nau myid' khyo" akoid goo" - hau: yang phung: yi da" shid' khoin" moo yu" yu ge , da" khoo" shid: ri toin" shid' nyid ge' .
60005004	Yang lhug zoug: moo" thu' myhang lo da' bidnyid moo nanu" gi myonhoo: phung: yoeb , bug thu' sheing" jhu" ziyo' khanham we' ashoem: apyang: lo: da" bidmug ri shau" yu boem wa zi nghoid .
60005005	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" zoolu: zoomyi: yi we' ludaid' yi da" dang: ri tam" gyo: nyid ge' . nyang: cang" nyang: zoem" khau: da" khyoo: moo nanu" dangain" mo , gi khyo , nyhoem: ein: da" khin' ri void , ci: lho: dayoug da" dei zoo: dayug koid nyid ge' . Khasu" wim ga: ri jhoem: mungdang: moo Mangsoo gi nghoid boin: mo , ri doin: khyo' pyam lho: nheigloem: nyhoem: mo , ri jeju" byid: nyid ga: lhid" to" .
60005006	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo phoo Mangsoo gi nya: ge , da" ayo , ju" lang" nanu" ri yo" tu: to' kaid' wa shid re" nya: yoem: moo" bo da" lo , yoem: bid shoem: khoug: moo khyo , nyhoem: lho: nyid ge' .
60005007	Mangsoo gi nanu" ri jheddab goin , coung: nyid yoomo nanu" da" myid' myoo: ung: loug khyoo: dangain" ri nyang: ri ab , pyam byid: ge' .
60005008	Gyeung: boin: da" byugyeing" koid nyi ge' . zed" lhid' lho: nyid ge' . nanu" da" gyivoo nghoid yu satan gi kha: yug ri myhau: pyam' wa la" » ga: myeung dang: yen" da" khang khyi yo' du nyid .
60005009	Nanu" koem gi loem" jeung" da" khyoo: moo geung: teung jo , lho: nyang: ri lhoem: zain: ge' . Khasu" wim ga: ri nanu" nyang: si' bye: ziyo' dakhyoo: ti" - mougmyid' gyab , goin" jang" moo nyid da" nanu" da" loem" jeung" mang nhung" yi gi hid: yhang: te" da" shen" yhen kyi" khyeug khyoo: ri thoung" shau" nyid boem .
60005010	Nghoid loug we' nanu" gi daso' za: shen" yhen ziri thoung" shau" thang: ri Khristu yo' dage" apyaid' ato: myonhoo: phung" yoeb , ri shau" kham: yu wa shid re" nanu" ri khe: yu da" jeju" dangain" Aseing: Mangsoo nyang: nanu" ri joeb , byeung" mo , bui" nhang: lho: wigi geung: teung khyoo: yoem: zeing so' moo" yo' loem , ge" da" apoem: ayang: qei" byid: wa nghoid .
60005011	Nya: jang" moo apyaid' atoo: - myonhoo: phung" yoeb , bug thu' seing" jhu" jo , baja" o" Amen .
60005012	Ngoo gi he: da" mougsoug" lhid" zoore" - Sila bo pang" byid: khyo" he: mougsoug" ri nanu" jhang khyoo: lhid" foin: kaid' sila gikyed da" Khristain mang nhung" dayug nghoid ein: - ngoo myid loem nyid . Nanu" ri yoem: byid: da" dang: tid wa ziyo' - nanu" shau" kham' zo: da" jeju" gi Mangsoo byid: da" jeju" gyeing" nyang: nghoid da" ziri sag si: kham' wa shid re" he: da" mougsoug" ri lhid" kaid . hau: jeju" moo geung: tung yab , jo , ge' .
60005013	Mangsoo khyen: yu da" jeju' ri nanu" yo' dakhyoo" ti" shau" kham: yu da" Babelon voo mo-nanu" da" mang nhung" phung: byu yi we' nanu" ri vhu" kaid' ago" - nga" zoo: Marku we' nanu" ri vhu" kaid .
60005014	Nanu" nyang: cang" nyang: we' Khristain jheddab nheigloem: khyo" boo: bug bug go" nyid ge' - Khristu khoug: moo nyid mo , nanu" dangain" bang: da" atho' moo myen , jham" ngei pyo: nyid goo" baja" o" .
61001001	Yesu Khristu da" join yo' lagyoo: nghoid su: - Ngoo Simun Petru gi Ngoonu" da" Mangsoo yo' khyoid yu da" Asing: Yesu Khristu da" deung byeung" khyoo: moo ngoonu" yhang: ti" - phoug" dab da" loem" jeung" khyoo: yo" yu bye: bang: jhang khyoo: - dang: pyeung: kaid .
61001002	Mangsoo yo' yha" da" khyoid yu Aseing: Yesu Khristu ri nanu" se' loo bye: yoomo nanu" gi jeju" yo' ngeipyo: khyoo: ri joeb byeung" sho' shau" kham: yu goo" baja" o" .
61001003	Nya: da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb yo' ge thang khyoo: joem ri gam boem shau" yuwa shid re" nyhang" ri khyoid yu bye: da" Mangsoo ri se' lo boem bye: yoomo Mangso da" yoem so' gi-deungmain" da" noku thung" loem" jeung" khyoo: moo kangso' yo" dei: nyid wa shidre" - nyhang" moo ca" nyid da" khyoo: bain , sho' ri byid: to" bye .
61001004	He: khyoo: yoomo gye" gyi: sheung: wigi phoug" dab da" jeju" jhung: shug yo' sen: lho: wigi-dang: soo" khoin" joem nyhang" ri byid: too" bye . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo he: da" jeju" joem khoug: moo-ngoonu" gi moug myed tho' moo lhu: phyo' lhu: shoin' se' da" vhoo: boo loug gyi: khyoo: mo loid byoin lo" lho: Mangso aved' ri yo" wang zhoug" yu goo" baja" .
61001005	Khyoo: he: khaid nyang: yoomo nanu" da" loem" jeung" khyoo: moo ge lho' da" khyoo: - se' zi dalung: kaid nyid ge' .
61001006	Se , jang" moo nyang nya: da" gungdu: ri yo" khang" zi nyang: nya: da" gungdu: ri yo" khang" tho' moo kham' zeung: zi kham' zeung: khyoo: moo tarha" ri phau" cang zi .
61001007	Tarha" phau" cang jang" moo mang: nhung" ri jheddab zi mang: nhung" ri jheddab tho' moo" - athang agoin zi dakaid loung: nyid ge' .
61001008	He gu: gi nanu" moo aboo age da" yoem: so' joem nghoid . He: gu: gi nanu" moo athang agoin dabo jo , nghoid rigi ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu ri nanu" se' lo ziyo' kangso' dei da" khyoo: moo zhang" zhang" yang yang nghoid wigi akyu" bo thu' loo nhang: wa zi nghoid .
61001009	Nghoid loug we' hau: yoem: so' ri ayo" yu bang: hang" nghoid loug we' vi: vi ayo" myang se' da" myo , amyang su: nghoid yoomo nyang: zei: lid loo bye: da" yougnoo yooboo mo wigi cid" khyoid' cid" shang: pyam shau" bye: ziri to" myhed' pyam su: nghoid .
61001010	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nga" mang: nhung" yi we' nanu" ri Mangso wigi khe: yu ziyo' khyen: yu bye: ein: da" khyoo: ri khanham we' shau" myed kham , zo: nyid wa shid re" je" ri yoem: kaid nyid ge' . hougsu" koid nyid boem nghoid rigi nanu" da" loem jeung" khyoo: ri khanham we she: pyam' boem wa zi anghoid .
61001011	Khyoo: he: khaid khyo" cang lo" boem nghoid rigi ngoonu" da" Aseing: yo' khyoid khyi: yu su: - Yesu Khristu da" athang agoin da" mungdain: khyoo: - yo" vang loo" wa da" akhang" - nanu" ri joeb joeb byeung" byeung" byid: wa zi nghoid .
61001012	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi-he: da" khyoo: joem ri se' gyo: ci: lho" wigi nanu" kham: yu ci: da" hau: deungmain" da" khyoo: moo geung: geung: teung teung ayang: qei" to" abye: go . Nghoid sho' loug we' ngoo gi nanu" ri khanham we da tid poin" nyid noug shi .
61001013	He: da: kangso' dei nyid shi" ayo' bidnyid gu: moo hau: khyoo: yo' sen: lho: wigi nanu" ri lhid' zid" wa shid' mo tidpoin" wa khyoo: gi ngoo zei eung: da" moo" nghoid ein: ngoo myed yu" nyid .
61001014	Ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu - ngoori bang" bang nyang: - tid poin" too" bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - he: da" shid: se' gungshoo" ri khamyhang amyang" ri khyoid' she: pyam wam , bye: ziri ngoo se' nyid bye .
61001015	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoo shid: byug thang: ri he: da" khyoo: joem ri nanu" khanham we' daboin: so" nyid wa shid re" ngoo yoem: so' thang" sho' yoem: kaid wa zi nghoid .
61001016	Ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu da" yoem: moo" phung" yoeb yo' ju" re" da" khyoo: nanu" ri si' nhang: wa da" shid re" ngoonu" gi byu yi koid: zheung" koid to" da" moomyed: ri ayang: koid khyoo: akoid boem loo . Ngoonu" nya: myu , jid" yo' nyang: - nya: da" gyi: sheung reung: da" khyoo: ri nyang: - shau" myang boem bye .
61001017	Nyang: ri phoo Mangsoo mo nyang - myonhoo: ngalang" phung" yoeb byid: da" uri we' je" gyi: thang da" phung" yoeb khoug: mo wigi nya: jang" moo ju" re" da" thui: gi He" yug gi ngoo vho" ngei da" ngoo jheddab da" nga" zoo: nghoid , ga: wigi tid uri we' ngoonu" houg moo nyang: yo' dage" nyid .
61001018	Hau: ayo' moo nyang: - ngoonu" gi hau: Aseing: yo' gyeungshang: da" boem tho' moo nyid nyid uri moug: khyo" myeung thu' lo da" thui: ri ngoonu" shug gyo: boem .
61001019	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" gi lapi: yi tid fu" to" da" yoeb , myang mungdang: ri je" wigi nheug shid nheug deug nyid boem bye . Nanu" we' hau: mungdang: ri goo" lhoo: za: datam: gyo: nyid ge" . Khasu wim gari hau: zigi nanu" da" nheugloem: ung: khoug: moo myo , myang: lo wigi-boo" myhu: thu' lo da" ayo' moo moug: coid' da" joyoo moo bang nyid da" myibung: yhang: ti" nghoid nyid .
61001020	Hang" nghoid sho' loug we" - nyang: tu: nyang: myed vho: khyo" jhoem: mungdang: mo lapi: dang: khoin" da: dang kang: ayo" koid: yu ziri dangain" da" shid moo xoem" too" ca" nyid .
61001021	Khasu wim gari kha: da" lapi: dang we' byu yi da" myedsoin' nyeung khyoo: bue" thu' lo yu" zi anghoid . Gyeungshang: da" Venyi wigi nheugloem: lhu: too' byid: zi shau" bang: gi Mangso jhag mo ju" re" da" lapi: dang: ri thoid' tid kyo" ago" .
61002001	Lai: lo" bye: da" ayo' moo byu yi jang" moo mhau' da" lapi: yi thu' lo boem ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" jang" moo we' mhau' da" sara yi thu' loo boem nghoid . Nyangnu" gi lhu: phyo' lhu: shoin , khyoo: adeung amain" jhau" mho' da" khyoo: joem ri shu" vang lo wigi nyang: tu: nyang: ri khyien: yu bye: da" Aseing: ri ngeug pyam boem wa zi nghoid . Hougsu" koid yoomo nyangnu" gi nyangnu" da" atho' moo byo , yoin" lo" khyoo: gi myab myab , ju" loo nhang: boem wa zi nghoid .
61002002	Hougsu" danghoid sho' loug we' byu myoo" sho' bang: gi nyangnu" da" age aved asam" khyoo: moo bo cang lo" boem wa zi nghoid . Nyangnu" houg: su" koid boem yoomo hau: deungmain" da" akhyoo" ri byu gooji bang: gi age khyoo" gei sang: juang" yi pyam boem wa nghoid .
61002003	He: da" mhau' sara yi gi-nyangnu" da" vhooo: boo myo , no' da" nheugloem: yo' nyheung phain" yu da" mhoo: myed: joem ri tid kyo" zoore"-amyaid sho: lo boem wa nghoid . Goonham , mo wigi nyangnu" ri dang: phyed' said pyam wa da" tarha" agyi phoo gi jen" nyid gu: nghoid ziyo' nyangnu" ri lhu: phyo' lhu: shoin' pyam wa sugi - yhoeb' nau lho: yhoeb , nghui" nghue" nyid zi anghoid .
61002004	Mangsoo gi yooboo koid da" moug: lagyoo: yi ri lang" gi khyam" sa: abyid: loo: za: ngarai khyoo: khyo' pyam lho: wigi hau: joyoo mo moug: coid khoug: moo myeug" tei" to" wigi tarha" dang: phyed' wa da" bidnyid ri dalang" nyid nhang .
61002005	Mangsoo gi shid phyang" mo da" moug: myed byu xangsu yi ri we'-khyamsa: abyid: loo: za: tarha" aphau" cang da" moug: myed byu xangsu: yi da" moug: myed ri tigyid shi , pyam bye . deung byeung" khyoo: ri tid kyoo" su: - Noa yo" gootu: byu nyhed yug ri za nyang: khyoid yu bye .
61002006	Mangsoo gi Sodom yo' gomora , eig voo ri we' myi: nghe' shoin pyam wigi tarha" anau cang bang: moo khasu" bue" loo: wa da" akhyoo" again daloem: ri toin" shid' too" bye .
61002007	Nyang: gi tarha" aci: aved asam" byo , yoin" nyid da" byu yi yoomo nheugloem: gye" byo , yoin" nyid bye da" byu ri za: nyang: khyoid yu bye .
61002008	Hau: deungbyeung" da" byu gi nyangnu" da" akhoug: moo nyid nyid shi" uri nyid" khang" moo" nyangnu" nya: da" akhyeung" ashoeb da" moozoo" ri-bo myang bo shau" gyo: nyid yoomo nheugloem: moo atho tid loo sho' jamjau jamkhi" shau" nyid .
61002009	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo Mangsoo gi-tarha" phau" cang nyid bang: ri-nyangnu" thoung" shau" nyid da" jham" cau" da" akoug: mo wigi-khakhyo" khyoid yu wa ziyo'-akhyeung" ashoeb bang: ri tarha" dang: phyed' da" bidnyid ju" sho' khakhyo" wigi shen" yhen wa khyoo: ri we' nyang: se' nyid .
61002010	Je" wigi gungsho" da" aco' ajhoid - nyam , da" khyoo: mo: zheung: cang nyid boem wigi Mangso da" amyeung" akhang" ri aphoug" akhyoid koid nyid bang: gi houg: yhang: te" khyoo: deung" deung shug wa zi nghoid . He: da" mhau' sara yi gi gye" ngi thu' boem wigi-nghoid boin: boem ziyo' tho' phung" yoeb boo bang: ri phau" myang: khyoo: atoin" loo: za: nyangnu" ri juang" yi geisang: boem da .
61002011	He: da" mhau' yen" sara yi tho' moo-yoem: je bo da" moug khung: lagyoo: yi lang" Aseing: da" shid moo nyangnu" ri rue" juang" yi ziyo' yooboo foin: khyoo: akoid yu" .
61002012	Nghoid loug we' he: da" byu yi gi kuang myheug yu lho:-said' pyam wa shid re" nyid yen" da" goug: nyhoug lam: joem yhang: ti" - nyangnu" lang" ase' da" khyoo: ri ung: khoug: nheugloem: yo' juang" yi rue" nyid moo" zei: ago" . Nyangnu" gi kyang: da" goug: nyhoug lam" joem ri yhang: ti" - lhu: phyo' lhu: shoin' pyam zi shau" boem wa nghoid .
61002013	Nyangnu" gi soobi" ri thoung" shau" nhang: da" kyi" khyeug sho" jhen: khyoo: gi nyangnu" nyang: moo we' latoo: doem phug zi shau" zo: boem wa nghoid . Nyangnu" gi bidnyid" dang: gung rilang" nyangnu" da" gungshoo" nheugloem: yoo: pei" wa shid re"-nyangnu" nheug shid: jang: koid ago" Nyangnu" yo' dage" zo ; shug mo , phung: moo dage" yhe: vang boo yoomo nyangnu shid re" asho' ashid: ziyo' myonhoo: ngilang: gyoeb khyoo: bue" nhang: nyid . Nyangnu" gi khanham fain" vo , khyoo: moo gye" pyoo: thui: gyo: boem .
61002014	Nyangnu" gi gootu: ce" ja: riwe' - ayu" noug nghoid ago" . Akyang" byo , ci: da" myiyi: yi riza: - date: yu" nau ago" . Nyangnu" yooboo koid lho: yo" shau" kham: yu da" myo' no , khyoo: gi atho' thang nghoid ago" . Nyangnu" gi loem khau: khyoo: moo yoem: nu: bang: ri nyangnu" da" lhid' moo myhi" sho' yo" mhe' yu ago" . Nyangnu" da" nheugloem: e" myid joem ri aco' ajhoid khyoo: moo vhoo: boo myono loo wa shid re: - zei: zhang: nhang: nyid boem . Nyangnu" ri gi Mangso tarha" dang: phyed' nheung" khoin" zang" nyid boem abye: go" .
61002015	Nyangnu" gi dain: da" khyoo" ri too" pyam' lho: khyoo: vhang" lo" boem abye: . Nyangnu" gi Beora da" nya: zoo: Balam cang da" khyoo: moo cang lo" byug boem abye: go" . Balam gi adeung amain" da" moo" zei: lho: yo" da" ngei ri myo , no , su: nghoid nyid
61002016	Nyang: gi nyang: zei: da" yooboo yoomo yooboo foin: zi shug bye . Nya: da" loozei: gi byu thui: khyo" dang: tid lo wigi Lapi: pho , da" ko" agyeung" moo" ri no: pyam' nhang: bye .
61002017	He: da" byu gi kyoug kain" byug bye: gyid bug yo" we' ug lid wigi houg tang" yen" da" jhoem: moug" yo" we' du nyid boem . Mangsoo gi nyangnu" shid' re" moug: coid' no , thang da" jang" moo joyoo daloem: nyheung too" byid: bye .
61002018	Nyangnu" gi shoid vang: khyoo: dam: dam: lo" byu phung: khoug: mo aseig shi" daloid thu' loo bang: ri ce: akyu" abo da" nghoid boin: dang: tid lho gungshoo" aco' ajhoid da" nheig" loem: yo' lhoem: tau , yu lho: khyoo shu" vhang: lo" boem .
61002019	Nyangnu" gi nyangnu" nyang byo yoin" lo" da" aved' asam: yi da" join zheung nghoid wigi gootu: byu yi ri lhoid' pyoin' kaid wa dang: soo" byid: boem ago" . Khasu" wim ga: ri nyang nyang ri-ung: sho' vhoeb , khang" pyam da" ziyoo join yi: nghoid nyid .
61002020	Byu yi gi ngoonu" da" khyoid yu Aseing Yesu Khristu ri se' wigi moug: myed mo aco' ajhoid da" yoem: vhoo" khoug: mo loid lo" thang: ri hau: aco' ajhoid khyo: wigi doem oung: pyam zi shau" nghoid rigi Houg: bang: da thang: mo bue" lo akhyoo" gi-xang: she" tho' moo je" yau: loo" wa bye .
61002021	Deung byeung" khyoo: ri bain se' yu lho: nyangnu" ri ab byid: too" bye - hau: gyeungshang: da" amyeung" mungdang: mo ve: gang: loo" wa tho' moo hau: khyoo: ri dajhi' we' asi loo: nyid rigi je ge nyid .
61002022	Lakhuid" gi nyang: doug boem to" zi doem geug zo: - Hau: lho: vu , gi bain cid" byid: thang: ri thoem" boeb , moo doem lhu" nyid . ga: da" dang: zhoem gi nanu" shid re" deung" nyid zi nghoid .
61003001	Nga" da" jheddab byen cang" yi we" - he: zigi ngoo nanu" jhang khyoo: eig lheung: ein: lhid" kaid da" moug soug" nghoid . He: da" mougsoug" eig pug moo nanu" da" yung" lho' nheug loem: yo' se' gyoo: wa shid re" vhoo: moo lhid" to" da" khyoo: yi yo' tid poin" tid kyeung" kaid .
61003002	Gyeungshang: da" lapi: yi shid phyang" tid kyo" to" dang: ri we'-nanu" lagyoo: yi da" lo , khyo" wigi khyoid yu da" Aseing: tid to" amyeung" dang: joem ri we' ngoo nanu" ri doem myed boin: nhang: nau nyid .
61003003	Hau: da" lo" thang bidnyid joem moo gi nyang: tu: nya: gungshoo" aco' ajhoid da" nheugloem: vho: khyo" cang wigi kangso' dei bang: thu' loo wa ziri dangain" da" shid moo se' too" ge' . Nyangnu" gi nanu" ri juang" yi zoore" - Hau: Aseing: doem ju" ri" wa ga: dangsoo" khoin" byid: to" anghoid goo" la" . akhid" nyang: khayoo: lo" lha" .
61003004	Ngoonu" da" phoug" pho , gi shid: lid lo" boem bye . Nghoid loug we' dangain" gi moug: myed ri phain" da" bidnyid mo dakhyoo" ti" da nghoid nyid shi" nhung: lha" » ga: wigi myed: lo boem wa nghoid .
61003005	Mangsoo gi-zang: shid" mo wigi moug: khung: mougdi yo' moug: myed yoosoo" ri nya: amyeung" yo' phain" too" bye: ziri we-moug myed , ri gyid khoug: mo wigi gyid yo' khu" thu' yu too" bye: ziri we' .
61003006	Hau: lho: moug: myed xoung ri gyid' yo" nyang: tigyid shi , lhu: phyo' shoin' pyam bye: ziriwe' - nyangnu" gi pya shi: koid to" myhed' pyam boem ago" .
61003007	Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo gi akhid" jo , da" moug: khung: mougdi yo' Moug: myed yoosoo" ri myi: yo' phyo' soin' pyam wa shid re-goo" nham , da" mungdang: yo' nyang: dakhu: shoung: to . Nyangnu" gi Mangsoo: ayo" da" byu yi ri - tarha" ang: phyed' lho: phyo' soin' pyam wa bidnyid ju" sho' dakhu: myhu: too" shi .
61003008	Nghoid loug we" jheddab da" byen , cang" yi we' khyoo: dakhaid ri ato" myhed' pyam goo" - Aseing: shid khoin" moo bidnyid danyid" yo'-zain ved' dakhyeung" gi ci: ashai" nghoid da . Nya: shid' khoin" moo hau: eig loem: gi dakhyoo" ti" nghoid nyid .
61003009	Byu dayham: bang: myed ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Mangsoo gi nyang: dang: soo" khoin" byid: too": bye: ziri cang" zei: pyeung wa shid re" ayo' ri lang" lho: nhe" nyid zi anghoid . Nghoid sho' loug we' byu xangsu: dangain" mo , youg: noo yooboo mo lheung: lo wigi hang" we' byo , yoin" lo" zi ashaoug" baja" ga: nyang: vho: nyid yoomo nyang: nanu" tho' moo gyi: sheung: da" nheug loem: toin: shed ; nyid .
61003010	Hau: Aseing: da: bidnyid koem gi-khoug" su: re" yhang: ti: ju" ri wa zi nghoid . Hau: bidnyid moo moug: khung: mougdi gi-gye" gyi: myeung da" thui: zeung yo' bei: loo" byug wa zi nghoid . Moug: khung: mo bidbang gung ; joem we' myi: nge" kyu" gyo" pyam' boem wa zi nghoid . Moug: myed yoosoo" yo' jo , moo jo , joem we' bei: lo" byug khare" boem wa zi nghoid .
61003011	Zi yoo jo , mo: jo , hid: khyo" wigi phyo' shoin' pyam zi dashug" wa nghoid rigi nanu" gi khayhang: te" da" byu yi bui" ca" nyid boem lha" . nanu" da" kangso' dei da" khyoo: gi gyeungshang: wigi Mangsoo moo xoin" to' pyam' da" kangso' dei khyoo: nghoid ca" nyid boem bye .
61003012	Nanu" gi Mangso da" bidnyid zeing ri dalang" nyid boem da"-khyoo: moo phyed' ju" loo: baja" - gethang khyo" yoem: kaid thoug shang" zoore" dalang" nyid ge' . Hau: bidnyid moo moug: khung: mougdi joem gi nge" kyu" wigi byo , yoin" pyam wa . Moug khung: mo , bidbang gungdu: joem we' soung ngi" yoo mo . yau , yu: loo" wa zi nghoid .
61003013	Nghoid loug we' Ngoonu" gi Mangsoo dangsoo" khoin" byid: too" bye deung byeung" bang: nyid wa yhoem: ein: da - moug: khung: aseig - myed jang: aseig ri ngoonu" nheig byu dalang" nyid boem .
61003014	Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nga" byen , cang" yi we' nanu" hau: bidnyid ri lang" nyid da: ayo , moo Mangso shid moo nanu" da" nheigloem: yung" lho' lho: wigi yooboo adab boem baja" - nyang: moo ngei pyo: myenjham" nyid boem wa shid re" yoem: goin' sho' shakoid yoem: kaid nyid ge' .
61003015	Ngoonu" jheddab da" mangnhung" Polu we' Mangsoo byid: ga" phajhi" juyhi: yo' dakhyo": ti" - nanu" jhang da' khyoo: mougsoug" lhid" kaid ziyo' dakhyoo: ti" - yha" Mangsoo kham , zeung: lho: lang" nyid khyoo: gi nanu" khyoid yu zi shau" wa shid re" akhang" byid: ziri myang se' nyid ge' .
61003016	Polu gi he: khyoo: yo' sen: lho: nyang: lhid" da" mougsoug" jhoem moo houg yo' dakhyoo" ti" lhid" shed nyid . Nya: mougsoug" moo bo da" akhyoo" dayham" gi-se' gyoo: wa zi youg ; yoo mo akoo" afang: bang: yo' nheig loem: khyeing" khyang: avim bang: gi shoid' vang ago" khyo" dangkang: phoid: yu ago" . Gootu: da" Jhoem: mungdang: ri we' hougsu" shoid yoomo nyangnu" da" byo , yoin ‹ lo" khyoo: ri nyangnu" nyang: koid yu boem ago" .
61003017	Nghoid loug we' byen cang" yi we" - nanu" gi he: da" khyoo: ri se' nyid gu nghoid abye: go" . Hougsu" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi-ce: tarha" abo da" bang: shoid vhang: lo" da" khyoo: moo shu" vhang: lo" jang" moo abo loo" wa ziyo' gau: ngu: da" kang so' dei khyoo: mo abyid: gyoo" loo" wa shid re"-zed" nyid ge' .
61003018	Nanu" gi ; ngoo nu" da" khyoid yu Aseing Yesu Khristu da" jeju" yo' nyang: ri se' lo khyoo: moo je wigi gyi: xo' lho geung: teung loo goo" baja" - akhid" nghoid loug we' apyaid atoo: moo ju" sho' nghoid loug we' Yesu Khristu jang" moo myonhoo: phung" yoeb gi dajo , jo , baja" o" . A men
62001001	Xang: shid" mo nyid nyid bye: da" hau" kangso' dei da" mungdang: khyoo: ri nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoonu" lhid" kaid' boem . ngoonu" gi hau: ziri shau" gyo: yu" boem bye - myojid" yo' we' myang yu" boem bye - nghoid - ngoonu" myang yu" boem bye: yoomo ngoonu" da" lo , wigi we' shau" tain" yu boem bye .
62001002	Hau: da" kangso' gi thu' myhang lo da" uri ngoonu' hau: ziri myang yu" boem bye - houg: yoomo nanu" gi hau: khyoo: ri sagsi: kham , byid: boem bye . Nya: phoo yo' dage" nyid yu" bye - hau: apyaid ato: da" kangso' gi ngoonu" jang" moo thu' lo wigi ngoonu" gi hau" kangso' da" khyoo: nanu" ri sho' kyo" boem bye .
62001003	Ngoonu" gi nya: phoo Mangsoo yo' we' nya: zoo: Yesu Khristu yo' we' zoem" khau: nyid boem zi nghoid boem zi nghoid wigi nanu" we' ngoonu" yo' dage" shau" zoem" khau: nyid boem goo" baja" ein: - ngoonu" myang yu" gyo: yu" bye: da" khyoo: nanu" ri tid fu" kyo" zi nghoid .
62001004	Ngoonu" gi nanu" moo gau yi nheig deug: khyoo: joeb , byeung" lo boem baja" ein: - he mougsoug" ri lhid" kaid' boem zi nghoid nyid .
62001005	Mangsoo gi bidbang nghoid ziyo' nyang: moo moug: coid' ci" we' aboo . He: mungdang: ri nya: zoo: khyo" wigi ngoonu" shau" gyo: yu boem bye: yoomo nanu" ri tid fu" kyo" zi nghoid .
62001006	Ngoonu" gi nyang: yo' shau" zoem" khau: nyid bye - ga: lho: wigi moug: coid khoug: moo kangso' dadei so" yen" shi" nghoid boem rigi ngoonu" tid da" dang: moo we' ngoonu" zei nyid da" moozoo" moo we' mhoug mo , ngoonu" danghoid nyid boem shi .
62001007	Nghoid loug - nyang: gi bidbang moo nyid nyid yhang: ti" - ngoonu" we' bidbang moo kangso' dei so" yen" boem nghoid rigi ngoonu" dayug yo' dayug nyang: cang" - zoem" khau: nyid mo , nghoid boem ziyo' nya: zoo: Yesu da" suid" gi ngoonu" mo youg: noo yooboo dangain" ziri yo" cid" yung" cid" shang: pyam' byid: bye .
62001008	Ngoonu" moo yooboo ayoo" ein: tid nyid boem nghoid rigi ngoonu" nyang: nya: da" gung ri ngoonu" mhau' pyam mo , nghoid wigi deingmain" khyoo: aboo mo , ngoonu" nghoid nyid boem .
62001009	Nghoid loug we' ngoonu" da" yooboo joem ri Mangso shid moo toin" shid' yhen: yu mho' tung" pain: boem nghoid rigi nyang: gi nya: da" dangsoo" khoin" ri ci: lho: wigi deingmain" da" moo" ri zei: nyid su: nghoid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - ngoonu" da" yooboo ri khyoid pyam byid: wa ziyo' shoid vhang: peig rhue , lo" khyoo: dangain" jang" mo ced" khyoid' ced" shang: yu byid: wa zi nghoid .
62001010	Ngoonu" gi yooboo akoid loo: ein: tid boem nghoid rigi ngoonu" gi Mangsoo ri mhoug su: nghoid ein: jho: khyo" nghoid wigi nya: mungdang: we' ngoonu" moo aboo loo .
62002001	Nga" zoo: yi we" - nanu" gi yooboo akoid loo: goo" baja" ein: - he: mougsoug" ri nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoo lhid" kaid' bye . Nghoid loug we' byu dayug yug gi yooboo doem shau" koid nghoid rigi hau: pho , da" shid khoin" moo ngoonu" shid re" mho' tung" pain: byid: su: - Yesu Khristu ein: da" deing byeung" Aseing: gi ngoonu" yoo" shi" .
62002002	Aseing Yesu nyang: - ngoonu" da" gung leig xoin" nghoid nyid wigi nyang: yoomo ngoonu" da" youg: noo yooboo joem ri khyoid' khyu: pyam' byid: tho' moo gootu - byu yug khang" moo' da" yooboo ri we' khyoid pyam byid: bye .
62002003	Nyang: byid: to" da" amyeing" dang: ri ngoonu" tam" gyo: lho: cang lo" boem nghoid rigi ngoonu" gi nyang: ri si' bang: nghoid da" khyoo: ri khyag nyang: yo" se' yu boem wam: bye .
62002004	Ngoo gi nyang: ri si' bye: ga: byu dayug yug tid nyid nghoid ' loug we' nyang: tid to" da" amyeing" dang: ri atam" gyoo: acang lo" nghoid rigi hau" yug gi mhoug su: nghoid ziyo' hau: deingmain" khyoo: gi nyang: moo ci: we' aboo .
62002005	Hang" nghoid loug we' nya: amyeing" dang: ri tam" gyo: lho: cang lo nghoid rigi gyeing" nyang: nya: Mangsoo ri jheddab zi nyang: moo joeb , byeung" su: nghoid bye - He: khyoo: gi ngoonu" Mangsoo yo' kha: khyo" wigi dadeing: daloem: za: bue" loo bye: khyoo: ri khyag nyang: si' nhang: da" khyoo: nghoid bye .
62002006	Khristu zei: so' kangso' dei lo yhang: ti" - zei: so' kang: so' dei su: za: Mangsoo yo' dadeing: daloem: za: bue" wigi kangso' dei nyid su: nghoid ein: dayo" tid .
62002007	Nga" jheddab bang: we" - akhid" hid: ngoo tid kaid' da" amyeing" tarha" gi aseig anghoid loo . xang: shed" mo nanu" yo" yu too" bye: da" amyeing" tarha" xoug" nghoid . hau: da" tarha" xoug" gi nanu" shau" gyo: yu" bye: da" mungdang: nyang: nghoid bye .
62002008	Nghoid loug we' akhid" ngoo nanu" jhang khyoo: lhid" kaid' da" amyeing" tarha" gi dashoid khyo" tid shang ein: rigi aseig nghoid . Hau: tarha" aseig nghoid khyoo: deung zigi Khristu da" kangso' dei lo khyoo: moo we' nanu" thoung" shau" yu" loo bye: da" khyoo: mo we' yo" myang yu boem bye . Khasu" wim gari he: da" moug coid' gi bei: lo" byug lho: hau: deingmain" da" bidbang gi akhid" nyang: lang" doug bang jo , bye .
62002009	Hang" nghoid loug we' ngoo gi bidbang moo nyid su: nghoid ga: yhen: tid lho: wigi nya: mang: nya: no , ri anoug angei zi dakoid nyid shi" rigi akhid" ju" sho' moug: coid moo danyid nyid shi" su: nghoid nyid .
62002010	Hang" nghoid loug we' nya: mang: nya: nhung" ri se' jheddab su: gi hau: bidbang moo nyid nyid su: nghoid lho: wigi nyang: moo gi byu dayug yug ri yooboo koid nhang: wa khyoo: ci" we' aboo .
62002011	Nghoid loug we' nya: mang: nya: nhung" ri anoug angei koid nyid su: koem gi hau: moug: coid moo danyid nyid shi" su: nghoid lho: wigi nyang: gi moug coid' khoug: moo so" loo" yoomo nyang: khakhyoo: lo" nyid zi ashi , Khasu" wim gari hau: moug: coid gi nya: myojid" ri lhu: ced' pyam' byid: bye .
62002012	Nga" zoo: yi we" - Khristu yoomo nanu" da" youg: noo: yooboo ri khyoid khyu: pyam' byid: bye: zi shau" boem bye: yoomo ngoo nanu" jhang lhid" foin: kaid zi nghoid .
62002013	Pho , phi" yi we" - xang: shed" mo wigi nyid nyid bye: su: ri nanu" se' nyid boem bye: yoomo ngoo nanu" jhang khyoo: lhid" kaid . Zoolu: yi we" - hau: akhyeung" da" yu satan ri-nanu" oung: pyam bye: yoomo nanu" jhang khyoo: mougsoug" lhid" kaid' zi nghoid .
62002014	Nga" zoo: yi we" - hau: nya: phoo ri nanu" zheung: se' nyid boem bye: yoomo ngoo nanu" jhang khyoo: mougsoug" lhid" kaid . Pho , phi" yi we" - xang: shed" mo nyid nyid su: ri nanu" se' nyid bye: yoomo ngoo nanu" jhang khyoo: lhid" kaid . Zoolu: yi we" nanu" yoem: bo nyid boem yoomo Mangso mungdang: gi nanu" moo bo jo , ziyo' hau: akhyeung" da" yu satan ri oung: pyam' boem bye: yoomo ngoo nanu" jhang khyoo: lhid" kaid zi nghoid .
62002015	Moug: myid ri we' mougmyid moo jo , da" zi joem ri we' ajheddab nyid goo" - nanu" mougmyid ri jheddab nyid boem nghoid rigi nanu" da" nya: phoo ri ajheddab mo , nghoid .
62002016	Moug: myid' yo' sen: da" ziyoo jo , moo jo , - gung shoo" moo nyam , da" nheigloem: joem - byu myojid" mo myang lho: myo , no , vhoo: boo loug gyi: lo ja: - he: mougmyid byu yi da" nghoid boin: phau: khuang da" khyoo: joem yo' ngeig go" phoug tu" go" da" khyoo: khaid khang" moo" gi kha: zi we' Mangso jang" mo thu' lo zi anghoid - hau: khyoo: dangain" gi mougmyid mo thu' lo da" khyoo: joem za: danghoid nyid .
62002017	Moug: myid yo' dage" houg: mo da" xang: su: byu yi vhoo: boo myo , no , da" khyoo: ja: khang" moo" gi lid lo" byug nyid bye . Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo vho: ngei khyo" cang: koid loo" su: koem gi apyaid' atoo: moo danyid nyid .
62002018	Nga" zoo: yi we" - lo" thang bidnyid jhang loo , bye . Nanu" ritid kyoo" bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - Khristu da" gyivoo phoo ein: su: gi ju" nyid bye: nghoid yoomo akhid" lang" gi Khristu da" gyivoo myoo" sho' thu' loo: bye: zi nghoid wigi lo" thang bidnyid jhang bye: ziri ngoonu" se' nyid boem bye .
62002019	He: da" byu yi gi khanham we' ngoonu" yo' zoem" khoug: wa zi ci: asen: mo , nghoid nyid boem yoomo ngoonu" jang" mo nyangnu" thu' lo" byug ago - ngoonu" yo' zoem" khoug: wa zi sen: mo , nghoid boem rikoem gi nyangnu" gi ngoonu" yo' dage" nyid nyid boem wa zi nghoid .
