62002020	Nghoid loug we' Yesu Khristu gi nanu" da" atho' moo hau: gyeungshang: da" Venyi ri foid shoin" byid: zi shau" boem bye: wigi nanu" dangain" bang: gi hau: deingmain" khyoo: ri yo" se' yu boem bye .
62002021	Nanu" jhang khyoo: ngoo mougsoug" lhid" kaid da" khyoo: gi hau: deingmain" da" dang: ri nanu" asi yoomo anghoid - hau: deingmain" da" dang: ri we' mhau' da" dang: gi deingmain" da" dang: yo' ci: asen: nyid ziri we' nanu" se' nyid bye: yoomo lhid" kaid zi nghoid .
62002022	Yesu gi Meshia anghoid ga: wigi ngeug pyam' su: za: anghoid rigi mhoug su: ga: zigi hang" nghoid wa lha" . Hau: nya: phoo yo' nya: zoo: ringeug pyam su: nyang: - Khristu da" gyivoo nghoid nyid .
62002023	Hau: nya: zoo: ri ngeug pya , su: hang" nghoid loug we' hau: nya: phoo ri we' bo ngeug pyam su: nghoid bye . Nya: zoo: ri lhoem: kham: yu su: gi nya: phoo ri we' lhoem: kham: yu zi nghoid bye .
62002024	Nanu" gi xang: shed" mo nyang: - shaug" gyoo: bye: da" mungdang: ri nanu" da" nheig: loem: khoug: moo kaid too" loo: ge' - hau: mungdang: nanu" moo bo jo , nghoid rigi nanu" gi nya: zoo: yo' we' nya: phoo yo' daeung: daloem: za: khanham" we' bue" nyid goo" wam: bye .
62002025	He: khyoo: gi Khristu nyang: ngoonu" ri dang: soo" khoin" byid: too" khare" da" atoo: moo kang: so' ri yo" yu khyoo: nyang: nghoid bye .
62002026	Nanu" gi mhau' fain" vo khyo" wigi khyoo: shu" vhang: loo" wa ga: yoem: kaid' nyid mo da" khyoo: ri ngoo shaug" gyoo: yoomo lhid" kaid zi nghoid nyid .
62002027	Nghoid loug we' nanu" koem gi Khristu da" Venyi ri nanu" da" atho' moo foid shoin" byid: ziri shau" kham: yu boem bye: yoomo nanu" moo hau" Venyi danyid nyid gi hang" we' nanu" ri jhoug" byid: mhoo , byid: aca" loo . Khasu" wim gari nya: da" Venyi gi nanu" ri khyoo: khaid khang" moo" moo jhau" mhoo , byid: nyid bye: yoomo nyang: jhoug" byid: da" khyoo: gi deingmain" da" khyoo: nghoid bye - mhau' fain" vo khyoo: gi ci" we' aboo loo: - houg: su" nghoid yoomo nanu" gi hau: Venyi wigi jhoug" byid: bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - tam" gyo: cang lo" lho: Khirstu yo' dadeing: daloem: za: bue" nyid ge' .
62002028	Nghoid bye" - myi: yi: zoo: yi we" - nyang: thu' myhang lo da" bidnyid ri nanu" gi sho' gyoug lho: phang: gau" yen" anoo" wa shid' re" nya: shid' khoin" moo asho' agyug loo: yo" yab , jo , sho' nyang: yo' daloem: za: dakoid nyid ge' .
62002029	Khristu gi deing byeung" su: nghoid ziri nanu" se' nyid boem nghoid rigi houg: su" deing byeung" khyo' zei: so' nyid yab , yen" bang: gi Mangso da" nya: zoo: nghoid nyid ziri si' eung: nyid boem bye .
62003001	Yu" ge' Mangsoo gi ngoonu" ri khayhi' jheddab nyid lha" . Nya: da" jheddab nheigloem: gi gye" gyi: zi nghoid wigi ngoonu" ri Mangso nya: zoo: yi ga: myeing byid: bye: ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - gyeing" nyang: ngoonu" gi Mangso nya: zoo: yi nghoid boem bye - Nghoid loug we' mougmyid gi Mangsoo ri asi yoomo ngoonu" ri we' asi nghoid da .
62003002	jheddab bang: we" - ngoonu" akhid: gi Mangso nya: zoo: yi nghoid boem bye - Nghoid loug we' nyhang" thang: phyang" cibui" wa zi gi bain' sho' ase' boem shi" . Nghoid loug we' Khristu nyang: doem thu' lo da" bidnyid rigi ngoonu" gi nyang: yo' du , goo" wam: bye" - Khasu" wim gari nya: gung doem: ri nyang: ngoonu" shau" myang boem wam: bye .
62003003	Khristu moo hau: nheig byu jang: yoo" bang: gi Khristu nyang: gyeungshang: nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nyang: tu: nya: gung ri we' cid" yung" cid" shang: to" abye: go .
62003004	Yooboo koid nyid su: gi hang" nghoid loug we' tarha" ri peug phue da" moo" ri zei: nyid su: nghoid . Khasu" wim ga: ri yooboo gitarha" ri peug rhue , da" moo" nghoid nyid .
62003005	Khristu gi xang: su: byu yi da" yooboo ri ced" shang: pyam' byid: wa shid re" thu' myhang re" da" khyoo: ri nanu" se' nyid gu nghoid - nyang: moo gi ce" yooboo daja: we' aboo .
62003006	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo Khristu moo nyid bang: hang" Nghoid loug we' yooboo ri axo , koid loo: nghoid da - yooboo ri daxo , nyhen" koid loo" su: hang" nghoid loug we' Yesu ri amyang asi shi" su: nghoid .
62003007	Nga" zoo: yi we" - nanu" ri hang" wigi we' khyoo: ayo" shu" vhang: loo" goo" baja" - Khristu gi deing byeung" nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - deing byeung" da" moo" zei: bang: hang Nghoid loug we' deing byeung" nyid .
62003008	Yooboo ri za: daxo , nyhen" zei: loo" su: hang" nghoid loug we' yu satan yo' sen: su: nghoid nyid . Khasu" wim gari yu satan gi xang: shed" mo nyang: yooboo koid su: nghoid nyid . Houg: yoomo yu da" moozoo" ri phyo' shoin , pyam wa shid re" Mangso da" nya: zoo: gi po" thu' loo bye .
62003009	Mangso da" nya: zoo: bui' bye: su: gi yooboo ri axo , koid loo - Khasu" wim gari hau: yug moo gi Mangso da" alhoo: aved , bo nyid bye . Mangso nya: zoo: bui" bye: bang: gi yooboo ri axo , koid loo nghoid da .
62003010	Hau: khyoo: gi Mangso da" nya: myid: nya: zoo: yi yo' yu satan da" nya: myid: nya: zoo: yi gi gyi" sho' shai" go" da" khyoo: ri bang bang nyang: myang se' da" khyoo: nghoid . Hang" nghoid loug we' deing byeung" da" moo" ri azei: ziyo' houg: su" anghoid lang" gi - nya: mang: nya: nhung" yi ri ajheddab bang: gi Mangsoo da" nya: zoo: yi anghoid .
62003011	Xang: shed" mo nanu" shau" gyo: yu" bye: da" dang: soo" khoin" gi nanu" nyang: cang" jheddab goo" ge' . ga: da" mungdang: nyang: nghoid bye .
62003012	Ngoonu" gi Ka-in yhang: ti" age koid - nyang: gi satan yu shoid mo byu bue" lo" lho: nya: nhung" Abela ri said' pyam bye Ka-in gi Abela ri ce: noem , koid said pyam lha" . Nyang: zei: da" moozoo" gi shoid khyoo: nghoid nyid nya: nhung" zei: da" moozoo" gi jo nyid yoomo nghoid nyid .
62003013	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo mang nhung" yi we" - moug: myid byu yi gi nanu" ri anoug angei koid lo khyoo: ri amhoug" goo" .
62003014	Ngoonu" gi mang nhung" yi ri jheddab nyid bye yoomo ngoonu" gi shid: jo , jang" mo dei nyid shoid khyoo: yo" rhue , lid loo" bye: ziri ngoonu" se' boem bye nya: mang nya: nhung" ri ase' jheddab su: gi hau: shid: lo" da" yoem: so' khoug: moo danyid nyid shi" su nghoid .
62003015	Nya mang nyanhung" ri anoug angei su: hang" nghoid loug we' byu ri said pyam nyid su nghoid . Byu ri said pyam nyid su gi nyang: moo apyaid ato: kang so' ayo" yu ziri nanu" se nyid .
62003016	Khristu gi yha" da" gung leig xoin" khyo" - nya: kangso' ri xoin" to' pyam byid: bye yoomo jheddab nheigloem: gyeung" zigi cite" zi nghoid ein: ziri gi ngoonu" se' boem bye . Houg su" nghoid yoomo ngoonu" we' mang nhung" yi shid re" ngoonu" kangso' xoin" to' pyam wa zi gi ge byid bye .
62003017	Soid gain ziyoo yoo" su: nghoid nyid lho: wigi nya: da" nheig khyeug nheigloem: ri khyoo jhed' pyam byid su: gi Mangsoo ri jheddab ein: khasu" se tid wa lha" .
62003018	Nga" zoo: yi we" - ngoonu" jheddab da" khyoo gi nhoid' yhoo: khoin" thui: yo' za: anghoid - moozoo" yo' yo" toin" shid da" jheddab nheigloem: nghoid ca .
62003019	Houg: yhang: ti" he: khyo" wigi ngoonu" gi hau: deingmain" da" khyoo ri cang yhi: mo , nghoid ziri yo" se' yu boem wa zi nghoid . Mangso da" shid' khoin" moo we' nheig shid: nheig deug khyo" yo" nyid wa da" amyeing" akhang" yo" yu boem wa zi nghoid .
62003020	Ngoonu" da" phug soo" lheig se' myid yu" da" nheigloem: gi juang" yi pyam zi shau" boem wa zi nghoid rigi mangsoo gi yha" da" phug soo" lheug da" nheigloem: tho' moo je gyi: su: nghoid ziri ngoonu" se' tho' moo agoo - nyang: gi nyid moo nyid jo , moo jo , ri se' thang su: nghoid ziri ngonu" se' nyid boem .
62003021	Houg: yoomo jheddab bang: we" - ngoonu" da" phug soo" lheug da" nheig leom gi ngoonu" ri juang" yi yooboo foin: khyoo: akoid nghoid rigi ngoonu" gi Mangso shid khoin" moo asho' agyug loo: yo" vang lo" boem wa zi nghoid .
62003022	Ngoonu" gi Mangso amyeing" tarha" ri tam" gyo: lho wigi nyang vho ngei da" moozoo" ri zei: nyid boem bye: yoomo ngoonu" mho' nyid da" khyoo: dangain" ri ngoonu" yo" yu boem wa zi nghoid .
62003023	Nyang: ngoonu" ri byid: to" da" amyeing" tarha" khyoo: gi ngoonu" gi nya: zoo: Yesu Khristu ri loem" jeung" wigi Khristu gi ngoonu" ri byid: to" da" amyeing" tarha" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - nyang: cang" nyang: jheddab goo" ca" khyoo: nghoid .
62003024	Mangso amyeing" tarha" ri cang pyeing bang: hang" Nghoid loug we' Mangsoo yo' dadeing: daloem za: nghoid nyid wigi Mangsoo we' hau yug yo' dadeing: daloem za: danyid nyid . Houg: su" yo" bue" da" khyoo: gi Mangsoo nyang: byid: kaid' da" gyeungshang: Venyi yoomo ngoonu" se' nyid .
62005001	Yesu gi Meshia nghoid ga: loem" jeung" byu hang" nghoid loug we' Mangso nya: zoo: yi nghoid wigi hau: nya: phoo ri jheddab mo , hang" Nghoid loug we' nya: zoo: ri we' jheddab nyid bye .

62005015	Ngoonu" gi nyang: ri mho' yoid , da" ayo , khang" moo" moo nyang: tam" gyoo: byid: nyid . He: khyoo: gi deung zi nghoid ziri ngoonu" si' yoomo ngoonu" gi nya: jang" moo mho' da" khyoo: ri yo" yu bye: khyoo: joem ri we' se' nyid boem bye .
62005016	Re" mang: re" nhung" dayug yug gi ashid: moin: da" yooboo daja: ja: zei: nyid nghoid rigi nang shau" myang nghoid ri nang gi nya: shid re" re" Mangso jhang akyu" bo mho' nyid ca" - Mangsoo gi nyang: ri apyaid ato: kangso' byid: wa zi nghoid . hau: zigi shid: moin: da" yooboo akoid mo , shid re" za: mho' byid: wa khyoo: nghoid . 62005020	Mangso nya: zoo: gi ju" re" nyid wigi deingmain" da" Mangsoo ri yo" se' yu wa da" nheigloem: - nyang nyhang" ri byid: too" bye: ziri nyhang se' nyid . 64001010	Ngoonyang: ju" ri lang" she' nyang: zei: shoid lo" khyoo: ri tid thu' kyoo" byid: wa zi nghoid . 64001011	Nga" da" jheddab bidnoem , phoo we" - age khyoo: ri anghoid loo: za: ge da" khyoo" ri khoo" shid' yu lho: cang nyid we' ge da" moo" ri zei: su: gi Mangsoo ri amyang asi shi" su: nghoid nyid . .

64001015	Nang ngei pyo: nyid baja" ga: re" da" bidnoem seing" tain" yi gi nang ri zheung: vhu" kaid' ago" . nang we' ngoonu" da" bidnoem , seing" tain" yi ri nanyang: cang vhu" byid: we' .
65001001	Phoo , Mangsoo jheddab da" ziyo' Mangsoo khe: yu to" lho: Aseing Yesu lhoug zung" nyid mo , Mangsoo khe: yu shau" mo , dangain" bang: jhang khyoo: - Aseing Yesu da" dei zoo: yo' Yaku da" nya: no , Ngoo Yuda mo wigi-moug soug" lhid" foin: kaid' .
65001002	Nanu" gi nheig khyeig go" khyoo: myenjham" yug yo khyoo: yo' jhed goo" kang: go" khyoo: ri joeb , joeb , byeung" byeung" shau" kham: yu nyid goo" baja" o" .
65001003	Jheddab , da" bidnoem yi we" - nanu" dangain" mo , bain' loem" jeung" kham: yu ci: bye: da" khyoid yu khyoo: ri ngoo gi nanu" jhang khyoo: lhid" kaid' wa shid' re" yoem: kaid' nyid uri Mangsoo gi dalheing: dam nya: da" byumyu" yi ri bain' nyeing byid: too" bye: da" loem" jeung" khyoo: geung: teung jo , baja" ga - loem: zain: oung: myid boem wa shid re" nanu" jhang khyoo: mougsoug" myab , myab , lhid" lho: wigi yoem: byid: ca" khyoo: shau" nyid .
65001004	Khasu" wim ga: ri tarha" aci: da" byu dayham" bang: gi aboin: aso" shoid' khyo" lo vang loung" jo , boem bye - nyangnu" gi yha" phoo Mangso da" jeju" mungdang: ri nyangnu" da" akhyeung" khyoo: ri nghoeb , pyam' byid: wa shid re" ci: yhoung: zoore"-dayug kyeung" ngoonu" da" khyoid yu Aseing Yesu Khristu rigi ngeug pyam' bye . Houg: bang: kham' zoo: wa da" yoobo dam gi jhoem: mungdang: moo goo" nham , mo tid lheom: too" bye .
65001005	Mangsoo gi Israela byumyu" yi ri khyoid yu lho: Egutu meing: mo wigi shu" thu' lo thang: ri nyang: ri aloem khoug: aloem" jeung" da" bang: ri byo , yoin" joem: thang loo" nhang: ziri nanu" nyang: se' deing gu nghoid loug we'-nanu" ri hau: khyoo: ngoo deom tid poin" nau .
65001006	Nyang: nyang: yo" jo , da" amyeing" akhang" ri ci: lid' lo" lho: wigi nyang: nya: da" joyoo ri she: pyam' kho' da" moug: lagyoo: yi da" khyoo: ri we' myid' boin: yu" ge' . Mangsoo gi nya: tarha" dang: phyed' wa da" bidnyid zeing moo houg: bang: ri yoobo dam kaid' wa shid re" moug: coid' thung: khoug: moo apyaid' ato: da" joto' jangcoo" yo' datei" to .
65001007	Sodom voo yo' Gomora voo eig loem: ri we' hau: eig vo da" ayam , aqei: moo jo , da" voogung joem ri we' myid ; boin: yu" ge' . Hau: voo mo voobyu mung" byu yi koem gi akhang: tid da" moug: lagyoo: yi yhang: ti" - youg: shoo: go" lho: yug gi nyang: cang" we' aved , avhu ; da" moo" ri koid nyid boem . nyangnu" gi apyaid' atoo: dadab nyid da" mi myi: khyoem , moo-yoobo dam ri shau" kham' zo: boem khyoo: - byu dangain" mo , ri bang bang nyang: zid" lhid' nhang: kaid .
65001008	Houg: yhang: ti" - hau: byu hid: bang: we' myo , myang aja: ja: myang ziyo' nyang: nya: da" gung du: moo yooboo koid wa Mangsoo ri ci: asoin: - aphoug" agyug lo: tho' mo phung" yoeb , boo bang: ri we' rue" pyam' boem bye .
65001009	Mouglagyoo: moo" Mikhaela nyang: lang" hid: yhang: ti" akoid yu" - Moshe mang ri hang" yu eung: ga: yu zoug: moo" ri rue" da" dang: yo' yooboo foin: da" khyoo: avoem" koid' loo za: nang ri Mangso wigi gyikoid baja" ga: date: tid .
65001010	Nghoid loug we' byu hid: bang: gi nyangnu" asi ashug" gyo: yu" da" khyoo: dangain" ri rue" ziyo' yooboo foin: pyam' boem . Kyang: da" gougnyhoug joem yhang: ti" - nyangnu" nya: da" nheigloem: khoug: moo akhang: re boo gu ri te: se' gyo: da" khyoo: joem gi nyangnu" lhu: phyo' lhu: shoin' loo" nhang: da" myid' nyain , za: nghoid .
65001011	Nyang: nu" shid' re" khayhi' gyoug pho" zi nghoid lha" . nyangnu" gi Ka-in so" da: khyoo: moo cang lo" boem bye . ngei yoomo Balam shoid vhang: da" yooboo ri bo bain' shoid pyam abye: go - Ko" ra , yhang: ti" thoung" shau" yoomo byo , yoin" loo" nhang: bye .
65001012	Nyang: nu" gi sho' asi ngei yid' thu: boem lho: zoo: pyoo: shug pyo: zoorre" - nanu' da" zoem" khau , myen" xoin: zo: pui" moo aco' ajhoid' bui" nhang: bye . Nyang: nu" gi nyang: nya: da" akyu" ri te: sho: nyid mo , nghoid boem ago" . Nyang: nu" gi moug: gyid' abo da" lid wigi hau' tang" lo" da" jhoem" moug" yo' date: du nyid boem . Nyang: nu" gi ; xung" kain" thoin" moo ashi" azei: yoomo agyi: mo wigi poid' said' to" da" seig kyug gam yo' du nyid ago" .
65001013	Nyang: nu" gi gye" thain: da" panglai being: mhoid' yhang: ti" du nyid wigi nyangnu" koid da" asho , ashid: moozoo" we' panglai gyid nyoeb , yang: ti" thu' nyid . Nyang: nu" gi akhyoo" acang da" kyimeing: lam" kyi: joem yo' we' du nyid nyangnu" shid' re" Mangsoo gi apyaid' ato: joyoo daloem: ri no , athang da" moug: coid' khoug: moo nyheung too" bye .
65001014	Adam: mo xo' gyo" lo da" nyid' xeig ein: jang" mo E-nug gi hid: bang: khyoo: yo' sen: lho: goo" nham , mo lapi: pe: too" bye - hau: zigi Aseing: ginghab , loo atho' da" gyeungshang: mau: lagyo ; yi yo' doem gyoo" loo wa nghoid .
65001015	Byu yug khang" moo" ri we' Mangsoo ci: phyoug pyam da: dang: tid mo , ri we' yoobo dam kaid' wa shid re" ju" ri" wa zi nghoid .
65001016	He: da" byu phung: yi gi khanham we' kyiyang myeung zoore" - byen , cang" ri yooboo za: te: se' foin: nyid bang: nghoid - nyang: nya: da" anyhoin: athoung" akhyeing: ashoeb da" nheigloem: khyo" cang lho: te: se' koid mo , nghoid . Nyang: nya: da" khyoo: ri phau: khuang se' nyid nyang: nya: da" akyu" yo" yu wa jang" moo yen , gi byen , cang" rimhau , coung" byid: se' nyid boem .
65001017	Nhgoid sho' loug we' jheddab da" bidnoem yi we" - ngoonu" da" Aseing Yesu Khristu lagyoo: yi - shid' phyang" khasu" ga: tid too" khare" khyoo: ri myid' boin: nyid ge' .
65001018	Khasu" wim ga: ri lo" thang da" bidnyid moo nanu" ri juang" yi lho: wigi nyang: nya: vhoo: boo: myo , no , da" nheigloem: axoug" ri cang mo gyeungshang: da" Venyi ri ayo" yu mo
65001019	Houg: bang: gi phung ri byo , yoin" loo" nhang: mo nyang: nya: da" nheigloem: axoug" ri cang mo gyeungshang: da" Venyi ri ayo" yu mo nghoid nyid boem .
65001020	Nghoid loug we' bidnoem yi we" - nanu" gi nanu" nya: da" gye" yung" lho' gyeungshang: da" loem" jeung" khyoo ; moo ayang: zug jo , lho: nanu" da" kangso' dei khyoo ; ri gyi: sheung: loo nhang: ge' . Gyeungshang: da" venyi yoem: vhoo: ri nghe: khau: lho: akyu" - mho' nyid ge' .
65001021	Mangso da" jheddab khoug: moo daloung" jo , ge' - Hougsu" Aseing Yesu Khristu gi-nya: nheig khyeig shoo" myen: da" khoug: moo nanu" ri byid: wa da" apyaid' ato: kangso' ri dalang" nyid ge' .
65001022	Loem gyam khau: gyam ; nyid mo , ri nheig khyeug nheigloem: toin" shid' nyid ge' .
65001023	Dayham" ri myi: khyoem , mo xue: yu ge' . dayham" bang: rigi gyoug nheigloem: yo' nheig khyeug nheigloem: toin" shid' nyid ge' . Nghoid loug we' nyang: bang: vhoo: boo myo , no , da" moo" yo' aco' ajhoid da" byimi ri co , ngheung" nyid ge' .
65001024	Nanu" ri ajhoid leung nhang: sho' zung" lhug byid: su: yo' ce: yooboo we' aboo nhang: loo: za: gau , yi ngei pyo: ziyo' myonhoo: phung: yoeb , doug bang da" Aseung: shid' khoin" khyoo: - yo" shu" vang yi su .
65001025	Aseing Yesu Khristu moo ngoonu" ri yo" khyoid yu da" dayug kyeung" da" Mangsoo gi moug ; thu' xang: poin: mo wigi he: yam: he: pyaid yo' thang: phyang" apyaid' atoo: moo ju" sho' myonhoo: phung" yoeb , yoem: moo" so' zeing - amyeing" akhang" gi nyang: moo za: dabo jo , baja" o" - A men .
66001001	He: da" jhoem: mungdang: gi Yesu Khristu da" pang shug byid: khyoo: ri lhid" xoem" to" da" khyoo: nghoid . Mangsoo hid: su" pang shug da" khyoo: gi Ade: myang" loo: ri bue" thu' loo wa da" khyoo: nya: dei zoo: yi yo" se' toin" shid' byid: nyid . Khristu gi nya: moug: lagyoo: yi ri nhang: kaid khyo" nya: dei zoo: Yohan ri he: khyoo: se' nhang: ziyo'
66001002	Yohan ginyang: shau" myang yu khyoo: ri doem tid khyo" hid: moo bo da" khyoo: joem gi Yesu Khristu khyo" Mangsoo jang" mo pang shug da" mungdang: joem nghoid .
66001003	He: moozoo" gi bue" loo wa da" ayo , jhang loo bye: yoomo he: mougsoug" ri nghab su: gi ngi: lhoo' wa . Hau: lho: he: da" lapi: dang: ri tam" gyoo: su: yo' he: mungdang: moo lhid" too" moo too" ri cang yhe: loo" su: gi ngi lho , nyid .
66001004	Ngoo Yohan gi Asia mung" mo phung nyhed loem bang: jhang khyoo: mougsoug" lhid" kaid . Goo" nham , pyaid he: da" pyaid thang: phyang" pyaid khanham we' dangid nyid da" Venyi: nyhed youg jang" mo we'
66001005	Kyed' da" sagsi: phoo - shid: jang" mo xang: shed" doem dei to'' yu zi shau" da" mougmyid Khokham" yi ri vhoeb khang" nyid da" Yesu jang" mo nghoid loug we' jeju" yo' myenjham" khyoo: ri nanu" shau" kham: yu goo" baja" - nyang: gi nanu" ri jheddab yoomo shid kham: khyo" wigi ngoonu" da" youg: noo yooboo mo loid byoin loo" nhang: lho:
66001006	Nya: phoo Mangso da" moozoo" ri yo" voin , vu , wa shid re" ngoonu" ri khainjung aya ab , byid: da: Yesu Khristu gi moug: khathang myid khathang moo myonhoo: phung" yoeb zoug: myeing" zoug: thui: gi pyaid moo too: moo dabo jo , baja" o" - Amen .
66001007	Yu" ge' . nyang: gi jhoem: moug" zhoung: lho: doem gyoo" loo wa nghoid . Aseing: ri lham: toin wigi thoug" bang: yo' dage" Byu yi dangain" mo , gi shau" myang boem wa zi nghoid . Moug: myid tho' mo byumyu" bain sho' mo , gi nyang: yoomo ngau yed , leung lo" boem wa zi nghoid . Houg: su" bue" loo baja" o" .
66001008	Goo nham pyaid he: da" pyaid thang: phyang" apyaid moo ju" sho' danyid nyid da" athang agoin yoem: moo" bo Aseing: Mangsoo gi da tid nyid . Ngoo gi xang: shed" su: we' lo" thang mo su: we' nghoid - ga: tid nyid .
66001009	Ngoo gi Aseung: mungdain yo' Aseung: byumyu" yi kham , zo: nyid da" yaukhe" kyi" khyeug shen" yhen khyoo: ri nanu" yo' dage" bo kham , zo: nyid su: - nanu" da" mang: nhung" phoo Yohan nghoid . 66001010	Aseung: da" bidnyid ri - Venyi: moo ngoo bo lo" byug wigi ngoo gi laboo" zeing moid myheung te" da" thui: ri nga" nung thang moo tid nyid zi shau" gyo .
66001011	Hau: da" thui: gi nang yo" myang yu bye: da" khyoo: joem ri mougsoug" bug moo lhid" kaid to" lho: Ephesu voo - Samurna voo Pegamu Thuatira Sardi Philadephia yo' Ladoki voo moo zheung: nyid da" phung nyhed loem: bang: jhang khyoo: foin: kaid' we' ga: tid .
66001012	Houg: ngoori ji nyid su: ri shau" myang sho' ngoo houg: su" lheung: yu" kaid' ri sheing: myibung: nyhed loem: yo'
66001013	Hau: myibung: joem da" agung moo gi byu xang: su: yhang: te" zi dayug ri ngoo myang - hau: yug gi nya: khanheig ju" da" byisheing: ri void ci: wigi yang gang moo sheing: phyid" cu" ri cu" ci .
66001014	Nya: da" xam: gi phyu: da" yang moug" yo' gyu: yhang: ti" phyu: jo . Nya: myojid" gi myiyham: doem , yhang: ti" dab , nyid .

66001016	Nya: lo , yo lo , moo gi kyi: nyhed cab , zhoeb ci - nya: nhoid mo gi sham: soo" eig shoid tho' da" lhab , sham: thu nyid nya: da" myonhoo: gi nyid" gung bid moo" su: bang nyid .
66001017	Hau: yug ri myang lang" nya: da" khyid: yang: moo shid: su: yhang: ti" ngoo leung lo - nyang: gi nya: lo , yo lo , nga" tho' moo ki" byid: lho: Agyug - ngoo gi xang: shed" mo su: we' - lo" thang mo su: we' nghoid - ga: tid .
66001018	Ngoo gi dadei nyid su: we' nghoid - ngoo shid: bye: nghoid loug we' apyaid atoo: moo ngoo dadei nyid shid: loo" no lo" da" khyoo: yo' moo vo , mau: da" atho' moo we' vhoeb , wa amyeing" ngoo yo .
66001019	Houg: yoomo nang shau" myang bye: da" khyoo: ri we' akhid" jo , jo , gu: ri we' thang: phyang" bue" loo wa khyoo: ri we' lhid" too" we' .
66001020	Hid: nang myang da" nga" lo , yo lo , moo kyi: nyhed cab , yo' zhoung: to" da" sheing: myibung: nyhed loem: da" zau" to" dangkang: gi hid: su" nghoid . Hau: sheing: myibung: nyhed loem: we' phung nyhed loem nghoid .
66002001	Hau: Ephesu phung mo mauglagyo: jhang khyoo: - hidsu" ein: lhid" kaid we' He: da" mungdang: gi lo , yo lo , moo kyi: nyhed cab ci: lho: zhoung: to" da" sheing: myibung: nyhed loem: da" agyoo: moo so" yen" su: jang" mo mungdang: nghoid .
66002002	Nang ci koid lid loo bye: da" moozoo" ri ngoo se' - nang khayhi' yoem: kaid lho: moo" zei: nyid zi nang khayhi' yo" kham zeung: nyid ziri ngoo se' nyid . 66002003	Nang gi kham , zeung: lho xang: shed" re sho" jhen: kyi khyeug khyoo: ri gye" kham , bye - nghoid loug we' ce" yoem: ashoin: .

66002006	Nghoid loug we' Nikola da" cangzoo: yi da" aved asam" ri ngoo ngheung" nyid yhang: ti" - nang we' bo ngheing" yoomo nang ri coung" byid: cang daloem: bo ashi .
66002007	Venyi gi phung yi ri khasu" ga: tid nyid ziri nukhyab' dab , bang: gi gyo: yu goo" baja" . Oung: doid loo" bang: ri Mangso khyam: moo youg jo , da" kangso' shi" gam , mo ashi" ri zoo: wa da" akhang" ngoo byid: wa nghoid .
66002008	Samurna phung da" moug: lagyoo: jhang khyoo: - hid: su" ein: lhid" kaid we' He: da" dang: gi xang: shed' su: yo' lo" thang su: - shid: lo" lho: kangso' doem dei loo su: youg jang" mo mungdang: nghoid .
66002009	Nang thoung" shau" nyid da" sho" jhen: jamjau khyoo: ri ngoo se' nyid nang gi damyoug sho" jhen: nyid nghoid loug we' gyeing" nyang: ga: rigi nang yoo" su: di su: nghoid nyid . 66002010	Nang shau" kham , zoo: wa da" sho" jhen: jamjau shid re" agyug nyid . yu satan gi nanu" mo dayham" bang: ri thung: moo lhoung to" lho: jham" ca: yu da" sho" jhen: shen" yhen zi shau" goo" wa nghoid loug we' nheigloem: geung: zug jo , we' houg: lang" ngoo nang ri oung: lo" da" kangso' bidmug byid: wa nghoid .
66002011	Venyi gi phung yi ri khasu" ga: tid nyid zigi nukhyab' dab , mo , gi gyo: yu goo" baja" - oung: doidloo mo , gi eig lheing: shid: da" jam joug shau" loo wa zi anghoid .
66002012	Pargamu phung da" moug: lagyoo: ri hid: su" ein: lhid" we' he: da" mungdang: gi eig shoid tho' da" lhab , sham: yoo" su - jang" mo nghoid .
66002013	Nang nyid da" joyoo ri ngoo se' - hau: joyoo gi satan da" zhung: tang jo , jang: nghoid . Nga" geing: zug da" sagsi: phoo - Antipa ri hau: satan nyid jang: moo said' pyam boem uri lang" nang gi ngoori loem" jeung" khyoo: ri ashe: pyam .
66002014	Nghoid loug we' nanu" moo yooboo foin: jang: dajhi' bo - Khasu" wim gari Israela byumyu" ri soolhoo: ri teing: byid: da" zoo: noem ri zoo: wa ziyo' avoid avhu: ein: da" youg: shoo: goo" wa shid re" Bala , ri jhoug" byid: balam: da" jhoug" myeing" moo bo cang loo" bang: nanu" moo dayham" bo nyid ago" .
66002015	Houg: yo' dakhyoo" ti" - nanu" da" akhoug: moo Nikola da" cangzoo: yi jhoug" byid: da" akhyoo" moo bo cang loo" mo , we' bo nyid .
66002016	Houg: yoomo re" yooboo mo nheigloem: myab , htid loo we' nheigloem: athed' lo nghloid rigi amyang" ri ngoo re" wigi nga" da" nhoid mo , thu da" lhab , sham: yo' nyangnu" ri jab , pyam' loo: wa .
66002017	Venyi gi phung yi ri khasu" ga" tid nyid ziri nukhyab' dab , mo , gi gyo: yu goo" baja" - oung: doid loo" mo , rigi yhoem" to" da" Mana , zoo: yho' ngoo byid: lho: yug du: ngab , ri moin: moin: phyu: da" kyi: myhoo: lug daloem: loem byid: wa . 66002018	Thuatira phung da" mauglagyo: jhang khyoo: - hid: su" ein: lhid" we' . He: mungdang: gi myojid" myiyham: doem ti" dab , nyid wigi nya: khyid: gi gyid: gyeing" yhang: ti" doug bang nyid da" Mangso nya: zo: jang" mo mungdang nghoid .
66002019	Ngoo gi nang ci koid nyid ziri se' - re" da" jheddab khyoo: - loem" jeung" khyoo: we' re" da" moo" voin khyoo: yo' nheigloem: sheung: khyoo: ri ngoo se . Akhid" nang zei: nyid moo" gi xang: shed" tho mo je ge ziri ngoo se .
66002020	Nghoid loug we' nang gi nya: jhoug" myeing" khyo" nga" cangzoo: yi ri avoid avhu: koid nhang: lho: soolhoo: ri teing: byid: da" zoo: noem zo: shug da" yooboo shoid sho' khyoo: shu" vhang: nhang: su: - myiyi: myhi , Yezebela ri nyid nhang: nyid shi" yoomo , nang ri yooboo foin: jang: jo .
66002021	Nyang: ri nya: yooboo mo nheigloem: thed loo wa shid re" ngoo ayo , byid: too" bye - nghoid loug we' nyang: gi nya: avoid avhu: koid khyoo: mo nheigloem: anau htid' loo: nghoid da .
66002022	Houg: su" nghoid yoomo ngoo gi nyang: yo' dage" myi: shoid lang shoid da" moo" zei: nyid bang: ri gyi" sho' da" noodam' yo' nya: yhoeb cuang tho' moo du" pyam' too" wa nyang: yo' dage" akhyeung" da" moo" zei: lho: nheigloem: athed' loo mo , ri we' ngoo houg: su" nyang: koid loo wa .
66002023	Nya: thang: cang mo , ri we' ngoo said' pyam loo wa . 66002024	Nghoid loug we' Thuatira voo moo deung nyid shi" da" byu yi dayham" gi hid: yhang: te" akhyeung" da" jhoug" myeing" khyoo: ri abo cang mo , yo' satan da" no , thang phajhi" khyau" khyoo: nghoid ga: subi" tid da" khyoo: moo abo cang loo" loo: za: deung nyid mo , nanu" da" tho' moo gootu: yoo: lid: ngoo afoin: loo .
66002025	Nghoid loug we' nanu" gi nanu" nya: da" lo , moo" ri ngoo ju" re" jang" moo ju" sho' geing: geing: teing teing zei: ci: ge' .
66002026	Ngoo vho: da" khyoo: moo lo" thang nyid" ju" sho' beung: abyid cang nyid khyo" yo" oung: loo" mo , ri nga" pho , jang" mo ngoo yo" yu da" amyeing" akhang" yo' dakhyoo" ti" ngoo byid: wa . 66002029	Venyi gi phung yi ri khasu" ga: tid nyid ziri nukhyab' dab , mo , gi gyo: yu goo" baja" .
66003001	Sardi phung da" mauglagyo: jhang khyoo: - hid: su" ein: lhid" we' . He: da" dang: gi Mangso Venyi nyhed yug yo' kyi: nyhed cab , yoo" su: jang" mo mungdang: nghoid . Nang koid nyid da" moozoo" ri ngoo se . Nang gi kangso' dei nyid ga: fu" nyid nghoid loug we' shid: jo , su: nghoid nyid .
66003002	Re" da" moozoo" gi nga" Mangso da" shid' khoin" moo ajoeb , abyeung" shi" ziri ngoo myang . Houg: yoomo too' we' re" da" kangso' bain sho' athang shi" uri yoem: kaid' we' .
66003003	Houg: yoomo nang jhau" kham: yu bye: ziyo' shau" gyo: kham: yu bye: da" khyoo: joem ri doem myed boin: lho: houg: moo cang zei: loo" we' . Re" yooboo mo nheigloem: thed' loo we' nang alhid' nyid nghoid rigi khoug" su: yhang: ti" ngoo re" jang" moo ri" wa . Ngoo ju" ri" wa da" ayo , ri lang" nang se' wa zi anghoid .

66007009	Hau: thang: ri ngoo doem yu" kaid uri hang" we' ayo" tho' nghab lo: da" byu phung: moo" ri myang kaid - nyangnu" gi byumyu" byu kung: - azhang" cang: joeb ziyo' myeing" acang: joeb , kaid' mo , nghoid nyid boem . Nyangnu" gi byiphyu: sheing: ri void ci: boem lho: nyangnu" da" lo , moo gi zhain lun kyang: ri ci: wigi zhung: tang yo' yang nu" da" shid khoin" moo zheung: yab , jo , boem .
66007010	Nyang: nu" tid nyid boem zigi khyoid yu da" jeju" gi zhung: tang tho' moo zhoung: jo , su: ngoonu" da" Mangsoo yo' yang nu" jang" mo yo" yu zi nghoid - ga: wigi thui: moo" yo' yoid nyid boem .
66007011	Mouglagyoo: dangain" mo , gi zhung: tang ri we' Ludaid yi ri we' dei noem gougnyhoug myid: ja: ri we' lheung khab , yab , jo , lho: nyangnu" gi zhung: tang shid' moo goeb , gyo" lho: Mangsoo ri coung" pid' nyid boem zigi
66007012	Amen Ngoonu' da" Mangsoo ri apyaid atoo: moo coung" nghei tu: to' nyid boem wa" - Mangsoo gi myonhoo: phung" yoeb , phajhi" juyhi: bug thu sheing" jhu" - myonhoo: ngeilang: phoug" tab ngi shab , byid: zi nya: da" jeju" ricoung" nghei nyid boem baja" - Amen , ga: nyho: coung" nyid boem .
66007013	Ludaid yi mo dayug gi Houg: ri " byiphyu: void ci: mo , gi hang" nghoid go" lha" kha: yo thu' loo mo , nghoid go" lha" » ga: myid: .
66007014	" Aseing: we" ngoo ase' Nang dase' , ein: ngoo phoug tu" . nyang: ngoori tid zigi " Houg: bang: gi sho" jhen: jamjau shen" yhen gyoug pho" akhoug: mo loid byoin thu' loo mo , nghoid - nyangnu" da" byisheing: joem ri yang nu" da" suid" wigi moin: phyu: sho' bain ced" phyu: boem bye .
66007015	Houg: yoomo nyangnu" gi Mangso zhung: tang shid khoin" moo zheung: yab , jo , lho: nya: da" Mangsoo yhoem: moo" moo nyid" ri myen" ri coung" nghei noku nyid boem . Zhung: tang tho' moo zhoung: jo , su: we' nyangnu" yo' dage" nyid lho: nyangnu" ri yu" goin , yu" coung: nyid .
66007016	Nyangnu" gi thang: phyang" khanham we' zooyoid gyid shed ziyo' bid lhab , nge" loung zi we' shau" loo: goo" wa zi anghoid loo .
66007017	Khasu" wim garizhung: tang agung moo nyid da" yang nu" gi nyangnu" da" yang zung" su: nghoid wa wigi kang: so' gyid bug ju" sho' - shu" vhu" zung" lhug yhe: loo" wa su: nghoid . Hau: tho' mo Mangsoo gi nyangnu" da" myojid" mo ngoug byid' dangain" shang" shang soid pyam byid: wa zi nghoid - ga: tid nyid .
66008001	Houg: lang" yang nu" gi dazid' nyhed loem: ein: wa loem ri doem phang kaid lang" gi moug khung: gi ayo , dago" yi" koo - sam" zoo: tam" to .
66008002	Hau: thang: ri Mangsoo da" shid khoin" moo yab , jo da" moug: lagyoo: nyhed yug ri ngoo myang - nyangnu" rilaboo" nyhed loem: zheung: byid: to .
66008003	Hau: thang: rimau: lagyoo: gootu: dayug gi xoin" to' phoin: nam , moo sheing: yo' koid to" da" nam , pyo: shoem: nghe , ja" lang: goin: rici: lho: re" yab , kaid . Nyang: gizhung: tang shid khoin" mo sheing: yo' koid to" da' xoin" to' phoin: tho' moo Mangso byu yi dangain" mo , akyu" mho' da" dang: yo' dage" myi: nghi , xoin" to' nyid jang moo lung: byid: wa shid re" nam , pyo: ja" shoem: myoo" sho' hau: yug ri byid: to .
66008004	Myi: nghe , to" da" nam , pyo: shoem: myikhoug" gi Mangso shid khoin" moo yab , jo , su: - mauglagyo: da" lo , mo wigi Mangso byu yi da' akyu" mho' thui: yo' dage" neing" do , lo nyid .
66008005	Hau: thang: rimau: lagyoo: gi nam , pyo: shoem: nghe , ja: - sheing: lang: goin: ri yu lho: xoin" to' phoin: tho' mo myi: ri yu kaid wigi moug: myid tho': khyoo: du" sain" khyo' kaid . Houg: lang moug: goem: goem: myeung lo ziyo' lhab , myeug lo asu , bue" loo bye .
66008006	Hau: thang: rilaboo" nyhed loem: ri ci: da" moug: lagyoo: nyhed yug gi laboo" joem ri moid kaid wa shid re" soin' nyid boem bye .
66008007	Mau lagyoo: xang: shed" yug laboo" moid kaid lang gi suid" lheug da" myi: yo' leig voo ri myidjang: tho' khyoo: foid khyo kaid wigi Moug: myid soem" boem , mo daboem - seig gam , joem we' soem" boem mo daboem - yo' nyau , young" jo , da" mhain" zoo: lung: lid' we' dangain" nge" pyam' bye .
66008008	Eig yug ein: da" moug: lagyoo: gi laboo" ri doem moid kaid lang" myi: nge" nyid yhang: te" da" boem , moo" zeing ri Panglai gyid thoem" moo du" khyo' kaid . Houg: lang" panglai gyid thoem" gi soem" boem mo daboem suid" gyid thoem" bue" loo khari" bye .
66008009	Panglai khoug: mo dei noem we' soem" boem mo daboem gu: shid: khare" lho: gyid sang phoo joem we' soem" boem mo daboem gu" gi byo , yoin" loo" khari" bye .
66008010	Soem" yug ein: da" moug: lagyoo: gilaboo" ri doem moid kaid' lang" myidoem , su" doug bang nyid da" kyizeing dacab , gi gyid lang moo" joem yo' gyid bug joem soem" boem mo daboem da" atho' moo moug: khung: tho' khyo" re" byed , gyo" nhae , zeug to .
66008011	Hau: kyizeing da" myeing gi " Kho" da" khain: cid" myoono , , ga: zi nghoid . hau: gyid lang soem" boem mo daboem gi gyid khoo" bue" loo" khari" bye - hau: gyid khoo" ri shau" shug da" byu yi myoo" sho' bang: gi shid: loo" bye .
66008012	Myid: yug ein: wa da" moug: lagyoo: laboo" moid kaid lang" bid soem" boem mo daboem , - lham" moo' soem" boem mo daboem - kyi: joem yo' bo" bang yi we' soem" boem mo daboem - moug: coid bue" lo" byug yoomo nyid" soem" boem mo daboem yo' myen" soem" boem mo daboem - boo" bang ayoo" loo .
66008013	Houg: lang" ngoo doem yu" kaid ri " gyoug pho" zi gyoug pho" joem: lo" khyoo" o" , ga: Goo tu: da' moug: lagyoo: soem" yug moid kaid da" laboo" thui: joem myeung thu' loo lang" mougmyid tho' mo nyid moo nyid bang: shid re" Atho' tid da" gyoug pho" khyoo" o" , , ga: wogi - moug: laid' phyoo" moo dang: lheung: yen" da" zoin , bung: dadu: thui: moo" yo' nyho: tid yen" ziri ngoo shau" gyo .
66009001	Hau: thang: ri wim: yug ein: wa yug - moug: lagyoo: gi laboo" doem moid kaid lang" moug: khung: mo wigi myidjang: tho' khyoo: - kyi: zeing dacab , shu: gyo" jo , bye: ziri ngoo myang - Hau: kyi: ri no , athang da" dung: khuang" mo khoem" thoug" ri ab , byid: to .
66009002	Hau: kyi: gino , athang da" duang: khuang" ri phang kaid uri myi khoug" gi myikhyoem , moo" zeing mo thu lo da" myikhoug" yhang: te" da" zi hau: duang: khuang" khoug: mo neung" thu' lo nyid Hau: myikhoug" zoo" yoomo bid yo' moug: laid moug: khung: gi ceug yo' no , loo" khari" bye .

66011008	Nya: eig youg da" mang gung gi nyangnu" da" Aseing: ri baid' jen" said' pyam da" voomoo" zeing mo fu" moo" khyoo: gung moo she: lheung: to" boem wa nghoid . Hau: voomoo" zeing gi-Sodam voo anghoid lang" gi Egutu ein: da" mung dang: ved , bo nyid .

66011010	Moug: myid xang: su: byu yi gi Lapi: eig yug shid: yoomo gau , yi ngei pyo: pui" koid lho: nyang: cang" nyang: jhung: shug jhung: lang: foin: go" nyid boem wa zi nghoid . Khasu" wim gari hau: lape: eig yug gi moug: myed , xang: su: byu yi tho' moo yau: khe" jamjau gye" byid: yoomo nghoid .
66011011	Hau: soem" nyid" dakhyoug thang loo" lang"-nya: eig youg jang" moo Mangso jang" mo kangso' doem vang loo yoomo zung" za: doem to' yab jo , ago" . Hau: eig yug rimyang mo , dangain" gi gyoug nain" nyid boem ago" .
66011012	Hau: thang: ri lapi: eig yug gi " He: joyoo khyoo: do , loo ge" , , ga: moug: khung: khyo" nya: eig yug ri gyi" sho' yoid da" thui: ri shau" gyo: ago" . 66011015	Hau: thang: ri nyhed , yug ein: da" moug: lagyoo: gi nya: laboo" ri doem moid kaid' lang" moug: khung: mo thui: zeing myeung thu lo zigi mougmyid' ri vhoeb , khang" da" amyeing" gi ngoonu" da"Aseing: we' Meshia da" lo , khoug: khyoo: vang loo" bye: wigi apyaid' atoo: moo vhoeb khang" nyid wam: bye: o" - ga: tid .
66011016	Hau: uriMangso da" shid' khoin" mo zhung: tang tho' moo zhoung: jo , da" ludaid' yi eig xe: myid: youg bang: gi Mangso shid khoin" moo nyangnu" da" myonhoo: ri goeb , khyo , lho: Mangsoo ri coung" pid' zoore" tid nyid boem zigi
66011017	Akhid" pyaid moo we' thang: phyang" pyaid moo we' " Dageung: teung jo , da" yoem: moo" bo da" Aseing: Mangsoo we" - Nang gi nanya: da" zoug: myeing" ri ci: lho: davhoeb , khang" nyid yoomo ngoonu" gi re" da" jeju" ri coung" nghei nyid boem o" .

66015007	Dei noem gougnyhoug myid du: mo dadu: gi pyaid di du: moo dadei nyid da" Mangso nheig khoo" yo: da" ziyo' byeung" bo da" sheing: goem , nyhed loem: ri moug: lagyoo: yi nyhed youg bang: da" lo , moo zheung: ab , byid .
66015008	Noku yhoem: moo" gi Mangso myonhoo: phung" yoeb , yoomo myikhoug" byeung" nheung: jo . Houg: yoomo moug: lagyoo: nyhed yug zheung: ci: re" da" nooboug: joem athang thang gi hau: noku yhoem: moo" moo hang" we' ayo" vang loo .
66016001	Hau: thang: ri noku yhoem: moo" khoug: mo thui: zeing myeung thu' lo - Hau" da" thui: gi " Moug: myid tho' khyoo: Mangsoo nheig gyed" zi bo da" goem nyhed loem: ri ci: thu' yhe: lho: foid shoin" kaid ge" , , ga: moug: lagyoo: nyhed youg bang: ri tid zi ngoo shau" gyo .
66016002	Mouglagyoo: xang: shed" yug thu' yhe: lho: moug myid tho' khyoo: nya: goem , ri foid khyo' kaid . Houg: lang" akhyeung" da" gougnyhoug zeung da" myeing ri tab ci: zi shau" mo , yo' nya: khyang du soolhoo: rino" mo , moo gye" gyoug pho" da" khe" no , moug: byeing myoug lo boem .
66016003	Hau: lho: eig yug ein: da" moug: lagyoo: gi nya: da" goem , ri Panglai gyid thoem" moo" moo foid khyo' kaid - hau" gyid thoem" gi byu shid: yi da" suid" yhang: ti" bue" lo . Hau: gyid thoem" khoug: moo nyid da" dei noem , gi suid" gyid bue" lo .
66016004	Soem" yug ein: da" moug: lagyoo: gi nya: da" goem , ri gyid moo" lang joem yo' gyid bug yi da" atho' moo foid khyo' kaid . Houg: lang" gyid dangain" gi suid" gyid bue" lo .
66016005	Houg: lang" gyid ri vhoeb , khang" da" moug: lagyoo: gi nang koid da" dang: phyed khyoo: gi deing nyeung" da" khyoo: nghoid - nang gi akhid" pyaid lid loo" bye: apyaid' moo nyid nyid da" gyeungshang: su: gi nang kyeing" za: nghoid - ga: tid .
66016006	Houg: bang: gi gyeungshang: Mangso byu yi yo' nya: lapi: yi da" suid" ri foid shoin: pyam' byid: boem bye: yoomo Nang gi nyangnu" ri suid" doem shug nhang: bye - houg: gi nyangnu" kham , moin: da" dam nghoid bye: - ga: tid nyid ziri ngoo shau" gyo .
66016007	Hau: thang: ri xoin" to' phoin: mo thu lo da" thui: gi " Athang agoin yoem: moo" bo da" Aseing: Mangso - Nang dang: phyed' nyid da" khyoo: gi deingmain" da" khyoo: yo' deing nyeung" khyoo: nyang: nghoid bye" - ga: tid nyid ziri ngoo shau" gyo .
66016008	Hau: thang: ri myid: yug ein: da" moug: lagyoo: gi nya: da" goem , ri bid , da" atho' moo foid gyoin: kaid' Houg: lang" bid gi byu xang: su: yiri gye" nge" da" myiso' yo' nge" kyu" pyam' nhang: zi shau" bye .
66016009	Nyang: nu" gi thain: da" myiso' yo' ngi" yoomo hau: shid: gyoin , amyeing" byid: su: Mangsoo ri damyeung nheung" nyid aloo: go . Nghoid loug we' nyangnu" da" yooboo yoomo houg: yhi' gyeung" da" shen" yhen jamjau shau" nyid boem nghoid loug we' nheigloem: athed' lo boem ziyo' Nya: da" gyi: myhang: khyoo: ri acoung" anghei' byid: nghoid ago" .
66016010	Wim: yug ein: da" moug: lagyoo: gi nya: goem , ri akhyeung" gougnyhoug da" zhung: tang tho' moo foid shoin" kaid . Houg: lang" akhyeung" gougnyhoug zeung da" mungdain gi moug: coid' teing: no , loo" khare" lho: nya: mung" byu yi we' khe" no lo boem yoomo nyang: nya: da" yhoo: ri ngaid' zeug ci: boem bye .
66016011	Nyang: nya: da" gyi: thain: khe" no nyid moug: byeing yoomo moug: khung: mo Mangsoo ri nheung" nyid boem ago" . Nghoid loug we' nyangnu" gi nyang: nya: da" akhyeing" ashoeb da" khyoo: joem mo nheigloem: athed' lo boem , shi" nghoid ago" .
66016012	Hau: thang: ri khyug yug ein: da" moug: lagyoo: gi nya: da" goem , ri Uphraid gyid lang moo foid zei , kaid - Houg: lang" bidthu shoid mo Khokham" yi ri" wa da" khyoo: bang" loo" baja" ga: gyid moo" lang gi kyoug kain" loo" bye .
66016013	Hau: thang: ri ngoo gi poo" lheig yo' du go" da" agyeing" ashang: da" venyi soem" du: ri myang - nyangnu" gi main jung: ni , zeung da" nhoid mo we' akhyeung" gougnyhoug joem da" nhoid mo we' mhau' yen" da" lapi: yi da" nhoid mo we' zheung: thu' lo zi nghoid .
66016014	Nyangnu" gi main: yu joem da" soo" byoo , joem nghoid wigi alhoo: again joem ri yo" koid shug . Hau" venyi soem" du: gi yoem: moo" bo Mangso meing: zain: da" bidnyid' zeing mo , gyipui" khyoo: - mougmyid gyab , goin" moo nyid da" - Khokham" yi ri dage" khe: zheing" wa shid re" thu' lo" boem .
66016015	Gyo: yu" ge' . ngoo gi khoug" su: ju" re" yhang: ti" ju" ri" wa Houg: yoomo byimi avoid shoo" cen: doem: nghoid nyid ziyo' sube" da" shid khoin" moo sho' athu' wa shid re" gyeung: boin: nyid wigi nyang: nya: da" byimi , ri zung" nyid su: gi ngi: lhoo' wa zi nghoid .
66016016	Hau: thang: moo hau" venyi joem gi Khokham" yi ri Hebre myeing" khyo" Armagedon ga: da" joyoo moo khe: zheung" phoung too" bye .
66016017	Hau: thang: ri nyhed yug ein: da" moug: lagyoo: gi nya: da" goem , ri lid' moo foid tang" kaid - houg: lang" noku yhoem: moo" khoug: moo jo , da" zhung: tang mo thu' lo da" thui: moo" da thui: gi " Moozoo" bain' bye" , , ga: tid thu' lo .
66016018	Houg: lang" gi lhab , myeug zi moug: goem: goem: da" thui: joem yo' thui: moo" zeing myeung thu' lo ziyo' gyoug pho" da" myid' leig zeing we' leug thu' loo bye . Byu phain" shed" da" bidnyid mo wigi houg: yhi' gyeing" gyi: da" myid' leig zeing gi khanham we' aleug yu" shi" .
66016019	Babelon voomoo" zeing gi soem" gang go , gyam: gyo" pyam' bye - moug: myid tho' moo voomoo" joem dangain" we' byo , yoin" lo" pyam' bye . Mangsoo gi Babelon voomoo" ri myid boin: nyid zoore" - nya: da" goem , mo nheig gyed" ein: da" so' thain: thang da" zabyid yhid" ri shug nhang: abye: .
66016020	Gu: gyoo: kang: joem yo' boem , lang joem dangain" we' byug . shang loo" khari" bye .
66016021	Houg: lang" moug: laid' mo dacab , ri70 joid" koo: koo: su" bo da" leig voo cab , joem gi byu yi da" atho' moo vo , gyoin: lo . Houg: mo bue" thu' lo da" gyoug pho" shid: gyoin , yoomo byu yi gi Mangsoo ri nheung" nyid boem abye: go .
66017001	Hau: uri goem nyhed loem: ci: da" moug: lagyoo: nyhed yug mo dayug ngoori tid zigi " Gyid moo" lang myoo" sho' da" ayam , moo zhoung: jo , voomoo" zeing te" da" myeing gyi: nyid shava myhi , da" yoobo khyoo: ri ngoo nang ri tid kyoo" ba .
66017002	Myid' jang: tho' mo Khokham" yi gi nyang: yo' aved , avhu: moo" zheung: zei: nyid yoomo mougmyid' moo nyid da" byu yi gi nya: aved , avhu: koid ein: da" zabyid yeid' ri shug yed , ci: abye: go" , ga: tid .
66017003	Hau: thang: ri mouglagyoo: gi ngoori venyi khyo" dain" pyoid yoo khyoo: shu" lam" lo" ri Mangso myeing ri juang" yi da" myeing dagung goin" lhid" tab ci: da" akhyeung" da" gougnyhoug ni , zeing dadu: da" atho' moo myi: yi: myhi , dayug zhoung: jo , ziri ngoo myang - hau: akhyeung" da" gougnyhoug moo vhuloem dab , nyhed loem: dab , lho: khyoug: daxi: khyoug: youg .
66017004	Hau" myi: yi: myhi , gi Ni , mi: yo' ni , no , yo , da" byimi void ci: lho: ngei sheing: lug nyoug - Palhe" joem yo' lhoo , yhoung ci: - nyang: youg: sho: to" da" aved , avhu: koid moozoo" yo' byeung" da" sheing: goem , ri nya: lo , moo zei: ci .
66017005	Nya: ngeilang: tho' moo gi shava myhi , yi yo' " Moug: gyab , goin" ziri khyoo: shu" vhang: lo" da" nya: myhi' - gyi: thang da" Babelon - ga: wigi gau: thang dang: kang: yo' lhid" to" .
66017006	Hau: lho: myi: yi: myhi , hau: yug gi Mangso byu yi da" suid" yo' Yesu ri loem" jeing" yoomo said' pyam' zi shug" mo , da" suid" ri shug yed , nyid ziri ngoo myang .
66017007	Hau: da" moug: lagyoo: ngoori myed: zigi ce: noem , wim wigi nang mau" nyid lha" . Hau" myi: yi: myhi , da" gau: thang dangkang: yo' vhuloem nyhed loem: dab , ziyo' khyoug daxi: loem: youg da" akhyeung" da" gougnyhoug khyoo: ri we' ngoo nang ri tid kyoo" ba .
66017008	Hau: akhyeung" da" gougnyhoug gi shid' phyang" dei nyid yu" bye - nghoid loug we' akhid" gi adei nyid loo - nghoid loug we' nyang: gi no , athang da" duang: khuang" mo thu' re" lho: wigi phyo' shoin , pyam' jang" khyoo: yhe: loo" wa zi nghoid . Moug: phain" myid' aphain" shi" mo Nya: kang: so' moug soug" pug moo - myeing abo lhid" kaid' to" da" moug: myid byu yi gi hau: akhyeung" da" gougnyhoug zeing ri shau" myang lang" mau" hang" to" boem wa nghoid . Nyang: gigoo" nham , dei nyid yu" gye - akhid" gi adei nyid loo - nghoid loug we' doem dei loo shi" wa zi nghoid .
66017009	Hid: moo lase' phajhi" yo' yeug se' da" phajhi" boo ca" - vhuloem nyhed loem: gi hau" myi: yi: zoo: zhoung: jo , da" boem , nyhed loem: nghoid lho: Khokham" nyhed yug ri we' tid nau zi nghoid .
66017010	Khokham" wim: yug gi shid: loo" bye - dayug gi dei nyid shi" - gootu: dayug gi apo" thu' loo shi" - po" thu' loo loug we' daso' za: dayo , daboin: za: te: vhoeb khang" wa zi nghoid .
66017011	Hau: lho: goonham: gi kangso' dei nyid nghoid loug we' akhid" gi age dei nyid lo: da" akhyeung" da" gougnyhoug gi nyhed youg khoug: mo dayug nghoid wigi shed' yug ein: wa da" Khokham" nghoid lho: phyo' shoin , pyam zi shau" zo" lo" nyid bye .
66017012	Nang shau" myang da" khyoug: daxi: loem: gi ashau" vhoeb , khang" shi" da" Khokham" daxi: yug nghoid . Houg: bang: gi akhyeung" gougnyhoug yo' dage" Khokham" da" amyeing" yoem: so' ri ayo , dana: yi: za: yo" yu mo , bue" lo boem wa zi nghoid .
66017013	Hau: da" Khokham" yi daxi: youg bang: gi myid' soin' khyoo: daja: za: bo boem wigi akhyeung" da" gougnyhoug zeing ri nyang: nya: da" yoem: vhoo" yoem: so' yo' amyeing" yoem: so' ri ab , byid: boem .
66017014	Houg: bang: gi hau: yang nu" yo' meing: zain: goo" wa zi nghoid loug we' hau: yang nu" ginyang: khe: yu too" mo , khyen: yu too" mo , yo' nheigloem: zung" lho: nya: thang: cang mo yo' dage" houg: bang: ri oung: pyam wa zi nghoid . Khasu" wim gari nyang: gi Aseing: yi tho' mo Aseing: - Khokham" yi tho' mo khokham" nyang: nghoid nyid .
66017015	Hau: thang: ri mau: lagyoo: ngoori doem tid zigi shava myi: yi: myhi , zhoung: jo , da" gyid lang gi mungdain joem mo myeing" cang: joeb , da" byumyu" yi yo' meing: byu yi nghoid boem ago" .
66017016	Nang myang da" akhyeung" da" gougnyhoug yo' Khyoug: daxi: loem: gi shava myi: yi: myhi , ri ngheing" yoomo nya: byimi , dangain" lang: shang: pyam byid: lho: shoo" cen: doem: koid to" boem wa nya: da" shoo" ri zo: pyam' lho: deung gu: rigi myi: moo nghe , jhoem" pyam wa nghoid .
66017017	Khasu" wim gari Mangso mungdang: joeb , byeung" lo da" bidnyid moo ju' sho' nyangnu" gi dadeing: daloem: za: koid lho: nyangnu" vhoeb , khang" da" amyeing" dang: ri hau: akhyeung" da" gougnyhoug lo , khyoo: ab , byid: khyo" wigi Mangsoo gi nyang: myid soin' khyoo: zei: pyeing byid: nau da" e" myed , ri nyangnu" da" nheigloem: khoug: moo kaid' too" byid: bye .
66017018	Nang shau" myang da" myi: yi: myhi , gi moug: myid khokham" yi da" atho' moo vhoeb , khang" nyid da" voomoo" zeing nghoid - ga: ngoori tid .
66018001	Hau: thang: ri moug: khung: mo gyoo" lo da" mouglagyoo: gootu: ri ngoo myang . Nyang: gi gyi: thang da" amyeing" yoem: so' ci: lho nya: phung yoeb , gi mougmyid gyab , goin" moo doug bang to" .
66018002	Nyang: gi thui: zeing yo' tid zigi nyang: gi byo , yoin" loo" bye: - Babelon voomoo" gi byo , yoin" loo" bye - byo , yoin" loo" bye - nyang: rigiakhuid" main: yu joem yo' mi: byoo joem wigi byo" too" zi shau" su: - aco' jhoid khyoo: aja: ja: yo' ngho' ngheing" joem da" nyid jang: nghoid .
66018003	Khasu" wim ga: ri Nya da" soem" lid' moo" ein: da" zabyid yhid: yo' byumyu" ja: khang: moo" ri yed , leung loo" nhang: bye . Moug: myid tho' mo khokham" yi we' Nyang: yo' dage" soem" lid' sho: moozoo" ri zei: yoomo mougmyid tho' mo phaga byu yi gi sathi" byue" lo boem bye .
66018004	Hau: thang: ri moug: khung: tho' mo thui: gootu: ri ngoo shau" gyo: - Hau: da" thui: gi " Thu' re" boem ge' nga" da" byumyu" yi we" - nya: jang" mo phang: thu' loo" ge' nyang: yo' dage" yooboo akoid nyid loo: goo" - nyang: yo' dage" yoobo dam ri akham' zo: nyid loo: goo" .
66018005	Khasu" wim gari nya: da" yooboo gi moug: khung: myhi: sho' myhang: jo , wigi Mangsoo gi nya: da" akhyeing" ashoeb khyoo: joem ri myid boin: nyid .
66018006	Nanu" gi nyang: koid yhang: ti" - nyang: ri latoo: doem phug byid: ge' . nyang: nanu" ri koid da" tho' moo eig zhang latoo: doem , phug ge' . nanu" ri jhug wa shid re" goem , moo nyang: eig zhang lung: byid: ge' .
66018007	Nyang: gi nya: gung ri koid yu da" myonhoo: phung" yoeb , yo' gung shoo" pyo: khyoo: rishau" kham , zo: nyid ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - nyang: ri koug shu: myid' myoo: ung: loug ziyo' sho" jhen: zi shau" nhang: ge' . Khasu" wim gari nyang: gi " Ngoo gi Khokham" myhi , nghoid - cougmoo" myhi , anghoid - ngoo gi khanham we' nheig koug nheig shu: khyoo: - shau" wa zi a nghoid , ga: wigi nya: gung ri nyang: tid yu nyid da .
66018008	He: khyoo: yoomo danyid" da" bidnyid moo nyang: gi no zi phyo" ziyo' nheig koug nheig shu: ziyo' zooyoid phang" khoug shau" da" shid: gyoin , joem gi nya: tho' moo ju" gyo" loo wam: bye . Nyang: gi myi: yo' nghe , pyam zi shau" wa zi nghoid - Khasu" wim gari nyang: ri dang: phyed' su: Aseing: Mangsoo gi yoem: moo" phung" yoeb , boo su: nghoid , , ga: tid nyid .
66018009	Nyang: yo' aved , avhu" koid go" lho: nyam , da" moug: myid Khokham" yi gi nyang: ringhe , jhoem" nyid da" myikhoug" rimyang lang" hau" voomo" shid re" ngau , yu: yen" boem wa zi nghoid .
66018010	Nyangnu" gi nyang kham , zo: nyid da" dam , ri myang lang" gyoug dain yoomo vi" vi" moo yab , jo , boem lho: nyangnu" tid boem zigi " Apho" apho" - ce: byo" lha" . myo , nhoo bo ziyo' gyi: thangda" Babelon we" - joem: loo" bye: nhung: lha" . dana: yi: khoug: moo za: yoobo dam , kaid' zi shau" bye: nhung: ga: tid nyid boem wa nghoid .
66018011	Moug: myid tho' mo phaga byu yi we' nya: shid re" koug ngau nyid ago . Khasu" wim gari nyangnu" da" zi yoo joem riqei yu wa byu hang" we' anyid boem loo: yoomo nghoid ago" .
66018012	Nyangnu" da" phaga zi joem gi hang" we' aqei boem loo - ngei sheing: lug nyoug lug sen" Palhe" yo' zoin: yung: pain" joem - jid: moo" pain" tung: sang" khyeing: bo da" pain" joem - yen: yen: ne , young" da" pain" joem - phoug" dab , da" seig - gyid: ni joto' yo' lug phyu: - xang: zei yo' koid da" zi aja: ja -
66018013	Seig cang" phyeig - zooxoin" moo kaid' da" nam , pyo: zi aja: ja: - moo" ra: - lo" bain - zabyid yhid: yo' xu: joem - sung: soo: phei" yo' sung: soo: cen: - Nukyung yang kyung myang: kyung yo' myang: rheing" joem - join yi yo' byu yi da" kangso lang" bo boem ago" .
66018014	Phaga byu yi nyang: ri tid zigi " Hau: da" voomoo" zeing ri nang vho: ngei kang: lung bu nyid da - phoug" dab , ziyoo joem gi ajo , loo - soid' gain ziyoo myonhoo: ngeilang: joem we' bei: lo" byug boem bye - hau: da" ziyoo soid' gain joem ri nang thang: phyang" doem shug" vhoo , loo: wa zi anghoid , , ga: tid boem .
66018015	Hau: voomoo" moo phaga koid lho: sathi" bue" lo da" phaga byu yi gi nyang: kham , zo da" yau: khe" jamjau dam , ri bo loin , zoo: wa gyoug yoomo vi" vi: moo dayab , jo . boem wa . Nyangnu" koug ngau zoore" tid zigi
66018016	Vha" - vha" gyi: thang da" voomoo" zeing we" - Jid: moo" pain" yung" - zoin: yung" yo' yen: yen: ne , da" pain" - byimi ri void ci lho: ngei sheing: lug nyoug Palhe" yo' lhoo , yhoung ci: da" gyi: sheung: voomoo" zeing gi joem: loo" bye: nhung .
66018017	Nyang: moo yo" da" ziyoo soid gain' gi dana: yi akhoug: moo joem: thang pyam' bye: nhung: lha" . Gyid sang phoo koin" da" vhu" jhung: yi yo' gyung: soo" mo , dangain" we' vi" vi: moo yab , jo , lho:
66018018	Hau: da" voomoo" nge" joem: lo" da" myiyham: doem' mo myikhoug" joem ri myang lang" gi nyangnu" gi" Khanham nghoid loug we' he: voomoo" ti" gyi: sheung: thang da" voomoo" riamyang yu" boem , shi" - ga: wigi nyho: yoid tid nyid boem .
66018019	Nyang: nu" gi nyangnu" nya: vhuloem moo phei" lhoug: joem ri geug shoin" ci: lho: " Vha" - vha" - Panglai gu: da" sang phoo zeing mo sathi" yi ri yoo" nhang: di nhang: lo da" voomoo" zeing gi dana: yi: da" akhoug: moo za: joem: loo" thang loo" bye: nhung: lha" » ga: koug ngau nyid boem .
66018020	Moug: khung: moug: di we" - hau voomoo" byo , yoin" pyam' bye: yoomo gau , yi nyid loo: ge' . Mangso byu yi yo' lagyoo: yi , lapi: yi we" - gau , yi nyid ge' Khasu" wim gari Mangsoo gi nanu" ri nyang: koid lid lo ziyo' dakhyoo" ti" - hau: voomoo" ri yoobo dam , kaid' bye .
66018021	Hau: thang: moo yoem: moo" bo da" moug: lagyoo: dayug gi gyi: da" lug lheing: zeing yhi' bo da" lug daloem: ri yu lho: panglai gyid thoem" moo du" zei , kaid' wigi " Babelon voomoo" gi hid: yhang: ti" du" khyo' kaid' zi shau" wa nghoid lho: thang: phyang" hau: voomoo" ri khanham we' doem myang loo: wa zi anghoid - ga: tid .
66018022	Nya: jang" mo teing thui: yo' byu thui: - khoo" lhang thui: yo' laboo" thui: ri khanham we' doem , shaug" gyoo: loo wa zi anghoid . Nang moo ce" lo , moo" zei: mo , khanham we' adoem myang loo wa lug lheing: gyeig thui: ri khanham we' doem , shaug" gyoo: loo: wa zi anghoid .
66018023	Nang moo khanham we' myibung bang ziri shau" myang loo: wa zi anghoid . myhi , seig yo' phoo seig yi thui: ri we' khanham we' ashaug" gyoo: loo: wa Re" da" phaga byu yi gi mougmyid gyab , goin" jang" moo Pa: va: bo thang mo , bue" lo lho: nanu" da" mhau' fain" goem phain" maintain: yo' nanu" gi moug: myid byu yi dangain" ri khyoo: shu" vhang: pyam boem bye .
66018024	Babelon gi yoobo dam , kaid' ziri shau" khyoo: gi khasu" wim gari hau: voo , moo - lapi: yi yo' Mangso byu yi da" suid" - moug: myed tho' moo said' pyam' zi shau" moo shug" mo , da" suid" joem ri houg: moo shau" myang yoomo nghoid nyid .
66019001	Hau: thang: ri moug: khung: moug: di mo , byu phung: moo" zeing thui: yhang: te" ziri ngoo shau" gyo . Houg: bang: da" thui: gi " Mangsoo ri coung" byid: ge' . Ngoonu" da" Mangsoo gi khyoid yu da" khyoo: - myonhoo: Phung" yoeb , yo' yoem: so' yoo" su: nghoid .
66019002	Nyang: dang: phyed khyoo: gi deingmain" ziyo' nyeung veung" nyid . 66022004	Ngoonu" gi nya: da" myonhoo: ri yu" wigi nyangnu" da" ngeilang: joem moo nya: myeing ri lhid" tab to" boem wa .
66022005	Hau: voogung moo myen" khanham we' ajo , yoomo nyangnu" gi myiboung: da" bidbang we' bid da" boo" bang we' aca" loo: wa Khasu" wim gari Aseing: Mangsoo gi nyangnu" da" bidbang bue" lo wigi nyangnu" gi apyaid atoo: moo Khokham" yi yhang: ti" vhoeb khang" lo" boem wa .
66022006	Hau: thang: ri moug: lagyoo: ngoori tid zigi " He: dang: joem gi deing byeung" ziyo' loem , ge" nyid . Hau: lho: nya: venyi lapi: yi ri kaid' byid: da" Aseing: Mangsoo gi ayo , khamyhang amyang" ri bue" loo wa da" khyoo: - nya: dei zoo: yi ri toin" shid' wa shid re" nya: da" moug: lagyoo: yi ri nhang: kaid' bye ga: wigi Yesu ngoori tid .
66022007	Yesu gi tam' gyoo: ge' ngoo amyang" ri re" loo wa he: jhoem: pug mo lapi: dang: ri tam" gyoo: mo gi ngi lho , shau" boem wa ga: tid .
66022008	Ngoo Yohan gi he: da" khyoo: joem dangain" ri shau" gyo: ziyo' shau" myang su: nghoid . He: khyoo: ri shau" gyo: ziyo' bain , myang thang: ri he: khyoo: joem ngoori toin" shid' da" mouglagyoo: khyid: yang: moo ngoo gi nyang: ri goeb , pid' wa soin .
66022009	Nghoid loug we' nyang: ngoori tid zigi " Houg: su" akoid - ngoo gi re" da" mang: nhung" lapi: yi yo' he" mougsoug" moo bo da" mungdang: ri tam" gyoo: mo , dangain" - nanu" da" dei zoo: byencang" dayug nghoid . Mangsoo ri dano' ku" we' , , ga: tid toem pyam .
66022010	Hau: thang: ri nyang: gi " He: mougsoug" moo bo da" lapi: dang: ri ayhoem" azau" too" - Khasu" wim gari he: khyoo: dangain" bue" loo wa ayo , gi jhang bye .
66022011	Adeung amain" su: gi adeung amain" khyo" cang nyid shi" baja" - agyeungshang: su: gi agyeungshang: khyo" nyid shi" baja" - gyeungshang: su: gi gyeungshang: nyid baja" , , ga: ngoori tid .
66022012	Tam" gyo: yu" ge' . Ngoo amyang" ri ju" ri" wa dayug yo' dayug ri nya: moozoo" yo' dakhyoo" ti" - doem , toug" byid: wa moin: yi" da" ngi shab , jhung: shug gi ngoo ci: ri" wa .
66022013	Ngoo gi xang: shed" yug yo' lo" thang yug - gam , shid" shi: su: yo' gam , thang: theing su: nghoid , , ga: wigi Yesu tid .
66022014	Kangso' shi" gam , mo ashi" ri zoo: wa amyeing" yo" lho: voogung khoug: khyoo: khoem" moo" duang: khyo" yo" vang loo" sho' nyang: nya: da" byisheing: joem ri ced" phyu: pyam mo , gi ngi lho , nyid .
66022015	Nghoid loug we' voogung da" nghe: shoid moo nyid mo , gi loem" jeung" khyoo: moo khyoo: vhang: vhang: mo , goem , phain" maintain: khyoug" mo , yo' aved , avhu: koid mo , byu said mo , soolhoo: ri noku mo , yo' ung: khoug: mo we' zei: da" moozoo" khyo" we' no" zo mhau' fain" voo mo , nghoid nyid boem ago" .
66022016	" Ngoo Yesu gi Phung byu yi da" akhoug: moo hid: yhang: te" khyoo: joem ri tid fu" kyoo" wa shid re" nga" moug: lagyoo: ri nhang: kaid . Ngoo gi davi da" akung: mo yhoem: byu nghoid lho: wigi nab , kyo' boo" myhu: we' ngoo nghoid nyid .
66022017	Hau: venyi yo' myhi , seig gi " Ri" we' , , he: khyoo: ri shaug" gyoo: mo , hang" nghoid loug we' " Ri" we' , , ga: tid baja" . Gyid shed' su: gi ri" baja" - shug noug mo , hang" nghoid loug we' jhung: shug khyo" aphoug" agyoo" loo: za: kangso' gyid ri kham: shug goo" baja" , , ga: tid .
66022018	Ngoo Yohan gi he: da" mougsoug" mo lapi: dang: joem ri gyo: yu mo , dangain" ri jhug jhug tid poin" kaid zigi dang: he: gu: mo daja: ja: ri loung: kaid' su: hang" ri we' he: mougsoug" moo lhid" to" da" shen" yhen shid: gyoin , joem gi Mangso wigi nya: tho' moo lung: byid: loo wa .
66022019	He: mougsoug" moo bo da" lapi: dang: daja: ja: ri yu she: pyam' su: hang" ri nghoid loug we' he: mougsoug" moo lhid" to" da" kangso' shi" gam , mo shi" ri zoo: wa ziyo' gyeungshang: da" voogung mo yo" vang yu zoo: wa nya: da" agyid asoo: ri Mangso yu she: pyam byid: loo wa zi nghoid .
66022020	Nghoid bye" - ngoo amyang" ri deing" deing nyang: ju" ri" wa ga: tid . Houg: su" bui" baja" - Aseing Yesu we" - gyoo" ri" we' o" .
